name: Affordable Ocean View in Paradise
summary: Share our beautiful retro-style one bedroom condo with a million dollar view of ocean and mountains. Close to golf, Disney, shopping, hiking, or just relaxing on the most beautiful beaches in the world. Wake up to a dip in the pool or relax on the lanai.  Located in Makaha Valley, just a 2 min drive to beautiful Makaha Beach or  Makaha Golf Course: 15-20 min drive to Ko'Olina resort complex (Disney Resort, 4 / 5-star dining, & Paradise Cove Luau) and Kapolei. 40 min to airport, 1 hr to Waikiki.
space: This one bedroom condo with central A/C has incredible high floor views of the tropical Makaha Valley and beach. There is a full kitchen and basic beach items.
description: Share our beautiful retro-style one bedroom condo with a million dollar view of ocean and mountains. Close to golf, Disney, shopping, hiking, or just relaxing on the most beautiful beaches in the world. Wake up to a dip in the pool or relax on the lanai.  Located in Makaha Valley, just a 2 min drive to beautiful Makaha Beach or  Makaha Golf Course: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min drive to Ko'Olina resort complex (Disney Resort, 4 / 5-star dining, & Paradise Cove Luau) and Kapolei. 40 min to airport, 1 hr to Waikiki. This one bedroom condo with central A/C has incredible high floor views of the tropical Makaha Valley and beach. There is a full kitchen and basic beach items. The entire condo is available to the guest, except for a locked owner's cabinet in the bathroom closet. We would love to meet you, but we live on the mainland. Any questions can be directed to our on-island contact, H. Lee, who lives close by and can be reached at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) She will be happy
notes: Park only in areas explained by security. if you arrive after 5 pm and the front office is closed, security will give you a temporary parking pass and you will have to park in a special area until morning when you register.
transit: There is a bus stop outside the gate which can take you down to the beach, the grocery store, or to the closest city , Kapolei. To get to the airport requires two bus changes. A car is recommended for this area.
access: The entire condo is available to the guest, except for a locked owner's cabinet in the bathroom closet.
interaction: We would love to meet you, but we live on the mainland. Any questions can be directed to our on-island contact, H. Lee, who lives close by and can be reached at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) She will be happy to help you!
house_rules: Please respect the front-gate security guards and the rules they require.

reviews.comments: We enjoyed staying at Ann's condo!  The view was absolutely amazing and we loved that Makaha beach (a beautiful and quiet beach)was just a short 15 minute jog/2 minute drive away.  The place itself was very clean and tidy and very spacious.  The Towers are in a secluded area which was very quiet and the staff was extremely friendly.  Groceries and places to eat were about a 10-15 minute drive away.  Ann provided all the directions and info that we needed to get in and we had no difficulties.  Would stay again!
Everything was good except for minor details like no iron, tub has stain and paint in it, pool closed at 8pm, bed is comfortable, view is awesome... Go to pokai bay and see uncle George.

this was an amazing place. the unit was fully furnished with an aloha hawaiian touch to it. the view made every morning waking up a pleasure. there was two boogie boards and two snorkel sets, extra towels, extra toiletries, and there were peacocks outside to make that real fantasy get-away come true. im still in wow mode.....thank you so much for having us and we plan on staying there again.

I can't say enough good things about the unit in Makaha Valley Towers. The view out the bedroom and living room was really great; plantation, mountains and ocean all in one. There was plenty of silver, glasses, plates and enough pots/pans to make full meals in a full kitchen (including dishwasher). 

This building has central air; semi-rare in Hawai'i. I turned it off on arrival (back on for the next person when I left) and the breeze kept the unit plenty cool for me. King size bed with extra blankets in one of the closets. Plenty of towels, there was soap and shampoo when I got there. Internet/wifi was fast, cable box in the living room with countless channel options, cable tv in both the living room and the bed room. I believe the couch was a sleeper sofa and the love seat reclined. 2 minutes down Kili Dr to as nice of beach as Oahu has to offer. Real calm water on the West side beaches in the summer months. Around 10 minutes to Wai'anae store or Tumura's, both grocery stores,  15 minutes to the northern end of Farrington Hwy with an easy/good hike out to Ka'ena Point, just over 20 min (w/out traffic) to Ko Olina. 

Communication with Lynn & Ann's house keeper H. Lee was good. Gave clear instructions of what to do, how to get in the grounds and how to get into the unit. Then association/office/guards are clear on the rules and will enforce them from what other people living at MVT have said, but I felt this was a good thing. 

This side of Oahu as close to 'Real Hawai'i' as you can find on Oahu as far as I'm concerned. I enjoyed it so much here I called a reality company and am thinking about buying one here instead of on the Gold Coast.
Beautiful home with a beautiful view. Would definitely stay here again. Thank you for letting us stay here.
Everything you could possibly need was readily variable. Very nice place and makes you feel comfortable and right at home.

This was my first airbnb and If I could give this place 10/5...I definately would!
The place is exactly depicted in photos and description. The view every morning was spectacular . We felt aa id were at Jurassic Park. Kitchen ware is available and very useful if your on a budget.Worth the stay if you dont want to be around the chaos in Waikiki ,but heads up do plan your day accordingly....traffic can happen on the way to the city randomly due to rimpac,tourist & wedding season.

It was an absolutely great experience. It is in a nice area and has a lot of room. We put the snorkel gear to good use and enjoyed the wonderful view. There was a coffee maker, rice cooker, microwave oven and cooking supplies. They have pamphlets about the area and have instructions for everything you need. Among the hustle and bustle of the rest of our trip it really did feel like a retreat during our stay in Waianae.

We enjoyed our time in this condo. It's an older home, but very well maintained. It was very clean and well stocked with everything that we could need, including extra blankets, beach towels and coolers. The hosts even offered us to use their snorkelling gear, which we did not get to, but perhaps on our next visit. We loved waking up to the stunning ocean and mountain views from the floor to ceiling windows that open onto a cozy lanai. The air conditioning was perfect after a hot day on the beach. The location was picturesque and while out of the big city it was close to fabulous beaches and hiking paths. The location was easy to find from the airport and the condo staff and security were friendly and helpful. Although we never met our hosts, they were quick to respond to any questions that we had. The Internet was reliable and we were thankful for the guest book that outlined great eats and attractions. Make sure you have a functioning mobile phone that works with one of the providers as the land line in the condo was not functioning during our visit. We really enjoyed our time and would gladly stay there again.

Wonderful condo off the beaten path with a spectacular beach and easy access to major attractions on the island. Communication with the owners prior to arrival was wonderful. Before we arrived we knew exactly how to get to the condo, get in and where to find the grocery stores on the way. The view from the condo is spectacular and the bed is super comfy! The condo had everything that we needed; beach towels, chairs, boogie boards, cooler, and high quality snorkel gear for two. The beach at the end of the road, which is a 15-20 minute walk or a 2 minute drive was one of our favorites on the island. At times it felt like a private beach and we even saw turtles swimming at the beach with us. The location is off the beaten path, something we loved, but has easy access to the north shore and all major attractions. A rental car is a must if you want to stay here. The complex has easy parking, is quiet and full of friendly people. Though we did not use the pool (a salt water pool) and BBQ area, both were easy to access. I highly recommend staying here and hope to return in the future!

Communications with Lynn & Ann were terrific.  I heard from them even before I asked any questions--they were quick to send confirmation and to provide check-in details.   The place was everything that the write-up and reviews said it would be and more.  The view was spectacular! As others said "just like Jurassic Park".  It was quaint to hear the peacocks in the early morning hours (we kinda missed it after we left)  The condo was clean, spacious and comfortable.  They had items there that those traveling from places other then the island would not be able to bring--- cooler, beach mat, snorkeling equipment  and beach chair (the beach chairs were a very pleasant surprise. . . . we got to see some great sunsets in comfort!).  We were greeted daily by helpful and friendly staff at the main gate and in the office.  The one slight drawback is that the surrounding area is not very commercialized--restaurant and stores are scarce.  However with planning, we were able to use the BBQ grills at poolside.  I would highly recommend this property--it far exceeded our expectations!!  If there were 6 stars to rate the condo I would give it!!!
Good view and a quick drive to the beach!

We really enjoyed our stay at Lynn & Ann's condo. The apartment has great views both of the mountains and the ocean. The complex is well maintained, and the staff we spoke to were very kind and friendly. The pool area is really nice. We didn't use the barbeque area which is located close to the pool area, but it looked very nice. It only took 5min to the beach by car, which we believe you need to have when you stay in this condo. It took around 1 hour to get to the condo from Honolulu. 

We felt at home inside of the apartment, it was well cleaned and had all we needed during our stay. The only thing we could suggest Lynn and Ann to add to the kitchen are a kettler for the morning tea. 

The condo looks to have the original furnitures and details, which is so beautiful and we liked it a lot. The bed was very comfortable.

The communications with Lynn and Ann was good.

Waianae is on the West coast, leeward, which is drier and less windy and less waves. If you're a snorkler or diver it's angreqt location. This part of the island is less developed and things are mellow. There are some great beaches - we went snorkeling and surfing (beginners). We also visited many other spots around the island, the driving from waianae was lengthy due to less developed road system. 

The condo was great, provided ample space for a couple. It was overall very clean though some upgrades (kitchen) would be nice. Checkin was very easy, on site staff very friendly and helpful, the information provided by the host was detailed and accurate. 

I can recommend this place and the host.

This was our first trip to Oahu, and couldn't have picked a better place to stay. We never met Lynn & Ann, but we have no doubt that had we had any issues, it would be an easy solve, especially since they provided contact information for us. At first glance the apartment was like a retro beach bungalow. There were mirrors everywhere and made the place feel very spacious and bright. I loved it and don't think they need to make any upgrades at all because everything was fully functional. We used the full kitchen a lot and appreciated having everything we needed. We shopped for groceries before arriving and was glad we did. We also used the bbq grill a few times, that area was clean and easy to use. We also used the beach chairs a lot, but didn't get a chance to use the boogie boards or snorkel gear.

Everyone at the condo was extremely nice. The grounds are very well maintained and while the rules were a bit strict (we got a noticed on our door for parking our car on the line once), we appreciated how it's mostly for everyone's safety, rather than just for having rules. Makaha Beach down Kili Drive was a big highlight for staying on the leeward side. The beach had calm waters in the center and surfable waves to each end. The location was also good for exploring the other more remote beaches like Yokohama Bay and hiking to Ka'ena Point. The drawback is that the drive to other coasts was usually upwards of an hour. Even driving to Kapolei took around 40mins. Despite the drive, we were very happy with the stay. The neighborhood leading up to the condo was full of tent cities and a lot of homeless people, so that was sad to see, but we never felt unsafe. Tamura's on the way in is a great place to get poke! All in all, we loved our stay in Oahu, and this condo apartment made our trip that much more enjoyable!

A perfect place if you like peace and quiet. Beautiful ocean and hillside views. Very comfortable bed, and great shower and bath. We drove all around the island and always returned home to sunshine.  Makaha beach is fabulous. Thankfully, it is not listed in the guide books. However, if you like to fight for a space on the beach, cocktails on tap and shopping (which we don't!) head for Waikiki!

We stayed at Lynn and Ann's place for a week.  The communication beforehand and during was very quick and thorough.

The view from the balcony was amazing.  The whole front wall is glass, so there was lots of light too.  There was great curtains, so you weren't bothered by the light in the morning.

The Complex is very well run by the management team.  They are very friendly and helpful, as well as very careful about who comes and goes on the property.  We felt very safe there.

Although the apartment is older and has not been updated, it is in very good shape for it's age.  Everything works well, from appliances to plumbing.  There is "Central Air Conditioning" which is a HUGE plus.  It is efficient and not LOUD! All the gear that you need for the beach is included too.

The pool is lovely and the Barbeque area is clean and has high end Weber Barbeques, and picnic tables to eat at.  People tend to congregate over cooking.  We met most of the travellers down there. When we arrived, we went to Tamura's Grocery store and stocked up for the week, for only $200! We spent that in Waikiki in restaurants in 1 1/2 days!

The area, Makaha, is quite isolated. Although you can get the bus, you really need a car. We didn't mind because the travel time to other places was worth coming back to out apartment paradise.  It is 1 1/2 hours to the Northshore or the East side, an hour to Waikiki and only 1/2 an hour to Ko Olina.  Because Makaha is on the "dry" side, we had almost no rain, except the huge storm that hit all of the islands at once!

Our favourite  beaches were Keawaula/Yokohama a 10 minute drive north of the apartment.  You can swim, sunbathe and snorkel with locals and tourists, but never very many in total at one time.  People are super friendly. The other was Ko Olina. It is a 4 Lagoon Resort 1/2 hour south where 3 big hotels are. But, you can use the beaches there, they are not private, and there is public parking for free.  They are lovely, calm and beautiful.  And you can get a restaurant fix if you need it.  There are very few restaurants in the area of the apartment.

Sorry for the long winded review, but we just loved our stay at Lynn and Ann's place and are trying to encourage others to have such a nice holiday as us! we will be back.
Fantastic views of both mountains and ocean.  Great location for whale-watching tours and hiking to wildlife refuge.

The best place to stay in Oahu if you want to avoid the crowds and noise of Honolulu. The complex is well maintained, secure and quiet at nights. The apartment is large enough for 2 people, the king bed is extremely comfortable, and the carpeted floors are nice to walk on. The kitchen appliances are a bit dated, but functioning without any issues.

Lynn and Ann, and their on-island contact, Hope, were amazing hosts. Very quick to help us with anything that we needed or any questions that we had. The apartment is extremely spacious and comfortable, especially the bed! The views out the front and on the small patio are absolutely INCREDIBLE and a joy to wake up to each morning. The only real downside is the location - the towers are in a pretty remote location without many decent restaurants or stores nearby; to get to Honolulu/Waikiki, the North Shore beaches, or basically anywhere else we went was at least a 30 mile drive.

A very clean and pleasant apartment. Fabulous views and the comfiest bed ever. Which after a 27 hour journey from the UK was very welcome. However, we were very disappointed in the area. Just down the road is the largest homeless camp full of addicts. Due to the poor area there are no restaurants of any quality and the local 7-11 was robbed at gunpoint during our stay. The supermarkets are very run down. Also don't expect to sunbathe much. The mountains attract heavy could whilst the rest of the island is in beautiful sunshine. The sun drops at 3pm and doesn't have any nice evening sun at all. The apartment is in need of modernisation the kitchen is firmly in the 70's.

Great location, quiet and set with a beautiful mountain range as a backdrop.  Lynn and Ann's condo makes you feel right at home the minute you step inside the front door.  The décor they chose for their place is of a high standard, with the bed and lounges really comfortable.  Everything we needed (and more) was there for our use.  This made our stay even more enjoyable than we has hoped for.  We know where to stay the next time we visit beautiful Oahu.  Would recommend Lynn and Ann's place to everyone.
Fabulous stay, coming back soon!

If you are looking for a quiet area to stay away from the bustle of the all the tourists and attractions, this is the spot for you! The view from the apartment is nothing short of beautiful and the beaches in the area are wonderful and not as busy. The lifestyle on this side of the island can be a little nomadic but honestly the people were friendly. Thanks Again Lynn and Ann!
Beau logement, bien équipé . Grand. Mais surtout vue magnifique sur la mer et la montagne. C'est calme .

Lynn & Ann's place is as close to my idea of perfection as I can imagine.  If you enjoy the hustle, bustle, noise, crowds, honking horns and overpriced food on Waikiki, then this IS NOT the right place for you.  This place is situated up on a hill on the edge of beautiful Makaha Valley.  One wall is covered completely in glass sliding doors, and offers spectacular views of the valley and out into the West ocean.  It was really well stocked with all of the amenities you would expect.  The security and admin staff at the location were all very friendly and helpful.  We had never been to Hawaii before, and were unsure about where to stay, what to do, etc.  Our biggest priority was to have a quiet and secure place to stay, and access to secluded beautiful beaches.  We could not have picked a better spot.  Thank you Lynn and Ann!!
Good price, nice pool, quiet. We would recommend Lynn and Ann's place for those looking to relax and enjoy Oahu on a budget. A car is needed though, even to get to the beach.

If you have never seen the splendor of Makaha Valley, you need to put it on your bucket list. There is no better view of the valley than the sweeping vista of mountains to the sea from this lovely condo. I’ve been in many apartments in the Makaha Towers and this has one of the top views there! While it’s not newly updated it is spacious, well maintained, quiet, clean, and comfortable. Central air keeps it nice and cool. The swimming pool is salt water, so low chlorine for pleasant exercise. About a mile from great beaches, and close to hiking. 

The Makaha Towers are well run, with many friendly and helpful staff. While the rooms are handicapped accessible, unfortunately the pool is not. 

This condo is a great place to stay, the hosts were easy to communicate with and they outfitted the place completely. I will definitely return whenever I’m back in Makaha.

The Unit although dated,  was very clean. The views there are picturesque. The property Staff was very friendly and helpful.  The beach is a lot less crowded than waikiki. My wife and I enjoyed our stay there.
Cozy stay in Makaha Valley embedded in a picturesque landscape and stunning nature. Amazing hosts, quiet complex with awesome saltwater pool and state of the art, ready2use barbecue grills.
This is a great place to relax, the complex feels very secure and staff are helpful and friendly, good base to travel from as long as you have a car.

This place would be perfect for a couple, with a car, who want to cook for themselves every night, don’t care to meet local people or experience cultural events, and whose idea of a good time is relaxing by the pool with a bunch of other tourists or at the beach.

Most people will call this dated and a few things are but we didn't care, it was immaculately clean, comfortable, quiet and safe. As many reviewers have said, it's a fair drive to get to most places on the island and traffic can be crazy busy in rush hour but the drive is gorgeous. You just need to leave time to get somewhere. The bus system comes regularly but it's a long ride to Honolulu if that's where you need to go. Tamura's grocery has real good prices and a great selection. For those looking for chain restaurants, it's about a half hour drive but local restaurants are a great option.

The views from the condo were breathe taking.  The property was well maintained and the staff was, friendly.  We loved watching the beautiful peacock family and were able to take some great pictures.  Lynn and Ann had thought of everything and the kitchen was well equipped for cooking.  Would highly recommend this airbnb.

Beautiful condo with everything you could need! On the 10th floor with gorgeous views of the ocean and mountains, peacocks love to hang around the property and make for a great sight! The property has a swimming pool that was very clean and accessible, no issues with noise or rude tenants. Security was very nice and tight, we felt very safe.Many items were provided in the condo including basic toiletries, beach chairs, and snorkeling gear! 

A few things to be aware of that should NOT deter you from staying here-- getting in/out of this side of the island is difficult as there is only 1 way in and out. Plan on at least a 30 minute drive out before hitting the highway, when traffic is low. At peak traffic times you are looking at a 1 hour 30 minute drive to Honolulu or North Shore. Traffic in that area gets bad as there are many schools along this one road. The beaches in this area get crowded with locals and many homeless people. Weekends wouldn't be a good time to go to the beach on this side of the island but on the weekdays it was serene, clean, and everything you could want!! 

I am so glad we made the decision to stay here and are looking forward to our return!!

Be aware of the location, it's a drive to get to any other part of the island. With that being said, I would stay here again if I got the chance. Beautiful scenery, peacocks everywhere, staff were wonderful. Close to some very nice, intimate beaches. The place is perfect for a single person or a couple, me and my husband loved it. Kitchen was stocked with everything you need to whip up a meal (besides the groceries of course) Lots of towels were provided, and some good beach gear (snorkeling gear, boogie boards, umbrella, etc) The buildings are very easy to navigate, this apartment being in core 2. Laundry was easy, parking was easy, the salt water pool is great. Will definitely consider staying here on our next trip to Oahu!

This condo is excellent.   The view is unbelievable and the breeze was magnificent.   Screen door allows fresh air flow through the unit.   The pool was heated and never crowded.  Nice cook out area.  Good security.   The hosts communicated clearly.   There is a great snorkeling beach just a couple of minutes down the hill.   We would certainly stay here again!
Staying for the second time. Perfect.

Eine tolle ruhig gelegene Anlage mit sehr schöner Aussicht . Für uns war es optimal, man sollte aber wissen,dass man min 45 min nach Honolulu fährt.  Die Aussicht vom Appartment ist unglaublich schön und man fühlt sich wie in Jurassic Park. Auch der Strand toll, nur sind leider überall Obdachlose und kuriose Gestalten auf  Strassen unterwegs. Die Anlage ist jedoch sehr sicher und wird super bewacht. Ebenso ist alles super ausgestattet, z.B. Duschbad, Essen, selbst Bier stand im Kühlschrank, einfach wahnsinn, man sollte sich nucht pbe Jederzeit sehr gern wieder in dieser Unterkunft, man kann sie jeden nur weiterempfehlen,der Ruhe und Entspannung sucht. Der Pool und auch die Barbeque Area sind auch so schön und sehr gepflegt.  Die Fotos täuschen es ist in Wirklichkeit viel schöner im Appartment.

This place is beautiful located between a Mountain View and the beach! Very quiet and romantic, you open up the curtains and sliding door to Hawaii’s raw beauty. The condo was clean and very comfortable had no issues or no complaints! Would recommend this place and the staff are super friendly and the wild peacocks made it feel even more tropical!
Beautiful views, spotless house, comfy bed!!!

Great view of ocean and mountains,  most apartment is 70,s decor with  great kitchen amenities and well supplied with linens and towels and  toiletries 

Since you are in the middle of where most Hawaiians live, you get a good feel of the local culture and not the typical  tourist Waikiki exposure.
The grounds are well patrolled by security and gives you a safe feeling walking around.

In 10 minute driving distance you will find Tamura super market, Starbucks and local eateries.
If you are looking for high end or fancy restaurants this is not  the place for it, you need to drive out  to find  it.
We did lots of  home cooking and  used the gas lit bbq,s around the pool.

You will need a car if you want to get around also for the beaches, which are nice and quiet compare to the tourist areas.
We did experience the WiFi  to be slow in the apartment and not responsive ,I needed to be connected  for some future work assignments , but that is the only downside from our overall experience.
great place, great location, beautiful mountains and beach view

Beautiful spot! Wild peacocks! Gas grills! Any beach accessory you could need or want! Great pressure in the shower, friendly staff, & comfy (but firm) bed! Pillows could be updated, as they were pretty worn, but all-in-all a great stay!!

Good affordable place as base to explore leeward side. Good amenities, nice pool and BBQ area. Immediate area is a bit isolated so a car is required. Building security is strict with parking privileges and the main building office has limited hours so can be slightly inconvenient for guests accustomed to ease of access and those with planned itineraries. However, building staff are generally pleasant and helpful. Overall, the view, amenities, pool, nice bed and thoughtful touches outweigh any of the minor inconveniences mentioned. We enjoyed our stay and would stay again.

It is a wonderful space. Clean, comfortable, and convenient, with amazing views. The Island contact, Hope, was also wonderful and super helpful. 
Go for it...you'll like it!
Great hosts with many extra little perks, such as beach chairs, umbrella, snorkel gear and condiments that help save you a little money and time. The view is amazing and room is very comfortable.

this place is amazing. great views of the makaha valley and western shore and tons of amazing places to eat nearby. we used the space as more of a home base but no one spot on the island is more than an hours drive (traffic permitting as you do hit a snag during rush hour) but I couldn't imagine a better spot for our stay.
Great place. Only down side is location if your activities are elsewhere on the island. Traffic can be bad at different times of the day. Still workable just need to plan ahead.

The location is remote and perfect for getting away from the busy tourist area.  30 minutes down the road is the Ko'Olina area, which has great restaurants and beaches. 
The staff at the building are amazing!!!  
The unit is clean and the view is stunning, can't get over the mountains.

As advertised. It’s very clean, nearly everything needed is provided. Nice touch that there’s a private pool and bbq area available. Staff for the building is very friendly and helpful. It’s a bit of a hike in and out everyday to get to and from excursions, etc. as it is on the west end of the island, but is a minor issue. The building is fantastic and the view is gorgeous. 
Highly recommended.

My husband and I chose to spend our honeymoon here. It was everything we could have hoped for and more. I have been visiting Makaha for the past 15 years, always staying at a beachfront condo. However, after our stay at Lynn’s place, we will never return to the other condo! The hospitality at the towers is beyond measure. Check in is quick and easy, and the office staff makes you feel very welcomed. The condo itself was sparkling clean and had everything you could possibly need. There is access to washer and dryer, so you are able to pack light. The views from the condo are breathtaking. You can’t beat waking up to the view. The beach is a quick 2-3 min drive to a fabulous beach. I could go on and on. We’re already looking at when we can go back!
Great view of the surrounding countryside and ocean off in the distance. Security is A+.
a1
The apartment and the whole premises are very well maintained. The apartment is clean, comfortable, and it has amazing views of mountains and the ocean. It’s also close to the beach.

name: Ribeira 24 (4)
summary: Situados na típica e pitoresca Ribeira do Porto, totalmente remodelados e equipados de forma a proporcionar o melhor conforto aos seus visitantes. De frente para o rio Douro e perto dos principais pontos de atração da cidade, é o alojamento perfeito.
description: Situados na típica e pitoresca Ribeira do Porto, totalmente remodelados e equipados de forma a proporcionar o melhor conforto aos seus visitantes. De frente para o rio Douro e perto dos principais pontos de atração da cidade, é o alojamento perfeito.

host.host_about: A Stay In Apartments tem-se dedicado à recuperação de apartamentos em ruas típicas da Ribeira do Porto, proporcionando alojamento com o máximo de qualidade e conforto.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

name: Habitación indiv con cama extra
summary: Acogedora habitacion doble con posibilidad de una cama extra en el barrio de gracia en un tipico piso modernista. Situado en pleno centro geografico de Barcelona y todos sus distritos. zona tranquila y bien comunicada por metro y bus.
space: Edificio modernista con techos muy altos, hay una cama doble y otra individual lo que permite dormir en pareja o por separado
description: You can use the kitchen, bathroom, living room and washing machine.
neighborhood_overview: This flat is a aditional flat located in Barrio Gracia. The good thing about Gracia is that it feels like a bustling little village within a city. There are lots of cool plazas, bars, cafes and restaurants to hang out in, as well as as plenty of fresh fruit, veg and bread to buy. There are a lot less tourists compared to the centre, which gives the Barrio a more authentic feel. Around there there re a lots of fresh fruit and veg, bread, cafes, bars, plazas and restaurants in the area! A perfect hub from which you can explore an amazing city!
notes: Well connected by public transport like bus and metro (15 minutes to the centre) but walking anywhere in the city is easy. You can walk to the centre in about 20 minutes and 10 min to La Sagrada Familia. Nearest Metro station are Joanic, Verdaguer.
transit: From the airport the Best way to the aparment is the tube Line 9 to collblanc, change to Line 5 untill Verdaguer, afther that 5 minutes wolk to the aparment
access: You can use the kitchen, bathroom, living room and washing machine.
interaction: I live here, i am happy to help and point you in the right direction. I  can recommend lots of good places to eat and drink.
house_rules: This is a quite neighbourhood and building, people is really respectfull, just collaborate to maintain it and not to create noisy or disrespectful situations.  The apartment is clean and tidy. Feel free to use the space to stay comfortable but leave the things as you found them taking care of them and cleaning all you use.

host.host_about: Hola me llamo txus trabajo en el mundo de las terapias como osteopata y llevo 12 años viviendo en barcelona , me encanta esta ciudad y en especial el barrio de gracia , tranquilo y animado al mismo tiempo . Como viajero me gusta conocer gente de culturas diferentes y si lo necesitan ayudar a conocer esta maravillosa ciudad
host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

address.government_area: el Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments: Ottima persona , sempre disponibile per qualsiasi cosa! La casa è stata accogliente e situata in una buona posizione per spostarsi in metro, ben collegata e vicino alla Sagrada Familia! Consigliata !

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Txus. Il vit dans un appartement qui est typiquement espagnol et c'est vraiment plaisant pour nous qui sommes touristes de voir ce type de logement. Il était très gentil et nous étions bien dans la chambre. Merci Txus!!
The apartment of Txus is perfect, we loved to stay here. I think the next time I'll go to Barcelona, I'll go there again if the apartment is free.

The apartment was better then expected! It is really cute and I love the tiled floor.
It was easy to find and a walk from town. Everyone was really friendly in the house and the kitchen had everything we needed :)
Relatively straightforward to get to from the airport, although luggage in the underground is a nightmare as there are often no escalators!
Would highly recommend this place!
Very nice and helpful. He waited for us until 2am, because we our airplane had a delayed. In the morning he cooked coffee and gave us all the neccesary information that we asked. Really nice staying.
Bien, amable y correcto
Txus was very friendly and accommodating. His place was walkable to attractions and comfortable. Would certainly recommend.

It was great! Txus's apartment is located in a quiet area that is close to some of the major tourist attractions (15min walk to Sagrada Familia, 15 min to Casa Milà, 20min to Park Güell) and has several metro stations nearby if one is feeling lazy. It is basically a shared flat where you can use the room appointed, living room (with a balcony), kitchen and bathroom. Everything was very clean and nice (way better that in the pictures). The room we stayed in was not very big, but it had everything we needed. Txus is very nice and helpful and made us feel really welcomed. Would totally recommend!

Txus is a very nice guy, hè was very welkomming, even though hè had been waiting for us for more than a hour.
Nice clean room, comfortable bed. Clean shared bathroom, good shower.
Nearby metrostation, safe area. Would reccomend!

Top! Txus is very kind and helpful. He's a lovely and careful person. The house is very clean, the room is minimal but comfortable, i liked it. Close to the house there r bus stations and metro stations.

Very good stay by Txus who is a very nice thoughtful guy, ans very helpful and welcoming. His shared appartement is relaxing, each person is respectful. The area ist very calm, I loved this quarter. I recommand his place.
Txus is very kind, helpful and welcoming host! The beds were comfy and the bathroom was nice and clean. All you really need!

Txus is very kind and gentle. We arrived at 1:00Am and he is patient to wait us. and everyday and night he would chat with us. Haha. And my friend says he is sooooo handsome hahaha.The house is in the center of Barcelona. It's convenient to go Park Guell and beach also. We enjoyed live in Txus ' place.
We spent to months in the apartment. Everything was good and clean. Txus was very kind. Very good stay!

Txus was an incredible host. He offered any help we needed, gave us a city map, provided suggestions, and gave us a very clean and welcoming home to stay in. The location was perfect for seeing Gaudi's works and catching the metro to the city center by the beach. We loved it.
Good location, good and flexible host, basic accommodation but good value. Recommended!
Great place, very friendly host who keeps in good contact
Texus est un super hôte très serviable, il prend le temps de vous conseiller sur les lieux à visiter à barcelone. Le séjour c'est très bien passé.

Txus is the perfect host, hospitable and nice. He gave us advice on places to visit and always take a moment to talk with us.
The room is convenient and the flat is in the center of the city, next to the sagrada familia and parc güell, bus and subway station. I recommend this accomodation without hesitation.
Very supportive host. Everything was clear and the place is close to the public transport. We had great time at Txus's place.

Wszystko tak jak chcieliśmy. Pokój nieduży, z piętrowym łóżkiem ale czysty i całkowicie nam wystarczał do naszych potrzeb. Lokalizacja świetna blisko centrum, wszędzie mieliśmy w miarę blisko. Gospodarz bardzo miły i pomocny. Czekał na nas przed blokiem mimo że wiedział tylko mniej więcej o której będziemy. Odpowiedział nam na wszystkie pytania jakie mieliśmy i polecił gdzie można coś zjeść albo zrobić zakupy. Kiedy wrócimy do Barcelony, duża szansa że wpadniemy do Txusa.

Txus was an amazing host - helpful, friendly and welcoming. The room itself was small, but clean and nice, the location was amazing! During our trip I fell sick on the last day and Txus let us stay longer than the check out deadline, recommended some medicine and was really helpful! I would recommend to.anybody!

Txus is very very nice! His flat is really nice also in a calm area, few minutes to walk to the center. The room might be a little small for 2 people staying a long time but it did the trick for us :)
Ubicación ideal. Estupendo anfitrion

Great place to stay while in BCN ! Very centrally located and close to all the main attractions. Txus is a very great host friendly and kind :) 
Highly recommendable !

I had a great stay in Txus's apartment! It was clean and had everything I needed. I love the Gràcia neighbourhood - it's so lovely and quiet, yet with lots of tapas bars within short walking distance. Txus was really friendly and accessible. He showed me an amazing tapas restaurant with some of the nicest food I've ever had. I would definitely stay here again!
Very nice location !
Super central super recomendo o txus é muito gente boa obrigado Txus por tudo.
Txus hat eine gute Wohnung. Er war sehr freundlich und ich kann ihn empfehlen.

Txus is very nice and the location of the room is perfect, central, metro very near. Quiet place.
The only less positive point is that when we came the living room and balcony were not accessible and that it was not mentioned that a second room is also rented in the same apartment.
An opportunity to come with friends or family:-)

It was a nice accommodation close to the metro stations and Sagrada Familia (approx. 15min walking). Communication with Txus was really great and he gave me advice how to get from the airport to this flat and recommended me a good restaurant in the neighbourhood.
The accommodation is pretty similar to the photos. There was no possibility to lock the room but I felt OK to leave my luggage there. I did not spend a lot of time in the room (just for sleeping) but I was satisfied. Thank you Txus :)
very nice householder, friendly and quiet~

He responded very quickly and thoughtfully.

The room was very cleaned and tidy.

I really recommend to stay here.
You’ll also love it!

Great experience. Txus is easy going, always there when u need. I arrived very late but we kept communication. Apartment was very nice and well communicate in the center and near metro.  Gracias Txus!

We had a great time in Barcelona. We stayed at Txus place for 3 days. The room is just right for 2 people. The room and the bathroom are clean. You can find all basics you need in the small kitchen. The location is perfect. You can get to all Gaudi places by foot in 10-20 minutes.
 
Txus is a very kind and attentive host. We had a flight delay and arrived in the middle of the night. He was up to meet us and everything was ready for us. He also recommended a nice place for dinner.
 
We definitely recommend it to travelers who seek a quiet and well located place to stay in Barcelona.
La limpieza es impecable y el cuarto es modesto pero confortable, buena conexión Wi-Fi, la inducción de Txus acerca de la ciudad es muy buena y si quieres más detalles te los dará.
Alojamiento muy bien ubicado. Te permite desplazarte a pie o en metro
Departamento muy bien ubicado, buenas recomendaciones de txus sobre lugares para ir a comer, en la zona hay muchos lugares para recorrer, nosotros hicimos todo caminando.

Tout s'est très bien passé, Txus est une Personne très gentille, s'adaptant aux personnes logées ainsi qu'aux contraintes de chacun. Le quartier est plutôt calme avec des bars autour pour sortir et les commodités sont à côté. Je recommande ce logement. Merci Txus !
La ubicación del alojamiento es genial, cerca de todo. Txus sirvió de mucha ayuda para guiar y encontrar los lugares precisos. Muchas gracias Txus.
Una atencion excelente con una ubicación privilegiada. Y un alojamiento de 10. Repetiremos sin duda
房子的地理位置很好,走路去米拉之家巴特罗之家大概不到二十分钟吧｡附近有L4,L5,55,45路公交车五分钟之内都能到达｡极力推荐,房东人很nett:)
Good place for the price. Bed was comfortable, clean shower and kitchen.
这个住处的布置非常的文艺,房东也非常热情
Txus was a very kind host. Despite being late, we had a warm welcome and found everything we needed in our small room. It's a good no-frills accommodation in the middle of the city.
Great communication with the host, quiet and clean place with a very good location near most of the main sights. The lack of fresh air in the room could be the only downside.
Un séjour parfait chez Txus, un hote très agréable et accueillant. L'emplacement à proximité des transports en commun a de plus facilité nos sorties pour visiter la ville.

Txus é um anfitrião impecável! Agradável, prestativo, alegre e muito disponível! Sua casa tem uma localização perfeita e, além disso, é confortável, muito limpa e tem uma ótima energia! Eu e minha amiga nos sentimos acolhidas e seguras. Não tivemos qualquer problema. Foram dias incríveis! Recomendamos muito! :)

Txus was a really nice and friendly host, he was waiting for us despite we arrived late at night. The place was clean, the bed was comfortable and the flat is in the centre, 15 minutes walking distance to Sagrada Familia. I recommend it :)
We had a great first trip to Barcelona. Txus was very warm and welcoming.  Location is awesome for sightseeing. Thank you Txus!

We are very grateful for our stay with Txus. He place was very clean and close to everything in town. Txus is a great host. He allowed us to leave our bags with him early and when one of our group became ill one night, he was extremely helpful and understanding. I can definitely recommend staying with Txus.
Great place in a great location with good access to the rest of Barcelona. Friendly and helpful host with great communication.

Хорошее жилье в центре Барселоны. До пляжа чуть больше 3км, но рядом есть автобусная остановка, от которой на 45 автобусе можно доехать до пляжной зоны за 20 минут. Рядом несколько продуктовых магазинов и хороших кафе. Недалеко Саграда Фамилия, минут может 20 пешком.
Есть несколько минусов:
- на кухне нет стола
- окна в комнате выходят во внутренний колодец, из-за чего есть недостаток солнечного света (да и освещения вообще) и шум (когда открываешь окно)
Возможно, произошло некое недопонимание, но как я понял, гостиная не для общего пользования, а как место отдыха хозяина. Надеюсь, я ошибаюсь.
Un encanto de hombre
Great Host Great Location. We arrived in middle of night to smile and friendly welcome. Would recommend to others
Fantastically located, a great base for exploring and fantastic amenities for self-catering (Lidl/bakery/etc on same block). A generous and friendly host, and comfy beds!
Nice and calm place. Perfect location to explore Barcelona by bike.
Txus is a very friendly and welcoming host. The room is fine, only during the nights it can be a bit noisy. The area is great, a lot of nice places to eat and close to public transport.

I enjoyed staying at Txus's place however it was very busy. There were other people coming in and out often . When I stayed there was also a horrible heat wave so we were sweating nonstop during our stay. It was way too hot in our room and it was hard to sleep or be in. Other than the unfortunate heat wave and people in the apartment, Txus's was great. He wants to maintain cleanliness and replies quickly.

Great and clean place. It is definitely recommended. This place is at the perfect location  because the most important and famous places are very close to it. Only bad thing is that bedroom doors don't have lock  and there is no air-conditioning therefore it's so hard to sleep in the summer time - it's so hot.   Txus is friendly and a great host.

Txus’s place is in a nice neighbourhood of Gracia. It is close to the metro/bus station and has various options to eat out. Txus was quick in replying and suggested various options (including a great flamenco show). Would definitely recommend staying at his place.

Très bon accueil. Tout est propre et les matelas sont très confortables. La chambre est petite, ainsi que les espaces à partager. Mais tout est très bien aménagé. La situation de l'appartement est idéale, à l'écart des lieux touristiques mais dans le centre. Très calme.
Recomendo a casa do Txus, ele educado e solícito, nos ajudou com tudo, deu dicas de locais para visitar,  o apto e bem central, tem tudo perto, adorei, ele merece  10 estrelas.
Ein sehr freundlicher und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber.
침실이나 공용공간의 상태가 좋았습니다. 체크인 할 때는 매우 친절했습니다. 체끄 아우슬 할 때는 연라기 되지 않았습니다. 위치는 도심지여서 걸어서 다니기 좋았습니다. 지하처를 타고 다니기는 매우 히미듭니다.
Excelente anfitrión, todo muy bueno.Impecable y cómodo.

Thanks a lot, you  are really   a great host, nice and friendly  person. if some one out there  wants to go to Barcelona I highly recommend his place. It   is clean and  close to  public transport and tourist attractions .  It is good value for money .

Txus's place is great all around - the location is close to a metro stop and in pretty easy distance to night life in the Gracia district. Txus himself is incredibly friendly and helpful, with plenty of tips to take full advantage of the city. I would absolutely recommend staying with Txus during a visit to Barcelona!

We had a wonderful stay here. Txus was an incredible host with plenty of great recommendations for things to do around Barcelona. He even went out with us for drinks and dinner one night! The neighborhood is nice, centrally located and well connected to the metro. Highly recommend this place, will probably try to book it again if I’m ever back in the area!

Estube tres días en casa de Txus y todo fue genial. El piso está reformado, pero mantiene la esencia de los pisos antiguos de Barcelona. La habitación era muy amplia y con todo lo necesario. Para destacar el trato con el anfitrión, muy atento y simpático, y la ubicación del piso, cerca de todas partes de Barcelona y con varias línias de metro cerca. 100% recomendable.
Todo fue según lo esperado, tanto en alojamiento y condiciones del servicio. Txus fue muy amable en sus recomendaciones pues era la primera vez que viajábamos a Barcelona. Disfrutamos mucho.
Fue muy hermosa la estadía! Txus un gran anfitrión!

Txus ist ein sehr netter und aufmerksamer Gastgeber, der seine Gäste mit umfangreichen touristischen Informationen versorgt. Die Stadteile Gràcia und Eixample kann man zu Fuß erkunden. Die U-Bahn ist in 5 min erreichbar. Das Zimmer hat ruhige Hinterhofatmosphäre in einem originalen Modernisme-Haus. Da das Einzelbett mit 1,90m Länge für mich zu kurz war, konnte ich im Doppelbett darüber schlafen. 
Eine super Unterkunft für diesen Preis!

Txus is a wonderful host, showed us true hospitality that made us feel like home. We were in Barcelona for 5 days and had a bit of rain but he made sure we had all the conforts and information we needed to make the best of our stay. The house was clean and tidy. It was a bit further from the city centre than expected, maybe because I had little idea of the distances in the city itself. It allows for a 15 min walk to Sagrada Família through the wonderful neighboorhood's flat terrain. Do not try to walk to Parq Guell, looks closer than it is, it's straight uphill (we kinda did eheheh). The buses are 5-10min walk away, and the metro is 10min away. Would definitely recommend Txus's place :)
I had a wonderful stay with Txus. The apartment is located very centrally and there is no noise at night. I will come again and can recommend staying here any day.
The apartment of Txus is in a good position, just few blocks away from metro. The house was founded very clean and the room with all the basics things we need. Thanks Txus!

Muy cómoda la zona para manejarse a pie, no necesitamos de trasporte público para ir a los centros turísticos de Barcelona. La habitación cómoda y las camas también! Todo ordenado y limpio. Jesús es muy amable. Recomendable!

Txus é um excelente host. O quarto e banheiro são extremamente limpos e organizados. O local do apartamento é excelente e muito próximo do metro e em um bairro muito bom!
Vale a pena!
Buena estancia y céntrica.

name: Keauhou Hale at Volcano
summary: Just outside the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and minutes away from the active Halema'uma'u crater. Our cottage sits along the first fairway of the Volcano Golf CC with an open lanai looking at the majestic Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea in the distance.
space: Comfortable and relaxing home away from home.
description: Just outside the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and minutes away from the active Halema'uma'u crater. Our cottage sits along the first fairway of the Volcano Golf CC with an open lanai looking at the majestic Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea in the distance. Comfortable and relaxing home away from home. Nearby Hawaii Volcanoes National Parks visitor center shops, hiking, if conditions allow for night time volcano viewing. Volcano Winery for wine tasting is less the a mile away. And of course golfing at the beautiful Volcano Golf and CC at our front yard! Punaluu's black sand beach is further south on Volcano hwy.
access: Nearby Hawaii Volcanoes National Parks visitor center shops, hiking, if conditions allow for night time volcano viewing. Volcano Winery for wine tasting is less the a mile away. And of course golfing at the beautiful Volcano Golf and CC at our front yard! Punaluu's black sand beach is further south on Volcano hwy.

name: Ribeiro de Moinho
summary: Espaço ideal para uma pausa a dois, com familia ou amigos. A casa com total privacidade, promete cunhar em si momentos de sonho e de prazer. As cascatas de água, as espreguiçadeiras, a piscina, o campo de futebol, a esplanada, são complementos para que possa  desfrutar em pleno da natureza e da sua melodia.
space: A total privacidade do espaço permite-lhe desfrutar da natureza e do espaço sentindo total independência .
description: Espaço ideal para uma pausa a dois, com familia ou amigos. A casa com total privacidade, promete cunhar em si momentos de sonho e de prazer. As cascatas de água, as espreguiçadeiras, a piscina, o campo de futebol, a esplanada, são complementos para que possa  desfrutar em pleno da natureza e da sua melodia. reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place exceeded my expectations by a million. Sandra is a very nice and helpful lady and her son as well. The house is clean and has all the equipment you need. There are many romantic spots (hammocks, swinging beds, bench, swing) near the house. The pool is amazing, there is an outside sound system. I would definitely recommend this place. A little gem!

Sandra's house is amazing: in the middle of the forest, in a very quiet, secluded location. 
The pool area is lovely, with hammocks, a lounge area and recliner chairs. The house was comfortable and had all the basics you would want. We loved using the outside kitchen (with bbq). 
The house was very clean and tidy. There is one double bedroom upstairs, with a bathroom and separate kitchen area. Downstairs there are three double bedrooms, a living room area and a bathroom. 
Sandra and her son were very helpful and friendly. We loved the yummy local sweets she left for us. Highly recommended!

Passei uns dias maravilhosos em família com crianças na casa da Sandra. O exterior é simplesmente fantástico e ideal para descansar, brincar com crianças, ler ou apenas ficar a apreciar o momento. A casa fica no fim de uma estrada se terra mas de fácil acesso a qualquer carro. O interior da casa, principalmente os quartos sem janelas, poderia ser mais arejado, mas como passamos o tempo todo na rua, esse pormenor não fez diferença. Gostamos muito de cozinhar na cozinha da rua, de fazer grelhados e comer da grande mesa da rua. As crianças adoraram a piscina, o baloiço da árvore grande, as camas de rede e o campo de bola. A Sandra foi muito amável e esteve sempre disponível para ajudar. Obrigado

Tudo 5 estrelas. 
O acesso é um pouco difícil, mas vale a pena. O espaço é muito agradável para passar uns dias com amigos, em família....
Conseguimos, eu e o meus amigos, desfrutar bastante do espaço e relaxar durante um fim‑de‑semana um pouco mais prolongado.

name: Stunning Apartmet for Rio 2016
summary: Three bedroom apartment renovated in 2015, in the best location of Barra da Tijuca neighborhood, where most of the events of the Olympic Games Rio 2016 will be held.
description: Three bedroom apartment renovated in 2015, in the best location of Barra da Tijuca neighborhood, where most of the events of the Olympic Games Rio 2016 will be held.

summary: Two level room . Upstairs bedroom, on the ground floor kitchen and bathroom.
description: Two level room . Upstairs bedroom, on the ground floor kitchen and bathroom.

host.host_about: Welcome to the Hotel Element Taksim... Hotel Element Taksim enjoys a priviledged location in the historical neighborhood of  Tarlabasi, which is located just 300 meters from Taksim Square,  İstanbul. Turkish hospitality with European modernism.

reviews.comments: Жилье очень "уставшее" и требует ремонта, душ ужасный. Район хоть и рядом с площадью, но тревожный. Если есть возможность поищите что-то еще. Справлеливости ради - хозяин приятный молодой человек, отзывчивый.

Tekrar merhaba ‍♂️ Bir süre daha görüşeceğiz sanırım. Temiz ferah ve büyük bir daire idi yumuşacık bir yatak ve güzel kokulu çarşafları vardı ve çok sıcaktı içerisi banyolar yeni yapılmış ve tüm malzemeler yeni değiştirilmiş belliki tertemizdi mutfakta kullanabileceğimiz tüm eşyalar mevcuttu ve çay ve kahvelerin olması gayet güzeldi. Tekrar teşekkür ederim görüşmek dilegi ile.
