Très réactive Marisa a tout fait pour faciliter notre accueil  et pour répondre à nos questions.  L'appartement est très agréable et magnifiquement bien placé pour visiter la Sagrada.
Il présente tout le confort et on se sent vite chez soi.
La propreté est parfaite et Marisa  nous a fait confiance  pour la remise des clés au moment du départ. Séjour très agréable.
We loved this apartment. Building facilities are in excellent conditions. Great location. Definitely recommend if you plan to discover this awesome city.

Superbe séjour de 3 jours à Barcelone !!! Le logement correspond tout à fait à la description du site. Le quartier est calme et idéalement situé (environ 200m de la Sagrada Familia et de la station de métro).

Merci Marisa pour son accueil et sa disponibilité !!

A recommander sans aucune hésitation !!!
Super appartement, bien placé voisinage discret et super équipé ! Je vous le conseil a deux pas de la sagrada familiale. De plus Marisa notre hôte a été super sympas

Marisa è un'ottima Host perfetta! È stata cordiale, gentile, molto disponibile. 
Si è subito prestata ad aiutarci nel momento del bisogno e a venirci incontro x accontentare le nostre richieste. La casa è bella e confortevole. Perfetta per 6 persone e ben accessoriata. Quartiere meraviglioso, a 3 minuti a piedi dalla Sagrada Familiare.  
Quando torneremo a Barcellona torneremo sicuramente da lei.

Marisa ha sido una excelente anfitriona. Estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos recibió siendo que llegamos de noche. Nos dio todas las explicaciones del uso del Departamento e indicaciones de comercios cerca del barrio para manejarnos. El departamento está muy bien equipado y coincide con todo lo que se muestra en las fotos. La ubicación es excelente. La anfitriona fue muy amable y nos dio facilidades para realizar el check out con nuestras valijas.
Lo recomendamos!

El alojamiento genial. Situación estupenda, buena comunicación con el metro a cinco minutos caminando, supermercados, fruterías y bares en la misma calle. Marisa muy amable y nos dio todas las facilidades.

We had a lovely time at this apartment.  It is very close to Sagrada Familia and also to the Metro station which is really handy for getting around the city.  We were welcomed at the stated time and told where everything was etc.  We didn't get a chance to meet Marisa, but her cleaner did a fantastic job of greeting us and making us feel very welcome.  The apartment block is quiet - you rarely hear/see the neighbours - but you will hear traffic.  But it didn't bother us.

Muchas gracias a Marisa por tan atento recibimiento. Todo estuvo fantástico desde el día 1. Incluso con el retraso que tuvimos a nuestro arribo Marisa fue tan atenta de comprarnos algunos abarrotes para poder tener algo que cenar y desayunar pues íbamos a llegar muy tarde. 

Totalmente recomendable el lugar. Hola excelente ubicación. Mil gracias.

Le logement correspond en tous points au descriptif et il est localisé vraiment tout près de la Sagrada Familia! 
Marisa est très accueillante, c'est agréable!
Great flat in great location !

Marisa und ihre Tochter sind sehr nett und waren immer erreichbar. Einmal hatten wir kein warmes Wasser, Marisa hat uns jedoch schnell helfen können und wusste sofort, was zu tun ist.

Nice and clean apartament in an excellent location, close to public transportation, 3 min walking from Sagrada. The place is very comfortable. well equiped. Marisa was a great host, very responsive and helpful. Will recommend surely
Good location close to sagrada familia and public transportation, confortable apartment  the only bad thing is the air conditioners is only on the living room and the bedrooms was very hot.

Marisa is amazing and her apartment is in a great location. It is well cared for. Easy check in. Though our stay was short, Marisa checked in on us and help us arrange a taxi to the airport before the taxi strike. My family of 5, including two kids (6 and 2 years) would have been in trouble without her help. She is a beautiful person and wonderful host.

Wij zijn met ons gezin 8 dagen in het appartement van Marisa geweest. Een prima plek om van daaruit Barcelona te bekijken. Het is een appartement op de 4e verdieping van een appartementencomplex waarin niet in gewoond wordt, uitsluitend voor AirBnB gebruik. 
Het appartement ligt zeer gunstig t.o.v. openbaar vervoer. Met de metro en bus kan je alle kanten op en Barcelona makkelijk doorkruisen. In een half uur zijn alle highlights bereikbaar. Tip: koop 10 rittenkaarten bij de automaten. Die zijn goedkoop en in meerdere vormen van OV te gebruiken. 
Marisa is vriendelijk en snel in de communicatie. Ze zegt geen Engels te spreken, maar redt zich er goed mee. 
Het appartement deed wat kleiner aan dan de foto's doen vermoeden. Je kunt er met z'n zessen slapen. Maar met 5 vonden wij het al vol. Er is 1 tweepersoonsbed (prima), 2 afzonderlijke bedden (wat hard) en 1 slaapbank (ook prima) die de woonkamer aardig vult. 
Buiten was het tegen de 30 graden overdag, wat maximaal zakte naar 25 s'nachts. Dan is het appartement warm. Er is 1 airco aanwezig die dan het appartement niet als geheel weet te koelen. De woonkamer is dan wel koel. Een raam open zetten kan. Maar vanaf buiten komt dan wel geluid van verkeer. Carrer de Padilla is niet de drukste straat, maar er rijdt wel wat doorheen. 
De badkamer en keuken zijn prima. De wasmachine en droger een zegen. We hebben 1 tip meegegeven aan Marisa: voorzien in voorzorgsmaatregelen voor brand. In het appartement en in het complex is daarvan niets te bekennen. En dat zou wel verstandig zijn.

The pictures are very realistic. The apartment is well equipped to enjoy your stay. The beds are comfortable which is very important when you travel.

Marisa is a great host with a big heart. She went far and beyond to help us in a difficult situation when it was least expected. We are very grateful to her. The communication with Marisa was excellent, she responded to any of our questions in a fast and efficient way.

We would recommend the apartment to any kind of travellers, including family with kids.

Todo excelente, Marisa muy atenta y amable. La sagrada familia y una gran cantidad de comercios (super mercado, frutería, recuerdos, panadería, etc.) a menos de 5 min andando. Departamento espacioso, bien equipado y limpio.

Cocina y baños nuevos, amplios. La habitación con la cama grande es correcta, quizás la de dos camas es algo sencilla, camas pequeñas, aunque es suficiente. Es cierto que se agradece que haya alguna cosa en el apartamento (en nuestro caso no encontramos gel o jabón en el baño y al ir solo para una noche, bajamos a comprar algo rápido). Son pequeños detalles que hacen que pase de ser correcto a ser un lugar muy agradable. Marisa fue muy amable y la comunicación fue ágil y cómoda. Nos recibió y estuvo pendiente de nuestra comodidad.
Piso bien ubicado, muy limpio y organizado. Tiene todo lo necesario para estar a gusto en un piso! Marisa super agradable y muy disponible. Volvería sin duda!
This apartment was clean, comfortable and in a safe location.  I would stay there again next time I would be in Bar Elena.
Great apartment. Located within 5 minutes of Sagrada Familia. Very good space for 4-5 people. The apartment is located close to a lot of restaurants opened late at night.

Appartement propre et agréable, tout près de la sagrada familia + métro + station taxi et adapté à une famille avec 4 enfants. Marisa est très réactive si besoin. Dommage pour le bruit de la circulation le matin.
Agnès, France

Marisa was a great host :)
Estamos muy agradecidos por la atención. Marisa nos trató de maravilla, el departamento es muy cómodo, muy bien ubicado y completo!!! Lo recomendamos mucho!!!

El apartamento está situado muy cerca de la Sagrada Familia y del metro. ES muy cómodo y funcional. Tiene todo lo necesario para cocinar o comer allí pero también está en una zona con mucho comercio y bares, lo que se agradece.
Marisa es una gran anfitriona, que estuvo siempre pendiente de si teníamos algún problema.

Un departamento que usamos 6 chicas, cómodo, muy limpio. Ubicación inmejorable a 2 calles de Sagrada Familia, muchos comercios en la zona de alimentos, frutas y ropa. El sofá-cama no es muy cómodo para  dormir muchos días, el resto del departamento esta muy bien decorado y tienen todo lo necesario para pasar en familia o con amigos unas vacaciones. Marisa es una excelente anfitriona.
Marisa es muy amable y ofrece todas las facilidades para que te sientas como en casa durante la estancia. Os recomiendo que contacteis con ella.
Really good location for anyone wanting to be close to the Sagrada Familia. Good local supermarkets, ATMs and Coffee Shops. No where is more than 10€ away in a taxi.
Excelente ubicación y atenciones por parte de la anfitriona, recomendable!

Recordable 100%. Es un sitio acogedor que te envuelve y te mantiene cerca de la Iglesia, con una excelente comunicación con medios de transporte. Todo te queda cerca y es muy seguro, cómodo, limpio y con todos los servicios que ofrece funcionando.
Perfect flat and well situated. Marisa was attentive and helpful! I super recommand!

Such a perfect location. We were a two minute walk to La Sagrada Familia. This was also a perfect location to walk to Park Guell and to the Gothic Quarter. The apartment itself was perfect. It was very clean and super spacious. I highly recommend staying here to visit Barcelona.

Très bon emplacement. Bel appartement très propre dans un bel immeuble.
Marisa est très arrangeante et à l écoute.
Nous recommandons vivement.
Ha sido un estancia genial, con mi familia, el piso esta muy bien ubicado con restaurantes cercanos y muy bien comunicado con el metro, lineas 2 y 5. y a dos calles de la sagrada familia
El departamento es amplio, cómodo y muy limpio. Está ubicado a poca distancia de la Sagrada Familia y del metro. La ducha es genial! Sin dudas volvería!

Un appartement très agréable et très fonctionnel ( beaucoup de rangements dans les chambres et sdb, ce qui est confortable pour cinq). Quartier très vivant avec supermarché à côté, fruits et légumes, pharmacie. Tout est à dispo. Ainsi que des restos et le métro. Et super bien place dans Barcelone, les principaux quartiers sont très accessibles. Idéalement placé. Seul bémol, un peu de bruit, les chambres donnant sur la rue. Marisa est super et très réactive. elle nous a par exemple commande un taxi, permis de laisser nos bagages. Un très bon séjour !
The space was very clean, so close to Sagrada Familia!  My dad had a knee injury and she was so great helping us order a taxi!  She went above and beyond!
Marisa fue muy atenta, nos facilitó todo lo que necesitábamos e hizo de nuestra estancia un fin de semana maravilloso. El piso es justo como en las fotos! Lo recomiendo totalmente
Very nice place. I’d stay here again if I came back to Barcelona.

Amazing apartment just 2 blocks walk from the Sagrada Familia. Marisa was a great host, really easy to communicate with, she made us feel very welcome, even accommodated an early check-in!! The apartment is so clean and was perfect for the 4 of us. It’s close to local supermarkets, bakeries and shops, easy to get to the metro and the neighborhood is safe. 

It was a great base to explore Barcelona and crash at the end of the day! The check in process was easy and the building has a lift as well which was good so we didnt have to haul our bags upstairs.
We had a nice stay. Great location.

Great location which is very close to Sagrada Familia, metro station, bus stops, and many bakery and supermarkets. What I liked especially was that it was not too turisty; safe and quiet. The flat has nespresso machine and DVD player, too. The host was waiting on time and asked us if we need something on the second day.

L’appartamento è situato in una posizione meravigliosa vicino alla Sagrada Familia  e alla metropolitana. Marisa è una persona disponibile e gentile che ti aiuta a trovare tutto ciò che ti serve, ristoranti, locali e informazioni. Un ringraziamento speciale perché si è presa cura di portare un cellulare dimenticato sino all’aeroporto da un mio amico.
Abbiamo soggiornato in 6 ragazze ad Aprile. Molto bello, spazioso e comodo. Vicino alla Sagrada Familia e alla fermata del metro per il centro. Lo consiglio!

La casa es genial. Nos alojamos 6 amigas y cogimos sin problema. El sofá cama que era lo que más nos preocupaba es muy cómodo y dormimos muy bien.

Al llegar nos recibió Marisa que es un sol, y está siempre a nuestra disposición para cualquier duda.

Si vais a pasar unos días en Barcelona os recomiendo que os alojeis aquí ya que no tengo nada negativo que decir ni de ella ni del piso

The apartment is very close to Sagrada Familia and with the Metro you can get everywhere easily. The apartment itself was clean and everything you need for your stay was there. Marisa is very helpful and responds extremly fast. I can only recommend it.
Nice apartment, very well located next to the sagrada familia. Marisa is reactive if any questions and flexible. I totally recommand this place !!
Great location for Sagrada Familia. Plenty of space for four adults. Would recommend. Susan was so kind and helpful.

It’s a great flat with all the amenities. Sparkling clean and very good space. It’s extremely close to the Sagrada Familia and to transportation around the city. We will definitely recommend it to our friends!

Marisa was an excellent host, very responsive and helpful. She was there the first day to greet us, we available to check in early, and gave us great recommendations regarding local things. We were a party of 6 and stayed there comfortably. I think the sofa bed was better than most.  Her place is clean and had all the amenities needed for a proper stay. Definitely recommend.

This apartment was perfect. We were in a great location, it was sparkling clean and my communication with Marisa before the stay was perfect. We were very comfortable here and slept like babies. We can't wait to go back, and when we do, hopefully Marisa's place will be available because her hospitality exceeds others.
A very clean space close to a lot of attractions.  Marissa was very available and answered all our questions immediately.  I would highly recommend staying here.

Marisa is very nice and accommodating. She helped us find things in the area. She suggested InterTapas restaurant which was so good we ended up visiting twice ! The apartment is nice and clean and around the corner from Sagrada Familia.

Excellent accueil, appartement impeccable, très bien placé et parfait pour 6 couchages. Marisa a été très à écoute, réactive et nous demandait régulièrement si tout se passait bien. Je recommande vivement.

A great place to stay when visiting Barcelona! A quiet area to stay and not far from Sagrada Familia and the metro to travel. The maid was very kind when letting us check in early after our flight and offered suggestions for our stay in Barcelona.
Great location and Marisa is very helpful. Making everything very convenient for  us.

It would be expected to have sugar and salt and coffee and muffins or bread for a first breakfast.

We really appreciated that we were allowed to drop off our bags early.

Over all a good stay in Barcelona.

Excelente ubicación a pasos de la Sagrada Familia y restaurantes.  El apartamento es cómodo para 6 personas, el aire acondicionado es muy bueno.  El apartamento muy limpio y organizado.  Nos sentimos seguros y tranquilos.  Marissa fue extraordinaria y responsable.

The place is clean and very convenient to all the activities. Stores close by to purchase groceries and walking distance to Sagrada Família, The hop on hop off busses and lots of  cafes and restaurant. Marisa is very quick in responding to your questions and needs. We will go back again to stay there next time we visit.  Thanks Marisa

Très bel appartement, confortable, propre convenant parfaitement à une famille de 4 personnes voire un peu plus. La communication avec Marisa etait très facile. L appartement est bien situé, mais côté Sagrada Familia, donc compter 20/30mn de trajet pour rejoindre les quartiers typiques ou la plage. des metros et des bus a 2 pas, un dab, boulangerie, fruits et epicerie, superette à 2mn chrono a pied. Un ptit bar sympa juste en bas... quoi d autre??? Barcelonaaaaa!!!
Très bel appartement bien situé, agréable et bien équipé. Communication très facile. Beau séjour à 2 pas de la Segrada Familia

Appartement idéal très bien décoré situé à deux pas de la Sagrada Familia, calme et bien isolé, propre et décoré avec goût. Encore merci à Marissa pour sa réactivité aux messages et au bon accueil de sa fille, je recommande !
Séjour super. Appartement propre, bien placé et hôte très agréable. Je recommande vivement.
Consigliatissimo a tutti..Marisa una persona gentilissima e attenta a tutte le ns esigenze..appartamento favoloso.grazie marisa
Super Unterkunft. Sehr sauber und sehr zentral. Wir waren sehr zufrieden.
Marisa provided a great space for us to stay for our first time in Barcelona!  The apartment has a wonderful location that allowed us to walk pretty much everywhere!
everything was really good.

Marisa's place was amazing. It was near the Sagrada Familia, and the apartment was lovely. There is a coffee shop across the street that opens early (even at around 7 AM). Marisa was easy to communicate with, and even suggested a place to buy an umbrella when I asked her.
Hermoso departamento excelente ubicación!
Great host and clean apartment and great location.
Excellent location near rhe Sagrada Familia and a lovely apartment with plenty of space and sparkling clean.  Marisa is very helpful and quick to respond to any questions.

El apartamento está muy céntrico y bien equipado. Marisa nos dio una atención inmejorable.
Repetiría sin dudar!

Appartement conforme à la description, très bien équipé et très bien situé, à côté de la sagrada familia et à 2 minutes du métro, parfait pour rayonner sur Barcelone. Marisa a été très accueillante, et très réactive à nos demandes. A recommander.

Beautiful apartment in a fabulous location. We were warmly welcomed by the housekeeper, Susan, and she was very helpful with neighborhood tips, the workings of the apartment, and comic relief!! I would definitely stay here again.

El piso es como lo esperábamos, es bonito, limpio, luminoso y tiene muy buena ubicación. Estuvimos 5 personas y tuvimos suficiente espacio, el sofá es muy cómodo para dormir. Marisa es muy amable, tuvimos un problemilla con la calefacción y vino a solucionarlo cuando se lo dijimos. Volvería a quedarme si surje la ocasión!
Great place to stay for a weekend in Barcelona!

Muy buena ubicación, a cuadras de la sagrada familia y del metro. Marissa la anfitriona muy atenta y super preocupada en todo momento por nosotros. El piso muy ordenado, limpio y comodo para 4 personas. Definitivamente muy recomendable y si volvemos a bcn no dudariamos en volver aquí.
Appartamento come in foto, vicinissimo alla Sagrada Familia, in una zona molto tranquilla e ben servita.
The apartment was clean, spacious and in a great location. Marisa was very responsive. She also allowed us to check in very early which we really appreciated. Would stay there again.

Lovely apartment in an excellent location just a few short blocks from the Sagrada Familia church and the metro. There are lots of places to eat and walk around nearby. The apartment is comfortable and Marisa was very responsive to all of our questions.
Excelente departamento, muy completo lo tiene todo! Marisa fue muy atenta y amable con nosotros.  Muy cerca de la Sagrada Familia y del Metro.  Recomendable
La mejor ubicación en un lindo departamento!
Muy buena ubicación, lugar amplio, lindo, iluminado, a 3 minutos del metro con combinaciones, Sagrada Familia. Hay un local de comida Vegana especializada a la puerta del dpto

excellent location about a 2 minute walk from the Sagrada Familia and the Metro. From the apartment you can be at La Rambla (if that's your thing) in about 15 min. Check in was excellent and easy with heaps of information about Barcelona provided. The apartment is spacious and was easily big enough for 2 adults and 2 children.
highly recommend:)

Un très bon séjour, l’appartement est très agréable, bien équipé et super bien situé dans un quartier central et agréable. Très bien pour des vacances en famille et pour découvrir cette très belle ville.
Apartamento limpio y agradable. Cerca de la sagrada familia. La cama doble es enorme y el colchon muy bueno. El sofa tambien es muy amplio, pero el colchon no es muy comodo
We really liked starting and ending our day getting a look at Sagrada Familia.  Never got old.  Exactly what we were looking for

O apartamento condiz com a as imagens, é muito confortável e tem uma localização  maravilhosa. 
Marisa é uma ótima anfitriã.

name: SUNNY RAMBLAS 2
summary: Fantástic two bedroom apartment at the best location in Barcelona, next to Ramblas and  Plaza Catalunya. Quiet and completely renovated.
description: Fantástic two bedroom apartment at the best location in Barcelona, next to Ramblas and  Plaza Catalunya. Quiet and completely renovated.

host.host_about: La mejor opción en Barcelona! Me gusta que los visitantes tengan la mejor experiéncia durante sus vacaciones en mi ciudad.

reviews.comments: Emilia has a great home that is both close to shops, nightlife and Las Ramblas yet is located within an interior courtyard. Therefore you are located in a very popular spot of the city but are separated from the street noise. I would highly recommend this home.

name: Exellent spot; light room w-balcony
summary: Beşiktaş is a great & very central district with a huge selection of cafes-restaurants, bars. shops & nightlife. Walking distance to the the Bosporus, the best parks, mosques, museums, PALACES and 6 km from Sultanahmet.  Public transport 100m away
space: The flat is well illuminated, peaceful and cosy, specially at night with the Thai lamps and candles. A 90 sq meter space,  ample and sweet, no clutter with a good balcony to chill out.  I'm a decent cook and sometimes we can share meals. No TV bcse in this city, there's too much to do and enjoy!
description: Beşiktaş is a great & very central district with a huge selection of cafes-restaurants, bars. shops & nightlife. Walking distance to the the Bosporus, the best parks, mosques, museums, PALACES and 6 km from Sultanahmet.  Public transport 100m away The flat is well illuminated, peaceful and cosy, specially at night with the Thai lamps and candles. A 90 sq meter space,  ample and sweet, no clutter with a good balcony to chill out.  I'm a decent cook and sometimes we can share meals. No TV bcse in this city, there's too much to do and enjoy! You can access all areas except the other bedroom. I work from home as a private language tutor and a therapeutic masseuse. On rare occasions there might be someone for lessons or therapy, there shouldn't be a problem, you can still go around your own business, just a bit more sensible and quiet in this case. I'm helpful and quite knowledgeable about the city and its intricacies. As long as I'm available, I'll be happy to assist you and give you tips
neighborhood_overview: I live between 2 of the best districts in Istanbul: Beşiktaş and Nişantaşı.  While the first is more bohemian, very lively, famous for its night-life and  next to the Bosporus, the later is much more affluent, elegant and full of specialized restaurants and internationally renown designer shops. Both are pretty, safe, very central and share an exiting lifestyle.  Everything is steps away or very nearby; gorgeous parks, mosques, Taksim and the TOP TOURIST ATTRACTIONS.  I'm surrounded by a huge array of cafes, restaurants, shops, bars and live music venues; all this contributes to making Beşiktaş one of the most sort after districts in Istanbul. Yet I live at a quiet and safe street. Witin 1 to 2 min walk: a hospital and pharmacy (at the corner) 3 supermarkets, including the cheapest chain in all of Turkey. The Saturday bazaar/farmer's market with very fresh and some organic products, only 150 meters away.  My street is quiet and with a line of trees. The Bosporus is a short walk away, f
notes: For avid walkers; the walk to TAKSIM trough Maçka park it's wonderful and it only takes about 25 min to reach Tksm. Or if you take the CABLE-CAPSULE ("teleferik") you can cross the park and have a gorgeous view from above and save a few min walk. You could even walk further to GALATA tower within 50 min (20 from Taksim square) and keep going down to Karaköy, only 5 min from Galata and another 10 min to Eminönū to the wonderful Spice bazaar and the Yeni mosque. All together you can walk from home to Eminönū in a bit more than 1 hr.
transit: **There are 3 bus routes that pass by the corner of the flat (130m) They go to TAKSIM, another to EMINÖNŪ (Spice bazaar) Karaköy & Yeni Kapı (very near the Blue mosque). 5 min walk there's the dolmuş (collective taxi) that goes to Taksim  in about 5 min. **Osmanbey metro is 15 min walk. This metro can lead you to Atatūrk airport within one hour with a short-easy change at Yeni Kapı. **Kabataş tram that leaves you at the door of the Blue mosque, Aiğa Sofia,  the spice and Grand Bazaars is 25 min walk or 1 bus ride away from this corner. Optional; taxi to Kabataş in 6 min and costs about €2.5 ** The ferries to Ūskūdar only take 5 minutes to reach ASIA! Or 20 min by luxurious ferry to Kadiköy (only 70 euro cents) From Beşiktaş centre there's another dolmuş to Taksim (5-7 min ride) and a huge selection of buses to go all around and mainly the most beautiful palaces in the city and near the Black Sea at Sarıyer!
access: You can access all areas except the other bedroom. I work from home as a private language tutor and a therapeutic masseuse. On rare occasions there might be someone for lessons or therapy, there shouldn't be a problem, you can still go around your own business, just a bit more sensible and quiet in this case.
interaction: I'm helpful and quite knowledgeable about the city and its intricacies. As long as I'm available, I'll be happy to assist you and give you tips on how to move around more efficiently, saving time and money with transport and eating out or bargaining like a pro at the bazaars! Being Mexican gives me a more unbiased view on Turkey, it's culture, traditions and life in general. I might be able to share some of my Mexican cooking or tips on how to prepare a great tasting guacamole or salsa. Also, could teach you how to play tavla (backgammon) if you already know, then we could have a fun match.
house_rules: No smoking inside, only outside or on the balcony. No shoes inside, specially bcse the carpets are very light. Respectful, tidy, independent, easy going.

host.host_about:
Friendly and helpful, well travelled, knowledgeable & polite Mexican female. I'm chilled out, frank, and in general spontaneous and funny  =}  In love with nature and anything that feeds my soul and leaves and indelible mark in my memories! :D 
During the span of 25 years, I've hosted 100s of people from around the world independently and through other websites.

I've done plenty of world travelling (from teenage years). Lived in several countries and studied in 5 (Mexico, USA, UK, Thailand & Turkey)

Fine Art Photographer, English & Spanish teacher and my latest venture; Massage techniques; traditional Thai, Oil/Swedish, shiatsu, deep tissue and reflexology.
I'm into a more natural lifestyle and believe in healing & positive energies. My diet consists of 90% non animal products. Non smoker and nature lover.
• l get by with 7 languages (including Turkish and Catalan)

name: Most laid back-quiet place in HK
summary: Welcome to the most convenient yet quiet place in HK. Kennedy town MTR and buses are min away but yet you won't be bother by the noise of the city.
space: Bedroom: comfortable aircon double bed - ideal for couple or single person Washroom: shower tap and basic basin and toilet Livingroom: cozy sofa, coffee table and fan Kitchen: all cooking utensils with cooking inductor, oven, fridge with freezer and a washing machine
description: Welcome to the most convenient yet quiet place in HK. Kennedy town MTR and buses are min away but yet you won't be bother by the noise of the city. Bedroom: comfortable aircon double bed - ideal for couple or single person Washroom: shower tap and basic basin and toilet Livingroom: cozy sofa, coffee table and fan Kitchen: all cooking utensils with cooking inductor, oven, fridge with freezer and a washing machine - Any advice on travel during stay including the best dim sum in town nearby! - Free welcome coffee and towels What I like the most about the neighborhood (and I'm sure the guest will appreciate) is: the peacefulness of the environment, which in HK could be hard to get and we are only few min walk from the MTR and like 15min to central. - Super convenient with supermarkets, markets, 7-11 and restaurants nearby - Airport bus and over-evening transportation are in few mins walk One flatmate stays in a room already so only one room is available. And the hosts may not be in house d
neighborhood_overview: What I like the most about the neighborhood (and I'm sure the guest will appreciate) is: the peacefulness of the environment, which in HK could be hard to get and we are only few min walk from the MTR and like 15min to central.
notes: One flatmate stays in a room already so only one room is available. And the hosts may not be in house during the day time so you would owe the place feel like your own apartment. **5-9 nights booking offers 5% off **10 nights booking offers 10% off
transit: - Super convenient with supermarkets, markets, 7-11 and restaurants nearby - Airport bus and over-evening transportation are in few mins walk
interaction: - Any advice on travel during stay including the best dim sum in town nearby! - Free welcome coffee and towels
house_rules: House Rules Check-in time is 11AM. No smoking No petting & noisy party but feel like home

address.street: Kennedy Town, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Really nice room with good location. Both the host and roommate are friendly and eager to help. I love the dim sum restaurant Felip recommended which is near by the apt. I love the food in HK so much that I plan to visit again. :) Btw, be careful of the mosquitos in HK when U visits in the summer time.
Nice place. Close to the down town. Would stay again :)

Hola a todos! Hemos pasado una semana en casa de luis y su compañero de piso, Camilo. Ambos muy simpáticos, receptivos y nos han ayudado con todo siempre. La casa está cerca del metro Kenedy Town, del tranvía y de numerosos autobuses que pasan por allí. La zona tiene muchos sitios para comer y supermercados. 
La habitación es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, pequeña pero con un colchón cómodo y aire acondicionado. El baño, completo y hemos utilizado incluso la lavadora y la cocina, nos hemos sentido en casa. Gracias chicos! 
Pilar

因为是去探访朋友和欣赏风景所以交通便利对我来说很重要 罗湖口岸出关之后地铁和巴士都很便利,从地铁站出来大概需要步行三分钟就可以到达,期间需要经过长长的台阶,拿着行李可能会劳累一些,房子很好找位于三楼,房东会很详细的安排与介绍,并留下钥匙,浴室很清洁,屋内虽小但五脏俱全,房东还贴心地准备了两个转换插头｡居住的五天确实温馨舒适,如果下次来香港的话我觉得我还是会选择住在这里｡要注意的是房间内两个屋子一个给旅客使用另一个是房东住,有时可能会带gf回来,介意的谨慎选择｡

Great location. Right next to the backside of Victoria Peak so if you're looking for nature you've found it. Very quiet and serene surroundings. Luis is very detailed in how to get here, just follow the instructions he sends you. 
Also right next to the Kennedy-Town MTR stop. Luis is a great guy, very friendly and outgoing and we very much appreciated his hospitality. Hope to stay with him again soon! Thanks!
Close to HKU and Kenndy Town. Nice roommate. Host is quite helpful.

Simply the best for its price among the dozen Airbnb offers in HK I have tried so far. 

The location: very close to MTR station; 7/11 store just down the street (free wifi), a couple of great local restaurants (one offers an awesome 2-person dinner for only 120 HKD, with free wifi), easy access to banks and supermarkets, all within 5-10 minutes walking distance. 

The room: very quiet, clean bedroom and air conditioner (I'm amazed there is no smell at all), comfy living room with kitchen, washing machine (you need that during summer time), and a refrigerator. And you could even find a copy of Animal Farm on the shelf, LOL. This really is what airbnb should offer in the first place, not some small and smelly hostel rooms without a window.

The host: quick response, easy communication, friendly permanent roommate. 

To summarize: awesome place, would definitely come back and also recommend to friends.



在香港住过不下十家的Airbnb平价旅店里,Felipe是我目前的最佳选择｡地点便利,步行五至十分钟可达坚尼地城地铁站｡楼下就有7/11便利店(有免费wifi),数家粉面店､茶餐厅(120闷二人晚餐好超值),Watson､百佳､惠康超市｡Felipe的房间安静､干净,空调无味｡起居室有沙发很舒适,附带厨房､洗衣机､冰箱｡书架上还有动物农场和其他一些书,不知可不可以拿来看｡｡｡与房主沟通很好,回复很快｡永久室友(真*房东)也很友善｡总之,远远好过无窗劏房小旅馆｡强烈推荐｡

Following the instruction that the host send me in advance, I have no difficulty finding the place. What a lovely and cozy home! I really enjoy my trip here. Thanks a lot!
看到中文评价很少,所以我用中文详细介绍一下哈*^_^*这里离坚尼地城地铁站和机场巴士站都很近,步行五分钟左右｡周围社区很安静,晚上可以休息得很好｡屋主细心的准备了液体蚊香,不用担心被蚊子咬｡关键是周围很多好吃的!攻略上有的太兴茶餐厅､新兴食家､源记甜品､德记潮州菜等等都在附近啊,吃得特别开心!推荐大家来啊,屋主很贴心很热情很友善,特别特别温暖!再次感谢!
Was a nice place to stay. In a fairly quiet section of Hong Kong, very easy to get to off the train and airport bus. About 15 minutes to Causeway Bay.

This Airbnb is what this site all about. You get a proper feel for living amongst the locals. The flat was well laid out with everything you need and the instructions from the host were super clear. 

The neighborhood is really friendly, on a rainy day we even got to borrow an umbrella from the downstairs neighbors (using sign language as we don't speak Cantonese) and the food in the area is sublime. Definitely go to the dim sum place they recommend!!! Our best meal while in HK.
Great location, just minutes walk from Kennedy Town MTR, yet located in a peaceful neighborhood away from the main road. Small but well equipped home.
Overall, it is a pleasant stay. Comfy bed and cozy room. Clean bathroom and easily accessible from Kennedy station. Great to rest up and continue  travelling around hk. :)

Charming, nice, and personal apartment in a cozy area.
A cozy place for two people with a small suitcase is perfect as there are many stairs and the room is small. 
And thank you for all your help Connie :)

We stayed 10 days, 9 nights and had a comfortable stay. The bedroom is small and we left our 2 backpacks outside of the room. We took advantage of the facilities provided and had breakfast in the kitchen and did our laundry.  The neighbourhood is lovely and gave a real local feel with cheap restaurants and a large supermarket across the street. Transport connections are excellent. We took the tram, bus, ferry and train after purchasing an octopus card all around HK. The hosts provide detailed instructions when checking in yourself and are always available to answer questions. This worked for us perfectly as we arrived very late in the evening.  If you want to get a local feel of HK with good hosts, this is the place.

name: The Porto Concierge - White Martin
summary: Totally renewed and fully equipped apartment two minutes ahead the Metro Station (Estação S. Bento) entrance. Excellent location to visit Porto by any means! Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.

The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Building recovered in 2016 providing extra commodity to our guests. Guests have access to all the amenities of the apartment
neighborhood_overview: Within short walking distance of such iconic places such as the Majestic Caffé, S. Bento train station, Sta. Catarina Street for shopping and the main avenue Aliados. Best downtown location of the city.
notes: - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 10€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 20€) - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals):    4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes
transit: The S. Bento metro and train station is 2 minutes away by foot. There are taxis right in front of the apartment. All main attractions are accessible by foot
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the apartment.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. This service will be available for you 24/7.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is at 11h. The person that made the reservation will be responsible for any issues dur

host.host_about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: We've been lucky to be the first ones to use the apartment!! All is new, great quality as per photos. Excellent location, really in city heart. We loved it and hope to come back soon. Thanks!

Cet appartement était vraiment superbe, très propre et très bien équipé! Beaucoup de lumière également! L'emplacement est vraiment idéal pour visiter. Il est très central donc tout se fait à pieds.
Merci pour tout!

Hi. The apartment is very nice as in the pics and situated in the perfect area - close to everything. It does not have heating as it states however as soon as we asked we were told they would bring us a heater asap. We were greeted nicely and introduced to the house and area. All in all very recommendable
Great communication with clean and neat apartment right in a great location. Thank you for everything!

We had a great time in Oporto. The apartment is in the centre and very easy to walk to all sites as well as just explore the streets. It is well furnished, comfortable bed, very clean and everything you need for a comfortable stay. A relaxing space to recoup after a big day and a nice perspective of the city from the small balcony. We will come again. Thanks.

The apartment is beautiful, immaculate and well located, a short walk from Sao Bento station and walking distance from most sights in Porto and the riverfront.  The welcome gift was appreciated, the kitchen was well equipped (although we ate out and didn't need to use it) and the apartment was exactly as described.  Isabel was a gracious host who kept in good communication.  There was a small issue with check-in (the concierge was late to drop off our keys) and if you are a light sleeper you may want to bring earplugs as noise from the upstairs neighbours tended to reverberate through the floorboards.  Overall, it was an excellent base for our short stay in Porto (far more authentic and beautiful than a hotel room) and we would be happy to return. Thank you.

The apartment is absolutely awesome, as you can see on the pics. It is in a great location to visit Porto. It was clean, the bed very comfortable and there is everything you need for a perfect stay. I would be definitely happy to return! 
Thanks Vania for being so kind and welcoming!
So far the place was great. It's well located, renovated decor, spacious and comfortable. It's also pretty well equipped. I'd definitely recommend that place for those looking for a cozy home.

Nice apartment with good location, we had a great stay there.
Be aware that there is no parking with the apartment, and we ended up spending  a lot of money on a parking garage. We recommend comparing prices for parking.

Tout à fait conforme à a description!Isabel a répondu à toutes mes questions avant notre voyage.
Séjour super.
Emplacement très pratique pour visiter Porto.
Très bel appartement, lumineux, bien décoré, propre, confortable.
Nous avons apprécier qu'Isabel mette à notre disposition un lit parapluie pour notre fils.
Petit bémol: le bruit de la rue! mais je crois que tous les appartements de Porto ne sont pas équipés du double vitrage.
Si je devais revenir à Porto, je retournerai sans hésitation dans cet appartement.

The apartment is just like the photos show. Very clean, confortable and bright. The location is perfect for visiting porto. The concierge who did the checkin was very nice and flexible for the meeting time. I recommend this apartment.

Our trip to Porto was great. The flat was in an amazing location that was very central. It was beautiful and very clean and the concierge service was wonderful at checkin. We very much appreciated the restaurant tips!

It was really nice! The apartament is in the city center and it's beautiful. It has everything you need and it's really new.
We stayed a weekend at Porto and we enjoyed it a lot. Such a beautiful city whith a big culture offer.
Although, it was really helpful the información about the city that fue agent told us.
Logement neuf. Nickel. Petit cadeau d'arrivée. Rue au coeur de la ville, animée, donc un peu bruyant parfois la nuit mais ça fait partie de cette vie de quartier. Très lumineux.
Apartamento muy bien situado, amplio, muy luminoso, limpio, bien equipado y perfecto para disfrutar Oporto. Tanto el recibimiento como la estancia fueron perfectas. 100% recomendable.

Our stay was very pleasant. The apartment was spacious and well equipped with fridge freezer, washing machine, hair dryer and kettle. The apartment was clean and located 3-5 minute walk from Sao Bento Railway station and 10 minute walk to the bus station. It is near all the major sites and a 15 minute walk to The Riberia with restaurants, boat trips and Port caves. 
The only suggestion would be for the concierge management, in that we were booked for a 15:30 check- in and were left waiting outside until 16:20 on the footpath/sidewalk until Louisa from the management company arrived, I understand traffic can be a problem, but would have appreciated a text or phone call as to the delay. I had to message the management service to find out any information and was only told someone was on the way - but no time indication.
We asked where would we find a grocery store and again Louisa did not have this information, nor recommendations. 
The door to the apartment jammed and she could not get it opened, luckily my husband was able to 'pound' on the door to help us get in. When we tested the door to get out of the apartment again, she was unable to open the door. If my husband had not been with me, I or any women would not be able to get in or out of the apartment. Louisa said she would report this problem and hopefully, it will be resolved before the next people arrive. 
I would recommend this apartment when visiting Porto for location, and general facilities in the apartment.

Isabella and her team are very professional and provided us any support and help.
The apartment is very nice and located in in center of Porto .

We had a pleasant stay and warm welcoming t the city by a nice reception, a city map and gifts. 
The street is a little bit noisy, you should make a compromise between quietness and distance to the city center trade off!

There are only two points that you should notice before choosing this apartment: check-in is flexible, but after 14:00. 
2. Under the house rules, the host requests to empty out the trash. It has been indicated that there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. We could not find it, on your check-in do not forget to ask the reception to show it to you!
We had a very nice stay. The apartment is very spacious, clean and comfortabel. We were friendly welcomed and the apartment is in a very central location.

Great location really close to the station and in the middle of town. Based on previous reviews i was expecting a noisy street outside but after 10pm or so it's pretty quiet in that respect. One thing not mentioned in previous reviews however is the noisy floorboards of the upstairs neighbours. Being wooden and bare (the floorboards) we were hearing (and feeling the vibrations of) the neighbours very clearly and they stayed up till around 2am every night we were there.
Apartamento muito bem localizado. Chega-se a pé a muitos pontos turísticos, restaurantes e supermercado! É também muito bem decorado e pratico, exatamente como a descrição do anúncio. Recomendo!

Great location and excellent property. Clean, tidy and spacious for two people.  Lovely fews from balcony overlooking Porto and the bustling yet reasonably quiet streets below. Kitchen well equipped and hosts were on time and helpful for area advice.

The apartment was perfect for our girl´s weekend in Porto! Being situated in the very centre it served great as a starting point to explore the entire city by foot. Even before the trip Isabel assisted with any questions and was very helpful. In addition, despite arrival in the middle of the night we were welcomed by her in person. Thank you so much for the great accommodation - we can only recommend this apartment!
Nice stay!!

Apartment is great - spacious, clean and with perfect location, just in the center. In apartment was wine, water for us and in bathroom  shower gel and shampoo, it  was exactly what we needed, because our luggage was lost and delivered only next day. Host is good, everything was ok. Porto is also lovely and very picturesque city, wish someday I'll be there again. I definitely recommend to stay here.

Cet appartement est entièrement conforme à la description. Il est joli, propre, agréable, idéalement situé et facile à trouver grâce aux nombreuses indications de sa propriétaire. Je le recommande vivement aux personnes qui souhaitent visiter et passer un bon séjour à Porto.

Goede en duidelijke communicatie.
Verhuurder was ter wille om 1200 uur check in ipv 1400
Overigens staat op Airbnb aangegeven elk tijdstip.....
We hebben het erg naar ons zin gehad in het appartement en Porto

El apartamento es amplio y muy bonito, tal y como aparece en las fotos. Es muy completo, sobretodo la cocina que está equipada con horno, microondas, tostadora y nevera grande. El lavabo es correcto y con plato de ducha. La cama muy cómoda. No es nada ruidoso. Está muy bien ubicado, está en el mismo centro, a 3 minutos de la estación Sao Bento y a 5 de Torre de los Clérigos, por lo que no necesitas transporte público para moverte. Como punto de mejora, que se pudiera dejar las maletas el último día en alguna habitación. Ha sido una estancia muy buena y ellos son muy atentos. Totalmente recomendable.

We had a great time at the apartment of Isabel. The location was very nice, in close proximity to the supermarket and also nearby some points of interest. Everything is in walking distance. + very good beds! 
For future guests it would be best to have someone take a look at the shower drain, it does not flush properly. 
Regardless of that we had a fenomenal time in Porto and we sincerely recommend this apartment.

Una casa preciosa, decorada con buen gusto, y muy cómoda para una corta estancia.

Muy buen detalle la botella de vino para nuestra llegada.

Una casa muy bien equipada, muy bien decorada, limpia y céntrica. A la llegada nos recibieron muy amablemente, nos explicó zonas para visitar y nos dejaró una botellita de vino de bienvenida.
Salimos muy contentos! :)

The apartment is spacious, clean & beautifully decorated (lovely wooden floors, high ceilings, patio doors with shutters with modern fittings).  The location is ideally located within walking distance to transport & local shops (couple of minutes).   Felt safe.  Isabel is welcoming & very helpful.  Would definitely visit again.
C'est appartement est très bien situé au cœur de Porto. Il est très agréable. (Du bruit mais nous sommes en ville)
Appartement bien situé, trés central, bien décoré et équipé...idéal pour découvrir Porto

Great location. Close to the river, nice shopping streets and restaurants. Very friendly pick up service yet with confusions regarding the adress. Nice, quiet and sunny apartment. We were there end of December, and it was not very well heated. It took us a few days to get it warm. Good price. Except for the misunderstanding at the pickup,everything was very well organized. All together, a pleasant experience.
Lovely place, very good location. Needs better heater in the winter! Recommend...

Great location.  5 minutes to great restaurants. On the trolley bus route but very infrequent. Apartment was new, minimalist and everything worked. Good for two.Hosting and concierge service were excellent.
Pretty, clean and very well located apartment. Great communication and we were well welcomed. Everything was perfect! I strongly recommend.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement qui est très bien situé, tout est faisable à pied !
Le quartier est vivant !
L'appartement est très bien équipé et la propreté était au top !

L'appartement d'Isabel était propre et bien situé ! L'accueil était parfait (explications claires, accueil très aimable, et petit cadeau). Petite note négative : les écoulements de la salle de bain et de la cuisine.

This is a very nice apartment, perfect for a couple or two friends willing to sleep in the same bed. The location is perfect; close to the old city center and within walking distance of just about anything you would like to see in Porto. The house was quite old so you can hear the neighbours (especially the ones upstairs) very well and there is also some noise from the street, but this is to be expected with such a centrally located apartment. Minor negative points: when we arrived, the place hadn't been cleaned yet so we had to hurredly leave our luggage in the apartment and go, so we didn't have time to relax or freshen up after our trip. But those are just details because when we came back, the place was very tidy. Communicating with the owner was very easy and someone waited for us at arrival to show us the apartment. All in all very nice experience in beautiful Porto! If I ever return, I will definitely book this apartment again.
Well located, spacious and clean apartment. Yes you can here cars on the street and water running when people upstairs have showers but it's nothing more than you would expect in an apartment.
The appartement is perfectly located to explore the city. It is very neat and clean. The pick-up service from the airport worked very well. Very recommendable.
Good

A very good option, best place to stay in Porto! Perfect location and apartment with everything you may need to enjoy your stay in this great city. We would absolutely come back to this apartment. Highly recommendable!!

I would definitely return if we visit Porto again. Its very close to all public transits, including the metro and Sao Bento station. It was so conveniently located for us since we also traveled to Lisbon by train. The residence was only 2minutes away by walk from train station. Also at great walking distance to famous restaurants, to the Douro riverside, and to touristy areas. The check in check out process was super easy and accommodating. The house was clean, it looks exactly like the pictures. We would definitely come back!

Dit was een geweldig appartement op een toplocatie. De transfer van het vliegveld naar de stad is aan te bevelen. Het appartement is ruim en echt schitterend. Het ligt middenin de stad en dus op loopafstand van alles. Wat dat betreft zijn we zeker niet teleurgesteld! Het is echt een aanrader!

Ook de communicatie met de eigenaar verliep vlekkeloos. Wij stelden een vraag en we kregen erg snel antwoord. Super!

Helaas waren er ook mindere zaken. Aangezien je in het midden van de stad zit kun je geluid en herrie verwachten van de buren, maar de bovenburen waren ronduit asociaal. Wij zaten er van maandag tot en met vrijdag en zij speelden elke avond knetterharde technomuziek. We konden vaak niet slapen en werden ons bed uitgetrild...

Ook de transfer van het appartement naar het vliegveld was niet goed. De transfer was er 20 minuten na de afgesproken tijd nog niet en daarom hebben we een duurdere taxi genomen.

Al met al is dit appartement zeker een aanrader, al hoop ik wel dar de bovenburen wel wat meer rekening met hun buren houden...

7,5/10!

It is a great location to the city center. I recommend getting off at Sao Bento Subway or train station then walk down the hill and up towards a hill where the Sao Idelfonso church is. The apartment is a little hidden so just look for the number near the door.

The actual room is well equipped and comfortable. I love the balcony's available. Highly recommend staying here if you're interested in staying in the center of Porto.
Great apartment in a very centrally located area.  Easy to walk around the whole city.  Host was very responsive and easy check in.  Would stay again if in Porto!

Dejo el comentario de mis padres en su estancia:
El apartamento es exactamente igual a las fotografías del anuncio y a su descripción. Es sencillo, acogedor, limpio y muy cómodo. Además está en la calle principal de Oporto, tanto que esa calle está anunciada en el aeropuerto.
No tuvimos ningún tipo de problema o queja en nuestra estancia. Es totalmente aconsejable para pasar unos días en Oporto.
Excelente apartamento no centro do Porto. Tudo funcionando bem. Recomendo a todos os viajantes.

ｻﾝ･ﾍﾞﾝﾄ駅から徒歩5分のﾛｹｰｼｮﾝでかなり便利です｡
ｷｯﾁﾝがしっかりしているしｽｰﾊﾟｰも近くに何ヶ所かあるので食事を作ることもできます｡
ﾎﾟﾙﾄに来たらまた泊まりたいです!!!

We liked the apartment and its central location. The apartment itself was adequately clean and as pictured, but we found that the kitchen wasn't fully equipped as described. We ate in a couple of nights and found it difficult to cook, with no oven gloves or even bowls in the kitchen.

Also, whilst the location was very good for sightseeing, the road is quite loud with a tram on it, but was fine at nightime. Overall, the apartment was reasonable with a good location, but there were a few drawbacks to our experience.

Great location and nice decoration. Also very spacious. 

집이 넓고 상밴투역에서 위로 도보 일이분 거리입니다. 인테리어도 멋지고 없는게 없을 정도로 잘 갖추어져 있습니다. 포르투 가시는 분은 꼭 묵으셨으면 좋겠네요. 집주인도 친절합니다~

Een fijn appartement, prima ontvangst en een top locatie.
Van alle gemakken voorzien. Echt een aanrader!

It was a pleasure staying at this apartment. It's comfortable and ideally located. It's right in the center, in walkable distance from all the attractions, and near plenty of greats options for food. Highly recommended.

Mieszkanie  dobrze położone, w centrum. Przy hałaśliwej ulicy. Dla nas to nie był wielki problem, tylko, jak tramwaj piął się w górę ulicy, to nie można było rozmawiać. Taki koloryt lokalny. Wynajem prowadzony jest przez jakieś biuro, którego pracownicy słabo albo wcale nie mówią po angielsku. Generalnie komunikacja daleka od standardów Airbnb, bardzo bezosobowa. Naczynia wszystkie bez wyjątku tłuste, niedomyte. Butelka wina na dzień dobry bardzo miła !Dziękujemy!:) Bardzo wygodna sypialnia, wielkie wygodne łóżko i duża szafa. Blisko do starej turystycznej części miasta, ale też do centrum pełnego sklepów oraz Marcado de Balhau, polecamy. Piękny zabytkowy dworzec jest tuż obok, ale nie słychać pociągów z tego akurat apartamentu, za to przed dworcem zatrzymują się liczne autobusy. Generalnie dobre miejsce dla osób przyjeżdżających na 3-4 dni.
Place is very convenient in terms of location and comfort. Highly reccomended

Appartement très bien placé, lumineux, spacieux et très bien décoré, on se sent comme chez soi. Un petit bémol sur la cuisine pas très propre à notre arrivée... mais c'est minime 
Je recommande vivement cet appartement !

Great little apartment, right in the centre of Porto. Walking distance to all attractions!

Excellent communication start to end, no problems at all.
A very cozy place in a great location! Happy to have stayed here.

Really great location and apartment was completely as advertised. Only drawbacks were that the apartment wasn't cleaned on arrival in the afternoon. It was however cleaned promptly thereafter. Also, the neighbour above was extremely noisy due to the thin ceiling but perhaps that is common of most apartments. Trouble-free stay otherwise.
Very good place and beautiful flat!

The location and interior of this apartment is amazing. We had a great time there, waking up and standing on the balcony above the busy street was priceless. My only comment would be that certain items need a good clean - the sofa, some of the towels and the blanket for example. The bathroom could also do with an upgrade, but it's perfectly functional.
Very nice and very clean apartment. Just a little bit to noisy in and around the house. But maybe we just had bad luck. Would come back anytime. Thanks for the good communication und recommendations.
Apartamento muy céntrico y tal cual se muestra en las fotos. El apartamento es amplio y la cama muy cómoda. Cocina equipada y lavabo con todo lo necesario.
Good location; very nice interior!
Wir waren für 2 Tage bei Isabel. Das Apartment ist super schön und die Lage perfekt! Bad und Dusche waren klasse und das Bett war auch angenehm. Würde jedes mal wiederkommen!

Estuvimos en Porto por 2 noches y tanto si es para más el apartamento es genial. El servicio es perfecto y viene equipado con todo lo que necesitas y más! La ubicación está en pleno centro, tienes todo andando. Muy limpio, bonito y un apartamento en el que sin duda viviría. Altamente recomendable!
bell' appartamento, zona centrale comoda per qualsiasi soggiorno e ben abitabile anche da 4 persone
Ubicación bien y en casa estuvimos muy Agusto. Todo limpio y muy bonita la casa nos dejaron un detalle a la llegada
Very central, great location! A bit loud at night but the place itself is great.
Tudo foi otimo

The people are very nice but this was not the best Airbnb experience. Keep in mind this is one of many apts managed by a business, not a private homeowner. I arrived before the 2p check-in time and I was able to grab the key earlier, but at their office, a 10-15 minute drive away. I went to the apt to drop off the luggage but the hosts hadn't told the cleaning crew we'd be coming by earlier, like I asked them to, so they were taken by surprise, and was obviously irritated we were there, only even for 10 minutes to freshen up before leaving. Between that and the clogged shower from day 1, loud upstairs neighbor who would consistently stomp overnight and wake me up, I had just an okay experience. However, the location is fantastic, the apt was fairly clean besides a couple stains on the bedding, and the wifi was fast.

Isabel was a fantastic host.  The place was clean and even better than what we expected.  The local was perfect and central to everything exciting around Barcelona.  I would highly recommend this to future travellers.

El apartamento es tal y como se muestra, con una ubicación excelente y todas las comodidades necesarias, Quiero agradecer y resaltar la buena comunicación y la solución inmediata que recibí ante un pequeño inconveniente. Es cómodo, muy luminoso y agradable para pasar unos días. Por poner una pequeña "pega", indicar la hora real de entrada al mismo, pues aparcar cerca aunque solo sea para dejar las maletas es algo complicado. Sin duda, si vuelvo, repetiría apartamento.

Overall positive experience. good location. cleanness. good value for money.  apartment is just like showing in pictures. all appliances you may need for a short stay. I suggest to reply to them when they request to confirm your arrival hour to avoid any issues.

Tolle Lage in der Altstadt, dadurch zwar auch etwas laut, aber ideal, was die Atmosphäre angeht! Das Haus ist ein Altbau, Charmant, aber eben auch hellhörig, wer also empfindlich ist, könnte schlecht schlafen...;-)
Ansonsten entspricht die Wohnung 1:1 den Bildern, freundlich eingerichtet, nett! Allerdings würde ich nicht zu viert dort schlafen wollen, denn das recht betagte Sofa kann nicht wirklich als vollwertige Schlafgelegenheit gewertet werden....;-). Das Sesselsofa hingegen funktioniert als dritte Schlafgegelegenheit sehr gut.
Very nice apartment in very nice location.
Pristine apartment, sparkling clean and in a great location!  Would definitely return.  Contemporary decor mixed with old world charm.
Desde la casa fácil acceso  cualquier zona turística a pie

Das Apartment ist wirklich wunderschön und geräumig. Die Lage ist hervorragend zentral, so dass man zu den wichtigsten Punkten sehr gut zu Fuß kommt. Durch die Lage an der Straße ist es nicht immer ganz ruhig, es war aber auch nicht besonders laut. Der Check-in verlief reibungslos und die Kommunikation war immer gut. Ich würde jederzeit wieder dort buchen und kann es absolut empfehlen.
Todo perfecto, el apartamento tiene de todo. Hemos estado como en casa
The location is nice and the flat is nice. Some details need to be improved - e.g. the equipment in the kitchen.

Très bon séjour passé chez Isabel.
L'appartement est spacieux, propre, lumineux et surtout très central qui permet de tout découvrir à pieds.
Je recommande :)
It is impossible sleep with the nightclub near this house. If it is to sleep and rest, this is not a good apartment.
Estupenda ibicacion y estilo
It was a nice stay! The flat is super chic and clean. Even the sofa was good for good for sleeping. All in all we had a nice stay and the accommodation is located perfectly central.

Hemos pasado un fin de semana increíble. El apartamento está justo al lado de Aliados, la ubicación es inmejorable para pasar unos días en esta ciudad. La casa está genial, la cama es muy cómoda y todo es espacioso. No hemos utilizado la cocina pero se veía muy completa. Sin duda, me volvería a alojar en el mismo apartamento, por lo cómodo y lo céntrico que es. Además nos dejaron agua, vino y café, detalles que se agradecen muchísimo.

Nuestra estancia ha sido desfavorable debido a los inconvenientes que hemos tenido en nuestra estancia..Cuando llegamos la casa estaba helada, no tiene calefacción y el primer día pasamos frío. Creo que deberían de acondicionarla antes de la llegada de los huéspedes.
El segundo día no había agua caliente por lo que no nos pudimos duchar; tampoco funcionaba el frigorífico por lo que se nos estropearon algunos enseres que habíamos llevado para el desayuno.
El tercer día se rompió el sofá cuando me fui a sentar.
Y ya por último, se estropeó el grifo y no se podía cerrar, esperamos varias horas para ver si venía alguien a solucionar el problema y, al no venir nadie, nos fuimos dejando el grifo abierto ya que estábamos allí por vacaciones, no para solucionar problemas....
Si bien es verdad la respuesta a los problemas se fueron solucionando en el día con rápida respuesta pero el piso no aporta confort, le falta equipamiento y (Website hidden by Airbnb) lo recomiendo y por supuesto que no volvería a alojarme.
En los años que llevamos alojandonos en apartamentos turísticos, esta ha sido la peor experiencia que hemos tenido. 
Agradecer a Martin que adelanto la hora del checkin.
Lo único favorable es la ubicación que está cerca de todo.

Estancia agridulce.
El apartamento está genial, muy completo y en una situación inmejorable. Si vas en coche vale mas la pena aparcarlo en un parking y no volver a cogerlo hasta el último día. Esta todo cerca a pié.
Hemos tenído problemas para que nos entregarán el apartamento. Teníamos la entrada prevista a las 15.00 desde hace mas de un mes, la sorpresa llega cuando al llegar a esa hora resulta que el apartamento estaba sin limpiar. Recalcar la amabilidad del chico que nos hizo la recepción y se le notaba incluso a él que esa situación no le agradaba. Nos dijo que podíamos dejar las maletas y que volvieramos en una hora. Una hora y media después al llegar al apartamento seguía sin limpiar. Tras 5 horas más deambulando por Oporto y habiendo llamado 4 veces sin solución alguna pudimos volver al apartamento ya limpio. Supongo que esta situación no será lo habitual pero no se puede dejar pasar sin comentarlo.
A día de hoy no se si repetiría alojarme en este apartamento.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Isabel.  Adoramos o apartamento , decoração, localização e a limpeza . Recomendo ! Espero voltar!  Obrigada ...

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans ce logement ! Appartement idéalement placé dans le centre, proche de tout - nous avons tout fait à pied. Jolie décoration, logement lumineux, propre et particulièrement bien équipé. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la disponibilité, la réactivité et la fiabilité de la conciergerie. Je recommande ce logement sans hésiter !
Apartamento muito bem localizado. É possível fazer tudo no PORTO a pé. Recomendo
O Apartamento é muito bem localizado e correspondeu às expectativas. Obrigado Isabel
Excelente localização, excelente apartamento. Algum barulho à noite, devido à proximidade com o centro. Recomendo!
Appartement  très propre avec une décoration vraiment joli, très bien équipé ,  proximité de toute commodités  et tout est fessable à pied . Je recommande

Appartement très bien situé, en plein centre-ville et à proximité de nombreuses attractions et bar/restaurants. 
L'appartement est très bien équipé et propre. Seul bémol, le bruit le soir - prévoir des boules Quiès!
Cozy flat in the strict city center (close to the Porto-São Bento train station). Absolutely recommended!

Appartement bien  situé  les lieux de visite son a portée à pied  , le métro est à une minute , des dizaines de restaurants tout autour et des commerces. L'appartement est propre et fonctionnel, lumineux et assez grand . Manque peut être une insonorisation plus efficace pour ceux qui ont le sommeil fragile. Si je doit retourner à Porto je retournerait volontiers ici .

Emplacement Super. Tout se fait à pieds. Nous sommes arrivés vers minuit, et avons eu un très bon accueil. L'appartement est propre. Il y à une machine à laver. Il n'y avait pas de gel douche. La rue est peu bruyante mais comme l'appartement est mal isolé, les bruits de l'extérieur, et de l'appartement du dessus, sont présents, mais ça ne nous a pas empêché de dormir. Je recommande,  si le bruit ne vous embête pas.

Central, appartement impeccable et accueil chaleureux, super accueil : nous n’avons eu absolument rien à redire sur la durée de notre séjour  ! Je recommande cet appartement à tous, idéal pour visiter Porto sur un week-end !
lovely apartment!! centrally located, clean and adorable. The bed was extremely comfortable and they gave us great tips and plenty of amenities like coffee, tea, soap, lots of towels etc.

Appartement idéalement situé pour découvrir Porto à pied, proche de la gare. La qualité de l'appartement est très satisfaisante, les draps propres ainsi que la salle de bain. Le salon cuisine est fonctionnel. Le chauffeur lié à l'annonce qui est venu nous chercher à l'aéroport était très pro et sympa. Je recommande ce logement

Isabel’s apartment is fabulous - very spacious and light. My husband and I spent 4 nights there and we were sorry to leave. It is in a wonderful location. We’ll definitely stay there when we are in Porto again
强烈推荐!位置很棒 房间比照片更棒

Apartamento muito bem localizado, ideal para quem pertende explorar o porto a pé! Corresponde as imagens e tem todas as comodidades para uma estadia agradável. Viajamos com duas crianças e recomendamos este apartamento!
Appartemento perfetto per un soggiorno a Porto. Centralissimo, molto grande e luminoso. Collegato benissimo con metro e stazione dei treni. Ideale.

Gostamos muito do apartamento. Muito bem localizado, fica perto da estação de trem e pode ir a pé a várias atrações. 
Bem decorado e aconchegante. Banheiro limpo e amplo. A cozinha é bem equipada e tudo é de muito bom gosto. 
Ficamos no segundo andar e não tem elevador, só para avisar em caso de mala pesada.
Recomendamos o apartamento.
Everything was perfect! I really recommend this place for a comfortable stay in Porto!!!

Isabel’s place is in a perfect location for a long weekend trip to Porto, walking distance to all the restaurants and attractions. The place itself is very stylish and clean- a couple small improvements would have made it amazing, things like only have one wine glass, not having the right kitchen equipment and leaving the hand soap empty on arrival. Only small things would make such a difference. Saying that i wouldn’t have a problem staying here again.

Logement super bien situé, à proximité de restaurants, bars, cafés et lieux de visites. 
En ce qui concerne la cuisine de l’appartement, il manque des équipements pour pouvoir se cuisiner un petit repas! 
Nous avons été accueillis par Joana qui nous a donné pas mal de bons plans. Globalement, bel appartement bien situé et jolie ville de Porto!
So far a fair offer - great location but needs some refresher regarding the bed and furniture.
The host canceled this reservation 110 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L appartamento è in una posizione strepitosa! Bello! Confortevole! Con tutto ciò di chi si può avere bisogno .... e se non c’è.... basta chiedere... Isabel e Fernando faranno di tutto per aiutarti .L host è sempre raggiungibile e contattabile! Abbiamo avuto al check-in consigli su come muoverci ! E’ Al secondo piano senza ascensore quindi se qlc ha problemi con le scale questa è l unica nota negativa ma le scale sono di legno e non molto alte.
The host canceled this reservation 64 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Sehr zentral gelegene Wohnung. Sehr bemühte Gastgeber. Jedoch teilweise abgenutzte Möbel. Für einen Kurztrip nach Porto jedoch passend.

Excellent location, central, next to rua de Santa Catarina (main commerce street in Porto). Walking distance for many tourist points. We used very little public transportation, which is easy to access.
Very clean, stylish, convenient. Nothing to change.
Very close to São Bento station (literally on the corner).
The apartment is on the second floor (no elevator, as all historical buildings in Porto).
There are two great windows with balcony in the living room, you can see the electric trams just in front.
The guests (concierge service) was there in the correct for the check in, and quickly answered to all our questions. 
Definitely a great experience in Porto!

Excellent accueil. A l’arrivé on nous a donné de des bon plans et bonnes adresses. 
L’appartement est idéalement situé, proche de la gare, des commerces et pas loin de ribeira district and the quais of Duoro. Parfait pour un séjour courte/moyenne durée

Very nice appartment in a central and convenient location.
Close to Sao Bento station and within walking distance of most attractions.
We loved having this flat as our home to discover the beautiful City of Porto !

Overall, the apartment was as advertised and was satisfactory for our purposes. The location was very convenient to the train station, restaurants, and a lot of the interesting places to see.

We did have some issues with check-in regarding communication with the host and the timing of it, in addition to the apartment not being cleaned from the last guests when we finally were able to check-in. Bit of a bummer to come off almost 24hrs of travel without sleep and not being able to shower or take a nap before having to hit the city.

name: CHARMING PRACTICAL RELAXING IPANEMA
summary: CHARMING QUIET SAFE PRACTICAL 1 double bed + 1 single mattress if needed  WIFI - TV - Air Conditioning - Fans in all rooms - Washing machine American equipped kitchen 5 min of the Beach and the Lagoon Restaurants,Bus and Metro nearby walking!
space: Very Nice and Charmous Flat, with one bed room, american kitchen, quiet and very safe!. Ideal for a couple.  Very practical, 10 min to the beach by foot  and 5 to the Lake. Everything just close: services, bakery, restaurants etc... Very easy transportation for everywhere by bus, metro or bike... Cozy living room with american kitchen and beautiful local wood furnitures. A good mix of french and Brazilian style as my friend say...  Bedroom with a very comfortable real bed, a hamac, and the view on the sky and mountains,  sun all the afternoon very clever in the Carioca winter.  Another small dressing room with computer place and place for another mattress if needed, and some ropes for your morning streching/yoga!! Bathroom with a shower and good hot water (by gaz). Every basic things for cooking ( Sices, suga, oil, coffee), with gaz and oven, (just no Microwave oven), and basic spice/oil  for cooking for free. Fruits and Vegetable Market at 2 quarters, on tuesday and friday, with Bio M

Native from north of France, Life leads me to Brasil 21 years ago and have been "Carioca" since 2001 - Living in the Marvellous City of Rio de Janeiro 
I evoluated from Computer Engineering to Yoga Teacher and now Conferencist,  Self Realization Mediation and Energetic Balancing & ThetaHealing Therapist.

I like receiving people at home and sharing what I like, and looking for making my guest feeling well in my apartment to enjoy their stay in a cool and secure way.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Christine was a great host from beginning; good communication, flexible checkin, answered any questions. Her apartment was a very peaceful oasis in a beautiful area of Ipanema. Apartment was larger than I expected, clean, comfortable bed, a/c and fans, wood floors, overall nice vibe and surrounded by Ganesha images. One direction was a few blocks to the beach, another to nice shopping in Leblon or for a jog around the lagoon. I did not need to take taxi anywhere, subway station was a few blocks away and everything I needed was within walking distance. I would highly recommend to a respectful guest looking for tranquility and a quality stay in Rio De Janeiro.
Absolutely no complaints. Very well kept, clean and nice apartment in a very good location. The area is very safe as well, and only about a 10 minute walk from Ipanema beach. I highly recommend it!
Great location in Ipanema, very safe too. Christine is very sweet and helpful.
On a guarded residence, pleasant apartment comfy and really well located,  very close to Ipanema beach and the lagoon. Kind of place that make you feel like home.

Muy buena & tranquila ubicación en el barrio de Ipanema, el apartamento es lindo y tal y como aparece en las fotos con todo lo que uno necesita para pasar unos días. Christine es muy simpática, flexible y disponible.

O apartamento é igual às fotografias do anúncio. Muito bem decorado e bem localizado em Ipanema, numa rua super tranquila.
A Cristiane foi muito atenciosa connosco, Recomendo a todos os hóspedes este apartamento.

L'appartamento e comodissimo e molto accogliente. Si trova in una strada alberata e silenziosa, vicino a ristoranti, negozi e molto vicino alla spiaggia di Ipanema. La zona é molto sicura. Christine é stata gentile, disponibile e solerte nelle risposte. Un' opzione raccomandabile.

Pasamos una muy linda estadía en el departamento de christine. Es muy limpio y comodo, tal cual se ve en las fotos.
Su ubicación es muy conveniente ya que esta a pocas cuadras de la playa de ipanema y también de la de copacabana y cerca de la estación de metro.
Christine fue muy amable, se adapto a nuestro horario de llegada y nos dio el departamento en perfectas condiciones.
Con respecto a Rio me gustaría conocer la ciudad fuera de la época de carnaval también, seguramente sea una experiencia totalmente diferente.

Our trip in Rio was really good, the city is amazing snd the Olympic atmosphere increased is beauty. The place is very well located on a backroad in Ipanema, which in my opinion is the best area to stay in Rio.

Regarding the flat location and value for money are the critical success factor. It was a really good deal seeing the prices durong the Games. The flat itself is decent, nothing fancy. It has some lacks here and there, but it's still good for a short time when you are travelling and spending most of the time outside.

Christine is really nice and helpful. She makes sure everything is alright and the communication with her is really easy and efficient.

Christine was an amazing host for us. We went to Rio for the Games and hence had HEAPS of questions about getting around, security etc. and she was very helpful in answering those. We arrived at midnight and had no trouble find the unit or getting in. Communication with Christine was fast and easy. The unit is lovely and very comfortable. GREAT location. Easy walk to shops, cafes, restaurants, the beach, subway etc. Ipanema is a lovely neighbourhood and felt very safe while we were there (and the people very friendly and helpful).

Great flat in a great location! The beach is a short walk away and Ipanema has a good choice of restaurants and is always very lively. It is also a great place to go all around Rio with the metro. 

Christine is a great host and suggested a number of nice places to go to!
Muy lindo apartamento, cómodo, cerca del metro y la playa.

A nice cozy apartment perfect for short stays in Ipanema.  I chose affordability over luxury and all my expectations were met.  Christine is very friendly and helped resolve a small issue I encountered in the apartment even though she was away on a trip.

Cést un trés bonne choix. Le appartement a resulté plus grand que sur les fotos et trés comfortable por nous. La cuisine est parfaitement compléte. Nous avons aimé le quartier parce que tout est proche, mais dans un environment vraiment tranquille. Christine n'etait pas à Rio ces jours-la, mais on nous communiquait tout le temps. Je recomende!


This is a good choice! The appartement is really bigger than in photos and has resulted súper comfy for us. The kitchen is fully equiped por enthusiastic chefs. We loved the neighboorhood because  is close to everything but in a really calm environment. Christine wasn´t at Río during our stay but we were communicated all the time.
Nice place to be hosted at. Cozy and practical.
