name: Copacabana Studio -  5* Reviews, 5 mins to Beach
summary: IMPORTANT: CARNIVAL - MINIMUM BOOKING 4 NIGHTS. Great location/AirCon/Strong Wifi/24 hr Doormen/Breakfast Pack/5* Service Beautifully-designed studio 5 minutes walk to Copacabana beach in tree-lined residential street with personal touches and high quality finishes.   We really understand our guests' needs and will help you have a memorable experience.  You'll receive our detailed written guide to Rio, welcome food, benefit from our local knowledge and feel at home before you even arrive!
space: CARNIVAL NOTE:  Please note that our minimum stay for Carnival is 4 nights.  So, please don't use Instant Book for Carnival if your stay is less than 4 nights.  Carnival 2019 prices are already in the calendar, so just enter your dates! We do hope you will come and stay -  we'll do all we can to make your stay special! Our beautifully-designed and renovated studio is located in a lovely, tree-lined, residential street in Copacabana with no heavy traffic and only 5 mins walk from the beach.  The walk to the beach is down Santa Clara St. which is full of interesting restaurants and shops and is one of the best in Copacabana.  It takes you to one of the nicest and most central parts of the bay.  Our building is small, friendly and residential with mainly owner-occupied flats, 24 hour doormen and security cameras.   We have air con, fast reliable wifi, as well as a flat-screen cable TV with international channels.     It's perfect for holidays in Rio or business trips.  We designed the stu

Our beautifully-designed and renovated studio is located in a lovely, tree-lined, residential street in Copacabana with no heavy traffic and only 5 mins walk from the beach.  The walk t
neighborhood_overview: Everything is on your doorstep here: local shops, supermarkets, the original 'City of Copacabana'  Shopping Centre, great cafes, bars and restaurants.  Every Wednesday morning there's a lovely fresh food market 3 minutes walk away at the end of our street.   When you see all the marvellous things in our neighbourhood set out in our guide you will see why we think we are in the best area and best street in Rio!   Copacabana Beach for us is much more interesting, day and night, than Ipanema and the range of shops and quality of life in Copa somehow seems much more real-world...a fantastic experience living like a true Carioca (native of Rio)! We have everything on hand, but perhaps what we love most best is the ease of just a 5-minute walk home to our residential tree-lined street feeling you are escaping from the lively beach area, or the big parties at New Year and Carnival!
notes: No more than two people can stay here - we can put an airbed in if the two people do not want to share the double bed.  For short stays we can make an exception if the third person is a child but only by prior agreement using the airbed.   Our street is residential and quiet compared to the busy avenues nearby - there is some background sound of Rio traffic and street life.     We don´t notice it, but you may if you are a light sleeper. Please think twice before using the aircon in order to be more environmentally friendly and to keep the costs down!  The ceiling fan is very effective and more gentle.  Please turn both off when not in the studio.
transit: We are only 3 minutes from the Siquiera Campos stop on the main metro line which connects us to Ipanema  (two stops - 5 minutes) and to the centre of Rio (8 stops - 12 minutes).  There are many buses nearby as well, and we are five minutes walk from the airport bus drop off/pick up point at the Marriot Hotel.   There is also a safe and reliable taxi rank within 100 metres, and we have our own driver contact for personalised airport transfers or trips to other towns like Paraty or Buzios. It's also a lovely walk to Ipanema - about 30 mins along the beach front.
access: What you WILL find: internet - cable and wifi air conditioning ceiling fan and light fridge microwave toaster filter coffee machine kettle single ring cooker stove fan heater tap water filter (so no need to buy bottled water) flat-screen TV with international cable channels plentiful wall sockets, all 110 volts (like most of Rio). All modern appliances automatically adapt to this voltage (including laptops). quality bedding and towels (towels for the shower, not to be used for the beach please) large bathroom cupboard with good storage space tea towels (for the kitchen) cutlery plates, storage jars and boxes glasses, cups and mugs pots, pans and cooking utensils small, light hairdrier full-size sofa bed - very comfortable as sofa and bed (see review on this) comfortable designer armchair wall mounted folding table  two chairs modern desk with lamp and drawer unit full-length wardrobe with full-length mirror with good hanging space chest of drawers (6 drawers) two 3-drawer units beside
interaction: Before your finalise your reservation we are available to answer any questions you have, and then are in close contact helping you prepare your trip sharing all our local knowledge as you wish, and also sending our written guide which covers great places to eat and transfer arrangements etc.   Our welcomer is Hugo who is a close, multi-lingual friend of ours and we are always available at any time during your stay to help with questions.
house_rules: No visitors - the 24 hour doormen will not allow non-guests to enter the building.

host.host_about: We're a happily married Scottish couple who fell in love with Brazil when we lived in Sao Paulo a few years ago. We love Rio so much we decided to buy a little studio here so we could spend some months a year in Copacabana, working from here and enjoying the city.  We sometimes rent it out when we're not here.  We hope you enjoy Rio and living in our studio as much as we do.  We'll do as much as we can to make your stay easy and memorable.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
This is a great little apartment on a quiet tree-lined street about two and a half blocks from the beach.  It is close to everything including the Siqueira Campos Metro stop which is a big plus if you need to get to downtown Rio. There are parts of Copacabana that are quite a trek from the Metro. There are all sorts of restaurants within a block in all directions and of course the beach a 5-minute walk away.

Everything is brand new and the apartment feels modern and cozy at the same time. It is however quite small. I was there by myself for 4 nights and it was perfect. Great for a couple as well if you get along really well. I wouldn't try to put 3 people in this place. When the bed is unfolded there is very little floor space left. The little space there is actually feels a lot bigger because it is very organized. It is easy to keep tidy since there is really only one place to put each thing. The handy apartment guide shows you where things go, how to unfold the sofa into the various configurations, and has some tips on the area. 

There is both wired and wireless Internet which was fast and worked perfectly for me. There is a nice little flat screen TV with satellite channels and easily accessible hdmi ports so you can hook up your laptop and play your own content. Sometimes wall-mounted flat screens make it really hard to get to the hdmi ports, but not in this case.

Note that power outlets in Brazil come in about 4 different flavours and you can never really be sure whether it is 110V or 220V. So bring adapters and make sure anything you plug in won't be fried by being plugged into a 220V outlet. In this apartment all (and there are surprisingly many) the outlets are IEC-906-1 type plugs at 220V. It is 3-pronged but still 2-prong Europlug compatible so if you are coming from most of Europe you won't need adapters. If you are coming from North America, bring some regular US-Euro adapters.

The view of Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer statue) is especially nice at sunset and in the evening when it is lit up. There is a shot of it at sunset taken from the window of the apartment here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Alan and Catherine were lightning quick to respond and made the process extremely smooth.

All in all this was a perfect and relaxing 4 nights in Copacabana for me.

Hola a todos!! Estuvimos en el Studio Apartment de Catherine y Alan a fines de junio de 2011 con mi marido. Fue una excelente elección, gracias Alan y Catherine!!
La UBICACION del depto es ideal, ya que estás cerca de todo (queda en Capacabana) y te podés mover en omnibus a todos lados sin problema.
La ZONA es muy seguro, tranquila y con lugares para comer y comprar comida cerca. Siempre nos sentimos MUY seguros.
El DEPARTAMENTO está buenísimo! Es tal cual las fotos. Todo nuevo, impecable y con diseño- Está todo pensado hastá el mínimo detalle! Tiene todo lo necesario y más!  El wifi anda perfecto; la pantalla plana es GRANDE, no como dice el comentario de Marcus. El sillón camo es muy cómodo, tanto como sillón tanto como cama(más cómodo que muchas camas de hotel). El baño está impecable!!! El depto está buenísimo para ir con pareja o con un amigo.
Tiene SEGURIDAD LAS 24HS.
ALAN y CATHERINE son muy organizados y amables. Siempre contestaron rapidisimo y nos dieron datos para la llegada que nos sirvieron mucho,  MUCHAS GRACIAS POR COMPARTIR SU CASA EN RIO CON NOSOTROS!!!
LES RECOMENDAMOS a todos los que quieran conocer Rio, quedarse en el Studio Apartmente de Alan y Catherine!!!
Saludos,

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Patricio & Mercedes

The studio is really nice and comfy, modern and well-equiped in a nice building, in a great area of Rio - its location, a few meters away from Copacabana beach, is really central and convenient. There are a lot of shops, coffee places, bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby, and the area is really safe.
Alan and Catherine have every thing prepared to make of your stay a great time - all you have to do is to enjoy!

Pase mucho tiempo buscando por AIRBNB algún lugar en el cual pudiera pasar mis vacaciones. En cuanto vi las fotos del Studio, me di cuenta que era un lugar agradable y acogedor. Cuando me puse en contacto con Alan & Catherine, me di cuenta que eran personas muy amables y atentas. Siempre se mostraron dispuestos a resolver mis dudas y ayudarme a encontrar sitios en Rio de janeiro. El Studio es muy bonito y muy comodo, me gusto la vista que se tiene del Cristo Redentor desde la ventana. Muy recomendalbe el Studio! muy simpatica Lelita y muy cordiales los Porteros! Rio es una ciudad magnifica su gente es muy agradable!

My rating is 5 out of 5!!!!! This studio is simply amazing!

Alan and Catherine's studio is a beautiful place to stay. The creative design and artistic details are inspiringly put together. It is also wonderful because it is situated in the heart of Copa. Very close to the shops, the beach, the metro, and major tourist attractions. Location and design are the perfect combo to make your stay comfortable and rewarding!

Alan is such a kind, polite and thoughtful person! I will not forget his kindness. He went above and beyond to make my stay a happy one. In fact, he went well and beyond my expectations of a land lord. He even helped me organise a taxi to leave and booked it for me. Alan also arranged to get the apartment cleaned mid-stay. I did not ask him to do this. In sum, you could not want nicer person to deal with! Alan is a rare gem! He responds to emails in a timely manner and is a generous, helpful and wonderful!  He thinks of everything to make your stay a happy one!

The apartment building is nice and the couple that work at the door and look after the cleaning are such warm, kind and beautiful Brazilian people!!! They helped me so much with many things. When I arrived my luggage was missing, so they rang the airport and even offered to drive me to the airport! They even helped me go shopping for electrical goods so I could use my computer. Outstanding kindness!!!  It was a joy to come and home and say hello to them on the way to the elevator. I will miss them very much!

The apartment is comfortable because every last detail has been very well considered. Coming from Australia, I found the internet speed very fast and easy to connect. The cable TV is excellent and nice to watch after a long day touring Rio! The kitchen is perfect and is a delightful place to make yummy breakfast etc. The bathroom is very well designed. While the living room and bedroom is a joy to be in due to the artwork and beautiful use of form and light. The use of colour in the studio is visually sophisticated and joyful. I really loved the use of design to create atmosphere and mixed with Brazilian art, this is a real treat to enjoy! Loved it!!!

I really enjoyed dealing with Alan and Catherine. They are perfect hosts and I will be coming back to stay again for sure! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine for letting me stay in your beautiful home. I had the best time and will always remember how lovely your home and your wonderful kindness! 

Thank you!!!!!!

The pictures really shows what you get: a modern and cozy studio. At first may look tight and small, however the decoration work done by the owners are very smart and find for every single free space an appropriate use. The location also could not be better. Just one remark: the street is very peaceful, but Rio de Janeiro is a very noisy place. And the studio is placed between two very busy streets. Finally, Alan,  Catherine (the owners) and Lelita (the maid) are extremely friendly and attentive. The will do whatever they could to help your stay to be the best.

Perfect ! The studio is a a Little gem In Copacabana In a quiet tree-lined street NeXT to The métro. Very tastefully decorated  
Communication with Alan and Catherine was great. They are perfect hosts. 
100% recomended

Pasamos una semana maravillosa en el studio de Alan y Catherine. Realmente han pensado en cada detalle para hacerlo funcional, cómodo... y muy bonito!! Tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar al máximo. 
Además esta ubicado en el mejor rincón de Rio, en el centro de Copacabana, con todas sus tiendas, restaurantes, transporte y vida urbana, pero en una calle tranquila y silenciosa. Un lujo.
Comentamos varias veces durante nuestro viaje la suerte de haber encontrado este lugar para quedarnos. Alan y Catherine fueron siempre muy atentos y accesibles por mail, excelentes anfitriones a distancia. Recomendamos 100% este studio!!!!!

I had such a lovely experience here. Alan and Catherine were extremely helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Everything was IMMACULATE and looked exactly like it does in the photos. Although the space is small, the furniture and set-up made it very comfortable for two people. Such great use of the space. Loved the location...short walk to the beach. Neighborhood was friendly and felt very safe. Alan and Catherine provided suggestions for places to visit and also stocked some key items in the fridge. Amazing!  If I return to Rio I would love to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.

We stayed at Alan and Catherine's studio in November for 6 nights and had wondeful time.  From the point of booking, Alan and Catherine made sure that we were prepared for our stay in Rio.  They shared their thoughts and recommendations with us, this helped us enormously.  The studio is exactly as described, and the location is great. We are more than happy to recommend this studio to our friends and family and we will definitely stay again when we return to Rio.

tuvimos una excelente estadia. Alan y catherine han sido muyamables, nos han dejado el departamento super equipado con todo lo necesariopara disfrutar unos hermosos dias en rio. !muy cerca de laplayay del centro. excelente ubicacion

muchas gracias por todo!

Alan and Catherine entrusted me with their apartment for a whole month and I would not be too surprised if I were to learn that they had nightmares about this. I am a newcomer to this fantastic forum and had no recommendations or much detail in my profile while the apartment that Alan and Catherine entrusted me with truly is their home in Rio. It is a lovely designed little gem in Copa. It is amazing to see how much thought this couple spent in developing this small apartment into a little home where everything just fits perfectly. 

The apartment is light during day and the sofa transforms into a most comfortable bed at night. When I read the description of the apartment I initially had my doubts about the sleeper coach but chose this apartment as all other things just sounded perfect. Well, it turned out that the sleeper couch is as perfect as the apartment proved to be. The most comfortable sleeper I have ever experienced!

The apartment was recently totally renovated and is kept in such good shape that it still feels new. One of the apartment's big asset (apart from its beautiful furniture and interior) is the large shower! And of course the aircon for the hot Rio summer nights!

The apartment is nearby a vast range of fair, good and excellent restaurants and various supermarkets and shops.

The special treat is the welcome pack which allows you some time to study the wonderful recommendations and tips Allan and Catherine provide you with in a little info brochure to assist you in finding your own way in the surrounding area. Alan also offed a Kyle chat to assist me finding my way, but I found the info provided so detailed that this was not necessary.

As with most apartments in Rio, security is tops with a watchfull 24/7 door guard, who by the way is always keen to help where he can.

The Wifi is pleasantly fast and reliable! 

I can only recommend Alan's and Catherine's home in Rio. It is stable for short term, for long term, for business or for just visiting Copa (which, if i may stray off the point :) ) should be on everyones list of things to do while you still can!!!!!)

Thank Alan, thanks Catherine! Your apartment and I will meet gain :) !

A fantastically located, very neat and carefully designed studio!  

The location is excellent, very safe with extremely friendly door-men, lots of good eating and drinking places within easy reach of Copacabana beach (and nice walk to Ipanema beach) as well as the underground to get into central Rio.

The studio is very well designed, and makes excellent use of a small space with everything you could need; a comfortable bed, desk, a kitchenette including full fridge, good bathroom, good internet access and a wide range of TV channels including 3 in English.

Catherine and Alan are excellent hosts, have provided lots of useful information about their local area and its haunts, and have been prompt in all their dealings through Airbnb.

I cannot recommend this place strongly enough! Thanks Catherine and Alan.

The studio is fantastic and I had a great stay! Highly recommend to anyone going to Rio! Great location, in a quiet street and yet close to everything you need in Copacabana! The hosts Alan and Catherine are great and the communication was always clear and the are very attentive people! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine! Looking forward to staying with you again! 
**
O studio é fantástico , super bem localizado, numa rua tranquila, mas ao mesmo tempo perto de tudo em Copacabana. Recomendo a todos que vão ao Rio! O Alan e a Catherine são ótimos, a comunicação  super clara e eles muito atenciosos. Obrigada Alan e Catherine e espero me hospedar com vocês novamente!

Samba,Sun and  Rio Carnival!

Alan and Catherine were absolutely exceptional hosts who went above and beyond their responsibilities as hosts and we could not recommend them more highly. They were extremely fast in responding to our quires and we had a good few especially as it was over carnival (They even responded to out quires during our week in the apartment and helped us with a problem we were having booking flights to Iguazu falls). The studio is ideally situated in a very safe area (although we found nearly everywhere in Rio to be very safe) that is perfect for exploring Copacabana and the surrounding areas. The city itself can be somewhat overwhelming at first but Alan and Catherine’s starter and information packs gave us the confidence to venture all over they city without hesitation. Carnival is an amazing time to go and it is good to have somewhere private to go back to after a long day or night at a bloc party (which you will run into everywhere). As a first time couple using this site we could not have been more happy with the outcome and it really made our trip to Rio carnival one we will never forget. So all that’s left to say is go and in stay in Alan and Catherine’s beautiful apartment, don’t believe the negative things you hear about Rio and bring a wig or a hat for carnival as you wont see a local without one :)

Our experience with Alan and Catherine's apartment in Rio was a dream experience.  Our first time in Rio, we were faced with a 1:00 AM arrival at GIG.   Already wary of what I had read about airport taxi, I wondered how we were going to deal with this one.  No problem, everything was promptly arranged with their trusted driver who was at the airport promptly with our name and a reaonsable cost. 

The apartment is on a beautiful quaint street in the heart of Copacabana.  Building security is fantastic with trusted 24 hr porters,  restricted access to the floors.  We felt much safer than in a hotel -- but Rio  not to be construed as an unsafe city.  We felt fine everywhere we went.  The metro is clean and efficient.  

Everything in the apartment is well organized and works.  The high speed internet permitted flawless (Hidden by Airbnb) calls at all hours - a great stress reliever when you're on business.

Alan and Catherine responded immediately to al communications, offered tons of helpful information about the area, checked in frequently to see if anything needed.  Its just goes on and on.  In short, they "get it".   Its not about the apartment, rather the total experience. 

Put this on your A list and consider yourself lucky if it books..

Tom and Cecilia Kessler
Guadalajara, Mexico

We had a wonderful time in Rio! The studio is great! It is very well designed. Everything works perfectly well and Internet is faster than what we have in Switzerland! The location is great too! About 5 minutes walk to the beach of Copacabana, and located in a safe neighborhood. The bus station to go to the Sugar Loaf is about 10 minutes walk and the subway and the supermarket are only 3 minutes walking distance. Ipanema is only a 30 minute walk or you can take the subway (2 stations). Catherine and Alan were very helpful in helping us organize our trip. They were very patient with all our questions and fast in responding emails. They also helped us book our transportation to the apartment and all went very smoothly. We also loved the handbook loaded with all sorts of recommendations. We tried out a few restaurants and were not disappointed. We also went to Churrascaria Carretao (10 minutes walk) as my husband loves grilled meat (very touristy, get there early to avoid the tourist buses!). The hotel Othon has a restaurant on the top floor with a beautiful view of the beach of Copacabana. The food is rather pricey but the view is definitely worth it! The restaurant Colombo in the Fort of Copacabana is supposed to be good too, unfortunately we ran out of time! There are some very nice markets on Sundays. When heading to the hippie market in Ipanema stop at this very small market off Avenida Atlantica just before the Fort of Capacabana! They sell great pastels and the best caldos de cane! There is also an information center on Copacabana only a few minutes  towards Leme... And all this in short walking distance from the studio! 
We highly recommend this place!

Estuvimos en el estudio de Alan & Catherine por 5 días y todo fue perefecto. El estudio es precioso, en un ubicacion muy comoda, cerca de la playa, el metro y muchos buses para diferentes puntos de la ciudad.
Ellos fueron muy amables con nosotros, enviandonos recomendaciones de actividades cerca del estudio y en todo rio!
Fue nuestra primera experiencia con airbn y realmente nos fue muy bien!
De volver a Rio no dudaríamos en volver aqui!!! :)
...............

Were in the studio of Alan & Catherine for 5 days and everything was perefect. The studio is beautiful, in a very comfortable location near the beach, the metro and many buses to different parts of the city.
They were very kind to us, sending us recommendations of the study activities near and around the river!
It was our first experience with airbn and really was great!
Ww hope go back here! :)

I stayed in the studio for 4 days with a friend and it was perfect! It was recommended to me by my cousin Mercedes who had stayed there previously. She talked wonders about the hosts and the place and fortunately it was all true and more! Before going, Catherine made sure that we had everything we needed. All our communications were really helpful and clear. Such attention to detail and genuine concern to make our stay smooth is hard to come by! The recommendations she sent us with places to go to were amazing, especially the restaurants! The studio itself is well located, near the beach, the metro and in a safe area. Everything inside is new and works perfectly. Internet connection is wonderful! Porters are nice and inclined to help. All in all, a perfect stay in Rio!!

We stayed for just under a week at Catherine and Alan's place in Copacabana.  Catherine was very easy to communicate with, and was incredibly helpful with tourist and non-tourist things to do in Rio.  I couldn't believe that they provided us with tea, coffee, fruit and cereal for our stay -- I haven't had better hospitality in some 5 star hotels.  Other reviewers have mentioned that the place is "cosy" (which I confirm), but for us it was fine.  On top of everything, Catherine and Alan have tastefully decorated the apartment and have quality appointments.  I would definitely love to stay here again, and would highly recommend it to others.

My cousin and I staying at Alan&Catherine's studio for a week in September. The experience was great from when we initially started our search through the checkout.  The hosts are very responsive to questions and advice - before booking, during the stay, and even after we left. Also, everyone else is also very helpful - doorman, hostess to check in, etc. The apartment is exactly as it looks in pictures - the space is very well utilized and very clean.  Alan/Catherine provide the basics to start off the stay (groceries, toiletries, etc). It is a great, central location - nice spot to come home to after a long day at the beach or checking out the city.

We felt safe and comfortable and are very happy with our choice. We'd recommend it to anyone looking for a spot in Copacabana.

The apartment is beautiful, well located, clean and secure. It is decorated with lots of colorful handmade Brazilian things. The location is great, especially for the price, close to a metro station and bus stops, and 3 blocks from Copacabana beach.  The area is pretty safe, and the apartment has 24 hour security. It has a big window to the street and looking out to the right you can see the Cristo Redentor. We were welcomed with a plate full of fruits and many things in the fridge. Catherine always answered our emails and Lelita, the person in charge, and the security brothers were very nice and helpful. The apartment had everything we needed. Close by a nice shopping gallery and 3 blocks away a well stocked supermarket. We appreciated all the written information that Catherine and Alan left to guide us in our visit, specially the one about restaurants. I guess the best recommendation would be the one given by a colleague, that we are very pleased to share. As the owners of similar vacation resort offerings in Chile, this was our first experience with Airbnb and we were so pleased with the experience that we anticipate incorporating our own vacation resort offerings to make same available thru the same service of Airbnb.

Alan and Catherine's studio is so lovely that you feel home the minute you  get in. Every detail is meticulously thought of, and Catherine will stay in close touch during your stay to make sure everything goes smoothly. They will also provide you with a "welcome basket", what make things easier when you're just arriving. The studio is very well located, close to the beach, metro and amenities, making it a good spot for vacations or work, as it was my case.

This was my Best Friend and I first time in Brazil, and we had such a wonderful time because of the amazing apartment we were staying in! Right from the get go, both Alan and Catherine were super helpful, in regular contact about the Apartment and Rio and really did go above and beyond as a host. The studio size was perfect for us, as we mainly used it to sleep and eat breakfast. The location is fabulous and all the staff were incredibly helpful. We couldn't fault anything! I would absolutely recommend the apartment to anyone travelling to Rio, and we hope to be back sooner rather than later :-)

My husband and I came to Rio de Janeiro for the first time together and we couldn't have had a much better time! We have never had any other experience quite like staying at Alan and Catherine's apartment. Their apartment is clean, modern, creative and how they use their space is honestly amazing. 

We felt like Alan and Catherine had thought of everything to make your stay successful. They had umbrellas in case it rained, two notebooks that gave to great insights and information that can help you with anything, one ring stove if you are a cooker like myself and hairdryer if you forgot yours. They were also available for any additional questions or concerns. Like things couldn't get any better they left us a welcome basket full of fruit, cereal, and drinks. 

Overall, I would stay again in Alan and Catherine's apartment in a heartbeat! It was the best experience I had in my entire life. They are great people and it's an amazing apartment. Loved, loved, loved it!

I stayed at Alan & Catherine's place in late November 2012.  It was my first time to Rio and to South America although it was not my first time renting an apartment on vacation rather than a hotel room.  So, I have experiences to compare this one to.  Alan & Catherine are first class individuals.  I have never had an experience with such personal attention and with genuine concern for my stay and for the overall success of my trip.  The hosts are exceptional and I imagine I won't have such good fortune again because they truly go above and beyond what you as a guest would expect of them as hosts.  They are in contact regularly and respond readily (even though they are several time zones away!)  Although I did not have the opportunity to meet them in person, you would think that you did, by the level of comfort you will have with them.  I have stayed in apartments around the world and never had such attentive hosts.
Their place is in a perfect location...a short walking distance to the beach, near restaurants, shops and the metro.  You couldn't ask for a better location in Copa.  Please know it is a very safe area.  I never felt unsafe at any time.  Their apartment is delightful...cheery and modern and clean.  What more could you ask for?  I will return to Rio and will check to see if their apartment is available.  I highly recommend the space for one or two people.  (I am a single male from Chicago.)  They have a wonderful local lady who meets you upon arrival and cares for the apartment and they also have a driver who is friendly and courteous and helpful.  He met me at the airport and also for the return trip to the airport.  My trip was a great success and staying at a place that made me happy was a large part of my happiness with this trip!  Kudos Alan & Catherine!  You are a joy to work with!  Five Stars!

we had a wonderful time in Rio. The apartment is in a very central and safe location. While small, it is designed in a smart way, so you will find everything you need. 
Alan is very responsive and helpful. He basically responds instantly and tries to make the stay as pleasant as possible. Also the recommendations he gave were very helpful. 

Overall a great experience! 
Daniel

Everything with this rental went smoothly from start to finish! Alan & Catherine were quick to respond to our queries, and were very helpful in ensuring our arrival went smoothly (they helped arrange our airport pick up with driver Marcio-- reliable, friendly man!) and had someone waiting to give us the key & a tour of the flat. The location is PERFECT- so close to the beach and the fact you can view Christ the Redeemer out the window is a bonus! The flat is equipped with everything you would need, and nicely finished as well! The flat has 24/7 security which made us feel safe, especially since our stay in Rio was during Carnival, and they were friendly/helpful staff too as they helped with our luggage. Overall is was a flawless experience-- and if we are ever in Rio we hope that the owners are not so we can rent this perfect little flat again!!!

Alan and Catherine were excellent hosts with superb and exact communication throughout the whole process. We were greeted with a bottle of sparkling wine, local beer, fruits and some groceries. Our hosts made sure that we had everything we needed and every detail was covered and explained. They were very accommodating in our late check in (due to delayed flight) as well as late check out. They provided many recommendations which we found valuable indeed. Do take a note of places in Rio that Alan suggests. We very much liked our excursion to Santa Teresa as well as very bohemian confectionary/cafe in the Centro. 

The apartment is in great location, right in the heart of Copacabana. It is located on a very cute tree lined street within 5 min walk to the world's most famous beach. Also, the metro station was just around the corner which we found very helpful since we used metro a lot to explore the city. 

The apartment itself is very clean, bright and pleasant. Alan and Catherine did a great job decorating the place and making sure it has everything for the comfortable living. The space was functional with all modern amenities and comfortable bed. Also, the wifi connection was great and it helped us a lot during our stay in Rio. 
Thank you Alan and Catherine for making our stay wonderful and memorable. We would definitely stay at your place again and recommend it to our friends!

Alan & Catherine were so helpful, we originally had our accomodation cancelled one day before by someone else on airbnb and Alan & Catherine moved heaven and earth to get their apartment ready with very little notice so we wouldn't be homeless! the apartment was great, and was stocked with everything you could possibly need - it felt more like a hotel than an apartment. We enjoyed our stay immensely, whether we were chilling out in air conditioned comfort or taking the short walk to the beach the apartment was ideal for any stay in Copacabana.

We absolutely LOVED Alan and Catherine's appartment.
First and foremost, Alan was so helpful before our trip that I knew I was getting a safe place before I even got there.
I have to admit I was a little nervous coming to Rio with all the crime you hear about, but Alan's appartment is in a very safe neighboorhood. Alan called a trusted driver to pick us up at the airport and get us back to the aiport for our flight. And when we got to the appartment, we were greated with a warm welcome from Alan's helper 'Hugo' that takes care of his appartment while not in Rio. We spoke with Hugo about 30 mins, we really loved him! 

The appartment is super cute, we went to the Rio art fair just to try to buy all the stuff they have in the appartment to have it at home as well :)

It is also located super close to the beach.

In summary, if we return to Rio, we will definitly take the appartment again, and I will also recommend it to my friends.

Thanks again Alan and Catherine!

Muy buena opcion para quedarse en Rio. La calle es muy tranquila, muy bien ubicada, metro, onibus, playa, y otras areas de la ciudad super accesibles desde el Apartamento.
Detalles muy bien cuidados, con el espacio justo pero muy comodo, y con la mejor vista desde la mañana a la noche del Corcovado.
El feedback con Catherine y Alan es instantaneo, estan para cualquier consulta, sugerencia, y recomendaciones acerca de todo lo que se necesita para visitar Rio.
Super recomendable, les dejo mi mejor review.

Alan and Catherine were the most wonderful and accomodating hosts. The apartment is in a prime location in Rio and it is very functional and cozy inspite of being a bit small. We were greeted by Hugo upon arrival who was also very helpful and kind. Alan and Catherine had arranged everything so that we had breakfast, cold beer and a lovely setting when we arrived so that we could rest and eat before heading out to see the wonderful city of Rio. We were pleased with the location and very impresses with how well everything is explained in their apartment and city guides. If we make it back to Rio soon (since we fell in love with it). We'll be definitely staying at the Studio again. We have nothing to say on the negative side. Our experience was only enhanced by Alan and Catherine's wonderful apartment and kindness.

Alan and Catherine are wonderful hosts and communication through out the entire process was speedily and accurate. The studio is tastefully decorated and has a clever use of space. It's located in a quiet street in the heart of Copacabana, a block from the metro and couple of blocks from the beach. As someone who grew up spending most of my summers in Rio, I found Alan and Catherine's city guide spot on! Follow their advice and spend your time in Rio like a real 'carioca'. In sum, I highly recommend their lovely studio in Copa.

We had a wonderful experience renting the studio of Alan & Catherine, who were extremely responsive, available and very friendly.

Their studio is very well located, cozy, nicely decorated, clean and functionally planned.

For our first AirBnB experience, it was a success! Thank you again!

Alan and Catherine (and their flat of course) made our trip to Rio unforgettable. I traveled to Rio with a friend for the New Years/Reveillon celebration, and we were looking for a clean and comfortable place to call home base - this flat was just that. The small space is organized incredibly well, and we had everything we needed for our 6 day stay. The food and toiletries provided truly made this a 5-star experience.

Additionally, Alan and Catherine always responded promptly to my questions and made the check-in/check-out progress simple. Apart from the apartment itself, the recommendations they provided, both in their Guide to Rio and to my individual requests, were invaluable. While I wish we'd had more time in Rio, we were able to plan our short trip very well, and see & do a ton with the help of Alan and Catherine.

If I am able to make it back to Rio at all in the future, I will absolutely hope to stay here again.

Obrigada Alan & Catherine!

The house was exactly as expected. Super clean, very well located (near the metro and the beach), had everything we needed. Our stay in Rio was perfect. Hugo was super nice and helped us with tickets for Carnival and with tips in the city. Meeting Alan and Catherine in person was also amazing - they are both super nice and made us feel like we were home. We are looking forward to stay there again this next weekend!

This was the second time we stayed at Alan & Catherine's studio in Rio. As the first time, the apartment was absolutely clean and organized. We checked in and out as planned. My boyfriend and I made a commitment to ourselves to go back there again as soon as we can. It was remarkable.

The stay at Alan and Catherine's Copa studio was amazing! Great location, you can walk to the metro and to the beach with ease. My wife and I stayed  8 days for our anniversary and it was the perfect cozy 5 star place we could unwind after a day at the beach. The decoration organization and comfort of the studio will make you feel very welcomed to the Carioca lifestyle. Hugo was a great help, he showed us around answered any questions and told us not to hesitate to call him for anything. We had a wonderful welcome with some snacks and drinks as well as some flowers and champagne. We will be visiting again soon!

I went to rio because of the world cup. I have to say that i could not have found a better place to stay. Well located, near a metro station, really close to the Copacabana beach and close to a bike rio station.

Hugo welcomed us, he showed us the place and introduced us to the building staff. He then continued showing us the apartment. Well organized, clean and had everything we needed for our short stay.

We where really surprised when he showed us a refrigerator full of stuff free of charge for us. Fruits, cheese, ham, bread and cereal. It even had beers.

It was an amazing gift from Alan and his wife.

We had a great time, we would totally book again here, and we even would like to book in their other apartment and meet them personally. It seems they are really great people to be around.

The flat is fantastic! We couldn't wish better place to live in Rio. I fell in love with its bright style. Many thanks to Alan and Catherine for their warm welcome, food in fridge (we arrived late at night and were starving) and their helpful tips about where to eat and what to see (oh, I love Real Chopp!). Thanks to Hugo for his friendly smile and being very helpful)) Our staying in Rio was just unforgettable!

My friend Carol and I stayed at Alan and Catherine's lovely studio flat in Copacabana for 8 nights at the end of the 2014 World Cup. The arrangement worked out perfectly - from the first moment of contact the hosts were so helpful; knowing that the two of us coming were friends they adapted the studio to our needs, putting in a spare single bed and adjusting the space accordingly so that we would be comfortable. We were given so much help and advice on everything ranging from places to eat in Rio, which banks to use, best ways of travelling around, recommended ways of getting to Sao Paolo where we went to watch a semi-final match overnight, etc. 
  Once there we really enjoyed our stay - it is a studio flat but the space has been put to such good use that we never felt cramped or on top of each other. The welcome pack when we arrived was just that - very welcoming! We loved Copacabana itself; it felt very safe, and there are so many places to go to all within a short distance; the biggest problem we had was being selective! Alan and Catherine's guide is extremely helpful and the fact that there was wifi at the flat almost meant that we could book online for trips like the visit to el Cristo Corcovado (which saved us a long queue and several hours of waiting.)  We also appreciated the fact that Alan kept in touch whilst we were there to ask if we needed help with anything, etc. 
  So all in all it was a very positive experience and I would highly recommend the apartment, whether you are travelling on your own, as part of a couple or with a friend, as it can be adapted to suit your needs! Thank you very much Alan and Catherine - I for one hope to return!

Me and my friend had a wonderful stay at Alan & Catherine's apartment. The studio's interior is beautiful and although it's small, it's very practical. You have all the facilities you need. 
The communication with Alan was very good, he was very flexible and helpful. We were welcomed by Hugo and he showed us everything we needed to know. It was very nice to see that the refridgerator was filled with groceries, it made us feel very welcome. 
Thank you Alan and Catherine, and  Hugo! :)

Yo no viaje personalmente, ya que reservé para mis padres. El departamento era tal cual como se veía en las fotos, ubicado en un barrio tranquilo (como Providencia para los que viven en Chile). 

Mis padres fueron recibidos por Hugo, un jóven muy entusiasta y simpático, muy atento y preocupado. 

Sin duda cuando tenga que viajar yo a Rio me quedaré en este lugar. 
El trato a mis padres fue de lo mejor, realmente me sentí muy seguro ya que ellos estaban felices y tranquilos.

Gracias ALAN!

I spent only two days in Allan & Catherine's studio and would love to have been more, it was perfect. The place is small, but completely welcoming and all the ornaments have good vibes. I recommend with eyes closed, They are the best hosts I've ever had.

The studio is very very cosy and confortable. I found evrything I needed in the studio. I spent 13 nice nights in the studio. Alan and Catherine left me the refrigerator full with good and lots of brazilian fruits which was quite helpful and nice from them. Besides an extra cleaning of the appartement was done in the middle of my stay! There is a very handy and full of nice addresses guide written by Alan and Catherine. I am from Rio and I found in there new addresses of very nice places to go. I'll be back to Rio and I will definitely stay in their studio again.

Truly Beautiful Copa Studio! Extremely clean and well organized to every detail! Alan and Catherine were very communicative and although we didn't get to meet them in person we felt very welcomed by them! 
Hugo who was waiting for us and showed us around the apartment was extremely polite, helpful and nice person! 
Thank you so much!
Marlena & Neil

The experience at Alan and  Catherine studio was simply great!! Everything happend just as we have spoke before. The studio is really pretty, clean and well located, near the metro station, magazines, banks, restaurants. Hugo, the guy who receive me, was really nice and attentive. When I arrived there were some bread, milk, fruits, and other things to eat and this is really kind. You will feel at home at this studio.

Great location for making the most of a few nights in Rio. Walk to the best beaches, metro to historic centre, wide selection of bars and restaurants close by. Compact but perfectly formed studio with 24 hr security and all information you need from Alan and Catherine to make the most of your stay. Recommended for a funky city break.

Great hosts, by far our best Airbnb experience, and we haven't had any bad experiences! Their host Hugo was a great guy who explained everything about the Studio to us and they had breakfast and fruits waiting for us! All the information about the neighborhood and best places to go was available in a booklet and very accurate. Beautiful location and very good service. Definitely recommend! 
Thanks Alan & Catherine!

Super studio décoré avec attention, tout a été bien pensé. Le studio est idéalement placé à Rio, proche de Copacabana et du métro ce qui est super pour se déplacer.
Alan a toujours été très disponible pour faciliter notre arrivée et a rédigé un superbe guide touristique de Rio bien fourni et astucieux.
Quelques guides traînent dans l'appartement avec des notes de ci de là, des commentaires d'hôtes précédents.
Ce studio mérite vraiment ses 5 étoiles, je le recommande très vivement et séjournerait volontiers à nouveau chez Alan & Catherine si l'occasion se représentait.

Alan and Catherine's flat is wonderful. The instructions, recommendations and attention to detail really made our stay perfect. The fruit and food left in the fridge were a lovely touch.  We managed to fit a huge amount into our very brief stay largely because of the assistance from Alan and his team of contacts. Highly recommended.

We had a wonderful time staying in Alan & Catherine's Copacabana studio. They were very helpful in the lead-up to the trip helping to coordinate our New Years plans and providing useful advice for our stay in Rio. The studio is wonderful and has a perfect location in a safe area - very central to the beach, restaurants and nightlife. I'd highly recommend a stay at Alan & Catherine's studio.

The place is incredibly cute and organised. It is a complete apartment with all amenities you need for a confortable and stress free vacation as it had everything. From food to toiletries and essentials. 
Very close to shops, banks and beach.
Our stay at Alan's and Catherine's place will be unforgettable. 
Thank you!!

Alan & Catherine no se encontraban en Río, pero dejaron encargado a Hugo para que nos recibiera, un chico muy amable y atento en todo momento, nos dió todas las indicaciones que necesitábamos y nos ayudó a conseguir ticket para el carnaval, un 10 para Hugo :)
Cuando llegamos al studio todo estaba en perfectas condiciones, Alan &Catherine dejaron frutas y comida para nuestra estadía. 
Sin duda recomiendo el lugar, queda cerca de la playa, del metro y de toda locomoción colectiva. 
Muchas Gracias por todo!

We loved our stay in Alan and Catherine's studio. The location was perfect just 5 minutes walk to the metro and to Copacabanna beach. There was fresh fruit, bread, cheese, cereal etc in the studio upon our arrival - this was a lovely touch and was much appreciated.

The studio, while considered to be a small space, is incredibly functional and we enjoyed spending time there, actually choosing to stay in on a couple of nights. Digital tv and wifi were both excellent. Sofabed was very comfortable and easy to set-up. Air-con and fan both excellent. Bathroom is quite big - great shower and quality shampoo. And a brilliant hairdryer which was a treat having had none for 9 weeks while travelling South America!

Alan and Catherine's studio user guide and Rio recommendations guide were excellent. We went to a couple of their restaurant recommendations and weren't disappointed.

Alan and Catherine organised for a friend to greet us on arrival which was totally unexpected. 

Overall we would highly recommend any couple to stay here - very good value for location and spec of studio.
Alan and Catherine were amazing hosts! The apartment was so clean, safe and central to everything in Copacabana.  My husband and I enjoyed our stay very much and highly recommend this apartment! :)

Love the apartment! Super cozy and cute, very clean and conveniently located in Copacabana. Alan and Catherine are also the perfect hosts - with such unexpected and welcoming touches to the room like the fresh flowers and snacks. Very accommodating to our check in and check out schedules too! And we ended up using their self written guide to Rio much more than the own guidebooks we had! :)

Fantastic hosts!  Very organized and reliable.  They provided a great guide to Rio and even had a map with places of interest near the apartment.  Apartment is well located close to Copacabana beach and metro.  Check in process was smooth and easy.  Highly recommend

The apartment was very good couldn"t complain, very neat, tidy and organised. The hostest were good, supplying alot of information on what to do in rio, such as the best resturants to go to, food markets to go to and nightlife etc, would definetly recommend staying at, you wont be disappointed

A lovely small studio with metro and bus stops really close by making it very easy to see all the key sites. The building is clean and safe. Good air con and modern interior furnishings. Hugo the welcomer is also really kind and very helpful if you need him during your stay. We would stay again!

We had an wonderful experience during our stay in Rio. The studio is clean and well organized and almost everything you may need is already provided. The location is wonderful: a few blocks from the beach and from the subway. There are a lot of interesting places to eat or to shop nearby, and Alan and Catherine did a great job providing a booklet with a lot of excellent tips. Although the studio is located in a very urban area, street noise was not an issue. I’ll certainly choose it for my next stay in Rio.

Alan and Catherine were extremely welcoming and helpful with our stay in Rio. Their guide was great and we ate at many of their recommendations. 

Hugo came to meet us and was very welcoming and helpful. 

The apartment has everything you need for a short stay in Rio and had all the essentials. 

The locations was prefect for Copacabana. 

Alan and Catherine really added the cherry on the top of a great holiday and would highly recommended.

Upon arrival, I was greeted on time by Hugo who was lovely. Inside the unit, I found a fully stocked fridge (meat, cheese, yogurt, juice, beer), fresh fruit on the table, as well as unopened bread and cookies on the counter...all for me! A nice extra touch for sure. Everything you could possibly need was supplied. 

In addition, a great location, helpful tips about the unit and surrounding area, as well as 24 hour building security that made me feel safe when returning later at night equals 5 stars for this one!

Alan made us feel welcomed the second we booked the dates. He was always helping with questions and supplies a great network in Rio. It's a perfect space for two, especially when you know you will likely be out exploring most of the time. It's very comfortable and has a home feeling touch to the decorations. The place was loaded with food, emergency amenities, and books with maps and info. Alan is constantly within reach and made us feel very comfortable and safe. They are the ideal Airbnb hosts and have set the bar VERY high.

Alan & Catherine's studio is just as shown in the pictures. It is a small, cozy, beautifully decorated space, in a great area of Copacabana. It is perfect for a couple, with a comfy bed, and surprisingly big shower. It is very close to Copacabana beach, and even  within walking distance to Ipanema, and the lake. There are lots of restaurants and shopping around.

From the moment I booked the place, Alan and Catherine communicated with me quickly, clearly and in a very friendly manner. I felt welcomed right away, and that left me no doubt that I had found the right place.

This proved true as soon as I arrived, as we were able to catch an earlier flight, at the last minute, from São Paulo to Rio. I emailed Alan from the airport letting him know of the situation, and he was able to make all the arrangements for us to go directly to the apartment upon arrival in Rio - 3 hours before our original arrival time!!!

Alan had recommended for me to contact Marcio for transportation from the airport to the apartment. Marcio was friendly and also very flexible, and was able to pick us at the airport at the earlier arrival time.

When we got to the apartment, Hugo was already waiting for us. He helped us with our luggage, and took us up to the place. The studio was immaculately clean, and ready for us to use. Moreover, Alan had arranged for us to have fresh fruit, bread, ham, cheese, cookies, etc!!

That was a totally unexpected, wonderful surprise!!! With all the attentions from Marcio, and Hugo, plus the fruits and snacks Alan had arranged, we definitely felt like we had come to the right place!!!!

I highly recommend Alan's and Catherine's studio, and would absolutely stay there again. What's more, I would love to meet them someday, as they seem like wonderful people, the type I would like to have as friends.

Antonio

We totally loved the apartment, it's cozy and functional, it has everything you need, the location is great, and the decor is lovely. The neighborhood is quiet. We felt at home. The bed is comfortable and the shower is the perfect way to end a very active day. Hugo was waiting for us and was very nice to us, he came at the agreed time and he helped us get a taxi to the airport. Thank you for the milk, the cereal, the fruits, the cheese, etc. Everything was perfect and delicious! Thank you very much! 
If we ever return to Río - and we really hope to have the opportunity - we will definitely contact you again.

Alan and Catherine's place was a great little hideaway, away from the hustle and bustle of busy Copacabana. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed, including snacks and breakfast foods upon our arrival. The cupboard was also stocked with any amenities you could possibly need. Hugo, the welcomer, was fantastic and really helpful. He helped us get last minute tickets to Carnival. Overall a great experience, and an apartment we'd recommend for others traveling to Rio.
Volvimos a Río y obviamente teníamos que volver a hospedarnos con Alan & Catherine! Gracias de nuevo! Excelente lugar!

Fue la primera vez que mi mujer y yo fuimos a Rio y a su vez fue la primera vez que alquilamos un hogar por medio de Airbnb. Con todos los medios que lo desconocido conlleva tuvimos la enorme suerte de encontrarnos con Alan & Catherine, quienes no solo nos brindaron un espacio para hospedarnos sino que además nos aconsejaron sobre el lugar, y nos guiaron en cada paso para que saliera de la mejor manera.
Al llegar ellos no estaban en Brasil, pero dejaron a Hugo, una persona increíble que supo aconsejarnos, darnos recomendaciones y dejó que lo molestemos con todo tipo de consultas.
El Lugar es un ambiente pequeño, pero SUMAMENTE funcional, para hacer un comodo living comedor de día y un acogedor dormitorio de noche. El baño, tiene una de las mejores duchas con las que me bañe.
La locación es excelente. En una parte segura de Copacabana apenas a unas cuadras de la playa entre Avenidas llenas de locales para todas las necesidades (restaurantes, supermercados, bares y más).
Mas allá de todo, creo que lo esencial está en los detalles. No falta nada, se encuentra provista de todas las necesidades y además está llena de atenciones como frutas frescas y sabrosas listas para comer sin cargo alguno.
Definitivamente es un lugar al que volvería! De hecho lo hice!
Si tengo que pensar en un lugar para quedarme en Río sería en el estudio de Alan & Catherine sin dudar.

Muchas gracias!

Apartamento muito estiloso, charmoso, tudo muito limpo, organizado e muito bem localizado. O casal ainda fez algumas gentilezas, como deixar frutas e bebidas na geladeira. Muito satisfeito com a estada. Vale super a pena. Do lado da praia de Copacabana e fácil acesso a qualquer ponto do Rio de Janeiro. Excelente viagem.

Alan and Catherine are incredible hosts- they think of everything. The apartment is the perfect spot to spend time in Rio- close to the beach, good places to eat and public transportation. Would definitely stay here next time I’m in Rio.
El studio tiene todo lo necesario para hospedarse en unas vacaciones. Es pequeño pero en mí caso, me sentí muy cómodo como en mí hogar
Great studio apartment spotlessly clean in a superb local tion with five star service.

Excellent flat very close to the beach in the best part of Copacabana.  It has everything you need in it and more!  Strong wifi, air conditioning, very comfortable bed and in a residential building with 24hr doormen.  Restaurants of all kinds, cafes and shops are on your doorstep.  Alan and Catherine give very good help and support and send a guide with personal recommendations for Rio.  We loved our stay here!

This studio is a great place to stay!    Very clean, modern and well-designed with a great welcome!   Alan and Catherine have thought of everything to support their guests and their guide to the local area is very useful - I used their recommendations a lot!   And it's only 5 minutes walk to the best part of Copacabana beach!   I will definitely return, and highly recommend it to other visitors to Rio - it would be great for Carnival!
ap pequeno aconchegante perto de tudo ambiente limpo anfitrião eficiente para fazer a reserva recomendo!

name: Ocean View in the heart of Waikiki
summary: Nice and cute 1 bedroom unit located just two blocks away from the famous Waikiki Beach.  With spectacular panoramic ocean views.  A Large balcony will provide relaxing times for you, and your loved ones to enjoy the beautiful ocean breezes that Hawaii has to offer.
space: 1 bedroom unit in Pacific Monarch Hotel/Condominium complex with a beautiful panoramic ocean view right in the center of Waikiki. -2 blocks away from the famous Waikiki beach.  -Full kitchen -Linens and towels -King size bed -Sofa bed -Large balcony to spend quality time
description: Nice and cute 1 bedroom unit located just two blocks away from the famous Waikiki Beach.  With spectacular panoramic ocean views.  A Large balcony will provide relaxing times for you, and your loved ones to enjoy the beautiful ocean breezes that Hawaii has to offer. 1 bedroom unit in Pacific Monarch Hotel/Condominium complex with a beautiful panoramic ocean view right in the center of Waikiki. -2 blocks away from the famous Waikiki beach.  -Full kitchen -Linens and towels -King size bed -Sofa bed -Large balcony to spend quality time Community areas: -Community laundry -Swimming pool -Sauna -Recreational room -Parking $25/day Just two blocks away from the famous Waikiki Beach. Gift shops, restaurants, beach access, everything is in walking distance. This place will be your best choice if you want to enjoy the lifestyle of Waikiki resorts and night life. Taxis, shuttle buses, and trolleys Price already included Transit Accommodation Tax (13.95%) Laundry is located on the 3rd floor Swimmi
neighborhood_overview: Just two blocks away from the famous Waikiki Beach. Gift shops, restaurants, beach access, everything is in walking distance. This place will be your best choice if you want to enjoy the lifestyle of Waikiki resorts and night life.
notes: Price already included Transit Accommodation Tax (13.95%) Laundry is located on the 3rd floor Swimming pool is located on the roof floor Paid parking is in the same building, $25 per day
transit: Taxis, shuttle buses, and trolleys
access: Community areas: -Community laundry -Swimming pool -Sauna -Recreational room -Parking $25/day
house_rules: Please take off shoes and any foot wear at the entrance. Do not bring any sands in the unit or else it will damage the carpet. Please keep the noise and volume after 9pm.

host.host_about: Aloha my name is Hide. I work mostly with vacation rentals for a company based out of Japan, but now I am venturing off to manage a few condos.  Airbnb, the first step and hopefully my last, an amazing place with a community full of wonderful people and adventurist travelers. Hope to meet many of you soon!

reviews.comments:
Hide was a great host.  The apartment was nice and cozy with amazing views of Waikiki.  I surf so it was really easy to just look out the window to see how the waves were breaking and then decide to go surf or not.

The apartment was also in a great location right in the heart of the action of Waikiki.
Thank you to Hide for making our stay a memorable one. Location was perfect and the service was excellent. He even went out of his way to accommodate early check in for us :)

Hide is a nice man.Zhe cando view is wanderful,and very near the beach.Room is so clean and space is big than most (Website hidden by Airbnb) family hope to come back to stay this cando more long time.thanks Hide.
Hide made us feel very welcome and all the descriptions of property were spot on.  Lots of little extras supplied as well including clothes pegs, cling wrap and nuts.

Lovely place to stay. Apartment had pretty much everything you would need. Bedroom could do with an aircon though.
View from inside and balcony was great.
Hide was very kind and accommodating.
Would definitely stay here again!

We had a wonderful stay in this apartment. The location is excellent for the cafes, shops and the beach. The apartment had everything you need and the views are wonderful both day and night. Our host was great and the easy to checkin and out.  We arrived early and we were able to check in early too. Great to access facilities like rooftop pool and spa! Thank you Hide for wonderful stay.

Had a great time during our stay here. The apartment was clean, cozy, and within walking distance to shopping and restaurants. The view is amazing and the beach is steps away. Hide was very accommodating, and everything was very easy. He even allowed early check in. I would definitely do business with the host in the future. This made our first airbnb experience a great one!

The place was nice, a bit smaller than expected (compared to the pics), but the view was amazing. The A/C was strong enough to fill the living room and even to the one bedrooms, so that was a plus. This unit was in a great location as well. The cons I have about this place was that there was an ironing board, but we couldn't locate or find the iron. The shower didn't have a plastic curtain to prevent the shower from going onto the floor. It usually left a giant puddle right next to the toilet. My fiance and I have slipped almost after every shower (twice a day for the week). Also, bring your own toiletries (including toilet paper). That is not included in this space. It may be located inside of a hotel, but its a private unit so the front desk will not help you out if you need anything. We also had to pay $25 a day for parking (there are ins and outs). For our first time using Airbnb, this was a still a great place to stay. I would love to stay here again!

Hide welcomed us in the foyer and escorted us to the room. The room was exactly as described and extremely comfortable for our weeks stay. The located suited us perfectly.  Thank you and we look forward to returning next trip.

Amazing experience! The space is perfect. The bed was comfortable. The balcony on the 21st floor was an incredible place to watch the storms over Waikiki beach during Tropical Storm Darby. Very close to everything. Would definitely come back.
Hide est acomodant et repond vite aux messages. L'emplacement est parfait. L'apartement est un peu petit pour 4 personnes. L'hotel est un peu défraîchie mais l'apartement a été un peu rénové.

Perfect. A lovely room with an amazing view and everything you need for your stay in Hawaii. The air conditioner was great and kept the room very cool.   It's in a great location too, just a short walk from Waikiki beach. 

Hide welcomed us and showed us to the room. He was very responsive to messages as well which was very helpful.

We had a wonderful stay and highly recommend this apartment!

The location is amazing with a lovely view of Waikiki beach. Everything was there including beach umbrella and chairs. We had an early flight in and were able to get an early check in. Perfect size for a couple. Although we never met our host he checked in to make sure we had everything we needed. We would highly recommend this condo.

Our stay in Waikiki was awesome - the location is great and the view fantastic with only a few minutes walk to Waikiki beach. The communication with our host was easy, fast and helpful and Check In efficient. We also always found a spot to park in the parking garage which otherwise would have been a hassle in Waikiki I guess. We would come back!

This was a phenomenal location. Hide was an amazing, informed host. He facilitated the check-in and check-out process. This is prime location without breaking the bank. I would 100 percent recommend this stay to friends and family.s

Apartment view was great with little blocked view of the ocean. Bed was comfortable. The only downside is bathroom is a little tight and the shower tap is rather difficult to use. Otherwise it's awesome stay!

We loved our stay! The location is central, just a couple of blocks away from the beach and the views from the apartment are stunning! The apartment is very nice and clean. Definitely recommend this place!

Perfect spot close to everything and a supermarket. 
Great apartment. 
We had no dramas while staying and hide was great. 5 stars 
Recommend. I would stay here again :)

Thanks Hide
Great place to stay. Close to the beach and the heart of Waikiki. Very clean and had a great view. Loved it!
Clean and cozy place. Amazing balcony views and central location to everything Waikiki.

Beautiful apartment 2 minutes walk from the main strip in Waikiki ! Perfect views of the ocean and mountains, only thing I would recommend is if you are arriving prior to check in with luggage find somewhere to store it as the hotel are unable to watch you're bags as you're a private guest! Other than that we had a wonderful stay! Thank you Hide :)
Host was good and he did send me message before arriving and his instructions were clear.

We stayed at the apartment for 2 nights only. The apartment has a fantastic location only a block back from the center of Waikiki Beach.
The views are fantastic from the 21st floor. I loved the big balcony most on the partment. The check-in was smooth and the apartment as described. This is the third time in Hawaii and I certainly prefer to stay in Hide's place over an hotel room on the Waikiki shore. I would certainly come back if the opportunity arises
Great location - not a fancy hotel but comfortable and nice. The view is great and everything is very clean. Great stay
Very comfortable room, great sea view! Thanks hide to provide accommodation

Great place with a fabulous view of Waikiki Beach. Easy walk to main shopping strip and restaurants. Rooms were tidy and clean, room enough for the 3 of us, and an added bonus was the sun on the balcony for most of the day. Check in was easy and communication with Hide is exceptional. Will certainly stay again.
Communication, location, clean with every-thing as advertised. We had a wonderful time and would recommend Hide to any-one.

This was a great location the unit had amazing views. Close to everything. The unit is small but great for 2 people or 3 but would be a little crowded if more. 
Would stay here again Hide gave us early check in as our flight arrived at 630am in the morning which was great..
GREAT PLACE TO STAY!
We had a wonderful vacation in the heart of Waikiki. We would definitely stay again. The view, condo and pool made our vacation truly special.

The apartment looks bigger in the photos but is perfectly adequate for two people sharing or a couple.  The separate bedroom has a bed that comes apart into two singles. The building is in a very convenient part of Waikiki, right in the heart of all the action and only a two minute walk to Waikiki Beach and the 'Dukes' statue.  This landmark is a pick up point for all the tourist 'trolleys'.  There's a well stocked supermarket a few minutes walk from the hotel.  The apartment is on the 21st floor on a corner of the building so great views of the beach and the city.  It is a bit noisy with the windows open at night as the noise travels up, but there's lots happening in Waikiki so noise is to be expected.  The one air conditioner in the lounge works well but the cool air doesn't really travel into the bedroom.  There is a pedestal fan in the bedroom though.  The living room has two large windows that open wide, so probably not suitable for young inquisitive children for obvious safety reasons.  Really nice rooftop pool and spa with great views.  Also a laundry on the third floor.  All in all a comfortable, convenient apartment right in the heart of Waikiki and good value for money.  I'd definitely stay there again.

Great unit with fantastic views of Waikiki Beach . Location perfect, just a short walk to everything.Host Hide was extremely helpful & very easy to deal with. Highly recommend.  Steve & Linda Australia.

Can't beat the location! As long as there's not a long wait for the elevator, it's a 5 minute walk from the room to the beach. There are many restaurants that you can walk to, as well as plenty of shopping. The view is very nice as well! 
The space was a little tight for 4 adults and luggage, but we were only there 3 nights and rarely in the unit.
Everything seemed to be pretty clean. My one complaint was that the shower curtain in the bathroom was halfway falling off the hooks. Maybe it's just me but I hate having to touch shower curtains. 
Overall this seemed to be a very good value for the location. Hide also responded very quickly to any questions we had. I would stay here again if I took another trip to Waikiki.

Beautiful home. My family and I enjoyed staying here during our visit to Waikiki. Close to everything, personnel was helpful and host is willing to accommodate every question.
Would recommend to family and friends.

Hide's place was just as described and perfect for my boyfriend and I! Beautiful view of the ocean from the balcony and was just a short 2 blocks from the beach and so centrally located. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!
Fantastic view, nice balcony, small but useable kitchen, full sized refrigerator, sofa bed was okay, everything else was fine.
Hide place is in the heart of the downtown area. It's a very nice place and cozy place. My parents and I really enjoyed our stay here.
The room was convinience, great location and view.
Excelente ubicacion, a metros de la playa. Todas las comodidades. Hermosa vista

I love the view from the condo!  The place is smaller than we thought but it was adequate to what we need.   The location is super convenient - only two blocks from Waikiki beach.  Tried to turn on the TV but couldn't but  we didn't spend too much time in the condo anyway.  One thing I would recommend is to have the paper towels in the kitchen.  The check-in and out was very easy.  Too bad the swimming pool was closed for maintenance at the time.  

There was one important thing we wish we knew before this trip was the present of jellyfish on the beaches.  If you check (Hidden by Airbnb) for Oahu's Jellyfish calendar, you will find the dates of their likely presence.  We were on the beach on Father's day and saw a group of men with buckets picking up more than 400 jellyfish within an hour.  That was when we learned about it. This information might help you select your vacation dates to maximize your enjoyment and experience in Hawaii.

Hides place in Waikiki is fabulous !! Super clean, amazing view and the best part... affordable if you're on a budget. This 1br condo was home away from home. I would definitely recommend it to any of my friends and family.

The owner was great to work with us. We're happy that the check out is so easy and it would give us extra two hours. The view was so great and the house is very  private. The beds were comfy, everything was very clean.
Hide's place is ideal, in a perfect location and has an amazing view. Would definitely recommend this place.

The room has great view of the ocean.  As the room is located on a corner, you have the mountain view as well.  The room is fully equipped with what you need.  Thanks to the nice breeze from the ocean, we did not need to turn on the AC.  We did not have a chance to see the host, but he was very flexible and quick to reply to email.  
We'd love to stay this place again.

Hides place has the most amazing view, from the minute you walk in you feel so lucky...
It's in the best position, only a block away from the beach...
There's a lot of eateries very close by and an ABC store a minutes walk away 
We got there early and Hide came and let us put our luggage in the apartment before our check in time whilst it was still being cleaned which was great
Highly recommended
The location is terrific and water views are beautiful!! A clean and comfortable apartment.  A suitable size for two people.
Very nice view! And very comfortable apartment. Thank you Hide for your flexibility.

Hide's apartment is in a very central location close to the beach, shops, restaurants and transport.
It has beautiful ocean views which can be enjoyed from the lounge room and balcony.
Hide's place is great! Very close walking distance to everything and a nice apartment overall. The views are AMAZING, and it is nice to be able to sit outside on the balcony. Highly recommend!

Hide's apartment is in a great location - fantastic ocean views - easy walk to centre of Waikiki beach, shops & restaurants. The apartment is a little tired but the positives far outweigh the negatives. Would recommend Hide's place to our friends. Just loved opening the door to see that view.

The pictures don’t do the view justice!! The location is great, walkable to nearly everywhere but a bus stop across the street if needed. As others have mentioned, the bedroom is a little warm, but if you put the fan by the door it isn’t so bad. We plan to stay here again on our next trip if it is available.
Terrific location, great views, very clean. Hide was able to get us a pack n play for our baby which was very helpful. Would stay here again!
Great location, great unit. Some reviews talked about small unit - it certainly isn't small when you compare with staying in a hotel room. Would definitely stay there again. Many thanks.
Can’t beat the location and view for the price. Great stay!
The location was perfect and the view was amazing, we enjoyed watching the surfboarders and boats from our loungeroom! Bed was very comfortable, wifi and air conditioner both worked well.
This is our second stay here, and the place does not disappoint. Plenty of room for the 3 of us and a great view of Waikiki. Tidy, neat and close to everything you need. We will be staying again!
Location and views are excellent for Waikiki beach.  Enjoyed my stay and had no problems.  Would stay here again in the future.

Hide’s apartment was wonderful. The location was very central. The view was beautiful. The balcony was a pleasant place to sit and enjoy a meal or drink. The air con was much appreciate after a day on the beach. The kitchen was of a suitable size and equipped with all utensils needed. The welcome cbocolate was a lovely touch. The pool and spa were lovely. Hide was quick to respond to all enquiries. We would highly recommend!

Hides condo is great value compared to other condos hotels in the waikiki area. The condo is in need of a freshen up and curtains are broken and smelly as well in need of a repaint to bring it up from a 4 star to a 5 star. Location is just behind the Hyatt Regency with a view to die for. Hide's description and pictures of the condo are accurate but it may be a bit small for anymore than 3 people. The condo is located in the aqua pacific monarch which has no bells and whistles but is clean and secure.  Hide was a great host with excellent communication and even allowed us to check in at 9.00am due to our early arrival. 
Enzo, Sydney, Australia

Great location, easy check in.  Some work needs to be done (no light switch in bedroom, missing tiles on patio).  Be sure to close curtains during the day, as the glass walls let in a lot of heat from the sun.
Great location in nice building. Large corner lanai with exceptional views. Very quick responses from host.
Amazing views awesome location best bang for your buck

Wonderful apartment!!!, great view and location, had everything we needed.
Looking forward to returning.
Good location and fast elevators.  Easy host to work with.  Would totally stay here again! Beautiful balcony for coffee and late night drinks. Good food choices close by!

great place, great location, fantastic view we could see the fireworks from the balcony and had lovely views of the beach and sunset. the complex was well maintained and surrounded by many eating, shopping and  transport options.

Hide's place is simply beautiful and with gorgeous views too. Located just a couple of minutes from the beach and restaurants this is the perfect place for a couple to stay. When I come back, I'll be returning to this apartment.
Great location! And the view from the room is amazing
