Place was great! Spent 10 nights there for our honeymoon. Loved it!

景色がとても良かったです｡ﾄｲﾚｯﾄﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰは1つしかないので持参をおすすめします｡ﾊﾜｲのﾄｲﾚｯﾄﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰ､ﾃｨｯｼｭﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰはとても高いです｡4人で宿泊(子供1人)でﾀｵﾙ3ｾｯﾄだったので､ﾋﾞｰﾁ用に持参かﾊﾜｲで購入になります｡ﾋﾞｰﾁﾊﾟﾗｿﾙとｺﾞｻﾞとﾎﾞﾃﾞｨﾎﾞｰﾄﾞがあり使用できました｡景色と場所の良さがとにかく満足でした｡Hideさんの返信も早くて安心でした｡
Hide was an excellent host - made the entire process very seamless. Was very responsive to communication and everything worked how ‘it should’ on the Airbnb platform - another satisfied stay.
great location great host super happy with the booking

We really enjoyed staying at Hide's apartment. It was bright and airy, beautiful and large patio with great views. The location is wonderful as you can walk to everything If I remember correctly it is on the 21st floor which gives you a nice vantage point looking over the city, ocean, and a bit of Diamond Head too. It was nice to have flat screen tv's in both the living area and bedroom.  The check in process was very easy Hide provided all of the information well in advance and was very responsive to messages. 

I think the only things that were slightly disappointing was the phone and AC remote batteries were both dead and although we don't care for AC, it would have been really handy if the phone was working as I needed to make calls to book rental cars,  reschedule flights, etc. I am now quite worried at what my cellphone charges might be! With fairness to Hide though, I did not mention this until after we had checked out. 

Also because we had not been to Oahu before, and are fairly new to AirBnB, I was hoping to have a book/binder as some hosts leave so that guests can refer to that for local information, maps, and information regarding the rental suite and how everything operates.  The suite wasn't super stocked so I suggest to pop into the ABC store just down the block to pickup some essentials, I think they are open until 11pm or midnight. 

Overall we had a great time and if returning to Waikiki I would want to stay here again for sure!
景色はものすごく良かったです

Location, location, location. Place was as advertised. It’s a small studio. The fan doesn’t help much in the bedroom. I slept on the sofa couch to be by the air conditioning. Walls are paper thin so you’ll hear neighbors. Not a big deal though. Rooftop area was great. Lanai was great. Awesome view of the mountains and ocean. Watched a surf competition from the lanai.
Great location. Fully equipped and clean. View is awesome.

Great location, fantastic view (better than shown on the listing), flexible host.  However, it does not comfortably sleep 4, the sofa bed is past it's use-by date.  Kitchen is understocked on utensils and crockery, for instance only one wine glass.
Thanks for a great stay
Fabulous location with brilliant views of the ocean!
A nice place that is super close to Waikiki beach. Great access and hospitality.
Great apartment with fantastic view. Perfect location.  All recommendations!
Good location.
Great place, will visit again

Hide was very prompt with all communication and graciously let us move in early.  Location and views were excellent and central to all that Waikiki has to offer.  Apartment is as per the pictures although a little tireder.  Bed and pillows very comfortable, reasonably stocked kitchen and two TV’s for entertainment.
Thank you!

Views are unbeatable!!! Location is perfect! We were looking for king size bed specifically and this was a rare find! Amazing place in the heart of Waikiki. And did I mentioned views? Much better than on pictures. Loved the place! we will be back there!
Location is everything.  The views from this place are amazing facing Diamond Head and the beach.  The rooftop pool area provided views in all directions.
'As described' - a brilliant view,  and a clean and comfortable stay
Apartment was in a great central spot, great views from the balcony. The decor was a little outdated and the furniture a bit worn.

Hello, i like to say that we enjoyed to stay(family with two kids) in Hide sun’s place very much^^. It is not new but it is very clean and well stocked with items that you might need, if you not lazy to look in the cupboards lol. The one bedroom was as on the photos, very simple all as described and the view is amazing! If you wish to cook kitchen have all you need for that,but microwave is not working sadly. ^^ All in all that stay was very pleasant thank you very much ^^

name: Cosy penthouse close to Barra beach
summary: This explendid penthouse has 4.400 ft2, with 5 cosy bedrooms, sauna, pool, parking for 6 cars and is located at one of the best points of the Barra da Tijuca beach, with the best restaurants and bars of the neighborhood (subway station 15 minutes walk)
space: This penthouse is located at one of the best beach points of Barra, just crossing one street. It is a large and cosy place where you can rest with your family and walk for several delightful places, such as restaurants, bars and night clubs.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Close to the metro (Jardim Oceanico, 1.2km, 15-20 walk). Really nice, 2-level brand new penthouse in a quiet residential area, just one block from the beach.  Various good restaurants nearby and a convenient supermarket on the corner.  Accommodates 12 persons (adults only, apartment is not exactly child friendly because of the 2 levels and the swimming pool on the 2 floor) with more than enough space to relax and feel like in a spa environment.

name: Near to Copacabana Beach
summary: Quarto amplo para casal com banheiro privativo / banheira, closet, frigobar, apartamento de cobertura. Quadra da praia, próximo aos famosos bares de Copacabana. Prédio de luxo, 2 elevadores, porteiros 24 horas. Ideal para casal durante Olimpíadas.
description: Quarto amplo para casal com banheiro privativo / banheira, closet, frigobar, apartamento de cobertura. Quadra da praia, próximo aos famosos bares de Copacabana. Prédio de luxo, 2 elevadores, porteiros 24 horas. Ideal para casal durante Olimpíadas. Falamos inglês, espanhol e português
interaction: Falamos inglês, espanhol e português

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Gorgeous Ocean View 2BD/2BA 106
summary: Menehune Shores Resort is centrally-located in Kihei, one of south Maui's most popular destinations.
space: It's prime location offers convenient access to other areas of Maui, such as the airport in Kahului, the charming town of Kihei, beautiful Wailea, historical Lahaina and Ma'alaea Bay, famous for whale watching, turtle sightings and The Maui Ocean Center.   Adjacent to the resort is the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, along with the historical 16th Century Alii (Royal) Fish Pond of Kalepolepo.  Protected by offshore reefs, the pond provides a safe swimming area for children and those who prefer a gentle surf.   Our spectacular ocean-front resort offers beautifully maintained and manicured grounds lined with majestic palms, a beach-front swimming pool with large sundeck, shuffleboard, two adjacent beaches, on-site restaurant and lounge, free and convenient parking, and an incredible roof top barbeque area with seating, lounging and amazing 180 degree views of The Pacific Ocean, the West Maui Mountains and the slopes of Haleakala. But that's not all!   The rooft

The host canceled this reservation 74 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: OportoBatalha  (by The HOST)
summary: The apartment is located in Praça da Batalha (downtow center), in 3th floor with elevator. The apartment is perfect for a small family, or  4 friends . The neighborhood have cafes, restaurants, ATM's, supermarket's, and shops. Nearby Santa Catarina,Aliados, Clerigos Tower, São Bento metro/train station, Bolhão metro station.
space: Has 1 bedroom (with double bed and balcony) , complete kitchen (with fridge, electric kettle, toaster, coffee machine), a living room (with 1bed-sofa and dining table and  a balcony), bathroom with shower.
description: The apartment is located in Praça da Batalha (downtow center), in 3th floor with elevator. The apartment is perfect for a small family, or  4 friends . The neighborhood have cafes, restaurants, ATM's, supermarket's, and shops. Nearby Santa Catarina,Aliados, Clerigos Tower, São Bento metro/train station, Bolhão metro station. Has 1 bedroom (with double bed and balcony) , complete kitchen (with fridge, electric kettle, toaster, coffee machine), a living room (with 1bed-sofa and dining table and  a balcony), bathroom with shower. Total access Available by phone or email. Oporto center, with cafes, restaurants, ATM's, convenience stores and shops.  Excellent transportation (Metro, bus and train), just 150 meters away. neighborhood_overview: Oporto center, with cafes, restaurants, ATM's, convenience stores and shops.  Excellent transportation (Metro, bus and train), just 150 meters away.  Metro Airport direct line to the station is only 500 meters away from Bolhão metro Station .  Very close to S.Bento train station, 50 meters for the street S.Catarina (famous Cafe Majestic) and the best shopping street in town.  Very near of famous Lello Bookstore (800 meters).  Only 10 minutes walk to the Galleries of Paris (street fashion bards) and 15 minutes walk to port wine cellars. Due to the apartment is found in the heart of city center you can hear the normal sound operation of city, (unfortunately we can't offer the best of 2 world).
transit: 5 min - S.Bento Train Station ( Sub-Urbanos Braga,Aveiro, Guimarães)  5 min - S.Bento Metro station (Yellow Line)  7 min - Bolhão Metro station( Every metro lines A,B,C,D and E )  5 Min - Bus Station (Destination : Braga, Guimarães, Aveiro, Coimbra, Viseu, Leiria, Fátima, Lisbon, Setúbal,Sines, Beja, Evora, Faro).
access: Total access
interaction: Available by phone or email.
house_rules: The apartment is located in a residential building, noise is forbidden after 10 p.m and 8 a.m, as well as in the staircase. Please do not disturb the neighbors when opening or closing the entrance of the building and the apartment, and leave the apartment in the same condition prior to your arrival.

host.host_about:
Hello, I am responsible for the reservations of that property. 
The apartments are very clean and well equipped; however feel free to ask any item you could miss, or cannot find. We will try to provided it during your stay. 
The properties are rented in whole, No sharing with other guests or owner. 
I live in O Porto and i will be always available to take care of your check in and assist you during your stay. 
Looking forward to have the pleasure to welcome you and provide you a memorable stay! 

I speak fluently English, Portuguese and a little bit of  Spanish. 
I take your reservation very seriously and I never cancel. 
Please make first an inquiry clicking on the button: "contact me" 
Than I will reply to your request with a accurate offer. At this point you are free to book it on line. 
I do not advise you to press the button "book it" because some dates may have 5 nights minimum stay policy or are on hold. 
I did decline some reservations 24 hours after the guest book it, but I never cancelled it. 
Kind regards, Bruno

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
L'hôte fut très acceuillant et nous a montré les lieux et monuments que nous pouvions visiter ! Les bons restaurants également ! 
L'appartement était trés propre
Le rapport qualité-prix est très avantageux ! 
Seul bémol : apparatement assez bruyant la nuit
Mais je le recommande fortement !

La casa cumple todas las expectativas y fue entregada impecable!. Excelente host, muy atento y con un amplio repertorio de recomendaciones de lugares para visitar y comer, sin duda alguna me quedaría otra vez!

Thank you so much for everything. An amazing place and good communication. Bruno was always there and answer all the questions quickly. The apartment is in a good location and clean. We will definitely choose this apartment again when we go to Porto. Thanks a lot Bruno.

I've stayed in this apartment for two night with other two friends. Everything was fine. The location is very central, close to every important monuments in the city. There are also many nice bars in the square just in front of it.
The apartment was clean, maybe just a little bit cold, but it was raining while we were there, so we were not that lucky with the weather.
Bruno's girlfriend welcomed us to the aparment and she was really nice and gave us valuable tips for exploring the city.
Highly recommended!
Muy buena opción

The appartment is very central and has all the necessary amenities.
Bruno was really helpful and explained tons of tips about the city. We were sure to try all the best things of Porto.
On the minus side, I was there in winter in a big storm, and we could  feel some wind getting in through the window, which made the flat chilly! Hope to come back in summer!
Thank you Bruno and see you around.
Local excelente!! Muito bem localizado, com muitas opções de lazer por perto!! Aprovadissimo!!
Super séjour dans l'appartement de Bruno ! Très bien placé dans la ville, propre et confortable ! La rue est un peu bruyante mais c'est normal pour un logement au centre ville.

Piso muy recomendable. Situado en pleno centro de Oporto. Desde allí puedes ir caminando prácticamente a todos los lugares turísticos además de tener cerca el metro y el tren. No sólo por localización sino por lo acogedor que es el piso. Estancia muy agradable.

El anfitrión muy atento. Nos facilitó mucho la llegada y nos dio información de la ciudad. Además de estar pendiente a cualquier cosa que nos faltara. La casa muy limpia y ordenada y la situación perfecta! sin duda repetiríamos.
Super zentral. Die Tipps von Bruno waren klasse und können wir weiterempfehlen

The apartment is in a great location and kept very clean. Bruno does a good job making sure his guests are happy, and he's readily available to answer any questions of concerns. I liked the place so much that I decided to stay a little longer. I'll stay here again whenever in Porto.
Todo bom

Je recommande !!!!
Merci pour tout
Great place, in great location. Easy access from the airport and railway station. Highly recommended.

Eu amei o apartamento, a localização é excelente perto de tudo... lojas, shopping, restaurantes. 
O metrô (estação Bolhao) fica a 5  minutos apé e leva para todos os lugares que precisar. 
O apartamento é super aconchegante, limpo e seguro.
O Bruno foi muito receptivo, sempre que precisei de algo ele respondia super rápido. Não tenho oque reclamar. 
Quando voltar em Porto já tenho um lugar certo onde ficar. Super recomendo.
We had a short holiday in Bruno's place. He's been very helpful throughout our stay. The place is very central, clean and comfortable.

We had an absolutely fantastic time at Bruno's place.

The flat is cozy and located right next to the most important city highlights. The two balconies are an absolute treat. The rooms are spacious and well organized.

Bruno is an amazing host - he took the time during check-in to show us around the map and give recommendations.

Thumbs up from us :)
Muy bien localizado. Amplio y comodo. El anfitrion muy amable
Great!!!!!
Perfect ! The appartement is in ideal conditions (clean and confortable) and perfectly located to explore the city. Plus, the host is very kind and helpful.

The best part of the apartment OportoBatalha is its central location to sightseeing in downtown Porto.  From the apartment you can see the beautiful Teatro Nacional Sao Joao right across Batalha Square. There is easy access to buses and the Sao Bento train and Metro station. The apartment is small, and the tv smaller, but it has most of what you need and I was impressed that all four walls of the cute kitchen were tiled. Bruno was very nice and responded quickly to any communication. There is a fruit and vegetable market right downstairs, and several restaurants in walking distance. We enjoyed our stay in OportoBatalha.
The place is great and the host, Bruno, is very friendly and helpful.
Ótimo espaço e hospitalidade 5*! Recomendo vivamente.

Bruno was a perfect host and gave us a lot of useful tips and addresses of places to visit and restaurants. He was very flexible with our early arrival and late departure. The apartment is clean and perfectly well located in the historic city centre. We had everything we needed to enjoy our stay in Porto and even more than we expected. We definitely recommend this place.
Una estancia increible en oporto, las recomendaciones muy buenas y la ubicacion inmejorable. Si voy a oporto repetire esta casa
El anfitrión estuvo muy atento en todo momento con nosotros y el apartamento estaba muy bien situado.

O apartamento correspondeu às minhas expectativas por completo!
Muito limpo e bem localizado. Estive por 12 dias hospedada com conforto e segurança.
O Bruno, o anfitrião, é muito carismático, educado e atencioso. Surpreendeu-me com a gentileza de buscar-me à estação de Campanhã, o que facilitou em muito a minha chegada, uma vez que eu teria que fazer uma baldeação para a Estação S. Bento e tinha bagagem pesada a carregar.
Não fosse isso uma feliz surpresa, ele foi muito eficiente ao me apresentar todas as disponibilidades do apartamento e, após tudo isso, ainda sentou-se comigo à mesa, para me dar dicas excelentes sobre a cidade, esclarecer minhas dúvidas sobre alguns locais e ensinar o modo mais fácil e menos cansativo de andar pelas ruas íngremes da Cidade! Eu super recomendo o Bruno como anfitrião e espero em breve retornar!

Appartement agréable très propre , très bien situé , on peut accéder à tous les sites, moyens de transport à pied en peu de temps. Hôte très sympathique et de bons conseils. Beaucoup de commodités dans le quartier restaurants, commerces , boutiques … Nous avons apprécié.  petit bémol victime de son super emplacement , c'est un peu bruyant.

Really nice flat in the centre of Porto. 
Bruno was really easy and accessible to do the check in. The flat was really clean and had a nice bed to rest after your long walks around the city.
At the check in bruno gave us same really nice tips about what to visit and where to eat traditional food, everything was delicious. 
Also a really easy check out. 
Recommend this place to everyone.
Buena ubicación!! gracias Bruno por las recomendaciones!!

This appartement is everything you’ll need for an amazing stay in Porto. It is spacious, clean and perfectly located. Although there is noise from the square outside all day, the nights were more quiet. For sensitive sleepers earplugs could be handy. Bruno was a great host with amazing recommendations in and around Porto. We would love to stay here again.

Casa molto carina e perfetta per due persone, ma sufficiente anche per quattro. Posizione centrale, a piedi di visita tutta Oporto. Host gentilissimo che ci ha fornito tutte le indicazioni per una visita della città

This is a really pretty and spacious apartment. It’s location is perfect for walking everywhere. 
It was also super clean, which was amazing. 
There is a bit of noise, because of the location, but still very well worth it.

Alles super , kann man wirklich empfehlen bei einem Aufenthalt in Porto. Super Lage , Wohnung die alles hat was man braucht und einen super netten Vermieter der für alle Fragen bereit steht. Danke !!!
The appartment was very nice, centrally located with a nice balcony and of course the host was veeeery helpful and reliable. Highly recommended!

Parfait Airbnb pour un séjour à Porto !!! L'appartement est très bien placé : proche de tous les monuments à voir, la station de métro pour aller à l'aéroport et de train pour aller à la plage; il est bien équipé, spacieux et propre. L'hôte est très réactif et disponible, il nous a fait un très bon accueil à l'arrivée et a pris le temps de nous montrer toutes les choses à faire à Porto + ses bonnes adresses pour manger ou prendre un verre/café. Encore un grand merci ! Je recommande vivement ce logement et cet hôte !!

We could not have been happier. This place was fantastic and Bruno was so kind. We went to two of the restaurants, a port house, and countless attractions that he suggested and were so pleased with them all. He took extra time to sit down and draw a map for us wiand n local tips, which made us feel so welcome. Anyone looking for a great trip to Porto should stay in Bruno’s place.
Lovely place. Great location.
Apartamento muy céntrico y bien situado.

This apartment is in a good location. Traffic noise could be a little loud at times when leaving doors open. 
Bruno was very welcoming and gave us great local knowledge and suggested nice places to eat.

The flat was located in an ideal location within easy walking distance of metro stations & a lot of the main sights. The flat was clean and well looked after and Bruno organised early check in for us which was great, all communication was quick and the top local tips we were some of our highlights of our trip!

Wonderful stay. Apartment is very clean, beautifully decorated and located in the very center of the city, so you can reach everything by walking. It has two balconies, well equiped kitchen and big bathroom. Both places to sleep (bed in the bedroom and sofa in the living room) are really comfy. Altogether it's a really great place to stay. And a big thank you to Bruno, who was a great host and provided us with a lot of tips on what to see and where to eat, which was really helpful. I recommend this apartment to everyone :)
Apartman was very beautiful in very good place in center of the city. Host was kind and gave a tips about city. We recommend.

Hemos estado genial en este apartamento. La ubicación muy buena, se puede ir andando a todos los sitios. Bruno Borja es un chico majísimo y muy amable, nos ayudó y  nos recomendó muchos sitios a los que fuimos y nos encantaron. Recomiendo 100%.
This apartment is a great place to stay. Excellent location, comfortable and stylish and with a wonderful welcoming host
Bruno is super helpful and provided us with great tips as a local.

My sister and I stayed here for 3 nights, and loved it. Bruno is a great host, he spent a good 15-20 minutes giving us tips and information about Porto, that helped a lot! Thanks for making our stay much easier. The apartment was clean, and had everything we needed. When we had questions he promptly answered. Thanks for a great stay Bruno!
Good location, wonderful apartment, amazing host (Bruno) but lots of noise from the street.

Beautiful apartment in a great central location.  Really nice views of the square.  Great balcony to sit and watch the world go by.  Charming, friendly host.  When we return to Porto we hope it's available again.

Great location, clean and bright apartment, friendly host, the apartment and noise level were accurately described. The washer is a bonus, and the host was very accommodating with earlier check-in.  The hot water pressure from the shower was low sometimes, but on the big picture it was just a detail.

Bruno nos recebeu com muita cordialidade. O apartamento me surpreendeu, a localização é perfeita, próximo de vários pontos turísticos e com restaurantes maravilhosos bem próximo. O metro e bus também ficam próximos. 
Super indico!!
Central position with lift to 3rd floor apartment. However, noisy at night and toilet temperamental on flushing.
Ótimo lugar para se hospedar. O Bruno nos deu várias dicas sobre a cidade. O apto. é bem localizado perto de tudo. Dispõe de cozinha  máquina de lavar, cama confortável, sala ampla e sacada. Nota 10.

name: Luminous Apartment in Nisantasi

notes: Nisantasi is one of the best special neighborhoods of Istanbul. It's famous with it's retail availabilities, boutique shops, cafes, bars and restaurants. It's 15 minutes walking distance to Taksim Square, Besiktas seashore and easily accessible from CBD (Levent, Maslak).
transit: The apartment is 5 minutes walking distance to Osmanbey metro station.
access: There is 1 double bed in the big bedroom,1 single bad in the other bedroom and 1 sofabed which can be a double bed in the living room.  The living room has big windows and the house is luminous. The bedrooms are located on the back facade of the building, so they are very quiet.
interaction: I would help you about any suggestions you may need about Istanbul and Turkey.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed in the apartment. No check in after 00:00.

host.host_about:
Hi there! 
My name is Pinar. I am an urban and regional planner and working in an international company.
I like to travel, discover new places, yoga and music.

I know the importance of good hospitality and safety when traveling and staying with airbnb. 

Look forward to meeting you!

name: 1BR COZY, SPACIOUS, NEXT TO METRO FLAMENGO, RIO
summary: Large and spacious 1 bedroom, full kitchen, charming apart an eclectic neighborhood where “Cariocas” live, eat, drink, play live music at Praça São Salvador. Walking distance to everything, just steps away from restaurants and transportation to Corcovado. No car needed when staying at this apartment. The Subway/metro is very close, 5 min walking distance. Perfect for 1 person or couple comfortably.
space: This 1 Bedroom apartment was recent remodeled, it's bright, spacious, sunny, cosy and quiet, air conditioner in the bedroom, Fan in the Living room, Very well equipped- great little kitchen, blackout curtains, dining table and chairs, sofas, large master bedroom with excellent comfortable queen bed, bathroom with lovely shower, separate laundry with washing machine and dryer.

Perfect for 1 person or couple comfortably. This residential building offers security cameras, doorman 24h. - WIFI - Clean sheets and bath towels provided - Guests will also enjoy great kitchen full of cooking utensils, microwave, coffee machine etc. All long-ter
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Flamengo, walking distance to the Praça São Salvador. Flamengo It's not considered top tourist area, but if you are interested in exploring Rio outside the touristic area, this location is perfect and well located. You will be in walking distance of bars and restaurants for every taste, from Brazilian to Italian, Japanese as well as buffet style eateries where you pay by weight for delicacies from salad bars to hot foods, divine desserts, cafes, bakeries, movie theaters, supermarkets, ATM machines and stores.
notes: Please have an updated profile with pictures (current, of yourself), verifications, references, and reviews.  For security reason the names of all guests occupying the apartment must be registered prior the check-in. I don't book or communicate outside of airbnb until reservations have been made. This keeps the community safe and personable. ** The prices listed here do not apply during high season, and will change according to season (long holidays, New Year's, Carnaval, Easter, etc.).
transit: Very easy public transportation by your door: (Bus, Taxi, Uber).  - located two blocks from the subway/metro station Largo do Machado or Flamengo.
access: This residential building offers security cameras, doorman 24h. - WIFI - Clean sheets and bath towels provided - Guests will also enjoy great kitchen full of cooking utensils, microwave, coffee machine etc. All long-term rental contracts after (2 weeks) 15 days requires a cleaning service without an extra fee. Housekeeping includes: changing the bed linen, towels and disposing of waste.
interaction: You'll be booking the entire apartment for yourself, and I'll be available to assist you at anytime. You are welcome and hope that you respect this apartment like it's yours! The obvious considerations of keeping it clean and tidy would be appreciated :)
house_rules: You are welcome and hope that you respect this apartment like it's yours! The obvious considerations of keeping it clean and tidy would be appreciated :) 1) Family building so please keep quiet after 10pm; 2) We have a non smoking apartment. We request smoking outdoors. 3) Please turn off the lights and electronics when you leave the premises; 4) Any extra person will be charged a daily fee (R$50 BRL); 5) For security reason the names of all guests occupying the apartment must be registered prior the check-in. 6) Extra housekeeping service available upon request (R$170 BRL); 7) Sand can damage the floor, please rinse off and wipe your feet before coming in the house.  You'll be booking the entire apartment for yourself, and I'll be available to assist you at anytime.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: I am a freelance web and graphic designer. I was born in Rio but have lived in San Francisco/CA for a long period. I love travelling: new sights, culture, unfamiliar food and I know how important it is to "feel home" at where you stay. I look forward to being your host during your stay in Rio and I can definitely recommend some great spots, good food and a tour around the city.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A hospedagem foi incrível. O apartamento é lindo, bem decorado e aconchegante. A localização é super central, perto de tudo e fácil deslocamento para vários lugares do RJ, seja de metrô, ônibus, táxi ou Uber. Os porteiros também foram bem atenciosos. Iremos voltar, certamente. Experiência sensacional. Super indicamos.
Parabéns pelo apto!! Mto bom, excelente localização.. Super agradável e bacana!!
It was a pleasure. Great apartment in Flamengo.

As fotos fazem jus ao apartamento, que é mesmo aconchegante e prático. O prédio é antigo mas o apartamento foi bastante reformado. Fica no início da Rua São Salvador, portanto longe do barulho que pode vir da boêmia Praça São Salvador, dois quarteirões adiante, mas suficientemente perto de serviços de todo tipo (banco, mercados, correios, metrô, etc.). Os funcionários do prédio são simpáticos e, quando tivemos uma pequena reclamação de barulho em relação a um vizinho, o porteiro rapidamente resolveu-o, sem sequer ser necessário fazermos contato com a anfitriã a respeito. Só sentimos que uma parte da cozinha não condiz com o restante do apartamento, mas penso que a anfitriã deverá resolver isso em breve. O banho de chuveiro é excelente, os eletrodomésticos da cozinha e a máquina de lavar-secar são novos e muito bons, a iluminação é linda e o ar condicionado no quarto é bastante potente (talvez o suficiente para refrigerar o apartamento inteiro, mas não há como isolar a casa da área de serviço com tanque, que é aberta). Acabamos não conhecendo a Sonia, pois chegamos e saímos em horários inusuais, mas a chegada e a saída foram tranquilas mesmo assim e o contato (por (Hidden by Airbnb) ) correu de forma fluida e sempre que necessário (de ambas partes). Ficaríamos aqui de novo e recomendamos para quem queira um apartamento de quarto e sala confortável numa zona agradável, central e não cara do Rio de Janeiro.

Sonia's been an amazing host from beginning to end of my trip to Rio! She was very welcoming and full of good tips about how to enjoy my stay in the city. The apartment is very cozy and had all I needed to feel at home! Very clean, comfortable and perfectly located, a few blocks from the subway and surrounded with a fun nightlife! 
My next visit to Rio will definitely be with Sonia again!

El sitio es fantástico!! La casa, el barrio, la ubicación, las conexiones, todo. Sonia fue de gran ayuda para todo lo que necesité pero la casa está muy bien equipada y puedes tener una estancia tan independiente como agradable. Sin duda volveré. Muy recomendable.

2つの地下鉄駅から徒歩5分ほど｡静かな住宅街です｡ﾌﾗﾒﾝｺﾞﾋﾞｰﾁへも徒歩圏内｡
部屋は天井が高く､南向きの窓も多く､とても清潔です｡
乾燥機付き洗濯機も､もの干場もあり､ｷｯﾁﾝは4つ口のｺﾝﾛにｵｰﾌﾞﾝ､電子ﾚﾝｼﾞと長期滞在に向いています｡
5泊しましたが､去るときに引っ越しするようで､とても寂しく感じました｡またﾘｵに来る時は滞在したいです｡
Great location :)

O apartamento confortável é muito bem  localizado, próximo aos meios de transporte, numa rua tranquila, próximo dos comércios e restaurantes.
Para quem vem a trabalho ou a passeio, recomendo.
Um apartamento muito bem localizado, perto do aeroporto, metro, onibus numa rua tranquila, perto de tudo.

Great and quiet apartment right in a lively part of Rio... supe close to the Aterro park and beach.
Very tastefully furnished and decorated. 
The bed is very comfortable which is not always the case in a Airbnb.
Sonia is a great and super nice hostess. She made my arrival and departure very easy.
Special thanks to the great doorman Cesar who's so nice!
Foi ótima a experiência e a Sonia foi muito solícita. Era bem próximo ao metro e a praça são salvador.
Sonia's apartment is perfect, nice, light and clean. The neighbourhood is full of restaurants, bars and shops. Praça São Salvador, just down the street is perfect to enjoy bit of local life! Thanks!
We had a great time in Sonia's flat! Great apartment great location good amenities and Sonia was always here to help in case we needed anything. I definitely recommend staying here!

O espaço é ótimo. Decoração de bom gosto e super aconchegante. O apartamento é claro e arejado. Não senti falta de nada. Exatamente como descrito e como nas fotos. Além disso, a Sonia é super atenciosa e estava sempre à disposição.

This apartment and host are wonderful! The place looks exactly like in the photos and it's clean and well-kept. The doormen of the building were very respectful and friendly, and we felt very safe in the neighborhood. It was lovely to wake up to so much sunlight and the chirping of local birds! The kitchen appliances are all new and function to perfection; the ceiling fan in the living room is great; and the air conditioning in the bedroom also works great (there were a few warmer nights while we were there and it was great to be able to stay nice and cool!). The TV and WiFi also work great. Overall we felt very much at home. The location is also fantastic. You can walk to the metro, bars/restaurants, the São Salvador plaza (where there is also a lovely feira on Sundays!), the nearby Zona Sul supermarket, the nearby Flamengo park, and many other fun places. We highly recommend this spot and would definitely stay here again!

Um estada inesquecível e para ser repetida. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e muito aconchegante. Aquele estilo que faz com que você se sinta em casa. A Sonia, anfitriã, uma pessoa extremamente carismática, atenciosa e zelosa. Recomendo o apartamento sem restrições e já adianto: vou fazer concorrência, porque vou alugar tantas vezes quantas estiver pelo RJ!!! Sonia, muito obrigado e até breve!

Foi ótimo ficar no apartamento da Sonia. O espaço é ajeitado, bem cuidado, confortável e tranquilo. A localização é perfeita: perto do metrô e de outras opções de transporte. De lá, é fácil chegar tanto às praias quanto ao Centro da cidade. Além disso, o prédio (simples) está numa área de comércio variado e fica próximo o suficiente para ir a pé até o Aterro do Flamengo, onde fui correr algumas manhãs. Recomendo a hospedagem.

Sonia foi uma anfitriã nota 10. Desde o dia que fiz a reserva até minha saída a comunicação foi sempre rápida e clara. O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos. Limpíssimo, sou  bem chata no quesito banheiro e posso dizer que o deste apartamento era espetacular. Cama confortável e adorei ter encontrado vários adaptadores para tomada de três pinos espalhados pela casa.  A localização é perfeita, com duas estações de metrô próximas além de farta oferta de várias linhas de ônibus. Rua tranquila, prédio muito seguro, porteiros muito simpáticos, enfim, tudo perfeito. Se pudesse daria seis estrelas.
O ap tem ótima localização, tem tudo perto e o bairro é arborizado. Tudo super limpo, bem decorado e aconchegante. A anfitriã atenciosa e querida. Recomendo.

name: Cosy Home at Galata
summary: Sumahan (building name) is a friendly Oasis in the heart of Istanbul.
space: Sumahan is a friendly Oasis in the heart of Istanbul, where creativity can flourish through support and collaboration between artists. Made up of a number of offices, art studios, residences, and common rooms, Sumahan is home to a wide range of activities and boutique events. As important as the spaces themselves, are the community of people who occupy them and add to the character of the building. A place where we can be free to express ourselves; free to think, create, and share; to inspire and be inspired. We need this place, because we are stronger together than we are alone.

name: Cozy flat the block Flamengo Beach
summary: Flat Full / mini kitchen / Fridge / Wifi / Computer and TV Flamengo beach block (southern Rio - near Copacabana / Ipanema / Leblon / Lapa / City center) Building with surveillance cameras and 24 hour doorman. Flamengo is a safe neighborhood, close
space: Flat Full / mini kitchen / Fridge / Wifi / Computer and TV Flamengo beach block (southern Rio - near Copacabana / Ipanema / Leblon / Lapa / City center) Building with surveillance cameras and 24 hour doorman. Flamengo is a safe neighborhood, close to world famous sites such as Ipanema, Leblon, Copacabana, Christ the Redeemer (Cristo Redentor), Sugarloaf (Pão de Açucar), Sambadrome (Sambódromo), Lapa, etc ... Besides the beach, one of the biggest parks is located in Rio (Flamengo Park). A perfect place to practice any kind of sport with friends and family (running, cycling, basketball, soccer, volleyball, etc ...) There are also parks for children. Very easy access to any kind of public transportation to anywhere - (near the main bus station, subway, airport domestic flights (SDU) and port terminal passengers). 23 km from the international airport GIG - about 30 minutes with regular traffic. It will be a pleasure to share with friends Airbnb my cozy flat and show the wonderful place whe

house_rules: Welcome and enjoy your stay. Please do not turn off the heater in the shower. Respect the neighbors, law of silence (sound and noises) from 10pm to 07am Sejam bem vindos e aproveite sua estadia. Favor não desligar o aquecedor do chuveiro. Respeitar os vizinhos, Lei do silencio (som e barulhos) de 22:00 as 7:00

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hi friends,

There are many good things in this world and I consider traveling one.

See new places and return to unforgettable places. NYC is on my list as a favorite destination. Each trip there is always like the first one is amazing.

Have you as a guest and share this great place where I live is a pleasure.

I am very happy to be part of Airbnb here I am in the right place.

Leandro.

--- // ---

Olá amigos, 

Existem muitas coisas boas nesse mundo e eu considero viajar uma delas. 

Conhecer novos lugares e retornar a lugares inesquecíveis. Nyc está na minha lista como destino preferido, cada viagem para lá é sempre como se fosse a primeira é surpreendente.

Ter você como hospede e compartilhar esse ótimo lugar onde vivo é um prazer.

Estou muito feliz em fazer parte do Airbnb aqui estou no lugar certo.

Abraço,
Leandro.

reviews.comments: PERFEITO! Flat confortabilíssimo, perto de duas estações de metrô, bairro seguro, tem tudo o que precisa. O anfitrião foi muito simpático e acessível, sempre disposto a ajudar no que fosse preciso. Enfim, com certeza ficarei nesse flat nas próximas vezes em que voltar ao Rio de Janeiro!

Exatamente como está nas fotos, flat muito limpo, lençol novo, toalhas de banho novas, ventilador tv e ar funcionando bem. Higiene nota 10, o hóspede muito atencioso e receptivo.

 Perto da estação de metro, perto do bicicletário do itaú, custo benefício nota 10!!

PERFEITO, Eu e minha esposa passamos uma semana muito bem hospedados no Flat do Leandro, próximo à pontos de ônibus, estações do metrô e dos principais pontos turísticos. Ficamos bem a vontade durante a estadia, os funcionários do prédio são cordiais e gentis e o flat superou nossas expectativas e tínhamos tudo e que precisamos, do frigobar a água quente no chuveiro perfeito, perfeito, perfeito. Flat do Leandro, eu recomendo......
Excelente. Vale muito a pena pela localidade e pela atenciosidade e educação do nosso anfitrião. Se eu voltar, certamente será a minha primeira opção.

Minha mãe ficou hospedada no flat do Leandro por 5 dias e gostou muito. A localização é excelente, a 1 quadra do metrô e pertinho do Aterro do Flamengo. O flat estava muito limpo, roupa de cama e toalhas praticamente novas. O chuveiro é muito bom, e o apartamento, por ser de fundos, é muito silencioso. Os porteiros do prédio também foram muito cordiais. Recomendo!

RECOMENDO! Estive com meu namorado durante minha estadia no ap do Leandro e só tenho boas coisas a dizer. Vamos por itens que avalio para uma boa estadia: 

Dono do AP: Ele é super atencioso, pontual, prestativo e honesto. 

Localização: A localização é excelente! Tudo perto: farmácia, mercado, metrô, táxi super acessível, pertinho da praia. Incrível! 

Segurança: Rua tranquila e segura, porteiros gente fina

Limpeza: Chegamos ao AP com tudo limpinho e organizado para nossa estadia. 

Praticidade: O AP tinha tudo o que precisávamos: compacto, mas super utilitário. Pudemos cozinhar, o local já conta com as panelas e um pequeno fogão. 

Preço: Justo pelo que ele proporciona. 

Enfim, voltando ao Rio é lá que quero ficar!

Minha experiência no apartamento do Leandro foi muito boa! Os comentários e as fotos eram absolutamente autênticos. Apartamento extremamente limpo, roupas de camas cheirosas e cama confortável. Além disso, o apto é perto de tudo: do metrô, lanchonetes e restaurantes. A rua é segura e o Leandro foi muito atencioso e gentil! Recomendo!
E cool District Perfect Place and Leonardo Friendly Typ thanks for all

Gostei bastante da localização do flat do Leandro. O próprio Leandro e os porteiros do prédio são muito simpáticos, prestativos e educados. Recebi o flat muito limpo. Só gostaria que houvesse uma arrumação do flat e troca de toalhas ao menos uma vez (fiquei 5 dias). No mais, não achei o preço muito bom, mas em se tratando de Rio de Janeiro é compreensível.

Leandro est un hôte sympathique qui sait recevoir. Il est réactif et à votre écoute pour vous fournir les informations dont vous avez besoin. L'appartement est convenable et est très bien situé proche de toutes commodités et dans un quartier animé. Merci Léandro.

O Flat é bem localizado: próximo a paradas de ônibus, a estação de metrô, à praia do Flamengo. Existem locais próximos para almoçar, tomar café da manhã, jantar. Enfim, tudo o que se precisa, é próximo ao prédio do flat. A minha estadia no verão tórrido foi agradável, pois o apartamento tem ar condicionado e ventilador que funcionam muito bem juntos. O local é limpo e tem água quente. O flat é ótimo para até duas pessoas. O anfitrião foi atencioso e corresponder bem às solicitações. Aconselho a estadia nesse apartamento.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, fica pertinho dos estações do metrô Catete e Largo do Machado, fica perto de supermercados e varias atrações turísticas como o Palácio do Catete, a praia do Flamengo, o centro histórico da cidade também. O apartamento tem geladeira, mini-cozinha, ar condicionado, ventilador, etc. É muito bem equipado com tudo que você precisa. O Leandro e os porteiros são muito simpáticos e atenciosos. O preço e muito bom também.
Recomendo muito!!! Leandro, obrigado pelo tudo, gostaría de voltar sempre!!!
Ако има българи, които се чудят къде да нощуват на поносима за стандартите на Рио цена, това е апартаментът на Леандро. Намира се на прекрасно място, съвсем близо има две спирки на метрото (до Копакабана се стига за десетина минути, до Ипанема за 15), както и спирки на градските автобуси. Освен че е на около 15-20 минути пеш от центъра, може да се стигне пеша и до подножието на статуята на Христос (Корковадо), може би за около 50-55 минути нормален ход. Иначе апартаментът отговаря напълно на цената си – с климатик, вентилатор, хладилник, два газови котлона. Аз бях сам, но е идеално и за двойки, леглото е голямо и удобно. Не се колебайте :)

I had a wonderful stay at Leandro's place. Ideally located in the very center of Rio, close to Flamengo beach, transportation and any useful shops. Leandro was very welcoming, the flat was clean and well furnished in a secured building, I highly recommend this apartment!

Somos 2 chicas españolas que hemos pasado nuestra estancia durante carnaval en este apartamento. Nos ha gustado mucho. Es completo, cómodo y está bien situado. Leandro nos esperó el primer día hasta muy tarde para explicarnos todo y nos dejó un teléfono de contacto para cualquier problema. Desde el principio ha sido muy atento, contestando rápidamente todos nuestros emails para resolver nuestras dudas de la reserva.
Un 10 para Leandro y su apartamento.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Somos 2 meninas espanhóis que estiveram em Carnaval neste apartamento. Nós gostamos. É completo, confortável e bem localizado. Leandro esperou para explicar tudo e deixar um número de contato para qualquer problema. Desde o início, tem sido muito amigável, respondendo a todos os nossos e-mails rapidamente para resolver nossas dúvidas e reservar o apartamento. 
10 Leandro e seu apartamento. Obrigado :)

Clean small apartament with nice sheets, towels, mini-fridge, small kitchen, wifi, computer that is also a TV, though I have not used the computer,  but it seemed to work fine. 
Very close to Catete subway station, Aterro do Flamengo, palacio do Catete, grocery store and restaurants. Catete is a nice, traditional and lively neighborhood with easy access to downtown, Lapa, Santa Tereza, and zona sul neighborhoods. 
The only thing that was a bit annoying was the very loud AC, but it was really hot, so better than not having it. But the noise woke me up a few times. 
Leandro was helpful and on time when we needed to leave early in the morning.

Leandro was a great host and very helpful - apartment was clean and had everything I needed for my one month stay. Would definitely stay again when I return to rio. Leandro's friendly and helpful attitude was much appreciated and I would highly recommend a stay here.

Great location and a nice apartment. Close to metro and supermarket, Flamengo park is also very nice. Very safe area. Apartment had everything I needed. Air conditioning worked well, sheets, towels, blankets were also available. No problems arose during the entire stay, but Leandro gave me his contact information in case. Overall a great place.

Leandro met us at the apartment when we arrived after coordinating with him. He recommended a few places close by and had information readily available. Very well located to hop on a subway or bus with plenty of options close by. Privacy in the apartment was very nice and we had all necessary amenities to enjoy our 4 days in Rio.

I had a very nice journey in Rio, thanks to Leandro's flat !

Very well placed in Flamengo, a safe district, Leandro wants allways his guests to be confutable.

To be recommanded, definitely.

The unit was very small.  The computer desk took up most of the room and the computer was also the TV and reception was poor.  There was no where to sit with only one ricketty chair at the computer
Desk.  The bed mattress was hard and uncomfortable.  Air-conditioning was very noisy.  This was definitely the host taking advantage of the world cup as it was expensive for low quality.  On the plus side it was clean, use of computer was a bonus, the location was good and building secure.  Leandro who met us on arrival was very friendly.  However we would not stay there again.  If you were desperate for accommodation for a night or two it would suffice.

Leandro was a great host and very flexible, he was easy to communicate with and we are very happy with our stay in Rio. The area was really nice and well connected, the apartment was exactly as described and perfect for two persons. Everybody was really nice and we enjoyed our stay at Leandros place. It was clean and great with the mini kitchen to prepare your breakfast if desired. We were very lucky that Leandro accepted our reservation for the World cup and it was an amazing experience. We can highly recommend Leandros hospitality and kindness as well as the apartment. Leandros support was much appreciated and we can definitely recommend this place to our friends and family.

Leandro is a great host, no doubt about it ! I was in a hurry and I was able to book the place and receive a reply by him in less than an hour, which helped me a great deal, and the overall communication with him was great, which is very important in my opinion when you use Airbnb. The place is nice, very well located in the heart of Zona Sul and close to everything (metro, restaurants...), and well furnished. I recommend !

Leandro's flat is perfect to visit Rio de Janeiro. It is a very simple flat  well located in a nice district near to metro and beach. The building is not new and not so well isolated but very charming. I guess it is frequent in Rio, since I stayed in a big hôtel in Copacabana before coming at Leandro's and isolation was also an issue. The flat is guarded days and nights. 
Leandro is very welcoming and does everything he can to be helpful to guests. 
I highly recommend.
Leandro é um ótimo anfitrião, pontual e atencioso. O apartamento é confortável e estava bem limpo. A localização é excelente. Nota 10!

O apartamento é ótimo, fiel as fotos, silencioso, prédio e bairro seguros, extremamente limpo e muito bem localizado.
Quando chegamos o Leandro estava a nossa espera e foi super atencioso. 
Super recomendo.

Gostei muito da experiência.  O apto é ótimo e super bem localizado. Leandro foi bastante atencioso e nos deu várias dicas. A localização é ótima para quem quer utilizar transporte público,  táxi ou até para caminhar. Adorei e recomendo.

This was really good experience. The flat was just like we expected,  clean, safety and wifi worked perfectly. Nothing bad to say. Leandro was really nice host even we were late when we arrived, we got the key from portera, because he had own flight leaving. I can recommend for everyone. :)

O apartamento é pequeno mas é limpo, ventilado e muito bem localizado. Próximo ao metrô, à praia, parada de ônibus, bicicletário, farmácia, supermercado e restaurantes. Tem porteiro 24h, o que dá uma segurança extra. O Leandro é muito simpático, responsável e gentil. Foi uma ótima experiência que pretendo repetir.

A minha estadia no flat foi ótima! A localização é excelente, ônibus e metrô hiper pertos ... fora os lugares que dá pra ir a pé! Excelente. O apartamento é pequeno, mas limpo, confortável e muito bem localizado. O comercio da região tem de tudo, além das duas estações de metro. Leandro passou todas as informações necessárias e foi bem simpático. Recomendo.

O Leandro foi uma simpatia, um ótimo anfitrião, me deu bastante orientações e dicas com transporte e lugares para passear..
E no apartamento me senti na minha  própria casa, tinha o espaço que eu procurava, tudo limpo e organizado..
Apartamento silencioso e bem localizado

Flat was clean and as described.  Leandro met us to give the key, and was extremely helpful.  Nice neighborhood, close to metro and lots of conveniences.  Recommended.

Estou usando o Airbnb, desde Outubro do ano passado, e cada experiência vivida em minhas viagens estão sendo únicas. Leandro é uma simpatia. Muito educado e gentil. Me recebeu no seu apartamento me passando todas as informações necessárias. E me deixou muito a vontade para que se eu precisasse de alguma coisa ou alguma informação, deveria ligar para ele a qualquer momento. O apartamento é pequeno, mas tem tudo que precisamos para uma estada agradável. O necessário. A localização é 10! Perto de metrô, e perto do apartamento tem tudo. Supermercado, bancos, academia, e vários bares e restaurantes. E museus. O bairro é limpo e muito seguro. Em minutos se está no centro ou em outros bairros da zona sul da cidade. Voltando ao Rio, com certeza o apartamento do Leandro é uma opção de hospedagem. Muito bom! Recomendadíssimo! Muito obrigado Leandro!

Leandro foi muito atencioso estava nos esperando ja na entrada do prédio, nos deu toda assessoria possível, indicando lugares por onde andar, onde ir... no apto encontramos td o q esperávamos e precisávamos foi uma ótima estadia tanto com a atenção que recebemos do leandro quanto aos porteiros q sempre foram bem atenciosos e com certeza qdo voltar-mos ao rio de janeiro novamente iremos fazer contato. amamos o apto..

The studio is small, cozy and located really close to Flamengo beach and the Catete metro station which makes it ideal to explore the surrounding highlights. There is so much more to Rio than Copacabana and Ipanema! 
Leandro is a very kind and attentive person who offered his hand all the time. High five.

Leandro é um anfitrião super simpático e receptivo. Fui recebido pessoalmente por ele e me foi explicado o funcionamento do prédio e do apartamento. A hospedagem fica super bem localizada (2 quadras do metrô), perto de bancos, farmácias, fast foods. O espaço é pequeno, mas limpo, organizado e dispõe de todos os utensílios para uma estadia tranqüila. Eu recomendo o lugar. Pretendo voltar mais vezes...

Não poderia ter sido melhor meu feriado! Chegamos no local e Leandro muito atencioso já estava nos esperando se mostrou disposto a ajudar sempre que possível e nos deu dicas válidas, gostei do apartamento supriu todas as necessidades minhas e do meu amigo, bem localizado perto de tudo, até mesmo os porteiros do prédio muito queridos, gostamos muito de ficar lá e esperamos voltar com certeza.

Cheguei o Leandro já estava esperando, muito simpático, solícito e educado. O apartamento é bem localizado, limpo e organizado... tem fácil acesso para o Corcovado e para o Pão de Açúcar e é pertinho do metrô e da praia, o que dá maior mobilidade na cidade. Voltaria a me hospedar lá, certamente.
Excelente anfitrião,  esteve presente desde o primeiro momento.

Nossa estadia no Rio de Janeiro não poderia ter sido melhor! A região é muito boa, bem localizada, perto do metro.. O leandro foi extremamente atencioso e nos ajudou muito em tudo que precisamos, além de ter dado várias dicas. Adoramos tudo! Esperamos voltar outras vezes.
Ótimo anfitrião, super atencioso, local excelente, perto do metrô, super mercados, bancos, etc. Pretendo voltar!

O Leandro é uma pessoa muito gentil e amável, nos recebeu em seu apartamento que por sinal estava muito limpo e organizado.
A localização é excelente, perto de tudo e ambiente seguro.
Nota 10 para a recepção do Leandro e para o seu apartamento, parabéns!
Obrigada pela compreensão e pela cordialidade.

O Leandro foi excelente! Estava esperando quando cheguei no apto e me deu as orientações necessárias em relação ao local, além de dicas sobre a cidade e se dispôs a me ajudar com o que fosse preciso.

Certamente me hospedaria no apartamento novamente!
Obrigado, Leandro!

O Leandro explicou tudo sobre o ap e a região. O apartamento é muito bem localizado o que tem no anuncio é o que ele nos oferece, muito conforto e tranquilidade. Tem tudo por perto é muito bem localizado e é pertinho do metro!

Pra mim foi uma viagem a trabalho e passeio, já que fiquei no feriado lá, então foi ótimo pois voltei tarde do trabalho no dia do checkout e pude entregar a chave mais tarde já que não havia nenhuma reserva no dia! Pra mim foi perfeito!

I had a great stay here. Best Apartment ever i had. Very clean and quite. You have all what you need. 
Leandro is very friendly and the location is top.

Thanks

Muito limpo e organizado!
Excelente localização e preço justo.
Adoramos!
Everything as promised. Cozy flat, good AC, good bed, small kitchen, great position, close to a beach and the metro. Great information and great availability.

Estou muito satisfeito com minha estadia no apartamento do Leandro. Ele veio me receber no dia e horário que atendiam minha necessidade. O apartamento é exatamente como descrito. O prédio é antigo, bem mantido, bem localiado e de uma arquitetura muito legal. Os porteiros foram cordiais. O wifi e o computador me foram úteis.
Eu vou recomendar a amigos!
Stay was very comfortable, room was clean, neat and doormen were helpful. Would definitely stay again when I return to Rio!

Leandro was great! Although we didn't have the opportunity to meet him, he had everything ready for us from the second we arrived. The room was well furnished with most appliances and tools needed for a comfortable stay. To our surprise, we even had an AC that worked like a charm. The room was close to the subway, local markets, restaurants. The beach was walking distance, and we found frequent secure parking for our vehicle for 2R a day. Leandro even left us basic instructions for the room and appliances in the room. Everyone was very friendly and helpful, especially the doorman. Great stay, highly recommended.
I loved the neighborhood. The apartment is really good and the host is trustworthy. I recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A descrição do anúncio foi adequada. O Leandro me deixou muito a vontade e se mostrou bastante disponível. O bairro é de fácil acesso. O local é muito próximo ao metrô, lojas, supermercado e lanchonetes.

O Leandro fez de tudo para que minha estadia fosse a melhor possível. Realizou contatos e se colocou a disposição durante todo o tempo.
O apartamento é exatamente como descrito nas fotos. Ideal para duas pessoas e na melhor localização da cidade do Rio de Janeiro: entre a zona sul e o centro do Rio - o que te possibilita frequentar as praias e restaurantes da zona sul e bares na Lapa, museus no Centro do Rio e etc.
O apartamento fica próximo a supermercados, farmácia e comércio em geral, mesmo estando em uma rua bem tranquila.
A proximidade da estação de metrô é outro diferencial, que permite o deslocamento para diversos lugares de maneira rápida e tranquila.
O prédio é muito bem conservado e os porteiros sempre muito educados e gentis.

Adoramos o apartamento, ele é exatamente o que aparece nas fotos, pequeno mas nos atendeu perfeitamente bem. Leandro teve o cuidado de deixar tudo pronto e foi flexível para entrarmos mais tarde e sairmos mais cedo. Deixou artigos de uso pessoal e de (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza iremos novamente, fomos muito felizes no apartamento!

We haven't met Leandro in person but the communication with him was swift and without problems. The key was prepared for us at the reception. The appartment was basic but clean and its location is perfect for exploring the city and close to the metro station Catete.
O lugar é muito bem localizado, próximo ao metrô e a praia! O apartamento é do tamanho ideal e o Leandro foi bem solícito!!!

Adoramos o apartamento do Leandro! Localização excelente, perto de tudo, muito simples de chegar e seguro. O apartamento muito aconchegante, tinha tudo que precisávamos, ficamos muito a vontade! Leandro foi ótimo anfitrião, muito atencioso! O prédio muito bonito com uma arquitetura antiga, porteiros educados! Enfim, ótima experiência, passamos dias muito tranquilos! Com certeza queremos voltar!!
Leandro was very hospitable. His place has everything we needed for our stay. Great location, next to Flamengo Park and close to a metro station.

Leandro a toujours été disponible pour répondre rapidement aux questions. Il a grandement facilité l'arrivée dans le logement. 
Le quartier est très agréable a proximité des commerces et de la plage.

O anfitrião foi super atencioso e constantemente preocupado com nosso bem estar.
Mesmo não o conhecendo pessoalmente, devido ao nosso próprio atraso em chegar na casa, ele foi super presente e facilitou ao máximo todos os nossos passos.
O apartamento é prático e bastante (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, em minha próxima viagem ao Rio de Janeiro, tentarei conhecer o Leandro pessoalmente e me hospedarei novamente em seu espaço.

Leandro was a great and friendly host. The place is tidy and cozy. It's really close to the city centre. It's safe and private. I loved staying in Leandro's flat. The communication with the host was smooth and non-problematic. I would definitely recommend you to stay in his place.
Leandro is very communicable and flexible. The apartment had everything we needed and was quite comfortable.
Ótimo custo benefício.  Localização boa,  bem perto de duas estações de metrô, permitindo acesso fácil tanto às praias quanto ao centro.

Predio seguro, ap de fundos sem barulho. Cama, travesseiros e toalhas de primeira linha, tudo muito confortavel. 5 min a pe do metro. Comunicacao com o anfitriao rapida e clara. Voltarei a me hospedar no ap do Leandro certamente
Comunicar com o Leandro é muito fácil e rápido... O flat é bem localizado, próximo a estação do metro do catete. Está foi a segunda vez que me hospedei no flat; recomendo.

Leandro's place is great! The location is amazing, you are so close to many places, and to the tube! It is a very small but good place to sleep. I loved the bed linen! The bed is amazingly comfortable and the shower is good! It is just a place to sleep, as it is small. But you will have a good night of sleep in a good location of the city! I recommend!
amei ficar no ap do Leandro. é como nas fotos, pequeno, mas pra mim foi o ideal. bairro muito bom com restaurantes próximos. bem perto da praia. quero voltar logo.

Para quem conhecer o Rio o apartamento para duas pessoa é ótimo. Pequenino, mas num prédio ótimo, local fantástico, junto ao metrô e ônibus, Parque do Flamengo e Palácio do Catete. Leandro é um anfitrião perfeito, pontual e preciso. Nada nos faltou.
O Leandro foi sempre muito atencioso, o local é ótimo, pertinho de tudo. Meu esposo e eu só andávamos a pé! Super recomendo! Próxima ida ao RJ certeza que nos hospedaremos com o Leandro.

Ameiiiii o lugar!!!!
Pertinho de tudo, o apê é super limpinho e organizado para a chegada do hóspede e o Leandro é um fofo, mega atencioso.
Super recomendo e quando voltar ao RJ irei alugar novamente.
O espaço é bem limpo e seguro! Tem vários itens de praticidade: frigobar, pia, fogão de duas bocas e cama de casal. Banheiro bom, ducha quente, enfim! Pequeno e pratico! Adorei!
Ótimo  lugar, vizinhos  super simpáticos e o  Leonardo  é  bem atencioso.

O apartamento é  bem funcional.  Pequeno mas possui tudo que precisamos.  Tudo muito limpo. Banheiro super limpo, roupas de cama e  toalhas limpas e bem cheirosas(isso para mim é  um diferencial) possui restaurante  perto,  fácil  acesso a praia,  bem localizado. Eu recomendo!!!  Voltarei em breve!!!

El apartamento es pequeño pero confortable, la cama es fabulosa, la Cocina tiene utensilios basicos para preparar cosas rapidas, la ubicacion es excelente ya que esta muy cerca a dos estaciones del metro, El edificio es tranquilo los porteros son muy amables y a pesar de que no hablan Español hicieron lo possible para ayudarnos

Para aqueles que desejam ficar no RJ a localização é sensacional. Tudo perto: supermercados, restaurantes e metrô. O anfitrião  concede uma atenção especial. O prédio é residencial, silencioso e o ar condicionado muito bom. Recomendo.
Ótima localização, Flat fiel as fotos e o Leandro é um excelente anfitrião, atencioso e esteve sempre disponível. Voltaria agora mesmo rs
Localização muito boa.
Excelente localização! Local tranquilo e aconchegante! Recomendo!
Ótima localização, apartamento idêntico ao descrito. Leandro é uma pessoa muito gentil e auxiliou em tudo o que tive dúvidas.

name: Private apartment, small and comfortable.
summary: We are close to the International Airport of Rio de Janeiro, with easy transport access and in a safe neighborhood, close to bars, markets, pharmacies and etc. The lease is for the whole apartment, it will make you feel more at home.
space: Small but cozy room, tailor-made for a great stay in Rio de Janeiro.
description: We are close to the International Airport of Rio de Janeiro, with easy transport access and in a safe neighborhood, close to bars, markets, pharmacies and etc. The lease is for the whole apartment, it will make you feel more at home. Small but cozy room, tailor-made for a great stay in Rio de Janeiro. Apartment and garage. I will be available to help guests learn more about Rio de Janeiro, if you have the time, I can indicate how to take some tours. The Jardim Guanabara district has the third highest HDI (Human development index) in Rio de Janeiro, the apartment is on the flat and 50 metres from Bica beach, which although unsuitable for bathing, is a meeting point for sports and friends, because it has many cool bars. There is a bus stop in front of the apartment, and if guests want, I can rent a vehicle with more affordable price, or make a trip, depending on availability.  To access other districts, there are three alternatives: buses, BRT and ferries to the city centre. Including a
neighborhood_overview: The Jardim Guanabara district has the third highest HDI (Human development index) in Rio de Janeiro, the apartment is on the flat and 50 metres from Bica beach, which although unsuitable for bathing, is a meeting point for sports and friends, because it has many cool bars.
notes: Negatives of the apartment:  Is not adapted for wheelchair users. The building has no elevator, but the apartment is on the 1st floor. The apartment faces a busy street, very close to bus stops, shops and etc, but the apartment does not offer absolute silence, nothing to disrupt a good night's sleep for those who are not very sensitive to noise.
transit: There is a bus stop in front of the apartment, and if guests want, I can rent a vehicle with more affordable price, or make a trip, depending on availability.  To access other districts, there are three alternatives: buses, BRT and ferries to the city centre. Including a recommendation to take the passenger ferry at least once, because guests can see Rio de Janeiro from another angle.
access: Apartment and garage.
interaction: I will be available to help guests learn more about Rio de Janeiro, if you have the time, I can indicate how to take some tours.
house_rules: * ATIVIDADES ILEGAIS: Não é permitido uso de drogas ilegais no apartamento. * NÃO AUTORIZADO: Não é permitido trazer outras pessoas para o apartamento. * CONDUTA INQUILINO: Silêncio depois de 10 horas da noite. Após esse horário, rádio e aparelho de som pode ser usado em um nível que não possa ser ouvido fora do apartamento. * DANOS MATERIAIS: Danos causados pelo comportamento de um hóspede será reparado a custo do próprio. * CHAVES E ACESSO AO APARTAMENTO: Encontraremos o hóspede no apartamento no momento do check-in para entrega das chaves. É de responsabilidade do hóspede devolvê-las no check-out. *TAXA DE PAGAMENTO SOBRE USO DA GARAGEM: Não será cobrado. *A TAXA DE LIMPEZA cobrada por período não cobre o custo de uma diarista, portanto manter o apartamento limpo é de extrema importância para você e os futuros hospedes.  *É IMPORTANTE que você se sinta em casa, sendo assim zele pelo imóvel como se estivesse no seu. *NÃO DEIXE EM NENHUMA HIPÓTESE, líquidos, óleos e outras substâncias
