reviews.comments:
A minha estadia foi a melhor possível. Recomendo muito a escolha. Ambiente aconchegante e perfumado, de muito bom gosto, bem equipado. Bairro e prédio familiar, de fácil chegada, próximo ao aeroporto internacional, próximo a comércio e praia de lindo visual pra Baia de Guanabara. O anfitrião muito prestativo e solícito. Tudo de bom!!! 
Nos sentimos em casa.

Apartamento perfeito!!Leander foi muito educado,prestativo e pronto para ajudar em qualquer duvida.Fica proximo ao galeao taxi em torno de 28 reais!Bairro seguro,ap impecavel,tudo lindo e cheiroso!!Agora tenho a minha estadia toda vez que precisar ir ao RJ..

Leander me fez sentir em casa! Super dedicado e atencioso, deu-me suporte, dicas e orientações de locomoção, o que tornou minha estadia perfeita! Apartamento lindo, de muito bom gosto, super limpo e bem equipado. Indico a todos q forem ao Rio de Janeiro. Por causa do zelo de Leander, mais a beleza, elegância e tranquilidade do bairro retornarei em breve ao Rio! Nota 10!!!
Foi excelente a minha estada, sem surpresas, tudo igual ou melhor ao descrito e às (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaria a ficar no local se estiver disponível.

Foi maravilhosa a minha estadia, embora por pouco tempo. Fui muito bem recebida pelos anfitriões, muito atenciosos e solícitos. O ambiente impecávelmente limpo, confortável com tudo o que se precisa. Perto do aeroporto, que traz muita comodidade, bairro agradável.Adorei e recomendo a todos!!!!

A estada no Rio de Janeiro se tornou melhor por conta da presteza do Leander e Nathalia (sua esposa). Desde quando reservei o apartamento, dois meses antes já nos comunicávamos e ele sempre atencioso e prestativo. Fui com meu pai e tínhamos dicas de tudo dadas por ele. A descrição do apartamento é perfeita, local bem tranquilo, confortável, com todo suporte para fazer comida, tudo pertinho, inclusive a praia da bica, pra quem quiser correr, fazer caminhada pegando aquela brisa, além de quiosques legais pra sair à noite. Passam vários ônibus para diversas áreas do Rio quase em frente ao apartamento. O bairro é bem tranquilo, nos sentimos muito seguros, a região da Ilha do Governador é bem militarizada por conta das bases da aeronáutica e marinha que ali estão. Enfim... super recomendada a acomodação no apartamento do Leander.

Queremos parabenizar os anfitriões,  pela atenção, zelo e carinho conosco.
O apartamento é maravilhoso,  aconchegante,   impecável em tudo,  transporte público fácil.
Enfim realmente sentimo-nos em casa, queremos voltar em breve.
Very nice and clean apartment. Hosts were very friendly and helpful, even picked us up from the airport. We would stay with them again.

Tudo que foi prometido foi cumprido... O anfitrião estremamente atencioso, deixou tanto eu quando minha família muito avontade, indico muito fica na ilha do governador, pois o bairro é super tranquilo, lugares ótimos, tenho certeza de quando voltar ao RIO quero focar na apartamento do LEANDER... Muito obrigado pela experiência...

Achei a estadia excelente. Eu precisava pegar um voo no dia posterior no Galeão e achei super cômodo encontrar um lugar legal pra ficar que fosse perto do aeroporto. Mas além de um excelente apartamento, o Leander é um excelente anfitrião. Desde o princípio foi bastante comunicativo, respondia rápido às minhas mensagens, mostrava interesse em ajudar e inclusive foi quem me pegou no aeroporto e me levou no outro dia novamente. Como se não bastasse, quando cheguei no apto no primeiro dia, fui recebido com uma jarra de suco de uva e pães com manteiga: uma forma sutil de boas vindas. Obrigado, Leander. Parabéns pelo flat e pelo seu atendimento. Voltarei com certeza em outro ensejo.

Quem ficou no apartamento foram os meus pais, que não deixaram de elogiar muito a limpeza e o conforto do apartamento e a atenção/cuidados que receberam do anfitrião Leander. O apartamento é pequeno mais muito bem arrumado e limpo, é muito aconchegante. Passa ônibus para todo o RJ na porta, tem padaria, farmácia e tudo que precisa perto. RECOMENDO e com certeza voltaremos!

Nathalia is a very social, charming and perfect host! She welcomed us very generousely and we were able to ask her for infos about our stay. The appartment is very clean and tidy, cozy and perfectly equipped with everything you need. We enyojed our stay and recommend her to everyone! We wish her good luck for the future!

Atendimento perfeito, Leander super prestativo, nos ajudou em tudo e esteve à disposição o tempo todo.
O apartamento não é grande mas super bem planejado e completo, fomos em 4 pessoas e não tivemos problemas com espaço.
Guia com pontos turísticos e tudo que havia por perto, mercado, padaria e outras atrações.
Bairro seguro e tranquilo. 
Vale muito a pena

Leander foi muito gentil e atencioso. Nos deu muitas e valiosas informações e estava sempre disposto a ajudar, muito flexível. O apartamento é super limpo e organizado e tem ótima localização com facilidade de transporte (parada de ônibus em frente). Recomendamos fortemente!

Leander foi muito gentil e atencioso. Nos deu muitas e valiosas informações e estava sempre disposto a ajudar, muito flexível. O apartamento é super limpo e organizado e tem ótima localização com facilidade de transporte (parada de ônibus em frente). Recomendamos fortemente!

Os comentários ao Leander e a Natália realmente não são de graça. Eles são incríveis! Pessoas extremamente prestativas, educadas e gentis! O apto deles é super confortável, bem decorado, moderno e equipado! Tudo muito limpo e cheiroso! Super indico o lugar! Gostaríamos de ter passado mais tempo, mas foi só uma noite para pegarmos outro avião no dia seguinte. Agradeço o acolhimento, a boa vontade de nos dar carona e o lanche que nos deixaram de cortesia!
Estadia maravilhosa, 5 estrelas em tudo e ele ainda se preocupa com a gente a todos os instantes

Nossa passagem pelo Rio foi super rápida. Chegamos as 7 da noite e outro dia as 5 da manhã já estaríamos indo embora para uma outra viagem.
O Leander quem nos buscou no aeroporto e levou nós até o apartamento. Aproveitou e também deu dicas para sair para jantar, mostrou alguns pontos para passear e depois mostrou o apartamento.
Apartamento essencial para nossa estadia. Tudo muito organizado, limpo e com tudo que precisamos(wifi, TV, shampoo e sabonete, toalhas) e alguns mimos(suco, pão fresquinho com manteiga, água).

Ótima localização(nem 5 minutos andando até a orla da praia, quiosques, bares e restaurantes)

No geral: buscaram nós no aeroporto(nota 10), fomos muito bem recepcionados e tratado com educação, apartamento muito bem localizado, limpo e com tudo que precisamos.

Voltaremos com certeza em breve!

Anfitriões maravilhosos, o apartamento e perfeito tanto que retornamos para final das paraolimpiadas. 
Super recomendamos a locação.

Excelente anfitrião , pessoa super simpática e prestativo ao máximo . Seu apartamento é confortável e bem localizado .
Adorei ficar em seu apartamento e super indico

Apartamento impecável,  fácil transporte, próximo ao comércios,  ao pé da orla com vista linda.
Os anfitriões são atenciosos e sempre prontos a ajudar. Gostamos muito de tudo.
Recomendo a locacao, pois é maravilhosa em todos os quesitos.

La estadía no pudo ser más perfecta! Leander nos esperó en el aeropuerto (cortesía pura!) mientras nos llevaba al apartamento,  nos indicó lugares para comprar comida, farmacia, etc. Llegamos al apartamento,  bien limpio, super práctico, muyyy lindo.  Luego leander nos ayudó  con la subida en el   bus correcto, para ir a la rodoviaria.Superó nuestras expectativas. Super recomendable!!!

Leander fue muy atento en todo momento. El departamento es pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario y más también. 
Lo recomiendo. Es una muy buena opción para quienes llegan de noche a Río por la cercanía del aeropuerto y la seguridad de la zona.

Leander e Natália são nota mil , eles são maravilhosos !!Foram impecáveis como anfitriões, extremamente atenciosos, prestativos, gente boa e muitíssimo preocupados em nos auxiliar para termos uma excelente hospedagem. Super recomendo me senti em casa e muito querida ao chegar e ser recebida com um café de "boas vindas", o apto é lindo, limpo, tudo arrumadinho, novo e equipado com tudo o que nos precisávamos para tornar a sua estadia super confortável. Amei e volto lá com certeza porque os anfitriões são nota mil, o apto nota mil e o local nota mil pertinho de tudo. Obrigada por tudo e até a próxima Beijoss

Excelente!! Leander se encargó de atendernos de la mejor manera, nos recogió del aeropuerto aunque llegamos pasada la medianoche, se preocupo por el más mínimo detalle y su atención... Mejor  imposible!!

Excelente. Passamos apenas uma noite, mas o apartamento é ótimo e tem boa estrutura. Por ser muito perto do aeroporto e da rua, tem algum barulho. Nada que incomode muito. Os mais sensíveis podem usar um tapa ouvidos e ficarão bem. 

O Leander foi um ótimo anfitrião, nos pegou no aeroporto e nos explicou tudo sobre o bairro e sobre o apartamento. Atencioso e prestativo. Certamente voltaremos a nos hospedar em seu apartamento. Excelente opção.

Foi tudo perfeito!! Leander foi extremamente atencioso, se certificou diversas vezes se estávamos bem! O apartamento é uma graça e tem tudo que precisavamos! Para nós a localização do apartamento foi perfeita! Do lado da praia, mercado atravessando a rua, próximo do aeroporto! Com ctz quando voltarmos ao RJ ficaremos no mesmo apartamento!
Obrigada Leander pela estadia e atenção! Até breve

Leander nos buscou e nos levou no aeroporto. A casa estava em perfeitas condições. Ficamos em 4 pessoas lá e para passar 1 dia foi super tranquilo. Perto tem vários lugares legais para comer.
Muito obrigado (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos. Grande abraço.

Everything was perfect :)

Nathalia, Leanders wife showed me everything because Leander had to work that evening. She is a very friendly and sympathic women and took care that i had a good stay. 

Everything was clean and lovely prepared at the flat :)

It was just a short stay because i had to take my flight early in the morning but it was great to meet Nathalia and have contact with Leander :)

Wish you both the best for the future and stay the lovely hosts i had to pleasure to met :)

Fomos por 2 dias para a Ilha do Governador para um casamento. O apartamento do Leander tinha tudo que precisamos! Tivemos uma ótima recepção com direito a lanchinho e suco geladinho... Muito capricho e atenção e em todo tempo, e uma ótima comunicação para tirar nossas dúvidas...Muito bem decorado e organizado...Ótima localização, dá pra ir dar uma volta a pé pela avenida da praia da Bica... Superou nossas expectativas! Recomendo com certeza!

Pela segunda vez utilizo o local para me hospedar. Diferente da primeira vez, agora pude realmente curtir o espaço e os passeios da cidade.

Fui bem recepcionado pelo Leander e durante toda a estadia sempre se preocupou em perguntar se estávamos bem, dava dicas de passeios, me ajudou a me locomover pela cidade, se dispôs a me ajudar no Reveillon, etc.

Tanto ele quanto sua esposa, são ótimos anfitriões.

O apartamento está próximo da orla, na praia da Bica. Tem diversos locais para comer, beber e até curtir música ao vivo.
Está distante em uns 10 minutos do Aeroporto Galeão, fácil acesso e localização.

Leander and his wife were very kind and very gentle people. They pick up in the airport, they show the neighborhood and the places to eat. They have juice and bread for us. The apartment was small but very beautiful and with an excellent equipment.

Leander was an excellent host, very kind and available to answer questions and receive us in his place. The aprtment is very nice, completly equiped and vey confterable. Perfect if you are arriving or leaving from Galeao airport. Despite it is a bit fat from turistic places like copacabana, it was easy for us to take public transport to the place.

Leander y Natalie ficaron amable de mais con nos.
Pegaron hasta aeroporto pra levarnos a sua casa.El apto ė muito bonito y comodo.Nos recibieron com um sabroso pão de milho y suco de uva (minha enamorada e fan jejeje) 
Nos sentimos bemvidos de mais. gente muito cálida.
recomendamos muito a esta parelha.
Nos levaron hasta aeroporto a comprar tickets pra nosso proximo viajem hasta búzios.
muito agraciados con sua atenção.
asim queremos voltar pronto!!
obrigados de mais Leander y Natalie. Vicente fucou encantado con vocês.
muitos carinhos pra vocês.

Apartamento bastante confortável. A localização atendeu muito bem à nossa necessidade, que foi um casamento na Ilha do Gorvernador. Anfitriões muito educados e receptivos. Comunicação fluiu muito bem desde o momento da reserva até o check out. Recomendo!

Apartamento excelente! Super confortável e bem equipado. Localização muito boa. Perto de uma praça com quiosque e brinquedos pras crianças. Mesmo sendo de frente pra rua, é bastante silencioso.
A única ressalva que faço é que pra quem vai com bebê tem que ficar o tempo todo de olho, por conta das tomadas e coisas quebráveis ao alcance. Fato que é bastante compreensível, visto que os donos não tem filhos.

This might be one of my favorite Airbnb experiences.   Leander and Nathalia were so sweet and helpful.   Their home was clean and comfortable.   The neighborhood is super cute and safe.   They even gave us a ride to the airport in the morning.

Pasar un tiempo en el super agradable apartamento de Leander fue una de las más lindas experiencias de viaje que mi esposa y yo tuvimos ! Lo acogedor del ambiente,  la zona tan agradable (un barrio precioso, cerca de playas, paseos, restaurantes y demás comercios y a pocos minutos del corazón de Rio de Janeiro!) Leander fue un anfitrión de lujo! Nos recibió en el aeropuerto, nos llevó hasta el apartamento y allí nos esperaba un riquísimo pan de anís y otros comestibles y bebidas que Leander y su esposa dejaron con gran corazón para recibirnos. Siempre dispuesto en todo momento para ayudarnos durante nuestra estadía, nos envió un taxi que nos llevó al aeropuerto, al momento de, no sin tristeza, tener que dejar tan agradable estadía. Sin dudarlo un instante, aconsejaríamos a nuestros amigos la estadía en lo de Leander al viajar a Rio, y nosotros no podemos esperar a volver ! Obrigados amigo!

Muchas gracias por todo!!!!, Leander y su esposa fueron muy atentos y nos asistieron en todo, solo fue una noche que nos hospedamos, pero resultó todo 10 puntos, el departamento limpio y muy acogedor, muchas gracias por todo!!!!!!!

Passando só para agradecer a hospitalidade, o Leander não se encontrava, mas deixou seu irmão Lander que foi muito gentil em nos buscar no aeroporto junto com sua mãe, os dois foram fofos super atenciosos e fizeram o checkin conosco. Sempre me mandando msg e perguntando se estava tudo em ordem. O apto do mesmo jeito da foto, tudo uma graça. Amei e com certeza voltarei mais vezes. Obrigada!!
Muito bom , e com plus , indo buscar no aeroporto , deixado suco e pão uma diferença muito grande no atendimento , além da simpatia do casal.Obrigado
Apartamento super aconchegante. Os anfitriões nos acolheram e  deixaram bem a vontade!

Todo fue excelente! Leander y su señora nos brindaron todo lo alcance a sus manos y más también. Nos buscaron en el aeropuerto, nos ayudaron siempre.
El departamento impecable, tal cual se aprecia en las fotos, y nos dejaron una hermosa atención para el desayuno. 
Solo fuimos por una noche, pero nos hubiéramos quedado más días por la comodidad, limpieza, orden y lo confortable del lugar.
Nos indicó lugares cerca para cenar, el barrio nos pareció seguro y lindo
Sin dudas volveríamos, estaremos siempre agradecidos por su amabilidad.
Leander y Natalia excelentes anfitriones muchísimas gracias

It was just a stop over between flights at Galeão, but Leander was super helpful and made everything easy to us. Even picked us up from the airport and booked a taxi to take us back early on the next morning. All much appreciated!

Leander foi super atencioso conosco.
Eficiente em suas respostas, e super bacana de lidar.
Certamente em nossa próxima viagem à negócios vamos considerar ficar em seu apartamento.
Local próximo ao Galeão, nos sentimos seguros no local, e gostamos bastante da infra do apartamento.
Obrigada Leander, foi um prazer e até a próxima! =)
Um abraço.
Boa localização e acomodação!
Boa acomodação e boa localização!!

This is a really neat, modern flat. It suited my needs perfectly because my daughter was attending dance school on Ilha Governador. Trips into Rio were easily organised and Leander is the perfect host, offering help and advice and even collecting us from the airport. The proximity to the airport is also a bonus if onward or internal air travel is part of your plan, as it was ours. 
The facilities locally are great, and although you will not be in the centre of the legendary city of Rio, you will find another side of Rio that has its own charms.
Simplesmente me senti em casa. Acolhedor!!!!

São anfitriões como o Lander que me fazem ser fiel ao Airbnb. Além de um apartamento excelente e extremamente aconchegante, o Lander e sua esposa foram super gentis com a gente, estavam super dispostos a responder nossas mensagens e ainda deram dicas bem legais sobre as redondezas. Apê bem localizado e com um preço muito bom. Recomendo! ;)
Leander é muito solícito é dedicado em ajudar, orientar e apoiar! Recomendo muito o apartamento...ah obrigada pelo suco e o delicioso pão!!!
Com certeza voltarei. Superou minhas expectativas !!!!

Ich fühlte mich sehr wohl in der Wohnung. Leander und seine Frau waren wie immer sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Ich möchte immer wieder kommen, weil sie sehr nett sind und immer bereit waren, egal welche Anregung die ich hatte.. waren sie immer da.
O apto é muito aconchegante, limpo, bem decorado e próximo a tudo! O Leander e a Natália são ótimos . São Atenciosos e cuidadosos. 100% Recomendado!  Cá e Jú

Fui com meu namorado e adoramos a estadia. Fomos bem recepcionados, a casa estava impecável, tudo muito confortável. A localização para nós era importante porque tínhamos voo cedo no outro dia, então estar perto do aeroporto foi ótimo, pois não pegamos trânsito. Também achamos muito seguro e tranquilo pra passear. A praia é bem perto, mas não dá pra entrar na água. Fizemos uma caminhada no fim do dia que foi bem agradável, e já conhecemos varios quiosques pra comer/beber depois, tudo pertinho. Conhecemos o irmão do Leander e sua mãe, que também foram muito atenciosos conosco. Recomendo!
super limpo! São atenciosos . Adoro sempre voltarei ...
Excelente localização e ótimas instalações.

Meu marido e meu filho foram e simplesmente amaram. Um lugar limpo, bem organizado e com uma boa localização. Leander os recebeu muito bem no check in, sempre muito atencioso e receptível. Pode ter certeza que foi uma ótima estadia e que eles ficaram muito satisfeitos.
Very stylish apartment only steps away from the seafront and 10 mins by car from the international airport. Leander and his brother went out of their way to accommodate my short stay. Recommended !

All though we only stayed there for a night, Leander's place is amazing. It is a very modern and comfortable space. Our flight was delayed and we got there at 10 pm and Leander had no problem to wait for us and show us his apartment. It has a beach very near and the airport is about 10-15 minutes away by car. Thanks Leander! I totally recommended it.

Otima localizacao e ambiente muito limpo e organizado, alem do preco ser em conta. 
Leander 'e muito atencioso e certamente me hospedarei qnd voltar ao rio.
Excelente ubicación cerca de aeropuerto y la limpieza inmejorable. Los anfitriones del uno.
Eu estou super satisfeita com a minha estadia no apartamento de Leander e de sua esposa! São muito simpáticos. Retornarei em April novamente ...
One of the best airbnb hosts I ever met
Leander is quick to respond, and was very hospitable as our flight was arriving in the evening, he kept up to make sure we were comfortable!
Ótima estadia. Recomendo!

Acomodação aconchegante, confortável, bem localizado, próximo de diversos restaurantes, lanchonetes, bares, praia, facil acesso aos diversos locais da cidade etc. Recomendo, excelente serviço prestado.
ótimo apartamento. recomendado
Lugar incrivel, muito bem localizado e casal de proprietarios sensacional
Es un departamento lleno de detalles y muy cómodo.

Ótima comunicação, eles sempre respondem em poucos minutos e são muito atenciosos.
Também achei que foram bem flexíveis em questão de horários.
A descrição do anúncio está muito precisa e descreve claramente os pontos negativos,
então eu já sabia o que esperar antes de sair de casa.

Leander's place is super conveniently located to the Rio GIG airport, and close by to the waterfront too, which makes for a nice morning walk. It was super clean, both Leander and his wife spoke very good English and were able to answer my questions and were responsive. They left bread, butter and water in the fridge which was much appreciated as I arrived late at night and wasn't able to buy anything. The flat is modern and comfortable and very well designed.
Esse lugar e muito bom!!!!
Leander’s place it’s amazing great hospitality, the apartment it’s beautiful and spacious excellent WiFi!!!

Un departamento muy acogedor, pequeño,  pero muy  bien distribuido, nos sentimos muy cómodos, aunque estuvimos solo un rato  ya que teniamos que tomar  nuestro vuelo de regreso, muy cerca del Aeropuerto,  una pareja muy preocupada de hacernos sentir comodos, muy buena opción de todas maneras.
Ótimo espaço na Ilha do Governador. Apartamento muito limpo e bem cuidado.
Excelente recepção e comodidade. Check-in e check-out céleres, sem atrasos para quem aluga não perder compromissos. Respostas rápidas. Sem incômodos para quem aluga.

Agradeço ao Leander e sua esposa, por nos receberem muito bem ao chegar no apartamento. Ficamos bastante felizes em encontrar tudo que precisávamos na estadia, além de conforto e aconchego. A localização também contribuiu bastante, pois estávamos em escala no Galeão, e precisávamos descansar. Recomendo!

El departamento de Leander es ideal. Está en una linda zona. Parece muy residencial. Estuvimos solo una noche, es muy cercano al aeropuerto, muy cómodo en ese sentido. El departamento hermoso y tal cual como se presenta en las fotos! Sin duda volvería si estuviese en Rio nuevamente
Excelente acomodação, fácil acesso, aconchegante e etc , muito bom

Ótima localização, próximo a bares e restaurantes, muito tranquila para se caminhar até mesmo a noite. Para quem utilizará o aeroporto do galeão é ainda mais vantajoso pois fica bem próximo. O anfitrião Leander muito pró ativo e pontual, nos deu ótimas indicações e referências facilitando muito nossa estada. O apartamento é muito limpo e tem uma decoração de muito bom gosto. Em nossa próxima passagem pelo rio com certeza voltaremos.
Atencioso, local próximo das principais necessidades, condução, alimentação e comercio.

The apartment is cozy and comfortable. The location is really close (walking distance) to Bica's Beach where is nice to walk around and have a good meal.

Leander has been super responsive and nice to any inquiry I had. The quickly followed up on anything was necessary.
la casa e perffeta , stato proprio bello , torno presto , mi piaciuto tanttissimo .

Très jolie appartement, cosy et douillet.
Petite attention touchante à notre arriver. 
je recommande l’appartement pour ceux qui veulent être proche de l’aéroport tout en voulant du confort !
um ótimo anfitrião, localização excelente e acomodações de ótima qualidade.
Nice guy I rented from before, and did come back now and have zero regrets. Good place  if you know Ilha de Governador.
Excelente localização, apartamento super limpo e confortável!
maravilhoso E organizado.

Apartamento familiar muy acogedor y en una zona cercana al aeropuerto Galeao. Acogedor, limpio, bonita decoración y muy práctico. Recomendado, muy recomendado. Leander y Nathalie excelentes anfitriones, hospitalarios y muy pendientes a nuestra llegada. Muchas gracias
Otimo hospede. O apartamento é lindo. Localização show.

Well organized and safe place. A cozy environment that made us feel like home in Rio. The building is a bit old, but had everything we needed. The host Leander was extremely gentle with us all of the time. A great cost-benefit option at Ilha do Governador.

O espaco do Leander, é realmente muito Bom, chega ser melhor que nås fotos, a prestatividade,  rapidez nas respostas, organizacao e ciudado com o local é visivel!!
sem falar num suco e um paozinho na hora que chegamos!!
Nice staying ,location very nice !!!Leander and his wife nice people!!!

O apartamento é bem lindinho e muito funcional, tem todos os equipamentos elétricos necessários. A região é tranquila, fica bem perto da praia e tem tudo perto. Na orla tem bastante quiosque com música e todo tipo de comida. Além disso, o Leander e a sua esposa são muito solícitos e cuidadosos. Estão de parabéns.
Foi ótimo nossa hospedagem,  confortável, muito limpo, bem localizado e os anfitriões são muito atenciosos e cuidadosos com tudo. Parabéns! Abraços

Um dos BNBs mais limpos que já ficamos, se não o mais limpo! Foi super prático de chegar do aeroporto e o que a gente precisava: somente dormir para pegar um voô no dia seguinte. O Leander e a esposa dele foram super queridos e acessiveis. O apartamento é lindo, cheio de detalhes e com tudo que precisamos. Apenas ouve-se o tráfego na rua um pouco mais alto do que o normal, talvez uma pessoa com sono sensivel teria problemas. Fora isso, incrível.

Natalie and Leander are very friendly and helpful. We were robbed at Copacobana and  their help in the situation can't be overestimated. Our flight to Iguazu was seriously endangered but they came late evening and drove us to an airport. After return from Iguazu Natalie was waiting for us at the airport. Their apartment is very comfortable and shining clean.
Otimo apartamento! Muito bem localizado! Perfeito em todos os detalhes. Atendimento e respostas rápidas. Pãozinho e suco na recepção. Super recomendo.
Ótima localização. Ambiente limpo,aconchegante e seguro. Os anfitriões são de extrema gentileza e cordialidade. Pronta resposta. Adorei ... tanto que vou repetir a dose ... extremamente satisfeita
Excelente anfitrião, fácil comunicaçã, localidade boa e com diversas opções. Local higiênico e muito aconchegante
Ótimo apartamento, tudo bem novinho, limpo e arrumado. Leander é um excelente anfitrião, sempre muito atencioso. Localização excelente em bairro nobre e tranquilo. Garagem espaçosa.
Ótima escolha.
The place was perfect, all amenities include, easy public transportation to Rio Janeiro center.

o espaço do Leander e simplesmente sensacional. muito limpo , muito organizado. tudo funcionando perfeitamente além disso pãozinho e suco pronto na hora que cheguei. o Leander e o irmão dele são muito atenciosos. estão sempre disponíveis .
Gente boa! E o apertamento e muito bom, bom lugar. Terceira vez eu fui com minha familia

Tudo otimo. O espaço muito bem decorado, limpo e bem localizado.
Os anfitriões foram gentis, disponiveis e cuidadosos.
Voltaremos outras vezes.
Obrigado por tudo.

Gostamos imenso do apartamento do Leander, muito limpo e aconchegante!
Está bem localizado um bairro muito bom e o casal é muito atencioso 
Recomendo para os próximos hóspedes
Concerteza vão gostar.
Um apartamento modelo, o anfitrião organizou tudo nos mínimos detalhes. Muito organizado e alto nível

Excelente Apartamento!!
Além de ótima organização e limpeza.
É muita Hospitalidade, com certeza um dos melhores lugares que já me hospedei

L'appartement est situé dans un bon quartier très accessible de l'aéroport (un bus juste devant la maison peut vous y emmener en 30 min!). L'appartement est très mignon, moderne, parfaitement propre et très bien équipé. Il est dans une résidence sécurisée à 2 pas d'une promenade en bord de mer. Léander et son épouse sont d'une serviabilité exceptionnelle. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié leur aide pour arriver à l'appartement. C'était parfait! un grand merci encore!
Excelente estadia. Fomos bem recebidos e adoramos o local. Próximo ao aeroporto e seguro.
recomendo,
Ottimo che dire
Hospedagem nota 10, tudo excelente! Leander e a esposa nos receberam muito bem e o apto é de muito bom gosto.

Apartamento bem localizado próximo à Praia da Bica, na Ilha do Governador. Decoração bonita, apartamento bem limpo e bem localizado com comércio nas proximidades. Destaca-se também a proximidade do Aeroporto.
Leander foi muito prestativo durante toda estadia, inclusive, quando precisei abreviar minha estadia por conta de um problema de saúde. Super recomendado.
Hermoso departamento , con muchos detalles. Muy atento Leander, nos esperó alli con aire el acondicionado, al llegar estaba todo muy bien. Gracias
El Departamento de Leander cuenta con todo lo q necesitas para pasar unos dias tranquilos en Rio, el barrio es muy tranquilo.
Apto limpo e aconchegante. Bem localizado e local seguro.

Excelente localização. 
O Leander foi muito atencioso e muito gentil. 
O apartamento estava muito limpo e organizado.
Perto da praia, uma ótima experiência.

Everything about my experience at this lovely apartment was amazing! From the warm welcome when we arrived, to the fresh lemonade and bread, to the plentiful amenities and super clean and well decorated home, to the ideal location: near the beach, airport and great places to eat- my first trip to Brasil was made even more perfect thanks to Leander and his wife being amazing hosts and providing an awesome (and affordable) apartment!
Muito bom. Casal simpático e apartamento limpo e moderno.
Local limpo, confortável e aconchegante. Localização ótima e tranquila!

Hermoso departamento, edificio antiguo, depto remodelado, moderno, lo recibimos en óptimas condiciones y Alexander fue un excelente host. Nos recibió en el lobby del edificio y nos mostró el depto. Muy amable y la comunicación muy bien también. Definitivamente volvería! Ubicado a 5' del aeropuerto Galeao. Ideal!

Reservei a acomodação para una familiar mt querida. Leander foi rápido e assertivo em suas respostas. A gentileza dele não passou em branco. A acomodação é limpa, bem localizada e cuidadosamente decorada. Um local para regressar e indicar aos amigos.
Todo excelente
O anfitrião nos recebeu muito bem e esteve 100% disponível para qualquer informação. Apartamento muito bem cuidado e localizado na Ilha do Governador. Recomendo!

name: Loft styled apartment /Terrace at Copacabana Beach
summary: It is located in the heart of Copacabana an area full of restaurants, coffee-shops, pubs, banks, pharmacies, gyms, etc. The closest metro (Ipanema). One Room with 2 beds (one queen size another double bed), 1 bath . 24-hour security with cameras. Just 2 blocks from Ipanema and one block from Copacabana beach.
space: The first floor offers a bright living-dinning room with two sofas, a dinning table a well appointed kitchen with breakfast area and one half bath. Upstairs it has a bedroom with a queen sized bed and another bed for two and a bathroom.

One Room with 2 beds (one queen size another double bed), 1 bath . 24-hour security with cameras. Just 2 blocks from Ipanema and one block from Copacabana beach. The first floor offers a bright living-dinning room with two sofas, a dinning table a well appointed kitchen with breakfast area and one half bath. Upstairs it has a bedroom with a queen sized bed and another bed for two and a bathroom. A excellent location for you to enjoy the city. We have a supermarket 10 meters from the apartment. There is also the laundry room, with free usage washing machines. notes: USD $400 cash Guarantee Deposit required on arrival, taken by Airbnb There are a staircase with no kids protection so the apartment is NOT SAFE FOR CHILDREN ages 1to 4.  No party type apartment. If you need to smoke, use only the terrace.  Come and enjoy my place!!
transit: Há uma estação de metrô a 300 metros (Ipanema), fora os pontos de ônibus é táxis que circulam pelo bairro.

host.host_about:
Olá,

Meu nome é Ricardo, trabalho como Consultor na área de Gestão Financeira. Gosto de sair pra comer, fotografar, estar com meus amigos e minha família.

Hi,
My name is Ricardo I'm a Finance Advisor. I like good restaurants, photography, my friends and my family.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ricardo's apartment is wonderful.  The patio helps you feel connected to the city, and is a scenic place to share a candlelight meal or drink.  To the right is the ocean and to the left is toward Ipanema beach.  The beds are cozy, the kitchen is stocked to cook in, the front room is a relaxing place to watch movies (or, in our case, Olympic highlights).  The neighborhood below has a grocery store, pharmacy, restaurants, juice bars, a gym, yoga...anything a traveler could need.  It is a 1 and a 1/2 block walk to Copacabana Beach and a short walk to Ipanema.  We could not have asked for a better place to stay, or for a kinder, more gracious host.  Ricardo helped us with Uber, shopping, bike rentals, getting money exchanged, what sites to see, and had some nice surprises upon our arrival.  Thank you, Ricardo.  We hope to entertain you when you visit California.

O Ricardo foi um excelente anfitrião, nos deixou muito a vontade em seu apto, nos recebendo muito bem, deixando toalhas e roupas de cama, indicações do que fazer no Rio durante as Olimpíadas, dicas de restaurantes, enfim tudo para o nosso bem estar. A experiência foi ótima desde a chegada até o dia de ir embora, ele sempre muito acessível quando solicitado. 
O apto é muito bem localizado, com fácil acesso ao metrô, praias de Copacabana e Ipanema, além de ótimos restaurantes. Recomendamos bastante o apto do Ricardo!!
Apartamento super bem localizado, super limpo, aconchegante, lindo e super bem equipado. Perfeito para quem procura uma estada no Rio de Janeiro.

C'était un vrai bonheur de passer ces quelques jours chez Ricardo! Tout était très bien :
La situation de l'appart, la belle terrasse, et surtout, le super accueil de Ricardo et sa bienveillance tout au long de notre séjour (conseil, assistance lorsqu'on avait des questions...), merci beaucoup pour tout!
En résumé, c'était parfait, je recommande sans hésitation!

name: 5 mins walk to Tai Wo MTR. Near CU
summary: 5 mins walk to Tai Wo MTR. Near CUHK and HKIED. - Convenient to Chinese University ( 5 mins walk + 7 mins train) - Close to HKIED, and Science Park also - Buses to Central, Mongkok, Kowloon Bay, Kowloon Tong, Kwun Tong etc. - Shops neraby
description: 5 mins walk to Tai Wo MTR. Near CUHK and HKIED. - Convenient to Chinese University ( 5 mins walk + 7 mins train) - Close to HKIED, and Science Park also - Buses to Central, Mongkok, Kowloon Bay, Kowloon Tong, Kwun Tong etc. - Shops neraby

name: Thriving city location, dining hub
summary: Step out of this 2 bed apartment into the thriving city suburb of Pyrmont. Short walk to the harbour side restaurant precinct and beautiful bay foreshore walks. Walk to Glebe, City Centre and local fine dining, bars, clubs and tourist destinations.
space: This apartment is perfectly located right in Darling Harbour, with the best Sydney has to offer all in a short walk. Restaurants, tourist destinations, nightclubs and event centres are all within a few minutes walk. Recently renovated, it provides an extremely comfortable 2 bedroom home to enjoy the delights of Sydney. With secure access, updated bathrooms, freshly painted, internal washer and dryer, basement parking, swimming pool, sauna and gym this apartment provides the conveniences of a top hotel.
description: Step out of this 2 bed apartment into the thriving city suburb of Pyrmont. Short walk to the harbour side restaurant precinct and beautiful bay foreshore walks. Walk to Glebe, City Centre and local fine dining, bars, clubs and tourist destinations. This apartment is perfectly located right in Darling Harbour, with the best Sydney has to offer all in a short walk. Restaurants, tourist destinations, nightclubs and event centres are all within a few minutes walk. Recently renovated, it provides an extremely comfortable 2 bedroom home to enjoy the delights of Sydney. With secure access, updated bathrooms, freshly painted, internal washer and dryer, basement parking, swimming pool, sauna and gym this apartment provides the conveniences of a top hotel. Guests will have access to the entire property. You'll have the full support of the team at MadeComfy, a Sydney company helping hosts provide the best quality stay even whilst they are away from their home. A team member will organise your arr
neighborhood_overview: Pyrmont is just 2km from the Centre of Sydney's business district, a leisurely stroll across Pyrmont Bridge and Cockle Bay.    The Jones Bay and Cockle Bay wharf restaurant precincts are within walking distance offering access to some of Sydney's best restaurants and nightclubs, including Flying Fish, Pontoon and Home, while event centres such as Doltone House and Dockside are nearby. Also located in walking distance are The Star casino, Sydney Fish Markets and IMAX.   The Sydney Aquarium and Maritime Museum are both just over the bridge. Several lovely parks are also in the local area.
notes: There is construction going on in this building between the hours of 7am and 5pm. We have reduce the rates because of the potential for noise. Late check-out and early check-in is available where possible. When you arrive at the property you will find a kitchen and bathroom welcome pack with travel size amenities to ensure you do not need to head to the shops on your first day. We also provide top quality linen and towels. Cleaning services are available during your stay at additional cost. Your host has chosen to use the services of MadeComfy to ensure your requirements are met. A MadeComfy concierge service is available to help you with transport, theatre tickets, food and grocery deliveries or any special requests.
transit: A Pyrmont location makes Sydney easy to get around. Walk to the City centre, Glebe, Fishmarkets, restaurants and Darling Harbour.  Or grab an Opal card and you can get around Sydney and it's surrounds easily, Central Station, light rail and Sydney's bus network all located within a few minutes walk. We highly recommend using ride sharing service Uber.  Check out the TripGo app for transport timetables.
access: Guests will have access to the entire property.
interaction: You'll have the full support of the team at MadeComfy, a Sydney company helping hosts provide the best quality stay even whilst they are away from their home. A team member will organise your arrival and will continue to provide any assistance during your stay.
house_rules: You are staying at a friendly and peaceful neighbourhood area. Your help in keeping noise to a minimum is much appreciated between 10pm-8am. Excessive noise such as amplified music, vocals will cause neighbours to complain to the Building Manager or Council Rangers or Police. This could lead to an on-the-spot AUD200 fine and/or eviction of the property. This can all happen very quickly so your cooperation is very much appreciated. Please treat our home with the same love and care you treat yours. We have the following house rules whilst you stay with us: 1. Please be mindful of sound levels after 10:00PM to avoid neighbour complaints. 2. If you break something please let us know to replace it. Please leave your beds unmade Kindly clean up your dishes and put them away In case you have rearranged furniture, please put it back to the original location We would highly appreciate if you could take out the trash Please ensure all appliances and lights are off and doors and windows are close

reviews.comments: Sabrinas place was very spacious, located conveniently and mostly well equipped. It was perfect for exploring the city since it's connected well to public transport and you could also take a walk into the cbd. The only downside is the missing Wifi (which I was unaware when booking) but I guess this will be fixed soon since they just recently renovated the apartment. The apartment was very clean (only the windows and mirrors not 100%- not so important) Communication with Sabrina was easy and pleasant. Would recommend to stay here, especially a larger group of people or a family!
Lovely accommodation and great location.

Location was convenient to CBD (short cab ride about $10 or nice walk across Darling Harbor Bridge 15 min walk if you stop to watch people and the sites).  Several restaurants are close by along with a larger Coles grocery market and liquor store right across the way.

Great communication from Sabrina about the location, features and checking in.  Sabrina reached out several times during the stay to confirm our stay was meeting our expectations.

Apartment was very comfortable, well appointed and supplied.
I stayed at Sabrina's house with my girlfriend, sister and brother-in-law. Her apartment was spacious, modern and in a great location! Would highly recommend to anybody.

Stayed at Sabrina's place for almost a week.  As I need to checked in early due to young kids, Sabrina was helpful in granting early check-in :) 
The place was neat and clean upon check-in. Initially there was only one heater and request to have extra heaters were met on the same day. Sabrina bought two new heaters and I am very thankful for that.  Another good thing that happened was the new wifi installed ;) 
Location wise is very good. Minutes walk to Darling Harbour and the Central Station Light Rail. Bus 389 is round the corner to take you to the Sydney CBD which is only one stop away. 
Generally we enjoyed Sabrina's place and will go back again.
Fantastic apartment with a great location, a very helpful host, and everything was provided. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

El apartamento es hermoso, es muy cómodo y amplio, tiene una decoración muy moderna. La ubicación es excelente, cercana a todos los puntos de interés de Sydney. Sabrina fue muy atenta y amable, y siempre estaba dispuesta a ayudarnos y brindarnos información para que nuestra estadía fuera inolvidable. Definitivamente volveríamos a alojarnos en este apartamento.

Great host, offered us with late check out, and late check in 1000pm, very professional, easy going and flexible, great location, 10mins to 20 mins walking distance to fish market, darling harbour, China town, with free parking onsite. Highly recommend and will be returned for our next trip to Sydney.

Sabrina was responsive to our questions and very helpful when we met; tea, coffee and milk had been made available on our arrival which was a really nice touch
We arrived by car and they have a private parking bay underneath the apartments which was invaluable and made things so easy 
This is a great location and the description of the apartment and amenities are very accurate and of high quality and we could not fault anything
When next in Sydney I will look to see if this apartment is available as a first choice

Location of apartment was fantastic. Walking distance to The Star, Fish Market and Darling Harbour. The apartment was also very organised and clean. Loved that there was ample sunlight that passed through the apartment. Parking space was a little tight. Recommend to get a smaller car if you intend to rent one. There are certain things to take note, response from host was not very prompt. Asked for late check out several times and only managed to receive a reply after 3 texts and emails. Parking garage was renovating the day I arrived but was not informed earlier and had to pay for parking several hours. Overall, a good experience.
Very welcome
Good location.
So close to harbor & city great place to stay!

The apartment is in the middle of everything in Sydney, full of dining and shopping options, close to transportation and excursion stops. We have small children and they very much enjoyed the area, as well as the apartment itself. The apartment is very clean, pleasant, and amenities for travellars are all ready to be used. Sabrina answered all of our questions promptly. Thanks so much!

Great, spacious and clean apartment in an awesome location. My only suggestion would be two sets of keys, as myself and my colleague with whom I was staying had different dinner plans and had to coordinate to meet up in the city somewhere so we could return home at the same time. Would stay again, thanks.

Excellent welcoming with clear instructions to secure a soft landing in a very clean apartment in a great location. All comfort and convenience, we did not lack of anything related to kitchen, bathrooms, laundry, ... as well as wifi, board games, "connected" TV ready for enjoyable moments spent inside.

This apartment is run (and owned?) by a management company. It clearly isn't actually anyone's home and has the clinical, impersonal feel of a hotel. But it's well equipped for a stay in the centre of Sydney and the location is very convenient for Darling Harbour. I never met the named host; I was 'checked in' (their words) by someone else who was clearly in a tearing hurry. Beforehand I was just told I would be met, I didn't know where this would be but I couldn't get into the building and had to wait outside in the street. 
There is no hairdryer or air conditioning (this will make it v hot in the height of summer) and the oven is complicated to work. The design of the building means the apartment overlooks and is overlooked by other apartments and there was some noise at night from neighbours as the units are close together. There is also traffic noise. We were only given one set of keys which was extremely inconvenient. On the plus side the apartment building has a small pool and gym.
Accoglienza buona.posizione ottima. Apt. Gradevolissimo
Very professional Airbnb host. Recommend!

Sabrina was a great host
Everything went well, apartment is very nice.
Lovely apartment, very central to everything, a great place to stay for a weekend away!
All was good, maybe a fan for hot days would have been nice, otherwise very comfy apartment in a good location.
Lovely clean spacious home close to Darling Harbour.  Great spot to explore the city from - thank you Sabrina
Great location to be in Darling Harbor. Very modern and exceptionally clean.
Very friendly and helpful.
Very good location and walking distance to CBD. parking space was a big plus for us
Central location close to Star City.  Tidy and spacious apartment.

This is a lovely place to stay. It's a very quick walk to darling harbour, either walk up the hill and across, or through the parking structure down the road and cross at the tram crossing and it takes about two or three minutes!
It was very comfortable, two full bathrooms, a full kitchen two bedrooms, could comfortably fit four people. Great area, close to grocery stores, restaurants, pubs, public transport!

This is a lovely apartment in a great area... lots of cute cafes & a great playground  (Pirrama Park) within 10 minutes walk.  Top recommendation is to get the ferry from Darling Harbour to Manly & you get to see the Opera House & Bridge from the water as well as a great day out!
Made Comfy - the company that manage this apartment - sorted the Internet within 24hrs when it went down. 
There is a major issue with this lovely apartment though!  The keys... 1 set provided with fob to enter lobby AND use lift. I didn't think having just one set would be an issue... but, for example, when my husband took our daughter to the swimming pool on the ground floor - I couldn't pop to the shops with the baby because they would need the fob to use the lift & I would need it to re-enter the building = trapped & logistics had to be discussed each time we wanted to do something separately.  We also had to pick the keys up from a random letter box several km away as we were arriving late (7.30pm).  Luckily we were hiring a car - not on public transport - so navigated our way around a strange city to 2 addresses... didn't realise this was the situation when I booked. 
I hope that they sort the key situation- they clearly listen to feedback as one of the reviews mentioned needing a fan and there are now 3 in the apartment which was brilliant!

I booked this place for my parents, aunty and uncle. They had a great time and loved the accommodation! They were even accommodated with early check-in to suit their flight arrival time. Thanks Sabrina!
Nice apartment in a good location, easy to go around central Sydney from here. Recommended!
So delightful to communicate with. Even had some laughs. The place is awesome. Up to date & contemporary with plenty of room to just relax. It's so close to everything.

Excellent experience.
Overall room was very clean, comfy and spacious.
It was an ideal location as we were working at the new Convention & Exhibition Centre in Darling Harbour
We will be back for sure!
Friendly team, great communication. Clean comfortable unit. Very noisy neighbours unfortunately.
Nice place, very comfortable and located just off darling harbour. Place was just as described.

We enjoyed our stay .
We wish we had more time to enjoy the pool.
Our request for a late checkout was accommodated.
Sarah was very helpful.
Lovely accomodation, spacious and comfortable and walking distance to everything. We were very happy and would love to stay here again next year!

Sabrina was prompt in responding which was a saviour to me being stranded in another place which was not cleaned. Simona who checked us in was also friendly and helpful. The location was perfect. Walking distance to Coles, Casino and main attractions at the harbour. This saved us alot of parking fee. The unit was has all we needed and definitely clean. Theres wifi and also designated parking. Im not sure why i missed booking for this place in the beginning but thank goodness I managed to switch to this. Dont think further if you wanna book an accomodation in Sydney! Lastly, thanks Sabrina!
Great locain, comfortable, great faililties & easy communication.  We had a great break here for 4 days, family of 4 & I would recommend this apartment
A brilliant, quiet, central location; absolutely perfect. Would definitely stay at your apartment again! Thank you so much.

Beautiful place, full of amenities like Brand New mini body wash, shampoo, lotion etc. 

There were also board games and the place was extremely clean and a fantastic place to unwind. 

Check in was smooth and have absolutely no complaints!
Sabrina's place was quite clean, spacious, and well-equipped. We had a nice stay there!

A lovely unit in a very convenient spot. Easy walk to Darling Harbour and walking bridge to city. Pyrmont ferry terminal close 10 minute walk - 5 stops to Circular Quay with great views of Harbour Bridge, Opera House and other sights as you travel. Coles 300 m away so easy to pick up groceries on way back from ferry. One stop to Balmain on ferry then catch 442 bus up to trendy shops and cafes. Catch 389 bus around corner into city or onto Bondi. Just be aware that all bathrooms in the building are being replaced so there may be some banging noise during the day depending on what level they are working on. Not overly loud at this stage. Clear, quick communication with those managing unit. Would recommend staying here.

Lovely appartment, very close to Darling harbour (walkable-5 mins). Appartment is well equipped and spacious. Appartment building is not that well kept, however once you are in the appartment you won't feel that.

Sabrina's place is well located  for Darling Harbour functions. The beds are comfy and the apartment is well represented in the photos. There is a fair amount of construction going on in the building so check with Sabrina first. It was great to have a garage but be aware that only a small car will fit. Our CX5 was quite a struggle to fit in. Overall a good place to stay in the city.
Very clean and central to everything .
Awesome location!!  Everything you need and more!!  Great communication from Sabrina and nice that we were met at the door. Would definitely stay again if I returned.
Nice clean apartment. Perfect location, easy check-in.

Clean and well positioned. Note that the whole building is currently undergoing construction, so as well as the noise (as mentioned in the listing) the halls and elevator are a worksite. The pool and sauna facilities are lovely though. I’m not sure I would stay here again for the price (& the cleaning fee $200+). There is nothing wrong with the apartment itself, however my experience overall was a little underwhelming.

The property is just like the description. Location is quite convenient for darling harbor and the rest of Sydney, several places to eat within a 5 minute walk. The space was clean. Staff was very accommodating to meet our requests for an early check in.
Lägenheten har ett bra läge i ett mysigt område. Det saknas luftkonditionering så det blev varmt på nätterna.
Ideal location, walking distance to most main attractions, very friendly neighbourhood and a beautiful and comfortable home.
Great location, slightly old carpets and walls... No aircon is the main disadvantage considering the humid climate.

Very well located.
Nice and perfectly equipped
I highly recommend

Great location! Close walk to darling harbour! 15 min walk to town hall station! Cute apartment with everything you need!
Car park is tiny though, so will only fit a small car.

This apartment was lovely. The building itself looks a bit run down but the actual apartment was great! The bathrooms looked brand new and the apartment was spotless and roomy. In addition check in was very easy and smooth. We had a great time there and would definitely recommend anyone to stay there!
Great location, great staff and service.

Good location, it is on the quieter side of Pyrmont. Still walking distance to the fish market, Darling Harbour and even CBD. The unit is as pictured. Impressed with the newly renovated bathrooms - nice!! Consequently the other rooms are noticeably older - carpet, walls. Easy check-in / check-out process, communication was quick and a breeze. They even allowed us to check-in early which was super helpful. The building is a bit dated, building hallways have some smell although it has some constructions (and we were given a heads up on this). Like others mentioned the parking space is a bit tight but we were able to park Mitsubishi Outlander fine. The unit was clean and overall it was a great stay.
Great location! Host was easy to contact. We had trouble using the stove but host arranged for immediate repairs.

Sabina's place offers a great location for Darling Harbour and other Sydney attractions. The place inself is very well equipped with everything you could need. Great for both couples, and families. We thoughly enjoyed  our stay and service Sabrina supplied.

Great apartment. So close to the city yet in a quiet neighbourhood to get away from the hustle and bustle. And an amazing dinner venue Olvolo 1888 just around the corner. Recommend and will be staying again.

Sabrina's apartment is really well appointed and had many thoughtful touches, like the coffee machine. The provided carpark is really low, don't try and fit a larger car or 4wd in there. Regardless, Sabrina's hospitality was great and the place was clean and welcoming.
This place was good value. Great location for walking around downtown Sydney.
Really great place,, very spacious,, everything was great,, if they can put aircon gonna be perfect.. lol
We had a great time. The location is great and check in was very easy. We will definitely stay again if in the area.
The space is good.

name: Large 3 bedrooms apartment
summary: This favourite home offers a huge balcony, lots of space, easy life, all the comfort you need and a fantastic location! The beach is only 3 minutes away. Metro is 2 blocks away (starting august 2016).
space: Large (160 sqm) and modern 3 bedrooms apartment just three minutes walk from Barra beach. This apartment is spacious enough to accommodate a group of eight: two in the main bedroom, two in the second bedroom/workroom, two in the third bedroom and two can sleep in the living room as two of the sofas can be converted to single beds. The main bedroom is an ensuite, has exceptional size and atmosphere with a comfortable kingsize bed. There is a wardrobe with great amount of storage if needed. The room has a split AC. The second bedroom which is bright and cheerful can be multi functional. An office during day and bedroom during sleeping hours. It has a comfortable sofa bed. The room has a split AC and a 42' TV. The third room has two single beds and AC. Two additional beds can also be prepared in two of the sofas in the living room. The living room has cable TV, 3 sofas and a large dinning table. The apartment has two bathrooms (one in the master bedroom) and a restroom. The apartment also

Metro is 2 blocks away (starting august 2016). Large (160 sqm) and modern 3 bedrooms apartment just three minutes walk from Barra beach. This apartment is spacious enough to accommodate a group of eight: two in the main bedroom, two in the second bedroom/workroom, two in the third bedroom and two can sleep in the living room as two of the sofas can be converted to single beds. The main bedroom is an ensuite, has exceptional size and atmosphere with a comfortable kingsize bed. There is a wardrobe with great amount of storage if needed. The room has a split AC. neighborhood_overview: Flat is in the quite residential street, but very near to supermarkets, drugstores, bars and restaurants.
notes: Flat is in the quite residential street, but very near to supermarkets, drugstores, bars and restaurants.
transit: Numerous bus routes are available within a couple minutes walk. The metro is only two blocks away (starting at august/2016). Olympic Park is only 20 minutes away (by car). Distances (by car): - International airport: 45 minutes  - National airport: 30 minutes - Leblon: 10 minutes - Ipanema: 15 minutes - Copacabana: 20 minutes If you don't use Uber Taxi already, please download the app, it's really the most convenient & cheapest taxi service in Rio.
access: You will have access to the entire flat. You will have it all on your own, neither the host nor anyone else will stay in the flat except you. I do have a locked service room as that is where I will store some belongings so this is out of the way.
interaction: During your stay, I'll be generally available if you have any questions - just call, text or email.
house_rules: -No smoking in the flat please, but you can smoke on the balcony!  - I would appreciate if you can treat it as your own place. - No parties allowed. - Be considerate of neighbours. - Please, turn off all ACs when leaving the house. - I will be as accommodating as possible for early check-ins or late check-outs. - All guests must be confirmed, and no additional guests are allowed.

host.host_about: Born in London, raised in Rio, living in Lisbon. Love to travel around the world, to meet new people and their culture.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Luísa é uma pessoa muito correta e preocupada com a boa estadia. Apartamento aconchegante e perto da praia.
Luísa é excelente pessoa muita atenciosa, seu apartamento é bem aconchegante e perto da praia. Voltarei em breve
Luísa é excelente pessoa, o apartamento é muito bem localizado e amplo.  E 01 quadra da praia.
Excelente imóvel, bem localizado e aconchegante e proprietária muito atenciosa. Voltarei
Ótimo imóvel, uma Quadra da praia e próximo de farmácia e supermercado.

Ótimo imóvel aconchegante e próximo do melhor ponto da orla.
A anfitriã é muito atenciosa, voltaria em outra oportunidade.

name: AMAZING VIEWS PENTHOUSE PARK GUELL
summary: The appartment is really well communicated (beside metro Alfonso X) that goes straigh to the beach and also to Paseo de Gracia or the center of Bcn. Feel in a well equiped Loft with a terrace with amazing views from the city
space: Licencia HUTb-010473 This appartment fully equiped and just renovated with a double bed and confortable dinning room, with an open kitchen and amazing terrace. Situated besides parc Guell, really well communicated (beside metro Alfonso X) that goes straigh to the beach and also to Paseo de Gracia or the center of Bcn. Feel in a quiet area, beside also the hospital Sant Pau (famous from Gaudi) with views from all the city and the sea We take guest satisfaction exceptionally seriously and ensure you have all the local insights you need to make the best of your time here. From restaurant recommendations walks and day trips to tours of the flea markets and boutiques we do everything we can to make sure you really get under the surface of Barcelona and uncover it's many wonderful secrets.Also for the ones that want a do Clubbing, i offer free access to the main clubs in Barcelona Please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or enquiries. We're happy to help and we always respond
