host.host_about: i like to travell, do sports and enjoy life. I hope to meet you as soon as possible!

reviews.comments:
very very good one room studio flat, well equipped and confortable, clean, with nice kitchen and a great cosy terrase with a view on sagrada familia.
ideal for a couple, ideal if you want to have a rest (there's no noise night and day), good rapport quality/price.
5 min walking to the underground that takes you to the city centre in a couple of stops, and a bus stop just on the door step.

We wanted a cheap trip to Barcelona and my sister recommended we use airbnb. As it was our first airbnb experience we were a bit nervous, however it turned out to be a dream holiday. 
We arrived at the flat and were met by Lola (the building guard) who gave us the keys and showed us around the apartment. It was perfect. Clean and tastefully decorated with all the kitchen appliances you could need! 
We chose the apartment for the balcony and views and were blown away. You can see the whole of Barcelona from the balcony, all the way to the sea. Perfect for a sunny evening with a bottle of wine! The best thing about the balcony is that you are not overlooked by anyone. It is completely private and being so high up you are not disturbed by the noise of the road. 
The flat itself is about a 10 minute walk from the metro station Guinardo and it's only a couple of minutes on the metro into town. The metro shuts around midnight so a few late nights we treated ourselves to a taxi back which cost about $11.
Lots of little supermarkets nearby to stock up and also several nice bars and cafes if you dont fancy the journey into town. 
All in all was a perfect trip. Fantastic apartment which was great value for money. Would 100% recommend Enriques apartment and will certainly be staying again in the future.
Really, amazing views! Everything was ok.

Un joli appartement pour un joli endroit!
La terrasse est hyper agréable, la vue est superbe ! Enrique est très prévenant, sympathique et discret. L' appartement est très pratique et nous a permis de faire pas mal d'économies ! Quartier très calme avec beaucoup de commerces. Par contre attention, ne pas avoir peur de marcher car l'appartement est sur les hauteurs de Barcelone, ça grimpe! 

A nice appartment on a beautiful place!
The terrace is very pleasant, the landscape is wonderful! Enrique is very attentive, nice and discret. This penthouse is very practical and permits us to take less expensive holidays. Very quiet district with a lot of supermarkets. But be careful ! Don't be afraid to walk cause this appartment is on the upper Barcelona. It climbs!

We had a magical days in this place. We dreamed and planned these days very carefully. Gaudi's masterpieces were in walking distance, beautiful view from the terraces pleased us and morning and evening! Convenience and hospitality house exceeded all expectations. I wish happy days to all  Enrique's guests)   M&S

Everything was great - the flat was in a good condition, cosy and tidy enough and of course a view from the terrace was fantastic. I also would like to notice a great location of the flat, good transport communication and the whole district itself (safe, with many shops and few tourists). Enrique was helpfull and easy to communicate. I would defenetly recommend this place for staying in amazing Barcelona.

Great flat! Clean and tidy, with a beautiful terrace with stunning views over Barcelona. We felt at home and really enjoyed our stay in the flat. 
The Guinardó neighbourhood is a great area. It is close to all the main tourist spots without being touristy. It is very well communicated and the people of the "barrio" are very friendly.
Communication with Enrique was great. He replied to all our queries in a matter of minutes!
We originally booked the flat for 4 days but we liked it so much that we decided to stay for another week. We would definitely recommend it.

Enrique was a great host. Communication was swift and all the questions we had before arrival were answered. Apartment was very clean & fresh towels were provided. The best thing about this apartment is that it has absolutely fantastic view from the terrace!!! As for the location it is really convenient as you escape touristy crowds and you are just few Metro stops from Centre of Barcelona. Highly Recommended!!!!

Enrique is very flexible concerning arriving time etc. The apartment is absolutly OK, but THE VIEW is the point.
Muchisimas gracias

The apartment is nice and looks exactly as at the picture.
Everything was great - the flat was in a good condition, cosy and tidy enough and of course a view from the terrace .
Enrique was helpfull and easy to communicate. I would defenetly recommend this place for staying in amazing Barcelona.

We had a great time in Barcelona, really a wonderful city. The view from the terrace was fantastic and we enjoyed it every night, after long walkings through the city. It's really close to the tube, which is very well organized.
Although we didn't know Enrique personally, we had help from the guard (a very nice old lady).
Thanks for this vacation.

Wir haben Barcelona vom 6.-15. Mai besucht und es war sehr schön und interessant. Enrique war zum vereinbarten Zeitpunkt im Appartment und hat 
uns alles wichtige erklärt. Das Appartment liegt zentral. Bus vor der Haustüre,
Metro 10 Min. entfernt. Sehenswürdigkeiten wie Sakrada Familia und Park Guell
sind gut zu Fuß zu erreichen. App.liegt im 7. Stock und die Aussicht auf Barcelona
ist toll. Auch Bäcker, Metzger und Supermarkt sind in unmittelbarer Nähe.Der
einzige Nachteil, neben dem App. liegt der Aufzugschacht und es ist deshalb
meist recht laut. Aber man gewöhnt sich an das Geräusch. Ansonsten ist das
App. einfach aber ausreichend für das was man braucht. Wir würden jedenfalls
bei einem nochmaligen Besuch wieder dort wohnen mögen. Bei möglichen Problemen ist Enrique auch telefonisch gut zu erreichen.

We had a great time in the appartment of Enrique. After walking around and visiting many busy places downtown all day, it was so nice to relax on the terrace and enjoy the great view over Barcelona. The quarter is quiet and feels save.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement. Les lieux correspondent à la description donnée. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour être comme à la maison. Le bâtiment est calme malgré l'ascenseur un peu bruyant.
Enrique est ponctuel et il a été facile de dialoguer (en Anglais) avec lui.
Je recommande donc.

We had a great stay in the apartment. It correspond to the description given. Everything you need to be at home. The building is quiet despite the elevator a bit noisy.
Enrique is timely and it was easy to talk (in English) with him.
I recommend.

L'appartement est très bien situé. Il y a 3 bus juste en bas de l'immeuble qui emmènent aux lieux principaux : plage, place Catalunya (de là on peut marcher vers les lieux touristiques importants)...
Le Parc Güell et la Sagrada Familia ne sont pas très loin à pied. 
Enrique nous a très bien reçu et nous a laissé des bons de réductions; par conséquent on a pas eu besoin de prendre la Barcelona Card (la T10 est suffisante). 
On est resté 11 jours dans l'appartement et cela nous a permis pas mal d'économie et le petit plus à été la machine à laver ce qui nous a permis de laver les serviettes de plages, maillots, etc et avec le beau temps on peut les réutiliser le lendemain. 

Par contre comme cité dans un autre commentaire il ne faut pas avoir peur des montées. Il y a une grande pente du métro jusqu'à l'appartement mais Barcelone est ainsi faite et il y a le bus si vous ne voulez pas affronter la montée. 
De plus l’inconvénient peut être l'ascenseur que l'on entend et qui peut être désagréable à 5h du matin quand on à un sommeil fragile comme moi mais on s'y habitue à force.
Fantastico! Appartamento molto bello e pulito! 5 minuti da metro! Vista stupenda! Perfetto per una coppia. Gracias de todo!

Just spent 4 days in the appartment of Enrique. The one room appartment is simple but fine. But the absolute highlight is the view from the terras! That is priceless. Sitting in the sun with a glass of wine overlooking the whole city. Loved it! The neighbourhood is not special but safe and fine. The metro is about 10 minutes walk (up/downhill) but there are some busses stopping right in front of the appartment door stopping everywhere in the city you want to go. There are supermarkets and bakery's around the corner. Enrique is à great host. We never met him but he answered our questions immediately.
We spent an amaizing week in that apartment. The place is great for a couple. The view is fantastic - those breakfasts on the terrace - unforgettable. We had a great time and we were sorry to leave.

This house was just perfect, the view of barcelona that you can see from the terrace is priceless and the area in which it is located is well connected to the city center and very close to Park Guell and the Sagrada Familia. Enrique is been very nice to us and he was always willing to help us,whenever we asked him about restaurants in the city etc. I would definitely reccomend this place!
Host was able to accommodate us on very short notice and was very good with his communication. I would deal with Enrique again.

Enrique's appartment is awesome! Everything you need nice and roomy and perfect views of the city and the sagrada familia. It was very clean and tidy and plenty of storage space. The area is great as much quieter and close to parks. Enrique leaves lots of information and maps which was very useful. Casa Batllo is a must see!

We have stayed at Enrique's appartment from the 15th till the 23rd of July. The appartment was great, especially the view was really amazing. The house was quite clean and so was the terrace. However, the furniture on the terrace almost fell apart when you moved it. This is the only thing that was insufficient in our opinion. The location on the other hand is excellent with only a 10 minutes walk to the metro station Alfons X with a direct connection to the beach. (Mind you, when you return you have to go up-hill).

After all we had a great holiday and we would certainly recommend this appartment.

Enrique replied to my questions within minutes, which was very helpful. The apartment itself was perfect -- clean, fully equipped. And the view from the terrace is an absolute winner, just imagine yourself sitting with a glas of wine overlooking the whole city, with the Sagrada Familia in front of you.
L'appartement était parfait avec un super balcon et une magnifique vue.

We loved our time in enriques apartment. The listing was very accurate. The view and the terrace were amazing. Subway stop is close by which we used alot and we found very convenient. We didn't meet Enrique but he organized it all very well.

We spent five days in Enrique's apartment and had a wonderful time! The apartment is equipped with everything you need for a short stay and located conveniently between Parc Guell and the metro station. The views from the rooftop terrace are priceless!
Would definitely stay here again.

The views from the terrace are definitely amazing. The flat is spacious, clear, well-organized with a big and comfy bed with fresh linens. The oven is powerful and great if you plan to cook a nice meal and there is a huge and brand new fridge as well. The neighbourhood is quiet, friendly, away from the hyper-touristic area, although well-connected. 
But the communication with Enrique has only been virtual as we couldn't met him and directly speak to him - only the housekeeper was here to welcome us. The terrace door didn't lock properly, we didn't feel really safe even if the flat is located at the top of the building, so we had to secure it our way.  The kitchen wasn't really clean, the utensils were old. Either in the sink and in the shower, pipes were blocked. 
Our overall experience in this flat was good but disappointing in some points regarding the Airbnb philosophy.

Tidy, self-contained studio flat within walking distance of Parc Guell and Sagrada Familia and 5 - 10 minutes walk from metro station. Views from terrace were fantastic and it was lovely to sit out and take in the Barcelona skyline. Facilities were sufficient for a short stay but with only basic kitchen equipment. Quiet residential area provided a welcome break from hustle and bustle of central Barcelona with some bars and shops nearby. Enrique was always very quick to respond to any queries.
We were offered everything we needed and I felt welcome.

Enrique was pleasant, friendly and very accomodating, responded to any emails almost immediately. The apartment, was without hesistation the best holiday rental I've ever made. The area is so scenic and quiet, yet so accesible to the city centre / main attractions. I would recommend this appartment to anyone. It's nicely furnished, well equipped, and the view and terrace make for magical memories. Thanks for a wonderful stay.

Enric was great, very accommodating and informative despite us getting in very late the night of arrival.  Apartment was nice and clean, balcony views were beautiful to wake up to.  Relatively private space, a nice hillside neighborhood with decent parking.  Nice location if renting a car, as main city areas are not far and parking space is available. Only negative would be the ants that tracked in from the front door window unit.  There's spray available under the sink so after some sorting that was not an issue.

Basically this is a great place to throw your bags and go discover the city. The view is absolutely amazing and the area is very quiet at night because it's kind of out of the way. The apartment lacks a handful of amenities and updates that would actually make it a more enjoyable to stay. Overall it's an ok place if you're looking for the bare minimum, but with a great view.
Enric is super nice host. The place is clear and the terrance is nice. And he always answer my question fast. Thank you so much! Had great time!!!!

Enric was very fast responding to our questions. He was waiting for us at the appartment.

The appartment was great, everything we need was present in the appartment. The view was AMAZING indeed. We liked the neighbourhood, there were enough stores and the public transport is around the corner.

If we are coming back to Barcelona, we are going to stay here again.

the view was great and apartment as described.  However, bed is very low and if someone has knee or hip problems it might be difficult.  No extras ie bath soap or shampoo.  The apartment is located right next to a bus stop and one can pay getting on.  Buses here go to center.  a short walk takes one down to a local area for cafe,more bues,metro. restaurant  across from Apt is open very late and food quite good.  Barcelona is definitely worth visiting again with more time.

The flat has an amazing view. It's very close to Guell Park and the Sagrada Familia (15 min walk). Close to the metro station as well so is easy to get anywhere you want. Enrique was very flexible (we arrived very late at night) and he waited us. He always responded very quickly. Overall a great experience.
The apartment was excellent. The view from the balcony was fantastic and the location was quite easy to access major tourist spots. Enric was a great host and I would gladly stay with him again.

The apartment is great! It has a great view and is very modern. The one downside is the distance from the metro and is up a hill. The work to get there is worth it for the view though. Just try pack light!
Fantastic host and superb apartment with breathtaking views on Barcelona

First of all: Great view from the veranda to the Sagrada Familia and all Barcelona, unforgettable! Enric answers quick.  We did not meet Enric personally. He manages, as he said, more than 10 apartments / flats, no time for  personal contact in our case. The appartement was quite clean, basically equipped.  Some informations about Barcelona would have been gentil ... Don't take the taxi from the airport to the appartement if you don't want to waste money. That was Enrics advise. We paied 48 €, rushhour. Take the  airport shuttle bus to Plaza Catalunya and than the bus No 55 (?) just in opposite to the airport bus stop, thats less than 7 €. The bus stop is only a few meters away from the apartment . All in all: a place to stay.

Enric is a great host, communication was spot on and check in and out could not be easier.
The apartment has the most amazing views from the quiet large balcony and the walk up hill other users mentioned is actually fun :)
The apartment is in a secure neighbourhood and the building has a secure entrance as well.
Worth mentioning is that the apartment was really clean and the bed was super comfy.
The only downside was that there are 2 not so new elevators right next to the entrance and bedroom so you may hear some noise during the night.
Altogether, the apartment is perfect for a stay in Barcelona for a single or a couple.

Enric was very easy to communicate with and responsive to our e-mails and text messages.  We enjoyed our stay in Barcelona because Enric helped to make it very easy.  We were very grateful that Enric arranged to have a taxi pick us up early on a Sunday morning so that we could catch an international flight! We are grateful and enjoyed our stay. Thank you! Miriam and Rudy

The apartment was lovely and the view fabulous.
It was well appointed with everything necessary for our stay. 
The only disappointment was due to a cleaning problem which the owner was unable to address because we were right into the Christmas period. However he did compensate us financially and confirmed that he immediately changed his cleaner!
Nice apartment.  It has a great view from the balcony and is great for a weekend stay!

I was so impressed with both the apartment and with how quick Enrique communicated with me. The location was ideal, a 10 minute walk to the metro which was really easy to use and a lovely walk around 15 minutes to the Sagrada la Familia and Park Guell in the opposite direction. The views really were amazing! I booked it as a surprise for my fiancée and it was one of the nicest places we've stayed. We plan to go back to Barcelona and we would definitely look to stay there again.Thank you Enrique!

Am stat in apartamentul lui Enrique si ne-am simtit super. Am gasit acolo tot ce avem nevoie de la linguri si furculite pana la masina de spalat rufele. Apartamentul era curat si foarte primitor, avand o terasa unde puteai servi cafeluta de dimineata sau un vin bun seara iar privelistea te lasa fara (Website hidden by Airbnb) vedea toata Barcelona de pe terasa. Recomand cu incredere apartamentul lui Enrique :)

We had a great time in Barcelona - the flat was perfect and exactly as described.  The balcony especially was amazing, really big with incredible views and a suntrap that meant we had breakfast outside everyday - not bad for March! The location was perfect for us and Enrique's recommendation to go to the viewpoint behind us was great  - amazing views of Barcelona and no tourists! We walked everywhere - only 20 minutes to Sagrada Familia and the hills were totally fine and worth it for the incredible views. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to anyone or stay there again.
Enrique is a very nice guy but this appartment has a couple of problems: the light in the morning (no tienda) and noise (the flat is very close to the elevator and its engine..)
A great apartment with all the things you need. Enrique was helpful and relaxed. Thanks we will stay again.
Très belle expérience. Une vue superbe. Je le recommande.

We had a fantastic time. The apartment is in a really good location. The apartment has everything you need. The host was very nice and we had no issues.

A few wise words to others:
If you like a quiet sleep. Bring ear plugs and an eye mask. The elevator in the morning can cause a lot of noise, and there is no blind or curtain on the window so the light comes into the apartment really early.

Apartment was clean and just like the pictures in the listing. Didn't get to meet Enrique but communication with him was fast & efficient. Lovely views of the city as well as the Sagrada Familia. Just a note: the walk from Alfons X metro is not long but has a really steep hill that may be a challenge with heavy luggages. The elevator is small but I did not have much problems with the noise from the elevator as seen in other reviews. Area has a supermarket and several small eating places. Overall, a nice, simple apartment for a relaxing stay in Barcelona.
Good location, lovely terrace with nice view. Everything was just great.

A beautiful view from this penthouse apartment. A large bathroom. A quiet area, that's great for crashing after a long day of exploring Barcelona. You will need to use the transit systems to get to the more popular spots in Barcelona. The apartment was perfect to relax and sleep which while your on your vacation is all that you need it to do. Thanks

The flat was just as described and the host was helpful and gave us some good tips. We arrived late in the evening and he was very accommodating and welcomed us. The apartment is functional with all essentials and with a wonderful view of Barcelona.

Kike made sure i would be able to change over from my other hotel into his flat very easily. The place was as the pictures sugested, and the view really is amazing. From morning to night time you cant beat it. The building is quiet, and within walking distance to park guel or sagraada familia if u love to walk. or take a cab. There are lots of small local spots and markets below. Its a great place to just relax and unwind. Definitely would come back. and i loved that it was mostly locals and not full of tourists. You can get meals for less than 5 euros everywhere. 

The water pressure was great, and you have anything you need to cook at the place. A small TV with shows, and wifi is dedicated so the connection is perfect.

Diese Unterkunft ist für alle gut geeignet, die einen Kurztrip nach Barcelona planen. Die Aussicht von der Dachterrasse ist unglaublich!  Kike hat auch immer schnell auf all unsere Fragen geantwortet. Nur am lauten Fahrstuhl darf man sich nicht stören.

It was a nice apartment with a lovely view .
We enjoyed our stay very much.

The apartment was just as it was seen in pictures with beautiful views of Barcelona. We enjoyed it being not right in the center of town, and it being in a quieter neighborhood with good food. The apartment was comfortable, as was the bed. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Barcelona as well as the host, he was great.

Le logement était exactement comme les photos. Nous y étions très bien! L'appartement est très confortable pour un couple. Le quartier est super sympathique.  Une personne était au rendez-vous pour nous remettre les clés de l'appartement à l'heure convenue avec Kike. Tout s'est très bien déroulé. Kike répond rapidement au courriel en cas de besoin. L'appartement est à 8 minutes de marche d'une bouche de métro, ce qui est très pratique et environ 15 minutes de marche du parc Guell. La vue du balcon est super. Je recommande sans hésiter cet appartement, parfait pour un couple qui apprécie se retrouver à l'écart de la foule après leur journée de visite. Il y a également une petite boulangerie, une petite boucherie et une petite épicerie juste en bas à environ 5 minutes de marche.

Fantastic apartment in a really great location, bus stops right outside the front door and a metro stop 5 minutes walk away. The apartment was everything we could ask for and the view from the terrace is spectacular. Great apartment!

Nice apartment, perfect for couples, with a superb view from the terrace. Everything was exactly as shown in pictures, although it could have been a little more cleaner. Fast and working internet connection and a useful kitchen with everything for a quick meal. Quiet neighborhood with a little supermarket and a bakery good for breakfast and Alfons X metro station within a 5 minutes walk. Would definitely come back.

The location is excellent, great view of Barcelona, 5 minutes to the nearest underground station, bus stop just below the flat. In the apartment you'll find all you need. Host was very helpful and everything was just as we agreed. Recommended.
war alles super, unkompliziert und easy! Das Appartment hat eine grossartige Aussicht :)

That view! Eating dinner on the balcony after a long day was just heaven. My boyfriend and I stayed 5 nights, and the apartment was spacious for us, and very close to the metro. We walked to both Park Guell and the Sagrada Familia. Apart from an electrical powerpoint that needed to be fixed, and the apartment being quite warm (window open, we could hear the neighbours), we had a terrific stay! Enrique was great - our flights were delayed and he was very very accommodating about changing our meeting time and location!

This was our 3rd Airbnb experience & 1st where no personal contact with host. Host had sent earlier message that WiFi details would be provided but didn't happen. Mobile text messages sent but presumably not received as no response. Did receive 2 text messages from host asking for us to allow workmen on 2 occasions. Part text message only read as message sent as email that alerts first part to mobile so couldn't access email as no Wifi. Stayed in 1 1/2 days to assist host's workmen but no expression gratitude. Flat is very hot with no air conditioning and single fan insufficient.

Kike was very helpful with providing access to his apartment and catered to our travel plans, which often didn't go the way we hoped! The apartment is exactly as described and it is easy to get access to the beach. If you're out and night, getting a taxi back is cheap too.

The apartment has one of the best views in town, even though you have to earn it by a 5 minute walk up the hill from the nearby metro station alfons x :) I've lived in Barcelona some years ago and the flat appears to be in one of the quietest neighbourhoods in the city. The flat is exactly as described with a direct metro connection to the beach (bogatell/poblenou) and the inner city (urquinaona) and a bus station in front of the door (e.g. nightbus). Parc Guell is in walking distance as well as different supermarkets. We really enjoyed our stay and had only a very few remarks, which we forwarded to Kike, who directly responded and ensured to fix them after we pointed them out. As blessed as we were with the weather, so occured the only drawback of our stay- the almost unbearable heat in the apartment during the night, as there is no air condition and only one window, so no air circulation.
All in all, we really enjoyed the time in Barcelona. The apartment and its price are perfect for a week and with the right kitchen equipment, which should be there by now, and more than one ventilaro I would def. book it again.

The unit had a great view from the terrace. The location was convenient for us to get around town. The  A few things need to improve a upon. Many necessities were missing ie hand soap, detergent and ironing board.
Great apartment with a great view! Loved staying here.

difficulté de communication avec le propriétaire, mais appartement très agréable et lumineux. Terrasse superbe. Métro proche sur la ligne principale (boutiques et plage) 10€ de taxi entre l'appartement et la plage

The view is amazing and for a fair price! You can see all of Barcelona including the famous sagrada familia. Definitely would recommend staying here. It helped make our trip in Barcelona even more memorable. Host was easy to contact via phone and helpful with checking in/out.

My partner and I enjoyed our stay - the place was clean, had a good shower, and the views from the balcony are breathtaking. The location is great as well, but watch out for the hill from the station up to the flat! While I would recommend staying here based on the location and views, there are a few things that could be improved. We loved that the flat is spacious and minimal, but we were a little disappointed that there wasn't a blind across the window, which is needed given the strong sunlight in the mornings. One of the plug sockets was left hanging out of the wall with exposed wires, which felt a little unsafe, and there were unsightly burn marks on the kitchen counter. The kitchen is lacking a few essentials such as a kettle, and more pots and pans are needed. We were only in Barcelona for a few days so we ate out, but if you were staying for longer and wanted to cook at the flat, you might have difficulty given the lack of kitchen utensils etc. That said, we had a really great stay, these are just a few minor things that would have made it even better.

Très bon séjour en couple dans cet appartement.
Magnifique vue du balcon sur la ville et la mer ainsi que la sagrada familia qui est en face. Appartement bien situé. 
Réveillé par la lumière du jour mais au moins nous avions bien profité. On conseille cet appartement.

Eric informed me that I would be met by a lady at the apt , Several minutes after I arrived I contacted Eric informing him I was waiting in the lobby of the bldg. After 15-20 mins I found the unit which was still occupied and being cleaned.When I finally entered the apt ,I noticed the bed sheets appeared soiled/stained which were replaced upon my (Website hidden by Airbnb) Eric's credit he was prompt in responding to concerns , for instance internet access . However , the front door lock did not function properly which was not thoroughly addressed , thanks to self ingenuity and olive oil , I managed.Unfortunately ,there were several other issues which are completely , unacceptable and placed a damper on my stay .Foremost , the stench from the mold spores growing on the base boards , there are exposed electrical wires from the outlet which is dangling on the kitchen counter , there is also solid ice build up in the freezer making the door to it impossible to close let alone use. The one saving grace of this apt would be the terrace w/views of the city except that the wooden chairs are weathered and rotted w/ torn cushions that create a potential hazard just sitting on them.There is more mold to be found in bathroom around the door casing. I would have considered another day/ two in Bcn but the quality of the air was so toxic In the apt I could not sleep and coughed the entire time I was there.These Issues need to be remedied asap!

Bonne location, bien située à Barcelone. Eric a été joignable en cas des problèmes. Merci pour cette accueil. 
On a passé un agréable séjour. 
Rado et Gaby (Nice, France)

Eric hat sich gut um uns gekümmert. Eine Woche vor unserer Reise hat er uns genaue Informationen bezüglich des Weges und des Check-In gegeben.
Das Appartement ist geräumig und zweckmäßig ausgestattet. Das Highlight ist der fantastische Panoramablick von der Dachterrasse über die Stadt- großartig!!
Die Nachbarschaft ist nett. Es gab mehrere Gesprächssituationen.
Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und U-Bahnanbindung sind fußläufig gut zu erreichen.
Wir empfehlen das Appartement gern weiter!

O enrique é muito atencioso e simpático.
A casa era como as fotografias, tudo muito limpo, impecável e a Internet funciona perfeito.
O apartamento tem restaurantes , supermercado na mesma rua.
O metro e extremamente perto e a zona é muito calma.
Pode-se ir a pé ao park gaudi, está mais ou menos a 1,5 km.
Da proxima vez que for a barcelona é de repetir...

Enrique's place in Barcelona was great!  

The view from the patio was lovely!  It did get a little warm while we were sleeping, but he had a fan next to the bed, so that worked out really well.

His place is in a safe and friendly neighborhood.  It's also a walkable distance to Park Güell, and other landmarks and was very easy to get around! 

We enjoyed our stay very much!  You will too!

The appartment and in particular the terrace is awesome - the view over the city including familia sagrada is just breathtaking! Communication with Enrique was simple and efficient. He told us two days before our arrival how to find the place and friend of him was there waiting for us and handing over keys. Groceries as well as public transport stations are pretty close.  

We truly recommend this place and would definitely come back every time!
Warm welcome and lovely apartment. 100% would stay here again - beautiful views and nice host.

Stayed at this apartment for three days before a cruise. The apartment was in a nice, quiet area. Very clean and nicely furnished. The terrace was a great added bonus to the unit! I enjoyed my time there.
Séjour de deux nuits. Superbe vue sur Barcelone! Appartement très agréable!
Very nice penthouse with an amazing view at the Sagrada Familia and the city . Good neighbourhood with shops and busstop nearby, metro at 10 minutes. Also nice, that there are 2 elevators.

Great find this apartment.  Spacious, nice and clean with an amazing roof terrace where we had our breakfast each day whilst taking in the view!  Slightly out of the centre, but easy to get into town.  Great value - I would recommend it!

Nice place, great location, and best of all - the amazing view !!!
Keep the 5 minute uphill walk in mind.. the 56 steps through the park (from metro) are exhausting but totally worth the view!!! 
Kitchen invetory could be desribed as minimalistic but it totally works out if you don't plan to cook a gourmet dinner

Séjour agréable dans cet appartement.
Situé sur une ligne de métro principale.
Cependant le manque de climatisation est assez gênant surtout pendant l'été à Barcelone.

Manque des produits de base tel que torchon pour la vaisselle, cuillère. 
L'appartement n'était pas très propre (poubelle non vidée) et les plaques de cuisson mette beaucoup de temps  à chauffer (1h pour cuire des pâtes), petit parasol sur la terrasse qu'il fallait bloquer entre 2 chaises pour tenir. 
Cependant excellente vue sur Barcelone et Enrique est joignable facilement. 
Voyage très agréable tout de même.
Très beau séjour à Barcelone ! Appartement bien équipé. Métro à 5minutes rien a reproché !
Very nice and clean (Website hidden by Airbnb) location.Thank you.

La description du logement était conforme mais très sale.
L'équipement de la cuisine très très minimaliste. Ce logement a besoin d'être nettoyé et mis à niveau. 
Je ne recommande pas ce logement.

Over all the experience was amazing. Although I never got to meet Enrique in person, everything about the stay was communicated perfectly so I didn't really have many questions.

The apartment was well kept and cozy, but the view is really what we came for, and it did not disappoint. You could practically see every corner of the beautiful city of Barcelona from that balcony. You even just walk out and there is the Sagrada Familia right in front of you. It was perfect.

Now the closest metro is down a pretty formidable hill, but do not let that deter you. It was worth the climb every night to see that view. 5 stars all the way.
The apartment is nice and well situated.  Enrique has been very friendly and helpfull.  Muchas gracias.

Enrique is a very nice host. He is very easy to get in touch with and answers your mails fast. 
It is a nice apartment with a great terrace and a fantastic view.

I really like this local area, 10 minutes walk to the subway.
We found apt easily. It was amazing view from a terrace. There's a park with one more magnificent view close to apt.
There isn't hair dryer and kettle.
Enrique promised help with it, but didn't fulfill.
The place is fine. The rooftop is sunny with a wonderful view of barcelona. We enjoyed it !

If you are looking for a traditional B and B where you meet your host, move on. If you want to be given the keys and get on with enjoying the superb view over Barcelona and visiting the other sites then this is for you. Enrique was quick to respond via email and provided a well priced and clean apartment.  Hostel prices with the benefits of your own space. The apartment is away from the main tourist centres and gives you a better taste of local life, but has excellent transport via the metro into one of the main metro stations

This location has an incredible view of the city that is truly remarkable! Me and my boyfriend stayed here the last 2 nights of our 7 nights in Barcelona. We had already seen Park Güell and Sagrada Familia before we checked in. This location is really close to both of those. We found that this location was a little too far from Las Ramblas (20 min cab ride, 35 min transit). It is located in a residential area with a lot of families and not a ton of restaurants/bars around. We found ourselves going to El Raval or Las Ramblas area for dinner/drinks and cabbing back up at the end of the night. It ended up costing us more to stay here. Also, the wifi didn't work at all during the 2 nights we were at this location. We contacted Enrique and he said there was an outage within the area. We know that's not his fault but take that into consideration if you need to check in to flights, etc. Hailing a cab the last morning to the airport was not difficult but it was a 40 € cab ride. 
If you're looking for an incredible view during your stay in a quiet residential area close to Park Güell and Sagrada Familia this is your spot!! 
For us we spent our time in Barcelona exploring restaurants and bars and this location was the furthest from that and our least favorite because of that. The view is great though and we did sit out on the deck one afternoon.

Seria bueno que alguien te reciba en el apartamento para poder recibir informacion sobre el funcionamiento de algunos elementos. Podria mejorarse el servicio ofreciendo toallas de mano para el baño (hay solo toallones) y para cocina. 
En general,la estadia fue buena.
Buen piso con buenas vistas. enrique siempre super disponible.
Perfect view and quiet area

Enrique's palce is very nice. The view from the balcny is the best. We had a very great time at his apartment. I'd recommend it to everyone:)
Enrique is a great host, he was very flexible about the arrival time.

Among good things I want to say that:
1. The view is really cool
2. Apartments include everything for comfortable time spending
3. There is a bus stop and a metro nearby, so there is no problems with city traveling and returning back
4. Enrique answers quickly, so you can always ask him questions

Now to bad ones:
1. Elevator is right to the left from the apartments, so you always hear it
2. No curtains for balcony windows
3. One of the balcony door's lock is broken, so you can't fully close all doors to the apartments. I hope, it will be fixed soon.
4. There wasn't enough  hot water for two people to take a shower. One will take shower in cool water.
5. There is a wardrobe, but no hangers inside, so you can't place your clothes properly.
Gute Lage, Parc Güell und Sagrada Familia zu Fuß erreichbar, Metrostation auch in unmittelbarer Nähe. Der Blick vom Balkon auf die Stadt ist super!

Το μόνο καλό ήταν ότι είχε εκπληκτική θέα και ήταν κοντά σε μέτρο. Γενικά το σπίτι μυριζε ,το ασανσέρ έτυχε για εκείνες τις ημέρες να είναι χαλασμένο και ανέβαινα 8 ορόφους με τα πόδια και φάνηκε ότι δεν είχε μπει καθαριστρια διότι βρήκα
 υπολείμματα φαγητού στον
 νεροχυτη.

The apartment would be perfect if there were more amenities. Hangers considering there was a lot of closet space, more toilet paper (1 roll for 2 people x5 days), water for at least the day we arrived, more towels etc.. You definitely get what you pay for. Location is close to Park Guell and Sagrada Familia. You can walk but considering I was traveling with my mom, we took taxis. Wifi was working great except for the last two nights which was a struggle considering I had to finish some travel planning to Italy. You definitely get what you payed for, a simple apartment. However, it was very clean and had no issues relating to that. Didn't meet Enrique but he answered right away when I had a quick question. If you're on a tight budget this place is great. If you're able to spend a bit more, I would definitely look at other options.

Arrived at the apartment late on Monday and stayed until Friday afternoon, so late check-in and check-out were a great perk. The location was fantastic, with a breathtaking view from the balcony, perfect for enjoying meals outside.
The apartment was equipped with all the necessities, towels, dishes, bedding, fast WiFi, everything, and looked just as in the pictures. Both metro and bus stops were really close, which made getting around Barcelona really easy. Park Güell and Sagrada Família were in a walking distance. A bakery, vegetable shop, grocery store and other shops were close by as well. The only thing was that the elevator was right next to the apartment, but you got used to the sound by day three.

Die Wohnung ist ein wenig renovierungsbedürftig und man muss Ohropax benutzen wegen des lauten Fahrstuhls - der Ausblick und die Lage macht aber alles wieder gut. Enrique ist super hilfsbereit und freundlich, hat alles super geklappt. Würde wieder dort wohnen!
We were very pleased in the speed Enrique replied to our questions before and during our stay to make our visit enjoyable.
WLAN was not working. Flexibel Check-out was not possible.
Отличный вид на Барселону! Классная локация! Рекомендую всем, если хозяин решит все организационные проблемы.

Enrique, очень гостеприимный, помогал в вопросах интересующих нас!:)
а вид с его жилья завораживает, такой надо увидеть Барселону! 
в районе очень много супермаркетов, сам по себе район тихий, жилой!
Très bon appartement, propre et pratique, aucun souci avec Enrique qui est très arrangeant , je conseille !
The unit was okay but there were basic amenities missing from the apartment that could have been left in place to make for a more comfortable stay. Overall very average.

The apartment was ok. It is well located with an amazing view to the city. The only disturbing factor was the elevator of the block which was placed next to the flat and was a bit loud. All in all we liked it very much.
Excelente vista, muy buen lugar, amplio, cerca del metro, muy limpio

I didn't meet the host in person but he response very quickly and generously provided us with flexible check out time!! 
The apartment is great! Has the amazing view of Barcelona. Inside is very clean too,have everything you need. The bed is comfortable too. I had a really good stay in here:)

The view alone is worth staying. Though you have to work your way up to it and can be tiring! So be prepared. Little things here and there like no AC and some unstable furniture and sketchy elevator. Kinda have to get everything except shampoo.. but overall a nice stay!
Un logement très sympathique avec une vue juste magnifique, quelques détails a revoir mais dans l'ensemble un très bon séjour !
Un appartement parfaitement conforme aux photos, avec une terrasse spacieuse et une magnifique vue, je recommande !

Enrique's place was great. The view from the balcony was absolutely Amazing. It was conveniently located within walking distance to the Alfons X metro. Enrique was quick to respond to any questions I had and even helped us find the best public transit to get back to the airport for a very early flight. I would most definitely stay here again

L'appartement est magnifique et donne une vue sur tout Barcelone ! 
L'appartement est très propre, bien desservie par les bus et le métro.
Nous avons passé un bon séjour et sommes très content d'avoir choisi cet appartement. Je le recommande fortement
Enrique est à l'écoute et répond rapidement à nos demandes.
Perfect in every way

Lugar alejado del centro de la ciudad, pero con paradas de metro y autobús justo al lado del apartamento lo que te permite disfrutar de la tranquilidad del barrio y de unas vistas espectaculares de Barcelona.
c

Ce lieu est vraiment très joli , spacieux, à proximité du parc guell et du quartier Gracià, métro à 10 minutes et bus juste à côté. La vue de la terrasse est magnifique. Il ne manque que quelques commodités pour la cuisine  (couteaux éplucheurs, maniques, huile, planche à découper et tupperware)

Great apartment close to central Barcelona (Sagrada Familia is a 20 minute walk or short bus journey). Perfect for a couple as it's a studio apartment but spacious. Close to metro and other transport links so most attractions are easily accessed. The apartment was spotlessly clean. The views of the city were impressive and the apartment has a great terrace to enjoy. If you are travelling in the summer, be aware that the apartment gets very hot and there is only a fan (no a/c) but this is typical of other accommodation in Cataluna from our experience. The apartment was great value for money and Enrique always replied immediately to emails with helpful information. Overall this apartment has a lot to offer visitors to this great city! :-)
Uncomplicated,Check-In and a phenomenal view over the city. Very good place to stay. :)
Really cool apartment and *really* cool view man! Getting there's easy by bus/metro and all in all it's a great choice for everyone who wants to have a good time in barcelona!
Excellent views from the apartment, but a bit away from ramblas and the beach.

Enrique ist sehr gut zu erreichen. Einfacher Check-in und -out. Frühstück bei Sonnenschein auf der Dachterrasse mit Blick auf die Sagrada Familia ist einfach genial. Wir können bestätigen, dass die Wohnung direkt neben dem Fahrstuhl ist - Den Lärm hatten wir unterschätzt. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Barcelona und einige Abende auf der Dachterrasse genossen.

Lovely flat with basic amenities, fantastic views over Barcelona! You can clearly see sagrada familia from the balcony, at night time it is really special. Although we didn't meet Enrique, he was very quick to answer any questions we had. Around 10/15 minutes walk from the metro, with a bus right outside the door so it was easy to navigate around the city.
Perfect weekend getaway

El departamento posee una excelente vista, tanto diurna como nocturna. Está bien conectado por metro, aunque a pie se encuentra un poco alejado. El anfitrión es amable en responder de modo inmediato a las necesidades vía wapp.

Naozaj nádherný výhľad, ktorý stál za to a Barcelona bola ako na dlani. Čisté ubytovanie, k dispozícii uteráky, čisté periny, vybavenie kuchyne postačujúce. Skvelé sedenie na terase, so skvelým výhľadom. Metro bolo blízko a vybavenosť v okolí bola tiež fajn (obchody, reštaurácie, bary...). Komunikácia s ubytovateľom bola perfektná, vždy poradil a odpisoval veľmi rýchlo.

Chýbal mi len fén na vlasy a ako jediné mínus považujeme balkónové dvere, ktoré sa nedali zamknúť.
Enrique is a good host ! The place is perfect for a little city trip. The view from the terrace over the city is amazing. I can recommend the place :)

Enriques apartment is as described with a fantastic view. Comfortable for a couple and easy access to public transport. There was a minor issue with the wc which Enrique helped us resolve and was prompt in his communication. As a goodwill gesture he also let us extend our check out time. We liked our stay and can recommend his place for other travellers.

Writing this, because its helpful for both - visitors and host. Everything about the home was as expected. Normal tidy home, excellent for two. And woah... what a spectacular view. Near by metrostation, bus right infront the building. 20 minutes walking from Gaudi Park and Sagrada Familia. The communication with Enrique was perfect. There was not a problem about giving the keys. Yeah, we didnt met personaly the host, but this was not a problem. There is some noice from the elevator, but for God sake you are going to Barcelona to explore the city, not to stay in a single room for a long time. Recommend this home for vacantion, there are shopping stores in the quarter, a bakery in the building and again the amazing view from the terrace!
Lovely view of Barcelona, worth every penny! Simple check in and check out! It was perfect!

The mattress was so disgusting to sleep in,  it smelled like putrid sweat.   Other possible negative items pale in comparison,  unless you don't mind sleeping on the floor.      For reference, however: check in arrangements non adequate,  got stuck in elevator with a baby for about 10 minutes, only one trash bag and toilet roll for 6 day stay and no toiletries,   only one thin linen available for the bed,  no hangers, mold in restroom,  door to balcony doesn't lock,  people working on balcony with no curtains without any notice,  front door lock doesn't work well, balcony furniture falling apart,  about 5 remotes for tv and other unknown items except only the tv was there and it didn't even have a standard antenna.  Asked for help setting up return taxi, no response,  don't expect any help from host.
It was fine :)

Enrique's apartment is in a wonderful location in Barcelona, offers a great view on the whole city. Commodities are essential, although overall adequate. 
Neighborhood is nice and well served with public transportation and shops.

The apartment is in a very good position (the view is spectacular), next to a few markets and just 5 minutes to the metro station. However, there are a few things that I need to underline:

- the apartment is located in the over-attic and next to the elevator: it was really hard to sleep, both for the elevator's noise and the weather conditions (it was extremely windy during our stay)
- the host was not at the apartment when we arrived, even if he told us he would have been there
- the first night we found out the sheets were stained: we immediately contacted the host and the next day the cleaning lady came to change them. 
Also, in the bathroom and the kitchen the cleaning was not *that* accurate.

Overall, we had quite good stay and the communications with Enrique were on top.
The place has a great view and great location.
Tout s'est très bien déroulé Enrique a été très réactif pour nous aider durant notre séjour.
Dommage télé marché pas et rien pour écouter de la musique

Had a great time at Enrique’s place, close to Alfons X metro and good connections to central Barcelona. Sagrada is walkable but it’s a bit of a climb back up, but you get great views from the balcony.
Very nice flat well located with a terrific terrace!!

The apartment was in a great location but i was disappointed because it didn't look like in the pictures. The walls were very dirty (with shoe marks near the bed), the glasses had a lot of fingerprints and food on it. Also, we had only one toweI/person for 7 days and no towel in the bathroom! I understand that the price was a normal to low, but if you promise (in the apartment description) you will offer it with complete services, is nice to respect this. I didn't expect to find some luxury apartment, but i wanted to be clean and comfy. Too bad! You should be more dedicated to this kind of business because it has a lot of potential if you have only satisfied customers.

Thank you Enrique!
Hadde et kjempefint opphold i Barcelona. Leiligheten var veldig sentral, 50 meter fra buss og 200 meter fra t-bane. Helt perfekt. 
Enrique var veldig rask og hjelpsom når jeg lurte på noe. 
Her får man veldig mye for pengene! 
Takk for denne gang, håper på å komme tilbake.
Thomas
Great location, great host!!

The appartement is just like on the pictures shown. The view is incredible. Public transportation is very close, but be sure that you have to walk 10min from closest Metro Station upwards :) Shops and restaurants are very close, only 15min to Sagrada Familia by foot. The furniture is partly older, but clean. Also the bathroom is not new but totally ok. The elevator is quite loud, but as people won‘t often use it during night thats ok. Enrique was very helpful  Communication was very fast and super friendly. Very nice appartement for a couple.
Appartement vue sur la Sagrada Familia

The view is the best part of this place. Amazing view from the balcony of the city. The place itself is small but very comfortable. Bring your own towels, as the towels provided didn’t seem to be clean , also, there is a little store in the corner of the place where you can buy your own toilet paper as you may run low on it .

Enrique's apartment is fantastic and his communication with us was fast and efficient. We stayed for a week whilst we visited the F1 and found the apartment in a great location, near to a main metro station and the balcony has amazing views across the city. If we ever visit Barcelona again, Enrique's place would be at the top of our list!

Вид с террасы прекрасен! Дом расположен рядом с автобусной остановкой, откуда можно добраться практически до любой точки города, не используя метро. Важно отметить, Энрике оперативно отвечал на наши сообщения, но в какой-то момент мы поняли, что он не сможет решить всех проблем с квартирой и перестали писать ему . 
Вся мебель старая, квартира очень грязная и неуютная! Ремонт делался давно и мебель не менялась, наверное годами! Постель воняет! Нет ни фена (оказывается и не должен был быть), НИ ОДНОЙ ВЕШАЛКИ В ШКАФУ, ни гладильной доски, ни сушилки для белья, ни средства для мытья посуды (принёс на следующий день какой-то парень со словами от Энрике), ни разделочной доски, не было элементарно мыла ‍♂️, про шампунь (оказывается не был включён) и гель для душа я вообще молчу! Шторка в ванной была очень грязная и покрыта плесенью...  
Есть микроволновка, ВНИМАНИЕ ☝чистая внутри, но не работает! В ванной некуда даже полотенца повесить (была одна вешалка под полотенце для рук), не горит одна из лампочек, темно, невозможно даже побриться. Крепление для душа отвалилось от стены через 10 минут после того, как мы вошли в квартиру‍♂️! На двух человек предоставили два душевых полотенца и одно крохатное, которым даже руки не вытереть. В квартире просто необходим кондиционер для просушивания и проветривания. Квартира абсолютно непригодна и не готова для жизни. Энрике даже не встретил нас и не смог толком назвать номер квартиры, попав в подъезд, искали у каждой двери файвай (на сайте airbnb был логин и пароль, спасибо!), чтоб определить где наша квартира. На наши претензии по качеству квартиры Энрике ответил, что квартира ни его, прошу обратить на это внимание администрацию сайта.
Уровень безопасности в квартире равен нулю! Входную дверь можно выбить ударом руки (каждый звук, шорох в подъезде слышен в квартире), а балконная дверь террасы не закрывается, (от соседей по террасе стенка отделена стеклянной перегородкой). Полы на террасе не мылись с момента постройки здания. Стулья на террасе были раскиданы, перевёрнуты, и настолько плохо выглядели, что на них небезопасно было садиться и фото мебели с террасы, не соответствуют действительности. По соседству с квартирой находится один из лифтов, шум такой, что кажется будто лифт сейчас въедет в квартиру.
Стоимость квартиры при бронировании не была низкой, чтоб можно было смириться со всеми этими ужасными недостатками. Я категорически не рекомендую снимать данное жильё даже на одну ночь.

We loved staying here - the view (which included the Sagrada Familila)  is really incredible. It is in a more residential area which was a nice getaway from the busier areas of the city each evening. With that said, there is a fresh produce market, convinience stores, bakeries, and restaurants within a couple of blocks of the apt so it wasn’t totally secluded. The apartment has the basics as listed and referred to in the other reviews.  If we had the opportunity to go back to Barcelona, we would love to stay here again.
El departamento está en una buena zona, a metros de un metro que conecta con toda la ciudad. El alojamiento está bien para salir a recorrer la ciudad.

Appartement très bien situé sur les hauteurs de Barcelone à l’écart de la vie bruyante des quartiers touristiques et à proximité immédiate des transports en commun. Vue extraordinaire sur Barcelone. 
Quelques imperfections dans l’appartement très bien décrites dans d’autres avis, bruit ascenseur, appareils ménagers vétustes, literie minimaliste ne gâchent pas l’impression d’ensemble très positive.

We had a lovely stay in Enrique's apartment, and his responses to emails were extremely quick and very helpful!
There are so many amazing restaurants in Barcelona, however Enrique's apartment isn't very well equipped for cooking/eating in if you did decide to eat in for 1 or 2 nights, as we decided to.
The only big downfall on the apartment is that there is no air con or fan - and in the middle of the summer it gets very hot at night! 

Overall though we had an amazing stay in Barcelona the apartment is very clean, and view is sensational !!!
A nice and quiet neighborhood that's easily accessible by bus and subway. Enrique's place is really clean with an awesome view of the city. Recommend!

My experience at Enrique’s was not good, at all. For starters, we arrived to check-in at 11:30AM, as prompted by Enrique. When we arrived to the Airbnb there was no one to greet us at the door or open the door for the building for us to retrieve the keys under the mat. I called Enrique and he told me Jocelyn would be arriving in 5 minutes. We did not even know who Jocelyn was or what she looked like. 5 minutes turned into 15 in the hot and humid weather and we decided to go into the building once another tenant had entered. We asked the lady at the desk who was also cleaning where the room was and she led us upstairs. We found the key under that mat and entered the apartment. Once we entered, the place was a disaster. It had not been cleaned at all between the time the previous guests checked-out and we checked-in. Dirty towels laying on the bed, dishes in the sink, hair in the shower, crumbs and trash in the floor. It was gross. A few minutes later there was a knock on the door from people who were coming to clean the place, I am assuming this was Jocelyn. We had to get ready for our day so the only way to get the place cleaned was to have the cleaners come into the space while we showered and got ready. The cleaners should have been called earlier by Enrique to clean before we arrived. Also, we were able to watch the cleaning job that the cleaners did, they did provide new sheets for the bed, they did not provide an new sheet for the couch. The blanket covering the couch was used and the pillows, as well. We never slept under the one sheet that was provided because under it was just the mattress, no fitted sheet. The first night, we went out and came back to the airbnb around 3AM. The key fob was broken and we had absolutely no way of getting in. I called Enrique about 10 times and he never answered the phone once. Considering it we were locked out with no place to stay, or had it been a bigger emergency, he should be readily available to his guests at all times of the day. We had to way for some man to open the parking garage next door who told us that if we hopped a 10 foot fence with spikes at the top, we could get in. And that was our only option. Myself and my friend are both afraid of heights and to throw the spokes at the top in the mix, it was incredibly difficult to get over the fence—not to mention the fence was filthy. We were covered in dust afterwards. I told Enrique this and he prompted me to “try again” as if I didn’t sit outside the building door trying to get the key into the lock...

Location great, ease access to metro station-Alfonso X, which goes straight to the beach (Barcelonetta). 
There was no air conditioning or a simple fan, and because of that it was really hot even during the night, and hard to sleep as there was no breeze. Kitchen facilities could be abit better : stove is not hot enough and microwave not working. Other than that it was all good. Thanks

Thanks to Enrique for this great week ! Small things weren't quite right in the apartment (very little kitchen utensils / overall hygiene of the place wasn't perfect / lots of noise due to the elevator) but all in all, nothing to ruin your trip, if you're not planing on staying home all day ! Easy access to the transports and great view from the balcony.

Our stay at Enriques's place was perfect. The apartment was well equipped with absolutely incredible views from the balcony. The kitchen contains enough utensils to adequately cook for dinner, we we did a few nights, however, we could not get the microwave to work. The apartment was on the top floor of the balcony but the building has two lifts which saves you from climbing the stairs.

The apartment is located within a short five to ten minute walk from the supermarket and the metro. The only downside is that it is very uphill on the walk back. The metro is easy to navigate and will take you anywhere as well as the Sagrada Família only being a twenty minute walk away from the apartment itself.

Enrique was an excellent host, replying to any messages very quickly. The place was very clean when we arrived and was an absolute steal for the price. The only downsides to the apartment is the lack of air conditioning or fan which means it gets very hot at night and hard to sleep. The back door to the balcony doesn't lock very well (it can be opened if you pull on it hard) but as it's located on the seventh floor it's not the greatest concern.

Overall, we would highly reccomend Enriques place and we would definitely stay there again!
Wir waren mit der Abwicklung von Airbnb sehr zufrieden.

Enrique's apartment is a really good choice for an affordable stay in Barcelona. The views from the balcony really are incredible and it has great connections to the centre being so close to a metro line. The balcony is a lovely spot to sit out and have breakfast and enjoy the views. Enrique is very responsive to messages and communication was clear throughout our stay.

The apartment itself is basic and has most of the essentials. There were a few things missing such as a bath mat and tea towels but these should be an easy fix. The apartment does also get very hot at night due to a lack of a fan or air-conditioning. These are little things but if they're fixed the apartment would be even better than it already is.
Very nice, clean appartment with amazing view and location. The host Enrique is very friendly and that made the stay that more relaxed and awesome.
Good place, a couple of details more and would be perfect!

Very nice stay. Close to metro, Parc Güell, Sagrada and many markets and restaurants. It is right outside of the city so it is nice and quiet if that is what you are looking for. Enrique is very quick to respond. We would stay again!

Appartement bien placé avec une vue exceptionnelle sur Barcelone. Beaucoup de rangements et le métro à proximité (environ 10 min) et ligne de bus à 100m. Enrique a été très sympathique. Petit problème : bruit de l'ascenseur qui jouxte l'appartement. Mais cependant nous recommandons cet appartement pour la visite de Barcelone car il est bien placé et le quartier est très calme.
beautiful rooftop!

The location was really good and had such amazing views. The flat is very basic and as someone mentioned its not great for cooking a meal. we only had breakfast in the flat. it is generally clean but basic. but for the price was definitely value for money. the microwave doesn't work and the balcony door doesnt lock. but still a good gem.

Realmente a vista, destaque do anúncio, é deslumbrante. Pena não ppder ser aproveitada, já que os móveis da varanda estão velhos e abandonados, além do espaço estar sujo.
A roupa de cama claramente não havia sido trocada e não havia nenhum tapete ou piso de banheiro, deixando o mesmo todo molhado após o banho.
A impressão é de um lugar wie já foi bom, mas que foi completamente abandonado, deixado para alugar sem maiores cuidados. 
Uma decepção do início ao fim, certamente não condiz com o preço pago. O pior de 6 em que fiquei em uma viagem de 25 dias, não voltaria de jeito nenhum.

Très bien dans l’ensemble..
Enrique très réactif aux messages.. vu du balcon magnifique.. appartement très cosy..

The view from the balcony was incredible. You can see almost all of Barcelona and it's a real highlight, especially when the sun sets and rises. The flat was clean and well presented, and a very decent size for a couple to stay in.  The wifi worked well. The microwave didn't work and the stove hobs are very slow so cooking isn't easy unless you only use the oven.  Overall though it was a positive experience, good value, and we would stay again. The balcony and the view are worth it.

Superbe vue, le gros plus de cet appartement, par ailleurs très bien situé pour visiter la ville. 
Un peu bruyant du fait de l’ascenseur, prévoyez bouchons d’oreille pour dormir (nous étions au courant grâce aux autres commentaires). 
Nous n’avons pas rencontré Enrique mais il était très disponible par messagerie. Les équipements sont un peu vétustes mais pour quelques nuits, ça fait très bien l’affaire.

The apartment was as described. There was no one waiting at the entrance but I managed to get in with other people. The key for the apartment was left under doormat. Toilet paper was missing but there was shop very close and I got refunded for that. There was only handsoap, not soap for showering. The apartment is quite near Alfons X subway station.

Bonjour. J'ai été en effet déçue du logement. Le concept d'Airbnb est que nous devons nous sentir "comme à la maison" et le minimum nécessaire doit être disponible. Nous avons du acheter tous les condiments (sel, poivre, huile...) car il n'y avait rien. Il y a peu d'outils de cuisine comme des bons couteaux par exemple et il n'y avait pas de torchon. Le micro-ondes et la haute ne fonctionnaient pas. Au niveau de la salle de bain, il manquait un tapis de sol et l'eau de la douche coulait par terre. Le sol était donc en permanence mouillé. Un rideaux à la fenêtre du salon aurait été un plus également.
Cependant, il y a aussi des bons côtés: le logement est bien situé, proche de la station de métro et une belle vue sur la Sagrada Familia. La terrasse est également agréable bien que le mobilier extérieur soit complètement détérioré.
Je précise aussi que l'appartement paraît plus grand et plus "neuf" sur les photos.
An amazing view of Sagrada Familia!!

L'appartement d'Enrique était conforme à l'annonce, excepté le titre, la terrasse est belle et bien là, mais l'on peut apercevoir davantage la Sagrada que le Parc Guell.
Il manquait juste des rideaux et un tapis de douche qui aurait un plus.
Sinon rien à dire, l'appartement est à 10 minutes de bus ou de métro et excentré du bruit et mouvements de la ville. Mais attention pour autant au bruit de l'ascenseur qui est assez présent.

Mein Freund und ich haben eine Woche in dieser Unterkunft verbracht und wir hatten eine tolle Zeit. Das Apartment hat alles was man braucht und ist für eine 1-Zimmer-Wohnung sehr groß. Optisch ist sie genau wie auf den Bildern und in der Beschreibung. Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet und wir hatten keine Probleme mit dem Herd (nicht wie in manchen Bewertungen zuvor beschrieben). Den Aufzug nebenan hört man tagsüber etwas, aber nachts fährt niemand damit und man kann wunderbar schlafen. Das Highlight der Wohnung ist natürlich die Dachterrasse auf der wir viel Zeit verbracht haben. Der Ausblick ist einfach großartig und man sieht über ganz Barcelona. Das WLAN funktionierte einwandfrei. Auch die Lage ist perfekt um die Stadt zu erkunden. Bis zur U-Bahn-Station sind es nur wenige Gehminuten und mit der U-Bahn ist man sehr schnell an den Hotspots der Stadt oder am Strand (ca. 10-12 Minuten).
Wir können diese Wohnung wirklich weiter empfehlen und würden wieder kommen, wenn wir noch einmal in Barcelona sind.
Great place to explore Barcelona (central) and the terrasse is just extra to chill after a long day of walking through the city. Enrique replied real quick and we had an easy check-in and check out.

This place is great! It’s located about 20 mins walking from the center of the main attractions. Enrique was always available to assist and recommended a few places. Loved the stay and would definitely stay here again. Also the view at night is to die for!
Great place, great location and host was super helpful!
Great apartment with a great view. If you have the chance to book this apartment, you definitely should! Great location, close to everything. Thanks again for the great apartment!
The view from the terrace is amazing. The location is great. Barcelona's metro system makes everything easy reachable. Enrique was kind and had a quick response time whenever we pinged him.
I had a very pleasant stay. I recommend.

name: Super Central Cozy private room
summary: With a view of the city, clean, comfortable, behind the Zorlu Shopping Center, a 10-minute walk from Metro and Metrobus lines, within walking distance of Ortakoy, a peaceful house.
description: With a view of the city, clean, comfortable, behind the Zorlu Shopping Center, a 10-minute walk from Metro and Metrobus lines, within walking distance of Ortakoy, a peaceful house.

host.host_about: helpful,positive and energetic.

name: Oporto Central Flat
summary: Flat with a complete bedroom for 2, a living.room with more 2 twin beds. Independent kitchen,hall, wc,marquee, balcony. Apartamento C/1 quarto completo para 2 dois e 1 sala/quarto com 2 duas confortáveis e  grandes camas individuais . Esta sala possui também 5 sofás p/ um bom relax e  área para refeições. Um wc completo, cozinha equipada,marquise  para fumadores, fazem também parte deste apartamento, servido por dois elevadores.   A 1 min. (pé) do supermercado,farmácia,bus e táxis à porta.
space: O espaço é luminoso e  arejado. Pensado para ser vivido confortável e descomplicadamente.
description: Flat with a complete bedroom for 2, a living.room with more 2 twin beds. Independent kitchen,hall, wc,marquee, balcony. Apartamento C/1 quarto completo para 2 dois e 1 sala/quarto com 2 duas confortáveis e  grandes camas individuais . Esta sala possui também 5 sofás p/ um bom relax e  área para refeições. Um wc completo, cozinha equipada,marquise  para fumadores, fazem também parte deste apartamento, servido por dois elevadores.   A 1 min. (pé) do supermercado,farmácia,bus e táxis à porta. O espaço é luminoso e  arejado. Pensado para ser vivido confortável e descomplicadamente. Os hóspedes têm acesso exclusivo, o apartamento é independente. A casa será habitada exclusivamente por eles, com total privacidade.  Poderão ter acesso por elevador a estacionamento directo à garagem, mediante consulta. Neste caso, obedece a um depósito de €30 garantindo um comando electronico,(devolvidos no dia do check out) e um pagamento € 5 de diários para o estacionamento em garagem privativa do edíficio.
neighborhood_overview: A localização do apartamento é uma mais valia atendendo á proximidade com os pontos importantes da cidade e com o mar. O viajante, pode optar por dias culturais ou por dias de relax, sem ter de se movimentar muito. Estará a 10 minutos de autocarro, ou até menos, destas duas hipóteses, sem ter de se programar.
notes: -Sempre que a reserva seja efectuada para o próprio dia, o hóspede deverá avisar o proprietário qual a sua hora de chegada com 3 horas de antecedência, para que este se desloque para o receber.  -Após a hora que o hóspede defina como hora de chegada ao apartamento, terá uma hora de tolerância de atraso grátis.  Após 1 hora hora de atraso, o hóspede deverá pagar 6 euros em cash, por cada hora completa ou incompleta à pessoa que o aguarda. -O lugar de garagem privativo dentro do edifício, tem um custo de 6 euros/dia e uma caução de 25 euros para o comando da garagem, a ser devolvida no final da estadia. -Os hóspedes que fiquem alojados por mais de 15 dias, deverão entregar uma caução de 100 em dinheiro no momento do check-in. Serão devolvidos no check-out, após a verificação do bom estado do alojamento.
transit: Transportes públicos constantes e táxis,  na traseira do edifício  para o centro da cidade, para a praia, para o aeroporto e estações de comboio e metro .Poderão comprar um cartão 'Andante" por 0,60 e carregar com viagens para circular pela cidade durante, 1hora, por (URL HIDDEN) compararem no bus o preço é  1.85 euros,  o máximo a pagar para qualquer um destes locais. Durante a noite, aconselho o táxi para duas ou mais pessoas, uma vez que o preço ficará equivalente e o Bus, tem menos opções.  Desde o aeroporto, a linha do metro é a violeta e deverão sair na CASA DA Música, onde podem no local, apanhar um bus para LORDELO DO Ouro, cuja paragem fica nas costas do apartamento. O táxi é também uma opção rápida, pois, demorará apenas 6 minutos e não custa mais de 6 euros.
access: Os hóspedes têm acesso exclusivo, o apartamento é independente. A casa será habitada exclusivamente por eles, com total privacidade.  Poderão ter acesso por elevador a estacionamento directo à garagem, mediante consulta. Neste caso, obedece a um depósito de €30 garantindo um comando electronico,(devolvidos no dia do check out) e um pagamento € 5 de diários para o estacionamento em garagem privativa do edíficio.
interaction: Os hóspedes poderão contactar-me via sms,  ou email para qualquer apoio ou informações. Poderão também obter transfers pessoais, refeições típicas caseiras confeccionadas no apartamento,  tours diurnos e noturnos na cidade ou arredores, consoante disponibilidade e taxa a  acordar.
house_rules: Regras: lavar a louça;  Despejar o lixo diáriamente; Fumar apenas na cozinha e marquise,  Check in disponível com aviso prévio de 3 horas, uma vez que não dispomos de recepção.  Animais de pequeno porte grátis, após consulta e só admitidos para reservas do apartamento na totalidade. Não são admitidos animais  em  reservas de quartos privados. Apenas aceites nas reservas de apartamento na totalidade.

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

reviews.comments:
The apartment is located 20 minutes away from Boavista square on foot, and 2 minutes away from bus stops to downtown (15 minutes). In the neighborhood you can find everything you need: tobacco shops where you can buy your bus pass (andante), grocery stores (e.g. Lidl), pharmacy, etc. A taxi from downtown at night is between 6-8 euro. In short, it is a very convenient location.
The apartment is exactly what you see in the pictures. There is no access to the main bedroom, but the two single beds in the living room were comfortable and the apartment was really clean.
The host canceled this reservation 134 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La acogida ha sido correcta, en todo momento nos ha ofrecido lo mejor para que la estancia se cómoda y que el viaje lo disfrutemos al máximo. Todo lo indicado en la descripción de la casa es tal cual al verla en persona. Todo muy bien

Hizo que en todo momento la estancia en el apartamento fuera agradable. Nos dio muchísima información acerca de medios de transporte, cosas que ver, actividades culturales, sitios donde comer o tomar algo.
todo como se esperaba y se describía. Atención e indicaciones sobre la zona muy buenas. Una ciudad para conocer y seguro que volveremos.

Everything was as we expected, Natalia was really nice and told us good spot to visit!
Obrigada!
Tranquilidad y sosiego  después  de un día de caminata. Muy bien  equipado el piso y Natalia te ofrece mucha información

Wir hatten eine wunderebare Zeit in Porto. Natália ist eine hervorragende Gastgeberin! Sie hat uns immer auf den neusten Stand gebracht was kulturelle Aktivitäten in Porto angeht, hatte gute Tipps für Ausflüge oder Restaurants und war schnell zur Stelle wenn wir Hilfe brauchten (z.B. bei Wegbeschreibungen). 
Das Appartment entspricht genau dem was auf den Bildern zu sehen ist sowie einer perfekt ausgestatteten Küche, also eine nette, kleine, sehr saubere Wohnung mit Stil und ausreichend Platz für 2. Es liegt ziemlich genau zwischen Altstadt und Strand und beides ist gut mit dem Bus (ca. 10 Minuten) oder einem längeren Spaziergang zu erreichen. Die Umgebung ist ein eher ruhiges Geschäftsviertel mit guten Einkaufsmöglichkeiten für den alltäglichen Bedarf. Ein tolles, nettes, portugiesisches Restaurant/Imbiss ist direkt um die Ecke. Wir hatten einen tollen Urlaub! Der natürlich zu kurz war.
Everything was even better than we expected, so beautiful cozy apartment in a really good place with such a nice owner, thank you so much!!

Laurinda y su papa son muy lindos, nos dejaron frutas del campo a nuestra llegada, un refri con varias cosas para cenar ya que llegamos tarde, que linda bienvenida!
El piso esta ubicado como 10 mns del centro en taxi (no esta caminable) y solo tiene 1 habitación. Tiene todos los comercios al lado. Esta perfecto para dos amigos ya que tiene dos camas individuales, máximo 3 diría.
Laurida was a great host helping us find the apartment and providing good tips for the area and helped us with coordinating transport
Perfecto
muy buen piso,buena decoración, detalles de bienvenida e indicaciones sobre los lugares mas interesantes.Lo recomiendo para visitar Oporto

name: Apart Marcelo - Studio Catete
summary: Comfortable apartment with en suite, sitting room, kitchen with double bed . In a strategic point in the neighborhood, close neighborhoods of Lapa and Santa Teresa.
space: Apartment located on the main street of the neighborhood. Near the Santos Dumont Airport and beach Park/Flamengo. A few minutes from the historic center of Rio. Coladinho the neighborhoods of Lapa and Santa Teresa. Including cooking utensils, and linens and (Website hidden by Airbnb) wi-fi. Há paid parking/private in the building itself. Ordinance running 24 hours. With security cameras on every floor of prédio.Conforto, security and privacidade. There are only ten minutes from Copacabana, through the (Website hidden by Airbnb) are lots of restaurants, supermarkets, banks, bakery and general trade.

name: Breathtaking Ocean Beach Condo Kaanapali , Maui!
summary: An incredible ocean front breathtaking one bedroom Ocean Beach condo steps from the beach! Granite Kitchen Two TV's Very private  See the islands of Lana'i & Molokai from our lanai & living room! Watch whales and turtles from our deck! Amazing sunsets! Top Floor Beach Condo, very private! 3rd story, no elevator w/ amazing ocean views!! Enjoy our private beaches, surf, snorkel-relaxing pool! Tennis court, putting Green, ping pong & shuffle Board -wonderful intimate Resort! laundry on 1st Floor!
description: An incredible ocean front breathtaking one bedroom Ocean Beach condo steps from the beach! Granite Kitchen Two TV's Very private  See the islands of Lana'i & Molokai from our lanai & living room! Watch whales and turtles from our deck! Amazing sunsets! Top Floor Beach Condo, very private! 3rd story, no elevator w/ amazing ocean views!! Enjoy our private beaches, surf, snorkel-relaxing pool! Tennis court, putting Green, ping pong & shuffle Board -wonderful intimate Resort! laundry on 1st Floor! 4 gas BarBQ grills Tennis court Ping pong table Shuffle board Beautiful garden Private style beach  Heated pool Free parking & close Full Laundry Facility in our Building-1st Floor! We are local and live on Maui! Walk to coffee shops, restaurants, food stores and farmers market! Best to have a automobile Not suitable for children and two adults maximum. Not set up for Handicap Aloha
neighborhood_overview: Walk to coffee shops, restaurants, food stores and farmers market!
notes: Not suitable for children and two adults maximum. Not set up for Handicap Aloha
transit: Best to have a automobile
