access: 4 gas BarBQ grills Tennis court Ping pong table Shuffle board Beautiful garden Private style beach  Heated pool Free parking & close Full Laundry Facility in our Building-1st Floor!
interaction: We are local and live on Maui!

reviews.comments: Ken was very responsive, and answered all our questions. The condo is in a great location, and an amazing  value compared to all the resorts around the area. Loved the privacy and resort amenities.

Although we did not meet Ken in person, he was very responsive to any and all questions. The condo was very easy to find and looks exactly like the pictures. It is close enough to the beaches and downtown lahina. The only thing we didn't prepare for was how hott is was and this unit only had ceiling fans and no AC. We were pretty hot at night. Other than that we were SO happy with our condo and hope to come back sometime soon
Thanks Ken, was really a really nice spot and we really enjoyed our time here.

My partner and I stayed here and we had a really awesome experience. The complex is absolutely stunning with beautiful well maintained grounds and the pool area and views were absolutely gorgeous. The apartment was clean, well equipped and comfortable.  The only downside was that the bedroom is near the front of the unit and the traffic noise was quite loud, making it difficult to fall asleep. This is probably due to the fact the one of the window fixture in the bedroom is an open blind, offering great air flow but not much in noise reduction. However, this probably wouldn't bother a heavy sleeper or could be easily be minisimed with earplugs. On the whole we would definitely recommend!

Great place, amazing view, very clean. No wifi and short drive to main shops and restaurants probably the only down side. Would definitely stay again. Make sure you are good with stairs as it's at the top of a three story complex but makes for an amazing view all day of the ocean!

This was the perfect rental for my husband and I. This is our first AirB&B rental and we were pleasantly surprised! The views of the ocean were amazing, the resort is well kept and the landscaping is beautiful. Turtles were in the ocean at the edge of the property every morning, and we were usually able to scurry down with coffee or a mimosa and watch them swim and come up for air. The pool was rarely, if ever, used during our stay, so you could have it all to yourself. The BBQ are was clean and well-kept. This condo is on the third floor with stairs up, so if you have physical limitations it might be a struggle. However, the third floor placement allows for extremely quieter accommodations and an unparrelleled view of the ocean. The bedroom is on the street side, so road noise does creep in during the evenings. We easily slept and the noise didn't bother us at all. The fans and open windows kept us cool during the evenings with no need for AC (this unit does not have it). Although we didn't meet Ken in person, he provided us with all the information we needed to enjoy the condo without worry. This place is well stocked, clean and convenient. Highly recommended.

I was struck upon entering the condo by the immediately visible beautiful view of the Pacific from the lanai. That alone would have made staying here worth it, but on top of that, Keneke has stocked the condo chock-full of kitchen supplies and extra beach towels. Two advisories: the condo is on the small side for more than two people, although it can technically sleep four (two in the real bed and two on the pullout couch), and careful with parking here because other guests and owners can get a bit possessive, especially if they have large cars. Also, you definitely should have a car if you stay here because while a few markets/delis and shops are walkable, the town of Lahaina is not. I heartily recommend this wonderful clean condo!

Great view, better than the pictures. The grounds are beautiful and private. We did see turtles on the beach and whales from the lanai. Preferred the location much better than Kihei as it feels more quaint, but still has all the amenities.

Great place to stay. Sad to leave. 

Keep in mind, this condo unit is on the third floor and is not accessible. There's no elevator or escalator.
Great view, excellent facilities and a great location. Will  book this again when we return to Maui
Nice one bedroom condo with a beautiful ocean view, and easy access to the pool.  We never met the owner, but he was most responsive to us, and access to the space was easy.

Great condo with spectacular views and beach access. Do try snorkeling with the turtles in the rocky area. You probably won't find such giant turtles even on most commercial snorkeling tours. It's conveniently located close to super market, farmers market and restaurants. 
Bedroom could be a bit noisy in the day time with traffic but not a problem during the night. No Wifi in condo but we had our own cellular wifi device. 
Overall it's a great deal and highly recommend this place.
Good suite with amazing views in a quiet building. Close to all amenities, as well as a sem-private beach. Well worth the price.

Nice facilities, lovely private beach, the cleanest BBQ grills ever for guest use, very pleasant garden with putting green, tennis court (very well maintained, no cracks), and best of all.....amazing TURTLES! More turtles than even the snorkel boat that went to Turtle City. Access to the water was superb, there was even a ladder from the property for easy access into the ocean.

No wifi.  No air conditioning.  Love the condo but not this particular unit.  Not the cleanliest.  The condo has a great view, pool and private beach.  Would recommend staying in another unit.  Love the sunsets there!

This is a great location for “jumping off” from. Restaurants, coffee shops, etc are walkable. Easy to get in and out of. 
The place is small, as stated, but I wouldn’t want more than 2 people here. 
The 3 flights of stairs are difficult when hauling suitcases and groceries, and we’re in our mid 40’s and decent shape. 
Washer and dryer in the unit don’t work and appear that they haven’t for some time, there are pay laundry machines on site, but it’s not convenient, much nicer to have in suite working, who wants to spend their vacation on a laundry room? 
The lack of air conditioning doesn’t make it awful, but keeps it muggy and uncomfortable to sleep even with the fans going and windows open.
The complex is beautifully kept and clean, we would stay on this property again, but would chose a different unit. 
There is no lack of beautiful view or sea turtle sightings, they are everywhere, so cool to see them right on the beach out front.

The views can’t be beat! Loved the breathtaking ocean view from private balcony. Sea turtles galore! Peaceful and meticulous landscaping surrounds this place. Great beach to snorkel and very private. Swim with the turtles and plenty of variety of fish to enjoy. Walking distance to park, coffee, markets and shops. Everything you need to make you comfortable. Clean sheets, towels, pillows and comfortable bed. Will definitely stay here again.
Great location and views. The amenities are great! We will definitely come back. Mahalo ken

I found this place to be very much worth it. The location is just steps away from clear waters filled with sea turtles. We were able to cook from the home and it was equipped with the necessary amenities.  Local stores and markets are within walking distance. No a/ c however the fans made it comfortable. Well supplied unit - and Karlos is very responsive. We recommend this spot for a welcomed get away. Mahalo.

This place was perfect. A private beach outside your backdoor but don’t stay there. Maui is an island to explore so make sure you gas up the car and go. This condo is a great landing space after your adventures. It was very clean and had everything you need. Shops are close so you can cook at home if you desire. Enjoy a cup of coffee on the balcony or walk down and watch the turtles eating off the rocks. Nothing negative to say about my stay here. A wise choice if you decide to pick this for your Maui trip.

Great place, great host. Booked last minute as my other plans fell through and was amazed by how great this place was. Car is a must. saw turtles every day right out front. Will definitely stay again.
Amazing location, the view from the lanai is fantastic. Highly recommend.

This place has the most beautiful balcony views and you can see green sea turtles every day at the little beach! We absolutely loved it. All of the amenities in the condo were fantastic... we had everything we needed to cook, make blended drinks, a cooler to take in the car when we went exploring, and a very comfortable place to call home in Maui. We had some bad weather for part of our stay and we still really enjoyed ourselves watching tv, playing cards on the covered balcony and playing ping pong down in the lobby area. The grounds are beautiful, lovely gardens, bbqs with views of the ocean... the price, location and amenities were just perfect for us and I would highly recommend it if you want a quieter beautiful place to come home to that is just a short drive away from everything!

Don’t forget your snorkel gear because getting to swim around with the turtles every day was definitely a highlight for us! 

Mahalo!

We stayed at Karols’s for a week and it was enjoyable. As described, the ocean view was really gorgeous. Loved the pool and amenities. 

One thing: The place itself was lovely, however,  constant noises from next door  —  first, a young couple who stayed up two straight nights talking loud and smoking. One late night we heard the securityguard downstairs came up to talk to them since he caught them smoking on the patio. After they checked out, there was, again, another big family guests who arrived rather late— prevent us from restful nights’ sleep. We were just unlucky. Otherwise, it was a perfect stay.
This place is very functional. Close to shops and restaurants. It was clean and had everything we needed. My only complaint was the washer and dryer didn't work so I had to pay at the laundry mat.

A nice little condo! Private beach and snorkeling area. Grills provided with a great view. Not as many supplies as you would expect in a normal Airbnb, such as ziplocks, aluminum foil, (Website hidden by Airbnb) you’ll have to do a bit of shopping. The cooler provided did come in handy for beach trips! We took advantage of the body boards as well. Fun location that’s walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, and grocery stores! A little heads up too, the tv in the bedroom is very outdated and in the way. My husband hit his head 5-6 times during our trip so be careful!

This condo was perfect for what we needed. Wonderful view, perfect size, quiet location. We moved to a second condo the second week and I don’t think it even compares to Ken’s. The bench right by the water/rocks to drink morning coffee on makes it worth it all by itself! And for anyone concerned abt the third floor walk up, don’t be. The condos are set up so that anyone coming up the stairs goes right by your front door, so if you have regular door open and just screen door closed they can see right inside. Being on the top floor makes that not an issue. Nobody was next to us either so nobody came by our door the entire week! Made it even more quiet and could also be viewed as an additional safety measure, since there was no reason for anyone but us to be on third floor. The whole week was perfect. Would definitely stay here again. Thank you, Ken!

name: B & B  Room Yoga Garden's Place
summary: We have one  room to rent or with a  big bed or  with double bed  and one extra  bed  or a baby bed if necessary and a yoga room/space.
space: The house has 1 room to rent for choose,  with a queen size bed or with twin  beds and one extra  bed  or a baby bed if necessary and a yoga room/space We host a room for 1 person or couple and another room  if necessary for 2 people, in a traditional portugueese and renovated house with garden, Our house is 15 minute walk from the historic city center of Port and 10 minutes from the main train and metro station.We are conveniently located to all major destinations. We have a beautiful garden with fruit trees and lovely flowers. It is situated in a quiet area and yet close to everything including reasonably priced local restaurants. Free WiFi is included. We have  free parking nearby. From the 1st March  2018  in Oporto is required to pay a Municipal Tourist tax of 2 € per person (more than 13 years) per day to 7-day stay. From the airport, you can take the metro (E line) going in the direction of Estádio do Dragão to Campanhâ station, which takes approximately 35 minutes. For that, yo
description: We have one  room to rent or with a  big bed or  with double bed  and one extra  bed  or a baby bed if necessary and a yoga room/space. The house has 1 room to rent for choose,  with a queen size bed or with twin  beds and one extra  bed  or a baby bed if necessary and a yoga room/space We host a room for 1 person or couple and another room  if necessary for 2 people, in a traditional portugueese and renovated house with garden, Our house is 15 minute walk from the historic city center of Port and 10 minutes from the main train and metro station.We are conveniently located to all major destinations. We have a beautiful garden with fruit trees and lovely flowers. It is situated in a quiet area and yet close to everything including reasonably priced local restaurants. Free WiFi is included. We have  free parking nearby. From the 1st March  2018  in Oporto is required to pay a Municipal Tourist tax of 2 € per person (more than 13 years) per day to 7-day stay. From the airport, you can tak
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is very calm and have everything near, groceries and other commercial things with traditional houses, cheap and local restaurants, away from the confusion of the city center and at the same time it near the center, 15 minutes walking or for those that does not like or can not walking a lot of bus is available.
notes: The breakfast from 8,00h a.m till 10,30h a.m
transit: We are very well served by public transports, bus, metro and trains ( very near of the principal metro and railway station of Porto named Campanhã). For parking it is possible to park in our street without problem, in front of our house.
access: Our guests may have access to the common parts of our house and garden and can make yoga if they want ask for Ayurvedic and tibetan bools massages
interaction: Our guests will be treated like friends and family
house_rules: Do not smoke at home and not make noise

host.host_about: Me and my husband are from Oporto,  we are yoga teachers and ayurvedic and bowl sound masseurs. We like contact and talk with interesting people and helping them to know better the Oporto city. We enjoy to go for a walk around  our city and  we like travel to know new cultures and peoples.

reviews.comments:
We had a very lovely time with Aurora and Alberto in their beautifull home in the Bom Fin area. We felt very welcome and A & A gave us a lot of usefu tips on what to do and see in Porto. They surprised us with a nice breakfast, the second day even in the garden.
Very fine, trustworthy and fun to talk with people!
Next time we will stay longer to also enjoy the yoga classes :)
Muito obrigado cariñosos Aurora y Alberto!! Hasta la proxima!
Miko & Swaze

Aurora and Alberto were very welcoming hosts and we really enjoyed our time at their beautiful place in Porto. They are helpful and kind and also prepared breakfast for us with fresh fruits from their wonderful garden.

We really would like to put 6/5. We felt very very well welcomed by Aurora and Alberto, who receive you in a charming house with caractere, originality and calm. 
Traveling with our little daughter (2 months) could have raised some issues, being hosted but I didn't at all.
On the contrary, Aurora & Alberto were careful and we appreciated sharing breakfast, conversations and their knowledge of Porto.
Little by little we build experience on Airbnb as host and as guest, and Jardim Yoga will ever stay an inspiring reference.

I had a great experience at Aurora's home. Aurora and Alberto are extremely nice people who will make you feel at home, are very helpful, considerate and are fun to be around. They offered that I join them and their friend to join them on a walk around the city which was very helpful. Also the chance to meet so locals and learn more about their culture and food was very unique. The home is very spacious with a lovely garden, the room is nice, clean and the bathroom is just fantastic. They prepared a healthy breakfast to start my day off and I already miss Alberto's unique and fresh morning juice. Overall I would highly recommend staying at Aurora's home.

Beautiful cosy house! Full of armony and with an outstanding decoration.  Aurora and her Husband were extremly kind. They even took us to a restaurant and explained all the activities in oporto. 100% recommended, and is a great value for money opportunity  :)

We had a great time at Aurora's, both her and her husband were really nice and made us feel just like at home. They gave us useful tips on what to see in Porto and how to get around which was very much appreciated. The room was very comfortable and the house was especially cozy and well located close to the metro and train station. My first airbnb experience was an amazing short stay thanks to both of them, definitely recommended!

Aurora and Alberto were the nicest and sweetest hosts ever. They invited us to an inspiring yoga class, were dedicated to help us discovering Porto and Alberto even took us to a great local restaurant.
The room (and the house and the garden) is beautiful, cozy, clean and silent.
This is the best place you can stay in Porto. We will definitely come back!

Oh my gods (we have 8 million gods who cover everything and all aspects in Japan)! It was the first time for me to stay in an air bnb. Although I was quite confident from their profile before my arrival, the quality of my stay was even beyond my high expectations. Aurora and Alberto confirmed they are the ideal hosts, and their house and garden were the ideal place to stay. I arrived with an empty stomach, and Aurora took me to one of the neighborhood restaurants and explained the menu in English (6 Euros for everything). After lunch, Alberto showed me all flowers and trees in the garden and later he had set up the hammock between the trees. I relaxed myself in the peaceful atmosphere with birds chirping among the fragrant orange and jasmine blossoms. During the stay, my friend, Emma and I received more than what we needed: beautifully decorated room and bathroom, delicious daily breakfast (sometimes in their lovely garden), good recommendations for restaurants and 1 day trips to nearby towns (they had prepared to give us all the information we need before we arrived). They learned my precise breakfast request in one day and prepared perfectly for the rest of my 11 day-stay. Also we enjoyed their yoga classes in the studio which is located in the basement with the window opening out to the garden. They sometimes offered me the fresh vegetable-and-fruit juice and yummy soup (They are vegetarians). On Sunday, when they have no classes, they offered us to drive around town. The highlight of the tour was the museum which also has a huge garden. Alberto knows all the flowers and plants, and has a lot of stories about almost everything. I shared their tastes and felt they were my friends for years. I totally recommend this place and will come back in the near future for a longer stay. Machiko

If you are searching for a place tot stay near centre of Porto, I can recommend the place of Aurora and Alberto.

The place is calm and lovely, has a very nice garden with you can use, a served breakfast every day, lovely, nice decorated room and even more lovely bathroom of your own. They have lots of tips what to visit in Porto and are alway wiling to help.

Porto centre is at walking distance, supermarket and postoffice too.
Near a metro/train station and bus to centre. 

If you stay buy a massage for an even more relaxed holiday feeling after a day of exploring Porto......

AMAZING room in an AMAZING house with AMAZING hosts. I had a great time at Aurora's house. She offered me breakfast and her husband helped me during 45 minutes to circle the best locations in Porto on a map. I strongly recommand this place and the center of Porto is a 20 minute walk away. Very confortable and truly memorable. Thanks for everything :)

Aurora and Alberto are the best! they give you tips and make you a lovely breakfast, but most of all, they open up their house and live style to you. Very calm, elegant, simple and caring. Besides, they have the most beautiful garden that makes you breath and fall in love with the house. Great place, lovely people, osom shower and bed. Walking distance from everything. It was the perfect home to get to know Porto.

Our stay at Aurora and Alborto was fantastic. They are very friendly. Their house is spacious and in a quiet neighnourhood, though close enough for a walk to the city centre. They have a nice bathroom wit ha bath and a beautiful garden full of fruit trees, flowers and a o so nice hammock :)
I would almost forget to say about the really good breakfast which is included. Could highly recommend.

Thanks again!
Dirk and Hilde

Coming back in the night to Aurora's and Alberto's place, we were already looking forward to the next day, which would start in the cozy garden with a nice breakfast. The guys were happy to help us find interesting places in the city and it was always great to share with them what we did and saw the day before. They were also so kind to bring us to the contemporary art museum on their weekend. Thanks to Aurora and Alberto we definitely felt very welcome to get a glimpse into the life of the local people. The best experience we could have hoped for! Also the place itself is beautiful and filled with individuality. The city center is within easy reach.
We were very happy to have stayed with Aurora and Alberto during our Porto trip!

Vraiment j'ai adoré Aurora et Alberto, et oui, Micha (la chatte) aussi!
Ils sont super sympas et accueillants. On se sent comme chez soit tellement ils sont chaleureux. Ils font un petit déjeuner super bon, nutritif et sain. D'ailleurs, tout l'ambiance de la maison respire la zen attitude!, c'est calme, beau, lumineux et zen. La chambre où j'ai été logée est belle, propre et tranquille. Le jardin est magnifique avec ces fleurs et arbres fruitiers. La saille de bain est super agréable, ample et propre. Enfin, toute la maison est remplie de bon gout et bonnes ondes. Le quartier est aussi bien, pas très loin du centre (on peut aller en marchant), desservi en bus et métro et au même temps calme. Alors: je vous conseille vivement chez Aurora et Alberto, pour votre séjour à Porto!

Nous avons été très satisfaits de notre séjour chez Aurora et Alberto. Ils sont juste adorables, au petit soin des invités. 
La maison est très propre, lumineux et possède un jardin sympathique. Elle est 1000 fois mieux que sur les photos (je n'exagère pas :) )

Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. Ils sont formidables.

Encore un GRAND MERCI!!!

Un séjour au top ! Aurora et son mari ont été très accueillant ! Ils nous ont donné beaucoup de conseils pour notre séjour pour tout ce qui est lieux à visiter, bonnes adresses... 
La maison est superbe, la salle de bain ultra spacieuse, le lit est spacieux et on y dort très bien. Le luxe : un petit déjeuner complet et vraiment bon dans un jardin très agréable ! 
Une superbe adresse pour visiter la magnifique ville de Porto ! 
Charles&Constance

Conveniently located near the Campanha station, easy for us travelling by train from porto to lisboa. Aurora and her husband were extremely helpful!! They gave wonderful recommendations for things to do in porto and told us about the history and culture of portugal. Delicious and generous breakfast. clean and comfortable rooms and toilets. Aurora even went the extra mile to get us pasteis de natas for breakfast simply because we enquired the day before on where we could find some in Porto. Highly recommended!!

Aurora & Alberto are such lovely and kind hosts!!! The house is very beautyful and cute furnished, the garden seems to be a small wellness oasis :). I enjoyed my stay in Porto so much and had a great time and fun at St.Johns Festival with lovely people. Definetely I recommend this wonderful place and I'm sure, I will come back!
Thank you so much! Yvonne

nous avons passé un tres bon sejour,dans un cadre soigné ,alberto et aurora nous ont donné plein d 'infos pour visiter porto ainsi que les horaires de train et adresses de resto la chambre est bien située pas loin de la gare et du metro et des bus  jean-luc et monique

Aurora and Alberto are really great hosts! It's a nice and cosy house, clean and charming room & bathroom. The garden was our favourite place for breakfast or to rest a bit in the shadow when it was too hot. They gave us all the help and information we needed in Porto, and extra tips and to do's. The location is near to Campahna station, easy to get to from the airport, and also good when you want to take the train to lisbon. A walk to the centre takes some time, but you can take public transport. We really recommend this place and will certainly go back there if we ever visit Porto again.

Eine wunderschöne Unterkunft mit viel Stil und Ruhe mitten in Porto. Aurora und ihr Mann sind grossartige Gastgeber. Im lauschigen Garten haben wir ueber Gott und die Welt palavert. Ein Stueck Paradies in Portugal. Vielen Dank. Wir kommen wieder.

Aurora and Alberto are warm, enthousiastic and dedicated hosts we liked to be and talk with. We immediately felt very very welcomed. The room is spacious and nicely decorated, the bathroom beautifull, and having a great full breakfast in the perfect garden was a straight moment in paradise each day. Highly recommended!

Wow! As you can see from the many other reviews, this place is amazing. We arrived and checked in with such ease as Aurora was waiting for us. What a beautiful home, so spacious, clean and modernly decorated it was so relaxing staying here we wished we had longer! What a fantastic host (and couple) Aurora and her husband are. He sat down with us and explained the entire map pointing out places to see/eat/do. Beautiful breakfast spread in there backyard with an explanation on all the plants and trees of fruit they have. Truly an amazing experience with airbnb we had here. It was such a pleasure staying with them and it made our experience in Porto much better. I would highly recommend staying here and would stay again if I ever came to porto again! Thank you!

A lovingly furnished house with great hosts-it was a shame to have only stayed one night. We immediately felt very comfortable with Aurora and hope to return one day to Porto to this place. The house is centrally located, yet quiet, and to enjoy breakfast in the garden is the perfect start for the day. Thank you Aurora for the beautiful and very rewarding time!

Aurora and Alberto were excellent hosts. Very helpful with everything about Porto and their breakfasts in the garden are truly lovely.
We recommend them as hosts.
The reservation was canceled 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Aurora e Alberto sono Host molto ospitali, gentili e pieni di premure per i loro ospiti. Alberto può fornire indicazioni preziose sulla città e sui luoghi intorno. Se dovessi tornare a Porto sicuramente contatterò ancora Aurora e Alberto per soggiornare nella loro bellissima casa.

For me the house of Alberto and Aurora was a perfect place to stay in Porto!  Although you you can reach it easily from the centre by foot or bus, it is very quiet.
The both are so nice and friendly people and the place with it´s wonderfull garden so unique, that I decided spontanously to stay longer. At least I have been there for 5 nights and enjoyed the very nice ambience. They handled many things for me, like renting a bike, calling a taxi and so on. I travelled alone and here I felt like staying with friends.I recommend Aurora as a very nice host, if you are searching for something especially, stay here!

Aurora and Alberto are the most amazing hosts! They were there to greet us when we arrived and immediately showed us around the apartment, which was absolutely beautiful!! Alberto helped us park our car and also carried our baggage into the house!! Our room was gorgeous, and the bathroom so lovely!! I really wish we would have had a few more days there!! Aurora then accompanied us around the area and showed us a great place to dine? It was amazing food and so inexpensive! We then met them at home and they took us to the center of the city and showed us around. We went for coffee and they further acquainted us with the city! They were over and above in helping us to feel comfortable in Porto! They are passionate about their city and made us feel the same! The next morning Aurora made us a fantastic breakfast which we ate overlooking their gorgeous garden!! We spent the day enjoying Porto thanks to their great guidance. The next morning Aurora and Alberto provided us with another wonderful breakfast in their garden. Aurora and Alberto really made our trip to Porto comfortable and such fun! They really are super people who love to show their guests their city. I would love to visit them again in the future!! They have a five star accommodation in a most beautiful city. Highly recommended!!!!

Excelente....:)) Casal muito simpático e jardim encantador...:)) Dá gosto passar uns dias nesta casa..............vamos repetir !!!!

Teresa e Jean-Marc

Super sweet couple and the house and room are big, comfortable and clean. Aurora and her husband make you feel very welcomed and are very attentive with their guests. The house is located close to the metro station and walking distance (20 mins) to the city attractions. However, Porto has many hills and getting back to the house can be a bit tiring, I used the metro and taxi, and it was ok. Beautiful house, beautiful people. Totally recommend!

We had a great stay with Aurora and Alberto.  I liked them personally, and wished we had more time.  They have a comfortable house, a pretty garden, provided tasty breakfasts, and couldn't have been more thoughtful  about helping us find our way around Porto.  Staying with them added a very nice friendly dimension to our visit to Portugal.

Hôtes charmants. Merveilleux accueil et conseils avisés.
Belle maison, au calme, joli jardin.
Chambre agréable et petites déjeuners sains, bons et copieux.

Très belle expérience.
Staying at Aurora's place in Porto was wonderful! The room was big and clean, the breakfast was great and Aurora and her husband were so kind. We recommend staying there.

I stayed here for 2 nights and it was wonderful. Aurora and Alberto were warm and welcoming hosts. Their house is fabulous, the room comfortable and the garden just lovely. The breakfast is delicious and included in the price which is very good value.
everything was wonderful

Aurora et Alberto sont des personnes formidables, leur maison est très belle et très accueillante, dans un quartier calme, on s'y sent vraiment bien. 
     Je voyageais à Porto avec mon petit garçon de deux ans : ils ont été très patients, prévenants et m'ont donné plein de bons conseils pour visiter la ville. J'ai eu beaucoup de chance de les rencontrer. 
     Toujours prêts à rendre service, ils aiment vraiment leur ville et ont plaisir à la faire découvrir. 
Merci Aurora et Alberto pour votre accueil !

Nous revenons de Porto où nous avons passé 5 jours très agréables, sous un beau soleil, nous avons séjourné chez Aurora et son mari, qui sont des hôtes très sympathiques, nous avons eu un excellent accueil, avec pleins de bons conseils pour visiter la ville
Une belle adresse où l'on se sent bien et qu'on ne peut que recommander
fabienne

It was cold during our visit to Porto - as to be expected in November! Despite this we very much enjoyed our stay with Aurora and Alberto. Their house is beautiful, and they are wonderful guides to the area - always able to give us advice to more enjoy our visit. You could not ask for better hosts! Everything in the house was in great shape, we had everything we needed. The house is located convenient to the train station, several restaurants and cafes, and markets. We enjoyed the longer walks into the center of town and to Gaia, also. We would definitely stay here again, and recommend it for others.

Aurora and Alberto are incredible persons, very friendly . Aurora on her own is very caring, and Alberto is great giving trip advices, our vacations were better because of our stay at this wonderful house.
Great neighbor, very quiet, beautiful house, full of light, and great people with nice energy!  I would say is even better then the description :)  I would return any time and recomend it definitely!
Thank you for the genorsity and the details!

Notre séjour à Porto n'aurait définitivement pas été le même sans l'excellent accueil que nous avons reçu d'Aurora et Alberto. Ils sont chaleureux, généreux, intéressants et passionnés par leur ville... Que dire? on s'est senties en famille et je recommande chaudement ce lieu à ceux qui veulent vivre une belle expérience humaine au Portugal. (à noter, ils parlent parfaitement français)
Leur maison est accueillante, et vaste, on s'y sent bien.
Merci Aurora et Alberto, pour tous nos échanges, et on espère vous revoir bientôt, ici ou là-bas! :)
Lovely people in a relaxed and friendly home. My stay was a pleasure and I recommend to all to experience their kind hospitality for themselves.

A experiência foi ótima, senti-me verdadeiramente acolhida. As imagens são fidedignas e a localização é muito boa (para referência de caminhada ao centro, a estação de metrô Campo 24 de Agosto é a ideal. Mas não se preocupe, todas as dicas com detalhes são dadas pela Aurora e pelo Alberto). A casa possui uma energia maravilhosa e os anfitriões são pessoas muito, muito especiais. Preciso dizer que se tiverem a oportunidade de conhecê-los, não deixem de fazê-lo.

Very friendly hosting, in a nice position 15 minutes from Porto city center by foot, close to some typical traditional restaurants. The room was large and clean, good breakfast and clean bathroom with towels included. They can speak English and French, and understand also Italian.

This is great value for money accommodation. Your hosts are knowledgeable about Porto city and will sit you down and explain the city to you including some great tips and locations. I walked into the main city area which is about 15 minutes walking although there is public transport nearby. The eateries around the location come cheap if you wanted a quick meal in a hurry. You are also provided with a simple breakfast which was enough to get me going for the day. I was there in the rainy season so could not take advantage of the beautiful garden setting. I arrived by car and was able to park in the street outside.

Voilà une belle adresse à Porto pour se sentir accueilli. Pour celles et ceux qui aime le Yoga, génial¨, car Aurora et son mari sont des passionnés et il est même possible de suivre un de leurs cours dans la salle de yoga dans la maison. Par ailleurs, pleins de renseignements utiles sur la ville et les environs

Aurora and Alberto are very nice hosts. They offer us a lot of useful tour and traffic information. The house is large and well decorated, with 15 minutes walk to the city center and near to the train station, which takes you to Lisbon and other important destinations. Breakfast is fresh made. We are very grateful to their B&B hosting and best wishes!
Thank you for hosting us :-)

Dear Aurora & Alberto, 

thanks for giving us such a warm home for a few days. We really enjoyed the stay and highly recommend it to our friends and everybody else. 

We wish you always very kind guests, which make your live richer as it is already. 

Greetings from Germany, Claudia & Maria

Io e Claudia abbiamo avuto un bellissimo soggiorno a Porto. Questo anche graze ad Aurora ed Alberto che ci hanno accolto con grandissima cortesia  e calore nella loro casa.
Sempre disponibili a preziosi suggerimenti e consigli ma mai invadenti. 
La casa è bella e ben tenutal ha un bellisso giardino ed è comoda anche per chi ha un'auto propria perchè si può tranquillamente parcheggiare di fronte. A colazione ci è stato offerto un buonissimo miele ed una buonissima marmellata fatta in casa. 
In definitiva un alloggop da consgliare sotto tutti i punti di vista.

My 5-day stay with Aurora and Alberto was truly enjoyable and rewarding experience. The house with beautiful blooming garden is a perfectly located to explore the city.. but the main value of the place are marvelous hosts, very generous and open-hearted people who do their best to make you feel at home.

Très bon accueil, Aurora et Alberto sont d'une gentillesse exquise et leurs recommandations de visites étaient bien vues. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié.
Si la pluie était au rendez-vous pendant notre séjour, nos hôtes nous ont réchauffé le coeur. Merci beaucoup.

La maison est vraiment superbe; elle dégage un sentiment d'harmonie très reposant. Nous avons été remarquablement bien accueillis et conseillés.
Aurora et Alberto sont très à l'écoute et aux petits soins, leurs conseils nous ont permis de longues promenades et probablement évité bien des difficultés pour découvrir la ville. 
Françoise et Jean François

Aurora e Alberto são excelentes anfitriões. Fomos muito bem recebidos, tivemos todas as informações sobre a cidade e redondezas, a casa é muito confortável, o café da manhã preparado pelo Alberto é excelente e a localização é perfeita. Por isso tudo realmente recomendo que você se hospede com eles.

Aurora's accommodation was perfect. A lovely restored home with beautiful period features, conveniently located a short walk from the railway and metro stations. Quiet, with a lovely garden. Our hosts were very friendly and accommodating, providing lots of helpful local information, and kindly giving us a lift back to the railway station. I had a lovely short stay with them, and would not hesitate to return when I hopefully visit Porto again. Thank you very much. John
The house of Aurora e Alberto is wonderful, great Breakfast! I would absolutely recommend!

Der Aufenthalt in Porto hat uns gut gefallen, und eine große Hilfe dabei waren die Gespräche und Tipps von Aurora und Alberto. Die Ausflüge haben wir jeden Tag beim Frühstück zusammen mit den Beiden geplannt, so dass wir die Stadt nach 4 Tagen ganz gut kennengelernt haben. Die Ausstellung des Hauses ist sehr interessant, und auf mittlerem Niveau komfortabel. Die Gastgeber wohnen im gleichen Haus, und zusammenwohnen kann man mit einer WG vergleichen. Trotzdem hat man genug Ruhe. Zusammenfassend ist die Unterkunft zu empfehlen.

très belle rencontre avec Aurora et Alberto
ils sont charmants, serviables et donnent plein d'information
leur maison est propre, très lumineuse et calme, le petit déjeuner au jardin, est vraiment sympa

Aurora's place is a small paradise with a beautiful house, a gorgeous garden and a Yoga room (guests can attend the Yoga classes). We had a great stay at her place. Aurora and Alberto are great hosts, extremely generous and helpful, they will really try to make your stay as pleasant as possible! We felt at home and cared for. Thank you so much! We will come back and hope to see you soon!
Aurora and Alberto were very warm and helpful, great stay in a lovely house.

Dear Aurora and Alberto, thanks for giving us a nice and friendly home. What a beautiful house. This evening i bought me some soya beans and cooked my first soya milk :-).
We felt comfortable staying with you and are glad about your informations and all the must sees you gave us. 

We wish you all the best!

We were pleasantly surprised by the kindness and hospitality of Aurora and Alberto. They both were very helpfull with everything we needed or wanted to know. The minute we came in their colourfull and cosy house, we felt at ease.
Having breakfast in the Sunny garden happened only once, because of the rain (bad luck) but the kitchen table wasn't so bad either, with Aurora or Alberto chattering around us :)

Nous sommes très contents de notre séjour tant pour l'accueil qui nous a été réservé que pour la qualité du logement.
Nous avons apprécié la gentillesse et les échanges en français avec nos hôtes.

Estadia excepcional, uma das melhores de todas as nossas viagens. Adquirimos dois amigos portugueses. Casa excelente, quartos confortáveis, jardim maravilhoso com ameixeiras cujas ameixas frescas eram servidas no pequeno almoço. Maravilhoso. Altamente recomendável.

Tout était superbe ! Logement très beau, très propre et bien situé.  Le lit est confortable aussi. Le jardin est magnifique et bien entretenu. Nos hôtes sont bien sympathiques. De plus, Alberto est une bible d'informations sur tout le Portugal !
Merci à Aurora & Alberto !
Linda &Roger
This place is a beautiful home and yoga center just outside the center of Porto. The hosts were friendly and gave me lots of useful information. I really appreciated their guidance about the city!

Porto is a really great town with a lovely historic port area. Aurora is a great  host and nothing is to hard for her. The back garden is great on hot days and it is only a 15 minute walk to town. I would highly recommend staying .
Our short trip to Portugal lead us to Porto where stayed at Aurora and Alberto's yoga place. Thank you for your great hospitality and the personalised sight seeing itinerary :). We had a great time.

My experience with Aurora and Alberto was wonderful. They took their time to explain about the area and gave me excellent suggestions. I enjoyed very much our breakfast time and talks. The listing was very accurate and the place exceeded my expectations. The neiborhood is safe and quiet.

The location in Porto was very clean and had a friendly environment by the Host Aurora and her husband. They were very enthusiastic in helping us navigate around the city and helped us with common tourist problems. Overall a great place that was very clean, and two friendly hosts. I recommend this location to anyone in Porto.

Aurora and Alberto are great hosts. They had wonderful recommendations for us. We greatly enjoyed our stay with them - fabulous garden, wonderful place, perfect location. We highly recommend them.

Gerd and Petra

Our stay in Porto with Aurura & Alberto was amazing. They were truly incredible hosts and made our stay a memorable one. They both went out of their way to recommend things to do for us and even gave us a tour through the city. As airbnb hosts ourselves we definitely learnt a great deal from Alberto & Aurora. The Yoga class in their studio was a great touch! Highly recommended!

Aurora and Alberto are great people and feel good what kind of information you need to visit Porto. They make you feel at home and are intrested. We had a great time and a comfortable room. We were invited for a yoga class from Alberto .  We made a choice to have breakfast in their great garden..thxs Thijs and Mireille

Aurora e Alberto me proporcionaram uma ótima estadia em Porto: a casa e o quarto são muito confortáveis e aconchegantes. A privacidade oferecida contemplou muito bem as minhas expectativas. Vou me recordar com carinho dos momentos de descontração oferecidos pela família, como os pequenos almoços (ou café da manhã para os brasileiros). Há um restaurante bem próximo à casa, onde pude fazer refeições boas por um custo muito acessível. Além disso, a viagem teria sido outra, certamente menos interessante,  sem as muito preciosas dicas de Alberto. Muito obrigada!

We enjoyed our first airbnb experience staying with Aurora and Alberto in their wonderful city of Porto. We were within walking distance of many areas of Porto, as well buses and metro, and also able to enjoy the quiet and calm in their gorgeous garden.  Alberto gave us lots of helpful information about where to go and what to do in Porto.

We had a wonderfull time with Alberto and Aurora. They were really nice to us, they explained the city in a very complete way, made us feel completely at home with a délicious breakfast in the garden... We really loved Porto thanks to them! Thanks again, Loubna and Cécile

Nous avons passé un très bon moment chez Aurora et Alberto, on s'y sent comme à la maison.
Le petit déjeuner au soleil est particulièrement agréable ...
Merci encore à vous deux pour vos conseils et  votre bonne humeur!

Aurora and Alberto are just perfect hosts in a magnificient house beautifuly and peacefully decorated! They did everything to make us feel at home and gave us really good advices to discover the best places in Porto. I can only recommend them and thank them for their beautiful energy! It was a true pleasure to stay with them.

Aurora and Albero are really nice people and wonderful hosts. Yoga lesson in the morning was a great start of the day. Good breakfast with home made jam in their beautiful garden. Alberto's tour around the garden, showing us the herbs and fruit they grow, was really nice. Location was good with walking distance both to the train station from where we took the train to Lisbon, and very easy to go from the airport.

Aurora and Alberto are wonderful hosts, courteous, open-minded, uncomplicated and very helpful. And their house is a really peaceful oasis in Porto. The good atmosphere in the house is characterized by the spirit of the both, the house and rooms are all in perfect order, tasteful and carefully decorated and we felt at home from the very first minute onward. We were pleased to join a yoga class in the morning, which is a wonderful start in the day and Alberto told us so many exciting things to visit in town - especially interesting locations you won't find in any travel book - great! We were lucky to enjoy fresh khaki fruits from the garden, which were ripe just during our stay - delicious! Aurora gave us useful advice how to get around in town each morning, with bus and metro connections, and even walking to town or station is no problem from their place. Thank you very much, Aurora and Alberto, you both contributed greatly to our successful and happy holidays in Porto!
aurora and Alberto were very cordial and welcomed us warmly. Alberto spent much time in showing us on a city map places of interest. they are a delight

From the moment I arrived I felt very welcome in this beautiful house of Aurora and her husband. They both teach yoga and in the evening I could already join for one class, eventhough I only stayed one night! They explained a lot to me about what to see, where to go, and how to get there. And where very warm and friendly.

Un accueil chaleureux dans une tres jolie maison decoree avec gout j ai adore le petit dejeuner dans le jardin au soleil. Aurora et Alberto sont absolument charmants et ont pris le temps de me conseiller pour mes sorties j ai passe un excellent sejour avec eux et recommande cette adresse tres vivement. Merci
Wir haben zwei Nächte in diesem wirklich schönen Haus verbracht und uns sehr willkommen gefühlt. Eine kleine Oase in Porto.Wir kommen gerne wieder...

what Kind of lovely People, Aurora and her Husband!
And what a lovely Place ! Two real yogis!
thank you so much.

Alberto and Aurora were fantastic hosts ! Always responded quickly and thoroughly with information/directions etc. They took the time to highlight the best parts of Porto for us to explore and catered terrifically to our food allergies.(Alberto's turmeric chestnuts were awesome)The house has a warm and inviting feel, it was like staying with good family friends rather then people we had just met!

I regret that I couldn't stay longer. The rooms and bathroom were furnished with highest style. It's truly beautiful house. I felt there like home since first seconds. It's very close to main train station and just 15 minutes walk from centre of Porto.
Aurora and Alberto are wonderful host.They are very kind and gave me good tips about the city.The room is cozy and comfortable.I will stay here when I go to Porto again.
I really enjoyed my stay in Yoga Garden's Place. The house is beautiful! Aurora is an amazing hostess. She can help you with everything.

Un tout grand merci à Aurora et Alberto pour votre accueil chalheureux, vos conseils avisés et votre bienveillance ! La maison est vraiment superbe et la chambre est très confortable ! On se sent tout de suite comme chez soi ! On reviendra avec grand plaisir lors d'une prochaine escapade en amoureux à Porto! Muito obrigada! :)

I had the most amazing experience. I did not want to leave. Their house is something you could only dream of. The cutest little yoga inspired home. They were also exceptional hosts. They allowed us to join a yoga session in their basement, they made us breakfast and then they helped us plan our day. A great location, really easy to find. I plan on returning one day! A must stay.

Merci Aurora et Alberto !!!   quel bonheur, quel accueil, deux yogi merveilleux, une maison  chaleureuse à 15 minutes à pied du centre. On s'y sent bien dès le premier moment, le lieu est plein de petits détails apaisants .. Ils sont à deux une mine d'informations sur Porto, ils n'hésitent pas à prendre le temps de donner des adresses, des directions, ils prennent le temps de discuter et, le petit déjeuner est hmmmmm. Faites le cours de Yoga qu'ils proposent, il est excellent! j'y retournerais sans hésiter :)

It's enogh to satisfy that my first Europe travel. Hosts - Aurora&Alberto - were so much kind people Im've ever met. Besides, they guided me the best way I can travel at Porto, it was the most helpful and effective. 
If you are reading this review, don't hesitate and book here. I strongly recommend you. 
Thank you both, Aurora & Alberto!

Aurora and Alberto are friendly and prompt to respond to my request to stay with them. Really enjoyed the experience even though I had a bad cold and was needing some rest.They're house is located in a quiet spot and yet a short walking distance to the train/metro station which is practical for traveling. A warm atmosphere, cultural and nostalgic with wonderful local honey on toast for breakfast and a myriad of healthy herbal teas. It was very interesting to be shown round the garden and learn some biological and nutritional characteristics of the plants and fruits there. I have no hesitation in recommending this location.
Aurora me recebeu muito bem, se dispôs a me ajudar,  me deu indicações sobre os passeios a fazer...  Além disso,  um ótimo café da manhã e uma casa muito bonita. Recomendo!

What a great place! We had a very nice time staying at this lovely house. Aurora and her partner were very kind and helped us with directions, suggestions on what to do/eat/see, and even gave us some tips to improve our Portuguese! 

Their house is very neat and bright. It's a great place to spend a few nights if you want to stay away from the very busy and touristic downtown Porto but still within a 20 walk.

We had a wonderful stay. The house is beautiful, warm and light and has many lovely artworks and curiosities. We were sad to only stay one night as it was a really comfortable place. Aurora and Alberto were extremely generous and caring hosts and gave us great tips on places to visit while we were in Porto. We had a lovely breakfast and even a tour through their magical garden. A very special place.
I &my sister had  a good time in Aurora ' house. It's cozy, comfortable.  I especially like their bathroom. So beautiful. Also Aurora and her husband were very kind, friendly.

La estancia con mi familia fué espectacular. La casa es super bonita con una chimenea que tiene mucho encanto.  El patio y las habitaciones son grandes y comodas. Autora y Alberto son muy atentos y majos. El desayuno muy roco y el café buenisimo. Fué una estancia muy agradable llena de historia y encanto. Hemos quedado muy contentos.

Linda cidade, linda casa, lindas pessoas.
Recomendaremos a todos.

Um grande abraço Aurora, Alberto e Nisha

We really had a great time with Aurora and Alberto. Charming house, beautiful garden,  marvelous breakfast and even our first yoga class as a bonus!
Thank you again for this wonderful time, you were perfect hosts!

Aurora and her husband are really nice. They provided us with all the informations we need when we travelling in Porto. The house is big, beautiful and clean. I am looking forward for my next trip in Porto!
这个房子在一个很安静的街上,而且离着地铁和公车都很近,在波尔图旅游的话非常值得选择｡而且它周围的餐馆和酒馆都十分便宜｡
Het was mijn tweede verblijf bij Aurora. Weer net zo goed als de vorige keer. Tips over de stad Porto, fijne kamer, lekker ontbijt en flexibele mensen.

Aurora and Alberto are great hosts, we have a nice stay in their lovely and peaceful house.
Alberto gave us excellent advice for visit Porto. All we need to do is follow his guide and get a wonderful trip.

De A à Z. 
De Aurora et Alberto à Zen,tout y est bien.  
Ce couple amoureux partage avec tous  conseils, lieux à visiter, bons plans , adresses de restaurants sympa et pas cher ,etc. Le tout en français. 
C’est aussi un lieu de yoga, de bols (prononcez boules) tibétains et massages ayurvédiques. 
C’est une adresse que l’on garde précieusement.
Merci pour ces moments de bonheur . A bientôt.
Pierre-Marie et Marie-Cécile

We only can say that to choose this place to spent a couple of nights in Porto was the right option! Aurora and Alberto are really kind and friendly. They will explain you perfectly all the corners you should not miss in Porto, and a nice breakfast will do the rest! You can feel like at home. 100% recommendable.
Aurora foi muito gentil e cuidadosa! Uma pena que nossa estadia foi tão curta!

We had a very nice stay in Porto with Aurora and Alberto. They are the most perfect hosts! The house and rooms are lovely, Porto Centre is just a little walk away and there is enough room to park your car. A perfect place to stay and discover Porto!

With kind regards,

Willem (The Netherlands)

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à porto grâce à aurora et son mari. Très disponibles et accueillants, ce fut un réel plaisir de les avoir rencontrés et d' avoir pu partager de si bons moments. La maison est très agréable notamment leur si joli jardin et les cours de yoga de qualité. Ils ont de plus de très bons conseils pour visiter leur ville dans les meilleurs conditions. Merci encore pour ce séjour.

We had a wonderful time in Porto.  Staying with Aurora and Alberto in their lovely home made our visit a holiday to remember. The room is very pleasant. The bathroom beautiful (although shared, but with all having other schedules that never was an issue).
The breakfast was good and the oranges from the garden made it very special. A good way to start the day. The garden is a truly oasis to be in. You don't feel that you are in the city at all.
The location of the house is very good. The old city center being within walking distance. 
Aurora and Alberto are very open and pleasant people and go way beyond what can be expected from "hosts". Really giving us the feeling that we kind of where visiting old friends. We are thankfull that they opened  up their home like this.

My hosts were outstanding, they let me feel at home, provided me with good suggestions of places to visit and restaurants. Other than that, I recommend the ayurvedic massage. 
The house is perfectly located, close to the center (walking distance) and easily reachable from the airport.

This was my very first experience as a Airbnb user, and a very successful one! My friends and I had a wonderful stay with Aurora and her husband. Their house is beautiful and has many lovely and interesting artworks. Aurora and Alberto were extremely generous and caring hosts and gave us great tips on places to visit while we were in Porto. This was especially helpful since my friends and I had booked the trip on a whim and didn’t know much about Porto. We had a lovely breakfast every morning  and even a tour of their lovely garden. Location is very convenient. We walked everywhere. I would highly recommend visiting Porto and staying with Aurora!

Aurora et Alberto sont très accueillants et de bons conseils sur les visites et activités de Porto ainsi que sur les restaurants. La maison et le jardin sont agréables et tranquilles. Le petit déjeuner est bon, et  petit plus, nous l'avons pris dans le jardin. A conseiller absolument!

This place is very nice. You really will feel welcome and homey. The garden is amazing and yoga lessons with Albert is a great bonus to overall pleasant experience. The place is not quite in the center of the Porto but in a walking distance or you can get a bus

Wir haben den Aufenthalt bei Aurora und Alberto sehr genossen. die beiden waren sehr hilfsbereit und man konnte mit jeder Frage zu ihnen kommen. Jeden Tag gab es Insider-Tipps, durch die wir Porto besser kennengelernt haben als durch irgendwelche Reiseführer.
Unser Zimmer und das ganze Haus waren geschmackvoll  eingerichtet. Der Garten war ein Erlebnis und zum Frühstück gab es frisch geerntete Orangen und Avocados. 
Vom Grostadtlärm bekam man nichts mit, das Haus liegt sehr ruhig, aber trotzdem recht zentral. 
Wir werden bestimmt wiederkommen.

We had a very good time in Porto. Alberto and Aurora are very nice hosts! The house is good located. Nice private bathroom and for them who loves to do their practise ... We followed the yoga lessons.  Highly recommanded!

It was a perfect end for my two-week solo trip. Aurora and Alberto's warm host makes Porto much more interesting than I expected.
Great location: 10 mins walk from Campanha train/tube station. Convenient for me as I took the train from Lisbon to Porto and I went back by air.
Comfortable and beautiful room: The house is very artistic and my room is very comfortable and quiet.
Warm host: I had a wonderful breakfast with warm toasted local bread and different home made jams which are extremely tasty. Also, Aurora gave me very detailed guidance on the direction on the map and made very good recommendation on where I could visit.
Thanks very much, Aurora and Alberto! I will definitely come back to Porto and meet you.

Aurora and Alberto are great hosts. Very proud of their city, aware of peoples interests in their tourist tips, and for us they were very flexible and tolerant of our large [loud?] family. The girls were accepted into a yoga class on the evening we arrived which they enjoyed.  Oh, and did I mention Alberto's coffee at breakfast!? Regards, Michael, Elly and the  Cycling Across Borders 'team'.

nous avons été très bien reçus  chez aurora  et alberto ce sont deux personnes très attentionnées et qui aime porto nous avons été bien conseillé pour les endroits a visiter sur porto et sa région et  aussi pour les restaurants!!  c'est vraimant une bonne adresse située a moins de 30minutes a pied du centre historique et  dans une rue calme ou
nous avons pu garer notre voiture sans problème
je recommande vivement ce logement

J'ai passé un séjour extraordinaire dans cette maison du bonheur. Tout y est parfait : la décoration, les couleurs, les bonnes odeurs, la tranquillité, le confort de la chambre, le calme du quartier à 10mn de la gare, et surtout la gentillesse et le sourire de ce couple charmant.

Aurora et Alberto ont pris du temps pour me conseiller des visites intéressantes et de bons restaurants. Ils parlent couramment  le français et l'anglais. Ils nous permettent d'assister aux cours de yoga, dans leur salle propice à la méditation, face au jardin. Alberto fait aussi des massages aryuvédiques ( 35 euros seulement, pour une heure de bien-être total avec musique et couverture chauffante ). On ne peut que repartir heureux, le sourire aux lèvres. 

Si je retourne un jour à Porto, c'est chez eux que je reviendrai !

My best friend and I stayed for 3 nights and it must be one of the best accommodations you could wish for. Very clean room and bath room. Quiet neighbourhood, yet very close to city center. Super sweat hosts and fabulous breakfast in the morning. Alberto's insider tips were highly appreciated. We had a great time! Thank you so much!!

La permanenza da Aurora e Alberto é stata piacevolissima. Sono molto ospitali e disponibili, ci hanno spiegato per filo e per segno come muoverci dentro Oporto. La colazione è stata una rivelazione: squisita e variegata. Che dire: da fare e rifare perché ne vale la pena.

Very nice stay at a beautifull house full of nice art. 
Friendly and warm people and we had some good talks. 
The bathroom is the coolest ever and only in use for guests.

It was a realy good place, nice energie and nice people and a very nice house with garden.A quite place in a big city
We will come back as we are in Porto again

The House and the Hosts were wonderful! Felt like home and fell in Love with the Garden,  Porto, the People & Food. Can only recommend the yoga class and to top of the day aurvedic & bowl Massage. I will be back asap :-)

We had a wonderful stay at the B&B of Aurora and Alberto. They gave us a warm welcome and we got a very thourough explanation of all the worthwile things to visit in Porto. In the morning during breakfast and in the evening we had nice chats.  

Oh...and don't forget to ask for a massage....this is a welcoming relaxation after a full day of climbing up and down the hills of Porto

Aurora and Alberto were very welcoming and gave good tips about visiting Porto. Aurora was so sweet to surprise us with breakfast and tea in their lovely garden (she has a very nice tea collection). If you are looking for a peaceful getaway out of the city centre (just a little walk away), this is the place to be!

Beloved Aurora and Alberto. Thank u for the wonderful stay with you.
You are soo nice couple, Alberto takes a lot of time to explain us everything about Porto, amazing breakfirst, we laughed a lot with them, both warm and kind people, wonderful bathroom, room ok, nice house in pink. Thank you very much for your kindness.

English:
Aurora and Alberto were amazing hosts! When I first got there, I met Aurora. She showed me my room (which was beautiful btw - the bed is huge and there's an entire closet for you to put your clothes, if you want), showed the bathroom, gave me the house key and a few suggestions of places to eat/to visit. They live some 15 minutes by foot from the center of Porto (and from there you can see places like the Ribeira, th D. Luis I Bridge, etc.), which is pretty neat. The next two mornings, they served us (there were two other guests from France) a nice breakfast, including coffee, bread, cheese, and a fruit. One of the nicest things Aurora did was lend me $5 when I had trouble paying with my credit card at this one sweets shop that is nearby (BRING CASH TO PORTO! this way you can eat at the cheap but good places!); she was okay with me paying her back once I was able to get money out. 
If you want a nice and safe place to stay in Porto, with loving and welcoming hosts, please choose Aurora and Alberto. They have so far been my favorite hosts (not that the others were bad - they just went above and beyond!) and I would definitely stay with them again if I went back to Porto.

Português:
Adorei ficar na casa da Aurora e do Alberto! Tive uma recepção muito calorosa da Aurora na manhã da minha chegada. Ela me mostrou tudo o que eu precisava - o meu quarto, a cozinha, o banheiro, lugares para visitar, etc. Também me deu dicas de onde eu poderia almoçar/jantar a um preço baixo.
A casa deles é beeeeeeem próxima ao centro de Porto, então não compre o cartão de viagem turístico que é vendido no aeroporto (a não ser que você esteja planejando ir para lugares como Matosinhos, que fica fora da zona de onde Aurora e Alberto moram e a passagem é mais cara). Além disso, com coisa de $6,  $7 euros, você pode jantar um prato feito e comer altos docinhos em uma das confeitarias/restaurantes perto da casa deles.
Eu recomendo a casa da Aurora e do Alberto para qualquer um que queira uma localização segura, perto do centro de Porto e com hospedeiros calorosos e gentis.
Excellent séjour, on a adoré prendre le petit déjeuner dans le jardin et les précieux conseils de nos hôtes sur leur ville.

We enjoyed our stay at Auroras and Albertos place very much. They are both very kind and openhearted and gave us the feeling beeing welcome. The house is a beauty spot and colourful, its furniture very tasteful. Our favourite room was the bathroom - it is really extraordinary. We enjoyed the breakfast in the lovely garden between trees and beautiful flowers. Both, Aurora and Alberto, love their little paradise. We've got a map and excellent tips where to go in Porto. Although we've had only 2 days, we've seen a lot. Thank you!

Our stay at Aurora and Alberto was great! They made us feel very at home. They gave us good information about the city. Every morning the breakfast was served in their beautiful garden: fresh bread and fruit, home made marmelade, cheese and tea. We got a key from the house, so we didn't had to wake anyone when we came home in the evening.
The room was clean, big enough and very quiet. We had to share  the bathroom with an other couple, but that was no problem. When necessary there was an other bathroom in the basement. 
The house is not quite in the city center, but only 10 minutes walking from the metro. In 20 minutes, it's possible by walking.
Uma ótima estadia.

Aurora et Alberto sont des personnes que l'on aimerait rencontrer dans toutes maisons d'hôtes.
ils nous accueillent chez eux avec gentillesse, prévenance et sont disponibles.
Nous avions 2 soirées et 1 journée sur Porto, Alberto nous a fait un programme au top pour que notre journée de visite soit efficace. Les restos conseillaient étaient populaires et très bons (menu à 5€), tout ce que l'on recherchait.
Nous nous sommes sentis vraiment comme à la maison, c'est une sensation très agréable.
Je recommande vivement.
Le quartier est à 10mn du centre en bus (bus toutes les 5mn), très calme! Parfait après une journée de visite intensive. La maison est zen!
Pensez à expérimenter les cours de yoga prodigués par Aurora et Alberto!
Nous reviendrons!

We had a wonderful stay and lovely time in Porto because of Aurora and Alberto, they are excellent hosts! They have a lovely house just outside the centre of Porto with a beautiful garden. They made us feel very welcome and  explained us how to find our way in Porto and all the nice and interesting places to visit and where to eat (not only the touristic places but also the "local" places). We think of Aurora and Alberto with sweet memories and a smile on our face and will visit them again next time we're in Porto. Dear Aurora and Alberto, many thanks and warm regards from Amsterdam from Mario and Sandra.

excellent accueil, excellents commentaires et idées d'Alberto pour visiter Porto
Logement bien situé , pas de soucis pour prendre le bus, le métro...

Absolutely amazing place, with even better hosts. Their passion for their home city is contagious. They told us where to go to see all the hidden treasures of Porto and also shared a cup of coffee while charming us in their oasis of a garden. Hands down favourite Portuguese experience.

Lovely house and awesome garden where the hosts have many fruit trees! 
The hosts were very friendly and were great for providing us with information on thing to do. 
We had a lovely breakfast with homemade jams and homegrown plums.
Location is in a nice quiet street and close walk to the centre of town

Aurora and Alberto were great hosts!! Everything was very nice, good beds beautiful garden and very lovely breakfast with own made marmelade and fruit from the garden. I highly recommend the place if you want a quite enviroment.

Nous étions 3 personnes et nous avons été accueillies très chaleureusement.
Les photos correspondent parfaitement.
Aurora et Alberto se rendent très disponibles pour nous conseiller, nous orienter et même partager des moments de découverte (nous sommes allées jusqu'à un musée ensemble).
Le petit déjeuner dans le jardin est incontestablement un vrai plus.
Avec les fruits du jardin qui plus est !!!!
Bref, je recommande de venir partager un moment dans cette maison très accueillante.
Le jardin est très joli et l'ambiance est très calme. L'hôte est très gentille. On a bien aimé le petit déjeuner.
Maison avec super décoration et jardin apaisant où nous avons pris notre petit déjeuner. Les hôtes sont très accueillants et nous ont conseillé pleins de bons plans. Ils parlent très bien français.

Nous avons ete tres bien accueillis chez Aurora et Alberto. Nous nous sommes semtis tres rapidement tres a l'aise. La maison est tres agreable ouverte et accueuillante le jardin ajoute a l'atmosphere reposante et nous etions invite' a participer au cours de yoga. 
La chambre confortable et le lit reposant.
Les explications sur Porto et le quartier nous ont aider a visiter la ville et comprendre mieux la vie local
Nous recommandons chaleureusement......
Really nice garden.the location is really central but calm. The hosts were really help full to find the best place in Porto.

J'ai passé un très bon moment avec Aurora et Alberto. Mes hôtes ont été aux petits soins et j'en ai profité pour m'offrir un massage ayurvedique je recommande ! La chambre est très belle et j'ai adoré la salle de bain. Pour ceux qui ne connaissent pas Porto il faut savoir que la maison n'est pas toute proche du centre ville je dirais 20 minutes pour y aller et 25 pour revenir à cause de la côte!! Mais on est tellement bien pour apprécier le calme du jardin ;)

Los duenos son muy amablesy el trato es cercano. El desayuno en el jardin muy agradable. Buenos consejos.
Bien comunicado para metro y tren, aunque se  llega por una calle desolada.

Notre passage fut bref mais nous avons passé une agréable nuit chez Aurora et Alberto qui ont trouvé le temps de nous accueillir très aimablement avant leur propre départ en vacances. Nous en avons également profité pour bénéficier des soins d'Alberto qui nous a prodigué à chacun un massage ayurvédique que nous recommandons vivement aux futurs hôtes de passage.

Nous sommes arrivés tard sur Porto vers minuit, mais une amie d'Aurora nous attendait. Nous avons été très bien accueillis.Notre séjour s'est agréablement bien passé. Le logement est très bien situé à 15 minutes en métro du centre dans un quartier calme. Aurora était joignable à tout moment si besoin.
Il est également très agréable de prendre son petit-déjeuner dans le jardin.

Aurora et Alberto n'étaient pas là mais leur amie Elena nous a très bien accueillis et conseillés sur les lieux à visiter à Porto. La maison d'Aurora est très agréable, accueillante. On s'y sent très à l'aise, le petit déjeuner dans le jardin est très appréciable. On est très vite au centre historique, en 10 minutes à pieds. Facile de se garer dans la rue. Un seul regret : n'avoir pas pu participer a un cours de yoga ou s'être fait faire un massage !
A nice house, with a beautiful garden when we feel really good

This was an excellent place in the middle of Porto with a beautiful quiet garden. We had a very warm welcome by Elene, who helped us immediatley with our navigation system. Thanks a lot, Elenea!
The rooms were decorated very teastefully and we immediatly felt at home. Absolute recommandation for anyone who wants to visit Porto!

Siamo stati accolti da Elene, un'amica dei proprietari, assenti in quel periodo. Elene è stata molto disponibile sia per quanto riguarda le normali necessità del soggiorno sia nel fornirci informazioni su dove mangiare e come muoverci a Porto. 
La casa è molto bella, assolutamente rispondente alla descrizione. E' arredata in stile orientale, dato l'interesse per lo yoga dei suoi proprietari. C'è un piacevole giardino con alberi da frutta ed un bel gatto. Le camere sono comode e pulite. La curiosità della casa è forse il bagno, molto particolare ed originale. Buona la colazione, anche se semplice.
Porto è una città affascinante, piena di sorprese.

Accueil chaleureux et sympathique d'Aurora et Alberto.
Petit-déjeuner délicieux dans le jardin, et, cerise sur le gâteau, un échange passionnant avec Alberto.
Ils nous ont indiqué de bonnes idées pour la découverte de Porto.
Seul petit bémol, la maison est un peu loin du centre...

Excellent séjour chez Aurora et Alberto. Les petits déjeuners dans le jardin sont un vrai bonheur ! Tous les deux sont très accueillants et Alberto nous a donné plein d'adresses et de conseils pour découvrir Porto et écouter du fado. J'espère revenir un jour pour continuer à découvrir Porto et continuer nos discussions. 
Lydie (Paris, France)

Le quartier est très calme, avons pu garer la voiture facilement.  Très bon accueil,  bonne literie, bon déjeuner.  Nos hôtes nous ont très bien conseillés pour rentabiliser notre visite de Porto au maximum en un minimum de temps.  Roberto nous a guidés pour nos visites ultérieures à l'intérieur du pays.  Nous retournerons très certainement lors de notre prochain passage à Porto.

Christiane et Charly.

They are yoga teachers.
They let me attend the classes which I really enjoyed.  They were fantastic classes. Our Room was very comfortable and location was very close to the train station.  Aurora cleaned the bathroom everyday. We received very helpful information and they helped us to enjoy Porto.

Aurora and Alberto did a great job of describing their place.  It is very beautiful and a nice quiet street near many convenient places in town such as a fresh market and delicious/inexpensive restaurants.

super
un ptit dej avec confiture maison 
les conseils d alberto et d aurora
que du plaisir
tous a gauche...
des biz
merci encore de votre accueil

Ces trois jours chez Alberto et Aurora étaient juste merveilleux.
Ce sont d'excelants hôtes qui ont toujours le souci de votre bien être !
Alberto est intarissable sur les trésors de sa ville Porto.
Aurora c'est même levée avec nous à 4 heures du matin pour être certaine que le taxi serait présent et nous préparer un thé.
Les petits déjeuners dans ce jardin entretenu avec amour sont magiques ( juste un petit bémol pour le café qui est lyophilisé une petit cafetière italienne peut être serait la bienvenue).
Bref ce séjour était parfait avec de très belles rencontres .
merci à Alberto et aurora d'y avoir contribué .
Si je retourne à Porto c'est chez Alberyo et Aurora que je retournerai ! 
Solenne

Very good stay at Aurora and Alberto's home. The hosts are really considerate. You will have good indications for your visits of Porto and a delicious breakfast to start the day! The place is quiet and you will surely have an enjoyable stay!

Aurora und Alberto sind wunderbare und warmherzige Gastgebert. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in ihrem Haus und haben uns in dem geschmackvoll eingerichteten Haus sehr wohlgefühlt. Alles ist genau, wie beschrieben. Besonders gut gefallen hat mir der Garten. Die Tipps der Gastgeber für unsere Entdeckertouren in Porto waren sehr hilfreich. Ein weiteres Highlight: die professionelle ayurvedische Massage von Alberto. Sehr zu empfehlen!!!

Aurora and Alberto are the ultimate hosts - they welcomed us in their beautiful and unique home, went beyond our expectations to suggest what to visit, see and eat, made my wife feel better when she was not feel well, and helped us feel like locals during our 3 nights stay.  They treated us like friends.  We highly recommend them for a wonderful experience in Porto.

Aurora et Alberto on ete merveilleux et maison (Website hidden by Airbnb) qu il a beaucoup plu car j aurais pu profiter du merveilleux petit dej en jardin et excellent confiture maison au petit dej et merci Aurora pour les pastel de Nata au petit dejeuner et hote a recommander pour tout ceux qui font une halte a Porto.Merci pour l adresse du restaurant.

I am sure Aurora and Alberto don't need any positive reviews but I will write one anyway as they deserve to be highly recommended.
Being the first time to travel alone I was rather wary before arriving at their home. However on arrival my anxiety disappeared as they are a great team at making you feel welcome and at home.
One special highlight was having fresh fruit picked straight from the tree for breakfast. Their tips for eating out and getting around the city
were very helpful. They also kindly ask you if you would like to join the yoga classes.

Aurora and Alberto were charming and accommodating hosts. Alberto provided us with such excellent suggestions on things to do in and around Porto daily depending on our whims for that day. They also helped organize transport, when necessary. Breakfast was simple but delicious. Perhaps we arrived in the right season as several fruit trees and my parents indulged in their persimmons that picked ripe off the tree.

J'ai merveilleusement bien dormi dans cette maison magnifiquement arrangee et re-interpretee par Aurora et Alberto. Les conseils d'Alberto, nos discussions, ont nourri notre sejour a Porto du debut a la fin. Et bien sur, le jardin, les fruits du jardin et confitures, et un excellent cafe. Pour une facon de voyager a la fois intelligente et simple. Je voudrais presque garder ces commentaires, et cette adresse pour moi exclusivement!

TRES BON ACCUEUIL D AURORA ET ALBERTO QUI CONNAIT TRES BIEN LA VILLE ET NOUS A INDIQUE TOUS LES ENDROITS A NE PAS MANQUER.

AURORA EST AUX PETITS SOINS. LES PETITS DEJEUNERS TRES COMPLETS AVEC DES PRODUITS MAISON OU BIO.

MAISON ET JARDIN SPACIEUX AGRABLES DANS UN QUARTIER TRANQUILLE A 30 MN A PIED DU CENTRE

la qualité d'écoute de nos hôtes nous a permis d'avoir des conseils judicieux
un séjour de rêve
petits déjeuners dans le jardin
adresse à recommander

Aurora & Alberto are such a lovely couple. It was great and relaxing time staying at their place. The garden definitely added to this, too. My wife also enjoyed joining their yoga lesson, that was a nice bonus, too. We both also appreciated Alberto's insight of how things were in the Portugal in the past and how they are now, that was really enlightening. Oh, and did I mention the bathroom? That was awesome, really.

Aurora and Alberto are great hosts! We had a superb time thanks to Alberto's good guide work through the city of Porto. We saw highlights AND hidden treasures! And last but not least: we enjoyed the yoga class and massage. Only the hard matrass wasn't comfortable, but that was nothing compared to the wonderful hospitality. We surely recommand this b&b.

What a lovely stay I had. Aurora and Alberto are a wonderful, helpful, and funny couple. I felt at home. I stayed two full days and each morning after breakfast Alberto opened the map and showed me what to visit and how to get there. Thanks to that I got to know not only the most popular places in town but also some hidden gems. The location is good, close to the Campaña train station (to/from Lisboa), and a short walk to the center. The room is comfortable and wifi works very well. Thank you for everything!

Even only three nights staying with this lovely couple, it was very difficult to say goodbye to them, to the good feeling of the stay. All the pictures are accurate. More than that, you should experience the precious feeling...highly recommend ed for sure.  I felt lucky to stay here.
