By the way, besides, Alberto is definitely a super guide to give the best suggestion of the trip in Porto. Because of him, in my limited time, i still traveled around Porto very smoothly. Thank you, Aurora and Alberto.

I felt welcome in Aurora and Alberto's home from the second I arrived. Their apartment is very close to the train station but about a 25 minute walk from the center of the city. That said, it was perfect for what I was looking for. The bed was cozy and their home was very clean and peaceful. I loved spending time in the backyard during breakfast and walking around the garden. They also allowed me to participate in their yoga classes. The entire experience was wonderful. Alberto also gave me detailed directions on the map of places to go and things to see. They made me breakfast in the morning and asked how may day ones when I came back from touring around. It really felt like home. They were both so friendly and kind and I would definitely go back.

Words cannot express how great the stay at A&A was! - it was my first airbnb experience and it was above good! The entire house is a palace to calm down a little and relax. I also participated in two of their yoga sessions which was a very nice offer b/c it was so simple to have a yoga class in the same house where you stay! I travelled w/ my 3 yrs old son who also appreciated the stay a lot. He loved to hang out infront of the fire place or helping Alberto w/ his gardening! Even though we stayed only 2 nights, I am sure I will return! A&A are beautiful people! THANKS!

La estancia en la casa de Aurora y Alberto ha sido excelente, un trato muy cuidado y atento. Han estado muy pendientes de cualquier necesidad, nos han ayudado mucho a conocer esta fantástica ciudad, orientándonos sobre que ver y visitar, cómo moverse con soltura por la cuidad.
La habitación es grande y confortable, así como el baño, el salón es muy cálido y acogedor y una cuidada estufa de leña hace más agradable si cabe su estancia. La casa está situada a unos 15 minutos del centro y bien comunicada con líneas de autobuses, es una zona tranquila y hay sitio para aparcar gratuitamente. El desayuno muy rico y variado ( mermelada  riquísima ), todo muy limpio. Participamos en una actividad de yoga y una cena conjunta en la que nos sentimos muy integrados y agradecidos. Sin duda hemos descubierto lo mejor de Oporto y lo mejor de sus gentes, repetiremos sin dudarlo . GRACIAS

Thanks so much Aurora and Alberto. You made me truly experience what I read on the plane about the Portugese's hospitality and helpfulness. Amazing the ways you took care of me, gave profound overview of what to do in Porto, cared about my wet hair, and put me to your lovely friend' s car for a free pleasant ride to Braga. Your friend then simply put me in a hotel car. So smooth and beyond what I could expect. I really fall in love with your country. Walking up the hill to your house with big luggage was only minor difficulty I had. Hug, Dao

Aurora y Alberto nos han recibido muy bien , han estado muy atentos y nos han ayudado mucho a descubrir Oporto.  La casa es muy  acogedora y hemos disfrutado del masaje ayurvédique. La casa está además muy bien comunicada. Todo perfecto

Aurora and Alberto are exclusively amazing host and wonderful persons. I felt so much at home and that was exactly what I was looking for. They are perfectly ready and very experienced with receiving guests, attentive and simply lovely ! As long as I was on the way to Brazil and didn't have much warm clothes with me, Aurora provided me with everything necessary. Alberto helped with practical advices and told me many interesting stories.
Their yoga classes are very nice and the whole house is radiating peaceful and loveful energy.
Aurora and Alberto organized a good pick-up service and I was even lucky to join them on a exhibition opening on a rainy weekend.

I loved the stay and fell in love with their beautiful spirits!
*****5 étoiles / estrellas / stars *****

Aurora and Alberta are excellent hosts!  They took great care of us. They are extremely helpful in telling us where to go, where to eat etc. so they made us really easy and enjoy Porto! The house matched exactly with what we were expecting from the pictures. The house is always calm, quite and clean. It has an amazing garden with lemon and orange trees and lots of flowers. We would like to be there in spring or summer. You can easily access to the house with public transportation. It's just a few minutes away from Campanhã railway station  and 20 minutes from city center by walking.The home is located in a local neighborhood. So you can find a lot of local restaurants and patisseries which are really cheap and yummy!   Dear Aurora and Alberta, we appreciated for your wonderful hospitality! Hope to meet you again!

Desde el momento que entramos x la puerta nos sentimos como en casa. Gran clase de yoga para comenzar, una explicación de la ciudad y de lugares especiales ... La habitación perfecta, el baño y el ambiente de la casa. El desayuno riquisimo. Sin duda si volvemos a Oporto q seguro que si, ya sabemos donde dormir
I had a wonderful time here; i could attend a yoga class, had some tea with aurora and a lovely welcome and goodbye. If i ever come back to Porto I would stay again here.

j ai aimé l accueil ,la présentation  de la ville de porto,les informations détaillés sur les endroits incontournable de porto a visiter,les lieux ou
manger...
le lieu est très facile d accès en voiture,aurora et alberto très disponible,parle le français,et leurs oranges du jardin au petit déjeuner superbement délicieuses;
je recommande cette chambre,on s y sent bien et en securite
merci a aurora et alberto
jean paul

I want to say thank you to Aurora and Alberto. I stayed at their place for 5 days and it was awesome. They gave me a lot of helpful tips about Porto- where to go, see and eat, and they are always so kind and cheerful that I could feel at home. The rooms are just the same as in the pictures- beautiful garden, lime yellowish walls, etc. Even in the winter, I could enjoy the camellia blossom in the garden. I took Alberto's yoga lesson in the morning and that was so relaxing. I totally fall in love with this beautiful city, Porto and my trip wouldn't have been this great without Aurora and Alberto. Thank you!

It was an amazing experience to stay with Aurora and Alberto, they are great hosts and lovely people, who made me feel very welcome. Albertos inside tips for exploring Porto were very helpful and their house and garden are beautiful. Also I could attend one of their yoga classes for free, which I enjoyed a lot. Thanks a lot, I hope to come back some day!

Alberto et Aurora ont été des hôtes très attentionnés et disponibles, et ce, malgré leurs occupations...
La maison bourgeoise et ancienne est accueillante, meublée avec goût, et remplie de petits objets d'art...dont une petite gravure libertine dans la salle de bains, assez hilarante.
Quartier très calme.
Les oranges du jardin étaient délicieuses.
Je recommande fortement cette adresse.

Thank you Aurora for a warm stay.

She gave me advise how to go sightseeing in Porto and helped me to call taxi even in a early morning.
I wish I could stay longer n wanted to take her yoga class.
Thanks Aurora:)
Aurora and Alberto were great guests! The B&B was beautiful and they gave a lot of information about Porto. This B & B is a must!

I had a wonderful stay at Alberto and Aurora's place. The house is amazing and in a very convenient location to explore Porto. Alberto and Aurora welcomed me in the warmest way and I felt like home from the first second I was there. Alberto gave me a lot of tips on the city wile we were sitting outside in their beautiful garden, unfortunately I only stayed for one night so I didn't manage to attend to Aurora's yoga class. I hope to go back and stay a bit longer. I definitely recommend this wonderful place as it was an amazing experience.

Lovely place, we were very welcomed and they provided lots and lots of tips about where to go. They were very kind and dropped us in town when they went out. We were in Porto during a very cold weekend though and the house was a bit cold.

The nicest hosts one can have with Aurora and Alberto! 
Everything was like in the description - and much more :-)
Very best organizied, helpful...

I can't say enough wonderful things about my time with Alberto and Aurora. The moment I entered their house I felt comfortable and relaxed. They went over and above to make my stay in Porto special. 
The breakfast and the yoga sessions were fabulous - the garden serene.
I love my time here!

Accueil très sympathique, nous rendant de suite à l'aise. La chambre spacieuse, bien aménagée, calme, salle d'eau et toilettes avec déco originales, le tout très bien tenu par la maitresse de maison. Aurora et Alberto se donnent beaucoup de mal pour satisfaire le moindre désir des hôtes, et donnent beaucoup de leur temps et d'énergie pour expliquer les bons plans pour les diverses visites de Porto et des environs. Un grand merci à eux. Adresse à recommander absolument.

Aurora y Alberto son super amables y me hicieron sentir en casa de familiares. La casa en si es una pasada de bonita, con jardín para desayunar y habitaciones muy correctas. Aurora y Alberto tomaron tiempo para explicarnos todos los detalles de la ciudad, y se nos hizo facíl navegarla. Además, llegué malito con tos y me cuidaron con tés y otros tratamientos naturales. Seguro que vamos a repetir cuando volvamos a Oporto.

Aurora et son mari nous ont accueillis avec beaucoup de gentillesse.
La situation et le charme de l'habitation sont remarquables.
Aurora est un rayon de soleil et Alberto un guide exceptionnel.
Nous avons passé un séjour rempli de convivialité., et serions prêts à y retourné à chaque voyage.
l
Really enjoy the stay and really nice couple. Like the house very much and already introduce it to my friends who will visit Porto.
A Aurora e o Alberto são excelentes anfitriões e vivem numa casa maravilhosa onde apetece ficar mais um pouco a conversar tranquilamente. Espero voltar um dia destes. Até lá, beijinhos. Ana

our stay at Aurora's was wonderful. Aurora is the kindest, smily-est person, attentive to every need. the house is beautiful and full of love and charm, the breakfast yummy, healthy and home-made. Aurora even offered us her husband's delicious home grown lemons :) we really enjoyed our stay!
the neighborhood is ok and close to the station and the center too.

Aurora et  Alberto (son compagnon) sont vraiment très fidèles à eux-mêmes et ont 'une âme', une vraie. On peut leur parler de beaucoup de choses, ils ont toujours de très bonnes choses à nous raconter et partager, sur eux, nous, leur maison, leur quartier, leur ville, les projets, les 'coins secrets'
Tout est à la fois simple et riche avec eux, leur philosophie de vie étant en soi un plaisir, à partager assurément!

I had a great stay in Aurora´s apartment. It is a lovely place with a fantastic garden and a nice room with bathroom for the guests. It is perfect located, you need only 15 minutes into the old town of Porto. But especially Aurora and her husband made it possible that I could visit all the famous and hidden places in Porto in only two days. They took a lot of their time to explain me ways and places in Porto, which I wouldn´t had discovered when I had visited Porto on my own. I am very glad to meet such fantastic people as my hosts. I truly recommend a stay here! One of my best hosting experiences so far!

Super séjour à Porto chez Aurora et Alberto. Ils sont tous les deux très sympas et sont plein de bons conseils concernant la ville et les visites. Nous avons été accueillis à bras ouverts. La chambre et la maison sont très confortables et facilement accessibles en transports en commun ou à pied depuis le centre-ville (ça grimpe un peu, comme partout à Porto ;-) ).

Abrigada, Abrigado, ce séjour était MAGNIFIQUE. 
Grâce à vos conseils, en Français, sur la ville et son histoire, nous avons pu visiter Porto dans de très bonnes conditions.
La maison n'est pas au cœur de la ville (15-20 min à pied), mais très accessible en transport en commun.

As pessoas fazem os espaços e os espaços fazem a experiência, e 3 dias na Bonita Cidade do Porto tendo como porto de abrigo a Casa/Jardim Yoga da Aurora é o lado mais prazeroso da experiência amplificado. À chegada a porta foi aberta com um vasto sorriso e a partida pautada por um saudoso abraço. A atenção que nos é dada como hóspedes faz-nos sentir mais que essa categoria, faz-nos sentir parte da vida desta casa e dos maravilhosos anfitriões que são a Aurora e o Alberto, que possuem um enorme conhecimento sobre a cidade, sempre com com as indicações correctas e culturalmente interessantes. O espaço transmite paz, tranquilidade, facilmente somos levados por toda a temática Zen, que é o paradigma ideal para equilibrar o frenesim cultural, visual e turístico da Cidade Invicta.

A poucos minutos a pé do Metro e da estação Ferroviária da Campanhã a Casa situa-se numa zona da cidade calma, tranquila.
Criei uma nova âncora com a cidade do Porto e essa âncora escreve-se com os nomes de Aurora, Alberto e Casa/Jardim Yoga.

Foi muito bom  estar na casa da Aurora e Alberto. Me receberam super bem. Atenciosos , fizeram me sentir super acolhida.
 Fui muito bem orientada de como conhecer os melhores lugares da cidade do Porto e com comidas baratos e de ótima qualidade.

Aurora et Alberto sont un couple chaleureux, accueillant et très dévoué. Carla nous prépare de bons petits déjeuners et Alberto est toujours prêt pour nous suggérer itinéraires et endroits inusités à découvrir. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans leur demeure et recommandons cet endroit.
Merci Aurora et Alberto et vous êtes les bienvenues chez nous au Québec!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Aurora et Alberto. Ils ont une jolie maison avec un jardin agréable dans un quartier calme de Porto, proche du centre-ville. Les conseils de nos hôtes ont été très utiles pour faciliter notre séjour. Et en plus on peut se garer gratuitement dans leur rue. A recommander.

Aurora et Alberto ont été tous deux très charmants et n'ont pas été avars en explication.
Séjour super agréable, quoique un peu court, l'instant de repos dans le jardin était merveilleux surtout près plusieurs heures de route

Lo primero que debo decir es que Aurora y Alberto son una pareja encantadora. Hicieron todo lo posible para que nuestra estancia en Oporto fuese lo más agradable posible.
La casa se encuentra en una calle tranquila, de fácil aparcamiento y a tan solo veinte minutos caminando del centro de Oporto.
La habitación está bien insonorizada, muy limpia y un cuarto de baño también muy limpio para las personas que se hospedan allí.
Nos sirvieron un buen desayuno. Tienen un bonito jardín en que sirven el desayuno cuando el tiempo es bueno. En nuestro caso no pudo ser porque el tiempo fue muy lluvioso.
Alberto nos informó de todo los lugares a visitar en Oporto, incluso aquellos de los que en una oficina de información turística no lo hacen. Nos sugirió lugares, restaurantes, edificios, etc. Él es realmente el mejor guía turístico de Oporto. Además nos habló de mucho de los cambios de Oporto en los últimos años. Yo podría haberme pasado horas conversando con él. Aurora es muy simpática, siempre sonriendo y pendiente de que estuviésemos cómodos.
Si en alguna otra ocasión visito Oporto, no dudaré en alojarme con Aurora y Alberto.

We had a lovely time staying with Aurora and Alberto. They were very helpful and made us feel welcome. The house is beautiful and in a great location, walking distance from all the sights. Highly recommended.

Het verblijf in Porto was een voltreffer, Alles was naar wens, Met de uitleg van Alberto was het verkennen van de stad een makkie.
Tijdens het ontbijt was er de gezellige babbel met de gastvrouw.
Un bel endroit au calme pour un séjour d'une nuit...très bon accueil de la part de Aurora et Alberto..........a recommander

Aurora und Alberto sind sehr liebenswerte Gastgeber und haben uns herzlich empfangen. Das Haus ist besonders gemütlich und liebevoll eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Es liegt an einer ruhigen, kleinen Straße und mit Bus und Metro ist man schnell im Zentrum.  Jeden Morgen nach dem leckeren Frühstück, u.a. mit selbstgemachter Marmelade und köstlichem Obst, welches wir, wenn eben möglich, auf der Terasse einnahmen, erhielten wir von Alberto allerbeste Tipps zum Erkunden der Stadt und auch wo wir gute und preiswerte Restaurants finden. 
Wir haben uns bei Aurora und Alberto besonders wohl und zu Hause gefühlt und werden sehr gerne wieder kommen!!

Yes very welcome - left keys with neighbour (as they were not home for our arrival) who was very informative and Alberto left a map for us to find our way around.  Following morning we spent time with Alberto with his suggestions for 'things to do' in Porto.
Great place! Very nice people!

Ich habe mich bei Aurora und Alberto sehr wohlgefühlt. Sie waren herzlich, hilfsbereit und haben mir viele Tipps zum Sightseeing gegeben. Der Kontakt vor der Reise war super, mit ausführlicher Wegbeschreibung vom Flughafen, Tipps zu den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln und auch die Ankunft spät in der Nacht war kein Problem. Das Zimmer war mit einem Bett und Fernseher ausreichend ausgestattet, es war alles sehr sauber und Frühstück sehr gut.
Wenn ich wieder einmal in Porto bin, würde ich jederzeit wieder bei den beiden Übernachten.

Aurora and her husband were absolutely fantastic and welcoming. They helped me a lot on how to commute and go around Porto city. The house was extremely beautiful and spotless. The toilet, the bedroom and everything was the same with the photo. Porto itself was amazing! Should have visited this region previously. Walking from Campanha station to the house was a bit hilly and quite but there was nothing to worry about. Highly recommend!

Siamo stati solo una notte nella casa di Aurora, ma era molto piacevole. La stanza è spaziosa e luminosa, il bagno è pulito e la colazione in giardino con la marmellata fatta in casa è la migliore garanzia per un buon inizio giornata. Aurora e Alberto sono molto disponibili e sono poliglotti, la comunicazione con loro è facile e veloce. Il quartiere è tranquillissimo, si parcheggia la macchina sotto casa, con una breve passeggiata si arriva in centro. Non abbiamo avuto molto tempo per conoscerci, ma siamo stati molto bene. Grazie Aurora e Alberto.

Aurora and Alberto were great hosts, they were kind and friendly, made it easy to see most of Porto, Alberto gave tips on best places to see and updated local map. house was comfortable, clean, you have own bathroom , garden was lovely. Had breakfast one day in garden area. They went out of their way to make you feel at home. Lovely breakfast, had homemade lemongrass tea. I had yoga class after 5 days on the Camino which was very relaxing. They are near camphana station, uphill walk but metro very cheap easy to get to and from airport. They are happy and cheerful couple. Thanks guys

Nyíltszívű emberek. Kár, hogy rövid időt tudtunk csak együtt tölteni. A kert gyönyörű. Az ágy fantasztikusan kényelmes, a fürdőszoba stílusos. A környék kicsit messze van az óvárosi résztől, de gyalog 40 perc alatt be lehet érni a folyóparthoz.

We enjoyed staying at the peaceful yoga house of Aurora and Alberto in Porto. We loved their beautiful and refreshing garden and the good breakfasts there. The house is overall an interesting and beautiful place to stay, and our room was clean and good. It was also a nice experience to join one of the morning yoga classes. We were provided useful tips and information on things to do and see in Porto, as well as for a self-organized day trip to the Douro valley. The location is a bit far for walking to the centre, however managable (we walked every day regardless of the distance and it was not a problem).

Nous avons été enchantées de faire la connaissance d'Aurora et d'Alberto qui sont très sympathiques et nous ont traitées comme des reines.
Nous nous sommes senties très bien dans leur belle maison, leur jardin magnifique ; cela y sent bon la douceur de vivre !
Et nous vous recommandons le massage d'Alberto !
Un grand merci, Blandine et Camille.

The apartment is not in the downtown but can be reached by metro easily. the apartment is amazing and very beautiful. The breakfast provided is also exceeding expectation. Aurora is very helpful. the only thing to improve is that i dont be given a key for the apartment therefore it' s not fully convenient to decide go in and go out by myself. but overall, strongly recommend.

For everyone who likes to stay a bit out of the centre, this place is heaven on earth! 
I could join the yoga class in the amazing garden!! just half an hour after arriving.
The house has a great and tasteful  atmosphere. 
Alberto and aurora are full of energy and advices. And even took the car to have a nice drink with me at one of the pretty beaches! 
If you still have a doubt... Don't!:)
Great location and great people! j ai été très bien acceuilli chez Aurora et Roberto! je me suis senti très a laise. Leur gentillesse m a touché.
It was a wonderful experience! Great helpful and friendly hosts. Quiet and convenient. Highly recommended!  WOW!!!!

Aurora and Alberto were wonderful hosts! They gave lots of information about what to do in Porto, were very welcoming when we arrived, and provided delicious breakfast. Their place is beautiful and spacious. The garden is so relaxing and they shared that space generously.
I had an unexpected job interview on (Hidden by Airbnb) during my stay and was able to use the wifi and the room easily, uninterrupted, which was a big relief!

Aurora and Alberto are fabulous hosts in a beautiful home. The garden was a most calming space. Help was offered with booking tours and travel in an around Porto. And you must eat the 5€ meal Aurora's recommends. Healthy, wholesome breakfasts with endless cups of tea, clean and comfortable living spaces, and a relaxing massage - heaven.

Ich habe mich bei Aurora und Alberto rundum wohl und willkommen gefühlt, sie teilen gern ihr Haus und ihre Zeit mit ihren Besuchern und sind sehr offen für alles. Sie haben mich sofort sehr herzlich aufgenommen, mir alles gezeigt und gute Tipps für Porto gegeben. Das Haus und der Garten sind wunderschön und mein Aufenthalt dort war entspannend, interessant und gemütlich! Das Frühstück war auch sehr gut. Es war wirklich ein super Einstieg in meinen Urlaub, den ich bei den beiden verbracht habe!
Avons été superbement accueillis avec beaucoup de gentillesse, avons apprécié l accompagnement au petit restaurant et le délicieux petit déjeuner très copieux dans le jardin.

It was nice! 2 lovely hosts.
Clean place, they gave many tips on what to do in Porto.
The neighbourhood isnt that special but close to the metrostation and walking distance to the city center!

Accueil chaleureux, conseils compétents et éclairés sur la ville, la région, le pays.
Véritables guides aimables et  serviables.
A recommander tout particulièrement à ceux qui aiment la découverte à pied. Nous n'avons repris la voiture que le jour de notre départ soit quatre jours plus tard!
Petits déjeuners copieux et variés...
Vraiment à conseiller.

My stay with Aurora and Alberto was wonderful. They are incredibly welcoming and fun people. They're house is beautiful and it was so lovely eating their delicious breakfast in the garden, such a great way to start the day. The house is nicely positioned for the Campanha train station and it only takes 10-15mins to walk into the centre of town. I would absolutely recommend this stay to anyone, it is an oasis while travelling.

Aurora and Alberto welcomed us into their lovely home, making us feel very relaxed and comfortable for the four days we spent with them. We liked the rather 'quaint' neighborhood, close to the train and metro station as well as a walkable distance to the historic town center. Alberto is an indefatigable guide pointing out Porto's most interesting historic, architectural sights and gardens!!

Aurore et Alberto sont des gens charmants. 
Ils nous ont fourni de très bonnes informations,  et toujours très disponibles.  La visite du jardin restera dans notre mémoire : un vrai voyage au Brésil. ...
La maison typique de Porto est très belle, et la chambre confortable.  Le petit déjeuner est très agréable et  convivial.
A estadia que tive foi excelente. O quarto onde estive foi mais do que adequado para mim. A casa é muito bonita e acolhedora e a Aurora e o Alberto foram muito simpáticos e prestáveis.

I spent a weekend in the house of Aurora and Alberto and I really enjoyed the stay. Both are very welcoming and helped us with good advices of what to do, where to eat, etc.
The house and the garden are perfect for those who look for some rest. Moreover, I can defintely recommend the Ayurveda Massage with Alberto. 
I'm looking forward to come back some day.
I want to stay for the rest of my life...

Ons verblijf overtrof al onze verwachtingen. Dit had alles te maken met de ongelofelijk lieve verhuurders Aurora en Alberto! Wat een bijzonder stel! De kamer was, netjes, schoon en warm ingericht. De privé badkamer met bad was geweldig. Het ontbijt heerlijk.
De locatie ligt net buiten het centrum maar alles was prima te voet te doen. 's Nachts was het er heerlijk rustig. Wat ons betreft een aanrader voor iedereen!
It was a really nice stay at Aurora in Porto. The house is beautiful and she is very helpful, so I would recommend.
Accueil très chaleureux ! Mon séjour fut très court. J'espère avoir l'occasion de revenir séjourner dans ce havre de paix :)

Avons passé un très agréable séjour (2 jours , 2 nuits) chez Aurora et Alberto. Leur maison est reposante et spacieuse. Nos hôtes sont plus que dévoués et débordant de gentillesse. La ville n'est qu'a environ 15 mn à pieds en marchant correctement. Pour la découverte du centre ville de Porto, Alberto a été très précis dans les détails touristiques (monuments ect...) et autre astuces. Guide parfait pour trouver de bons restos typiques et à des prix corrects. 
A garder précieusement dans nos archives pour un autre séjour dans leur ville.

Aurora y Roberto, a pesar de estar pasando un momento familiar complicado, nos esperaron y nos recibieron con gran amabilidad. Desayunamos la masa de nata típica de Portugal y frutas de su quinta! El baño súper amplio.
Maison tranquille et accueil extrêmement chaleureux. Tout est parfait !

5 stars, excellent stay with really lovely people.  The location is great, just outside of the noise but close enough to walk most everywhere.  The house is very chill, relaxed and quiet with a great garden out back.  Loved the art work and decor throughout.  Bed was comfy, house was clean, and breakfast was great.  I would definitely recommend this place to others without hesitation and even ended up spending two extra nights here myself.

Quelle belle maison! et quel accueil! Nous nous sommes sentis des invités de choix, des heureux élus! Encore merci pour cette disponibilité. Aurora et Alberto nous ont transmis leur passion pour leur ville. Nous avons suivi tous leurs conseils et nous ne le regrettons pas!

Aurora and Alberto are fantastic hosts. The house was even more beautiful than the photos, and the room was cozy and comfortable. Also, the guest bathroom has to be my absolute favorite one I've ever had at an Airbnb - high ceilings and a great bathtub. Alberto is a great guide - he gave me two very useful maps and told me about all the sights I had to see. The location was a little further away from the action than I had anticipated - it takes 10 minutes to walk to "city center" but 20-30 minutes to walk to other happening areas of town. It was fine with me because I love to walk, but just a note. Overall, I'd highly recommend staying here and I look forward to returning!

I had a great stay with Alberto & Aurora.  They are very friendly and helpful.  Alberto will provide you with maps and lots of information.  The only thing to note is the location is outside of the city center (which I wanted) but it is still quite a walk if you are coming back late.  After a few days, I got used to it as I became more familiar with the streets.  The house is beautiful.  They also offer yoga classes and massage which I was really looking forward to doing but I never got a chance to fit it into my schedule.  Breakfast is great and you can also have it outside.  =)

Merci pour votre accueil et vos conseils pratiques pour visiter la ville. Nous avons apprécié le petit déjeuner qui était très convivial. 
Très cordialement, 
Epiphane et Clothilde

Occasionally one stays with an Airbnb host that makes you want to open an Airbnb yourself just so that you can host them back: they are that friendly and helpful. Alberto and Aurora are such a couple. Their home is an early 19th century classic remodeled and furnished in a very peaceful, tasteful, and aesthetic way with a Buddhist influence in their art and sculpture.Their garden is beautiful, and their downstairs yoga room is very comfortable. It is a treat to take advantage of their yoga classes. Alberto was absolutely enthusiastic about making sure that we saw the Porto that he knows and loves. In addition to the many beautiful sights he recommended, he also told us where to find an authentic bar for fado, where we think we were probably the only tourists and the locals would come to sing to one another: a true taste of Oporto and the people and culture.

My stay in Porto was absolutely lovely...the house is amazing and Aurora made my stay very comfortable with beautiful breakfast and tea when I arrived. I am definitely staying here next time I am in Porto to also join their yoga sessions. Thanks for the warm welcome :)

Aurora and Alberto were very hostile, have a nice house and garden, are very communicative, know a lot of good places to go in Porto and like to help with whatever they can. I had a really nice stay in their Airbnb!

I can recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting Porto. Great hosts, very helpful and nothing was too much trouble. Perfect location, 10 minute walk to the Station and 15 minute walk to the middle of town, ideal.
It was all just perfect !! )
Aurora and Alberto are a wonderful, warm and loving couple. They helped us tremendously with everything we needed. I'm so grateful for having met them and feel that they are now my friends.

Aurora and Alberto were great hosts. 
The room is cosy and the bathroom is huge. Very nice breakfast :)  Great moments shared. Thank you for all. Hope to see you again soon!

La casa di Aurora è piacevolmente immersa nel cuore di una Porto dalle atmosfere vivaci e accoglienti.
Aurora ed Alberto si sono dimostrati ospitali ed attenti ad ogni richiesta. L'alloggio è centrale e comodo per la linea metro.

Aurora e Alberto são pessoas adoráveis, disponíveis e comunicativas, que oferecem ao hóspede todo tipo de informação útil e orientações que fazem a experiencia de turismo no Porto muito fluida e agradável. Foi preciosa a orientação recebida quanto aos melhores restaurantes e os melhores pontos turísticos. Recebemos também ajuda para compras diversas, com identificação dos melhores fornecedores e respectivos endereços. Os quartos são grandes e confortáveis, o banheiro é enorme e o jardim muito lindo. Aos praticantes de yoga os anfitriões oferecem aulas, pois são ambos professores qualificados. Adoramos a visita e recomendamos enfaticamente esta casa.

Voyageant seule, Aurore et Alberto m'ont acceuillie comme une reine. J'ai été très bien conseillée pour visiter la ville, ils m'ont même envoyée voir un musée et également de beaux jardins. A noter pour les futurs hôtes que leur maison est super bien située, le centre est à 10mn à pied , à proximité des transports en commun et surtout un quartier très calme qu'on apprécie après une journée bien chargée . il y aurai beaucoup de choses à rajouter car vous avez été au top . Bravo Aurora et Alberto , restez comme vous êtes , bonne continuation et j'espère revenir sur Porto car je pense que vous avez encore beaucoup de choses à me faire découvrir . On se dit donc à bientôt  Marie-Laure

My stay with Aurora and Alberto was just perfect! I was traveling on my own so it was nice to have a place to stay with locals and some company in the mornings and nights. Alberto took the time to explain all of the things I might like to see and do during my stay in Porto and marked places of interest on a map as he told me about them. The yoga sessions were a perfect end to my days out walking and riding. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this place to people looking for a nice, chilled visit to Porto.

Aurora et Alberto sont des hôtes exceptionnels. Leur accueil et leur maison sont en tous points parfaits :
- Une chambre confortable, bien chauffée en hiver, et un très bon lit
- Une salle de bain magnifique
- Un jardin superbe
- Un accueil et des conseils précieux (petits restaurants, lieux cachés...)
- Des cours de yoga à domicile
- Un petit déjeuner très agréable
- Et deux hôtes d'une rare générosité !

Les yeux fermés !

Aurora and Alberto have created a true treasure of a home. The quiet and comfy bedroom added to making our stay rejuvenating as much as enjoyable. Alberto's brilliant local knowledge he so generously shared with us mad our visit of Porto very special. Coming back in the evening to such a beautiful home and so warm and caring hosts was lovely.
Looking forward to sharing another visit with my family. 
We walked I to town most days and took a taxi back in the evenings, an affordable luxury in Porto.

Clean, Oldfashioned, Beautiful. The garden is wonderful and so Aurora and Alberto are. Helpful and always smiling persons who are always good for a talk.
Perfect!
A comfortable room in a very nice house with wondeful hosts, ready to please and provide excellent information & tips for the city.
Endroit idéal pour un séjour de découverte de Porto. Aurore et Roberto sont là pour donner des conseils judicieux. Accueil dans la bienveillance.  A recommander.

We loved the time at the Jardim do Yoga. The house is absolutely beautiful and Aurora and Alberto are very sweet and welcoming. They know the city very well and give great tips and recommendations for things to do and places to eat at. We definitely want to come back and stay with them and try some of their yoga classes.

I had a really nice experience here. The bathroom is huge and beautiful. I love the garden and the cat Michelle, she is a little shy LOL. Aurora is very helpful and gives us lots of useful advice about travelling here. I will miss them and the beautiful city.

La casa de Aurora es una muy buena opción porqué es una vivienda bien equipada, limpia, tranquila, los amfitriones te informan de todo lo necesario para visitar Porto y además, el desayuno esta muy bueno.

Aurora and Albertos accomodation is located north-eastern of the main touristic places of Porto. It is easy to reach both by train and by metro. The neighbourhood is pleasently quiet and calm. Yet it is sometimes quite lengthy to get to the Ribeira of Porto, as it will take you at least 15 minutes by walking. Combined with the breathtaking garden and the relaxing Yoga-class it is like some kind of a seperate vacation within the vacation, as you can relax from the touristic stress.

As soon as you reach the place, Aurora and Alberto will greet you with open and very welcoming arms. This will make you feel like home quite quickly, as you never feel like an intruder or unpleasent nuisance.

Overall definitely an accommodation I would recommend!
청결하고 친절하고 좋았습니다. 체크인을 1시쯤 했는데도 친절하게 맞아주시고, 관광안내도 잘 해주십니다.
Great place, lovely people. We also enjoyed the yogaclass and the massage!

L'accueil est excellent. Les conseils d'Alberto sont très précis et très précieux pour découvrir Porto. Le jardin est magnifique et Aurora sait mettre à l'aise. Le petit déjeuner sur la terrasse, au soleil, est un atout de charme ! C'est une adresse que nous recommandons !

Magnifique logement, très bon rapport qualité-prix, bon emplacement à environ 15-20 minutes de marche du centre-ville, très belle balade. Aurora et Alberto sont adorables, ils partagent spontanément tous leurs conseils et bonnes adresses (restaurants, etc.) sur Porto. Petit-déjeuner complet et très agréable sur la terrasse donnant sur un jardin magnifique! Un havre de paix, parfait pour pratiquer le yoga!

Chambre agréable et très calme. Pas très loin du Centre, avec transports en commun assez près. Accueil chaleureux de nos deux hôtes, très sympathiques ! Grâce à leurs conseils, nous avons fait de très belles visites et nous avons mangé dans de très bons restaurants pas chers !

I liked the house, it' s decoration, the beautifull bathroom. I liked verry much sitting  and having breakfast in their beautifull garden with many nice flowers with a deliscious smell.  And above all Alberto and Aurora are verry kind hostes, the know a lot about the city, which they like to share with you
Really a good place to stay in Porto. We really recomment to stay at this place.

Aurora and Alberto were fantastic hosts. They ensured we had a comfortable stay and provide us with locations to visit while we were in Porto. They are very knowledgeable on the city and the transportation methods to get to all the areas.

The maximum of 5 stars ranking is not enough to give a correct feeling after a wonderful stay at Aurora's ! Full set of wonderful advices + extraordinary kindness + Breakfast with home made lemon jam + peaceful garden + + +... etc !!!
Thank you for your tips ...for hosting us in such a nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) was the best stay on our trip and the best marmalade too!!!

Our stay at Aurora's place was remarkable. The home which she and  Albertino share is of 5 * quality. They provide excellent information on ways to make the most of a visit to Porto. The location allows you the choice of transit options or of taking your time to walk to places of interest. Breakfast is a pleasure and your sleep is restful. We recommemd it highly.

Aurora and Alberto go above and beyond as hosts. They went out of their way to help us see the best parts of Porto, made us delicious breakfasts, and let us join their yoga classes. The house is beautiful, especially the garden and yoga studio. Our stay in Porto was an absolute pleasure.

Aurora et Alberto sont tout à fait charmants, accueillants et intéressants. Leur maison est très agréable et donne à l'arrière sur un jardin.  Alberto n'a pas hésité à nous consacrer un peu de temps, et a été très prolixe en conseils en tous genres sur Porto, et plus largement en informations sur le Portugal. La chambre est à l'étage, parfaitement aménagée et une salle de bains grande et décorée avec gout était à notre disposition. Au rez de chaussée il y a les pièces communes et au sous sol, la salle de yoga. Si nous revenons, nous irons assurément à nouveau chez eux et nous verrons si nous pouvons assister à un cours... La maison, toute rose, est dans un quartier calme, à environ 25 minutes à pied du centre de Porto. Le stationnement se fait dans la rue. Alberto nous a conseillé un restaurant tout proche de chez eux où nous avons mangé une excellent dîner (bon rapport qualité prix). Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour chez Aurora et Alberto.
Ótimos anfitriões. Casa linda, limpa e organizada com uma energia muito boa. Me ajudaram muito com dicas e recomendações. Recomendo e espero retornar em breve.

il etait trés symphatique. Nous avons reçu beaucoup des informations bien dosé sur les endroits que nous pouvons visiter inclu des jolies restaurants et même des informations sur l'histoire de Potrtugal. Alberto se prenait beaucoup de Temps pour nous instruir. C' était très interessant. La maison est trés belle aussi le jardin soigne avec passion et amour. Je pouvais appartenir a une  leçon de yoga ça me plaisait beaucoup et ça faisait du bien. Un grand merci à Aurora et Alberto.

Een hele goede ervaring! Mijn moeder en ik zijn erg gastvrij ontvangen en hebben dagelijks heerlijk in de tuin ontbeten. Het huis ligt buiten het centrum in een wijk die er niet direct aantrekkelijk uitziet, maar als je beter kijkt is het een goede locatie voor je verblijf in Porto

Alberto and Aurora are excellent hosts!! Do not hesitate to go to their lovely house. We are couple with a small baby, and our hosts did everything they could to make our stay nice and comfortable. We immensely enjoyed our breakfast in the lovely garden  chatting with Alberto and Aurora who take time and care to explain whatever you would like to know about Porto and the surroundings. I can only thank them for their hospitality.

Alberto and Aurora welcomed us as if we were friends. The tour of the garden, the encouragement to use the garden chairs to relax on very hot days, the perfect breakfasts, the rich conversations, and their recommendations for our time in Porto are highlights of our stay in Porto.. We would love to stay with them again. A very good place to stay and sleep, an excellent place to meet some of the special people of Portugal.

They are very kind, helpfl really nice person.
The room is very cozy.
Bath room is spacious and clean.
Location is good.
You can go to center of the city 10~15minutes by walk.
If we have a chance to go there, differently want to stay their room again.
Muit obrigada!!

It's Aurora and Alberto's back yard garden with which we love so much to sign up and ended up in loving more of their garden before making our way to the next journey. It's so nice and comfortable staying with them. Alberto is passionate and having city map in his mind. With their tour tips, we left Porto with tons of happiness. Thanks so much Aurora and Alberto and wish our life journey crosses sometime in the future.
Aurora et Alberto sont adorables ; nous avions une grande chambre et salle de bains privative bien équipées ; ils sont tous les deux disponibles et accueillants. Séjour très agréable pour nous.

Both Aurora & Alberto were very helpful giving me directions & explanations to my questions. They both offered great tips on what to see and where to go.
Aurora also got up early and walked with me to the bus stop and made sure I was on the right bus to catch the metro to the airport. 
Always had a lovely breakfast when I woke.

Un très bon accueil et beaucoup de conseils donnés pour visiter Porto et le Nord du Portugal. Les hôtes sont très sympathiques. La chambre et le jardin sont très agréables. Le logement est proche des transports publics. Le centre ville est à environ 15 min à pied du logement.

Alberto and Aurora were very kind and helpful hosts who offered many tips regarding places to see in Porto and the surrounding area. The local eateries they recommended were also great. We loved the peaceful energy of their home and particularly enjoyed breakfasts in their lovely backyard garden. This accommodation is definitely great value for your $

Aurora and Alberto are such warm and helpful hosts! They took time out of their day to serve us breakfast, show us their beautiful garden and give us so many fantastic recommendations for porto. Couldn't recommend it more!
Aurora and Alberto are the very best of hosts. The house is comfortable, the breakfast they provide is delicious, and they are both very warm people. Good location to walk to the river or take metro.
Great hospitality, very nice place not just to spend the night but enjoy personal attitude and care!

On a beaucoup aimé cette étape à Porto car Aurora et Alberto sont des hôtes charmants et chaleureux. Une maison paisible avec à disposition une chambre confortable et une salle de bain privative spacieuse ; un très joli jardin et un délicieux petit déjeuner sous le jacaranda .
À 20 Minutes en voiture de l'aéroport ; à pied tout est possible et station de métro proche .
*****

Es sind wundervolle Gastgeber. Sie gaben uns sehr gute Infos, sind sehr warmherzige und liebevolle Menschen. Wir haben uns sehr wohl und willkommen gefühlt.  Wir haben zwei schöne Yogastunden genossen und im Blumengarten gefrühstückt. Danke für die schöne Zeit!!!! Bus- und U-bahnstationen sind gut erreichbar.  Peter und Inge

I felt like in having arrived to heaven when I reached Aurora and Albertos place. I was a little ill but immidiately felt better when I entered there beautiful and athmospheric home. 
It's a place so full of warmth, energy and easy goingness, that I would love to come back again and again!!!
Très beau logement avec jardin. Hôtes vraiment accueillants.

This is really a very special place, the garden is super, Aurora and her husband so very kind an giving lots of good advises what you can do in te (beautiful) city Porto. And he can give you a very special massage which helped me extra to relax!

This was a very short stay, arrived in the afternoon, and left early next morning. But it was my impression that this is a very fine place to stay, the little I did get to talk to the hostess told me that they are very nice people. They gave me a very nice tip where to eat, and made me a very good breakfast. Actually I wish I could have stayed longer!
Sehr schönes Haus, wundervoller Garten. 15 Min. Fussweg in die Altstadt.

Alberto y Aurora son los mejores anfitriones de la ciudad, sus recomendaciones te harán descubrir la ciudad con otros ojos.  Un rincón fantástico para descansar y poder practicar yoga. A 10 minutos de la estación de tren. Un regalo
Son una pareja encantadora, la estancia ha sido súper agradable. La casa es preciosa y tranquila. Nos aconsejaron muy bien sobre qué ver y cómo visitar Oporto. Ha estado genial!

Consigliamo questo alloggio perché ci siamo sentiti come a casa.Aurora e Alberto disponibilissimi,sono stati a nostra completa disposizione per aiutarci ad organizzare il nostro soggiorno a Porto con ottimi consigli.Colazione rilassante nel bel giardino con marmellate fatte in casa.

We had a wonderful time at Aurora's and Alberto's place. The house is even nicer than on the pictures and the two of them are super warm hosts, who spontaneously gave us a ride to the bus station so we wouldn't miss our bus! The ayurvedic massage was one of the best I ever got, perfect start into our vacation time.

Encore merci pour cet accueil très chaleureux et votre sourire. Nous avons passé un super moment. Merci pour tous les bons conseils que vous nous avez apporté pour la découverte de Porto ainsi que pour les petites attentions telles que le super petit déjeuner.
Nous conseillons vivement cette belle maison très agréable! Nous reviendrons avec plaisir!
Chloé et Florence

I stayed two nights with Aurora and Alberto in September and they were the best hosts. My flight arrived very late and I had to find my way to their house (with a lot of luggage) well after midnight. They were super helpful guiding me from the airport - we were in contact with each other the whole way. 
The house is an older renovated house - beautifully decorated and my room was quiet and cool. I had a great sleep :) The next day I was served a nice breakfast in the lovely garden and when I was ready to head into town, Alberto equipped me with a map and good advice. The house is a good 15 minute walk from the center. You can hop on a bus if you are to tired to walk back. The house is two floors and big enough for you to be private if that is what you prefer. I was happy to engage with Aurora and Alberto since I was traveling alone, but my impression is that you be as private as you wish. My trip onwards was by bus and Alberto drove me to the bus terminal which was a big help. Actually it felt like staying with family. I will be back for sure!

I had a wonderful stay! My room was comfortable and breakfast was absolutely delicious. Aurora serves homemade jam, butter and compote with breakfast. Both Aurora and Alberto were incredibly warm and helpful. They even gave me a ride to a ferry one day!

The home is on a quiet street and the center of town is easy to reach. I didn't try walking because uber was something like 4 euros and my stay was short. 

Overall I totally recommend. I would stay here again next time I'm in Porto. Thank you Aurora and Alberto!
Lovely couple , lovely home and energy, definitely recommend staying.

This is a beautiful, hospitable and caring family with comfortable accommodation. Alberto and Aurora helped us a lot to navigate the city (and wonderful Portuguese culture in general) with many valuable pieces of advice, suggested tasty breakfast and in general were very kind and friendly!
I wish we could come again and have more time to also visit their yoga class.
Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Aurora et Alberto. Leur maison typique est située dans une rue calme. Le seul regret le petit déjeuner frugal pendant nôtre séjour.
Aurora and Alberto are very friendly and helpful persons. Aurora made a tea in the middle of the night to help me with my bad cough. Alberto gave us many good hints about Porto .

Aurora zorgt heel goed voor haar gasten. De beschrijving naar de bnb was heel duidelijk. De kamer en badkamer waren schoon en netjes. Het ontbijt ( in hun prachtige tuin) was heerlijk met zelfgemaakte producten. Alberto is de beste gids van Porto. Hij heeft ons veel mooie plekken op de kaart aangewezen waar we met ons reisgidsje nooit gekomen zouden zijn. Met OV is het centrum goed te bereiken, maar ook lopend was het goed te doen ( half uurtje). Ik was jarig: een Portugees verjaardagsliedje, gezongen door Aurora en Alberto maakte het helemaal compleet. Kortom: een uitstekende uitvalsbasis voor een verblijf in Porto.

L'accueil chez Aurora et Alberto se révèle tout à fait extraordinaire: ce sont des hôtes à l'écoute de vos désirs, et qui se donnent de la peine  pour vous fournir l'aide nécessaire afin de les réaliser. Leur carnet d'adresses est très bien fourni, et leur générosité nous a permis de découvrir des lieux magiques que l'on ne trouve dans aucun (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison est par ailleurs charmante, et les petits déjeuners très agréables.
Nous recommandons vivement!
Very warm welcome and great hospitality. Lovely peaceful home and garden. Felt so well looked after by Aurora and Alberto. Couldn't have asked for more.
Staying with Aurora was a delight! Amazing hospitality and great conversation. I would go back in a heartbeat! :)

We met Aurora and Alberto as two characters: solid, real, hearty, full of "joie de vivre" and with great hospitality. Day by day we got a treasure chest of insider tips which can't be found elsewhere: just follow the sites you're told to visit - each one is worth it! Thank you so much, Alberto and Aurora!
The room is beautiful, very clean, and big, with a fine bathroom to guest's Disposition. Due to the weather we couldn't enjoy the big lush garden , unfortunately...!The location of the house is favorably located. There is some noise of few cars passing in front of the room on the cobblestone-street, but when you close the window you fall into sound sleep.
It's a great place we would certainly choose again! Karin and Hanspeter

Aurora & Alberto ont été très gentils avec nous. Nous avons pu profiter d'explications et de nouvelles adresses (visites & restaurants) qui se sont révélées être de très bonnes surprises. Rien à redire sur le logement, propre & bien placé ! Avec le petit déjeuner en plus ce qui nous a permis de discuter :)

Aurora und Alberto sind Gastgeber wie sie im Buche stehen! 
Es war meine erste Airbnb Erfahrung und ich hätte es nicht besser treffen können! 
Neben all den insider Tipps von Alberto, durfte ich am Abend beim Yoga mitmachen und jeden Morgen Aurora’s selbstgemachte Marmelade beim Frühstück auf der Terrasse genießen. 
Ich hatte ein wunderschöne Zeit und hab mich vom ersten Tag an bis hin zu meiner Abreise um 5 Uhr morgens stets willkommen gefühlt! 
Das Haus ist einfach wunderschön und die Lage (7 min bis zum nächsten Bahnhof) perfekt. 
Ich kann euch Aurora’s Unterkunft nur wärmstens empfehlen! 
Ich werde auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!
Aurora and Alberto are very friendly, communicative and hospitable. The house is lovely, the bathroom is big and they provided breakfast each morning. I’d happily stay again!

We had an excellent time here. Alberto and Aurora are wonderful hosts, and were extremely helpful in helping us navigate the city. Nothing bad to say about this experience and we would definetly stay here again!!

오로라와 알레르토는 매우 친절했어요 아침밥도 맛있었고 원래 커피를 주셨는데 제가 외출 후 집에 돌아올때 초코우유를 따로 사서 먹으니까 아침에 커피대신 네스퀵을 주시는 등 많이 배려해주었습니다. 방도 매우 깨끗했고 화장실도 혼자 써서 좋았습니다. 하지만 위치가 시내에서 좀 멀어요 그리고 캄파냐 역에서도 가까운게 아니더라구요. 특히 밤에 캄파냐에서 숙소 가는길은 너무 무섭습니다. 포르투 자체가 빈집이 많다보니 거리가 너무 휑하고 사람이없어서 ㅠㅠ
여성분이시라면 숙소 체크인할때 낮에 도착하는걸 추천드립니다.
Such a lovely place. Really grateful we have stayed in this amazing house:)
A very nice place to stay. Enjoyed it a lot.

Aurora & Alberto are amazing hosts.  They are friendly, welcoming, helpful, and delightfully nice.  I absolutely loved my stay at their home, which was clean & comfortable, has a yoga studio, and a beautiful garden.  They gave me tips & recommendations, which I found incredibly helpful.   If I ever get the chance to visit Porto again I would love to stay with them again.

Aurora was very accommodating and had great communication with me. The place was very nice with a very spacious bathroom. Even though I didn’t spend much there I liked it very much and found Aurora to be very sweet and welcoming. Only thing I did not like was how far it was from the city center, would prefer something closer. But other than that perfect(:
I hade a great time working, practicing yoga and recovering at Albertos and Auroras place. They were extraordinary generous with both their home, practical tips and care. I had a great stay.

Sensacional!!

Ótimos anfitriões!! Alberto me apresentou a cidade inteira e me passou as melhores dicas!! 

A casa é enorme e linda!! 


Recomendo certamente!!!

Location is amazing, everything within the city is within walking distance. Aurora was very helpful as she provided me with a detailed message regarding metro directions from the airport. My flight landed at 1030PM and they were accommodating when I arrived at their house at 12PM. The breakfast was delicious as they were options of coffee, tea toast and cereal. Alberto was helpful as he provided me with a map highlighting landmarks and recommended delicious restaurants for lunch and dinner. There is also a yoga studio in the basement and you can attend their class for free which is terrific. The bed was very comfortable. I have only good thing to say about this airbnb and would recommend it to anyone!

Aurora and her husband have a beautiful, clean and well decorated home. 
I felt very welcomed as they gave me a tour of their house. After I settled in, they gave me a map and marked where all the major attractions were then they told me the easiest ways to get around. They also provided laundry service for a price which was a convenience that I was very grateful for. 

Since it was in the 40F. at night, they provided a bundle of warm blankets for my bed. The house is located about 20-25 minute walk from the main square, so I usually took an uber. Overall, I had a great experience and I would definitely recommend their house for a nice, clean and quiet room to stay.

Ce lieu est une maison privée, jolie, agréable. L'accueil y est 
 chaleureux, doté d'une hospitalité superbe de la part d'Aurora et Alberto. Le cadre de ce lieu est très joli. Et, si l'on voyage seul, c'est vraiment agréable de revoir Ces hôtes après une journée de balade à Porto.

We felt very much at home. The location was perfect to vist Porto. Fot us it was important to that there was a bauetiful golfcourse near the cost only 10 minutes away. Aurora and her husband helped us with everything. We had a masage and followed a yogaclass. The bed and room was warm and compfortable.

Aurora和Alberto家是我在葡萄牙十天之旅中住过的性价比最高的民宿!房子特别大,很有空间感,尤其喜欢浴室,很豪华的感觉｡Alberto会仔细为你讲解关于波尔图的一切,包括哪里观光,哪里吃东西,让你与普通游客的选择不一样,而且都很赞哦!Aurora非常贴心,头一天下雨我弄湿了裤子和袜子,就扔在了房间里,第二天回家发现她都帮我烤干了｡｡怕我晚上睡觉冷,她还帮我冲了热水袋,提前捂在被窝里,其实她家是双层玻璃的房子,一点都不冷｡她家还有很漂亮的小花园,只可惜天气不好,没有好好享受｡离火车站很近,去市区的话,走路大概1.7公里,不算远,但推荐坐公交车,很方便,也很快捷｡总之十分推荐在波尔图住Aurora家｡

Die Gastgeber sind zwei tolle, herzliche Menschen. Ich habe mich bei den beiden sehr wohl gefühlt. Das Zimmer hat alles, was man benötigt, das Bett fand ich sehr bequem. Die Einrichtung hat mir sehr gut gefallen. In der Zeit als ich da war, hatte ich das wunderschöne Bad ganz für mich alleine. Das Frühstück war lecker, vor allem die selbstgemachte Marmelade war toll. Es gibt super Tipps für Unternehmungen und Touren durch die Stadt, die einen auch mal in weniger touristische Gegenden der Stadt bringen. Das fand ich besonders toll. Die angegebenen 15 Minuten ins Zentrum führen einen dann aber erst an den Rand des Zentrums. Vom Douro sind es eher 30-45 Minuten, je nachdem, wie schnell man unterwegs ist und welchen Weg man nimmt. Busse und Metro fahren aber regelmäßig und bieten eine gute Alternative, wenn man dann doch mal keine Lust hat zu laufen. Insgesamt bietet diese Unterkunft alles, was man sich wünschen kann. Gerade die Gastgeber machen den Aufenthalt zu etwas besonderem. Die Lage der Unterkunft ist sehr ruhig. Danke nochmals für einen rundum wundervollen Aufenthalt!

Aurora et Alberto sont d'une grande gentillesse et ils sont toujours prêts à donner conseils et bonnes adresses ou à vous aider pour tout. Ils vous accueillent dans leur maison en amis et non en clients.

Jeg boede hos Aurora og Alberto i 11 dage, og de er virkelige noge dejlige mennesker, og huset de har er meget charmerende med eget yogalokale og dejlig have, så det er et perfekt sted at være. Det ligger ca 10 minutters gang fra centrum i en rolig gade, og hvis du er intereseret i yoga er du havnet det helt rigtige sted. Yogaundervisningen er gratis og jeg lavede yoga hver dag, og Alberto giver en rigtig god kropsmassage til kun 40€, så det benyttede jeg mig af et par gange. Man føler sig meget velkommen i deres hjem, så jeg kan varmt anbefale dem.
Med venlig hilsen
Torbjørn
I loved staying with Aurora and Alberto. I was really made to feel at home. They would always try to help me out however they could. A great experience
Atención inmejorable!!
Très bon séjour avec de précieux conseils en français....très belle maison où on s y sent tout de suite bien....on recommande à 100 %

Staying with Aurora and Alberto is already worth a visit to Porto! They are warm, welcoming, easy going and interesting to talk to. We loved their yoga studio! The house is nicely decorated and cozy, well located to be near the centre but away from the noise, and we could park our car in their street. We wish we had more time to spend there :)

It’s clear why Aurora has been a Superhost seven times! We had  missed our bus stop so were late arriving. To ensure that we got to her place Aurora came and met the bus, past her normal bed time. She also provided a heater when she realized we were chilly. Her partner, Alberto, shared his extensive knowledge of Porto to help us plan our visit there. I was grateful to be able to join their yoga classes, situated in their home studio. All in all, a 5 star experience!
Aurora and Alberto are wonderful hosts and their place is beautiful.
非常友好,非常热情的本地人,并且房子很大,有一个漂亮的花园,种了很多果树｡并且还有幸参加了瑜伽,真的好热情,非常好的体验!

C était notre premiere experience en maison d'hôte et c'est une vrai réussite. Une très belle maison , super bien entretenue. Un couple qui est à votre service tout le temps, c'est très agréable . Et surtout d'une extreme gentilesse.Bref à ne pas laisser passer cette belle occasion de profiter du centre de Porto.

A magic place in a magic city!
We loved Porto also because we meet Alberto and Aurora very kind people that make us feeling home in their house and spended some of their time giving us a lot of informations about the town and helped us in organizing our excursions.
The house is cozy and clean. The garden was the perfect place for our children.
Thank you Aurora and Alberto, if we will come back to Porto we will come back to your place!

Wonderful hospitality - Aurora and Alberto were very helpful in pointing out sights, and provided a lovely breakfast (accompanied by Misha the cat). I had been in Porto for a few days by that point so it was nice to stay slightly further out of the city centre and explore a different part of town (ten minutes walk from Campanha station, approximately 25 minutes walk from Sao Bento station).

Logement bien situé pour visiter Porto. Aurora et Alberto sont des gens adorables qui feront tout pour rendre votre séjour agréable. 
Nous les remercions chaleureusement.
Aurora is a wonderful host. Highly recommended!
Super recommandation!

Ich habe 2 Wochen bei Aurora und Alberto verbracht. Der Aufenthalt war großartig. Das reichhaltige Frühstück im Garten, die Ausflüge die Alberto ausgearbeitet hat jeden Morgen, bis hin zu gemeinsamen Aktivitäten. Alles war perfekt. Wenn man mag, kann man Yoga machen.  Das Haus mit Garten ist ein kleines Paradies. Die Nächte sind ruhig, das Bett sehr bequem. Zu Fuß in die Altstadt sind es ca. 20 Minuten, zur nächsten Metro und zum Bahnhof ca. 10 Minuten zu Fuß. Kleinere Restaurants in der Umgebung sind in 5-15 Minuten zu Fuß  zu erreichen. Die Gastfreundschaft der beiden ist wirklich einmalig. Einen Aufenthalt bei Aurora und Alberto kann ich sehr empfehlen.

Alles super!
Lage ist ein wenig ausserhalb des Zentrums: Ca 40 Minuten zu Fuss entfernt oder per Metro erreichbar.

I very much enjoyed my stay at Aurora and Alberto's place. They made me feel welcomed throughout my stay and I  really enjoyed having a breakfast in their beautiful garden! Their house is also close to many historic sights and Alberto game me suggestions for things to see in Porto . Thank you for such a great stay! I wish I could have stayed longer!
Excellent accueil nous nous sommes senti comme chez des amis. des hôtes à l’écoute à nos petits (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande cette havre de paix
Outstanding hospitality   ,and what a traveller would need in a holiday

Aurora and Alberto have a very curious and cosy home with a beautiful garden close to the city center. We felt very welcome and the couple had lots of tips and suggestions what and how to explore in Porto. We had a great stay and Alberto was so nice to let us join one of his yoga classes. I can only recommend the two hosts and their home!
Super séjour chez Aurora et Alberto. Un très bon accueil avec d’excellents conseils pour les visites. Un jardin magnifique où nous avons pu prendre nos petits déjeuners... je recommande vivement!
An amazing place with amazing helpful hosts. We have arrived at midnight and they have waited for us. They provided very tasty breakfast and helpful tips for sightseeing. Highly recommended!!

Ein Haus voller Herzenswärme und Freundlichkeit. Aurora und Alberto sind wunderbare Menschen. Ein liebevolles Frühstück, schöne Zimmer und ein tolles Bad. Ein ganz besonderer Platz, um ein paar Tage in Porto zu verbringen.

Our stay at Aurora's was just perfect! The room is comfortable and the bathroom is spacious and beautiful... the breakfast we had in the wonderful garden made everything even more special :) thank you for this short, but lovely experience in Oporto!

Aurora & Robert have been amazing hosts! They gave me great tipps for everything (sightseeing, restaurants, activities .... you name it). I even got the opportunity to particupate in a yoga class and an amazing breakfast every day. You'll reach the city center within a 15min walk, on which you can already watch some cgurches etc. If I should ever come back to Porto, for sure I would try to stay there again. Thank you for your kindness and help!

Aurora's home was beautiful and both her and her husband were so kind. They were great with communicating and giving suggestions. I even got to take a yoga class in their beautiful yoga studio downstairs. Thank you for the great stay!
Great place. Super quiet and peaceful, with a nice garden, great bathroom and  cute cat! It isn't super central but Porto is small so it's easy to get into the Old Town

This is the place if you like a peaceful stay in Porto. We had Yoga and massage. Every morning we had breakfast  in the beautiful  garden. Alberto gave us the best tips where to go. Alberto and Aurora are the best hostess.

The rooms in Aurora's house are very clean and include all the basic needs. The breakfast was ok, the garden was beautiful and Aurora is very very kind. They are helpful and enthusiastic. The only 'downside' is the distance to the center, which is quite a walk.

Aurora's place is a home away from home.  We were greeted very enthusiastically by Aurora and Alberto.  They are the most hospitable hosts you can ever find.  The house was spacious, bright and very welcoming.  We felt comfortable and at ease immediately especially after a long trip.  Their garden which was what attracted me to their place was not a disappointment.  My friend and I enjoyed a relaxing moment there one afternoon.  The house was super clean, bed was comfortable, the private washroom was huge, spacious and clean. Breakfast was so good with homemade jams from their own garden.  The hosts were very generous enough to share with us the fruits from their own trees.  Plums were so sweet. (Small gestures mean a lot.)  They even came with us and introduced us to a friendly cafe nearby where we always had our "tosta mista con cafe".  They definitely know what places to see in Porto and they gave us proper instructions/directions and advice. Some extras:  if you are into yoga and meditation, you are welcome to join.  The host can give you a good massage for a very, very reasonable rate.  It is easy to see why they became a superhost.  If and when I have a chance to go and visit Porto again, I will definitely stay at Aurora's place again.  As my friend said, it is like visiting your faraway cousins.  Muito obrigada Aurora and Alberto!

Everything was wonderful, the service was great and we got a complete breakfast including fresh fruit every morning! The host is really open and kind! The beds are of good quality and the hostel is beautiful, also the garden is mesmerizing. Thank you for the great experience!

The hosts went above and beyond to make you feel at home. The home was absolutely perfect and clean. Great location to the city center and they gave us a map with fantastic directions and local tips. The breakfast they prepared every morning was delicious and their garden was very relaxing. Aurora and her husband also gave a ride to the airport and let us do laundry. I would absolutely come back again and would recommend their home as a perfect place to stay. They are a very memorable couple.

La casa de Aurora es muy bonita y comoda. Ella y su pareja son anfitriones increibles, muy atentos y amables. Nos dieron indicaciones muy completas para disfrutar de Oporto. Las instalaciones y servicios de la casa son inmejorables. 100% recomendable.
Fijn verblijf gehad. Gastvrije mensen, lokale tips en uitleg

Super adresse sur Porto ! le petit déjeuner est top (du bon pain toasté, des yaourts et confitures maisons, des fruits frais ), servi dans le jardin . Alberto donne de bons conseils pour visiter la ville. les chambres sont propres. rien à redire. je recommande !
very cosy place, very nice couple, great garden !! Loved to stay there !!
Quel accueil ! Nous avons passé un inoubliable séjour, que de bons souvenirs, notre seul regret est d'avoir dû partir.

Aurora's place was spacious, sunlit and spotless clean. They are a nice couple  and gave me lots of information, which was helpful enough to explore Porto, enjoy eating out and purchase what I had wanted. I will definitely stay here again next time in the city, and join their yoga classes and relax more in their lovely garden!

I really had a great time in Aurora's house. Aurora and Alberto are the best hosts that I have ever met!! There is nothing to really explain about the very clean room and convenient location. (It is 20 mins by walk from the city centre!) They took care of me a lot, gave me lots of useful information and made me feel like at home. Indeed, it was a very special experience to have amazing breakfast in the beautiful garden. I will definitely stay in this place when I visit Porto again.
Aurora et Alberto sont des hotes extras, à recommander

Ich hatte eine sehr tolle Zeit in Porto! Die Stadt ist toll, es gibt viel zu sehen und auch das Umland ist wunderbar. Alles ist von der Unterkunft aus sehr gut zuerreichen, ich bin zu Fuß ins Zentrum gelaufen, aber auch die Bahn ist nur ca. 5 Minuten entfernt. Aurora und Alberto sind sehr gastfreundliche Menschen, was den Aufenthalt zu einem wunderbaren Urlaub gemacht hat. Frühstück, Tee, Tipps, Yogakurse und Ausflüge machten meine Woche in Porto zu einem besonderen Erlebnis.... Das Haus ist groß, geräumig, sehr schön und ästhetisch eingerichtet, auch der Garten und das Yogastudio sind besonders liebevoll eingerichtet und ich habe mich rundum wohl gefühlt. Definitiv zu empfeheln!
Aurora ist a famous host. She gave us many tips and took care of our well-being. We recommend the accommodation to our friends.

My mom and I have had a nice stay at Alberto and Aurora’s beautiful home. Their house is located just a bit outside of the historical center so it’s the perfect option if you want a quiet place with easy parking available on the street. Alberto and Aurora care a lot about their guest and are very resourceful about the city and the other areas around Porto for day trips. We were pleased with our stay there.
Très bon endroit pour demeurer,un couple très gentils et accueillant et très dévoués! Endroit très propre et tranquille! Je le recommande fortement!
wonderful place, very good advices, nice breakfast and very good opportunity to participate at yoga lessons. many thanks to both!!

Une merveilleuse adresse pour découvrir Porto à pied. Des hôtes très disponibles et  attentionnés dans une belle (Website hidden by Airbnb) plein de conseils pour visiter la ville et ses trésors ! Merci Aurora et Alberto pour votre accueil.

We had a really lovely stay, we only stayed a night but Aurora and Alberto were really great hosts. We were given great local recommendations for places to eat and a really lovely breakfast in the morning. The house is really beautiful and cosy, the bed we stayed in was really comfy and the bathroom was beautiful. Would definitely recommend.

The local people restaurant that Alberto recommended is really authentic food! Very thank you ! Especially the Cod roll and cod with potato dish is so amazing. This restaurant NOVA ERA is a little far but can reach by walk or metro 24-August station.
Muito bom! Ótima hospitalidade. Vale a pena, condiz com o anúncio. Limpo, próximo a linha de metrô.

Aurora and Roberto offer a home and their warmth not just a room and a key. The lovely old wood burner roaring away downstairs and the use of the heater in the bedroom add to the homely feeling. Aurora is kind and considerate and Roberto informative and keen to help. The bathroom is lovely with hot water and the simple breakfast with homemade jams etc was a nice addition. The bedroom looks a little plain but is perfect for its use, mattresses are hard and pillows thin but the covers are cosy, everything was clean. The yoga by Roberto is nice, he speaks in Portugese all the way through which means you might not always follow what to do. Both Roberto and Aurora speak English which is helpful. I would recommend this place.

Amamos a hospitalidade de Aurora e Alberto. Ficamos muito agradecidos por tudo: gentileza, carinho, disposição, super dicas de como andar por Portugal. Enfim, super recomendamos a (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza saberemos onde ficar quando voltarmos ao Porto.

Aurora and Alberto are wonderful hosts. They were always eager to give us local tips and help us with our planning. We unexpectedly had to leave early and they were also very accommodating with the the hiccup. We greatly appreciate their help. Their place is 15 min more or less from the center and there is a metro and many bus stops nearby too. We recommend it.

Aurora et Alberto : 
sont de belles personnes ;
avenante, accueillante , à l'écoute : 
J'ai passé en leur compagnie, un agréable séjour 
MERCI
Sehr empfehlenswert!superschönes sauberes Zimmer, tolle herzliche Gastgeber und kostenlose Yogastunden im Haus! Einfach fantastisch:)

More than perfect. Aurora and Alberto are adorable and caring. Felt like we were staying with friends or family. 
And the free yoga classes were such an awesome bonus !!!! Loved it.

name: Green House in  Barra da Tijuca
summary: Located on a secure Condomínio  full of green with  the confort of the urban area. Clear and fresh. Good to relax of a working day or for a good vaccation. Very easy transportations and commerce close. Familiar atmosfere.
space: Loft with terrace and solarium on the third. floor of house with stripped Búzius style. Own bathroom, small pantry and desk. Familiar, peaceful setting. Support and optional housekeeping and food transport. Convenient space for those who is working in city or a relax vaccation.
description: Located on a secure Condomínio  full of green with  the confort of the urban area. Clear and fresh. Good to relax of a working day or for a good vaccation. Very easy transportations and commerce close. Familiar atmosfere. Loft with terrace and solarium on the third. floor of house with stripped Búzius style. Own bathroom, small pantry and desk. Familiar, peaceful setting. Support and optional housekeeping and food transport. Convenient space for those who is working in city or a relax vaccation.
transit: Há espaco para estacionamento em frente a casa. Precisando de trasporte público há todo tipo de transporte para todos os lugares da cidade na rua do Condominio. Ha BRT para acesso do aeroporto ao bairro.
interaction: Tanto quanto necessário os hóspedes podem contar comigo. sempre haverá alguém na casa para certificar-se que tudo funcionará a contento.
house_rules: A casa possui dois gatos. Por isso nao é possivel hospedar outros animais de estimação.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: I am an English speaking hostess that love my city, specially the natural areas. I work with environment matters and have a lot of energy to help you on everything you need to have a good time in Rio. I have wide experience travelling so I know what people expect when they go to other countries os other states inside Brazil. I enjoy cultural programs and love making new friends,  I am a serious person and have a lot of responsabilities, family, kids, and good reputation but I am happy  and entusiastic person that like good people with health habits and like experience good things.

reviews.comments:
La casa esta en un condominio cerrado, lo cual brinda seguridad. Esta algo alejada del centro, por lo que es recomendable tener movilidad propia. La casa no esta preparada para recibir huespedes. No se han vaciado los cajones y armarios; la heladera debe compartirse con los propietarios. El loft del ultimo piso no tiene cortinas por lo que entra mucha luz desde temprano. Tres gatos viven en la casa y conviven con los visitantes.
Patricia fue amable, dispuesta a ayudar y brindar informacion.

Patricia was a good host! she is friendly and helpful and at the same time she was not always at home so we had our own space. I've stayed in her house 6 days with four friends of mine and we were all quite happy with the accommodation. We could also use the kitchen and the BBQ. The house is big and nice and she has four cats in the house. The house is part of a group of houses surrounded by a fence and 24/7 guards, so very safe. In the surrounding area there are mainly big buildings and shopping mall but in just 30min walking you are on the beach :-)

name: Modern luxury Beach House
summary: Across the road from Warriewood Beach, this executive rental offers a north facing backyard with swimming pool, 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas, a fully self- contained flat, polished concrete floors, King Furniture, Miele and Ilve Appliances, fully furnished, built in BBQ, outside shower,  etc ...  minimum 5 day rental
space: Across the road from the beach, around the corner from restaurants and cafes, up the street from a cinema and a 2km drive to Warriewood shopping centre and Mona Vale. 100m walk to major bus route that takes 40mins drive to Sydney city. Very central location
description: Across the road from Warriewood Beach, this executive rental offers a north facing backyard with swimming pool, 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas, a fully self- contained flat, polished concrete floors, King Furniture, Miele and Ilve Appliances, fully furnished, built in BBQ, outside shower,  etc ...  minimum 5 day rental Across the road from the beach, around the corner from restaurants and cafes, up the street from a cinema and a 2km drive to Warriewood shopping centre and Mona Vale. 100m walk to major bus route that takes 40mins drive to Sydney city. Very central location Pool, BBQ, outside shower, Aross the road from Warriewood beach, and the Warreiwood beach shops, 400m walk to cinemas, 2km walk to Warriewood shopping centre, 2km walk to Mona Vale shops The  bus route to the city and manly is at the end of the street.
neighborhood_overview: Aross the road from Warriewood beach, and the Warreiwood beach shops, 400m walk to cinemas, 2km walk to Warriewood shopping centre, 2km walk to Mona Vale shops
transit: The  bus route to the city and manly is at the end of the street.
access: Pool, BBQ, outside shower,
house_rules: Respect our house the way you respect your own house.

reviews.comments:
Great place. Perfect for families or adult groups for that matter. 
Great location. Across road from beach, cafe next door. 
Great host. Couldn't be more helpful.

Hi Marissa and Damien, thanks so much for the wonderful stay.  Your home was spacious and the times we had 12 people there - it never felt crowded.  The kitchen was well equipped and swimming pool  / trampoline kept the kids entertained.
The house was perfect  - we had family from Brisbane and Darwin for a very special and rare Christmas and New Year.
The location was perfect, nice and close to beach, an easy walk to movies and local shopping centre.

PS: The ocean views from balcony are stunning, and there is nothing better than lying in bed listening to the sounds of the ocean.

Once again - thanks so much - Julie and Terry

Marissa's place is lovely. I was delighted to discover that there is a sea view from the main bedroom balcony and a great coffee shop and restaurants across the road. There is lots of space and great for a big family. It is walking distance to the beach. I would recommend this house highly.

name: Large, Airy Walk-Up With Rooftop Near the Park
summary: This is a large walk-up with high ceilings, located very conveniently near Victoria Park and the Tin Hau MTR station, and betweenTin Hau proper and the charming neighborhood of Tai Hang.  There's an open kitchen and a large common space with full dining table, as well as a rooftop area furnished for dining and lounging.  We are offering this as a holiday rental while we go out of town.
space: The apartment gets great light and has high ceilings and an open kitchen, giving it an airy feeling. There's a large rooftop with patio furniture for picnicking or just lazing outside and reading. There is wifi, of course. It's a walk-up, which may not be to everyone's taste, and there are two cats.
