description: This is a large walk-up with high ceilings, located very conveniently near Victoria Park and the Tin Hau MTR station, and betweenTin Hau proper and the charming neighborhood of Tai Hang.  There's an open kitchen and a large common space with full dining table, as well as a rooftop area furnished for dining and lounging.  We are offering this as a holiday rental while we go out of town. The apartment gets great light and has high ceilings and an open kitchen, giving it an airy feeling. There's a large rooftop with patio furniture for picnicking or just lazing outside and reading. There is wifi, of course. It's a walk-up, which may not be to everyone's taste, and there are two cats. Guest will have access to both bedrooms, the bathroom, kitchen, sitting room, dining room and roof. We will be out of town during this rental, but our helper will be available when needed and we will leave details for a friend in the neighborhood who can answer basic questions. Tai Hang is a charming neighbor
neighborhood_overview: Tai Hang is a charming neighborhood full of low-rise buildings and quiet lanes. Small local restaurants as well as plenty of foreign options line uncrowded streets. The apartment is located on the edge of the neighborhood and equally close to Tin Hau, which boasts even more good restaurants, cafes and small shops. We are across from Victoria Park and very close to the Causeway Bay Sports Ground and the Central Library.
notes: We have two cats, who will stay elsewhere, and we will clean the place thoroughly before we go, of course. But those who are very sensitive to cat dander should be aware that there is some around.
transit: This is a very central location with great access to transit. The E11 airport bus goes right by us, and the MTR is right on the corner. The free Airport Express courtesy shuttle drops off at the Metro Park hotel, which is next door. There are also a number of other buses and trams, and plenty of cabs.
access: Guest will have access to both bedrooms, the bathroom, kitchen, sitting room, dining room and roof.
interaction: We will be out of town during this rental, but our helper will be available when needed and we will leave details for a friend in the neighborhood who can answer basic questions.
house_rules: Please be quiet and courteous, wash your dishes if you dirty them and don't invite a bunch of people over.

reviews.comments: très chaleureux, gentil accueillant, patient j'ai été ravie de l’accueil le lieu est clean comme sur la photo le quartier est joli juste une bonne marche pour accéder aux transport je recommande vivement l'hôte

Mr. Thompson’s flat was comfortable, spacious, well equipped and adequate for our requirements. Overall, our experience was satisfactory, except for the fact we missed air conditioning in the very hot weather. The flat was as described, well maintained, orderly and clean including the bathrooms. However, it was quite a distance from the centre and even the local taxi driver had difficulty locating the flat. 
Our host, Thompson had readily agreed for earlier check in. His agent was Abilio; and although he didn’t converse with us in English, his friend (Paulo?) spoke fluently.  On entering the house we were told the house rules, including repeated instructions NOT to touch the walls, which we all felt were quite unnecessary and frankly, rather unwelcoming . We were also instructed not to smoke inside, and despite interrupting to explain that none of us were smokers, our host insisted on continuing his spiel.
Admittedly I had not done my homework well and was disappointed to discover there was no wifi (although this and the fact of no AC is mentioned on the website) which made communication and enquiries difficult as we normally depend on UBER taxi service. The nearest public transport was some distance, but this was not an option as we were travelling with our 2 year old grandson accompanying us.  The neighbourhood was tidy and quiet but rather remote from the touristy areas, and probably best suited to a big group of music festival-goers who want to stay together in a large flat. In this context, the flat would prove relatively good value for money. 
I had mentioned to Thompson that we were travelling with a young child, however the flat was far from child-friendly – we had our work cut out to stop our curious toddler from playing with the numerous trinkets and decorations in the apartment. It wasn’t just the child, I myself accidentally knocked down some photographs from a shelf in the hallway trying to find the bathroom light switch in the dark. I might have caused some damage to the frames for which I apologise. If this is the case, I will pay for new replacement frames.
In summary this flat is spacious, clean and cheap but has several shortcomings as highlighted above. Unless one has private transport and is able to tolerate the lack of aircon and wifi I would not readily recommended this flat for first time visitors to Porto and certainly not with little children.
Tout etait parfait,comme la premiere fois. Le rapport qualite prix est imbattable

très joli appartement très moderne avec tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un agréable séjour. dans résidence sécurisée et très calme. seul hic! les transports en commun sont assez éloignés (25 min à pieds pour métro) commerce de proximité à 15 min.

Mes appartements totalement équipés sont situés, dans la Ville de Mont-Royal, un secteur dans le centre de Montréal. Proche du centre commercial Rockland et a quelques minutes en voiture de l’aéroport et du centre-ville de Montréal. Sunset Suites satisfait principalement les voyageurs de longue durée (7 jours ou plus), mais je fais de mon mieux pour héberger les voyageurs recherchant un séjour de 3 jours minimum.

reviews.comments: Maria Es una persona muy amable y cordial, inmediatamente hice reservación estuvo al pendiente de nuestra llegada e indico algunas cosas importantes acerca de la habitación. El Lugar en realidad no hay como describirlo, dormir justo detrás de la popular Catedral de Barcelona y tener todo exactamente en la parte de abajo (puesto que es un departamento muy hermoso por cierto) recomendaria este alojamiento a familiares, amigos y conocidos sin lugar a dudas. Maria jest bardzo miłą i sympatyczną osobą. Od samego początku wszelkie niezbędne informacje przekazywała na bieżąco i była bardzo pomocna. Oferta była zgodna z opisem oraz oczekiwaniami, więc jakość oceniam na bardzo dobrą. Lokalizacja wręcz rewelacyjna - w samym centrum miasta, w niedalekiej odległości od wielu wartych odwiedzenia miejsc. Polecam serdecznie wszystkim osobom, które szukają wygodnego i dobrze zlokalizowanego pokoju.

excelente lugar para conocer Barcelona!! todo muy limpio y organizado.

She even speaks good English, so communication wasn't a problem. At Maria's, you can feel like real locals in Barcalona. The location was amazing and you have a lovely view from the balcony. The bathroom was clean with towels you can use. Would recommend Maria's place if you like feeling a bit like a local.
Maria Eulalia ha sido una excelente Anfitriona. Su casa está muy bien ubicada y ella ha sido siempre atenta,respetuosa y solidaria con nosotros. Totalmente recomendable!

My brother and I stayed at Maria Eulalia's place for 3 days. The location of her flat is extremely convenient: right in the middle of the city centre, 2 min. from a subway station, 10 min from Plaza de Cataluña, several restaurants and stores nearby and at walking distance from the Barrio Gótico. The place was really clean and with the necessary space, although having to share just one bathroom between people on all of the 3 guest rooms could cause you to wait a bit at certain hours of the day. Maria Eulalia herself was a really lovely host, very helpful and with a lot of stories to tell. Overall, I highly recommend staying at her place.
Sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Vermieterin. Tolle Lage. Nur ein paar Minuten vom Strand entfernt.

The apartment is very clean, only a short walk to the metro station, 20 minute walk to the beach, it's a great location overall. Maria is very friendly and has helpful tips for tourists. As or flight was delayed we didn't arrive till after 1am and Maria still welcomed us with a smile. We stayed 5 nights and would highly recommend it :)

Being Scots we of course found it difficult to sleep in the heat and the busy street below was quite noisy at night but after a long day and night exploring Barcelona it did not take too long to fall asleep. Great central location which was fairly easy to find.
Maria's place is in a great location!! Right Beside the cathedral, subway, etc and she is very nice and helpful.

Great location, close to everything. Good communication with Maria. Bedroom was a great size. No major issues; minor issue always having to wear your shoes or else the bottoms of you feet would be black, but a cleaning lady did come in after a couple days. Overall a great stay.

Wonderful location in the city centre in the host's personal residence. Our Host, Maria, was pleasant, unobtrusive. but available to answer questions. We came and went as we pleased. Our room was small, but we had everything we needed, including permission to  put a few food items into hosts refrigerator even thought there were technically no kitchen privileges.  A small fan was a welcome relief due to the heat of summer and fact that there was no air conditioning.  The lift to this fourth floor apt. was wonderful after traveling for a week and hauling our own luggage up and down flights of stairs.
Posizione , a due passi dalla  metro, supermercati sotto casa e Rambla a 7 minuti

Best location to the all visit sides and also beach. And Maria is so kind. Thank you. If we come back Barcelona, we absolutely stay here.

Very clean and we were told we could have use of the kitchen and appliances if needed. Thank you!

You're located minutes away from the Cathedral, Gothic Quarter, and around a 10 minute walk to Las Ramblas and the Port! We couldn't have asked for a better location. Maria was a great host. We were able to check in hours before the allocated time, which was a great help! it meant we could freshen up and get out into the city without having to lug around our cases. Maria gave us a key and gave us the freedom of coming and going as we pleased, which was great! It was our first time using Air BnB but it was honestly a great experience of using it for the first time. We'll definitely be back, if you'll have us :)
You've got a beautiful apartment in the heart of Barcelona! 
Thanks so much! 
Tara & Greg

Maria`s flat is itself quite clean with lots of space, communication with Maria is excellent, she is very kind and flexible. There is a huge balcony at your disposal. In my opinion value for money is excellent for this place and you will hardly find anything better in Barcelona.

We loved Maria's place! The location was absolutely perfect and view was great.  Wet close to metro which took us to all the sights. The room was clean and basic. Two twin beds and two closets for hanging clothes. The bathroom was shared with Maria and other guests but it was not a problem. The bathroom was clean and a cleaning lady even came while we were there. Maria let us use cups, wine opener, cutting board, etc. The only thing to mention is that it smelled like cigarette smoke so if you are allergic i would not recommend this apartment. Overall, basic, but great value, and the location couldn't be better!

Maria Eulalia nos hizo sentir bienvenidos enseguida, fue muy amable al responder nuestras inquietudes. El departamento es muy cómodo, con una ubicación excelente, a solo unas cuadras de la Plaça de Catalunya, lugar estratégico para acceder al transporte, compras y paseos.

it was great

The location was fantastic and in the vicinity of restaurants, bars, shops and public transportation. Maria is very welcoming and easy to communicate with. We would definitely recommend staying here!

Maria is a very nice lady. The location was perfect! Walking distance to bus stops and restaurants. Great view of the Cathedral. Unfortunately did not speak English well so The communication was difficult. The room has a faint smell of cigarettes and there’s a cleaning crew that comes in unannounced that we weren’t aware of. But for he price and location it was worth it.
Maria Eulalia fue una anfitriona muy cordial, amable y bien predispuesta. La habitación cumplió con nuestras pretensiones, y ubicación es excelente (pegado a la catedral en pleno barrio gótico)
We had a great time. The location was very central and Maria is a friendlyand warmly person.
Within walking distance to cathedral

Amazing flat with great views of the Gothic Quarter. Close to the sea and most of the night life in and around the Gothic area. If you're looking for an authentic stay in Barcelona with someone who knows their way around stay here!

Maria Eulalia's place is very well located, close to many attractions of Barcelona. It's just a walking distance to La Rambla, Mercat de la Boqueria, La Catedral, Basilica de Santa Maria del Mar, Museu Picasso and many more. What's more it's only 10 min walk from Barceloneta beach. 
Maria Eulalia is a very nice and friendly lady. She is always ready to answer any questions and help with any issues. I had an amazing time in Barcelona and one of the reasons was that I had a great place to stay there. I highly recommend Maria Eulalia's place. She is a great host.

Maria Eulalia's place is in the IDEAL location. It's on a main street, there's a cafe downstairs (so there's foot traffic which makes everything feel safer if you're traveling solo), there's a security guard for most of the day, there's a grocery store across the street, all the main sites are in walking distance (including Barceloneta) and the view from the balcony in the apartment is great. There is a slight smell of smoke in the apt, so if you're allergic be aware of that. There's also another long term resident of the apt, but I never even saw them until right before I left -- so no issues with sharing the bathroom. Maria Eulalia is so kind and offered great advice on sights and is a lovely person as well. She had another guest checking in the day I was leaving and was nice enough to offer luggage storage space since my flight was late in the afternoon.

Die Lage ist perfekt und Maria ist ein "Juwel"! 
Es ist ein Zimmer mit Balkon auf dem 4.Stock. Zweckmässig eingerichtet und da gegen die Strassenseite bekommt man gezwungenerweise den Lärm mit. 
Trotzdem, Ausschlafen war kein Problem für uns. 
Maria ist seit 40 Jahren in Barcelona und hat uns diverse wertvolle Tipps und auch Hintergrund Infos gegeben. z.B. Gaudi. 
Kann es nur 100% empfehlen, da ich jederzeit wieder bei ihr buchen würde.

Very nice apartement, perfectly located in the Barri Gotic next to the cathedral. And an even nicer Lady host with whom we enjoyed every little conversation! Maria is warm and welcoming and helped us with tips even long before we arrived. That was perfect! Thanks so much!

The only thing we have to criticize is the noise from the street and the church. The bells ring every hour, even during nighttime! And the cars, especially busses and city cleaning vehicles made us wake up every night. If you can't sleep with earplugs (like me) you should consider this.
Great position, the appartament, a typical  barcellona house is on one of the main streets of the city, near the gotic quarter and  the host Maria is a very nice  and lovely person
Excelente ubicación, zona movida pero segura, todo a la mano. Eulalia excelente anfitriona. Dispuesta y súper respetuosa. Seguro volveríamos

My husband and I spent 3 nights in Barcelona. María Eulalia’s apartment was our first experience with Airbnb and I must say it was PERFECT! First, as a host she is just amazing, very lovely. Second and one of the most important things for us as tourists, her apartment is located in a super convenient area, extremely close to any line of the metro, very walkable, safe! It is close to a lot of stores and touristic points. I can’t wait to go back to Barcelona and stay again with her. Highly recommended !!!!
El alojamiento es muy comodo la anfitriona muy cálida y dispuesta a colaborar con las necesidades la ubicación es muy buena. volveria sin dudas a alojarme en su piso

El departamento es muy limpio y muy bien ubicado. Se puede llegar caminando a los puntos principales. La habitación es tal como se ve en la fotos. Cómoda y con un balcón muy lindo para disfrutar. Tener en cuenta  que el departamento también se puede compartir con otros huéspedes. Maria Eulalia siempre fue atenta y nos dio buenas recomendaciones.
María Eulalia es amable y dispuesta y la ubicación es excelente.

The apartment is the best location you can have in Barcelona. Just around the corner of the cathedral and in the heart of gothic quarter.
The house and flat has a great charme and the view of the balcony is magnificient. Also there are a lot of nice small cafés and bars just around the corner. 
We had a perfect time! Thank you.
Excellent location in the Gothic Quarter and a wonderful space for myself and a friend who were out and about most of the day/night.
Very good location. Close to the beach and the center, lots of restaurants and cafes around. Clean room and a very friendly host.

posizione eccezionale, a 1 minuto dalla cattedrale, vicinissimo alla rambla e alla metro, un po' rumorosa la notte perché si affaccia su una strada principale ma abbiamo dormito benissimo comunque. stanza un po' spartana, signora disponibile, ci siamo trovati molto bene
Great location right in the gothic quarter. The view from the balcony is amazing! The apartment is easy to access and beautiful!
Maria was very kind and her home is beautiful. Sitting out on the balcony and having a glass of wine at night with a view of the mountains was amazing.

increíble estadía en lo de Maria eulalia !!! Ella fue super amable y nos ayudo en todo !!! pudimos guardar las maletas y tomar un baño antes de irnos! la ubicación es inmejorable, es una plaza del barrio gótico... no podría ser mejor! recomiendo !!!

Apartement ancien mais dans un très bel immeuble avec une très belle vue. Super bien placé pour les visites des monuments et de la mer. Métro Jaume à 2 mins. Maria Euralia est une dame très gentille qui est très serviable et hospitalière. C’est une adresse que je garde pour une prochaine visite à Barcelone.
Petit bémol pour une panne d électricité et de l ascenseur mais qui apparement reste occasionnel et l avenue devant est très bruyante mais bon ça ne nous a pas empêché de dormir....

This Airbnb was incredible! We could not believe how amazing the location is and how beautiful and old the house is that we lived in. It is quite noisy because the house is on a main street but the view from the balcony is mesmerizing. And you live just next to a 1000 year old Roman wall! It only takes 15-20 minutes to go to the beach and just next to the house is a metro station. Maria is a wonderful, kind woman that was helpful with anything we needed. It was an extraordinary Airbnb where you could feel history.
Maria is a really sweet person and her appartment is perfectly situated for tourists. We defenitively recommend for anyone visiting Barcelona!
The room was in a great location. The balcony has a great view. Maria is a lovely lady and made me feel very at home

Maria is amazing! She welcomed us with open arms, gave us a tour of the house, and was very lenient about checking in and out of her Airbnb. Even with my limited Spanish, we were able to communicate well. 

Maria’s Airbnb is centrally located near great restaurants, shopping, and sightseeing. Highly recommend!

Estuvimos casi una semana y todo resultó muy bien. La ubicación en pleno barrio gótico es inmejorable!! Cuarto sencillo que cumple, balconcito y todos los servicios básicos con baño compartido, bastante práctico y cómodo en general, fue una estancia muy tranquila, si lo recomendamos! :)

Очень красивое историческое здание в самом центре города, в самом эпицентре всех достопримечательностей. Окна комнаты выходят на большой симпатичный балкон, единственное - со стороны оживленной улицы, поэтому с открытым окном шумно, и ещё в начале октября сквозь щели тянуло холодным воздухом (думаю летом это не проблема). В квартире есть всё необходимое.
Maria has a lovely apartment. Right in the centre of the gothic quarter so is quite lively at night. It is 10 minute walk from the beach  and right next to the metro. Perfect for our four night stay
Maria is a great host! She is so kind and helpfull.Best location in Barcelona for tourists!
GREAT LOCATION! The balcony was so lovely ! Winning view!

Maria Eulalia ist eine nette, unkomplizierte Gastgeberin.
Wir haben alles wie beschrieben vorgefunden. Die Lage der Wohnung in der Altstadt  ist perfekt. Von dort aus sind viele Sehenswürdigkeiten, Bars und Märkte gut zu Fuß erreichbar.Die Metro ist in einer Minute zu Fuß zu erreichen. Das Zimmer zur Straße ist nichts für Leute mit leichtem Schlaf, da der Verkehr deutlich hörbar ist. Allerdings ist die Lage der Wohnung kaum zu toppen. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen. Danke!

테라스 뷰와 위치만 보고 정한 숙소 였는데 예상했던것 보다 좋았습니다. 침구에서는 향기가 나고 매트리스는 푹신했어요. 테라스에서 보는 경치도 훌륭했습니다. 욕조도 있고 주방도 이용 가능하고 없는게 거의 없으며, 없는 것도 부탁하면 가져다 주십니다. (저는 치약이 없어서 부탁했는데 주셨어요) 호스트 두분 모두 너무 친절하셨어요. 어디서 담배냄새가 나는 지 모르겠는데 자주 담배냄새가 나긴 했어요. 유럽건물은 오래 돼서 녹물이 좀 나오긴합니다. 저희는 정수샤워기헤드 들고갔는데 필터가 많이 노래졌어요. 그래도 저는 추천하고 싶네요. 현지인처럼 살아보고 싶다면 주저하지 말고 이 곳으로 정하세요.

It was the terrace view and the location, which was better than expected. The mouth was fragrant and the mattress was soft. The view from the terrace was wonderful. There's a bathtub, there's a kitchen, there's very little that's available, and if you ask for something you don't, you can bring it. (I didn't have toothpaste, but I asked for it.) Both hosts were so kind. I don't know where I smell cigarettes, but I often smell cigarettes. But I'd like to recommend it. If you want to live like a native, don't hesitate to choose this place.

Pro 
- Great Location 
-Good Price 

Con 
-Difficult to Locate 
-Host was unresponsive the first night. I had to contact AirBnB support to get a response. She was responsive after the incident.
Delightful apartment in great location. Maria was also lovely
Excellent location in the Gothic Quarter, Maria was lovely and we had everything we needed for a weekend stay.

Location location location! Maria’s place is located in the absolute best location! Additionally, the views from the balcony are spectacular! Not to mention the fact that her place is located right next to an old Roman wall AND only a few minutes away from the Barcelona Cathedral and Las Ramblas. Maria is also a very kind and helpful host who will chat if you’d like or leave you to do your own thing. She was also available to give us recommendations on things to do and places to eat. There is also a bus stop and a metro stop right by her place, so it’s very easy to get around to other places in the city. The room itself was clean and worked perfectly for my friend and I. The beds were comfortable and the direct access to the balcony was by far our favorite thing about the room. The only thing we didn’t like was the fact that the room only locks from the inside, so while we were out and about we couldn’t lock our room. So that’s something to keep in mind if that’s a feature that’s important to you. All in all though it was the perfect place for our few days spent in Barcelona, and we would absolutely stay here again!

This wonderful apartment is exactly as advertised on Air B n B site. Maria is just wonderful, as is the location, and you are in fact 6 floors up with an amazing view.
Maria smokes, and the lift may break down , leaving you 24 flights of marble stairs to climb.  I would love to go back there again.
Maria was a gracious host who provided everything we could need. The location was unbeatable! Really enjoyed our stay.

Maria’s home was extremely convenient for tourists like us. Close to the city center and located right in the heart of the gothic quarter, it is the perfect place to stay for a short trip in Barcelona!
beautiful place to stay in barcelona

the place has good view 
highly recommended
交通太方便了,慈宁宫机场过来方便,去往各路景点方便,从公寓的阳台上望出去就是风景｡｡｡｡当然,如果是期待五星酒店的,那就免谈了

name: Independent room in Rio - Carnival and Rock in Rio
summary: Great room in family residence. Fully independent, it can have up to 2 guests. Private bathroom, minibar and microwave. Cul-de-sac providing parking nearby. Quiet neighborhood, with access to the BRT that connects to the Rio de Janeiro International Airport, the Olympic Village / Riocentro (Rock In Rio) and the beach and the Barra da Tijuca subway.
space: It is a neighborhood, not far from Barra da Tijuca and an interesting place to stay if you want to see the Olympics. However, you need to take a bus to get to the BRT station, or 20 minutes walking, connecting to the Carnival and Rock in Rio area. It is a residential home, where also live my mother and sister in apartments next door.
description: Great room in family residence. Fully independent, it can have up to 2 guests. Private bathroom, minibar and microwave. Cul-de-sac providing parking nearby. Quiet neighborhood, with access to the BRT that connects to the Rio de Janeiro International Airport, the Olympic Village / Riocentro (Rock In Rio) and the beach and the Barra da Tijuca subway. It is a neighborhood, not far from Barra da Tijuca and an interesting place to stay if you want to see the Olympics. However, you need to take a bus to get to the BRT station, or 20 minutes walking, connecting to the Carnival and Rock in Rio area. It is a residential home, where also live my mother and sister in apartments next door.
neighborhood_overview: O bairro é residencial, porém com comércio muito vasto. Taquara é um dos subbairros de Jacarepaguá, ao lado de Curicica, onde fica a Vila Olímpica e o Riocentro, local de shows, eventos e do Rock in Rio.
notes: Há possibilidade de solicitar o serviço de comida caseira e café da manhã.
transit: Há disponibilidade de linhas de ônibus que interliga à Estação Taquara do BRT, que fica a apenas 2 quilômetros de distância. O BRT interliga o Aeroporto Internacional do Rio de Janeiro, praia e metrô da Barra da Tijuca, Vila Olímpica/Riocentro/Rock in Rio.
access: O acesso é totalmente privativo dos hóspedes desse quarto, por meio da área externa.
interaction: Estarei disponível para orientar no que for necessário, caso os hóspedes solicitem. Minha filha e irmã residem em apartamentos anexos e também poderão ser solicitadas a ajudar em algo.
house_rules: É um studio com acesso somente por escadas. Não é interessante para idosos ou pessoas com mobilidade reduzida. Terminantemente proibido acesso de pessoas além daquelas identificadas como usuárias na locação, ou para encontros fortuitos e namoro. Ambiente familiar.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Es un apartamento pequeño y sencillo pero muy limpio, con buena luz natural todo el día, con todo lo suficiente para sentirse muy bien y ubicado en un entorno muy tranquilo, agradable y seguro del sector Taquara de Río de Janeiro.
Se puede llegar fácilmente desde el aeropuerto internacional Galeao hasta la estación de BRT Taquara. El apartamento está cerca de la
estacion de metro BRT de Taquara a través de las cuales se puede llegar a cualquier sitio en Río de Janeiro. Tiene restaurantes, farmacias, pastelerías, almacenes grandes y tiendas cercanas a las que se puede llegar caminando.
Don Paulo Henrique es una persona bondadosa, de gran corazón y muy amable con sus huéspedes. Sin dudarlo, cuando tenga la oportunidad de volver a Río, me alojaría en ese apartamento nuevamente.

name: Casa S. Miguel 6 - The Yellow House
summary: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price.
space: The ideal place to stay with family, friends or on businesses, can accommodate up to 8 guests. The house  has been refurbished and furnished recently, preserving its old character and adding the quality of nowadays comfort. Free Wifi, 130 TV channels, sound system, board games (cards, chess, draughts, mikado, domino) and books are available. Bed linen, bath towels, beach towels hair dryer and straighteners. The bathroom shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper will be provided.  Kitchen: hob, oven, extractor, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, kettle, fridge/freezer, washing and dryer machines, iron and iron board, stick blender set, vacuum cleaner, cutlery, glassware, complete kitchen ware and cleaning products are available. Baby eating chair and baby cot are available. The house is comprised of three floors: - Ground floor: Entrance with a spacious open living room, kitchen and dining space; - First floor: small living room with sofa bed and access to balcony + double bedroom with acce
description: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price. The ideal place to stay with family, friends or on businesses, can accommodate up to 8 guests. The house  has been refurbished and furnished recently, preserving its old character and adding the quality of nowadays comfort. Free Wifi, 130 TV channels, sound system, board games (cards, chess, draughts, mikado, domino) and books are available. Bed linen, bath towels, beach towels hair dryer and straighteners. The bathroom shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper will be provided.  Kitchen: hob, oven, extractor, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, kettle, fridge/freezer, washing and dryer machines, iron and iron board, stick blender set, vacuum cleaner, cutlery, glassware, complete kitchen ware and cleaning products
neighborhood_overview: The S. Miguel 6 house is located in the heart of the historical Porto's area, just 5 minute walk from "Torre dos Clerigos"  This house is located in a privileged and quiet location with access to the fantastic view of the city and Douro river from the "Miradouro  da Vitoria"  across the street.  The "Mosteiro de S. Bento da Vitoria" is a minute walk away. The vibrant Porto's night life is just 5 minute walk way. Come discover Porto and feel at home!
notes: Pets are welcome, but an additional cleaning fee of 40 euros per stay will apply.
transit: Nearest train station:  By subway - Stop SÃO BENTO - about 700m - 10 min walk.  By train - Stop SÃO BENTO - about 700m - 10 min walk. If you are carrying heavy and bulky luggage is recommended to take a taxi from the airport. If you arrive by car please note that there is free public car park spaces on the street, first come first serve basis. Alternatively there are also paid car park spaces near by.
access: Access to the entire house. You will have the entire house and privacy during your stay.
interaction: I am always available to respond to any queries, and of course to greet you at your arrival.
house_rules: Please don´t smoke indoors; please use the balconies. Our community is very quiet, please respect our neighbor's. Please leave the house as you found it: take the waste out, turn all lights and heating off and close the windows. At your arrival I will require to see your passport, in order to complete the Portuguese Immigration and Borders Service (SEF) form. This is a legal requirement to those who provide the accommodation to guests, including nationals of other member states of the European Union. Please note that check in and check out times are flexible, please let me know in advance the estimate time of your arrival and departure.

host.host_about:
Hello, I am Ana, I enjoy travelling and meeting new people. 
I have a passion for old buildings, love to refurbish them and bring them back to peoples life. The house in Porto is located in the Old Town Centre and Porto is a fantastic city with plenty to do and see. 
The house in Figueira da Foz is also located in the Old Town Centre close to all amenities. Figueira is in the Centre of Portugal and offers sandy beaches, a Casino and events all year round!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Pasamos cuatro días estupendos en Oporto y ya con ganas de volver.
La casa está muy bien situada en la zona histórica de la ciudad y permite hacer las visitas a la mayoría de los sitios turísticos andando.
Es una casa muy bien rehabilitada en un edificio antiguo y tuvimos la suerte de ser los primeros en disfrutarla. 
La atención de Ana es excelente y la respuesta a las cuestiones previas que le planteamos antes del viaje fue muy rápida, casi inmediata, y con mucha información útil para la estancia.
No nos queda más que agradecer su hospitalidad y esperar que no esté alquilada para cuando nos decidamos a volver.

Ana was a wonderful and gracious host. She was always accessible, punctual and welcoming. The apartment was truly incredible and just as pictured in the Airbnb description with plenty of space for everyone. The apartment is in a fantastic location, right down the street from the Torre dos Clerigos which means that all of Porto's major sights are within walking distance. The only tricky part is finding parking near the house if you drove a car to Porto. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Porto.

Ana has been really helpful and welcoming. She even got us some special things as we were travelling with our 2 little girls.
She answered to our "request" immediately with extreme efficiency....like I rarely have seen before.
(For example, she changed the microwave in only a few hours after we mentioned her it was not working).
The apartment is in a perfect location, just a few step from one of the best view of Porto and Gaia. 
There was parking in the streets.
We had everything needed and expected.
Ana, thanks again for everything.
We l (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ed Porto and really annoyed our stay at your place!
Ana's house was vey nice. A lot of space, very well equiped, with modern furniture and really close to the center. I reccomend it !
A perfect place for our large group and a lovely view at your doorstep and from your balcony. Communication was easy and beyond accommodating. We had a lovely time.

Todo genial. Ana es super amable: nos facilitó información sobre Oporto, aparcamiento y demás antes de llegar; nos vino a buscar a una plaza cercana para conducirnos hasta la casa (el navegador del coche nos dio algún problemilla..); nos explicó todo sobre la casa y  nos dio información sobre restaurantes.
La casa está muy bien para 8 personas, toda reformada, muy cómoda y todo muy limpio. Los chicos disfrutaron mucho de la sala del sótano con los puffs dejándonos a los padres algo de tiempo de relax... La casa está muy bien ubicada, a 50 mts del Mirador Da Vitória (con unas vistas preciosas de la ciudad y del río) y  a menos de 5 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos donde hay autobuses urbanos y turísticos además de un pequeño centro comercial con algunos restaurantes y bares de copas.
En general es una casa perfecta que recomendamos a quien quiera disfrutar de Oporto estando en el centro de casi todo  ¡¡¡Muchísimas gracias por todo, Ana!!!  Si volvemos a Oporto, repetiremos en tu preciosa casa.  Un abrazo,

Ana e seu marido foram extremamente receptivos. Estavam na casa na hora que chegamos e nos receberam muito bem. Nos ajudaram a estacionar o carro, com as malas, nos falaram sobre o Porto e deram dicas sobre a região. 
A casa é uma delicia, super bem equipada, muito bem localizada e com quartos amplos e banheiros excelentes.

Even though we were a little late, Ana gave us a very warm welcome, made us feel at home right away and even helped us with parking our car. The house was clean, spacious, comfortable and had everything we required. The location was fantastic. Would definitely recommend. Thank you Ana! :)

Het huis was exact zoals beschreven; ruim, schoon en gezellig ingericht.
De ligging in het centrum is perfect. Echt een goede uitvalsbasis voor het bezoeken van de stad. een echt buiten terras is er niet maar door de ligging is er altijd een terras dicht in de buurt.
Kortom; een aanrader.

Ancienne maison typique, totalement rénovée et très bien située, à proximité à pied de tous les points importants à visiter dans le vieux Porto. Proche des transports publics. Quartier calme. Ana a été aux petits soins pour nous rendre le séjour agréable. La maison est équipée de tout ce qui est nécessaire. Excellente literie. A recommander sans aucune hésitation

la característica fundamental de este alojamiento es su situación. Por otro lado la dueña tiene buen gusto y está bien  amueblado y tiene unas camas estupendas. Únicamente decir que la gente se pone hablar en la calle delante del edificio y eso si hay un montón . L comunicación con la dueña es fácil y cómoda

Staying at Ana`s place was one of our best experiences. Starting with the excellent communication with Ana and her very beautiful apartment. Ana`s apt is exactly as in the photos, modern, clean, comfy and with all the necessary items for our stay. Everything was first class. Thank you for a fantastic weekend in Porto

The apartment is in a wonderful location within super easy walking distance of all of the wonderful treasures of Porto.  We easily walked to the Tower and all of the churches and walked along the river.  There are so many amazing, local restaurants right in the neighborhood, and the coffee shop that is only 50 feet from the apartment was amazing with incredibly friendly owners and great food and coffee.  The weather during our visit was unseasonably cold for Portugal, so the apartment was a bit chilly, but we can't wait to visit again when it is warmer.  The neighborhood is lively and you can hear the cars and people outside the apartment, but it was not a problem for us.  Our host was incredibly helpful!  She introduced us to the owners of the coffee shop and arranged for our very early cab back to the airport.  We loved Porto and would definitely use this apartment if we go back.
Everything perfect! Charming old house with 4 bedrooms and located very well!

Adoramos a estadia nessa casa bicentenária, mas que foi completamente renovada e modernizada. A Ana foi uma anfitriã fantástica nos deixando muito a vontade e com flexibilidade para nos atender  O local é excelente na região histórica e a poucos minutos da Ribeira e de todas as atrações. Recomendamos fortemente.

This house is perfectly located next to everything. It accommodated all of us perfectly. 
Ana introduced us to Fernando who owns the little shop on the next street and it was amazing. Fernando brought us breakfast every morning, he was so sweet. 
The only thing we did not like was the bathrooms. Wish they were a little cleaner.

maison très agréable dans un quartier bien situé par rapport aux points intéressants à voir à Porto.
Très belle vue de Porto depuis la terrasse publique à 20 m de la maison.
Ana nous a très bien accueilli et conseillé pour le séjour.
Nous conseillons cette maison pour les familles voulant profiter de Porto dans les meilleures conditions.

Adoramos a estadia na casa de Ana. Tudo é exatamente como nas fotos: bem equipado, limpo e organizado. Perfeito para grupos grandes. As histórias sobre a região onde a casa está são fantásticas. A localização é perfeita para se locomover pela cidade com facilidade. Muito comércio no entorno, mas bem tranquilo para dormir. A vista do miradouro na mesma rua é incrível. Ana é extremamente receptiva e sempre disposta a ajudar seus hóspedes, como muitos outros moradores de Porto. A cidade é encantadora e acolhedora. Foi uma agradável surpresa em nossa (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos! Um bônus: o café do Senhor Fernando, há alguns metros (que ficou nos esperando com as chaves, pois fizemos o check in bem tarde). Tudo muito gostoso feito por uma família simpática. Recomendamos fortemente a cidade e a casa de Ana!

Casa incrível situada no coração da cidade do Porto, muito bem localizada, limpa, acolhedora. A Ana foi sempre muito acessível e disponível para ajudar em qualquer uma das necessidades. Voltaremos com toda a certeza.

We had an excellent stay in Porto and Ana was the most gracious and helpful host. The townhouse was well-equipped and comfortable. The location was central to all of the sites in Porto, which was great. The townhouse is located at the top of the hill, so we also got a great workout. We were worried that the townhouse did not have air conditioning, but the stone walls kept the place at a comfortable temperature. This place is great for a group and I highly recommend it!

My family of 4 loved staying at Ana's apartment. It was clean, very comfortable, nicely decorated and in an excellent location, close to restaurants and tourist attractions. Ana was a fabulous and helpful host. Would highly recommend Ana's apartment.

The house is full of character, has lovely rooms with nice beds and pillows. It was very clean indeed. Location is very close to historical center, nightlife and restaurants. Round the corner there's is a small shop which Ana recommended in case you want breakfast or food brought in, Just go in and order with Fernando.
Ana has a great smile and she was a great host in all aspects from time of booking to our check out, and her friendliness made us feel very welcomed. 
Ana also helped us by allowing us a place to leave luggage until we were ready to go to airport, giving us the benefit of enjoying another lovely meal round porto center.
I highly recommend this place and Ana as a host. Hope we come back soon.
Thank you very much

Beautiful town house in an old neighbourhood of Porto, very close to the Torre dos Clérigos. The house was exactly as advertised, and fit us(two families of four each) very well. Ana welcomed us with some wine and beer in the fridge, which was very welcome on a  a warm day. She also introduced us to Fernando at the corner store, who brought us breakfast in the morning!  All in all  a very pleasant stay that I'd recommend to anyone.

Our family had such a wonderful stay at this apartment! In the old, historical neighborhood, everything was walking distance with excellent sites to visit, restos, cafes and shops. The apartment was very clean with more amenities than we expected, and the beds very comfortable. I will recommend this place to all my friends and we will definitely come back the next time we're in Porto!

El viaje ha sido fabuloso. La ubicación inmejorable, al igual que la casa.
La casa es exactamente igual que las fotos o incluso mejor. Y bueno, Ana un amor. Se puede contar con ella en todo momento y te da todas las facilidades que puede. 100% recomendable y muy agradecidos!

A truly exceptional home in a great location situated in the heart of the old town. Everything easily accessible on foot. Couldn't ask for better. Ana was a delightful host and even took the time to show my wife around the local restaurants and supermarket and introduce her. A very helpful and kind touch. 

The house is well laid out (3 floors), clean and contains everything you need. It was all just perfect, even down to the SuperBock beers she had ready chilled in the fridge. She obviously has a sixth sense !!

A very strong recommendation from all of my family for a successful stay in the beautiful city of Porto.

We really enjoyed our stay at Ana's rental is Porto. The property is located within the old part of the city and everything is within close walking distance. 

The rental has 3 good sized bedrooms and good living space. The space was more than enough for our teenage children and us. The kitchen is stocked with the basics needed for self catering.   

Ana was an excellent host and was really flexible with check in and check out as the next guests weren't arriving immediately. Ana made us feel very welcome, explained all of the essentials and gave us some local tips on places to eat. 

We would highly recommend this property for anyone wishing to explore Porto. It would suit families or friends alike.
Excelente moradia. Tudo limpo, em perfeito estado. Ideal para famílias.

Fantastic location, as good as it gets for Port.  lovely clean 3 bedroom with lots of space. washer/dryer came in handy as well.
Loved it!

This apartment was wonderful for our stay in Porto.  We were a family of five adults.  The bedrooms accommodated us well, and were comfortable.  We  enjoyed having a kitchen and living room in which to gather.  The apartment was stocked with all the basics you need, including a basic pantry for cooking, and coffee. The location was amazing.  Near the historical sites, convenient to Sao Bento train station, and just around the corner from an incredible view of Porto.  The walk to the Ribeira and Nova de Gaia was no problem for our family.  Ana was very accommodating with check-in and check-out, and arranged a taxi to the airport for our departure.  We definitely recommend this apartment for Porto!

Appartamento super confortevole, dotato di ogni cosa.Arredato con gusto e  con dei letti super. Dal balcone si gode una vista sul Douro e il ponte D Luis. Situato in una posizione strategica. In vicinanza anche un bar per fare una colazione tradizionale gestito e frequentato da persone gentilissime. 
Una bellissima esperienza in un luogo magnifico. Ringraziamo Ana per la sua simpatia e disponibilità nel farci un check in/out personalizzato.

Alojamiento con mucho encanto en una localización perfecta para descubrir y disfrutar la ciudad. Ana nos ayudó en todo y nos dio muy buenas indicaciones para hacer de nuestra estancia una gran experiencia. Para repetir.
Looking forward to our next stay :)

This place is spacious, centrally located, updated and well equipped.  Ana worked with us on our arrival time and was flexible when we arrived early. The location is fantastic and centrally located.  It's a short walk to many sites and only a few blocks from the hop on hop off bus.  Highly recommend!
La mejor ubicación de Oporto. Casa con mucho encanto. Volveremos.

Alojamiento ideal para familias o grupos de amigos. Situación inmejorable, en el centro del casco antiguo de Porto. La casa tiene todos los elementos necesarios para que la estancia sea muy agradable (Sería perfecta con un pequeño lavavajillas). Las camas son muy cómodas. La limpieza es buena y la calefacción eléctrica funciona muy bien. Ana nos dió algunas informaciones muy útiles sobre los servicios de la zona. Cuando volvamos a Porto no dudaremos en volver a "The yellow house". 
Muito obrigado. Saudações,
Marije y familia(incluído Zazpi)
Muy buena opción para alojarse en Oporto a menos de 5 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos, en pleno barrio judio. La casa tiene tres pisos con tres habitaciones dobles y dos baños.

L'appartement es très bien situé dans le centre historique, correspondant en tout point aux photos. Toute la literie est confortable et l'appartement était très propre. Ana est très accueillante et disponible, elle nous a aidé à trouver un restaurant à notre arrivée, faisant même la réservation pour nous. Nous le recommandons et y retournerons sans hésiter.
Fabulous location, authentic home in old town, with modern amenities and a friendly responsive host!  Would definitely stay here again.

Charming, well-equipped, very clean house on a lovely street in a great, central location.  Comfortable beds.  Three floors provide privacy and lots of space for families or groups of friends.  Host was responsive and kind.  Would absolutely stay here again!
A great place for few days in Porto

Perfect apartment for the 6 of us.  Very comfortable in a great location in Porto's historic Ribeira District.
Ana was very helpful.  We all very much enjoyed our stay in Porto.
Thank you!

At Ana's place, one can expect a kind and responsive host. Her apartment is clean, spacious and adorable. It is in a great location for touring Porto. We were traveling as 5 adults. We had plenty of space, the sights were in walking distance. We all loved the apartment.
Our stay here was lovely. The apartment was in a great location and our host was very accommodating.
Maison agréable et très bien située!

Amazing place and host! The apartment is stylishly decorated and super clean. It is in very convenient and picturesque location - we couldn't have found a better place for our group of 6 people. The beds were all very comfortable and the house is equipped with all the necessities you will need. Ana was quick to respond on (Hidden by Airbnb) and airbnb messaging, and was very accommodating and flexible.
Wonderful place to stay in Porto.  It was a perfect location and so stylish and comfortable.  Ana was there to great us.  Thank you!!!

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Zeit in Porto und in Ana's Haus. Das Haus ist tiptop sauber, sehr schön eingerichtet und mit mehr als nur dem Notwendigen ausgestattet (z.B. kleine Klimaanlagen in den Schlafzimmern, die wir aber gar nciht benötigt haben). Eine klare Empfehlung an alle, die mit einer Gruppe im Zentrum von Porto übernachten wollen.  Wir haben fast alle unsere Ziele zu Fuß erreicht, nur zum Strand haben wir den Bus genommen (ca. 15min Fahrt).  Unsere Gruppe hat sicher sehr wohl gefühlt und wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen. Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und auch bei Fragen während unseres Aufenthalts war unsere Ansprechpartnerin immer zur Stelle. Sie hat uns zum Beispiel auch die Taxis für den Flughafentransfer vor dem Rückflug organisiert. Mit einem Wort: Superhost!

Great apartment! Spacious (three bedrooms, living room, dining room, two baths), with comfortable beds, clean and well stocked. Amazing central location in a renovated historic building, yet quiet at night. Quite a gem. Highly recommend!

If you're lucky enough to stay here, check out the historical context of surrounding buildings; enjoy the night time view from the third floor balcony of the river and monastery lit up; the viewpoint of the entire city from the churchyard park next door; the nearby restaurants and monuments. The location is superb. And the house, though 100's of years old is updated and comfortable. Watch out for mosquitoes, since there are no screens on the windows and lovely French doors.
Great location, you can walk to nearly every part of the city. Very friendly welcome
A wonderfull house at a perfect location, just walk to the riverside. The house is very clean and was perfect for 6 adults.

Ana nous a permis d'arriver(beaucoup!) plus tôt dans la journée et de partir plus tard ce qui nous a fait gagner presque une journée suivant les horaires d'avion. De plus, elle s'est montrée réactive aux messages. La situation de la maison est idéale pour découvrir la ville (3' à pied de la Torre dos Clérigos). La literie est bonne et la rue est très calme la nuit (sauf les mouettes de grand matin mais cela fait partie du charme!). Des traces d'humidité sont visibles dans l'armoire de cuisine à droite de l'évier (rendant le grille-pain inutilisable) et la vaisselle méritait d'être relavée (locataires précédents?). Pour les amateurs de tapas, allez découvrir sur la place de la Torre dos Clérigos le BRICK CLERIGOS.
Las valoraciones de la casa de Ana son muy acertadas, hemos estado muy a gusto, la situación es magnífica y ella encantadora. Sin duda la recomendamos!!
Helpful host. Nice, clean appartment, ideal for a family. Good location in the middle of the old town of porto. Thanks!
Ana is an excellent host. Her apartment was sparkling clean, the bedding was very comfortable, and we didn't wish for anything more. We were 5 adults and would definitely recommend Ana's home.
Fantastic apartment in an excellent location. Across 3 floors, loads of space and within (sometimes hilly!) walking distance to everywhere you’ll want to visit in Porto. Would definitely stay again!
Great place, excellent location, helpful host.

If the named guest is under the age of 21, the resort will not allow you to check in, and you will not receive a refund! NO ONE has access to the Westin hotel water slide except Westin hotel guests ... just like no one except Westin timeshare guests may use the Wes
interaction: There are activities programs and concierge activities booking services at this resort.
house_rules: No smoking; No Pets; This property is located in the Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas, so their rules apply. Please call the resort directly to verify details.

host.host_about: Adventurous couple loves to travel :)

reviews.comments: Wonderful hotel in a great location. Very family friendly and responsive.  We have traveled much through our life and always enjoy a hotel room that feels more day-to-day livable and  offers more of a home away from home feeling.   If you're looking for more than just a hotel room this is a great choice.
The beach and snorkeling directly out from the resort are fabulous!  We saw more sea turtles in front of the resort than on snorkeling tours.
Great location, excellent property, fun vacation!
We were very happy with our stay.  The place is a great location on Maui with awesome snorkeling right out in front. We also enjoyed the pools and restaurants on the property.

Lovely space! Cozy, clean with everything you need to relax and settle in quick. Very safe for kids and great resources to explore the surrounding area. Walking distance to the lodge and shuttle which is great!

CHECK-IN - Once you’re in Honolulu, you will need to make a phone call to arrange a time for your personal check-in.  A cell phone is preferred in case the property manager needs to call you back.    EARLY CHECK-IN/LATE CHECK-OUT: Because a previous guest may check out of the condo at 11am the day of your arrival, the only way to guarantee an early check-in (8am or later) is to reserve the condo for an additional day.  Likewise, we will do our best to accommodate late check-out requests but as the next guest may check in at 3pm the day of your departure, we cannot guarantee a late check-out unless you reserve the condo for an additional day.

host.host_about:
ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

reviews.comments:
This was the perfect location! fantastic views of Waikiki Beach, easy access to everything.
Captain Cook Resorts were very welcoming and helpful, although we didn't actually need anything during our stay as it was seamless.
The photos were exactly what we got and communication prior to arrival was excellent.

Mahalo! we WILL be back.

Clean, easy, convenient location with fantastic views.  Comfortable condo with nice space to hang out and enjoy  family and friends. Pool and gym were also easy to access in the building. Waikiki is right across the street ready to walk, surf or lay in the sand. We love the entire island but staying in Waikiki is always a treat as we love to watch the kids surf while having lunch from the  lanai or at the famous restaurant, Dukes, across the street!
Great family vacation place; conveniently located right next to the beach and stores.
Great location, Property Manager (Byron) was very accommodating, would recommend and stay again

name: Calm room Barcelona
summary: Bonjour, nous louons une chambre contenant un lit une personne, plus un matelas pouvant être disposer sur le sol. L'appartement est lumineux et très bien entretenu. Vous y trouverez internet, balcon, cuisine équipée etc.. le tout à 2 min du métro.

予定の時間よりちょっと遅れたのですが､
上手に調整して対応していただけました｡
他の同居人の方々もとても親切でした｡
Kevinさんは同じ部屋には住んでいないので､
入居の時だけいらっしゃるけど､
同居人のRobertさんやAlexさんに聞けば何でも教えてくれました｡

街も治安がよく､駅も近いし､ｻｸﾞﾗﾀﾞ･ﾌｧﾐﾘｱまで3駅の立地なので､とても良かったです｡

name: Cozy Room w/ Office | The Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: The Plateau Mont-Royal: At once, Quiet, Cozy, and Lively.  - Beautiful Parcs. - Great Places to Eat & Drink. - In proximity to Downtown, the Mile-End, and the Old Port. See the 'Interactive Map' for nearby Eateries. Ask me directly for additional information!
space: Fully equipped Kitchen. (Incl/ Food Processor, Blender, Coffee Grinder, Stovetop Espresso, and a Toaster. Everything required to make and serve Sushi, as well as Baked Goods.) Play your Favorite Music. From 9am-11pm, feel free to enjoy your favorite tunes on our Household-Soundsystem. (Instructions included.) Want to relax with a new Read?  We've got books.  Forgot something? Extra bath towels, face cloths, shampoo, conditioner and soap are available. Hair Dryer, and Iron also included.  (Otherwise, there are two pharmacies close-by!) - Yes! neighborhood_overview: Close to the essentials, daylife, and nightlife of the Plateau Mont-Royal & the Mile End (Grocery Stores, Drugstores, Cafes, Bars, etc).  The building is located on a quiet street where many young families and students live.
notes: Neighbours are all very kind, but we kindly ask you to respect the 11pm limit on execissive / loud noise (including high-volume music) in order for us to keep on good terms.
transit: The #97 bus passes quite often on Mont-Royal Avenue and gets to the Mont-Royal Metro Station in 10-15 mins. Most locations take an additional 5-15 minutes to get to after that. The #27 bus is an alternative to the #97, and brings you to the Laurier Metro Station (One metro stop away from Mont-Royal). Otherwise, we recommend using (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps, or (URL HIDDEN) for your itineraries.
access: Kitchen, Living Room, Bathroom, Bedroom / Office.
interaction: I work a lot, but can help you navigate the city and suggest places to visit, eat, drink, and have fun. I'm generally around on the weekends, so we'll likely cross paths.
house_rules: *Smoking on balconies only. **Feel free to invite guests during your stay.  But be reasonably quiet after 11pm.

host.host_about:
Easy-going, average cook, and continuing education (Urban Planning).
Interests include: Cities, Landscapes, Gardening, Music, and other things.

Just looking to provide you with a cozy retreat.

reviews.comments: Shane welcomed us in with open arms, he was very friendly and helpful. Stayed up to chat with us, suggested some places for us, and worked very hard to be sure we were having a good stay. First thing he did when we walked in the door was offer us food. Cozy, affordable, and pretty close to a lot of cool stuff.

Le gars est brillant! Et l'appart tout autant;  on s'y sent, immmmédiatement comme chez soi. "Hautement recommandé", si on veut non seulement dormir quelque part, mais rencontrer quelqu'un.

The guy is brilliant, and the house too. Feel immediatly at home. Highly recommended. Opportunity to sleep somewhere and to meet a human being. Thank you Shane!

Shane was a GREAT host.  When my father and I arrived, there was a lack of bed space for the two of us and Shane voluntarily gave up his bed so that we could be comfortable.  He went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay.  I felt safe and secure and was able to live according to my odd schedule and hours without any problems !

Nice, Nice, Nice. European and artistic but well organized and covenient house. Perfect location. A block away from great street filled with international restraunts and grocery stores. While you arw enjoying the scene, you will get to the Metro or Bixie bikes. I did write this because of Shane. He is a kind and good guy. He will give you a full support while you are staying his place. So have a nice time!!

Shane was a a great host. He is very accommodating, communicative and fluent in both French and English. I never felt I was intruding in his space and I felt at ease sharing his kitchen and bathroom. His place is situated in a quiet neighborhood that is safe, charming and short commute to downtown. It is a short walk from his place to restaurants, bars and shopping (produce and clothing). I highly recommend this listing.
Shane was very helpful and amenable with check in time. The apartment is very clean, spacious and centrally located to food and drink. We loved our time in Montreal and Shane was very helpful!

Shane was an AWESOME host! I couldn't have asked for anything better; the place was cozy, close enough to everything I needed (I did have a Bixi membership for the month though which was also great), and I felt perfectly comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone :)
Un grand merci à Shane pour sa disponibilité et sa fiabilité ! Logement très bien situé et agréable.

name: Old Montreal.  ( Rent for at least 12 months)
summary: Great Apartment ideal for 1-2 guests, located in the heart of Old Montreal in the historic Basilica Notre-Dame area, surrounded by best restaurants, shops and major city attractions,two minutes walking to the Old Port. Very quiet building.  Condo rent  for at least 12 months, Contact me for detail
space: 1. Queen size bed  2. Full kitchen 3. Full bath 4. TV + Netflix
description: Great Apartment ideal for 1-2 guests, located in the heart of Old Montreal in the historic Basilica Notre-Dame area, surrounded by best restaurants, shops and major city attractions,two minutes walking to the Old Port. Very quiet building.  Condo rent  for at least 12 months, Contact me for detail 1. Queen size bed  2. Full kitchen 3. Full bath 4. TV + Netflix Guests have access to everything they need:  - High speed Internet/WI-FI - TV with Roku-3 including Netflix, YouTube channels - Dishwasher -Iron, ironing table - Coffee maker - Electrical kettle - Toaster - Coffee, tea - Glasses, plates, cookware and everything you need for staying. - Fresh towels, fresh sheets, bath essentials... All information about access will be send by e-mail. If you have some questions don't hesitate to call/text/e-mail me. (phone number hidden) Simple - 20 meters from Basilica of Notre-Dame,steps away from Place D'Armes,Old Port. Metro, bus, train,   Easy to get any of that transports
neighborhood_overview: Simple - 20 meters from Basilica of Notre-Dame,steps away from Place D'Armes,Old Port.
