interaction: All information about access will be send by e-mail. If you have some questions don't hesitate to call/text/e-mail me. (phone number hidden)
house_rules: • Check-in is after 4:00 PM • Check-out 12:00 PM - NO EVENTS or PARTIES are allowed, you can most definitely have a nice dinner party or a few drinks before the night gets started! Please respect our neighbors with regards to noise and loud music after 9 PM . - NO pets, NO smoking! - NO extra people stay over during the stay/night. - Please be respectful and courteous of the space as you will be treating it as your own. - At the time of check in, you will be provided with clean towels and linens.  - Do not leave dirty dishes and garbage in the unit  - The garbage chute is located right across the Appartment front door.Please dispose the garbage in the chute. -  Do not throw cigarette butts or anything off the balcony  - You are requested not to take your shoes in the appartment. This will ensure that the suite remains clean and our valued guests like you can enjoy a clean environment. - We cannot be responsible for lost or stolen items. Subletting the property is strictly prohibited. -

reviews.comments: Great location!  Unit was just as described.

The host was very responsive from checkin through to checkout. He waited for us to give us the keys and show us around though our train was two hours late. The place is as described new, modern, extremely clean. The building that the unit is small and quiet despite being extremely well situated. Would love to stay here again.

Andy was very accommodating . He took the time to walk us around the neighborhood and get us acclimated. The loft was perfect and the location was extremely convenient. Everything we needed and expected.
Wonderful, clean and modern apartment in a perfect location. Really appreciated the communication and flexibility with A when our plane was delayed and then rescheduled multiple times.

Vous pouvez y aller sans hésitation, c'est bien comme décrit dans la présentation et le quartier est idéal pour visiter Montréal.
Certes l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux, mais il est rare d'être en centre ville avec une vue imprenable sur la campagne! Et puis on n'y est surtout la nuit...

The loft was immaculate! The decor was lovely as well. It felt "good" - comfortable and safe the moment I walked in. I appreciated the security lock at the entrance to the building and the elevator. The location was awesome, just meters from the Basilica as promised. Also only a few short blocks to a metro stop to get to the 747 Bus to the airport.

I loved my stay in Montreal!! The air bnb was perfect for my short 3 night stay and I felt very comfortable there, it was definitely clean and tidy and had everything that I needed for my stay. I would most certainly use this air bnb again if I visited again. Many Thanks

Great place, great location, and Andrew was very helpful and easy to communicate with.  It's steps from Notre Dame cathedral, and was a convenient place to be: in Old Montreal/Ville-Marie, but also right by the Place d'Armes metro station, Chinatown, and the bus to Mile End/Quartier des Spectacles. We found it very peaceful and relaxing, and great for an afternoon nap after a long walk!

The apartment was clean, quiet, open, and airy, there was free wifi and Netflix, and basic kitchen amenities, including a coffee maker. We enjoyed getting some bread, fruit, and veggies from Marché Jean-Talon and having them for breakfast. 

I would gladly stay here again, so I guess that's the best recommendation!
The host was great.Friendly,easy to communicate with.  Great location
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I did not have firm arrival time and Andrew worked with me to make sure the key was exchanged without a problem. I wanted a downtown location and it was seconds away from the Basillica Notre Dame.  The loft was spacious, clean, modern, comfort  and attractive decor, with a well equipped kitchen, plenty of closet space and large bath area with shower/bath combined and a working air conditioner that I appreciated because there were some very warm days.   I did not meet Andrew  but all my questions were answered promptly.
The description was accurate and met our needs.

Great little studio in the heart of Old Town - super convenient and steps from the Notre-Dame Basilica. The apartment has everything you need and is impeccably clean. 

Only slight downside for us was the communication style - not quite as welcoming and flexible as we've become accustomed to with Air BnB hosts. More of a serviced apartment experience rather than a true Air BnB but comfortable and positive overall none the less. Thank you!
Great place in an excellent location. Highly recommended.
Great location in the heart of old Montreal.
The host canceled this reservation 112 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Andy’s space was located in the most amazing location in Montreal. Walking distance to anything and so many options for shopping, food, patios, etc. The space is so cute and trendy just as described. They offer so many amenities in the kitchenette and bathroom so you don’t have to run out for the little things you might need. Very quiet inside the space. Check in involved walking to a nearby location to get the key from a lockbox but was manageable. Thx again !

Nice apartment in a great location.  However, this apartment is in a building that does not allow short term rentals.  We were not told beforehand.  There is a warning on the front door that you do so at your own risk.  Also, the owners were not very responsive to our concerns regarding the smoke alarm beeping regularly while we were there (it was never fixed for the full week we were there), and that there were no pillowcases for the extra pillows.

Perfect location for St Catherine’s and the Plateau. The apartment was in a great location and felt very safe with security door to main entrance. My wife and I loved our stay. Would highly recommend this appartment.

Olga and Andrei's place was very stylish, in a great neighbourhood, and easily accessible.  Contrary to what people are saying about the key location, it was very easy to find and a 3 minute walk from the condo.
Cons: There is a sign on the front door prohibiting short term rentals (AirBnBs), the pillows were flat as a pancake (there were extras in the closet but no pillowcases to go with them), a dishcloth and/or a hand towel would have been appreciated. 
Pros: The place was super quiet, in a lovely area, the bed was comfy, and we very much enjoyed our stay.
The hosts are really kind and I had no complications. Also the appartment was clean and did not lack anything.

The location of this apartment was so perfect.  We loved being right in the heart of Old Montreal with easy access to so much.  The apartment itself was also just what we wanted and needed—clean, cozy, quiet, modern and with most everything we needed.  Keep in mind when booking that parking is not included and will run you about $20 a day.  Andy made self check-in very straight forward.  We gave it four instead of five stars because there were signs in the lobby saying that Airbnb was forbidden, and we worried about being kicked out.  We never had a problem though.  If they had been granted an exception, it would have been helpful to know that.

name: Private entire second floor
summary: Enjoy a spectacular sunset from your private screened in lanai at the end of your day in paradise and you may be treated to whale sightings. You have the entire 1st floor of  3 story home in beautiful Captain Cook. 45 min to Kona & 1 hr to volcano
description: Enjoy a spectacular sunset from your private screened in lanai at the end of your day in paradise and you may be treated to whale sightings. You have the entire 1st floor of  3 story home in beautiful Captain Cook. 45 min to Kona & 1 hr to volcano If checking in before 4:30pm please call for instructions; after 4:30pm, come on out. We are 20 minutes south of Captain Cook. If you do not eat in town, bring what you want to eat as there are no grocery stores or restaurants near us. We have a full-sized refrigerator, microwave and a hot plate. After you turn on Ili Ili, we are the first house on the left. Please park on the street by the wall in front of the house that is 3-stories.  Walk up the driveway to the door on the left. We have wifi.
interaction: If checking in before 4:30pm please call for instructions; after 4:30pm, come on out. We are 20 minutes south of Captain Cook. If you do not eat in town, bring what you want to eat as there are no grocery stores or restaurants near us. We have a full-sized refrigerator, microwave and a hot plate. After you turn on Ili Ili, we are the first house on the left. Please park on the street by the wall in front of the house that is 3-stories.  Walk up the driveway to the door on the left. We have wifi.

reviews.comments: Great place to wake up in, surrounded by views of ocean and cliffs. Room is connected to large porch with a net screen to avoid the bugs from getting in. Woke up to coffee and biscotti, would definitely go back.
Beautiful view of the ocean and wonderful open atmosphere!

We were pleasantly surprised by how big the place was and the incredible views of the ocean.  The place is a little remote but luckily Velma advised us to purchase some groceries before heading over to the place.

The place has an unobstructed view to the ocean, the neighborhood is very quiet and Velma+Gene are just steps away if you need something.

Velma was prompt to establish communication and was very accommodating with the requests that we had.

The location is fairly remote, so make sure that you stock up on food prior to coming.
I love it!!
Great place, beautiful and very quiet.
One of the highest value for money we have had so far with Airbnb. Kind hostes and a spacious room with all you could need!

Really enjoyed my short stay here. I loved the view and the place had everything needed to make yourself at home. It is a bit of a drive from everything but enjoyed the remote feeling and seeing a different side of the Big Island.
Was a lovely place to stay with an incredible view. Very remote location for away from all the noise of the city. Sweet couple who own the property.
Beautiful views, quiet neighborhood, big space and very comfortable. Great spot

It's quiet, except for the rumbles of the ocean, music to my ears. Close to old Hawaii style, I just loved the feel and beauty of the area. Just the right distance to Kona. Your right there in the 100%  Kona coffee belt. Visited 2 farms ,Old Hawaiian coffee, very old style to see. Then we also visited a larger one! Have fun we sure did!
Everything was very nice!
Good stay. We enjoyed a lot .

We would of preferred the room on the second floor which was shown in the listing. We felt uncomfortable in what appeared to be the private residence with all their personal stuff everywhere. The location and view were great. Very quiet.
Amazing! People are fantastic and a blessing they will bend over backwards to help and amazing ideas to make the most of the trip! The views are breathtaking just book it!
Awesome place with an amazing view.  Velma was a great host.
Velma was very kind and very informative.

Velma is a wonderful person, very caring and nice lady. This place of her is very beautiful, clean and very tastefully decorated with amazing views from huge glass windows on three sides. The unit is very private and separate from the other house. It also has the attached bathroom and the kitchen is also with this unit. I would definitely recommend this unit to others and if I will be back in the area, I will certainly request Velma to host us again. 
Hope to meet with you again Velma.

We live on the Hilo side of the island. When I got back to Hawaii after a 2 month stay , my husband welcomed me home with a 3 day stay on the Kona side of the island. Velma was very helpful and the place was awesome! Location location location! wow what a view. Sunsets! We will be back often. I am adding more pictures of this unique place.  This is real Hawaii, bring food with you it's a ways from a store.

Velma's accomodation is very spacious and has an amazing view on the hawaiian costline. We could even see whales from there. 
in the little kitchen on the balcony you'll find all you need and Velma even welcomed us with muffins and drinks in the fridge.

This place has everything you need and feels like an entire home, not part of another home. The kitchen is only slightly limited but a real foodie won't have a problem making any dish desired. The bed is comfortable, coffee in bed every morning a pleasure due to the spectacular views and sound of ocean waves. There are too many great things to say about this place. Just go see. Both of our hosts were exceptionally sweet, and always available. Suggestion: when Siri tells you to turn left onto ili ili road, go one more street.

We had a good time at Velma's place. The view is awesome, the bed was comfortable and it's really private and calm. The road to access Velma's house is very steep and can be a bit scary but that's ok.

The view at Velma's is panoramic - it is much better than can be represented by any photograph!  We loved hearing the waves crashing on the shore and the crickets at night. My husband loved cooking in the little outdoor kitchen and it is surrounded by screen so bugs won't bother you. Everything was very spacious. We didn't get to see much of Velma as we only stayed one night but she was very kind and welcoming.

We never met Velma but she was a great host! We were indecisive about our checkin times and she was very accommodating. She was quick to respond to any questions. The place had a beautiful ocean view and we enjoyed the screened in porch and kitchen area :) would stay here again

We arrived at 9:30 pm, after dark, but we were welcomed nicely.  
The room is spacious (even for 4 adults) and the views are spectacular.  There is a nice screened porch for dining that was a nice surprise, and Velma left delicious muffins and juice in the refrigerator for us for breakfast.  What a nice touch!
I'm not sure if laundry facilities would have been available, as we arrived so late.  The place was very clean, and Velma and her husband were very pleasant people!
I would definitely stay there again.

This place was great!  Clean, comfortable, private, and it has a great view.  The hill down to the house and back out of the neighborhood are steep so have a good car.  Otherwise this is a great choice!  Velma and Eugene was very welcoming, prompt to respond to messages, and have a beautiful home.
Velma and Eugene were amazing hosts!  Thank you for sharing your beautiful home with us!
This is such a cute unit with a great view and everything we needed right there. Walking distance to pebble beach and a spectacular view of the South Kona coast. Very much enjoyed our time here!
Velma and her husband are very sweet.  We enjoyed our stay. View is great

Superb accommodation , great ocean view, kitchen and wifi - even better than written on profile.  Easy communication with Velma and muffins for breakfast. Only issue are mosquitos, which you can easily handle. Overall best value for that money. Highly recommended !
Great place steep street and drive way. Beautiful location. Lots to do very near. Great hostess
Velma is a very friendly host. You will have an amazing ocean view from the room and its balcony. Unfortunately, I just stayed for one night but would definitely come back.

We enjoyed our stay at Velma's home, it had a beautiful view and a nice outdoor eating area. The kitchen was basic, but had all the essentials and there was a large fridge and sink. You are nestled in a very quiet neighborhood, with an impressive location above the ocean, everyone was very friendly.

This place was everything we hoped it would be and more.  The room is fantastic, views are to die for and the cool breeze off the ocean was lovely.  Beautiful walk to the ocean and along the cliffs, nice place to pic nic.  Velma was a warm and welcoming hostess, and made us feel right at home.  We would definitely come back!!
Great place with comfortable accommodations and spectacular view of the ocean
Amazing place amazing view !! If you like it calm and want to have breakfast with an awesome view on the ocean this is the place !

This place was amazing and a great value! Pebbles beach right down the road is pretty awesome. It is a little far from a market, so make sure to bring food. Velma was great and very responsive. They made sure we had everything that we needed and too care of us.
Lovely spot; would stay again.
Great stay, great hosts and incredible view.

Velma has a well equipped and spacious suite on a separate level to the rest of the house. Velma and her husband were very acomodating to our changes of plans and communicated well and in good time. While she was always contactable by text or by going upstairs the couple kept to themselves allowing us plenty of space to rest.

Velma and Eugene were the sweetest hosts. Velma informed us we needed to bring our own food before we came as there is no food or restaurants in the immediate area. We didn't realize there was no oven and bought frozen pizzas. When we arrived Velma and Eugene were gracious enough to cook our pizzas for us! Thank you, Velma!
The subdivision is steep which allows unobstructed views of the shore down below you. Very quiet neighborhood. Minimal light pollution. Spacious room.

Velma was absolutely wonderful! I was late checking in because I got lost and then there was an accident 10 miles  from her on the twisty and dark  one lane "highway" that required a pretty treacherous work-around which was even more steep, twisty, dark and rainy. The street they are on is also all those things, which is to say, arrive during the day if you possibly can! But Velma was very accommodating and communicative and welcoming once I finally arrived (and stayed such with any questions that came up while there, also.) It's remote, but once you see the view and have such a relaxing place to be it will be worth it. Spent most of the day recuperating there and it was very enjoyable. Coffee and muffins were great! Do bring food. Da poke shack isn't far and has great poke, keokis is also sweet, but hours vary, so make sure you have stuff to eat and the kitchen has everything you'll need (except an oven or range).  Wifi was only strong in a few places in the room, so don't expect to stream. I'd recommend this place as a checkpoint going the southern route from side to side, get there before dark and watch the amazing sunset.
Amazing views, very clean, and had everything we needed. No complaints whatsoever!
We had the happy time in Velma's house. They prepare everything for us, like the kettle, the microwave etc,which make us feel like in own home. And the view is really very nice.

Wow! What a gorgeous first night in Hawaii!! After a long travel time to get to Hawaii, it was an absolute dream to settle in to this little paradise and enjoy the views and get some rest. The screened in Wrap-around lenai makes it safe from the pesky mosquitos. We used it as a "half-way" point between Kona and Hilo, since we were going to spend the next couple nights there. It is secluded, so bring food!
Amazing view from the house, we enjoyed the sunset very much. Velma and her husband were very sweet and helpful.

Thanks Velma, we had a great night stay on our way around the island!

View: Very beautiful view from the whole place. 
Host: I only briefly got to meet Velma and Eugene but they seemed like kind hosts. 
Room: Lovely lanai to hang out in and chat.  
Internet: functional (Despite description) 
Sleep: good main bed. a bit soft second bed. lovely ceiling fan. lots of room for a crib
Clean: Yes
Quiet: Yes

Very friendly and helpful couple! In case of need they help you out with anything as they are just living above the apartment. 
The furniture is really tidy, clean and is looking beautiful. The apartment is really big! 
Best part is it is the view to the ocean! Wonderful like in dreams with a big balcony! 
I really recommend staying there as it is better than a hotel and a lot cheaper and more private. 
Mahalo Velma!

Lovely home with a great view of the ocean! Very clean with a kitchen, fridge, everything you need to feel comfortable.

Thanks for the homemade muffins, they were delicious!

Unfortunately we didn't meet Velma because we arrived very late in the evening and leaved while they were outside in the next morning.
Velmas place is awesome! The view and the room are incredible! We would highly recommend to spend a night (or longer) at Velmas place on Big Island. She is a great host!

Staying at Velma's is like a trip to grandma's. But instead of the the scary woods, there is an awesome ocean view! It's more than a private room. There's lots of space including a well equipped kitchenette on one of the lanais. The neighborhood is down a very steep hillside that meets the ocean. Velma and her husband are very nice and accommodating.
Peaceful and comfortable.

Really superb accommodation , great ocean view, kitchen and wifi .. Very nice communication with Velma and muffins for breakfast. No mosquitos because of nets. Overall best value for money. Highly recommended !

The fact that it is a bit further from Kona was a plus for us. Quiet and beautiful place. Velma was the most kind hostess from the first moment on, and helped us whenever we turned to her for help. The place was clean and tidy and very spacious. We got more than we needed and the view from the terrace was magnificent. Wonderful place to stay!
Lovely place and great view! Fantastic lanai.

What a great view the place has!
The host is very nice and the place is spacious. It has a different feeling from hotels and the breakfast with such a 270 degree open view from the room is just so beautiful. 
We had to arrive late and leave early in the morning but it's very enjoyable .
The view is amazing! The space is well equipped and clean. We stayed there one night upon arriving in Hawaii.
Great place to stay. Excellent sunset view from the room.
Scenic and (Website hidden by Airbnb) peaceful
Great place to stay with perfect views. Velma prepare foro us delicious muffins for breakfast!

Communication with Velma was great. My flight was delayed late into the night so she asked her husband to wait for me to check in. The entire 2nd floor was mine. I like that it is quiet and cool at night. The bathroom towels can be cleaner though: After I toweled myself dry, I found one piece of long white hair and another piece of long black hair on my arms. I have short hair so they can't be mine. Overall, if the towels can be cleaned more thoroughly, this place is a good place to stay in Kona.

Staying at this location is one of the greatest gifts you could give yourself.  This amazingly beautiful space with 180 degree ocean views, mild breezes and warm and friendly hosts made our visit to the island one we will always treasure.  I highly recommend this home and hope to return.  Peace and quiet and a place to relax.  Thanks Velma and Eugene for all your good care.
Velma's house is really beautiful, ocean view is wonderful, checkin is smooth.

The place is very spacious with an amazing view on the ocean.
Velma and Eugene are a lovely couple and great hosts.
Very practical arrangements for an easy and flexible check-in.
Loved the stay

This is my second booking at this location and I can't wait to come again.  I love the quiet area and no street lights at night, and amazing ocean views during the day.   Very comfortable space and unforgettable views of the coast line and ocean.  Wonderful hosts.

Velma's place was excellent. It has ocean view from the windows all around the room. Great sunset. You could hear ocean waves from the room coz it is close enough. The room is very spacious to accommodate a group of four. It is located 20 minutes away from Captain Cook which was convenient for us. Velma and her husband were very friendly and welcoming. Recommend for anyone.
Accommodating and beautiful space to stay and wonderfully welcoming hosts.
Outstanding 180 degree view of the water and the wrap around , screen enclosed deck was wonderful.  We were able to fall asleep to the sound of the waves and the birds.  I'm definitely coming back!

Velma's place had awesome view of the ocean! Loved the spacious room. The hosts were very nice, helping us check in though we arrived really late, confused and worried of the situation.

Very nice bed & prepared us muffins & drinks which was very sweet!!
Wonderful place, wonderful hosts. Can't beat it.
Beautiful view and just what we needed. Remote and quiet with helpful hosts

Fantastic stay and thoughtful hosts! And like everyone else said, the view is phenomenal with huge windows. Even though we didn't get to meet, Velma made sure we were taken care of! Highly recommended and it's super close to 2 Step snorkeling!
Another great visit (our second in a week circumnavigating the big island)
Very nice environment and a fabulous host, very good experience.

Velma's apartment is great. It has everything you need and you got a amazing view. Velma and her husband are really welcoming and helpful.
We also could see dolphins in the morning!
This place has a fantastic view of the ocean and the Kos from its high elevation. It was nice to have all our meal outside on the patio  that
This place was awesome! We would definitely stay at Velma's house again. Thanks for hosting us!!
Great place to stay with beautiful view. Lovely room with small kitchen and fast internet. Thank you for letting us stay at your place.
We had a great stay, the place is wonderful and Jeremy and Velma were very welcoming!

We loved the quiet neighborhood, the gorgeous views in the day and the night (moonbeams on the ocean!), the screened in porches, the location (loved swimming and snorkeling at Pebbles Beach), the comfortable beds and practical kitchen. Having the whole 2nd floor was nice and private, really a little apartment all to ourselves! Velma's son was very welcoming and hospitable. Offered to put our beach towels in the dryer and his kids delivered them all dry and folded up a bit later...such a treat!
性价比极好的一家民宿,宽敞舒适,推荐入住

We've only stayed one night. We've arrived when it was already dark and left early in the morning. However, we can say the welcome was great, room and beds were clean good and spacious with large terrace.
When we woke up, we were astonished by the view.
Some delays have to be expected by car to go to Captain Cook or Kona due to traffic we experienced  in the morning.

Enjoyed our stay!  The room is nice and large...the screened in patios are a nice addition.  Enjoyed having a kitchen area.  Woke to an amusing view in the morning. Be aware the road down to the house is pretty steep and bit narrow...especially in the dark.  We also saw lots of cute little green lizards early in the morning!!

It was a steep road going in but reallly peaceful country area. 
Private space was great
The accomodations were excellent; clean and comfortable.  Excellent ocean views and a short drive to Pebbles Beach.  Definately will be staying again.
Our stay was great! The view was very pretty. We would definitely stay again

Eine wunderschöne und ruhig gelegene Unterkunft mit atemberaubenden Blick zum Ozean. 
Würden wir jederzeit wieder buchen.
Die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich und total hilfsbereit.

Velma's home is a special place and the views are breathtaking!  The room is very large and clean,   The dining space on the Lanai is super comfortable and allows you to hear the nature sounds in the evening.  The geckos are fun to watch and keep the home pest free...they are your friends!  Lighting in the kitchen is minimal so cooking after dark is a challenge.  Although our stay was only for 1 night we were welcomed and treated as a guest.  Velma is kind woman who clearly cares for others.  Thank you

I wish I had spent the evening sunset at the place. Had a very great ocean view! Great place to stay. Thanks for the muffin.
I would recommend.

This place was true to the pictures. I would definitely recommend getting there before dark as the roads are really steep and windy but also because the sunset views are amazing here! Great communication and comfortable accommodations.
Cozy place. Great place to watch sunset.
Amazing sunset and sea views. Host was very hospitable and thoughtful in their welcome. Was like home away from home. Thank you for the wonderful memory of Big Island.
Great stay and experience!
Beautiful view!! Thank you
Velma's place was perfect for out 1 night stay. It was quite, large and had an unbelievable sunset view. Wish we were there longer.
The accommodation was clean and has an astonishing view with a balcony surrounding the apartment. There is enough space for 4 people to sleep in 3 divided beds. It was a great stay.

nice spot... plently of room... great view...
mahalo
Very nice place with a great view. The road to the apartment is quite steep, but it's worthy doing so.

Spacious room with super nice view with walkable distance to Peddle beach (almost like private beach). Very quiet neighborhood, I had such a good night sleep. 

The only complaint i have is not having the place cleaned on time. Luckily the beach was nearby so we stayed out for few hours and got back around 1700.

Place was a great quick one night stay if you are there on the way to the south side of the island from Kona. The outdoor kitchen area was great, the outside porch area was breathtaking. Space was large and loved the ability to allow a lot of airflow with the open doors/ windows.
If there could be improvements I would say the making the place more visible at night. It was extremely hard to find without any lights in the front or the house number illuminated.  Luckily the host Jeremy gave us his number and we were able to communicate with him on finding the place. It would have been nice beforehand  to find it though and also where to park.
If you not used to driving extremely steep and winding roads, I would advise. Although the drive was worth the view, it was also terrifying at night time. Even with experience driving in San Fran, Colorado, etc.
All in all a decent quick one night stay.

Terrasse mit toller Aussicht. Genug Platz für vier Personen. Die "Küche" besteht aus einem Spülbecken und einer Herdplatte. Kühlschrankkombi und Kaffeemaschine vorhanden, ansonsten eher sparsam ausgestattet. Das Haus steht an einem steilen Hang. Entsprechend ist die Anfahrt. Dafür eben der tolle Ausblick aufs Meer. Die große Terrasse ist mit unaufdringlichen Fliegengitter vor Insekten geschützt.
Wonderful view quite and relaxing !

It is a great ocean front room. The driving to the house might be a little difficult for new drivers, but it is worth it! Once you enter the room you will know why. Complete 180 degrees views of the ocean!

Velma's home is exactly as described... It's away from the town, off the main road, down a steep hill, and the views are incredible!! There is also a little beach at the bottom of the hill. One of our favorite touches was the screened in porch overlooking the ocean, absolutely perfect for enjoying morning coffee and avoiding the mosquitos (didn't get bit once!).
Great view!  Nice hiking trails near the ocean.  Far away from city life, though surrounded by a neighborhood community.
This is in a unique secluded location and is a unique tropical property. Loved the outside screened kitchen and patio. And the view is amazing.
This is an older home with a beautiful view of the ocean. Theres a mostly screened in wrap around deck, and you can hear the surf from the place. Nice for the price.

The views from this place are just gorgeous! It's a lovely gem of a place and arriving in the dark meant we had a lovely surprise in the morning.  Felt like home from home and communication with host was open and fine. A lovely place for a small family too. Highly recommend this place to others.

a big room with a magnificent ocean views. Good location, nice neighbourhood. Finding the place at dark with steep and winding road was bit of a challenge when our navigator didn't find the address but was definitely worth the effort!
Cute place. Great price. We enjoyed!

This place have best view possible to see the oven from the hillside. Velma is very responsive and accommodates our late check in. The place is clean and best is the king side bed for a good night sleep. Thanks Velma for hosting us!

Beautiful view from the room but the parking of our tiny rental sedan up the driveway was a challenge. The room was located in the second floor of the house and was very spacious. As we opened the door there were some sort of worms crawling near the door, that was a huge scare for me. However the bed area was clean, the bathroom is ok. I'd get this place only if I were to crash for a day or two but not for longer stays.
Stunning ocean view in a quiet neighborhood. The host is very responsive and accommodating. On top of that, the room was spacious and very comfortable. We had a great stay!

Clean, large, private, and with dynamite views as advertised.  Excellent access to the Captain Cook/south Kona area.  Velma and her on-premises son, Jeremy, were gracious and helpful.  The space could have been even better with a few basic amenities like TV (I know, who comes to Hawaii to watch TV?  Still, the listing should be accurate.), paper towels for the kitchen and soap, shampoo for the shower - especially since nearest shopping is 40 minutes away.  Nevertheless, good value for the $.  Overall, a pleasant stay.
This place is close to the sea, and have ocean view from the deck. The furnitures are a bit old though

This place has spectacular views and was a great value compared to other places around. There was a large ount of screened outdoor seating which was awesome. We enjoyed that the home was nestled down off the main road and away from Kona. The small outdoor kitchen was great and has what you need for small fpor preparation. The home is on rainwater catchment and energy efficient water heating so if you are looking for long showers this wouldn't be a first pick for you, for us it wasn't a big deal, we are all for energy conservation and we didn't come to the island to spend time in the shower anyway. :) They were able to accommodate us on late short notice and that was very very much appreciated. The pillows smelled kind of odd but probably due to the combo of humidity and heat they get here. Overall we very much enjoyed our stay here and would recommend and revisit. Thanks again.

Holy cow, this place was perfect for us!! My only regret is that we didn’t stay more nights.  If you are expecting a high-end, spotless hotel with matching towels, you might want to look elsewhere. However, if you are looking for a comfortable abode at a great price with a fantastic view and amazing hosts, look no further!

Previous reviews aren’t kidding about that view; it’s killer. And the best part is you get the panorama from the entire room - the windows are amazing. As we were checking in, I mentioned that I wished we had stopped and picked up a beer, to sit on the deck and enjoy the sunset with. Three minutes later our host came down with a 6-pack of IPA’s (my husband’s favorite), explaining that a local brewery had given them to him and he wasn’t keen on IPA’s. Ahhh, what a great way to unwind after 24 hours of travel. We then went to sleep with the doors wide open (to the screened-in porch), listening to the sound of the ocean.  

I WOULD recommend picking up some food and ground coffee before heading to Velma’s. While the location is central to the island, it is not close to groceries or other similar amenities. There is a coffee maker (yes!!) in the outdoor kitchen.

Mahalo, and Mele Kalikimaka!

We only stayed one day at Velma's place (wish it was longer!) but it was really nice, clean and very comfortable. The view was easily the best part of the place but everything else was just as amazing. We would stay here again for sure.

Beautiful house on the mountainside. It was a bit of a steep drive down to the house itself, but once there the view was worth it! The water system is rain catchment, so the water supply is limited. Wifi worked wonderfully. The coffee and tea were greatly appreciated. There is a fridge, hot water boiler, coffee maker, and sink available. Very friendly via email and phone!
Velma's place was great, amazing views, sounds of the ocean, lots of lounging options. We only had a short stay but it was a lovely, quiet place.
The view of the house is amazing! Having dinner on the balcony is definitely a wonderful experience!

We’ve had a pleasant stay at Velma’s place. Although she was away during Christmastide, she ensured that we reached safely and checked in smoothly. Her response was fast as well. We woke up to a magnificent sea view and dined at the balcony. Would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Kona!

This living space has a fantastic 180º view of the coast and is half a mile, uphill, of a quaint pebble beach.  You can see the stars at night.  This is much better than a hotel.  You can watch the Sun set over the horizon of the Pacific Ocean from the spacious, screened-in balcony. The kitchenette was well equipped.
Great view, quite neighborhood.

This place was a perfect spot for us to sleep after getting in to the Kona airport at 9pm. Wasn't hard to find and the slopes aren't thaaaat crazy. Didn't see sunrise but it would have been amazing. Watching the sky light up as the sun rose was amazing. 

The host was great and checking in with us to make sure we got in okay bc it was after when someone would be able to meet us. Great value!
Excellent home! Turned out way better than I thought.
Great place to stay, wonderful views and amenities!
Such a great place. The viene and the room are really awesome
Very nice place. Fantastic view. Near to beach. Friendly people. Huge space. Everything was fine. But you need a car. Next supermarket is more than 10 miles away. I can recommend it.
Excellent secluded spot with great ocean view!
Quiet! Private (yet if you need anything hosts are right there!) AMAZING VIEW! Wow!

The "entire second floor" is not an understatement. The room is quite big and comfortable. There are three big balconies and the view is wonderful. You can hear the waves while on bed, not too loud, but enough to be feeling the presence of the ocean. A great stay.
Fantastic with the ocean view!!!

Don't miss out on walking down the hill to visit the beach. The a short walk along its edge to the north brings you to a great snorkeling beach.... we feel lucky to have been able to stay in its neighborhood! Completely recommend!
The place was nice, beautiful view of the ocean.

Ce logement est d'une propreté impeccable et offre une vue magnifique. Le chemin pour se rendre est sinueux et dans une côte très escarpée (comme plusieurs chemins résidentiels sur Big Island), arrivez prêts à profiter de l'endroit sans avoir à ressortir pour une pinte de lait ;)

Beautiful view, as stated by everyone else. Driving through the steep neighborhood was no big deal at all, even at night. The bed and bathroom was fine, they do ask you to take your trash with you instead of leaving it, just an FYI. Ive never heard of that before. We got in late and left early and didn’t hear, see or speak to anyone else but that was fine. It was a good place to stay. I’d stay there again.

Loved Velma’s place. Jeremy organised everything upon our arrival. 
We loved the view. I’d really stay there again.
정말 멋진 주변 경관을 가진 숙소입니다. 꼭 한번 묵어야할 장소로 추천해요! 아쉽게도 고래는 못 봤습니다.
fantastic ocean view, room is large and have two big balconies. Very close to the volcano national park. Good place.
Une vue superbe et un accueil chaleureux. Merci ;-)
사진보다 훨씬 예쁜 집이에요. 멋진 테라스가 정말 마음에 들었던 곳입니다.

We enjoyed our stay and what a Wonderful view of the shoreline and ocean! The road is steep and winding going down to their house, so we were thankful to have driven it in daylight. There was adequate parking for 2 vehicles next to the retaining wall out front, leaving an 80 foot walk up the steep driveway. The two screened in porches on either side of the unit were nice to have if there are mosquitoes. There is no TV and the WIFI was weak and slow - a consideration if you’re staying a while. We didn’t plan to use the outdoor kitchen facilities, but the fridge and microwave were nice to have. Mahalo.
We loved waking up every morning out on the Lanai seeing the ocean and beautiful sunsets. A good value for the price.

We enjoyed Jeremy's friendly welcome and it was an unexpected surprise to have the refrigerator, toaster and hot plate to keep our food and cook a bit in the morning before we left.
It is spacious, with a nice dining place on one of the two screen in decks.
In the morning, there was a nice view out over the pebbled beach a few streets below that looked very swimmable when we were there.
If you are a cautious driver, do be aware that it is very steep driving up and down.

Beautiful apartment with amazing views on 3 sides! Screened in porch and kitchen, balcony, just wonderful. You can fall asleep to the sound of the ocean. About 25min away from any restaurants or grocery stores though, so make sure to pick stuff up when out during the day.

The view really is remarkable here! We loved our two nights and enjoyed the sunset and amazing lanai. Jeremy was a great host and we appreciated his friendliness and hospitality. The drive is steep, but very manageable even in a small rental car without 4-wheel drive. A great place to explore sights such as Two Step, and beaches nearby.

If you are looking for seclusion & peacefulness the sound of birds in the morning wonderful views great sunsets large Lanai’s to watch this from lovely ocean to swim in down front (No Life Guard) You need to check this place out .
Amazing morning and sunset views!
Great view
非常好的海景房｡very nive ocean view house, supply is perfect.
Velma’s place is a jewel and we feel blessed to stay. The ocean views and location are hard to beat. Cleanliness and hospitality A+. We would book again.
This place was very comfortable and had a great view of the ocean.
If you love going to sleep & waking up to the sound of the birds & ocean then this is is place!

This was such a peachy spot.  We wanted to.be away from everything and this suited us to a T.  The studiolike space was huge, bright (really really bright if you're the type who needs a mask, I'm not), well thought out and had sweet touches all over the place. 

 There were virtually zero mosquitoes, there were little green lizards all over the place.  They were friendly, harmless and stayed high on the walls or ceilings, nice little buddies to chat with.

Dragging your garbage out is a pain since the transfer stations seems like mystical oasis that's close when you do actually find it, but I get it.

When we finally crossed paths with Jeremy he was super friendly, gave us an extra fan and some muffins, thank you!

I'm struggling to come up with any real complaints, there was a wifi dead spot on our favourite lanai (awww) and the best wifi was in the bathroom.  There wasn't any real hot water but since we were hot anyway from adventures, the warmish water felt great...   I would stay here again, I'd like to just move in :)

Ps. The pictures dont do it justice, this is a GOOD place 

With love from Canada
We had a blast! Super comfy, great privacy, and the view was breathtaking.
Amazing views! Thank you Velma and Jeremy!

This was our second time staying here, and we had just as great of a time as the first! It is a super quiet, relaxing location. We loved that it is close to all of the best snorkeling spots on the island. The amenities are somewhat basic, but we had everything we needed. The apartment was very clean, and has amazing views. We will definitely be visiting again!

I only stayed one short night, but the stay was wonderful. The outdoor lanais, dining area, and outdoor kitchen overlooking the ocean led to a very peaceful atmosphere. The place was spacious, clean, light, and bright. The road down to the house was very steep, but worth the drive out of town. Definitely recommend this location.
great place

Awesome view of the ocean! There's an outside (but screened-in) kitchen area and refrigerator if you're looking at a longer stay. 
We slept 3 guys on the big bed and had enough room to be comfortable, and had our lady on the single bed. Be sure your best driver is behind the wheel on your way in, as the drive is unexpectedly adventurous and can be tough at night!
Great view and large, generous space.

Velma’s place was in an extremely quiet area and we got the entire second floor of the home.

It was a little “tired” and not sparkling clean, but good for the value. The view is beautiful.

It’s like a hidden gem place!
Definitely way better than pictures. This place makes you feel special by providing breathtaking view.
The room is larger than the pictures.
Mrs Velma was out of town when I arrived, but her son Jeremy was super helpful.
Overall very satisfied with the stay!
The place itself was comfortable with an amazing view. Definitely would stay again.
Nice second floor room with incredible views of the ocean. Friendly and welcoming host.
Excellent place to stay. The view is incredible.

전망이 너무 좋음. 돌고래를 볼 수 있다고 했는데 못 봄. 한적하고 새소리 나고 선선한 바람 불고 매우 좋으나, 에어콘이 없어서 눅눅함. 선풍기에 먼지가 가득 껴 있어서 보기가 않 좋았음. 밤에 도마뱀이 나와서 딸하고 와이프가 한바탕 난리났음. 이 가격에 가격대비 매우 훌륭한 것 같음. 좀 외진데 있어서 마트 가려면 차타고 30분정도 가야하고 코나로 가려면 50분정도 달린 것 같음

Very nice place to stay, the view is amazing. The road is steep indeed but not a problem. The room is big and bright, we liked the outside kitchen. Velma's son welcomed us really well and Velma was very accommodating. We totally recommand.
Great place off the beaten path. Nice beach not far from the house. Great view! Definitely worth the drive. Would absolutely stay again!
Serene surroundings ,beautiful view of ocean, had a very relaxing stay.
Very nice view on the sea. We really enjoyed our stay there. Its a little bit far from everything but just for the view it's a good compromise.

We last minute booked Velma's place after deciding to stay an extra night on the Kona side, and it was perfect for a one night stay.  It is a bit outside of Kona, but a beautiful drive and closer to Volcano NP and green sand beach/the southern point.  Velma was quick to respond.  Her son checked us in and was so friendly, he even brought us muffins and juice in the morning!  The views from the balcony are beautiful.  Would definitely stay again.
Tolle Aussicht, alles gut.
Strongly recommend to make sure that water supply is good enough for shower/loo before visiting. Other than that, the place is a good deal.
Velma's place is in a great location and is a good value for the price. Plan to bring your own coffee and all amenities, including coffee and any kitchen basics you require.

We had a great time and enjoyed the views, take advantage of the beach area at the bottom of the hill, a gorgeous black pebble beach with warm waters to enjoy. We booked at the last minute for our two night stay and the hospitality was awesome. I would recommend there place anytime. 

Mahalo and Aloha
Marques & Lisa

Nous n’avons pas vu l’hôte car nous sommes arrivé tard, mais la chambre était très agréable et très propre. L’espace cuisine a l’extérieur est un peu dégradé, mais cela reste correct. 
Très belle vue, je recommande ce logement,
What a cool place to stay. The view was hampered a bit by the volcanic haze, but having a private black pebble beach was great.
mahalo

This place is amazing. Don't let the creepy pictures detour you. Glass walls allow you to see the view of the ocean no matter where you are inside. Make sure you pack your eye masks or else you'll be up with the sun. Muffins and Cereal where a nice touch. There is wifi. I'd definitely stay here again.

Appartement d'un bon rapport qualité-prix dans un secetur très joli, bien pour aller à black et green sand beach par exemple :-)
La vue au réveil est très agréable !
Pas assez de fourchettes et un souci de dysfonctionnement du micro-ondes néanmoins mais une fois cela réparé, c'est un logement sympa.

Jérémy nous a accueillis et il a était vraiment très gentil et serviable. Merci !!
La chambre est vaste et a une vue incroyable sur la mer.  Le mobilier a par contre pas mal de vécu, mais tous les aménagements sont présents. Vu les prix d'hébergement sur l'île en général, cette chambre a un bon rapport qualité-prix.
Par contre, l'accès y est vraiment surprenant. La pente est tellement abrupte que mon conjoint a préféré laisser l'auto en haut de la côte le premier soir, par peur de ne pouvoir la remonter le lendemain, jour de notre départ. Nous avons donc descendu de nuit, à pied pendant 20 minutes la route à pic en compagnie de coquerelles et de mille pattes (qui sont habituelles sur l'île). Le lendemain, il nous a fallu remonter cette pente très (Website hidden by Airbnb) vous réveille !!!
Bref, heureusement que c'était pour une  seule nuit, et non pour une semaine complète...
Amazing views, large room and balconies, very comfortable bed.
Great view! Cosy room away from the hustle and bustle of Kona.
Great cliffside view- make sure your tires have good tread for the steep driveway and you bring a bag to pack out your own garbage.

Great place and the view is amazing. I would definitely come back again.
The only thing was that the microwave and the toaster didn’t work very well but we supposed it was a problem just of the power strip
Velma was super nice with us. She let  us check in late in the night and she also left some muffins for breakfast 
Thank you again for the hospitality
As expected! Can get warm, but view is great.
The location is good because it is pretty near all the water activities.
Very nice, big, clean, quiet accomodation with a great view!
Cozy house with great view. Thanks a lot :)

A spacious second floor/room to yourself and spectacular views! 
Went solo but it can sleep several people comfortably and at a reasonable price! Would stay again!

Large space, very comfortable bed, nice screened in porches to maximize the breeze, amazing views of ocean and while outside of the tsunami zone still very close to beach.  Excellent snorkeling beaches  nearby.   GPS took us right to the house.  The only down side is you need a rental car to get there as you are well south (30 to 45 minutes)  of Kona and its  airport.  Velma was away but her two sons were exceedingly helpful with advice about the area.  Ultimately the question I always ask myself about any airbnb is  would stay with a host again.  The answer here is of course.
Great place and  hospitality, it was just to hot and humid for me with no air

Velma's place is very comfortable and fitted our needs for the one night stay.  The view to the ocean is so beautiful and peaceful - best view I had during my stay in Hawaii.  The place is very clean, and we were greeted so nicely.  It was nice to be greeted by someone vs having a lock key (I love the personal touch).
The drive is steep.  Thank you for the morning muffins and drinks.  Great place, Great location (near Ali'i Rd, captain Cook and more).

Velma's place is the full second story of a residence in a quiet neighborhood near Captain Cook. It was the perfect retreat for my husband and me after a long day's travel, when we just wanted to chill, read, and watch an amazing sunset from the screened-in lanai (which is important in August to avoid the mosquitoes). There's also an unscreened lanai, which provided an unobstructed view of the ocean (except for a few power lines, although those were easy to ignore). We loved having both options.

Velma's son Don greeted us and showed us the ins and outs of the place, which includes an outdoor kitchen sufficient for some simple cooking, and complimentary muffins for each guest, bottled water, and freshly ground Kona coffee for the morning. We didn't end up using the kitchen, but we appreciated having the fridge to store beverages. There's also a bottled water dispenser in the main room to fill your own bottles, which was really nice late at night when I needed a quick drink.

The bathroom was well equipped with all the necessities, and the king-sized bed was divine! I slept so well the one night we spent at Velma's place because of the comfort, quiet, and lovely, relaxing atmosphere.

I can highly recommend Velma’s place. It was wonderful. We booked it really spontaneously and even Velma was in California, it was no problem to stay at her place. Her son took care of us. We had a wonderful time. We would book this place again.
Everything was great. View from room is amazing. You have there a big balcony with kitchen. I recommended this place. Thank you.
Was a great quiet place to stay with an amazing view. Has everything you need and some extra touches that were really appreciated. Friendly and easy to communicate, would definitely recommend.

The view is beautiful and it was easy to find. The road can get a little steep in some areas but it was absolutely beautiful and worth it. I will definitely be rebooking this place before I leave the island.
Richtig nette Leute - sehr coole Unterkunft mit einer sagenhaften Aussicht - sehr sauber... zum wohlfühlen. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen! :)
All around a wonderful place to stay! Awesome view, spacious, comfy, all the necessary amenities. Donnie & Velma were very nice & welcoming. Would definitely stay again!
Good views, great for basic hub
Cuando ví el alojamiento en la aplicación la estancia la puse en mi última opción, y fue la que elegí, al final fue más de lo que esperaba, muy agusto y una vista Genial.

Really fantastic views from the entire unit. Lots of outdoor space to enjoy the ocean view. Screened in outdoor kitchen with Great amenities. Screened in large outdoor porch  on the other side of the very large space. This screened in outdoor porch has a table and 4 chairs. A rocking chair with cushion, a bamboo cushion chair w/ottoman were super comfortable and extra nice to have to enjoy. There is even a desk w/chair as well and a nice outdoor rug on the tile. 

There is a ceiling fan in the bedroom. This bedroom is very large with wooden floors and large closet with mirrors. The bed is a California King Bed! There’s even a dresser, side tables, and a nice comfy chair. There’s a Day bed, and a mattress/cushion for additional sleep space if needed. The bathroom is a full bathroom with nice body bathing products. The front balcony/lani is as wide as the whole 2nd floor you get to stay in. It’s a beautiful view. There are very large windows all around which give you a view no matter where you’re at in the unit. I will be back! 

Be aware that the drive is steep due to going down mountain toward the ocean. Steep. Really great views all around the homes there. Truly great location. Very friendly host.
nice place with awsome view
This was my second time staying here. It is a great place and the host is very friendly. He went out of his way to gather some fruit for us and is always very welcoming.

More luxory then I expected,  
AC was not necessary.
Strange problem with WIFI, but Internet works well through cellphone network.

코나에서 1뱍만 모뮤를 예쫑이라소 가굑이 싼 뱡으러 골럈더여. 샤진이 녀모 이샹해쎠 기대뎌 안했는데 뱡은 섕갹보댜 훠얼씬 괜찮았어여.^^ 샤딘보고 겁먹디마세혐
뱡에서 보히는 바댜 젼망이 끝내줘여^^
안죻은 점은 슉셔 위치가 너뮤 시내랑 둉뗠어뎌있서쇼 시내꺄디 가료면 30분 이샹흔 카야하교여.. 저희가 밤에 첵흐인을 했뉸댬 슉셔 찾기가 녀무녀무녀무녀무 힘뎔엇쎠어.. 주변에 불삧치 햐냐더 없써셔 열먀나 당황했뉸디멀라혀
첵흐힌은 무져견 날 밝을때 하세염 그리거 메인도로에서 슉쇼료 내려가는 길이 너며 가팔라서 운뎐에 자신없는뷴들은 조심하세혀

Velma’s place is great. We had Velma make up the trundle since there were 3 adults and a 15yr old and it was done. All of the beds were comfortable and there were enough pillows and blankets (not that we needed s blanket). The screened lanai’s are excellent and we had no mosquitos. There are blinds in every window that needs privacy but the big picture window didn’t have a blind so you’ll wake up with the morning light to incredible unobstructed views.  The cooking facilities were basic but we had everything that we needed and Velma’s son Donnie had set us up with a muffin, juice and water each which was so thoughtful. He also had lots of helpful hints. The pebble beach at the bottom of the street was fabulous and very handy. I wish we had more time to enjoy the coast but we’ll just have to come back again.
Cosy condo with everything we need as a family of 4. Awsome view of the ocean from the screend patio.
This place is my favorite of all four places we stayed at while on the Big Island.

We loved staying at Velma’s place. Her son, Donnie was there. He was so kind and helpful with the check in process, talked story a bit and then gave us privacy. It was a perfect stay! The view is incredible, we love the are, and there’s are two screened in Lanai’s to enjoy the outdoor space without and bugs! He also provided some snacks and awesome Kona coffee For the morning. It was perfect for us! We liked it so much that we came back for a second night later in our trip. Highly recommended!
This was our second time coming back to Velma’s place, it was just as good as the first!

The room is nice , clean and big enough for the 3 of us. 
Velma’s son was very welcoming and nice !!
Good place to stay

We had a nice stay for a night!
A lovely place with an awesome view!!!
Amazing location. we will never forget the view over the ocean. a little   bit far away from kona. drive down very steep.
One of our best AirBnBs so far. The ocean views were great. Especially the sunset.  Way better than what we expected!
The host is friendly and helpful, he gave us lots of useful tips. the place is quite and clean.

Amazing location and hospitality. Don was there to greet us and show the rental. The house was clean and the views were some of the best ones we saw while in Big Island. Don was thoughtful to provide us local tips. We had a great time.

Velma’s son, Donnie, was awesome! Such a huge help, a good tip giver, and very welcoming. We enjoyed our time and the view! The hill coming down was a bit scary in the rain, but overall what a fantastic location! The sunset is the best part  Mahalo, Velma and Donnie!

This place was absolutely beautiful. Growing up in the city, it’s not every day that I get to wake up to such an amazing ocean view. The hosts were wonderful and very sweet! They gave us small snacks and made sure we were comfortable. I would definitely come back again to stay here if I come back to Hawaii on a short trip.
GO HERE IT'S PRETTY DAMN GOOD. AND ALSO-- Pebble Beach was tight it's only down the hill

This place is amazing. Velma's home offers wonderful view over the ocean, is convenient located, sparkling clean with comfortable beds and fully equipped kitchen. Velma and her son, are great hosts. They greeted us with delicious muffins and refreshments. Hope to be back soon. Highly recommended.
A very cute place to stay with a spectacular view! Perfect for couples or small families! Would definitely go back if in the area. (Note there is a very steep drive down and lots of stairs)

Velma’s place has an amazing view of the ocean, and watching the sunset while sitting in the nicely screened patio is an unforgettable experience. The beds are very comfortable, and the spacious room, large windows, plus the additional patio spaces made the entire atmosphere nice and breezy. It was very thoughtful of the host to also provide us with some bottled water, juice, and muffins in the refrigerator. The kitchen and bathroom were well suited to our needs. Donnie greeted us and was very hospitable, chatting with us and letting our kids meet his friendly dog! Would stay again!
We enjoyed our short stay at Velma's place. Her son Donnie gave us lots of helpful tips.  Wish we could stay longer!
Terrific visit. Great location and wonderful hosts. Thank you Donnie and Velma

Don was very nice person 
he was take care about us very nice 
Room was sparkling clean 
All towels was super clean 

Location was ok 
30min from central kona 
I really recommend to visit Velma’s place !

The beauty of this place is the peaceful neighborhood and screened in porch to enjoy the amazing view. With two kids this easily accommodated all of us. Fresh water, coffee and muffins are provided. The fans were sufficient to keep us cool through the night and we could enjoy and appreciate the weather sleeping with the windows and sliders open. Comfortable and cozy space with an amazing view. We only stayed one night but would have gladly stayed more.  If you seek peace and quiet, this is the place!

Nothing like waking up to a view of the Pacific! My family and I had the entire second floor to ourselves -- lots of space, comfy beds, and fully equipped bathroom, kitchen, and veranda. Velma's son Lonnie was super friendly, and gave us great tips on snorkeling spots right near the house. Definitely the best accommodation of our trip to Hawaii.
Super host, amazing views, comfortable stay, awesome value, great experience!
Great views, comfy bed, clean bathroom, kitchen needs improvement.  Velma's son very welcoming and accommodating.
Unglaublicher Rundumblick aus dem Zimmer.

The view every morning and every night was incrdiable! 
The screened in pitches made the house so spacious and to be able to have the air flow all night was more than we could have asked for. 
We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Amazing place the view is gorgeous.
Velma was very helpful we had little bit of a hard time find the location but she stayed on the phone with me until we found the house. Donnie was so helpful and welcoming he gave us a few locations to check out. We would definitely stay here again.

The accomodation was an amazing, perfect apartment with a beautiful view to the ocean. Velma and her son are nice people. He was very helpful and knowladge about Island. Just perfect  thanks for staying with you. Take care. Aloha

When I put Kona in the search engine, I didn’t expect to get a place an hour away in Captain Cook.  Picked it for the value because we just needed a place to shower and take a nap before going to airport in the evening.  It was an added bonus to drive there and see the beauty of that area...just cut our time shorter because we had to drive an hour to get to the airport.
Very nice place with great view and aloha!

Has everything you need to function for a long or short stay. The view from the wraparound lanai is fantastic. Place is a little far from any kind of amenities and would be impossible without a car. Grade is very steep getting down to the house.
A lovely place, thoughtful host, peaceful location.
Great place. Great host. Sweet views.

The view from the room is amazing! Er got to see whales and dolphins from the room! We couldn't catch the sunset but the unobstructed view should result in some spectacular sights. The room is really big, completely private with a very comfortable bed and great hosts!

Velma’s place is in an amazing location. The view towards the ocean is amazing, specially for the sunset and its mosquito proof (it has a net all around). The apartment has a fridge, cooking area, and even drinkable water! 
We didn’t meet Velma but her son Don gave us a warm welcome and some inside tips of the island. He even lend us some snorkel gear to complement ours. The drive is a bit steep but we managed even with a small car. Amazing place!
Amazing space! Unbeatable view! We watched whales off the balcony and loved the open air feel to the space. If back in the Captain Cook area would definitely stay again for longer!

The room is huge with your own private bath and a kitchenette on the Lanai. Waking up to that view of the Ocean is priceless.
Also great Central location in Captain Cook, with easy access to Volcano & Hilo. 45mins from Kona, 1hr from Kona Airport.
Don was really helpful and even gave me some natural meds for my sinus/allergies that really helped me. (I should’ve gotten the name) Thank you for a great stay Don & Velma

The view is beyond gorgeous.  It's a private room,  but definitely attached to the main house.  you use the same front door as other guests/ owners.  Balcony and outdoor kitchen is all for your personal use,  which I didn't know before booking.  We couldn't find coffee filters,  but there are many things useful in the kitchen. All screened in,  but still got mosquito bites and had a HUGE spider in the bathroom! Still the view was beautiful.
You will have a spacious room with magnificent oceaan view in a very quiet environment.
Velma's place was an excellent stop over on our trip.  It was very affordable and comfortable. The hosts were very friendly and welcoming. The view of the ocean is very nice.
Clean place to stay with amazing views.

We stayed at Velma’s for one night and it was ok. Don welcomed us and gave us many recommendations, which was nice. The view of the place overlooking the ocean is just great. Kitchen is very basic and outside, everything a bit sticky. Ok for 1-2 nights.
Very beautiful location.   Loved the view of the ocean.

The view is beautiful and we did hear and see whales several times from the veranda.  
We loved the outdoor kitchen.  One thing to note for other travelers if you are cooking is there are few supplies so bring what you need.  
The drive up and down is steep but you certainly get used to it.  
We had a great time and the location works well for all activities.
Beautiful view and friendly host.
Don (the son) welcomed us and was very nice and told us a little about the island and gave us some tips. We had a lovely night at the place and of course the view is great to wake up too :)

name: B4.Walk to MTR 1 min/Economy room/Twin single bed
summary: Our room is conveniently located in Hong Kong’s renowned commercial and entertainment district at Jordan.Located on Nathan’s Road,near Tsim Sha Tsui. 1-5 minute walk to the MTR,Airport Bus Stop,Yue Hwa Chinese Products,Prudential Center,Park Lane Shopper’s Boulevard,SASA,Bonjour,Mannings,Watsons,Temple Street Night Market,Australia Dairy Company,Tsui Wah Restaurant,Hui Lau Shan,7-ELEVEN. Whether you’re in town for business or pleasure,we will be your best choice.
space: Important information!!! We are hostel inn, if you are looking for a clean､safe and comfortable stay you can consider us. But if you are looking for a local accommodation, such as a log house, a rooftop room, I don't think we fit. Just 1 minute walk to MTR jordan Station Exit B1 or Citybus Airport Express Station. Whether you're in town for business or pleasure, we will be your best choice.  ★We are provide accommodation in accordance with the requirements of the Hotel and Guesthouse Accommodation Ordinance of the Hong Kong Government and have obtained a valid license issued by the Hong Kong Government. house_rules: Not to make much noise, does not affect the other residents,it is so! Not too many restrictions on it!

host.host_location: Flat Rm A9/F, National Court, 242 Nathan Road, Jordan, Hong Kong/九龙佐敦弥敦道240-252号立信大厦9字楼A室
host.host_about:
Welcome To Hong Kong
欢迎来到香港

reviews.comments:
还是不错的｡
照骗照骗,肯定没有照片看起来那么金碧辉煌｡会比你想象的更小,更简陋｡但是这个价格,作为洗澡休息的地方,也是符合要求了｡
另外客房工作人员态度很好,不认识路她还拿出地图给我们指路｡
房型和图片上没有差,离澳洲牛奶公司不远,离车站也蛮近的｡点赞
有待改进
Very good location and easy to go everywhere
地理位置很好 性价比很高 虽然很小 但是简洁 设施齐全
房间足够大,大概有8-10平米左右,2个人1晚的价格不到500,算很亲民了｡有提供免费的WIFI,矿泉水(冷､热),房间也有空调,温度虽然不能调节,但温度设置比较低,适合香港这样比较热的地方,晚上睡觉很舒服,也不吵｡
I’m sorry but this room looks prettier in the photo but not in person. They should improve the cleanliness of the place itself. We stayed here for 1 hour and left right away.
住宿的地方非常方便,走走就能到尖沙咀的崇光百货,离地铁站非常近,很方便｡房间除了小点没毛病｡
与描述一致,房间干净无异味,位置比较好找｡
过来住2次了 感觉性价比很高  很满意 m明天还是打算去这里

초행길에 주소만을 찾아갔는데 근처에서 조금 헤매긴했어요. 그러나 잘 알고 간다면 아주 찾기쉬운 위치에 있습니다. 
지하철 출구 잘 알고 가세요. 
와이파이가 잘 안터져서 조금 답답할수도 있어요.
숙소는 조용하고 가격대비 나쁘지 않았으나 큰공간 럭셔리함을 생각한다면 고급호텔로 가시는게 나을 거 같아요.
这个价格能住到有窗的房间,性价比很高,房东也很热情,去哪里都会很详细的告知,很棒的体验
交通是真的便利,而且房东很友善hen tie x很贴心啊~
Great location
还是不错的,在闹市区,周围吃东西或者坐地铁都很方便,但是晚上并不吵,我已经满足了,只是找个地落脚睡觉没什么太大要求,交通还是很方便的,治安也可以了｡
老板人很好,香港的正常房子,独立卫浴比较干净
总体很棒,这个价位的房子已经算是非常不错的了,但其实是酒店不算是民宿,地理位置非常好,在香港中心,去哪里都近,而且楼下就是地铁口,房间打扫的也很干净,每天会有人收拾垃圾,个人认为唯一不好的地方是隔音还可以提高,因为在市中心时时刻刻下面都是车来车往的,另外空调很差,效果暂且不提,空调噪音巨大,有待改进,谢谢~
性价比不错 位置不错 房间没有脏乱差  值得这个价格
在香港算得上是性价比很高的住宿地方啦,房间比想象中得大,设施齐全
很好,交通很方便

host.host_location: Flat Rm A9/F, National Court, 242 Nathan Road, Jordan, Hong Kong/九龙佐敦弥敦道240-252号立信大厦9字楼A室
host.host_about:
Welcome To Hong Kong
欢迎来到香港

reviews.comments: Location very good, in the shopping center, and many fast food place,  traffic is very convenien !
交通确实很方便,香港住的地方都不大,好在即便如此设施也都有｡性价比高
总体来说算是便宜的,性价比还是蛮高的,地理位置也挺方便的

Well recommended place. Very close to Mtr Jordan station and many shops nearby. Place is just like how it is in the photo. Good for solo travellers. At first i got lost finding the place but on the next days i feel like i am a local in hongkong. Thankyou until next time!
很好的一次体验,香港寸土寸金这个价位住到这样的房间很不错了,地理位置也很好非常方便,离地铁站很近,周围也有巴士站,大厦楼下有保安首先安全很到位,其次能分到有窗户的房间也很好空气流通好,就是香港的汽车喜欢改装排气管,一踩油门轰轰的很吵,不过还好,其实香港给我的感觉非常好很安静很安心,除了消费高点没什么不好的,总体来说这次体验还不错,下次再去还会住这里,也会推荐给朋友

- 非常靠近佐敦地鐵站,交通十分方便
- 附近有不少美食,也開到很晚
非常便利的地段
真是太太太好了,下次还来耶,我爱｡

The pictures are quite deceiving I would say. The room we stayed in was quite dirty and there was a roach crawling about the place. Linens were riddle with stains and towels as well. The bathroom had a peculiar odour. The size was just as expected and not a problem.  The location is great. I would recommend spending the few extra dollars and getting a place much cleaner.
觉得整体性价比还不错~就是早上起来感觉身上痒痒的,发现床上有小虫子~
大体上还是可以的,但是太过于狭小拥挤,给人感觉有一丝简陋吧｡卫生间的马桶盖一直无法完全开启
地点超级方便哟,附近也好多好吃的,好玩的｡比想象中干净｡

The address in Airbnb app was just to show where the reception counter is. I’m glad I’m staying in another building. The room was refurbished although the exterior of the building was old. Saw tiny cockroaches but I was not surprised as the building was old. Space was good for me as Asian. We could hear noises from the street and other room but we are okay as we are not light sleepers. We need to share hair dryer with other guests. Thanks to the staff who helped to empty trash bin daily and I liked the firm bed very much as I could rest really well after walking all day long.

name: Private room (Kurtuluş/İstanbul)
summary: Hi!  I'm 30 years old working as a kindergarden teacher in a public shool. I live with my girlfriend. We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house.  Let's be friends! :)
space: Hi! I am 30 years old working as a kindergarden teacher in a public shool at Beyoğlu. I live with my girlfriend. Her name is Fatima and she is studying in the same department at Boğaziçi University. Our 3-room apartment is in the third floor in the building located at Kurtuluş/Şişli, 15 minutes walking distance from Taksim Square. We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house. Let's be friends :)
description: Hi!  I'm 30 years old working as a kindergarden teacher in a public shool. I live with my girlfriend. We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house.  Let's be friends! :) Hi! I am 30 years old working as a kindergarden teacher in a public shool at Beyoğlu. I live with my girlfriend. Her name is Fatima and she is studying in the same department at Boğaziçi University. Our 3-room apartment is in the third floor in the building located at Kurtuluş/Şişli, 15 minutes walking distance from Taksim Square. We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house. Let's be friends :) Our guests can use bathroom, kitchen, living room with a small balcony. - 24 hours wi-fi - 24 hours hot water - Hair dryer, Iron, laundry hanger, washing machine, - Fridge, Gas cooker, oven, kettle. - In your room, there are a double bed, wardrobe, mirror, nightstand, floor-lamp. I am working and my girlfriend is going to schoo
neighborhood_overview: Kurtuluş, (formerly known as Tatavla meaning "horse stable" in Greek) is a cosmopolitan safe neighborhood of Şişli whose population consists of Turks, Greeks, Armenians, Kurds, and Jews. Our apartment is very near to a big main street named Kurtuluş Caddesi, where you can find a lot of markets, pharmacies, shopping malls, cafes, cake shops, banks, hospitals, groseries, exchange offices.
transit: You can reach to bus station (named Kurtuluş Son Durak) in 3 minutes. There is a direct bus every 10 minutes to Taksim (the heart of the European Side of Istanbul) and Eminönü (the historical center). Also, there is subway station (named Osmanbey metro durağı), so you can reach anywhere you want. However, we suggest you to walk to Taksim, Mecidiyeköy, Nişantaşı. So you can enjoy the city on the way!
access: Our guests can use bathroom, kitchen, living room with a small balcony. - 24 hours wi-fi - 24 hours hot water - Hair dryer, Iron, laundry hanger, washing machine, - Fridge, Gas cooker, oven, kettle. - In your room, there are a double bed, wardrobe, mirror, nightstand, floor-lamp.
interaction: I am working and my girlfriend is going to school in the daytime. When we are free, we like to chat, hang out, cook together etc. Also, if you need any help during your trip, we are ready here.
house_rules: We dont have strict rules as long as we show mutual respect.

name: Paradise Mopeds and beds 2 (Shared)
summary: This is a shared living space, "Hostel". shared living, single bed's are $35.00 per bed a night and a one time cleaning fee of $5.00 Parking available next door, parking fee $20 24hrs.
description: This is a shared living space, "Hostel". shared living, single bed's are $35.00 per bed a night and a one time cleaning fee of $5.00 Parking available next door, parking fee $20 24hrs.

reviews.comments: Steve was extremely accommodating and friendly. Location, location, location. If you are looking for a simple place to put your bags down and sleep and be in the middle of it all, this is it. Beach, marina, restaurants, Waikiki, Ala Moana, so many things to do and a great price to be in the middle of it all.
It was amazing stay! Nice house, perfect location and Steve with his housemate were really friendly. We enjoyed our stay! Thank you

I stayed with Steve and the boys for 3 days and they're so helpful and welcoming. 
The room/house had what I needed to have a comfortable stay. This is one of the few places where I've stayed where I had a door into my room I could lock.
The place was clean and the kitchen had what I needed.
It was in walking distance to the beach, buses, loads of shops and restaurants.

Steve was fantastic. My friend & I were unable to get to Steve's place until approximately 6pm. Therefore, Steve liaised with us via cell phone so he could meet us when we arrived & welcome us. He was open & friendly toward us and basically left us to do our own thing after giving us the run down of his place. However, he did tell us if we needed anything else, just to ask him for his assistance & he will more than happy to help.
價格非常划算,位置到各大景點都非常近｡房主人也非常友善,也很有愛心,在門外養很多貓,但貓都很乖｡
Steve and his friends were nice with us. The room was as described and the location amazing!
Steve was helpful and flexible. The room was clean and as advertised.

Steven est un hôte très sympathique.
Endroit bien situé avec une location de vélo, sympa pour visiter Honolulu.
Chambre basique mais nous avions tout ce dont nous avions besoin! Merci!
Steve was great!  If you're looking for a true local experience in a convenient location, this place is for you.

Steve was very friendly! He knows the island well and is happy to answer your questions or provide suggestions. It's very convenient that he also rents bikes/mopeds from just outside the house, so that option is always open if you don't have a car. My friend and I stayed for almost a week, and at the end he even drove us to the airport!

The house is old but cozy. During our stay, there were 2 males staying in another room and both were very friendly (and willing to help us kill cockroaches). There are tons of cats always hanging out around the front door and lawn and it's adorable.
Steve was a great host! Very friendly and very open to assist us with our stay in Honolulu. The amenities were as promised and with such late notice/reservation, his place worked out great.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Steve was very friendly coming into the house and flexible about check-in! The room was very clean and close in proximity to many eateries and shops. A cozy room for our short stay for the 4th of July made it a unique and local experience we enjoyed.
We stayed for one night. Steve is very friendly and the room was clean.

My first two nights with Steve were totally fine. The final night, multiple men approached our residence and began pounding on the door demanding that Steve give them money and goods. They clearly had a relationship and it was some sort of deal gone wrong. Steve went outside and clearly there was a violent and screaming interaction between all of them. The men came back multiple times throughout the night, while I barricaded myself in my bedroom pretending to not exist while Steve was using a power drill to either make something or put boards over his window for protection. The police may have come throughout the night, I couldn't tell. I eventually snuck out at 5am once everything had calmed down and stayed on the beach the rest of the morning.  I would not recommend anyone stay here.

Nous sommes arrives avec une heure d'avance et Steve nous a chaleureusement accueilli quand meme! La chambre est propre, la salle de bain aussi et il y a un frigo, TV et air climatisée dans la chambre. La chambre est egalement barrée donc tres securitaire. Possibilite de louer des velos et scooters sur place. Proximité de Waikiki a pied et de toutes les commodités. Le quartier n'est pas le plus attirant mais c'est quand meme le meilleur rapport qualité-prix quand vous ne voulez pas depenser tout votre argent dans une chambre d'hotel. Nous etions un couple voyageant sac a dos et nius recommandons fortement cet endroit!
Steve is a very friendly and laid back guy. Location is great, because is close to Waikiki. The bedroom and bathroom were clean. It's a great affordable place in Waikiki.
Steve is easy to communicate with. The place is convenience to commute. The room is so small but worth for the price. It is very afforadable.

Steve was a great host. He was kind and made sure we had everything we needed. His place is also walking distance from almost everything. That was really great because we didn't rent a car and walked everywhere.

Thanks Steve for being super chill and accommodating. He is easy to talk to, gives great tips about the local area, and in general has great communication; he does his best to make himself available to us,  and made that clear as well. The place is walking distance to the Ala Moana center outdoor mall,  Ala Moana beach park,  and Magic Island (I love to watch the sunset there,  and parking there is free!!). He also feeds the cats that lives in the streets,  they are all adorable.. He runs a moped rental business,  so there are many bikes and parts and moped stuff there basically. Note that if you get a rental car, there is a $10 per night charge for the car, much cheaper than every other place that offers overnight parking. The washer requires $1.50 in quarters to be operated,  dryer is free; Steve showed us how to use both of them. The AC in the room is a life saver.
