We came to the Big Island with almost no idea of what to do, but with the help of Carol Ann's guidebook, we were able to create a complete itinerary and have an amazing time. I loved the Big Island and attribute it to her recommended list of places to go!
small, cozy place that is very welcoming! Carol's husband gave great advice for local attractions.

A fantastic view !! Amazing host with a full of attentions ! 
The studio is lovely, the place is very quiet!! Perfect to relax yourself !!
Nice cabin.
The pictures don't do justice to how cool this place is. We would have liked to stay for more than just the one night!
Very welcoming (Website hidden by Airbnb) up high and off the beaten path but it’s worth it.It gives you an idea what Hawaii is really  like.
the place itself was extremely charming. it was really nice to have breakfast in the morning. Carol and Mike were very responsive.
absolutely amazing Hospitality I would highly recommend this spot just for the opportunity to meet the hosts! great value and wonderful location.

This place is awesome! We loved the outside shower and washing up outside by the garden and awesome view in the morning. They have a cool chicken farm too and we had some fresh eggs for dinner and for breakfast because they were taste so good and more better than those eggs from store. Only one thing that because I have supper light sleep so I could hear someone walking in the middle of night for few times and I was worried to bother them when I was trying to something at night or earlier morning. But overall I loved it!
Great off the grid charming cabin. Views are amazing, especially at sunset. The bed is very comfy. Having the shower and bathroom outside creates a unique experience. Very clean.

This is an amazing property off the beaten path in Ocean view. You can really feel all the love and passion that went into making this home so beautiful.  We loved our space- everything you would need including a small tv, free WiFi, towels, amazing eggs from their chickens in the fridge and all the cooking equipment you would need.  The outdoor shower was exciting- fun to be outside in the elements.  The views from the room are fabulous- during the day you can see the gorgeous Ohi’a forests and the ocean in the distance, and at night the star-gazing is amazing.  The power did go out twice when we were there, but something we were expecting from the off-grid style home.  It’s very dark in this neighborhood so be careful when driving at night.  Someone ahead of us during the night ended up hitting a stray dog with their car.  It was fun to explore another area on our beautiful big island!  Mahalo nui loa Carol Ann and Michael for a fun adventure.

Carol Ann’s place is great! She thought of everything in details. We even had eggs, bagels, jam for breakfast!
This is a wild house location, amazing sky at night, cozy place for a couple on the slope of Mauna Loa.
The area is remote so expect a long drive from the main cities like Kona.

We arrived late at night and were greeted by Michael who made us feel immediately at home and showed us the ropes of the place. 

I especially loved the outdoor showers and eating areas. It’s like you and nature are one at this indoor/outdoor, quiet, secluded, eclectic little place. 

There are lots of things to look and and the artistic style is very funky— in a good way. If you are into seeing how creatively people can build a home from a mix of standard and non-standard materials, you’ll be as excited about this place as I was. 

In the daylight, the beauty was breathtaking. You feel like you are in your own succulent garden. 

We were provided with the most well stocked fridge and pantry we have ever seen at an Airbnb. Fresh eggs, jelly, cream cheese, butter, bagels, sparkling cider, English muffins, water, pantry full of stuff! 

There are lots of tips and suggestions of things to do in the area. Mostly, we just sat and enjoyed the view and the surroundings before we headed out. 

Oh and there are chickens and snuggly cats. So if you are missing your critter cuddles (like I always am), one of the lovely cats will show you some love if you want. But they stayed to their own area so if you didn’t want to see cats, you might never know they were there. 

The place has to be your style. If you are looking for a motel room, keep looking. If you want an earthy, relaxing, clean, creative place, stay here!

Though quite a drive from airport, we were happy to stay in “the cabin in the clouds “.! Carol Ann and Michael are super hosts! The Ocean view, vast horizon, and lovely garden patio was delightful! Not so sure about the outdoor bathroom and shower, a little too cold for me. We enjoyed an unexpected supply of breakfast treats and well-stocked with an assortment of can goods and seasonings!

Tolle Unterkunft mit wunderbarem Ausblick über das Meer. Es ist für alles bestens gesorgt (von mehreren Handtüchern, über die Küchenausstattung bis hin zu Frühstück und weiteren Lebensmitteln zum Kochen). Die entspannten und netten Gastgeber geben gerne Auskunft über Ausflugsziele.

Great accomodation with amazing view. Everything you could need (towels, pantry, breakfast,...) is already there. Nice and relaxed hosts who give you valuable tipps for your stay on the island.

Sweet little spot on a farm on the southwestern corner of Big Island. The hosts were super responsive and hospitable, the space was tiny and comfortable. The toilet is in a separate outhouse, but it was clean and convenient. The shower and bath sink are also outside, which can take getting used to, but are totally fine. I wish I could’ve spent more time on the farm itself, which had some chickens, cats, and other quaint decorations. You should have a car as it’s about 5 miles from the nearest highway and an hour plus to Kona or Hilo. Great value!

Carol and Michael were excellent hosts! Not only did they meet us in person but they also made sure we caught an amazing view of the stars and the blood moon on their property. Amazing! The space is incredibly cozy, and the eggs, bagels, and kona French press coffee they provided made an “eggsellent” start to our day. Overall brilliant place to stay on the Kona side of the big island.
We had a lovely stay at Carol Ann’s home and they gave us lots of great tips of the area. Thank you again!
Unique room with very nice host

Michael and Ann's place was super cute and away from the city in their cute ranch. Their place is at a beautiful 4000ft altitude from where the ocean is visible and the stars at night appear very bright and beautiful. 
We especially liked thier attention to detail. Everything had clear instructions on how to use/find to help a first timer in the place. The fridge was stocked with their farm eggs, bagels, butter and other breakfast material. We had eggs with bagels in the morning and the eggs were absolutely delicious. We will definitely recommend their place for anyone who wants to have an experience in a quiet place, at a high altitude where you can see sunrise and sunset. Yet you will be few minutes drive from Kona where there's a lot to do.
Super endroit pour séjourner dans la region de south point! Petit logement avec tout ce dont on a besoin! Nous avons adoré notre nuit passée la bas!

This place was so comfy and cozy. I felt like I was glamping. I especially loved that the kitchen was well stocked and we could make breakfast with eggs from the farm. There were not a lot of options for food nearby so having food available was great. This was my anniversary trip and my husband and I had a great time. Carol and Mike even had sparkling apple juice in the fridge upon our arrival. I loved the set up of the place and I felt safe. My husband  enjoyed speaking with Mike and I loved playing with the animals (chickens and cats). Great time and great hosts.
Great, cute, and secluded place. Loved the personal touches around the place and the eggs were delicious!

name: Aloha, Kihei Bay Surf, New Pool and BBQ
summary: Welcome!  Amazing unit across the street from the ocean, an ancient Hawaiian fish pond, small park, the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, and an awesome Indian restaurant.    Great BBQ area, pool, tennis courts,  and relaxing hot tub.   You will also be near the beginning of the longest uninterrupted white sand beach in all of Hawaii!  Come for the vacation of your dreams.  There's a 15% vacation tax that will be collected before getting the keys.
description: Welcome!  Amazing unit across the street from the ocean, an ancient Hawaiian fish pond, small park, the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, and an awesome Indian restaurant.    Great BBQ area, pool, tennis courts,  and relaxing hot tub.   You will also be near the beginning of the longest uninterrupted white sand beach in all of Hawaii!  Come for the vacation of your dreams.  There's a 15% vacation tax that will be collected before getting the keys. Sometimes I work in isolated areas of Maui and don't have good Internet connection.  But I have two reliable backup people who are happy to help if I'm unavailable.  Just call or text:  Renée - my mom at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) or our friend Lacey at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).  Don't hesitate to contact us.   Aloha, Johnny (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)   Airbnb does an excellent job of censoring contact information, but don't worry, I can give you these numbers before you arrive, and they are listed on the information in the unit.
neighborhood_overview: 1/30/2018 I'm adding the Haleakala notice and swimming cautions because we want you to have a safe and joyous vacation.  Look below this information for the tips on where to go and what to do.    Haleakala Sunrise – change:  No longer can you just get up in the dark of night and drive a couple of hours up to the top of the crater to stand in the cold and hope to see the sunrise over Haleakala.   Now you need reservations: “The one-day, non-transferable $1.50 sunrise reservation is only available online at  at least 60 days in advance of a planned visit.  To address last-minute requests, the park releases 30 tickets at 4 p.m. two days before a planned sunrise visit.  (For example, the last 30 tickets for a Saturday sunrise are released at 4 p.m. on a Thursday).  Currently, these sell out in less than 10 minutes online.“ If you are lucky, you can possibly see the Haleakala sunrise that many hope to see Be sure to take something warm with you. No food or gas is available in the park.  An
notes: You will be able to do self check-in.  So if your plane arrives at 11pm, you don't have to worry.  You can get into your unit and have a legal parking spot even when most places are closed.
transit: The public bus, the Kihei Islander, does stop right in front of Kihei Bay Surf, but the places you can go on it are limited.  It runs from 5:50 am going south until 7:50pm going south.  Be sure to check the schedules.  (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN): Maui Bus. Although KBS is right on the bus line and there are taxis and Uber and buses, it's a good idea to have a car while you are here so you can get around easily.  Here are some good options (Airbnb filters out URLs, e-mail addresses, and phone #s from my messages, so you will need to look up the websites).   The car rental companies offer airport shuttle and toll-free numbers:  1) Ohana Rental Car: Ask for Sandee Crossland  2) Maui Cruisers  3) Kimo’s  Parking is open and free at Kihei Bay Surf for one vehicle for each unit.  You will need to have the parking pass from our unit for overnight parking.
interaction: Sometimes I work in isolated areas of Maui and don't have good Internet connection.  But I have two reliable backup people who are happy to help if I'm unavailable.  Just call or text:  Renée - my mom at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) or our friend Lacey at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).  Don't hesitate to contact us.   Aloha, Johnny (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)   Airbnb does an excellent job of censoring contact information, but don't worry, I can give you these numbers before you arrive, and they are listed on the information in the unit.

host.host_about:
Aloha: This Kihei Bay Surf spacious, comfortable studio suite is across the street from the ocean. Its ideal location in North Kihei is close to restaurants, many beaches, and interesting activities. From your lanai, you will see an ancient Hawaiian fish pond where green sea turtles sometimes come to bask; there is a quiet, shaded park, the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary (the only sanctuary dedicated to to humpback whales), and an awesome Indian restaurant right on the ocean. Located near the beginning of the longest uninterrupted white sand beach in the whole state, you can run (or walk) from our unit all the way (six miles -in front of Kihei Canoe Club, Maui Canoe Club and a few condos to the protected area along the Kealia Pond National Wildlife Refuge and board walk) to Maalaea Harbor (with the excellent Maui Ocean Center, Maui Golf & Sports park for the kids, many restaurants, Pacific Whale Foundation - and a bus stop to deliver you back in front of Kihei Bay Surf. Our complex has a good swimming pool, hot jacuzzi, tennis courts, BBQ area, and clean laundry facilities. 

Our corner unit is bigger and has more light than most of the other units in our complex. The wrap-around lanai offers more space than the other units as well. It has a queen bed and a sofa couch for sleeping. The unit has been renovated and upgraded several times since my mom first lived there when she arrived on Maui from Chicago in 1985 to teach English at Maui College. She loved her job and Kihei -- and she met a nice, handsome counsellor working at the college. They got married - and had me. 

And I just got married in August to my beautiful bride, who has a 8-year-old son. We feel very blessed. And we hope to share our love of place with you. 

At KBS, you will be close to Kihei Canoe Club, where both my mom and I have done competitive outrigger canoe paddling. You can experience being out on the water if you go to the KCC Visitor Paddle on Tuesday or Thursday morning. Get there by 7:15 am to make sure you get a spot. During the winter, you may see whales while you are on the water. Allow a couple of hours for the experience. My mom is a volunteer for the HIHWNMS - the free museum and whale sanctuary across the street. On Tuesdays and Thursdays, you can hear a free lecture from 11am until noon about the Humpback Whales. The museum is open from 10am-3pm, Monday-Friday, and on the last Saturday of the month from 10am-1pm. The mission is to educate the public and protect humpback whales and other marine life and our environment. 

Another activity that is nearby is Hawaiian singing, ukulele, and hula on Thursday nights from 7-8:30 pm. at the Keolahou Church, 177 S. Kihei Rd. It is joyful - and a glimpse of Hawaiian culture. 

Come stay. We think you will have a wonderful time.

reviews.comments:
Excellent place with all the facilities as described in the ad. Perfect location as the place is literally across the road from the beach and has shops and restaurants 1 mile down the road.

The complex also has a beautiful swimming pool, jacuzzi and very clean barbecue facilities.

The hosts were superb and even went out of there way to accommodate our every need.

I strongly recommend this place.

John was great at communicating and making sure I was comfortable at his studio right across the street from the beach. He even went as far as to offer me a ride to the airport which I thought was incredibly considerate. As far as the place itself it was very large and conveniently located with a very clean pool and hot tub. I would definitely recommend staying here.
John was a great host. Awesome communicator and very easy going.

Staying at John's listing was a great experience from start to finish. The place was great and customized with hand-picked flowers and "where to go in maui" for my first visit to the island. The place was very clean, very nicely kept and had all the amenities I needed especially in the kitchen.

John persona davvero speciale! Abbiamo trovato fiori freschi in tutte le stanze e degli snack di benvenuto! Appartamento bello, curato nei dettagli e pulito. A disposizione A.C.,microonde,TV, wifi, asciugacapelli, lavastoviglie, lavatrice e asciugatrice, teli mare, sdraio e borsa frigo. Cucina super attrezzata. Piscina,bbq e parcheggio. Ottima posizione. John e la sua ragazza molto simpatici ed estremamente disponibili...tornerei senza dubbio e lo consiglierei a tutti...grazie John e a presto...Mahalo...
John was easy to communicate with and provided us with everything we needed. The place was clean and spacious and is in a great location, just steps away from the beach.

What a guy, what a welcome, what a place! If you're looking for a homely space, comfortable and clean and well located, this is your spot! Throw in a welcoming host with a great sense of humour, willingness to help you find a cold beer upon arrival and give you great tips on island life, you may well have hit the perfect combo!! Mahalo Johnny :) See you next time champ!!

Great place, has everything you need. The lanai (balcony) is spacious and wraps around corner. Has everything you need for beach; towels, cooler, etc. Nice pool area with hot tub and grill. Conveniently located in Kihei, short drive to some of the best beaches in Maui, big and little beach, and across the street from kalepolepo beach and fish pond. Many restaurants and businesses just down the road on S. Kihei Rd. Communication could have been a little better. Could only respond via text, no voicemail or calling, and some of the texts were delayed or vague. With that said, I did leave an item behind and John stayed in touch so I was able to retrieve it two days later - so thank you John. Would recommend this place if staying in Kihei.
The place is absolutely amazing! So clean, cute and cozy! The location is absolutely perfect. I will definitely recommend John to all my friends here on Oahu.
Felt right at home at John's apartment. Accurate listing description. Easy to communicate with, would definitely stay here again.
Great experience

I enjoyed staying Kihei Bay Surf. This family is very sweet and willing to help me out all the time! Neighbor hood is very quite and beach is right cross from the apartment. It's such a peaceful place to stay. However, you need a car because there is not grocery stores and restaurant. You can walk to those places but it takes about 20minutes. I'd love to visit this place again :)

Staying at John's place was perfect for my husband and I. We felt the location was awesome, fairly central to the rest of the island and Kihei was so relaxed it was perfect. The condo has everything you could need and we especially liked that there was Tupperware so we could pack our own lunches and snacks. There were also two sets of snorkel gear which was great since we left one of ours at home accidentally. The beach towels were great too since they take up room when you bring your own. We enjoyed spending time by the pool and right across the road is a great park with a perfect swimming spot for kids. On our last day we had a late flight out and asked if we could stay a bit later so we could shower after the beach and John was very accommodating. We really had a great last day knowing we still had a home base for us and our stuff, it was greatly appreciated.  We would definitely come back!
perfect stay !
John was very nice, we live on island and would defiantly stay again there again for a quick getaway!
Thanks for everything. Felt like we were at home on Maui rather than vacating!

Had a great time in this place. We had breakfast on the lanai in the morning, enjoyed the beach all afternoon and finished by grilling pineapple on the gas grill and relaxing in the hot tub. Great area, great host and great place! We will be back.

This fabulous corner unit condo is exactly as John has described it!! It's spacious (twice as big as the neighbouring condos!), clean, fresh and airy! A wrap around balcony which is perfect for a glass of wine at sunset! Ideal for drying clothes also! Screen doors back and front meant a breeze could run through the apartment. 
Swimming pool was really clean as was the hot tub and well looked after by the on site manager, Mark. The pool wasn't that busy so we felt like it was our own private pool on several occasions! There was a barbeque area beside the pool which was great to use on those evenings we didn't feel like going out for dinner! A laundry room was also situated beside the tennis courts. 
The location on Kihei was great, we had a beach right across the road that we could see from our balcony. No matter where you're  staying in Maui a car would definitely be necessary. John recommended Kihei car rental which turned out to be a fraction of the cost of an airport rental! A shuttle bus runs to the airport also from there. 
Monsoon Indian(restaurant)for any Indian lovers is directly across the road and was recommended by Johns dad to try it out, it was so good we went there twice! 
Snorkelers- there are so many great snorkelling beaches within a ten minute drive(by car)! 
Molokini + Turtle town-definitely a must!! 
The Road to Hana- beautiful scenery and waterfalls I would advise camping along the route as there is so much to see in just one day!! The road is quite windy and narrow! 
Definitely go to Hookipa beach near Paia if you want to see turtles basking around 17.00hrs! 
We can't wait to visit Maui again next year and were hoping John will have a free space for us in his condo!! I can't thank John and family enough for their hospitality :)

We really enjoyed our stay at John's place. The apartment is very conveniently located--right near beaches, central highways to explore the island, 24hr grocery stores, and places to go out at night. John's place is also well outfitted (cooler, snorkeling gear, beach towels, etc.) which makes it easy to do day trips. The unit is a good size with a smart layout, and having the option to turn on the AC at night is nice too. Thanks so much for a great stay!

Great Location! Good vibe! I enjoyed staying at John's place and would definitely stay there again. My only feedback would be regarding towels. I would recommend bringing your own towel, I am not sure the towels were very clean. Enjoyed my stay!! Thank you!!

ma copine et moi avons passé une semaine magnifique chez john, il était très disponible et hyper sympa. 
à chaque fois que j'ai eu besoin de lui il était là et son appartement permet de vivre dans l'ambiance de kihei.
encore merci pour tous les cadeaux à l'accueil john ;) :)

We really enjoyed the place! The location was great, close to the beach and accessible to many activities on Maui. I highly suggest visiting the Maui Brewing Co. 

The space was comfortable, the lanai spacious, and had a full kitchen for our use. John was very quick to respond when I had a questions. He also provided great food and hiking suggestions! 

We loved it all, would definitely return and recommend staying here.

Mahalo!
This was a wedding gift to my son and daughter-in-law. They were very pleased and would stay here again.
The place was perfect, he had everything ready to make it feel like home & just across the street from the beach. Mahalo!!! Will definitely use it again when I stay in Kihei again

We had a great time staying at John's place.  Condo was clean and comfy.  The location is great. The place is across from the beach.   It's only 1 mile from the grocery store. John was very welcoming and responsive to our questions.  Really enjoy our stay there!  
Thanks John!

John's place was very nice. Sunny, lots of room. It had one of the most comfortable beds of anywhere I've stayed. The pool and grill access was also really nice to have. I would definitely stay here again.

Nice and large place with fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and available parking space. We loved the swimming pool and hot tub. Location is also great for South Maui beaches. Beach equipment (chairs, towels, snorkel, fins and ice boxes) was kindly provided by John. We had a great time. Only downside was that the apartment was quite noisy for my taste (air conditioning and busy street) and could have been a bit cleaner. But I would recommend it.

This is not far from the airport. Everything you need is there, from cookware, picnic, to snorkeling gear, not to mention a parking permit. Safeway isn't too far either and if you're looking for fresh seafood, go to Eskimo Candy. I would definitely stay at this Airbnb, the next time I'm in Maui.

Great mid point location for checking out all parts of Maui.
Close to all the great places ti eat in Kihei.
John was very helpful and responsive. If we couldn't find something (we weren't looking hard), he responded quickly to help us out.
Great stay indeed! Everything we needed. We didn't spend much time there as we were out and about exploring Maui! Perfect place to come back to and recharge before the next day!
This place is absolutely amazing!!! Super spacious inside, full kitchen, awesome wrap around porch, quiet, beautiful, close to everything. Will definitely stay here again!!
its really an awesome place to stay. it was hard regards to communication. the host was working so he wasnt getting any of my msgs. but once he was contacted he was very accomodating.
Greets place for a get away. Love the balcony and close to anything you need. I'd def stay again

I've been to Hawaii a few times, I really like staying at local places.  John and his mother are very hospitable, and want to be sure your taken care of.  We drove to Haleakalā the second day we were there, great trip, I highly recommend doing in the evening, not the AM sunrise trip.  You can hike during the day 65 degrees, then watch stars after the amazing sunset 45 degrees!  Close to the Airport and Costco.  I will go back!
Great easy place to stay with everything you can imagine in the kitchen!  Across the street from the beach, with amazing sunsets!

John's corner unit across from the beach is an ideal location for enjoying Maui. We took a long walk down South Kihei road and explored the many beach parks. We walked across the street, with lovely beach chairs provided, to watch the sunset, turtles and fish in the fish pond. Very close to good restaurants, shops. Easy to get to other parts of the island. The unit is spacious.  Some street noise (which did not bother us).  The community is quiet and well maintained, with a beautiful pool. Plan to return!

We had a very nice stay at John's apartment. It's very close to a beach and a fish pond with turtles swimming around.
The shops and restaurants are just a few minutes drive.
There's some traffic on the road down the apartment during the day, but night is quiet.

La photo idyllique de la plage ne représente pas tout à fait l'ambiance du logement. En effet, l'appartement est situé sur une rue très passante et la circulation est incessante. Les fenêtres sont du verre simple et le sol dur et le plafond en bois crée une cage de résonance qui rend amplifie les bruits de la route. Il est très difficile, voire impossible de dormir profondément. La piscine du complexe n'est pas chauffée et très peu de monde ose s'y baigner plus que quelques minutes. La mini-plage de l'autre côté de la rue inclut des algues rouges pas très attrayantes pour la baignade. En réalité, il faut descendre à South Kihey en voiture, une quinzaine de minutes, pour trouver des belles plages sans algue. Malheureusement, tout cela ne faisait pas partie de la description du logement, assez charmant autrement.
same as private review

The location is great for access to all of Maui.  Check-in was easy and simple.  We enjoyed the pool and hot tub.  A nice touch was the fruit left for us on the kitchen table.  John was quick to respond to our one question.

We found Kihei to be a central, less expensive, and nice place to stay on Maui. We had a rental car the whole time, so it didn't take long to drive to restaurants, beaches, and other sites. We didn't have to pay for parking at the complex, and we found places to park at the places we wanted to visit. John's place was very comfortable and there was snorkel gear and lawn chairs available for us to use if we wanted.
Great location! Large corner unit right across the street from beautiful beaches. Only negative - on the main road traffic is a little noisy, we shut the windows and turned on the AC it was fine!

Johnny was awesome from start to finish! We absolutely loved the place, we made friends with others in the complex and we stayed for an entire month! It became our home away from home and it was just such a wonderful place. The bed was comfy, the kitchen was great to prepare food in, and we spent time grilling and enjoying the pool! Top notch, wonderful experience!
Really enjoyed our stay here. Very accommodating host.

Johnny's place is great and in a great central location for beach and Maui exploration. Johnny gives great recommendations for the island. Great deck for outdoor dining. Felt like our own little home in Maui. Can't wait until my next visit!
Everything was excellent.  We would definitely stay again.

The apartment was very spacious, the kitchen well-equipped, and the bed was very comfortable - firm with a foam pad on top.  There were touches that showed Johnny is environmentally conscious, which we appreciate very much.  We ran into two minor problems that Johnny responded to immediately and resolved to our satisfaction.  The only downside was the noise from traffic, tho we ran the air conditioning at night to cover the sound.

This apartment is just as described. Great value and 30 seconds from an nice little beach. Some road traffic noise but when the balcony doors are shut and the AC is on (which we did at night), everything is fine. We enjoyed the pool and grill as well. We love Maui and this is a great little apartment from which to see the sites.

This was my second trip to Maui, but first time at John's place.  The bed was comfortable and the AC was cold. This is a great location with quiet neighbors and I'll be looking to stay here again in the future.
Great location and reasonable price. Would stay again!

John was an amazing host. His home is beautiful and in a perfect location on the island-a wonderful neighborhood with lots to do and it's easy to get almost anywhere on the island. He provided snorkel and beach gear which we were able to get a lot of use out of. The fresh fruit was a very nice touch, too. The patio is beautiful in the mornings and the place was very clean. We very much enjoyed our stay and can't wait to come back-we will definitely stay here again next time.

Notre séjour à Kihei a été formidable entre autres grâce à l'hospitalité de John et de sa famille. Un petit imprévu est survenu à notre arrivée (délai avant d'entrer), mais les hôtes ont été charmants et ont su nous accommoder pour ces quelques heures. L'endroit est sympa et proche de tous les services en voiture. Un ananas bien mûr et sucré nous attendait... L'appartement est un "L" (un coin), donc plus grand que les appartements adjacents. La terrasse fait également un "L". Bien que ce soit sur une rue très passante, le bruit ne nous a pas incommodés outre mesure (nous avons mis l'air climatisé, comme conseillé). Le lit est confortable. Pour le BBQ, il fonctionne au gaz, donc pas de souci pour des briquettes. Par contre, on ne peut pas l'utiliser après 21:30 (les lumières se ferment automatiquement). La petite plage en face est belle et fréquentée par les gens de la place (nous en avons vu qui y faisaient du snorkling). Nous n'avons pas utilisé la piscine ou le spa, faute de temps, mais les gens du complexe les utilisaient. Les proprios nous ont texté chaque jour des suggestions de sorties que nous n'aurions pas connues autrement; nous n'avons pas été déçus. Nous y retournerions sans hésiter. Mahalo!
John's place is spacious. Balcony was nice. Would stay here again.
We enjoyed our stay in this adorable apartment. Great outside porch and pool. Environmentally friendly kitchen soap- bonus! Close to beach and beach chairs and boogie boards provided.
cute little studio place. we had trouble finding the key and John came out of his way to help us out. very cool

The place is well located, kind of middle of everything, however keep in mind you will need to rent a car to move around. There is a lot do in the island and rent a car is a must! John's place is across street from Kihei beach. Sugar beach has few miles of beach perfect for running. This is not a luxury aparment, but honestly you have got everything you need. The place includes a large balcony that we loved having dinner out. The condo has a well-maintained pool and jacuzzi. John promptly attended my questions, including a late check-out with no problem.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Not really satisfied. I think it was ok for the price $94 per day in Maui. If you don't expect too much and want a private place which has affordable price, then this will be your good choice.
The condo is great for people who are active and like to see the island. You have everything you need for a nice stay and we would come back - for sure!

I have mixed feelings about this place. You can tell John put in some effort in setting up this vacation rental. He had a closet full of beach items and plenty of towels. The location is pretty good. The base price of this place is also reasonable.

Now comes the negative parts - the two main negatives are cleanliness and communication. When we booked, John was very responsive. He told us he would send some additional information when we arrived. We landed around 5pm and I had still not heard from John. No check-in instructions or where to park, etc. We waited outside of the apartment for about an hour before John replied.

During the first night, I noticed a horrible odor emanating from the bed, the sheets, the pillows, and the comforter. It smelled like a locker room. Upon closer inspection, there were hairs all over the bed, it became pretty clear that nothing was washed in between rentals. This is extremely alarming because it's very unsanitary AND the cleaning fees are quite high for this unit.

We messaged John about this and received no response. We ended up using our clothes as a pillow and bought some beach towels as a comforter cover. In fact, we did not hear from John until the day we were checking out. He didn't apologize, all he said was the sheets are clean. He told me he would send his cleaner over so we can discuss it. Well, given it was the day of check out, it's a little too late for that. I waited for the cleaner anyway, but he never showed up. Poor way to end an otherwise great vacation.

Given the poor communication and atrocious cleaning fees, I would not recommend this to anyone until John fixes the issue.

Pulizia scadente, condizionatore che non andava, irraggiungibile L host fino alle ore 14 e la stanza data alle 17:30 ( check in era previsto dalle 12 in poi e noi siam arrivati alle 13). 
Abbiam pulito casa noi. Gentile john e carino L appartamento ma trascurato e trasandato.

Loved the place! Thanks again for letting us stay! We never got a parking pass and I kind of just guessed on how to get in the place. But besides that, you will see us book from you again in the future. Thanks again!
Super convenient place

Great place which is easily to reach and close to all main attractions the Kihei area has to offer. Really spacious appartment for 2 and the balcony, though being on the main road, is a very nice spot to sit in the evening.

Pool and hottub are really a nice place to relax after coming back from hiking or snorkling trips
Great stay. Really nice place. Close to the beach and places to eat. Easy to find parking. Overall great experience

John's place is great! We were comfortable right off the bat and had no trouble adjusting because that's the last thing you'll need when you're on vacation! Amenities included everything we needed. Having beach chairs and snorkeling gear was a big plus!

This place was the perfect spot. Beach right in front of you and a 15 minute walk to the good bars and restaurants. Even more the hosts gave me a great first impression of Hawaii! Thank you guys Mahalo.

I got this place last minute and the deal was at such a great price!
The place is exactly how it is pictured.

It has a very nice island feel!

Plus it’s right across from the beach and is in walking distance to restaurants and stores. 

The only thing I would say was communication was a bit laxed.

It’s a great location and a very clean place.
John had a great place and an even better location.  Beautiful beach steps away from the condo.  Many thanks for the hospitality, John.

John never responded to give us instructions after he had confirmed our reservation.  This left us without a place to stay.  Luckily Airbnb stepped in and refunded us and got us into another location for our trip.
This condo is great. John has made the place a home with plenty of amenities and the pool and bbq grill make it a slam dunk.

The place is recently refinished and very clean, John adds many nice touches such as beach gear and a fresh ripe pineapple. The road can be a bit noisy, just remember to close the windows at night. The jacuzzi is refreshing after a long day travelling.

The place and the hospitality was great. The little things made us feel at home and not to forget the secret Santa totally made our day. The condo was a few steps from the beach but the one thing that I wished for would have been a view of the beach to wake up to from the patio
Great place!

My husband and I had an amazing stay in Kihei for our belated honeymoon in John's home. The space was so lovely and we liked the privacy of the entire condo. It was amazing to be one street across from the ocean, and we went out to see the sunset on John's beach numerous times. John and his ohana also left us two beautiful handmade lei in the fridge as well as a giant, delicious pineapple and passionfruits. John was extremely communicative from the moment of our reservation until we checked out (though we never got a chance to meet him). And he left lots of information about places to go and things to see in Maui. Parking was easy, the location was great (a car is a must for this place, though!), and our overall experience was super positive.

John was a wonderful host! His place is in a great location, and it has all kinds of beach accessories you can use, snorkel gear, beach chairs, bogey boards, etc. There are wonderful restaurants and beaches all nearby. He left us nice amenities, and was quick to respond to any questions. We had a wonderful time, I would highly recommend staying here.
Nice and clean

Great space to get away when you need to be in Maui.
We walked frequently from John's place all the way down towards the South Kihei Fish Co. where we found fresh local fish and great food truck pricing.  
The convenience alone could save you dollars if you wish to use Lyft instead of renting a car.  Most places are within walking distance for sure.  
Free wifi helps with everything.  Mahalo and until next time!
John is a thoughtful and communicative host.  The location is great.  There are a lot of amenities in the immediate area.

John’s place worked perfectly for our needs. We knew that we‘d be spending a large majority of our days out and about, so we made our decision based off the location. 

We were short drives from most of the beaches and areas we spent our time at. There’s a great fish pond right across the street from the unit where we saw sea turtles every single day. It’s also a great area for small kids to get in the water given there’s no waves. 

John’s place is ideal for a couple or a young family looking for a place to stay without breaking the bank.

We’d definitely stay again.
John was super helpful, he had suggestions for activities to do with our toddler.  Would highly recommend this place!

Johns place was accurate to the listing with the best part being how close it is to the beach (across the street). The condos have a shared pool, hot tub, and hose for rinsing off on your way back from the beach which were nice additions. John left us some fresh fruit which was also a nice touch. The bed was SUPER comfortable and the AC kept it a good temperature! Kihei is a nice little town and we would like to return again someday!

Head's up if you are a light sleeper. You will hear every car that passes on S. Kihei road just outside the main windows. We got this place for an amazing price, but I would never pay over 200$ a night here. I would just go to the Kihei Days Inn at that point. The apartment had ants everywhere. We ended up doing our own cleaning of the place to try to get rid of them. I would replace the spare pillows and blankets that are stained and add more towels to the unit if I were the owner. I would also get rid of some of the end tables. 7 tables in that small of a space is a bit much and less is more. :)

Johnny’s place is cozy and comfy, and served as the perfect home base for us, whether we were hanging out on the beach or adventuring about the island. Johnny was a great host, making sure we had everything we needed and even dropped off some fresh fruit for us.

The ocean is just across the street, and you’re never more than a few steps away from a totally chill beach that was never crowded on any of the days we were there. When we weren’t at the beach, the on site pool and hot tub on site were nice, too. (Both clean and well-kept.)

We appreciated the location being far enough away from all the super-crowded attractions, but were happy that Kihei’s central location made it easy to get to any of the other stuff we wanted to do on the island.

There are newer, more expensive places where you could stay next to a bunch of attractions, but if you’re looking for a relaxing, low-key place to come back to when you’re not out exploring the island, then I definitely recommend Johnny’s.

My wife and I spent a few days in Johnny’s place for our honeymoon and it was absolutely perfect!
It wasn’t our first time with AirBnB but certainly the best of all times!
Johnny was a great hostess! He responded fast, welcomed us with extremely warm welcome that included Lei decorations, special surprise and much more.
The place is a walking distance to the beach of 2 minuets tops. Free parking, very spacious apartment, big porch, great decorations, clean place, nice & quiet.
I would definitely recommend to everyone to go to this special place and wish we will return again and again.
Absolutely LOVED it! 
Thank you Johnny!
Hodaya & Yuval
You should stay here for long time,I stayed for six days, it is too short.
John runs a simple nicely located condo
Johnny and his ohana were wonderful and made for a great experience.

After a horror Airbnb on the northcoast, staying at Johnny's apartment was like heaven on earth. The kitchen is well equipped and the balcony is really big. The most we enyojed the pool with whirlpool.  Johnny is a really nice host, we tried to go surf with him but hadn't luck with the waves. He makes a good deal for private surf lessons, just plan the whole day. Thank you Johnny and maybe someday we'll be back.

John was a very kind and accommodating host.   The unit was in a good location.  
It was very convenient.   
I would recommend his unit.
Awesome spot

John was seriously the BEST host I’ve ever had through Airbnb! He left fresh pineapple and other fruits along with sparkling cider in the fridge to enjoy and even dropped off a Hawaii calendar before we left on our last day, which he extended the check out time all the way to 6pm for us even with someone else staying the same night! He went above and beyond to make sure my husband and I had a great time and I would highly recommend staying at his place. Great location! Pool and hot tub were never busy and kept very clean and nice. There is a calm beach right across the street and the place itself was actually bigger than what it seemed like from the pictures. Had all kinds of beach equipment which my husband and I loved using!
Fantastic and low maintenance - had a phenomenal time here!

This was my second time staying at John’s beautiful condo. Could not ask for a more hospitable or welcoming host! John went out of his way to ensure we were Comfortable and had everything that we needed. If we were missing anything at all he went out immediately and bought it for us. My favourite part, besides the comfortable accommodations that Jonn provides is the extra large heated pool and the amazing hot tub and barbecue area. My roommate and I just want to say a huge thank you for making our stay in Hawaii so comfortable and relaxing. Will definitely be coming back to John’s place!!
Amazing
Was Awesome, next to Whale Sanctuary and 100yds from beach.

立地条件がとてもよいです｡
ｽｰﾊﾟｰも近く､基本的に必要なものは揃っているので快適に過ごせると思います!

The Airbnb is one of the best I’ve ever stayed at.  John was super helpful in providing me whatever info I needed.  The condo was easy to find and it was a pleasure to stay in.  It had beach equipment already there, which saves me some hassle procuring it for myself.  Clean and stylish room.  Everything went perfectly.

John’s place was even better than I expected! The apartment is spacious and very comfortable, and located across the street from a long strip of beach (with very few people)! It’s minutes from all restaurants and things to do in Kihei. The pool at the complex was heated and enjoyable as well, also without many people around. Great stay!
Wonderful! Enjoyed our first time in Hawaii!
Great place to stay!  Close to great surf & great restaurants.  Johnny gave some great advice on what to do and how to get there, felt right at home.
Great person to deal with, nice place, short ride to 10,000 peaks surfing breaks, hot tub, and a pool. I would recommend staying here. Jimmy
It is a wonderful beach and condo, lots of privacy, getting to know the area, good bus opportunity and the best place to get to familiar with the endangered green sea turtle :)

We had a great time staying at John's place. It is at a very convenient location, right across from a small beach park, where we watched sunset one night. It is a 5-min drive to all the restaurants and shopping area. John also gave very detailed local tips, which were very helpful. We didn't cook any meals as the kitchen is quite small, but it was not a big deal for us since we were out everyday. Other than that, it is a place with great value, just as it is described in the posting.
Location is really great. South Kihei is a good spot for snorkeling- we saw a few honu in Makena Landing. John provided us with all necessities. I recommend this home!

Wow! John's place was perfect I stayed there for over 1 week, went through HURRICANE Lane and still had a blast! I loved there warm hospitality and chilled Hawaiian vibes! This transferred into there beautiful 1 bedroom apartment. Doesn't matter if your a couple or a traveller you will not regret this decision! 

P.S - Even if you are there for a hurricane event the host will even get you food and water to stock up on just incase. This made them over 5 stars ❤

I loved my stay here and definitely go back the next time I'm in Hawaii - Maui
John was very good at communicating and was flexible when we had a change of schedule. The apartment was great and it was nice to be able to use the common pool and hot tub.
Wonderful location and great hospitality
Perfect location, great place. Had everything I needed and check-in was a breeze. Really enjoyed my stay!

This was a great little place right on the beach in Kihei! It was so quiet, and had all the amenities you could imagine. John sent a ton of great info on the area before I checked in, and I didn’t even need to reach out to ask for anything because the apartment had it all! 

The appliances are a little old, but everything worked and I was able to cook and do laundry (though I didn’t need to) and there was lots of space to spread out over the 5 days I was there. The value was wonderful and I’d highly recommend this apartment! Thanks John & Ohana!

Had a great time at John’s place. It’s comparatively spacious with respect  to other offerings around and has everything you might possibly need from dishwasher to dryer all the way to beach chairs. Whilst located right by a semi-major street, that won’t really be an issue as the traffic comes to a standstill at night - the AC though is a bit of an older model and somewhat noisy. There is a regular fan however that is much more quiet so you have alternatives if the AC were an issue for you.

Good value, recommended.

Loved this place! We arrived a little early so the place hadn’t been cleaned yet (which we were completely fine with!) They offered to come clean it right away. John’s wife came by right away to bring clean everything and clean the house. A really comfy and cute place definitely would love to stay again :)

This place served the purpose. It was in close proximity to south side beaches and many shops. It needs some upgrades with kitchen utensils and the cable tv (Cable doesn't have much and the interface is awful to use. Adding a Chromecast or fire TV would help). But, given the price and location this was perfect for us.
Great place.  Good value.
great location. would stay again.

John was very communicative and friendly. Unfortunately we had some issues but they seemed isolated to our stay as I didn’t notice the complaint in other reviews. John did his best to make things right which we ultimately really appreciated. Location was amazing in Kihei!

Great location, very responsive host.

I had a minor issue with hot water not being available (turns out the fuse was tripped), but John was quick to respond and it was solved immediately.

The place is worth the value if you're not looking to spend much time indoors. The location is great as it is further away from all the resorts and closer to all the great beaches and only 20 min away from the airport. If you're doing the road to Hana, molokini crater or any helicopter tours, you'll find that it is easier to stay in Kihei vs Lahaina. We loved the proximity to the beach and to all the local bars as well. It also has a nice, clean pool and hot tub in the common areas!
Nice!

Fantastic location!! Easy to get to and centrally located along the Kihei coastal area.  A mile north of shopping and restaurants, and a few miles south of the Maalaea Marina where most of the tour boats go out. Also, and this is the BEST, its right across the street from Kalepolepo Beach Park where Green Sea Turtles come to rest on the sea wall and beach!!! Couldn't have been more pleased. We loved the Tommy Bahama beach chairs and took them everywhere!! John was a great host and provided quality toiletries, towels and furnishings!! There was always a parking spot for the rental car. We would stay again!
Great place!
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great local and amenities

Guys this place is in a perfect locataion has pool and a jacuzzi  you can chill out on the deck and start your day off with a nice coffee honestly we didn't want to leave on that last day this spot is a great price and should be booked every day of the year!!!
All you need for the beach plus beach towels. Basic condiments provided along with basic toiletries. Very relaxing and a great bbq area !
perfect, thanks for a great place

name: Casanova Eixample 4 bedrooms apartment
summary: Charming, elegant, luxury 4 double bedrooms  apartment with 3 bathrooms in the centre of Barcelona, just few minutes walking to Passeig de Gracia.  Capacity for 7 person. HUTB-003243
space: Decorated with style and elegance, the light and bright living room invite you to enjoy your breakfast on the close terrace. Free wifi, flat Tv on each room and living room, washing machine, dishwasher, air-conditioning and a fully equipped kitchen.
description: Charming, elegant, luxury 4 double bedrooms  apartment with 3 bathrooms in the centre of Barcelona, just few minutes walking to Passeig de Gracia.  Capacity for 7 person. HUTB-003243 Decorated with style and elegance, the light and bright living room invite you to enjoy your breakfast on the close terrace. Free wifi, flat Tv on each room and living room, washing machine, dishwasher, air-conditioning and a fully equipped kitchen. The guests receive an email and phone number connected 24h and ready to help and attend for all their needs before and during their stay. The closest metro station is Hospital Clinic and there is a bus station just in the corner . On the check in time, all the information regarding transportation and places to visit will be shared with you. Kindly ask to receive  the landing time in Barcelona Airport at least 48h before arrival, in order to organize the check in properly. The city tax 2,48€/pers/night will be paid in cash in the moment of check in. The check in
notes: Kindly ask to receive  the landing time in Barcelona Airport at least 48h before arrival, in order to organize the check in properly. The city tax 2,48€/pers/night will be paid in cash in the moment of check in. The check in after 21h have an extra fee of 30€ and after 23h is 50€. License HUTB-003243
transit: The closest metro station is Hospital Clinic and there is a bus station just in the corner . On the check in time, all the information regarding transportation and places to visit will be shared with you.
access: En el interior, amueblado con el mayor gusto y atención al detalle,encontrara la combinación y elegancia entre el blanco y negro, TV y aire acondicionado en cada habitación, una incomparable combinación de glamour que permite a los huéspedes una extraordinario experiencia y redefine lo que alojamiento en un hotel puede ser. Si te apetece una comida hecha en casa, la cocina remodelada está completamente equipada con todos los electrodomésticos y aparatos que puedes desear. El exterior de la casa con un terraza increíble , dan a la propiedad una sensación acogedora y romántica.
interaction: The guests receive an email and phone number connected 24h and ready to help and attend for all their needs before and during their stay.
house_rules: The parties are not accepted inside the apartment. Smoking is allowed only on the terrace. The check in later than 21 a clock has an extra fee of 35€ and the check in later than 23 a clock has an extra fee of 50€.

name: ABEL'S IN DOWNTOWN - THE PLACE TO BE 1 OF 2
summary: As easy as it gets: 1- Located at Praça Carlos Alberto, in the heart of Porto´s downtown  2- Everything you need at your fingertip: cafes, supermarket, pharmacy, ATM, etc. 3- All main attractions within walking distance (5 min). 4- Livraria Lello and Torre dos Clérigos just around the corner Be literally my guest Abel
space: This luxury open-space 2-bedroom apartment is located at the charismatic "Praça Carlos Alberto", in the heart of Porto’s downtown known as "Baixa". Just 100m from the city’s main iconic attractions: "Torre dos Clérigos", "Livraria Lello" and "Galerias de Paris" – the jam-packed new nightlife neighborhood. Restaurants, bars and boutiques, as well as pharmacy, cafés and Oporto´s fine bakeries are all around the corner. You´re close to everything. This apt has 115 square meters, 2 bedrooms, 1 big bathroom and 1 living room with a fully equipped kitchenette. It is set on the 2nd floor of a recently entirely refurbished building that combines architectural environment and heritage with a functional and contemporary design. Both rooms have stunning views of the main square, whereas the living room is directed towards a common interior yard. The large windows give it an enormous transparency and brightness. Features: • 2 Bedrooms: 1 w/ a big double-bed and the other w/ two single-beds (sheets
description: As easy as it gets: 1- Located at Praça Carlos Alberto, in the heart of Porto´s downtown  2- Everything you need at your fingertip: cafes, supermarket, pharmacy, ATM, etc. 3- All main attractions within walking distance (5 min). 4- Livraria Lello and Torre dos Clérigos just around the corner Be literally my guest Abel This luxury open-space 2-bedroom apartment is located at the charismatic "Praça Carlos Alberto", in the heart of Porto’s downtown known as "Baixa". Just 100m from the city’s main iconic attractions: "Torre dos Clérigos", "Livraria Lello" and "Galerias de Paris" – the jam-packed new nightlife neighborhood. Restaurants, bars and boutiques, as well as pharmacy, cafés and Oporto´s fine bakeries are all around the corner. You´re close to everything. This apt has 115 square meters, 2 bedrooms, 1 big bathroom and 1 living room with a fully equipped kitchenette. It is set on the 2nd floor of a recently entirely refurbished building that combines architectural environment and heri
house_rules: No special rules, just good sense. I just ask you not to smoke inside. Enjoy!

host.host_about:
I´m originally from Porto.

I´m laidback and love to welcome and meet my guests whenever possible. 

I´ll do my best to enhance your experience in Porto!

Welcome!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The apartment is clean, spacious and modern.  The location is fantastic - located on a beautiful square in downtown Porto, and a close walk to restaurants, nightlife and the activity along the Douro.  Amenities are provided, such as toiletries, kitchen supplies, coffee and a great wi-fi connection.  I would definitely recommend this apartment for a stay in Porto!

Abel's apartment is amazing - beautiful, big and modern and bright. The view over the square is incredible, you really feel like Evita or something! The location is also great, an enjoyable walk through the heart of the city brings you to the river.

When we stayed (early August) there were a couple of small problems that can be easily fixed when Abel has time - we couldn't get the TV and the washing machine to work, and the pictures were still waiting to be hung on the walls.

I would definitely point out that the apartment is not air conditioned. This was a problem for us staying in summer, because the bedrooms, fronting onto the square, face west, and so get very hot. However, opening the windows makes the bedrooms very noisy and not easy to sleep in. I don't think this would be a problem for most of the year, but definitely in summer it made us wish that the apartment's heating was actually reverse cycle air conditioning!

Overall, this is a great apartment, and if I was coming back to Porto I would stay there again - but not in summer.

We stayed in Porto in the beautifull and very luxureous appartment of Abel. The location is perfect, in the citycentre, and the appartment is big and comfortable. We enjoyed Porto very much and had great diners twice on the square at O Cacula. On our way out we met Abel in person; he and his mother are very charming hosts!

This apartment is the perfect place to stay in Porto. Its in a really great location, easily walkable to everywhere you want to go. Its situated right in the heart of the nightlife, so if you're looking to go out at night, you wont have to wander far. 

The apartment itself is very modern, clean and comfortable, its quite spacious, we were 4 people and had plenty of space. as a previous reviewer has noted, there isn't air con, so we slept with the windows open. There is quite a bit of street noise, particularly on weekends so thats something to be aware of. It didn't bother us too much though.

Appreciated the use of the wifi as well! Overall a near perfect experience for us.

Excellent séjour chez Abel. L'appartement est très agréable et idéalement placé. A deux pas du quartier le plus animé de Porto.
Nous y reviendrons si nous sommes de retour à Porto.

Great place to stay. Awesome location, near everything in the center o Porto.

Apartment is beautiful, was really clean, great areas and the hosts were very polite, relaxed and flexible.

Recommend 5*.

Hope to return.

We had a very pleaseant staying in Porto in Abel's house. The house was perfect, on a beautiful square in the centre of the city. It's close to all the facilities and full of equipments, with a very nice design. Greatly recommended.

Great Location, Wonderful updated and spacious apartment,  A bit noisy in the small hours of the morning - there is a nightclub district just north of the square, but quiet the rest of the time. Wonderful restaurants nearby.  Easy walking to the main sites of Porto and nice views of the square out the bedroom windows.  There is an underground parking lot directly in front of the building where you can leave your car for 33 euros/24 hours if you need to.  Very convenient.
Be sure you know how to operate both sets of keys and the elevator code to get in and out !!!  The door key sticks a bit and there is a "trick"
Abel is very responsive and his mother, who actually met us at the apartment, very helpful and gracious.

Amazing place - very smart and well presented.  A little noise dose come up from street level overnight, but almost all of the guests slept well (including the 5 month baby).

Great location - easy access to roam around Porto. 

Abel, the host, was fantastic - always trying to help and he even managed to provide a baby bath and cot.

thank you for the great place to stay.
Alles io

Experiencia perfecta.

La madre de Abel estaba esperándonos a la hora acordada. 
El apartamento es muy amplio tiene todas las comodidades necesarias: habitaciones grandes con camas cómodas, cocina completa, televisión, conexión a internet. Moderno y muy bien montado, además de perfectamente situado para visitar la ciudad.

¡Completamente recomendable!

Abel's apartment was amazing, spacious and located in a beautiful square a moments walk from everywhere. We were greeted by his lovely mum who came to give us keys and show us around. Abel was great, quick to respond with any questions we had such as where the nearest laundry was located etc. he also sent info with restaurant  and attractions suggestions.

We were also located a few minutes walk from Galerie de Paris street filled with many interesting night spots and a most incredible bookstore.

I would highly recommend staying there and would definitely return.

Abel's apartment is just amazing ! Very spacious and conformtable, perfectly located in the heart of Porto, clean, just like on the photos. And Abel is welcoming and helpful with his recommandations. I would definitely do this place again !

Our family of 4 stayed comfortably in Abel's apartment and we would recommend this place for it's facilities and location which are all top quality. Abel is easy going and reliable to communicate with and his mother gave us a friendly welcome on arrival. The heating is sufficient for the cold weather which we aren't used to also.Thanks Abel for a great stay :)
Terrific apartment in a central location. Very spacious and modern and Abel has some good tips on where to go and what to see. Highly recommended.

It was a real pleasure staying at this apartment. Modern and well equipped, bright and cozy... And the building itself gives a very safe feeling. Located on a charming little square, and just steps away from some very nice restaurants, bars and shops. We were received by Abel's mom who gave us a quick tour of the place, while Abel provided us with some really useful informations about Porto. The communication went smoothly and quickly. I warmly recommend this place!

Great Host. Abel is very kind and always available! Great Apartament in the best location in Oporto, fully equipped.
Whenever I go to Oporto, this apartment will be the choice.

Thanks Abel! See you soon.
Clean, spacious, right in the middle of downtown. Highly recommended! We loved our stay

What a great place to stay while in Porto! The location was absolutely perfect. We are a family of 4 adults and traveled from Madrid while on vacation. The apartmentwS easy to find and Abel was extremely communicative both before and during our.stay we were met at the apt by a friend of Abel's as he was out of town. It was perfect! 
We parked in parking under the street- a bit pricey but well worth it not to have to deal with a car in a central area. We were able to walk absolutely everywhere, even in the rain!
The apartment itself was extremely roomy and comfortable. We truly could not ask for better or more!
We are well travelled internationally and I cannot give this location/ host high enough praise!
Abels apartment is spacious and comfortable and a short walk from everywhere in the city. The communication with Abel was easy and quick. A perfect aparment for or days in Porto

Excelente apartamento. Corresponde exactamente ao que vem nas fotos. Decoração moderna (estilo IKEA), localização super central, numa das praças mais emblemáticas do Porto, em pela baixa portuense. Dois quartos espaçosos com janelas, uma casa de banho moderna, wifi grátis, televisão. Excelente para dois casais. Recomendo vivamente, uma vez que tem uma ótima relação preço/qualidade, mais competitiva do que um hotel.
L'appart est exactement comme décrit online. La réception et l'aide pendant le séjour excellentes. La localisation est merveilleuse. On y retournera sans aucun doute!

The apartment was lovely. New construction, great space, comfortable beds and furniture.  And the location was amazing -- 5-10 min walk to many sights, with a nice selection of cafes and restaurants right on the square outside the apartment.  Space was clean, and Abel and his mom were extremely attentive hosts.

Wir waren zu viert drei Tage lang in Abels Apartement und sind absolut begeistert: Tolle Lage in einem entspannten und ruhigen Viertel mit vielen Cafés, Bars und Restaurants um die Ecke. Sehr zentral gelegen! 
Die Wohnung ist super eingerichtet und sieht genau so aus wie auf den Bildern dargestellt. Alle Absprachen mit Abel waren sehr angenehm, unkompliziert und zuverlässig. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen!

We spent a week end in Abel's flat, and it was very great!
The apartment is really as shown on the pictures, very bright, clean and pleasant.
Its location was perfect to enjoy the city center.
Great place, great location and impecable house.

This is a big, bright, modern and quiet apartment. We found the central location perfect for our 5 days in Porto- everything was close by (it's near some great restaurants and an excellent cafe and deli) and it also has good transport links to the airport and other places of interest. Abel was a great host and even provided a cot for our baby. We loved the apartment and I'd thoroughly recommend it!
Great apartment in the centre, it was equipped with everything we needed. Would definitely stay there again
Beautiful apartment in the  best section of town!

Our stay in Abel's apartment in Porto was as nice as it could be. We newer met him in person, but always felt his readiness to answer all and any questions and help with  anything we needed. His mother met us in front of the building, showed us around and gave us some useful information. The location of the apartment  overlooking a beautiful square is great: we walked everywhere (and we are grandparents, but maybe fit grandparents). There are a lot of cafes and restaurants in the area and a beautiful famous book store is very near by. The apartment itself is modern, large, very clean and has everything you need for a perfect stay in a beautiful city. The square gets busy on weekend nights: it is pretty common in Europe where people start going out for dinner at 9 PM. But it did not bother us, it was nice to watch young people enjoying themselves. We never felt unsafe or unwelcome there. Thank you, Abel, and all the best to you.

We had a great time on the city and on the aparment thanks to Abel who was always willing to help us with any doubt even though we had a lot of questions and issues, we always answered with a smile and extremely polite mood. 

The apartment is awesome and is near of everything you need to see and know about this beautiful city! don't hesitate and stay on this beautiful modern place with awesome views and perfect location!
Beautiful location in the city center. The apartment is located in a brand new building and is very clean and confortable. The host gave us a lot of suggestions for our staying in Porto
L'appartement est bien situé au cœur de Porto. Spacieux, clair et propre il est très agréable à vivre.
Very, very, highly recommended!!) Nice touch, everything was clean, best location, gladly again!!!))))

The flat is awesome - just as the pictures show. The living room is v spacious, as is the bathroom. There is plenty of storage space, so enough room for everybody. 
V. good contact with the host - it was easy to arrange the keys pickup. 
The flat is in the centre of Porto, so I highly recommend to those who go there for sightseeing. 
The only thing that could be improved are the frames of the single beds,  the mattress holders are not very stable and my friend fell down when she sat on the bed for the first time, later we were careful and no further accidents occured :)

Abel was a great host! The apartment was absolutely incredible - exactly as advertised and in many cases even better than the pictures. Everything was extremely clean, modern and well kept.

The location is as central as it gets - very close to great restaurants and bars in Porto, and a short walk to the river.
Excellent apartment in an equally excellent location, right in the heart of Porto. The apartment was clean, spacious, up-to-date and simply a very pleasant place to stay. I would stay here again.

Abel was helpful and friendly throughout our booking and very organised. Directions were good and it was easy to pick up the keys. The apartment was lovely - in a beautiful square in a great neighbourhood. Apartment was very clean and modern, and very spacious. We couldn't recommend this any higher - really great!

Abel's apartment is wonderful, extremely well situated, close to the major sightseeing spots, cafés and restaurants. We walked from San Bento station which is just 10 minutes away. The apartment is very clean, bright, secure  and spacious. Highly recommended. We're already impatient to go back to Porto and rent the same apartment!

We (family of 2 adults, 2 kids) stayed here 6 nights in June. The apartment is really modern and everything looks brand new, including Bosch appliances and a very nice bathroom. It sits on a small square and is adjacent to a street that is closed to cars and has a lot of shops.

Abel was really easy to work with -- very responsive and accommodating, including providing a crib for our youngest.

We really enjoyed Porto itself and the apartment's location was ideal for allowing us to experience the best of the city, while still being quiet. We left the apartment by foot each day, walking mainly downhill towards the river, and occasionally caught a taxi home (uphill). The location is well known so we had no trouble explaining its location to drivers.

We had deliberately timed our visit to coincide with Festa de São João do Porto which is the biggest party of the year. After midnight fireworks by the river we made our way home and then were "serenaded" at 2am by about 50 drummers in the square outside our window. It was simply awesome and was the perfect end to the day!

Overall, a great stay in every way!

Pro tip: if you head out the back gate of the building, you'll find another small square and the Leitaria da Quinta do Paço, a fantastic bakery/cafe. Check it out!

Apartamento 5 estrelas!
Tudo o que é preciso para uma estadia tranquila e aconchegante.
A juntar á sua localização que é das melhores que se pode ter no Porto.
Por último, o Abel é muito solícito e pronto a ajudar no que for preciso.

Super sleek and modern apartment in a fantastic neighbourhood in Porto!  Abel was a wonderful host.  He was flexible with our check-in and check-out times and even offered a place to store our bags if we were leaving later.  Upon arrival, he gave us a quick tour of the apartment and then offered lots of tips for restaurants and things to see/do.  There were a few maps that we could use which were a nice touch.  He also sent an email with a nice outline of more "must sees" and good information on Porto.  I highly recommend this place!
The apartment is superb, in great location of Porto old town. We enjoyed staying there. Good luck, and hope to return there again!
The apartment was modern, clean, spacious and just as advertised. Communication with Abel was fast, and even when we arrived earlier, he tried to accommodate us. Great experience!

The apartment was great: really pleasant place where to stay with comfort and modernity!
Abel and Co/ were all very responsive and helpful making out stay super pleasant!

Nice and spacious apartment.  It served our family of 5 well. 
The location of the apartment is great. Close to many nice restaurants and shops.

The place was very clean, modern, very spacious, and at a great location. Our expectations were clearly surpassed. Abel (even though we only had contact via sms and email) seems like a nice and very reactive person. Overall we had a great time. Thank you!!

From the start we had perfect communication with Abel. He responded very quickly and accurate. The apartment was as pictured. Very modern, eveything in perfect condition and very well situated in a very lively square. Bakeries around the corner, bars and restaurants all at very close walking distance. The supermarket Pingo Doce was a 10 min walk. Abel helped us ordering  a taxi on a sunday morning when we had to go to a place that didn't connect very well to the Metro.  1 mail was enough for him to organize it. We were very pleased and I would recommend without hesitation.

Nous avons passé un excellent  séjour chez Abel. L'appartement est  très agréable et idéalement placé pour visiter Porto . Le quartier est très sympa et à deux pas, du centre.Il manque juste un peu  d'ingrédients de base pour faire la cuisine.

Bien que n'ayant pas rencontré Abel personnellement, tout c'est bien passé pour notre séjour. Abel est resté très disponible pour nous donner des informations et répondre au plus vite à nos questions. L'appartement est magnifique, idéal pour une famille comme la notre composée de 2 grands ado et de leurs parents ( peut-être moins bien avec de petites enfants, en août, il y a du bruit sur la place ou se trouve l'appartement) . Nos jeunes ont pu partir en exploration seuls. Le quartier est formidable. A deux pas, du centre, nous avons tout visiter à pied. Samedi soir, des jeunes dansaient le ...foxtrot au son de music ragtime sur la place sous nos fenêtres!... Magique!

We had a very great time at Abel's place. We had plenty of room with our two boys (teenagers) and we felt like at home.
The apartment is clear, very comfortable and fully equipped. Everything is clean, modern and well kept.
The apartment location is also great to visit Porto. Bakeries, restaurants, bars, places to be visited are all located at a very close walking distance. The apartment is calm even though a bit noisy in the early hours of the night. It didn't really bother us much but people who are light sleepers might want to know it.
  Abel is a very attentive and easy going host. He is very kind and always available. The communication with him was easy and quick through emails. He gave us information about what we could do during our five days in Porto, and was always ready to help us when needed. We didn't meet him in person but we met his mom who is very friendly too.
We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. If we go back to this town, we'll go there again and we will recommend this place to our friends.

El apartamento es muy nuevo y está muy bien situado (a 10 minutos andando del centro). El apartamento dispone de todas las facilidades para disfrutar de unas vacaciones en Oporto, es muy amplio para 4 personas. Abel es muy buen anfitrión, siempre puso facilidades a nuestra llegada. Nos recomendó buenos sitios para cenar en Oporto.
Ottima accoglienza, ottima posizione, a Porto non c'è di meglio.

Современна, уютная с отличными дизайном квартира в самом центре Порту. Абель - приятнейший молодой человек, все рассказал- показал, зарядил положительными эмоциями. Посоветовал, как лучше провести 2 дня в его городе: места, рестораны. Очень рекомендую. Все лучше, чем я ожидала. Буду рекомендовал друзьям.

We enjoyed very much staying at Abel´s apartment. We were 4 adults and 2 babies. The apartment has plenty of space, in fact our first impression was that it felt bigger than in the pictures. High standards everywhere and very clean. 

The location is perfect. All the main tourist areas are within walking distance. We brought a car with us but still you have several parking possibilities in the neighborhood. There is one parking place right at the door although it is a bit expensive. 

Abel has been a great host since the beginning, answering all our questions very fast. He even left some city maps and a small guide with recommendations for restaurants. 

We recommend it to everybody!!!

Tolle moderne Wohnung in einer super Lage. 
Man läuft ein paar Meter um die Ecke und ist schon mitten in der Stadt. Bäcker, Supermarkt etc. sind auch nicht weit. Kann ich nur weiterempfehlen!

We loved this apartment! It is huge, well set up and very style. Fantastic location etc.
The hosts were outstanding. Really helpful and kind.
The only complaint was we couldn't stay longer as we liked it so much.
Thank you.

The host wasn't there and so a friend of his checked us in.  he didn't speak english or spanish but we were able to communicate well enough.  the apartment speaks for itself and is PHENOMENAL.  There is a night scene around and college kids were going wild with crazy team games that involved some hooting and hollering.  there was a bit of street noise as a result.  it did not bother me in the least.  i like to see action and people having fun and they were in good spirits.  i loved the town and i loved the spot.  highly recommended.
In fact this is the place to be in Porto. Lovely and central area, this is where things happen. Lovely flat well isolated, very clean, just great. Nice interactions with Abel

If you want to go to Porto, there is no better place to stay than with at Abel's apartment. First of all, the location is beyond perfect and there is a gate and codes for the elevator that make you feel very safe. It is walking distance to shops and a cafe right downstairs, and more importantly for me and my budget college friends, we found a grocery store only a few minutes walk away. The apartment itself is beautiful. It is JUST as beautiful as it is in the photos and much larger than you think. The floor plan is very well laid out to have space for our group of 4 to hang out or be able to make phone calls privately in our rooms. I could not ask more of Abel during the trip, he was very helpful and responded very quickly to any of my questions.

Abel's apartment is the perfect location to explore Porto. It's pretty well located in close proximity to all the major sights and also walkable to the river. There are numerous bars and restaurants around (ok, the flip side is that it's a bit noisy at weekend evenings). The apartment is very modern, very clean and spacious - as shown in the photos.
