We did not meet Abel himself, however, he helped to organize a very flexible hand-over of the keys upon arrival and departure with his local contact.
All in all, Abel helped us to have a fantastic weekend in Porto.
Excelente lugar! El piso es muy moderno y espacioso, la cocina y el baño son espectaculares!

We had a great time in Porto. The apartment was great, just like the photos - very spacious, modern, well equipped, bright and clean. It is very conveniently located in walking distance to all the main sites. My family of four, including children ages 7 and 14, found it the ideal place and we felt like at home.
I would recommend it to anyone and would like to stay there again.

Thanks Abel.

superbe appartement, très bien placé, proche des lieux touristiques, mais aussi des (Website hidden by Airbnb) plus, abel est très disponible pour toute (Website hidden by Airbnb) conseille vivement cet appartement.
Gran apartamento en una zona muy céntrica. Nos dejaron cuna y bañera para el bebe. Todo limpio y ordenado. Flexibles para hacer el check in mas tarde. Muy recomendable

The apartment is nicely decorated, spacious and clean. Conveniently located in the city centre and attractions are within walking distance. Host was very responsive to my queries and even emailed a list of places to see/dine. Have enjoyed my entire stay here!

Nous avons fait un très  beau séjour à l'appartement de Abel. L'appartement lui même est magnifique et très bien situé. Nous avons pu visiter la belle ville de Porto à pied. Bref une très bonne expérience. Nous recommandons sans hésitation.
Genial! Ubicación perfecta. El apartamento espacioso, limpio y perfectamente equipado. Repetiría sin duda.
O apartamento de Abel é incrível! Ficamos muito bem instalados e passamos ótimos momentos. Recomendamos fortemente. Ótima localização e estrutura.

Fomos a Porto, um casal e dois filhos (15 e21), fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Abel, que nos esperou para explicar sobre o funcionamento de tudo e nos situar nas redondezas. O apto é grande, cozinha novissima e bem equipada, bem mobiliado, ótimo banheiro, tudo funciona perfeitamente. É confortável e acolhedor, nos sentimos em casa desde o primeiro momento. A localização tambem é ótima, muito próximo a torre dos clérigos e livraria Lelo, numa area muito tranquila e com restaurantes e comercio próximos. Se voltar a Porto será com certeza minha primeira opção ficar nesse apto novamente. Muito obrigado Abel.

Très bel appartement, propre et très calme, dans la ville haute.
Situation idéale pour prendre les transports et pour les visites.
Accueil chaleureux dès notre arrivée.

Ha sido una gran experiencia, el piso es estupendo, con una decoración muy cuidada y en la mejor ubicación, cerca a todo y completamente equipado. Abel es un anfitrión maravilloso, nos ha dado indicaciones y recomendaciones para disfrutar la ciudad, recomendable al 100% y repetiríamos sin dudarlo.

El apartamento estaba situado en una plaza muy céntrica, cerca de comercios, restaurantes, supermercados e incluso una farmacia.Muy bien comunicado. El apartamento mucho mejor que en las fotos,  muy grande y bien decorado. Equipado con todo lo necesario para cocinar, tanto en electrodomésticos como en menaje de cocina. Calefacción en todas las habitaciones, a pesar de ser un apartamento tan grande no hacia frio. La comunicacion con nuestro anfitrión Abel perfecta, cualquier duda era resuelta inmediatamente por email, además de aconsejarnos sobre lugares de interés para visitar. En resumen,  un apartamento fantástico, ha hecho que nuestra estancia en Oporto sea inolvidable,  recomendable a todo el mundo.
It's really an awesome apartment at a great location! Abel is the nicest guy, waited for us, gave us some advice and tips. We really had the best time in Porto!
Maravilloso apartamento, maravillosa ubicación, maravilloso anfitrión...Un absoluto acierto el haber elegido a Abel y su apartamento para nuestra escapada a Oporto....Absolutamente recomendable¡¡
I am really happy that we had the possibility to stay at this amazing apartment. Everything is perfect about it. I cann recommend it 100%. Abel is also a fantastic host and very helpful!

It was a perfect stay in a perfect apartment ! We, 4 girls, enjoyed everything. It's a great apartment for your stay in Porto ! The location is  also perfect. In a few minutes you 're in the centre of Porto.

L'appartement d'Abel est très bien localisé, agréable et propre.
Parfait pour 3 personnes.

Me and my girlfriend had a great time in Porto and especially in this appartment. The appartment has everything one would like during a holiday, it has an unique location and very friendly (and helpful) owner! Thank you Abel, hope to see you next time!

Asunto itsessään paras käyntikortti, erittäin tilava, moderni, siisti, hyvät sängyt, hieno kylpyhuone  sekä lämmitys toimiva. Näkymä makuuhuoneista aukiolle ihana ja ikkunoista mukava seurata kadun elämää. Isäntäperheen tervetulotoivotus keksit ja espressokeitin kahvineen. Tässä voisi majoittua myös pidemmän ajan, koska pesukone sekä täydellinen keittiö, tällä kertaa tyydyimme pelkkään aamiaisen valmistamiseen. Keskeinen sijainti erinomainen, helppo tutustua kaupunkiin kävellen ja siitä huolimatta rauhallinen hyville yöunille.
Abel was very helpful and provided plenty of information about what to see in Porto. The place was really lovely.

This apartment is absolutely perfect! It is located in the center of town and is very spacious and clean. On top of that, Abel was extremely welcoming and helpful - he provided us with restaurant suggestions and "must sees" while we were in Porto. We had a great trip - would certainly stay here again!

Appartement très joli, moderne et confortable. Très bien situé, a 5 mn a pied du centre ville. Les 2 chambres donnent sur la place, donc un peu bruyant le soir. Bien équipé avec lave-linge et sèche-linge et lave vaisselle. Décoration de bon goût.

Just a great place to stay in Porto. The apartment and the view are amazing. Perfectly equipped with all you need. Abel was a great host and was very helpful and easy to communicate with. Also Rosa and Abels Mom were great. We had a wonderful time and will come back again.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cet appartement. il est beau et bien situé, à proximité de nombreux bars et restaurants. Il est dans le centre, et nous avons pu faire toutes nos visites à pied. Abel était très sympathique, et a pris le soin de nous envoyer des conseils de visites.
Seul bémol, l'appartement peut être un peu bruyant les soirs du week-end.

Recomendo fortemente este apartamento caso pretenda visitar o Porto, o apartamento é amplo, moderno, bem decorado e equipado com tudo que um viajante pode necessitar. A localização também é excelente e possibilita conhecer diversos pontos turísticos caminhando ou fazendo uso do metrô. Quanto ao anfitrião só posso ter elogios, uma vez que sempre foi rápido nas respostas e prestou informações úteis em nossas conversas, vale dizer que por um erro meu e reforço que a responsabilidade deste erro foi minha! Acabei por esquecer a chave dentro do apartamento ao contatar o Abel (anfitrião) ele me ajudou a solucionar o caso com muita presteza e agilidade, realmente foi super atencioso!
Great place. Everything was perfect. If you come to Porto you should definitely try to stay in this apartment. Great Location. You won't regret.

My husband and I spent 6 weeks in Porto this spring.  We loved staying in Abel's apartment.  The location could not be better. The apartment is within walking distance to the metro, the train station, bus terminal, the river, awesome restaurants & bars, and if you feel like it, you can leisurely walk 75 minutes to the ocean.  Abel and his Mom are super friendly people.  Everything promised to us before the trip (office chair, weekly cleaning) was taken care of, and when we needed an iron, Abel’s mom bought one and had it at the apartment the next morning.  We loved our visit to Porto.  There are restaurants with good food and friendly service almost everywhere, but we especially loved the ones right behind the apartment, like Moonshine, Trinkas  and Oporto!!

Abel hosted my parents who found him to be extremely helpful and easy going, offering tips and flexible meeting times. 

The apartment is a wonderful location, clean, spacious and well equipped. 

Recommend Abel as a host for Porto.

ótimo anfitrião, gentil e prestativo,localização excelente fizemos tudo a pé, apartamento superou as expectativas, ideal para famílias
Recomendamos
We loved this apartment! It's spacious and well-equipped, with a nice view of the square. The best part is the neighborhood--vibrant, but no busy roads nearby. We would stay here again.
Great location, friendly host and beautiful apartment
The apartment is spacious and clean and the location is also perfect.

A fantastic apartment in a great location! 
The apartment had everything we needed and more. All the best spots in Porto are within walking distance and also surrounded by great restaurants and bars. 
Abel was a great host; giving us fantastic recommendations of things to see and do and even helping us locate them all.
Staying here ensured we saw the best that Porto had to offer and meant that we had an amazing time.

Abel was great, super easy to communicate with, very accommodating for our arrival and departure times.  The apartment was exactly as shown in the pictures and very clean - big and spacious as well.  Great location for getting around the city!
Piso muy limpio, agradable en un barrio muy céntrico. Una acogida muy amable. Muchas gracias Abel, realmente os recomiendo este piso! Muita obrigada.

Really nice, clean and perfectly located appartment. Also receiving/leaving the keys and a short introduction was easy without any problems. All in all nothing to complain - this place can be highly recommended.
Modern and clean in a great location.

Es waren ganz außergewöhnliche  Tage in Porto in einer tollen Wohnung ganz zentral zum Torre Clerigos und zur Buchhandlung Lello. Mit einem tollen Blick auf den Praca Carlos Alberto. 
Abel war ein hervorragender Guide, für den Tipp francesinhas im Cufra zu Essen sind wir ihm besonders dankbar. Ein Erlebnis für sich :)

La casa de Abel es fantástica. Es un piso amplio, iluminado y muy bien situado. La atención de Abel fue en todo momento muy atenta y rápida, así como Riu, que fue el que nos mostró la casa.
En ella tienes todo lo necesario para pasar unos dias. Nos hemos sentido muy cómodos en ella.y lo mejor es que te puedes desplazar a pies desde allí.
Lo único que cambiaría serían las dos camas gemelas de la habitación doble, ya que el colchón es muy fino y se notan las tablas del somier porque las camas son para niños no para adultos.
Volvería sin dudarlo ;)

Abel was right on time at our appointment at his house, he was really kind and nice with us, gave us suggestions about the city, food and neighborhood. He seems really a super fine guy. The place is really lovely, clean, it has all the confort you need for a perfect vacation and it's located in one of the most amazing spots in Porto, nearby all the facilities you might need in your vacation. Nice restaurants and bars just around the corner. I suggest everyone this apartment for a lovely vacation in this beautiful city that is Porto.

The apartment fits its description. It is clean, modern and has everything
that we need. Completely satisfied. Abel was answering all the questions
within minutes. The location is noisy on holiday nights but it was okay
even with the windows slightly open.

Abel's flat is really beautiful, spacious and in an amazing, central location.  Spent enough time in Porto to get to know the city's different areas, and I wouldn't have picked a different location to stay.  Extremely close to pockets of good food & drink (Galeria de Paris and R. Candido dos Reis) with only a short distance to more touristy areas (Duoro, etc.).  Highly recommend Abel's flat.

I highly recommend staying here. It was truly worth every penny and the location was great. Abel is quick to respond and helpful with anything you need. I did not actually get a chance to meet him, but his mother and trustful friends were there to great us and help us.

Pleasant stay in Porto.  Clean and modern apartment as pictured.  Central location and close to everything.  Abel responds quickly to emails and is willing to offer solutions.  Look no further.  Book here.
I made the reservation at the last minute> Absolutely no difficulties. Got the keys to the apartment as arranged.  Very clean spacious flat. All features worked perfectly.

Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Abel. Instead an old man came and show us the house. He was ok. The house was great, central, and beautiful. It helped us having a great time in Porto. We didn't like that the check out was so soon since we were there to celebrate my birthday. But we had a great weekend.

Rose and Abel were both lovely hosts. Very helpful with recommendations of restaurants/bars/sight seeing/beaches. The house is absolutely gorgeous. Very close to everything! Especially trindade metro which will take you everywhere :) thanks again for a lovely stay

Great clean and spacious apartment in a brilliant location. Stumble out the door to cafes and bars and within walking distance of most things. 

Very understanding when we were arrived a little late. Simple instructions and correspondence made it a joy.

This was a lovely apartment with all the amenities we needed. The location was central and very convenient, and once we learned the nuances of parking, it was great. Our host was always responsive and met us at our convenience, which we really appreciated. We were able to enjoy a wonderful visit to this beautiful city. Thank you!
This was a really great flat, very clean, tidy and spacious. Everything was within a 20 minute walk and it was right next to lively nightlife. We had a great trip to Porto staying here!

Abel's place speaks for itself, this is an incredible apartment. It is very well designed and spacious. The building is situated in a very charming plaza with restaurants, bakery and local shops. The location is perfect, 10 minutes to the river on foot.

Check-in process is flawless. Communication was made well in advance to coordinate meeting time in front of building.

Almost everything you need is provided for in the apartment.

I was travelling with my two kids and found that the bar up the street did attract some noisy types from 2 to 4 am. Having said that, if I was travelling sans kids I'd surely be hanging out in the bar - it looked like a fun spot.

Anyhow, i'd recommend Abel's place to anyone looking for 5 star accommodations at a 3 star price.
A lovely apartment in a great location. Thank you very much Abel and Rose

Superbe séjour dans l'appartement d'Abel situé en plein centre de la ville. L'appartement est tous ce que nous attendions, moderne, grand, super bien situé, cosy et propre! Il se situe dans un quartier vivant et à deux minutes à pieds des deux principales rues très appréciées des nuits de Porto! Un peu bruyant la nuit mais on peu pas tout avoir;-) Vous pourrez prendre votre petit déjeuner au café juste en bas de l'immeuble avant de commencer vos visites à pied! L'arrêt de métro Trindade se trouve qu'à 10min a pied et vous permet de rejoindre l'aéroport très facilement au pire si vous avez des grosses valises vous prenez un taxi jusqu'à Trindade (5min) et c'est réglé!

Great apartment! Very well equiped, new and clean! The location is great as well with the rooms looking to the Praça Carlos Alberto, which is nice itself and its very near the rest of the city centre. We would definitely recommend it for anyone visiting Porto!

El apartamento está en una magnífica ubicación para moverte por todas las zonas de Oporto. Es muy cómodo y práctico, perfecto para unos días de vacaciones incluso con niños pequeños. Al tener estructura tipo loft es genial. La cocina está equipada y puedes organizarte perfectamente los horarios. En los alrededores hay varios cafés y restaurantes estupendos, además de un parking en la puerta y acceso a todos los transportes. Lo recomiendo y volvería sin duda.
Hemos pasado unos días magníficos recorriendo Oporto.

The apartment is as described.  It was large, clean, and the location was great (close to sightseeing, restaurants, and shopping).  Abel and Rose were easy to work with and provided information about the area. I would recommend this place to friends and I would stay there again.

The flat was as beautiful as pictures show and it was located at the heart of the city. The big windows in the bedrooms offered you a great view of a lovely square. THE flat was really big, well decorated and perfectly equipped. We hardly recommend it

L'appartement est superbe, contemporain et bien situé.
Il est au deuxième étage avec le côté chambres donnant sur une place assez calme.  Il est extrêmement bien sécurisé.
Abel n'était pas là et malheureusement, Rose qui le remplaçait n'a pas eu beaucoup de temps à nous consacrer à notre entrée.
Le gros électroménager était présent et de bonne qualité.
Nous avons eu 24h de perte totale de réseau et n'avons jamais su pourquoi.
Mais l'appartement est vraiment beau et assez grand pour que 4 personnes y cohabitent sans se sentir à l'étroit.
Isabelle

La descripción y las fotos del apartamento reflejan con precisión la realidad. Resulta cómodo y su ubicación en una plaza agradable y con aparcamiento público a la puerta es estupenda para una visita turística.

Abel was very easy to deal with and although he wasn't there for the check-in, the person in charge made it very easy for us to get in the apartment and the keys.

The place is amazingly well located. We literally walked everywhere we wanted and had some good restaurants and bars nearby. 

The apartment is very spacious, modern but a lot of cheap items were used to furnish it. The beds were ok, but the pillows very uncomfortable, the kitchen is complete but again a few details made it for us not a perfect stay. 

Wifi was good. Washing machine too. Bathroom amazing, although the door did not lock. Extremely safe building. Overall great stay! Thanks Abel

Abel's apartment is gorgeous, nicely decorated and perfectly situated to visit the city of Porto. Abel wasn't there to welcome us, but the check-in was perfect thanks to Rose! Only issue, some noise at night in the bedrooms coming from the nice square in front of the apartment! Overall, would recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to visit Porto!
Great apartment, amazing location and friendly host!
I only stayed for one night, but it was a nice place in a great location, and it was super easy to coordinate with the host. Thanks, Abel!

Abel's flat is modern, clean, safe, and very well located in the middle of everything (famous Lello bookstore <10 min; Majestic cafe 12 min, Ribeira 20 min), with paid parking closeby (if a bit expensive).  

His colleague Rose met us, and they were flexible with our arrival and departure times (thanks!).  They were responsive and easy to communicate with before and during our stay.  The flat was easy to find, easy to access, secure and had plenty of space for our family of 3 (1 bedroom with a double bed, the other with 2 single beds).  Lots of food and drink options immediately outside (and the soundproof windows are a nice feature given the popularity of that neighbourhood at night).  We highly recommend the restaurant right next door, Andor Violeta, for innovative and tasty food at a good price. 
Thanks Abel and Rose!

logement à proximité de tous les commerces et lieux à visiter. pas besoin de voiture pour les visites .
quartier beau et agréable.
Tres bien recu.
TRES belles prestations.

We stayed at Abel's apartment for three days and it was an excellent experience. His colleague Rose was very helpful when she welcomed us and easy to communicate with. The apartment is very spacious, clean and has everything you need for a nice holiday.
The location of the apartment is excellent as well, close to many bars and restaurants, and easy to reach with public transport from the airport.

Abel's place was very nice, clean, convenient and fantastic location
near the university for exploring Porto. Check in and communication were great. The only negative was some noise from people partying into the early hours from the square below.

Great stay at Abel's apartment - fab location over looking a lovely square, only around the corner from "Lion's Square" and the beautiful Livaria Lello book shop.  The apartment is modern and amazingly spacious, bright and airy - looks just like it did in the photos! We spent lots of time at the window just watching the Porto life go by!

Abel and Rose were really helpful both before and during check in. Rose helped us solve our baggage problem on the day of check in as we arrived first thing in the morning and so she advised us that there were lockers at Trindad station.  Happily the apartment was available earlier than expected and Abel was on hand to check us in - he was super friendly with great recommendations on places to see and eat.  There were also some great spots to eat right near the flat: Andor Violeta immediately next door and the gorgeous Camafeu a couple of doors up.

We had only a couple of complaints: (i) the nighttime noise on the square - as others have mentioned it can get loud, especially at weekends and there were a couple of nights we either could not get to sleep or found ourselves woken up due to the loud football fan-style singing; and (ii) the beds were a little uncomfortable - especially the single beds.

That notwithstanding, I would not hesitate on recommending this apartment and would definitely book again!  Thanks so much for sharing your lovely apartment with us Abel (and for all of your help Rose!).

Jules & Family

Wir wurden von Abel's Mutter zur verabredeten Zeit freundlich empfangen. Sie gab uns Tipps für Einkaufen und Restaurants.
Die schriftliche und telefonische Kommunikation mit Abel/Rose war stets schnell und freundlich.
Die Wohnung entspricht die Fotos. Sie ist geräumig, schlicht und sauber.
Die Nachbarschaft ist lebendig mit Restaurants und Läden. Die Wohnung ist für viele Attraktionen Portos sehr zentral gelegen.

We werden verwelkomt door Mr Rui die ons enthousiast een rondleiding gaf door het mooie, ruime appartement. Het appartement ligt op loopafstand van bezienswaardigheden en winkels, een ideale locatie voor een weekeinde Porto. We hadden problemen met de douche en Mr Rui probeerde ons daar zo goed mogelijk mee te helpen. We hebben een fijn verblijf gehad.

Excellent large apartment,in an ideal location in Porto.Very clean,light and bright with good wifi,close to numerous restaurants and bars.
Key exchange was very good,communication was excellent.
A very pleasant stay in an ideal part of Porto.

The apartment was located in a really great central location which made it really easy to get to bars and main attractions. Hosts were really accommodating regarding our late night (and delayed) arrival. Only thing to note is be sure to have them show you how to open the apartment front door - it can be tricky unless you know the technique!

Apartamento perfecto, como se ve en las fotos. Muy bien situado y muy amables.

Repetiré cuando vuelva a Oporto, 100% recomendable.

l'appartement d'Abel est très spacieux, bien placé au centre de PORTO.
La place reste un peu bruyante la nuit...
nous avons été bien accueilli par Mr RUIS et Rosa par téléphone
logement agréable !

El apartamento está muy bien situado, cerca de la mayor parte de puntos de interés y de la zona de bares y restaurantes. 
Es muy amplio, limpio y con todo lo necesario para disfrutar de una agradable estancia.
No tuvimos el placer de conocer personalmente a Rose y Abel pero Rose estuvo muy pendiente por teléfono y siempre que lo necesitamos estaba ahí para atendernos. 
El único "problemita" que tuvimos, por llamarle de alguna manera, fue con la puerta del apartamento porque tiene truco para abrirla.
En resumen, apartamento muy recomendable.

The listing description was accurate, and the neighborhood was great.  We were very convenient to many sites we visited regularly, and there were plenty of restaurants and coffee shops in the area.  Rose met us upon our arrival, and made us feel very welcome.  We felt very safe and the property was very secure.  We had a beatiful view outside our window.  The apartment was modern, nicely decorated and had all the amenities that we needed.

pas déçue par le logement, quartier très central et agréable, nous n'avons pas rencontré les propriétaires mais la description était conforme, très propre.

nous recommandons cette location

Nice welcome, apartment is clean and spacious. Modern but no  charming. Location is good : bars and restaurants all around.
Bad point for me was the apartment organization : bedrooms windows are facing the main square outside. it is noisy in weekend nights. On the contrary, living room is on the backside of the building and you keep curtains on windows : light and view are missing from my point of view. Last, welcome was nice and on time.

El apartamento esta perfectamente situado en una céntrica y preciosa plaza. Muy cerca de la casa hay infinidad de restaurantes y cafeterías.
El apartamento es muy moderno, muy amplio, decorado con muy buen gusto y perfectamente equipado. Los muebles son cómodos (sofás, camas) y la limpieza es absoluta. Un lugar perfecto para conocer la sorprendente ciudad de Oporto y disfrutar de sus rincones y de su estupenda (y baratísima) oferta gastronómica.
Como puntos negativos, el hecho de no poder entrar al apartamento hasta las 15h y tener que abandonarlo a las 12h. (afortunadamente, en la cercana estación de Trindade hay servicio de consigna). Al llegar, la información no fue del todo completa por lo que tuvimos que llamar dos veces, para que nos dijeran como funcionaban la televisión y la calefacción. La cafetera no funcionaba.
A pesar de estos pequeños  detalles, el apartamento es muy recomendable y sin duda repetiremos en futuras visitas a Oport (Website hidden by Airbnb)

This is a lovely spacious apartment in an excellent central location, we found everything we wanted to see was within walking distance. Check in was well organised and there were no issues with us arriving quite late at 00:15, this is an excellent place to stay and see the city.

el apartamento es grande , luminoso , decorado muy bonito y muy céntrico y a la vez muy tranquilo, aunque hay varios restaurantes, bares...en los alrededores. nos gustó mucho la plaza donde está y hay un parking en la misma plaza. Lo único, del parking, es que si no llegas a un acuerdo el día que llegas, cobran 32 euros al día. Nosotros tuvimos que negociarlo el día que nos íbamos, y nos lo acabaron dejando en 15

Passamos este ano o réveillon em Porto. Foram 5 dias muito bem hospedados no apartamento do Abel. O apartamento é bastante confortável e muito central, perto de supermercado, bares e restaurante e muito próximo do centro e dos principais pontos turísticos, isso facilitou muito a nossa locomocão. Conhecemos Porto andando muito.  Infelizmente o Abel não pode nos receber mas tinha designado alguém muito simpático para nós receber. Este senhor nos explicou todo o funcionamento da casa e nos deu dicas de passeios e restaurantes. Abel é um maravilhoso anfitrião. Muito gentil e querido sempre respondendo prontamente os meus emails.
Muito obrigada Abel por compartilhar sua casa conosco. Eu, meu Marido e filhos nos sentimos em casa. Espero poder retornar a Porto e com certeza ficaremos hospedados novamente neste apartamento. E quem sabe desta vez possamos conhecer a Rosé e o Abel.

Abel is a great host. The house is clean, big and comfortable. Unfortunately the weather was not good during our stay but staying at home was not a problem because we had everything we need! Thanks Abel

Abel's apartment was amazing. Located in an amazing area, everything was in walking distance. We were greeted by Rose who showed us around the apartment. We couldn't get the heater working so Abel came to the apartment to show us how to work it. Communication with Abel and Rose was very prompt. Thank you for having us. Will definitely stay at Abel's apartment next time we come to Porto.

The location of the place is perfect! Right in a vibrant area with lot's of nice restaurants, bars and some musea and just a small walk from the old town. The appartment itself is really nice and modern. Would definitly recommend staying here!

Appartement bien situé.
Spacieux et fort agréable. Je recommande. Le voisinage y est discret. On se sent trop vite chez soi ✔️ ;-)
Merci

It was a great experience staying at Abel's apartment. He is very kind and helpful. The apartment is very comfortable, spacious, clean and close to amenities.  

I will definitely come back!

A simpatia e disponibilidade foram a cereja no topo do bolo. O apartamento além de ser bem localizado foi exactamente aquilo que estávamos à espera. Fomos ao Porto em trabalho e mesmo assim conseguimos relaxar no fantástico apartamento proporcionado pelo Abel.

Muito bom =)
apartamento bem confortável e muito bem localizado!

Spacious apartment, with perfect location. We had everything close by, and it was a great place to stay :) Abel was really friendly, and told us some tips for the city. The apartment was clean and moderne.

A localização da casa é perfeita para quem quer conhecer o Porto a pé. Estamos perto de tudo: desde dos pontos principais da cidade, como de bons restaurantes e junto aos bares noturnos - Dada a boa isolação da casa a vida noturna em nada ouve-se dentro de casa. O Abel recebeu-nos muito bem, muito afável e pronto a fornecer-nos dicas da cidade.

O anúncio da casa foi ao encontro da nossa experiência.

The apartment was really nice. It has a small private courtyard and an elevator. It's a great space with an open kitchen. It is a pitty that the living room is not at the back of the house cause that is where the vieuw of the square is. We could not get the heat to work but that was okay. We had a great local diner just around the corner. The supermarket is at the end of the street. The location is great! The neighbourhood is so nice. We parked our rental car at a nearby parking and then it was just a short walk. Ana was there to welcome us and gave us map of the city and showed us some places the recommended. We have a really nice stay. Thank you!
Very accurate listing. The apartment was in a very centrally located area that was easily accessible to everywhere in Porto. Would definitely book this place again.

El viaje ha sido perfecto! La casa tal cuan en las fotos, grande, espaciosa y limpia! La localización inmejorable en pleno centro y a pocos minutos andando de un supermercado. Además en apenas 15 minutos estabas en la ribeira donde habían muchos bares con vistas al Duero y al puente de Luis I. A pesar de no tener parking, justo en la entrada del piso hay uno privado que si regateas un poco al señor que hay te puede salir bastante bien, a nosotros nos salió por 15€ el día. Darle las gracias a Abel & Rose por su amabilidad durante todo la estancia!

Très bel appartement, parfaitement situé. 
L'équipement est de qualité, la propreté irréprochable. 
Sécurisé avec digicode et au second étage. 
Le seul point négatif pourrait être la place un peu bruyante la nuit  ( oui oui,même en février ! ).
Très bon logement, situé en plein centre de porto. Très bon séjour.
Excelente recepción, espacio moderno y edificación reciente, Abel y Rosa fueron unos estupendos anfitriones y el apartamento está ubicado en una zona central pero tranquila.

Très bel appartement, spacieux et confortable ! Idéalement placé ! 
Un séjour parfait !

Bei der Reisevorbereitung war uns Abel immer hilfreich.Abel hat uns sehr nett empfangen am späten Abend noch und uns noch einige gute Tipps bezüglich der Stadt und Land gegeben. Wie haben eine sehr schöne und saubere Wohnung  vorgefunden. Wir können die Wohnung nur weiterempfehlen und würden sie auch gerne selber demnächst noch einmal mieten.
Herzlichen Dank an Abel

La experiencia ha sido muy buena. La casa está en plena zona céntrica por lo que no tuvimos ningún problema en desplazarnos. El piso es muy amplio y luminoso y las camas son muy cómodas.
A la llegada nos recibieron muy amablemente y nos mostraron qué lugares ver y eso se agradece mucho.
Viajaba con gente que siempre se había alojado en hotel y seguro que vuelven a repetir!

We had a fantastic time at this flat.! Rose met us and explained everything clearly which was great. The flat is modern,light,quiet and very well equipped. Lots of storage space for your clothes and perfect location right in the centre of town. I would truly recommend this place for your stay in Porto.!!

Ons verblijf in Porto was superfijn. Het appartement van Abel en Rose is ruim, proper en praktisch ingericht. We werden goed ontvangen door Rose; zij gaf ons bruikbare tips voor ons verblijf in Porto. Het appartement ligt in een toffe, zeer centraal gelegen studentenbuurt. De sfeer is er tof. Onze drie dagen waren goed gevuld met interessante uitstappen, allemaal op wandelafstand, en lekker eten en drinken dat in Porto een pak voordeliger is dan bij ons in België. Kortom een ideale citytrip. Voor herhaling vatbaar.

Appartement idéalement situé pour découvrir le centre de Porto à pied; très spacieux et moderne mais peu adapté à des vacances avec des enfants : les chambres donnent sur une place très animée la nuit et donc très bruyante. Il est compliqué d'y cuisiner par manque d'ustensiles et de couverts.

Magnifique appartement, spacieux et bien équipé.
Très bien situé pour tout visiter à pied.
Merci à Rose et Abel

Mooi en ruim appartement in het centrum van Porto op loopafstand van zowel metrostation Trindade als de meeste bezienswaardigheden. Legio restaurantjes in de nabije omgeving. Bakker aan de overkant van de straat en supermarkt op 5 minuten lopen. Kortom en prima uitvalsbasis voor een heerlijk verblijf in Porto.
Appartamento bem situado na cidade do Porto, limpo e com todo o conforto necesario para uma estadia perfeita. Vou recommendar os appartamento do Abel. Obrigado por tudo.

This is a wonderful apartment in Porto. The check in was smooth: Rose (who helps Abel out) was very accommodating when we arrived earlier than planned and she was sure to show us everything we needed and give some restaurant recommendations. The apartment is large, comfortable and spacious, and in a fantastic location - possible to walk everywhere we wanted to go and in a cool area with great shops/cafes/restaurants. It was incredibly clean.

Abel and Rose, who are in charge of the flat, were very approachable and reliable. Communication with them both before and during the stay was hassle-free, and the check-in process went smoothly. The flat itself, which looked like a place specially furnished for tourist accommodation, is in an excellent location, at a small square very close to the centre of town and not too far from public transport (several hundred metres from metro line E, which links the centre with the airport, via Trindade station). It is quite spacious and fitted out in a modern style, with all requisite amenities. I particularly appreciated the fast internet connection. The water flow in the shower was also excellent (which is not always the case even in some posh hotels). All in all, a good place to stay if you need two separate bedrooms and a living room.

It's perfect place for me to stay in Porto. Rosa is very kind. House is very clean and comfortable, great location. She explained to me where the market is on the map. I really enjoy staying in this house.

Abel was a really good host, and was able to accommodate our really late arrival! He communicated really well-from pre-booking to the actual stay and gave us really good recommendations for restaurants. 
The flat was really clean and exactly as described. It was very spacious for 4 people. The location was also perfect, everything was within 15 mins walk. There are plenty of cafes and restaurants right outside. 
I would definitely recommend the apartment, and would stay again if I was back on Porto.

Everything was perfect in that spacious and clean apartment! It's like in the pictures and perfectly located to explore Porto! Thank you also for the cool tips where to go for dinner and for the delicious Portwine tasting place!

Abel's apartment is spacious, modern, and very centrally located. It was exactly as described on the web. Thereis an underground carpark just in front which operates 24 hours and it of a modern design with comfortable access ramps. Abel was on time for the checkin and together with his friend were most helpful with guiding me to a temporary unloading area for my luggage. We enjoyed our stay very much. Tips for the next user: must close the windows facing the square very tight, as it can get very noisy even past midnight when people passing talked loudly without any awareness of making too much noise. Suggestion for Abel: the apartment is well equipped overall but a kettle for making tea or hot water 
would be useful.

Excellent communication before we checked in and thorough tour upon arrival. The flat was great and exactly as shown in the photos. Lovely, spacious and ideal for two couples. Excellent location - couldn't have been better.

We were met by Rose at check-in and she explained everything we needed to know. The owners were available during our stay to address any questions that came up. The location of this place is fantastic. It really is walking distance from nearly everything you'd want to see (and at the very least, close to transportation that can get you there). We had a wonderful stay in Porto!

Dear Abel,  this has been a great stay. Your apartment is very nice and really ideally located. And your advices always wise: restaurants, places to visit like the Grahams graves, all spots that you have recommended were really good.
Best
Françoise & Luc

Adoramos o apartamento, é muito bom !  Espaçoso, moderno, com todas condições necessárias e no centro da cidade (andamos sempre a pé) !! O Abel e a Rose foram muitos prestáveis durante a nossa estadia!! A Recomendar !! Obrigada

Photos don't do justice to it. It's very spacious and cozy, makes you want to stay inside instead of exploring Porto :)

The location is unbelievable, we went almost everywhere by foot even though we had 2 children with us (aged 7 and 5).

O Anfitrião foi muito atencioso, prestável e simpático. A localização  é excelente e o apartamento corresponde à descrição, super cómodo, limpo e aconselho vivamente. Se pretende conhecer o Porto, estando no centro e próximo de tudo, este é o sítio ideal.

This apartment is in an absolute dream location - within easy walking distance of Porto's most beautiful sights and best bars. It was our first visit to the city and we completely fell in love with it.
Rose was a great help to us when we arrived, coming to find us when we got hopelessly lost and giving us lots of tips for things to do in the area.
The beds were comfy, apartment bright and airy, and the open plan living space was great for our sociable little group. 
We really couldn't fault our stay!
Todo perfecto
El piso está genial. La ubicación es inmejorable y las habitaciones dan a una plaza con mucho encanto. Repetiría sin duda. Muchas gracias por todo Abel y Rose, hemos estado como en casa.
Apartamento agradável, amplo, no centro da cidade.

The flat is absolutely like you can see in the Fotos.  Enough Space, clean, hell and top located (you can go by Walk everywhere). During the Night there are lot of People partying outside and you can hear everything. A better Windows Isolation would help a lot.

Porto is a lovely city with a charming atmosphere, good food and wine! Abel & rose flat is just beautiful and well located ! And going to the beach (espinho) by train in only 25min from the city center was just perfect !

Le logement correspond tout à fait à la description de l'annonce. Il est très agréable. Difficile d'être mieux situé dans Porto. Tous les sites peuvent être visités à pied sans problème. Le quartier est super et on y trouve de nombreux restaus et bars très sympas. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'accueil d'Abel, les renseignements qu'il nous a fourni à notre arrivée et le service rendu pour le stationnement.

Superbe appartement, situé dans un quartier chic de Porto non loin de bars sympas. Nous avons été très bien reçus par Abel et Rose. Appartemment adapté à une famille ou amis. Pour mon prochain voyage à Porto je n'hésiterai pas à y retourner !

Bon accueil, bonne disponibilité. 
Appartement agréable situé dans un quartier sympa.
Tout le centre historique de Porto est accessible à pied.
Petit bémol : l'isolation phonique côté chambres

Abel, was real nice and we had a good communication before and during the stay. 
The apartment has a great location in the best area in Porto. The apartment is big and well equipped. 
Totally worth a stay
Ottima esperienza, la casa è bella e comoda, in centro, Abel ė molto disponibile

Gut gelegen und sehr sauber und neu.
Gerne wieder
Hemos estado muy a gusto en la casa. La ubicación es perfecta para conocer Oporto.
We stayed in this appartment for 3 nights and really liked it. It's close to everything and in a great location. I can recommend it to everyone. The welcome was very nice and of great help

The apartment is extremely spacious and comfortable...and very clean.  Plenty of closet space if you plan to stay a while.  The bathroom is sleek, modern and large.  We loved the fact that the building is located in a piazza or square.  I had been to Porto before and knew the location.  It's perfect! There are several restaurants and cafes in and around the square.  And in the evening you can walk just a few blocks to the bars and nightclubs. The major sites are within walking distance.

A big plus about the apartment is that there's an elevator in the building.  If you have a lot of luggage, it's perfect.

Fatima was so sweet and hospitable.  She was available to answer questions and help whenever we needed it.   

If we are ever back in Porto again, we'll book here.  Loved it!

What can you say after so many amazing reviews? Only spent a night there before flying home and abel was very kind and accommodating.  The apartment was clean and gorgeous, wish I could have spent more time there! Thanks again!

This is a lovely, bright, clean and comfortable flat in an excellent location.
There are plenty of places to eat and to drink nearby, the flat overlooks a square where people congregate and hold activities. 
The location is near many of the places visitors and locals visit, especially the ones away from the major rip-off tourist haunts. It is also well served by public transport.
We were contacted by Fatima who was charming and helpful. We definitely recommend this flat to others.

Mooi appartement op een prachtige plek in Porto. Veel op loopafstand, en in de directe omgeving restaurantjes en mooie bezienswaardigheden. tramhalte dichtbij. Wij waren met mijn wat oudere ouders en daarvoor was de lift ideaal. Inrichting van het appartement ook goed. mooie badkamer, keuken en lekkere banken om te relaxen. Ook nog lekker buiten op de galerij van het gebouw gezeten. Wij hadden wel last van het geluid buiten, m.n. omdat het studenten introductieweek was. De twee eenpersoonsbedden waren wat onconfortabel vanwege de dunnen matrassen. En we misten een koffiezetapparaat. In de winkelstraat nog maar even een filter gekocht. De keuken was zowiezo wat matig geoutilleerd.
Our host was very welcoming and provided excellent information on local things to see and do.  The apartment is very well located and was very clean.  Highly recommended
O apto é muito bom, está bem equipado e localizado em uma ótima região. A nossa estadia foi ótima. A nossa anfitriã, Fátima, foi muito amável e prestativa.
Everything was amazing. Amazing location and beautiful apartment.

Superbe appartement, agréable, lumineux et très bien placé au coeur du centre de Porto. Léger bruit nocturne sur la place juste en dessous lié à à l'avantage d'être en hypercentre. Amélioration possible de la literie mais non derangeant pour un court séjour.
Notre hôte à été fort sympathique et disponible pour nous indiquer des sites importants à visiter durant notre week end portugais. Elle nous a également prêté sa carte de parking nous évitant une note exorbitante.
Really nice apartment in a great location! Loved our stay there.. Fatima the host was very nice and helpful :)

Super mooi appartement, heel centraal gelegen. Het appartement is mooi schoon en lekker ruim. Goede communicatie vooraf met Fatima en Abel heeft bij aankomst tips gegeven voor leuke restaurantjes. Hele vriendelijke host. 
Alles op loopafstand. Wij waren met 4 vrienden, echt een aanrader! Dichtbij het uitgaangsgebied
Tijdens het verblijf mailde Fatima nog om ons een goede reis naar huis te wensen, heel attent. Porto is een hele leuke stad. .

Appartement très bien situé pour visiter Porto. Quartier très agréable avec commerces et petits restaurants sympathiques. 
Accueil ponctuel et très aimable. L'hôte nous a indiqué les lieux à visiter sur une carte.
Parfait
great place and location. very recommended!
Apartamento  lindo, muito limpo e agradável.
Fatima was an excellent host. The apartment is amazing, so confortable and located in a good area full of restaurants and nice bars. We recomended 100%

La casa e' molto bella ed anche l ubicazione e' perfetta. Purtroppo abbiamo perso molto tempo a raggiungerla causa manifestazione, c'era una grande festa degli studenti e le strade erano bloccate. A Porto se si e' in centro la macchina veramente non serve, rappresenta un costo inutile. 
La casa e' moderna e confortevole con due ampie camere un bellissimo open space. 
Consigliatissima!

Très bien accueilli par Fatima qui nous a conseillé pour différentes visites et découvertes pendant notre séjour.
Appartement très central et situé dans un quartier agréable et très vivant ....même la nuit (un peu bruyant certaines nuits).
Point de départ idéal pour visites à pied.
Appartement moderne ,agréable et fonctionnel.

Отличное расположение, все в пешей доступности (включая супермаркет). Очень хорошие апартаменты. Светлые, просторные, есть все необходимое. Никаких посторонних звуков, запахов. Хозяйка встретила, все рассказала, ответила на все вопросы. Рекомендую.
Fabulous apartment in a great location. Abel was a great host and recommended some lovely restaurants nearby. We had a fantastic stay!

Superbe appartement spacieux dans un immeuble rénové moderne, ambiance loft, tout équipé, propre, les photos correspondent à la réalité, donne sur une petite place charmante. Merci beaucoup à Fatima pour son accueil. On recommande sans hésiter !

Lovely large apartment and a great location to the main sites in Porto. Abel and Fatima were very accommodating including booking us a taxi for return journey. There is a bar below the apartment which was a bit noisy on the weekend but otherwise a fab place for our short weekend break.

Stop looking for an apartment in Porto! You have just found the best one so book it! :)
The apartment is huge and really bright. Kitchen is fully equipped so you can cook whatever you want. 
The view on a sunny square is what you want to see when you wake up! 
Location is perfect, the apartment is in the heart of Porto.

I really enjoyed the stay the apartment was comfortable and had everything we required. The apartment is very centrally located very close to many of the tourist attractions. And Able and Fatima were always available to help answer any questions.
La estancia en el apartamento ha sido genial. La ubicación es perfecta en pleno corazón de Oporto. El apartamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos y las vistas geniales. Repetiremos sin duda.
Superb location, nice, modern and comfortable house. Very spacious too. Although we had a brief one night stay but we enjoyed it very much! Obrigado. :)
Uma boa opção para a família.

El alojamiento es perfecto, tal y como aparece en las fotos, muy limpio, espacioso y cuidado, con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. Muy buen Wifi y buena calefacción, además los dueños genial, buena comunicación.
 La ubicación es ideal, en pleno centro, a un paso de todo.
Cuando vuelva a Oporto repetiré seguro.
Hay justo debajo un parking, si se hace la reserva por internet sale a 15 euros diarios.
Location is perfect! Everything is at walking distance. Very clean and very nice hosts. Could not be better!

Excelente apartamento, muito bem montado, banho delicioso, roupa de cama muito boa, com calefação (detalhe importante no inverno, na outra casa alugada pelo nosso grupo tinha aquecedores portáteis, mas a infra elétrica não aguentou quando ligaram, então tem mas não dá para usar). 
A localização é muito boa. É central mas sem o burburinho das áreas mais congestionadas. Facílimo se deslocar para todos os pontos do Centro Histórico.
O estacionamento ao lado é super caro, mas é possível deixar o carro na Estação São Bento, que é muito mais barato. Acredite, em Porto o carro é desnecessário. Dá para andar ou se locomover com as diferentes opções que a cidade oferece!

Todo estupendo, el piso es ideal, Fatima encantadora.
Muy recomendable
The appartment is nice, big and clean and the location is perfect to explore the great city of Porto
The place is huge and very nice. Lots of place for bigger family or company. Location was very good for us and we enjoyed the stay a lot. Definitely would stay there my next trip as well!

We've spent 3 wonderful days in the beautiful Porto! The apartment is clean and very comfortable and the location is perfectly suitable to appreciate the center of the town and to reach the Douro's riverside which is adorable ! Great Fatima's advise to reach Matosinhos where we've had a fantastic fresh fish grilled lunch in a "family driven taverna". We will strongly recommend your apartment to our friends! Thank you

El piso es genial, tal y como se ve en las fotos. Muy amplio y muy limpio. Está situado en pleno centro de la ciudad, se llega a todos los sitios andando. Si hubiera que poner alguna pega es que las camas son de las finitas, aunque son cómodas. Estuvimos muy bien en el piso y si volvemos alguna vez repetiríamos seguro.
Très bel appartement, spacieux, moderne, et surtout très central ! C'est un excellent point de départ pour visiter la ville et profiter de l'ambiance nocture de PORTO
Great apartment, centrally located...all major sights accessible on foot. Abel & Fatima are GREAT hosts, we will definitely visit again!

4 jours à porto en famille et nous avons pu faire tout le tour de la ville à pied. Apparemment très bien situé, près des commerces, restaurants et des bars. Très spacieux pour 4 personnes. Je recommande!
Apartamento ótimo, perfeita Localização, anfitriões muito atenciosos, ambiente perfeito para quem quer conhecer o Porto!
Todo estupendo
I strongly recommend this apartment. The host was really friendly and the place is well localized and comfortable. Porto became one of my favorite places in Europe and part of this was the stay
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは最高です｡歩いて1､2分でｸﾚｺﾞﾘｽの塔やﾘﾌﾞﾗﾘｱ･ﾚﾘｮなどの人気ｽﾎﾟｯﾄがあります｡部屋は広くて清潔､ｷｯﾁﾝや多ﾁｬﾝﾈﾙｹｰﾌﾞﾙﾃﾚﾋﾞなどの設備は最新で素晴らしいものでした｡ｺｽﾄﾊﾟﾌｫｰﾏﾝｽが高い宿だと思います｡

Appartement spacieux, moderne et très agréable pour 4 personnes. Idéalement placé nous avons profité pleinement de Porto en nous baladant toute la journée à pied sans prendre le métro ! Je le recommande vivement cet appartement et merci à toute l'équipe pour leur accueil.
It's has been an awesome stay. The apartment is as shown in the pictures, it's clean (the microwave and the oven could have been cleaner)  and centric. I'd recommend it.
Very Nice flat. Lot of Space and very useful. Well located .

Fantastic location perfect for all the sights. Wonderful apartment. Public transport in porto is great. really friendly people. Only half hour for the airport with the metro so need for a car or taxi. The apartment is in the night life area or Porto and is very noisy at night if you want to go out partying this is great but the noise goes on until 6am.  This did not bother us but did our friends who came with us.

Rose nous a parfaitement accueilli nous et nos enfants et aussi attendu malgré le retard de notre vol . A notre arrivée elle nous à présenter le logement qui est conforme aux photos . Logement très spacieux où l'on se sent en sécurité ( Accès sécurisé ) ; proche de toute commodités .. Il faut noter que Porto est une ville où la majorité des choses à faire est accessible à pied .. Nous avons adorer notre séjour chez Rose et Abdel et ne manquerons pas de revenir

Definitely recommend a stay here if visiting Porto!
The flat is in an excellent location, easy to get everywhere on foot. 

It's clean and tidy, with everything you'd need including towels etc. 
The kitchen is great with all that you'd need including fridge, cooker, coffee machine etc
Beds are comfortable with plenty of storage, and good blinds to allow lie-ins even with the sun shining outside.

If you're a light sleeper it can get a little noisy at times but if you follow the Portuguese weekend sleep pattern and have a mid afternoon/early evening nap, party til 4am then sleep a little later in the morning you're fine 

I'd recommend getting a map from the tourist office as they have more detail and we managed to see most things on foot on one day then did the amazing Porto bridge climb and people watching sat in cafes on the Sunday.

It's a great weekend city as you can feel like you've seen a lot and still feel relaxed but also if you had more time there's plenty to do including the Port houses, trip to the beach, ride on the river, art galleries, museums etc etc.
 
Again I'd definitely recommend staying here and visiting Porto!
Super convenient location and very spacious apartment! Hosts were easy to contact and helpful.
Amazing amazing location, very confortable apartment. Excellent stay.

Meine Mutter und ich verbrachten 3 Nächte in Abel's Wohnung. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber, sehr geräumig und mit allem ausgestattet was man brauch. Rose war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Am Wochenende ist es nachts auf dem Praca Alberto etwas lauter, aber noch vertretbar. Alles im allem kann ich die Wohnung wärmstens empfehlen. Wir werden sicherlich wieder Abels Wohnung buchen, wenn wir nochmal in Porto sind. Danke Rose!
Easy location, easy to communicate with, clean. Thought it was a great oasis. Very recommended.

Das Appartment war für unseren Aufenthalt perfekt. Es ist vollständig eingerichtet und sehr schön. Es liegt an einem schönen zentralen Platz, von dem man sehr gut die Stadt erkunden kann. Abel und Rose waren sehr gute Gastgeber. Sie haben uns einen sehr späten Check-In ermöglicht und alles hat ohne Probleme geklappt. Danke dafür. Wir empfehlen das Appartment sehr für einen Besuch in Porto weiter.

We had a short stay and the place wasnt at all what we expected. It was EXCEPTIONAL. I would recommend this place 100%. The apartment is just like in the pictures. We had an amazing stay! Thank you Rose!!!

Nous  n'avons  pas rencontré l'hôte  personnellement,  mais  avons  communiqué par  SMS auparavant et  avons été  accueillies  par  quelqu'un pour nous dîner  tous  les  renseignements. 
L'appartement  est  parfait, tout  à fait  conforme aux  photos  . Il est   très  spacieux  ,  moderne  , très  bien  équipé (  four  , micro  ondes  , lave  linge  ...  que  nous n'avons pas  utilisé  !  cafetière  ..  ),  très  agréable mais  surtout  IDEALEMENT  bien  placé. Proche de  rues  commerçantes,  de  belles  boutiques ,  des lieux  de  visite,  du tram, de  parcs  , des  restaux  et  des bars .... Peut  être  un  peu trop  proche  des  bars  !!  Seul  bémol ,  la  place  sur  laquelle  donne  les  chambres  est  plutôt  bruyante  le soir .( chambre  parentale  surtout pas  très bien  isolée )
  A  part cela  tout  était  parfait et  je  recommande  cet  appart.

The apartment is located in the very center of Porto. You will find a plenty of nice restaurants, bars, nightclubs ... just around the corner. The closest bigger supermarket is not more then 10 minutes by foot. The apartment itself is very modern, spacious, nicely equipped and clean. The beds are good. The landlords are very nice and they will help you with whatever question and answer quickly. It's maybe not the cheapest apartment in Porto but in my opinion is was worth the price! You will get a top location and a really luxurious equipment (for an Airbnb). All in all maybe the best Airbnb I ever saw :) The only disadvantage I can report is that it was sometimes quite noisy in front of the bedrooms during the weekend-nights. The fact that the apartment is not far from restaurants, bars and nightlife shows some kind of impact here.

Abel's place is located in easy walking distance to many places in the city.  It is a lovely apartment with elevator access.  It is located in a lively location with bedrooms facing the street, so for guests wishing a quiet night, this might be a consideration.  One bedroom has children-sized twin beds with wooden slats, so if guests are two couples this might also be a consideration.  Abel's co-host Rose was wonderful and very helpful.

Very nice flat. Modern interior, nothing personal if you expect a flat where real people from Porto live in. We did not use the tv, kitchen and things like that. The kitchen is fully equipped. Bedroom windows are to the plaza which could be noisy in the mornings even with closed windows(they start cleaning the streets outside at about 8h in the morning). There are many apartments in the same building rented to airbnb. Very secure area and the house is locked with several doors and access codes.
Check out was easy as we could leave the keys inside the flat and go away. :) We were not allowed to leave our luggage in the flat longer than 12:00. :(
Porto is a very nice city and the apartment is located perfectly that you can go everywhere by feet in 10-20min and it is not in a main tourist area. Many locals are around the flat.

Very clean and nice place to spend your  holiday  on Porto. Really big place . Beautiful views. Highly recommended.
Very good communication with the owner.
Thank you!

Casa deliziosa in posizione centrale, comoda per raggiungere a piedi tutte le attrazioni principali. In zona negozi e locali non mancano!  Il check-in a mezzanotte non è stato un problema. L'appartamento è molto funzionale e attrezzato e la pulizia eccellente. Indirizzo assolutamente consigliabile.

Apartamento muito bom, acomoda confortavelmente 4 pessoas. Prédio dispõe de elevador. Única desvantagem é que possui apenas um banheiro, o que é pouco para quatro pessoas, atrapalhando um pouco a "velocidade" da viagem. Tudo estava limpo e organizado. Recomendo!

Very well located, clean and comfy. A little bit noisy during night, due to the central position in the city. Rose helped us with valuable info about Porto and its cuisine. A really nice and safe stay!

Excellente situation géographique dans le quartier très vivant des bars et des restaurants.
Très joli loft, vaste, agréable à vivre et très bien équipé.
Accueil très sympatique de Rose.
Good apartment exactly as per the pictures!

The location of the apartment is absolutely perfect. There are many main attractions around as well as great restaurants and bakeries. If you are a light sleeper make sure to bring earplugs because the windows are not sound-proof and there are teenagers playing outside til 3am. All the main amenities are there, wi-fi, TV, kitchenware, coffee. My only other complaint would be to fix the above shower-head as the pressure is low and more cleanliness in the bathtub. Otherwise clean and cute apartment.

Optima localização, mobília, espaço, limpeza e kit básico de hospedagem. Quando lá estivemos a duche estava baixa e muito próxima a ponta da banheira, o que nos fez agachar um pouco no banho. O colchão de casal era muito confortável porém os de solteiro um pouco finos, a decoração era sofisticada mas algumas lâmpadas estavam queimadas. Obrigado pelas 3 cápsulas de café que não esperávamos :D
appartement conforme à sa présentation

Location is amazing--right in the center of a lively square and with the Harry Potter bookstore a 5 minute walk away.  The apartment is very clean and modern, Abel and Rose were responsible and very easy to work with.

The apartment itself is spacious, clean and functional. An and especially, very well positioned. A bit noisy, but impossible to predict for our guests this period of work.
At the end, we strongly recommend ! Dom & Ben

Abel's apartment in Porto was fantastic. Rose was a very friendly and helpful host. The location is perfect to explore downtown Porto yet still in a quiet part of tow . We very much enjoyed our stay. Thanks for the national park hiking tips also!!

Beautiful apartment, great location near bars, restaurants and interesting public places. Highly recommended for young people looking for day and night alternatives. There's a parking right next to the door which helped us with our car in our Portugal road trip. Thank you Abel and Rose!!!

Appreciated Rose and Abel's help for check in even though it was close to midnight. They were friendly and welcoming. Home was clean and neat. It is easily accessible and within walking distances to quite a few attractions such as the Sao Bento train station, Clerigos tower, etc. There were many books on the bookshelf too, including a few English books, good for readers out there!
Apartamento amplio, cómodo y muy bien situado. Repetiría sin duda :)

We had a great stay in Porto! The apartment is in an excellent location, very walkable with convenient access to all the city has to offer. It was also clean and spacious for our group of four. Rose was communicative and kindly accommodated our late arrival from the airport. I would gladly stay here again for future visits to Porto.

Rose and Abel were very friendly, helpful and always at hand to answer any questions! They made our check in extremely smooth. The apartment, what can i say! It was perfect in ever way. You won't find a better location than this, it is close to everything, a 15 min walk to Douro river which is a must see! and a short taxi ride to beautiful museums, cathedrals, the beach! the area is lively and scenic and i can't recommend it enough. The apartment is luxurious, spacious, clean and modern - with amazing views on to the square. We will definitely be coming back! Porto is beautiful. Thank you!

Hermoso departamento, igual a las imágenes! Muy limpio y bien ubicado..
Único inconveniente no supo cómo explicar el funcionamiento de los electrodomésticos y poca flexibilidad en cuanto al horario. Lo que está bien de igual manera. 

Muy amables 
Gracias
Zentral gelegen, nahe zu Restaurants und sehr gue Kommunikation mit dem Host - zu empfehlen
Very central, clean and good value. Will use again when we return to Porto.
The flat was in a great location within easy reach of public transport. The flat was spacious and very clean. We had a warm welcome.
Great location

Un bel appartement sécuritaire, propre, lumineux, confortable et très bien situé. L'endroit idéal pour découvrir Porto, le seul bémol de l'appartement c'est le petit jardin devant, un lieu de prédilection ou se rassemble les jeunes après 4h00 du matin pour écouter de la musique a plein volume !!

Bel appartement, très bien situé. 
L'accueil était chaleureux. L'appartement est conforme à la description. Une bonne adresse à Porto !

El piso es una maravilla, y la zona está genial. Puedes visitar todo Oporto desde allí. Rose nos atendió muy bien y nos ayudó a encontrar los lugares más destacados para visitar. Por poner alguna pega, La Cocina no estaba demasiado limpia, ya que había pañuelos de papel usados en los cajones, y el lavavajillas tenía cubiertos y vasos sucios sin lavar. Por lo demás todo Ok.
Perfect veneu for visiting Porto.
Alles sehr gut organisiert, Lage sehr gut , Apartment optimal. Gerne wieder.

L'appartement est spacieux et propre et parfaitement positionné pour visiter Porto. Il se trouve à proximité du quartier le plus branché pour sortir le soir et donne sur une jolie place. Tout se fait à pieds. Parfait pour 4 personnes.
Bel appartement, au centre ville et très calme. Bon acceuil

L'appartement est extrêmement central, dans une charmante partie de la ville. Des cafés, des bars et des magasins juste n bas de l'appartement. Entièrement rénové, l'appartement est dans un building très sécuritaire. Vaste et épuré, il reçoit très confortablement quatre personnes. À savoir: il n'y a pas de AC, mais des ventilateurs sont présents dans les deux chambres. Une très belle expérience!

Appartement moderne, confortable pour 4 personnes. Seul bémol, les chambres donnant sur la place assez bruyante et le prix du parking souterrain, 40 euros pour 1 jour et 1/2, mais pratique car à 30 m de l'appartement .

Magnifica ubicación
Es posible acceder a los principales lugares caminando
Fantástico,muy céntrico.volveria sin dudarlo
Muy buen apartamento. Amplio y cómodo. Muy bien situado, cerca de restaurantes y monumentos. Se puede ir andando a todos sitios. Muy recomendable.
Abel flat is perfectly located in the charming center of the city, close to everything. Flat is modern nice and clean, I recommande !

La casa está muy bien situada y es bastante recomendable para conocer El Centro de la ciudad. La única pega es que podría mejorar alguna de las instalaciones como la lavadora (que no funcionaba o la Cocina  (que teníamos que subir los plomos cada vez que cocinábamos porque uno de los fuego no funcionaba bien)

Son detalles que el dueño de la casa podría mejorar, aún así,... la casa es casi perfecta
Appartement spacieux bien placé pour visiter le cœur historique de Porto. Le logement est très  facile d’accès depuis la gare ou l'aéroport.
Me and my friends stay at Abel & Rose place for two nights on our Europe trip and it is a great place to stay at. Close to the metro train station. Very central location to every think you need.

L'appartement est vraiment sublime et très propre!la situation géographique est parfaite! Très grand et en plus un lave vaisselle! Quand nous y étions le lave linge ne fonctionnait pas.. la salle de bain est superbe! Le seul bémol est le confort des deux lits simples dans la deuxième chambre... et le bruit jusqu'au petites heures de la place publique en face. Mais le confort de l'appartement est très très bien; l'accueil et les informations étaient super! Merci Abel
Great apartment and location. Would definitely recommend
房子超级棒,干净整洁空间大,离景点非常非常近,装修现代化,房东人很好,我们在波尔图待的很开心,绝对不会失望的｡
Nice apartment in a perfect location! Well furnished and very clean. If you come with a car watch out that the underground parking is pretty expensive!

Logement très bien placé mais mal insonorisé alors qu' il donne sur une place festive.  Lits individuels de mauvaise qualité.  Le check in est à 15h check out a 12h. Nous avions demandé pour pouvoir seulement déposer nos bagages un peu plus tôt. Impossible, soit. Mais le logement n était pas prêt à 15h, nous sommes arrivés en même temps que les femmes de ménage..... Nous comprenons qu' un problème puisse arriver. En revanche nous aurions apprécié pouvoir laisser nos bagages quelques heures de plus après le check out prévu à midi. Mais la encore nous nous sommes vus opposés une fin de non recevoir...Bref accueil impersonnel.
The place was very nice and clean with a great location
Great Appartment en Rosé was willing to help us with everyting.
Awesome location right in the heart of the city. The apartment is massive and very clean. The front door was a bit difficult to unlock but Rose prepared us well for that.

Great location! Central to all restaurants and sites. Place was very clean and spacious. Felt very safe in this area. Rose was a great host and provided us with lots of information. Harry Porter book store was very close and a cool place to see. Loud at night but is manageable if you bring earplugs. Definitely would recommend staying here.
The place to be! Everything was  perfect.

Staying at Abel and Rose's place was lovely and great value for money. The location was perfect and the modern apartment seemed to be recently renovated. They were very accommodating and replied to messages quickly.

Excellent position for sightseeing and spollessly clean and modern.However noisy outside and no air-conditioning made difficulty sleeping.This is just an observation as otherwise excellent,Many thanks.

We loved everything about Porto. The apartment, the location, sunsets & views.
Fátima and Rose were very kind.

Das Apartment war sauber, gross und mit viel Liebe eingerichtet. Schön im Zentrum gelegen. Rose war eine sehr freundliche, hilfsbereite Gastgeberin! 
Wir hatten eine grossartige Zeit in Porto und können dieses Apartment nur weiterempfehlen
Appartement très bien situé, propre et bien équipé. Mais douche bouchée, isolation moyenne donc appartement bruyant surtout en période de travaux! Rideaux non occultants dans les chambres
Vero comfortable apartment

Really lovely appartement on a great location!
Close to lovely restaurants, shops, bars & monuments.
Everything is on walking distance!
We really had a lovely stay!

Our stay at Abel and Rose's place was wonderful!! Easy to reach, very centric, close to all the main attraction. It was very clean and comfortable, better than the picture. I was greeted by Rose, and she showed me the place and even gave me some tips for the city! Looking forward to coming back to Porto
Great location with modern apartment
Gorgeous apartment, incredible location, and a seamless check in/out.

Ubicación ideal, andando a todas partes.
El piso es mejor que en las fotos y eso que eran de por sí fantásticas!
Muy recomendable para pareja con niños ya que es muy muy espacioso.

Really great spacious apartment in a fantastic location! Very large, and a great bathroom, and fully functional spacious kitchen. Close to everything. I wish I could have stayed longer. Will definitely be back. Thank you!

O apartamento é excelente, super novo e bem cuidado, além de ser extremamente limpo e ter ótima localização! Quem nos recebeu foi a Rose, ela foi super atenciosa, nos explicou os pontos turísticos e deu dicas ótimas sobre a cidade. Tanto a Rose como o Abel respondem rápida e prontamente as mensagens. Enfim, super recomendo a estada.
The location was fantastic!

Rose hat uns im Vorfeld alle Fragen sehr schnell beantwortet und dafür gesorgt, dass wir reibungslos vom Flughafen zur Wohnung gefunden haben. Rose hat uns außerdem gute Tips für Sehenswürdigkeiten und Restaurants gegeben. 
Die Wohnung war sehr schön und modern eingerichtet und vor allem richtig groß! Es war alles vorhanden, was man braucht. Die Lage war außerdem super, sehr zentral, sodass wir die Stadt problemlos zu Fuß erkunden konnten. Bars, Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten waren reichlich in der Umgebung vorhanden und viele Sehenswürdigkeiten sind auch direkt in der Nähe. Durch die zentrale Lage an einem Platz mitten in der Stadt war es nachts oft etwas lauter, aber mit Oropax war die Nachtruhe trotzdem gesichert. Wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen!

Abel/Rose apartment is in a great location. We easily walk to old downtown and had a great time in Porto.
Also, there are a number of great restaurants walking distance from the house.

We had a great time during our stay

This apartment surpassed my expectations! The space's layout is phenomenal, and it is perfectly decorated. The apartment complex was very well situated within the city, and the security systems in place to get into the complex and elevator made me feel super secure. The location is perfect to be within walking distance from downtown and the tourist sites, and there's a supermarket within a 10-15min stroll. I highly recommend this apartment to anyone interested, and I hope to stay again on a future visit to Porto!
Excelente localização e espaço. Até uma próxima! :)

Beautifull modern appartment in Porto centre. Wery modern, with all the things someone needs for a stay.
Parking is close, as well as several nice cafes and Porto attractions.
Communication with the owners was fast and accurate. Definately would come there again!

Fomos informados no momento do check in que tanto a máquina de lavar louça quanto a máquina de lavar roupas estavam com problemas e, por tanto não deveríamos usar. Não faria muito diferença para nós, portanto não nos incomodamos a princípio. Os colchões das camas do quarto com duas camas são péssimos. É possível sentir a madeira do estrado nas costas. Precisei colocar os dois colchões, um em cima do outro, para ficar confortável. Quando comentei com a host, sugerindo mesmo que fossem trocados para o conforto dos hóspedes, a mesma respondeu que sentia muito se não eram do meu agrado. Não é questão de agrado, é questão de que são realmente antigos, finos e provavelmente de baixa qualidade, extremamente desconfortáveis. Desde o momento da reserva deixamos claro que seríamos três hóspedes, como deve ser feito quando se reserva qualquer acomodação. Ao chegar, só tínhamos toalhas disponíveis para duas pessoas. Ou seja, duas toalhas de banho e duas de rosto. A terceira pessoa a tomar banho teve que escolher entre usar uma toalha molhada ou uma toalha de rosto pequena. Ainda o chuveiro estava completamente sujo. Tanta sujeira que os canais de saída de água estavam entupidos. Ao tentar limpar, começou a sair uma água marrom, muito desagradável. A limpeza do banheiro é tão duvidável que não tive coragem de pisar na banheira sem chinelos após o acontecimento do (Website hidden by Airbnb) toda a sujeira existente no apartamento e o fato de que todos os problemas que já tínhamos tido, tivemos a impressão que o apto estava há muito fechado e não foi preparado para receber hóspedes. Ao contactar Rose, com quem conversamos em todos os momentos desde a reserva, para falar de todos os problemas, Rose disse que 1) o chuveiro sujo deveria ser apenas minha impressão, 2) sentia que os colchões não fossem de meu agrado, como já coloquei antes e 3, que haviam mais toalhas no armário do corredor. O armário se encontrava trancado e nada mais foi dito até o dia seguinte, quando às 10h da manhã Rose disse que enviaria uma equipe de faxina para resolver a limpeza e também a questão das toalhas. Retornamos ao apartamento e nada tinha sido feito quanto ao que tinha apontado para a anfitriã. Foram necessárias 24 horas e dois banhos em que meu pai usou uma toalha de rosto para se secar para que Rose nos dissesse que havia uma chave que abriria a porta do armário e nos daria acesso às toalhas. A essa altura, já tinha reportado todos os problemas ao Airbnb e dito a ela que a partir de então trataria com a empresa, pois a mesma não havia dado nenhum retorno e assistência. Um problema tão simples não foi resolvido com rapidez e precisão. Ainda a comunicação é péssima, pois todos os problemas reportados foram tratados com descaso e como se fosse mera impressão minha. Quando ouviram minhas reclamações, não fizeram nada para resolvê-las e Rose achou ruim quando notifiquei o Airbnb e parei de...
A casa do Abel é fantastica em termos de localização. O espaço era limpo e agradável e tinha tudo. A única coisa que mudaria seriam os colchões da cama, eram demasiado finos e desconfortáveis.
Otimo

The place was impecable, great location, very clean, great check in in detail which you don’t get everywhere.  Rose was very pleasant and thorough when explaining all around the apt. The place is very spacious, you feel like you live in Portugal. It enhances the overall living experience of what it is to be in Portugal. I’m going back to the same spot when I visit Porto again :)
Very nice appartment in the middle of the city centre. I will recommend it to everyone.
Appartement conforme a l’annonce encore merci pour l’accueil

l'ubicazione è il meglio per visitare la città. la casa grande e comoda sotto tutti i punti di vista. manca qualche accessorio (una scopa - o delle pulizie durante il soggiorno, strofinacci da cucina, carta assorbente da cucina, fiammiferi per la cucina, asciugamani da bagno un po' più grandi, piccole cose di questo tipo).
abbiamo avuto dei problemi con la tv che non si sono potuti sistemare durante il nostro soggiorno  ma la padrona di casa si è interessata subito, venendo di persona a controllare (purtroppo con il week end in arrivo non era possibile provvedere a risolvere il problema).
la proprietaria è stata gentilissima e ci ha aiutati in ogni cosa. esperienza certamente positiva. consigliato.

grazie!!!
Very stylist apartment, we loved the location as it was close to the artistic district.
Great apartment and host! Very spacious designed and clean, in central location.

The flat couldn't be better located, walking distance to every sightseeing spot in Porto. We kept constant communication with Abel and Rose and got great recommendation for restaurants around the area!

This appartment is great. All the pictures are very honest. The appartment is in a very nice location as well. And the structure for babies is perfect: crib and bath tub - you don’t find it everywhere.
The only thing that is quite problematic is the noise. As it’s a lively neibourhood, there is lots of noise at night.
We were with a 5 month baby and it was not nice on that perspective.
Putting this issue aside - for those can easily sleep, I highly recommend this appartment.
best location in all of porto. nothing beats the bedroom views.
Great location, nice modern space, and attentive hosts. Would recommend!

Wir verbachten zu viert zwei Nächte und es war PERFEKT! Die Whg ist sehr gross, modern, sauber, gut gelegen, man ist schnell zu Fuss im Zentrum (gleich neben der Wohnung hat es 2, 3 Lokale für Frühstück/Brunch/Kaffee - Zenith ist zu empfehlen!). Rose war sehr freundlich, hat alles genau erklärt, Kommunikation hat allg. super und easy geklappt.
Einzige kleine Minuspunkte: teils etwas frisch/kühl in der Wohnung (im März) & keine Gepäck-Lagerung nach Check-out möglich. Aber ansonsten war alles zu unserer vollen Zufriedenheit! Danke für alles! Wir würden def. wieder kommen!
Great place, amazing location - really close to restaurants, bars, and sights. Rose was super helpful and communication was good throughout. Would definitely recommend!

The apartment and the location were pretty good! We didn't need to take any public transport, they answer immediately and help with everything. We would love to have known that we had to pay a tourist tax before.
Cerca del centro, un piso bonito e increíble y a buen precio

Piso muy bien ubicado, muy centrico. A parte de muy espacioso y luminoso, es más grande que en las fotos. Rose nos atendió muy bien, dándonos recomendaciones y ubicaciones geniales durante nuestra estancia.

Overall our stay was great. Apartment is very spacious and in good condition. Location is exceptional. Checkin was well organized. There are minor things that can be improved like bathroom corner that leaks, bed mattresses and pillows could be better, not working washing machine. But for the short stay it is not a big issue. I can recommend this property.
Nous conseillons ce logement idéalement placé en plein centre pour faire tout à pied.
Very confortable apartment and great location! Rose gave us very precise instructions on how to get to the apartment and was always available for any questions.
Would come back! Awesome stay.
