Free WIFI and Cable TV, full kitchen w/ built-in Cook-top, nice bathroom & Queen Bed w/ drawers below for extra storage. Door by the kitchen leads to balcony. Waikiki studio with everything you need! Inside is a Queen bed with Linens, Flat Screen TV, Free Wifi, Kitchenette with granite counter tops, mini fridge and microwave, coffee maker, pots and pans, dishes and silverware included. Located on-site is a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, and public parking are available on-site ($25/24 hours). This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes located on each floor. I am always available when my guests have requests or need information about what to see and do.  Please stop in my office located on the ground floor of Kuhio Village, Hours of Operation Monday-Friday (9:30 am-4:30 pm). Sat-Sun (9:30 am- 3 pm). Location, Location, Location!  We are in the middle of it
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location!  We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki. Waikiki Beach, Honolulu's most famous beach is just two short blocks away.  Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village at 7:45pm. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels like Moana Surfrider, numerous restaurants, and nightclubs that cater to every traveler. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center  and other “World Class Shopping” may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street along the beach).  A few blocks away you will find the memorable Kapiolani Park and Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
notes: Hawaii Taxes included in the nightly rate! Hawaii Taxes are (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % (TAT# GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Parking onsite is a PUBLIC GARAGE and is located in the below street level garage stairway access only.  Daily parking fees are approx.  $25 per 24 hours.  Read the signs by the machine or you will get towed.  Payment options may be selected at the vending kiosk located at the bottom of the ramp.    But who needs a car in Waikiki?  Everything is in walking distance.  But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is Number #1 at only $2.50/ticket. The major bus stops going in both directions are easily accessible from Kuhio Village.
access: Located on-site is a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, and public parking are available on-site ($25/24 hours). This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes located on each floor.
interaction: I am always available when my guests have requests or need information about what to see and do.  Please stop in my office located on the ground floor of Kuhio Village, Hours of Operation Monday-Friday (9:30 am-4:30 pm). Sat-Sun (9:30 am- 3 pm).
house_rules: Per House Rules, all guests must register with our Team in the office, the AOAO Resident Manager or Security.  A photo copy of valid government issued identification is required for all guests in the unit. All residents are required to sign­in their guests at the Security Desk in the main lobby for every visit. Guests are not permitted unescorted above the lobby level and may not be in possession/and or use of key set.  Use of key set is reserved for the express use of residents only and may not be used to allow access to anyone other than the resident and guest. In general, all guests are asked to be a good neighbor and to also comply with the following: •	Loud music or TV is generally not allowed. •	Trash chutes are located on all floors.  Please adhere to posted signing.(URL HIDDEN)Please use the large trash bin in the garage for large items. •	Items may never hang over or from a lanai ledge or there is a $50.00(URL HIDDEN)USD fine. •	Intoxicated behavior in common areas is prohibit

host.host_about:
ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

reviews.comments: 今回初めて利用しましたが､大きなﾄﾗﾌﾞﾙもなく快適に過ごす事ができました!ｽﾀｯﾌの皆さんがとてもいい人たちだったのは間違いありませんw

Host is very organized and responsive so you don't have to be. Enjoy Oahu and Waikiki, they'll let you know how to get the keys, painless process, and if you need anything, they are quick and present, otherwise you could as well be the condo owner yourself, for the degree of interaction needed, they are invisible unless needed. Condos are in a great location, three minute walk to the beach, good food around, and for those who like the security, it's keyfob to get in the elevator, keyfob to select your floor, security guard on at night, cameras, and keys to the doors, with deadbolts. Nice little welcome basket with coffee and a few sweets. Internet is often slower than mainlanders expect (but some condos are faster than others) but you're not here to surf or stream, right? The host isn't an ISP, but it's nice to have internet in the condo also.

Great location! Clean room! Warm, welcoming team that helped with every enquiry. They were really on it. Normally wouldn't expect such great help from air BnB hosts. They helped us find buses and told us what's up in the area. Really helped us to get around! Wouldn't say that the kitchen is fully equipped but it was nice to have one that worked and had all the basics! Overall great experience

The Hawaii Dream Realty Team was very friendly and easily accessible via E-mail. The location was so close to restaurants in the area and it was only a short walk to Waikiki Beach. If wifi is important to you then you might rethink booking here unless they upgrade the wifi service from the very basic service they currently have to a more robust service.

There was a cockroach on the bed the first night I arrived.. but the host answered my call at 11 pm and gave me a different room for the night. They had a bug guy come in the next morning, re-washed the bed sheets, and re-prepared the room for me. Sucks that we found another cockroach in the bathtub after all this. The host did everything they could to make us feel comfortable and keep the place clean so it was nobody's fault. It just sucked because I am terrified of roaches.

The team is fast at responding and communication is superb. They make sure you have all the necessary information for a smooth check-in and check-out. 

Other than the roaches, this place is awesome! The pictures show exactly how the place looks. They even have a balcony! Location is amazing as well. I will probably stay here again but in a different room.
Everything was great! Exactly as advertised

The space was accurate to the listing. It was actually a treasure in disguise because it is so close in walking distance to various points of interest i.e. the beach, shops, restaurants. We were left alone after check-in but they were extremely informative and helpful during check-in. We didn't find to need any extra stuff during our stay so there wasn't any further contact. I definitely enjoyed my time here though and would love to come back! The space is definitely just suit for two though, while on the smaller side it felt cozy enough for me and my boyfriend!
Great location and great communication!
The pictures for this condo are very well taken. The room is quite small but with a great location in Waikiki. Try the seafood truck downstairs. Delicious.
Convenient location in Honolulu
Very comfortable, though a little small.

The Hawaii dream Realty TEAM was very fast and answering all of our question, the location was a 3 minute walk from the beach.  
The only thing that was a draw back would be that you could hear everything in the neighbouring apartments. 
There was a balcony which was a nice features, however the view was of only of more buildings.   
I would recommend this place to anyone who is looking for an basic and affordable place to stay near the beach.
It is noisy with the loud neighbors behind you. Shut the bathroom door

This was our first Airbnb experience and it was an amazing one. Booking was fast and easy. Communication with the Hawaii Dream Realty Team was very smooth and they are very nice. We had a later flight and getting our keys was so easy. The space is great for 2 people. It is very close to the beach and I liked that it was in the middle so I could walk in either direction and it would be a short walk to all the shops on the strip.

Great location, friendly staff, if you plan on spending your trip in the room maybe not the best option.  If you plan on spending your vacation on the beach or at one of the many restaurants/shopping totally convenient.

The room was just as advertised, along with being very clean and well-stocked upon arrival. The location is extremely convenient and the realty team is very helpful in providing information and other services during the stay. Great value if looking for a simple spot near shopping and the beach - would recommend and use again.
Room is a little small but kitchen is new and the apartment is right on the bus stop so very easy to catch the bus around town.

Pros: Size of room was a little small but still o.k. for two people. 
It was great having a kitchen which meant we could make breakfast and sometimes lunch at home rather than eating out every day. Which saved us $$$.
Great location with only a two minute walk to the main strip and beach. 
Well priced for Hawaii, as we paid 1/4 of the price of what my other friends paid and we were one street away from them with a bigger room and our own kitchen. 
Only cons of the accommodation were that the quilt and pillows were a little thin, and it was a little cold at nights. 
Would also have been useful to have a broom to sweep the floor during our 9 days stay, because we spent so much time at the beach, our bathroom got a little messy with sand. I like to keep areas clean and it was difficult to do so without a broom. 
Our trip was for a family wedding and Hawaii is quite expensive for accommodation. Out of all our family who stayed for the 9 days, we got the best price at 1/4 of what the others paid and we had a kitchen which they did not. We were also only one street away from the family and still got the best value for money that they were all regretting paying so much for accommodation.
Prefect !!! Will come back to stay again .

Apartment was just as advertised. It was perfect for our trip, just what we needed. Very clean, air conditioning worked very well, has TV and internet. Internet was a little slow, but worked for looking places up and checking email. Could use some more space to store our clothes, had a hanging rack but no hangers. Was nice to have the kitchen, small fridge with a freezer was nice. Location was very close to the beach and short walk to the strip. Hawaii Dream Realty Team was very nice and helpful, gave us a list of popular places to go and how to get there. Check In/Out was very easy. Would definitely stay here again.

I traveled together with my girlfriend and we stayed here for 2 weeks. The purpose of our travel was mixed, both business and holiday.
Pros:
 - Communication with the agency is great. We needed to arrange for a late check-in and the provided instructions were spot on
 - Great positioning of the property. 2 minutes walk to Waikiki beach, right in front of the public transportation (connections to Ala Moana Center), 2 minutes walk to Kalakau Street (filled with fancy shops and restaurants)
Cons:
 -  If you plan for a 4+ days trip, you have limited cloth storing capacity in the unit.
Great location. Close to all shops, restaurants and public transportation.

Location puts you close to a lot of things... room photos not as accurate.. kitchen and bathroom updated but linen on bed very dated and motel looking. Host came to wash it for me but would have preferred new linen (comforter for what I paid) .. host is great in response time and communication! They tried to be helpful and I always appreciate that!
Condo is as described and check in/check out was quick and convenient. Traveled on business and was a great location to mix business and beach.

Ideal Base
I stayed at this apartment for a month while I searched for a more permanent home after relocating to Honolulu. Ideal for one person (or a couple). Clean and well kept. It had a good kitchenette, all the necessities plus cable and wifi. Very comfortable and fresh new bedding. Quiet unit considering the proximity to Waikiki nightlife and daylife. Nice to have the beach handy after a day of house hunting or working.

Our room was clean, well situated and checking in was easy even with a late arrival after the office opening hours. This is a main street downtown concrete building, if you are looking for tranquility this is not for you. If you look for a well located spot with easy access to the beach, shops, restaurants, grocery, city bus, rental cars, etc, well you got the right place. Dream Realty TEAM were easy to reach (phone, sms, e-mail) quick to respond and very accommodating with any issues or concerns we had during our stay.

Mahalo
Alles alles hat sehr schnell und reibungslos geklappt. Lage zentral nähe Strand und Restaurants.

We enjoyed our stay - this suite is located a hop skip and a jump from the beach, shopping and transit - it’s in a perfect location. We were able to cook meals on the stovetop using the pots and pans provided. There is a coin laundry facility below. It is on the small side but the great location and price made it worth it. The staff gave us information on how to get around and were friendly and helpful. We would stay there again!
Great location not just to the bed but great eateries and public transport.
Gute Unterkunft, top Lage
Great location, close to city transit (across street) and many close restaurants and shops.

This is a great place to rent! We stayed 5 days and this was the most economical place to stay. I would highly recommend!!! Staff responded quickly and had great advice for baggage storage, tour companies, and places to eat. This is a great value!

Location is perfect only about 5 minute walk to the beach. Place is smaller then how it looks on the pictures. But perfect enough for a couple. Bed was honestly horrible. Woke up with back pain every morning.

Be careful, the bedding will give you a rash. There are mold in some rooms. The hosts are very hard to find. They are never at the front desk during business hours like they said. And their number is unreachable, nobody picks up. Would not stay here again.

This location is actually in the heart of Waikiki. You are near the International Market Place where there is a ton to experience and try. You are also near not only all the amazing shops of Waikiki but just a.small walk from Honolulu Zoo as well. The other great thing about this location is that if you want to explore outside of Waikiki, you are next to the major bus stops that can take you to great places such as Hawaii Kai or even Ala Moana.

Location couldn’t be any better. This room is on the quieter side of the building (doesn’t face the busy street). Quite tight so our 2 yr old didn’t have much room to play but we were out of the room 16 hours of the day anyways. Transit going East or West is literally just outside the door so very accessible. The host team was very responsive when we needed them.

Everything as described all tho the mattress was terrible. Only supplied 2 rolls of toilet paper for an 11 night stay. Luggage can make the room very tight even when packed away and kept in the corner. 

Overall wasn't too bad location was good security over night and laundry mat downstairs very handy.
Très bien situé suffisant pour un couple
L’emplacement est super bien situé. Près de la plage, des restos, des boutiques. Toutefois, très petit. Une chambre sans fenêtre.  Air climatisé très bruyant. La propreté laisse à désirer.
We had a very relaxing vacation knowing we had a wonderful place to stay. It was everything we needed.
Awesome!
The location is great! Close to everything! Also, the bed was really comfy and cozy. I would recommend!

name: 1201L Grand Studio, Waikiki BEACH!
summary: In the center of all the Waikiki Action, 3 min walk to the beautiful sandy beaches, great shopping & restaurants at all price points. Enjoy the Penthouse floor & Grand Mountain View w/ large lanai.  It is a small unit but with a kitchenette equipped with a built-in cook-top helps to save if you do not want to eat every meal out and a nice large lanai with table & chairs providing nice mountain & city views.
description: In the center of all the Waikiki Action, 3 min walk to the beautiful sandy beaches, great shopping & restaurants at all price points. Enjoy the Penthouse floor & Grand Mountain View w/ large lanai.  It is a small unit but with a kitchenette equipped with a built-in cook-top helps to save if you do not want to eat every meal out and a nice large lanai with table & chairs providing nice mountain & city views. Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, and public parking are available on-site. This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes are located on each floor. We are always available when our guests have requests or need information about what to see and do.  Please stop in our office located on the ground floor of Kuhio Village, Hours of Operation Monday-Friday (9:30 am-4:30 pm). Sat-Sun (9:30 am- 3 pm). Location, Location, Location!  We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki.    The World’s most famous beach is just two shor
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location!  We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki.    The World’s most famous beach is just two short blocks away.   Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village.   The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality.   Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips.   The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center  and other “World Class Shopping” may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach).  A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
notes: Hawaii Taxes included in the nightly rate! Hawaii Taxes are (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % (TAT# GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Parking onsite is a PUBLIC GARAGE and is located in the below street level garage stairway access only.  Daily parking fees are approx.  $25 per 24 hours.  Read the signs by the machine or you will get towed.  Payment options may be selected at the vending kiosk located at the bottom of the ramp.    But who needs a car in Waikiki?  Everything is in walking distance.  But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is awesome.
access: Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, and public parking are available on-site. This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes are located on each floor.
interaction: We are always available when our guests have requests or need information about what to see and do.  Please stop in our office located on the ground floor of Kuhio Village, Hours of Operation Monday-Friday (9:30 am-4:30 pm). Sat-Sun (9:30 am- 3 pm).
house_rules: Per House Rules, all guests must register with our Team in the office, the AOAO Resident Manager or Security.  A photo copy of valid government issued identification is required for all guests in the unit. All residents are required to sign­in their guests at the Security Desk in the main lobby for every visit.  Guests are not permitted unescorted above the lobby level and may not be in possession/and or use of key set.  Use of key set is reserved for the express use of residents only and may not be used to allow access to anyone other than the resident and guest. In general, all guests are asked to be a good neighbor and to also comply with the following: •	Loud music or TV is generally not allowed. •	Trash chutes are located on all floors.  Please adhere to posted signing.(URL HIDDEN)Please use the large trash bin in the garage for large items. •	Items may never hang over or from a lanai ledge or there is a $50.00(URL HIDDEN)USD fine. •	Intoxicated behavior in common areas is prohibi

host.host_about:
ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

reviews.comments:
Very welcoming on arrival. Conversational with lots of helpful advice on where to travel!

No surprises with the room. Decent wifi. Nice balcony. The room and en-suite do exactly what they need to do.

Very pleasant stay.

All the necessities were there plus a welcome basket with the essentials needed upon arrival.  I would definitely stay there again and felt that I could always contact my host with any problems.  A real home away from home.

This place  was great if you're looking for a quick and easy access point to the beach.  Its 3 minutes walking distance from the beach, and a nice 10 minute stroll and you're in the heart of all the stores and restaurants.  The unit was perfect as its safe, easy to get in and out, and simple and to the point.  If you're a simple person where you're not in need of the high class hotel pampering and for a really good rate, this is the place.
If you are looking for the best place to stay this would be it. It is very clean, the team is great. Only down side do not forget to pay parking they will tow your car.

Great studio located in an ideal spot in Waikiki, very close to the beach and all amenities! The room is small but it was enough for us as we didn't spend much time in it. The host was super nice and was always available to answer our inquiries, even late in the evening, which was much appreciated. Finally, the bed was amazingly confortable. 

Overall I would say it's a nice price/quality ratio :)

This is a great place to stay.  If you are by yourself or a couple who want a close place to the beach.  The laundromat is convenient if you nees to do some laundry.  You are literally in yhe heart of Waikiki.   Shaka Tours next door was great and helped me get a great deal on a car through Alamo.  Parking is limited but parked in the evenings down by the zoo for free.  The staff is great and helpful.  They made me feel like a VIP once I stepped into their office.  O highly suggest this place!
Please look elsewhere this unit is very small, overpriced and management unwilling to make amends for problems that occur. Avoid at all costs.

Hosts were very accommodating and quick to answer any questions I had.  The room was very clean and had all the amenities I needed during my stay.  The location was key...walking distance to everything, and the beach was only a few blocks away.
Tiny place but great location and value.  It was just me (42 YO male) and it was tight with no table inside but the lanai has one.  Owner was accommodating and super friendly.

What a lovely stay in the beating heart of Waikiki! A few blocks from the beaches, excellent dining options near by, the convenience of a farmer's market on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday... mango, papaya, pineapple, shrimp roll, all within a short stroll of your accommodations. Staff was very helpful and provided excellent advice of transportation from the airport.
Great place, great management team. They didn't mention that the view from the balcony is Gorgeous! Great location, small and cozy. Perfect for a single or a couple
Had a great stay!

This is a kids place.  If you are looking for a special vacation room, look elsewhere.  It isn't dirty, just old and dark.  It is also to small.  The dimensions of the room are stated, but I never realized how small that really is.  Partly my fault.  Cleaning fee is way to high.  One does not get a good value for their money at this location.

An older apartment complex that met most of my needs.
Outstanding from a cost/benefit perspective. I was in close proximity to the ocean, McDonald's, and the St. Augustine Catholic church. I could also make activity arrangements with nearby Concierges such as Expedia and Shaka Tours. Public transportation is readily available and dirt cheap.

The team are lovely and very friendly. I was met with directions to the supermarket and bus routes. I even got a can of sunscreen along with the basics like tea and coffee! 
It was as advertised - clean and basic - just the essentials but if you're planning on getting out all day you won't need anything else!
The location is central to the best part of Waikiki away from the big resorts, lots of great food shops and bars.
Its a few streets behind the Waikiki beach strip but I never felt unsafe walking around, even at night. The balcony was nice to sit at in the mornings with a coffee. 
Great value, highly recommend if you just want the basics!

This place was small but really cozy. My girlfriend and I really enjoyed it. It says you can only book 1 person but after contacting them, they said I could book both her and me. They talked me through the entire procedure and were very helpful and clear along the way. I would definitely come here again.

This moderate and affordable venue was perfect for our needs. We were only 3 minutes walk to central Waikiki Beach, tons of great shops and restaurants. It was a quiet room for us and even though our neighbors were in an adjoining hall, it was rare that noise was a problem. We'll go back. We loved it! 
John and Ruth Filler, Coeur d'Alene, Idaho

I didn't know what to expect before getting there, but I have to say I loved the place! It's perfect for a couple or a single person. Great view of the city with the mountains. Close to everything you want to do or even if you have somewhere else you want to go the bus stops are right by the building. Would definitely stay here again!
The room was quaint and perfect location!

We stayed here for 4 nights, and it was wonderful! The view of the mountains and clouds from our room was spectacular. There were small soaps and lotions provided and tools/utensils to make a small breakfast. The location was a good middle ground between local food joints and waikiki shopping areas; everything was within walking distance. Our hosts were also very kind, easy to communicate with, and gave us great recommendations for things to do. We highly recommend staying here!

We were 2 people and stayed here for 1 week.  It was in a perfect location, close to the beach and busses that take you all around the island as well as the shops and restaurants.  It's a perfect place if you are looking for a small and simple room to base your trip from.  Communication was super easy with the hosts and they were able to help us out whenever we had a question.  We would definitely stay again!
Great place for the price

This is a great spot, a couple of blocks back from Waikiki Beach and close to plenty of shops and restaurants. A good option if you just need somewhere to sleep and leave your things while being out and about most of the time. Good bathroom and cooktop facilities in the room.
Fantastic location and value. Condo was a bit on the small side but clean and all the amenities advertised. Outdoor patio are was a nice bonus. Short walk to beach, restaurants etc.

It was cozy and great location! :) I loved my stay here. I rented a car during my stay, and eventhough the parking in the bulding is expensive there is a place you can park for free nearby! I absolutely recommend Hawaii Dream Realty.
Great location!

Great location! Only a couple blocks to Waikiki Beach. Small but comfortable space, we had a partial view of Diamond Head on our balcony.
Rented a car from Shaka Tours on the floor level, great deal.
Wish we could have stayed longer!

This place is a very very tiny old unit that feel uncomfortable. The queen bed not fit into this unit. The picture show pillows you see here is not truth. The pillows suppose go other way which have no headboard, no wall to support. No space for you to put your bags / luggage. No closet to hang your clothes. 
Building and unit too old and too small.

Great location. The team was so kind to let us check in before 3 since the room was available. They also gave us tips for local restaurants and places to check out. We wish there were cleaning during the stay

This place is great. It's perfect for people who are traveling as a couple or single.  We love how everything is within walking distance to everything we were looking for (the beach, places to eat, activities, shopping, etc) and if you have to travel outside of Waikiki "da Bus" is just within a few feet of this building. The staff were great as well and readily available whenever needed!
Was exactly as the photo's showed, quick response.  Nice group!
This is my second time booking Airbnb with Hawaii Dream Realty Team and as usual, the experience was awesome! Would totally do a booking with them again during my next visit to Hawaii! Mahalo!

Das kleine Appartement hat alles, was das Herz begehrt bis hin zu Bügeleisen und Bügelbrett. Die Lage in zweiter Reihe am Waikiki Beach ist sensationell und gleichzeitig vollkommen ruhig. Aufgrund meiner späteren Ankunft konnte ich den check-in am nächsten Tag machen und wurde sehr freundlich empfangen. Sehr sehr gerne komme ich wieder!
molto piccolo ma in un ottima posizione
Good place. Awesome location. Good hosts.

単身者にはｵｽｽﾒです!!
ｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰも施設内にあって便利でした｡

와이키키해변 근처라 위치도 괜찮고
숙소는 작지만 깨끗하며 한명 또는 둘까지 사용하기 딱 좋습니다 테라스가넓어서 밤에 맥주한잔 하기에 아주 적절합니다!! 뷰가 멋짐!!
화장실은 샤워기호스가없고 고정되어있는 상태라 조금불편하고 세면대 물이 엄청 느리게 빠집니다 ㅠㅠ.. 주차는 24시간하는대 한화로 이만오천원정도 하니 렌트하시는분은 고민해보셔야할듯하네요
This is a very convenient location close to all the action of the city and yet a huge deck with a great View that is peaceful and relaxing an outstanding last minute deal for which I am grateful
Great place and a great stay - Thanks

Great walkable location in Waikiki. We rented a car and had no issues getting parking in the two lots for the building. Room is definitely small but worked great for the two of us. Office staff was friendly and helped us through one minor access related issue.

Reasonable price and best location!
Check in/check out time.

The location close to the Waikiki Beach is the selling point of the unit. It is good for a couple. Checking in procedures is simple. The unit is safe as the lift leading there is with high security. Amenities in the unit are adequate. There is no problem in communicating with the host.
Great location, air conditioning worked great. The unit is very small, perfect place to rest your head each night.

For the price this was a great place to stay. Location was perfect & within walking distance to restaurants and shops. If you consider staying please be aware when they say studio, that means extremely small! 

Overall great experience with staff & even had to extend for an additional night last minute, which was easy.

No motorcycles allowed, car parking is $25 a day. Confusion on room key deliverance. Locals that live there, tweak out a bit. Safe but, random characters you could possible interact with. Had an unexpected visitor while banging my wife, they didn’t knock and barged into the living quarters and almost had a heart attack; slammed the door and ran away. I noticed someone turned off my TV that wasn’t us (tv volume on 4 (low)). Nothing stolen that’s what matters. 

I would stay again but personally ask for a discount.

I would definitely stay here again but if someone walks in and sees my dick imma charge them. If they see my lady they should pay me double or a free night. 

Fun times in Hawaii !

Nice space enough for 2 ppl (1 Queen bed) with a lovely spacious lanai.  12th story roof top far from street noise. Has A/C, TV, Coffee maker & electric stove, .. 2-3 min. easy walk to Waikiki beach. Everything is close by.. I'd do it again in a heart beat.
The space was nice and the balcony was great for nice days. It was in a very convenient location with lots of places to eat breakfast, lunch and dinner. Beach is only 2 blocks away.
Wonderful stay, thanks a ton!
Was what we hoped for. Location was perfect.
Super Lage
Close to the beach area.  But, not on beach.  Quiet.  You don’t really spend much time there, as too many things to  do and see.

Great location, okay place for the price. Much smaller than expected, the bed placement was a little awkward. Bathroom wasn’t the cleanest. Super close walking distance to everything in Waikiki. Overall basic room with scant amenities, however it gets the job done.

Great location. With it being around the holidays we had a very difficult time checking in. The dates on our reservation were also mixed up. Smaller than expected, but if you aren't spending much time in the room it is in a great location.

The location is the best part about this rental - 2 blocks to the beach with many good surrounding places to eat/shop. The room is tiny with a balcony facing the city/mountains, which I didn’t realize. It does have a balcony but you can walk around to the adjacent rental’s balcony (small opening in the wall) so I always felt like I need to lock my balcony door. Definitely feels more like an old hotel than a private air b&b. The room has a stale smell, the bathroom sink didn’t drain and the floor was dirty so I wore flip flops the entire time. The price is steep for what you get but it does get you close to the beach.

name: Stunning Oceanfront. Amazing Views. 2 Bed 2 Baths
summary: Experience Stunning Views in a large 2 bedroom private Oceanfront condo in Maui.  Property amenities include:  Beautiful Beach, 2 Pools, Hot Tub, Restaurant, Board Rentals, Tennis Courts, Mini Golf, BBQs, Washer and Dryer, 2 Gyms, and Concierge.
space: THIS CONDO HAS IT ALL:  Stunning views of the ocean, swimming with turtles, whale watching while sipping a glass of wine on the balcony, being able to hear the waves while you sleep, good property amenities, and large space for the family. STUNNING VIEWS:  Leave your busy lives behind.  Kick back and relax on the balcony that has breathtaking views of the ocean and surrounding islands, watch whales and dolphins passing by, and chill while listening to the ocean.  Maui keeps delivering breathtaking sunsets that you can watch right from the condo.  Fall asleep to the sounds of the waves and let the island bring you its magic.   THE CONDO SPACE:  The Condo is unit 283 at the Sands of Kahana and is nearly 1600 sq ft of oceanfront awsomeness that has enough space for 6.  Bedroom 1 has a king bed, and Bedroom 2 has 2 queen beds.    WASHER & DRYER:  No need to bring a boatload of clothes on your vacation.  Our condo has a washer and dryer.   PROPERTY AMENITIES:  Our condo is located at The Sa
description: Experience Stunning Views in a large 2 bedroom private Oceanfront condo in Maui.  Property amenities include:  Beautiful Beach, 2 Pools, Hot Tub, Restaurant, Board Rentals, Tennis Courts, Mini Golf, BBQs, Washer and Dryer, 2 Gyms, and Concierge. THIS CONDO HAS IT ALL:  Stunning views of the ocean, swimming with turtles, whale watching while sipping a glass of wine on the balcony, being able to hear the waves while you sleep, good property amenities, and large space for the family. STUNNING VIEWS:  Leave your busy lives behind.  Kick back and relax on the balcony that has breathtaking views of the ocean and surrounding islands, watch whales and dolphins passing by, and chill while listening to the ocean.  Maui keeps delivering breathtaking sunsets that you can watch right from the condo.  Fall asleep to the sounds of the waves and let the island bring you its magic.   THE CONDO SPACE:  The Condo is unit 283 at the Sands of Kahana and is nearly 1600 sq ft of oceanfront awsomeness that ha
neighborhood_overview: NEARBY:  The condo is walking distance to a bus line, coffee shop, sushi restaurant, and bar.  Here's a shortlist of things to do: 1) Whale Watching Tours 2) Road to Hana 3) Snorkel Trip to Molokini 4) Watch the Sunrise at Mt. Haleakala 5) Go Golfing at the world class golf courses 6) Take in a Luau 7) Take a helicopter tour 8) Take a sufing lesson 9) Go on one of Maui's amazing hikes 10) Get some "shave ice" at Ululani's
notes: $75 One time resort fee charged at check-in (include parking for your stay) $60 per additional guest per day over 6 people. 4 night minimum stay unless filling gaps between reservations. Our Cancellation Policy:  Full return minus $125 processing fee if cancelled 61 days before arrival.  No refunds 60 days or less prior to arrival. This policy overrides any cancellation policy shown elsewhere.
transit: A car is not required but we do recommend renting a car because there is so much to explore on the island... hikes, beaches, the volcano, amazing snorkeling sites, etc.
access: Guests can access all typical parts of the property:  Beach, pool area, restaurant, mini golf, tennis courts, parking etc.
interaction: Call us any time with questions you may have.  We'd love to talk with you to tell you about our favorite restaurants, day trips, hikes, and drives.
house_rules: Check-in is after 4 PM.  We have a Front Desk check in that is open 24 hours. ABSOLUTELY No Smoking.   Early check-in is available for free when previous guest checks out the day before.

reviews.comments:
Raj was the perfect host from "start-to-finish!" During our stay there was never a need to contact him as his Lahaina condo was perfect. Prior to our stay, I sent Raj a couple logistical questions and he responded to each immediately plus he called twice offering assistance. 

We felt very welcome and comfortable due to Raj's warm hospitality. He sent us a detailed "Welcome Packet" which included very useful tips for our Maui adventure. The condo was 100% clean and included everything one may need to prepare meals and have an enjoyable and relaxing stay. Prior to our arrival, he actually replaced most all the kitchen items such as silverware, dishes, cooking utensils, pots and pans, etc. The furnishings (including the beds) were extremely comfortable and the panoramic view, condo grounds and beach were SPECTACULAR!!! It was especially nice having a casual open-air restaurant on the property. Served breakfast, lunch and dinner.

We're already looking forward to returning :-)

Nancy, Rich, Jeff & Robbie

Excellent views and very comfortable. Rajeev is extremely welcoming and provides excellent recommendations for dining and activities. Great communication and smooth Check-in/out process. Highly recommended!

We totally loved our stay here. Perfect spot for lots of activities and sights around Lahaina. 
The view was sensational and Raj made everything easy before and during our stay with his comprehensive guide and responsiveness. We can't wait to come back!!!
Place was awesome! Had everything posted and more

This condo was fantastic.  I love how the master has huge sliding doors that you can open up for more space or close for privacy.

Rajeev was a excellent and very personable host.  He gave us super recommendations.  I only wish we could have done them all.

We had a glitch with my name on checkin and he called me directly a short time after to check and make sure everything was taken care of.

He always responded very quickly after any email, text or phone call.  Such a great host.

The grounds were also fantastic, great pool and hot tub.  The cafe on the grounds was a great place to eat dinner or breakfast if you didn't want to drive anywhere and the beach is beautiful.

Because it's not part of the huge resorts it feels much more private, but only minutes away from great shops, restaurants and water fun.

If we ever get back to Maui, we will definitely be looking this one up again.
Rajeev's place was beautiful and he was very responsive to questions.

Rajeev's place was as depicted in the pictures and even better. The view from the private lanai was AMAZING! The unit was nicely decorated and very clean. The kitchen was fully stocked with every appliance/utensil you could imagine and more.  You had full use of beach chairs, towels,  laundry, etc. We would definitely stay here again.

The condo was the perfect location for our vacation in Maui. We thoroughly enjoyed staying here and Raj was very helpful with information before we arrived. We will most definitely stay here again, which hopefully won't be too long from now.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rajeev's airbnb. The beach was very private and filled with many opportunities to see turtles. The location was walking distance to a delicious sushi place and Maui's Brewery (highly recommend both). We were able to check in earlier than expected and the place was very clean. Rajeev was a great host and we really enjoyed our stay.

What a beautiful experience!  Raj and family were fantastic hosts to our family and we are grateful to them for sharing their beautiful home in this gorgeous resort. It's the perfect setting for a fun yet peaceful vacation. 
Raj is very responsive and thoughtful as he provided a valuable welcome packet before we arrived. It was put to good use in creating our family's itinerary! 
We were giddy from the moment we arrived to the family home and found it was exactly as illustrated in the description and more! The views are absolutely AMAZING!!! We spent many hours on the patio simply taking in the spectacular views... The family home is truly lovely and very clean.  We appreciated the notes regarding the access to wifi, the use of the laundry machines in the home, storage of beach supplies, and even check out process. A fabulous host that provided my family with everything we needed to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable!  The check-in process was so easy and convenient, the staff so warm & friendly, wonderful resort amenities. This was our first trip to Maui, and we know we will be back! This is largely due to our memorable experience staying here! 
Raj-- a huge MAHALO for sharing your beautiful home with us. Can't wait to come back!
This place was everything the pictures "describe"!! Raj was great with communication and everything was perfect! We will definitely be back!!!

Great location , great communication , great tips on where to eat and things to do.   Rajeev Went above and beyond.    Would highly recommend to anyone for a great value we felt.     Only compliant was tight parking under building but u can park out side where we had no issues.
What a beautiful place! We really enjoyed our stay in Raj's apartment!

Rajeev's place is exactly as depicted in the pictures. Clean, accessible, beautiful and calm environment. He makes it very convenient for his guests by providing coolers, beach chairs, etc. We had a great time and will definitely be back.
Raj made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived in Maui. Our family loved the room at Sands of Kahana. Beautiful room and great location. We will be back. Mahalo!

This is an EXCELLENT condo to rent. Perfect location, beautiful grounds, right on the beach, on site RESTAURANT (which serves excellent food) and that is a HUGE plus especially in the AM. Fabulous views and a beach with VERY few people. Quiet and peaceful. 8th floor provides spectacular views and a wonderful breeze and the sounds of the waves at night. Would DEFINITLY rent again!

The condo was a PERFECT place to spend a week on Maui.  The property has great amenities complete with hot tub/ pool, daily cleaned  grills for BBQing, a full serve restaurant/bar  and paddle board/Kayak/snorkel gear rentals.  

The condo's oceanfront bedroom was heavenly for hearing the waves through the screen doors and evenings on the lanai at sunset were magical.  Our 8th floor view had to be the best on the island.  Rajeev was a grest host....very attentive in his communications and recommendations.  We are excited to return again next year!!

Rajeev's condo was absolutely wonderful. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay, and the space itself is huge and very well looked after. It was spotless and we felt right at home. There are plenty of beach towels supplied which was very useful and Raj gave us great tips about local places to check out. 

The condo has THE MOST spectacular views of the beach and ocean and we spent a huge portion of our holiday soaking in the sunsets from the balcony. Just incredible. 

We also loved swimming at the beach and happy hour at the restaurant/bar downstairs. 

Can't recommend this place enough, please visit and see for yourself! Thanks Raj!

The condo is spacious and well appointed. The view is amazing! It was great having access to the pools, hot tub, tennis courts and bar/grill. We would love to go back. The owner’s communication was excellent and he provided a lot of useful info. Loved Maui!!

Everything about our stay went above and beyond our expectations.  The condo is lovely and in such a wonderful location.  We were able to whale watch, paddle board, snorkel, and hang with turtles all at the condo.  It was our favorite place to be.  Thanks for helping to make our dream vacation come true!

This was a very clean and beautiful condo that had a real home away from home feeling. The beds were cozy and the kitchen had everything you need and more. Location is great too, good restaurants and amenities close by. Being So high up makes for an amazing view where we got to see lots of whale activity and other sea critters. From booking, up til checking out everything was smooth and easy. It was great week. Thank you for sharing your home!!

The view at this condo is incredible! Perfect for a morning coffee or happy hour - beautiful! The place is quite large with spacious kitchen, living room, bathrooms and bedrooms. The convenience of the restaurant on the grounds was really nice, especially with a family. It’s close to other towns but not necessarily walkable. That being said there are certainly things to do right around the location. We had an awesome time and would come back!
Very clean, well lit, beautiful condo. Would stay here again. Accommodated our family well. Very homey! Beautiful view of the ocean and whales!
This place is everything we thought it would be in more! I can’t say enough good things. The pictures are accurate and say it all! Will recommend to everyone I know.
One of the best vacations we’ve ever taken! The location was great, the condo was accommodating for our family and the VIEW WAS AMAZING!

Rajeev's place did not disappoint. My family and I had an amazing time there. Very cozy & comfortable place to chill between island excursions. The space is large and open with spectacular views as described. The outdoor patio furniture is a little weathered but not bad. We appreciated having the beach chairs and soft coolers to take with us on our adventures. There was no air conditioning in unit, which wasn't really an issue due to the weather being a bit cooler and rainy during our stay, but there are plenty of fans to circulate the air. Master bedroom has a movable wall for opening the space during the day and privacy at night. There's nothing better than drifting off to sleep to the sound of waves crashing and waking up to the same tranquility. We would definitely consider staying here again!

I'm  impressed  by the ocean and island view outside the window when I first stepped into the room. This place is very convenient if you want to go snorkeling, water sports and experience some other activities. Raj was very kind to share us with his recommendation for beaches,  restaurants and everything about traveling around maui. We felt so lucky to stay there for a couple of days.

Rajeev's home was amazing! The view is even better than the pictures! The home was clean and equipped with everything that we needed. Rajeev was also super quick to respond with any questions we had, we definitely recommended anyone stay here!

Beautiful condo! Faces the ocean with a stunning view. We loved being in the master bedroom and hearing the ocean waves.
The resort was comfortable with a nice bar and restaurant. Great access to the west side of Maui.

Easily the best stocked kitchen I have ever been in as a guest.

The condo doesn’t have A/C, but we never missed it. The consistent ocean breeze and numerous windows kept it very comfortable. This from someone who prefers his house pretty cool! As a bonus you can hear the waves. 

Rajeev was a wonderful host. He was extremely responsive. He provided outstanding information about the condo and Maui.

Highly recommended!!

This condo is absolutely incredible. My family and I could not have asked for a better place to stay. The balcony views of the sunset were unparalleled and the condo was impeccably clean and extremely comfortable. It provided the perfect home base for our trip around Maui! Additionally, we received a lot of local tips and restaurant/activity suggestions; we tried several and they did not disappoint! Do not hesitate to book this condo - it made our vacation that much better!! We would stay there again without hesitation.

We had a great week at Raj's condo! The space is large and was very comfortable for us 4 adults and a toddler. The kitchen was wonderful - equipped with everything you could need, and huge. We loved having a balcony that was oceanfront and it was amazing watching the sunset right from the room. The only downside was that the sun really beats down on the condo in the late afternoon so it does get hot without AC - but we just put all the fans on and it was bearable. Great location for a trip to Maui!

Rajeev’s condo had everything you could want. The 8th floor view never got old and the balcony seating was perfect for morning coffee or afternoon cocktails. The breezes and ceiling fans throughout kept it the perfect temperature. The open floor plan and two bathrooms made it feel extra spacious for our family of six. We also loved the welcome packet pdf that listed all your favorite eateries, beaches, hikes, etc. The kitchen was so well stocked we ended up cooking more than planned. Thank you for leaving us the coffee too! We loved accessing the beach right out front but also found the location of the condo close to many other spectacular beaches. We cannot day enough good things about this place and will book it again when we return. Thank you so much!

What a place! So beautiful and perfect for our Maui stay. Great beach access and a spacious beautiful apartment. 

Raj was extremely helpful with his information pack and very quick to respond to any queries we had.

Have decided to make this an annual trip and look forward to staying here again
Great place to enjoy paradise. Awesome view and just the perfect location for beaches, hikes, and shopping.

Amazing apartment! More than great! It is fully equipped, very clean but mainly the view is just crazy, with rainbow over the sea in the morning and wonderful sunset in the evening. You just can't be wrong if you book that place.

This condo was spacious, clean and the perfect place for our stay in West Maui! The view from the condo was spectacular and the perfect place to watch the sun setting. The kitchen is very well stocked. The shared pool and beach are easily accessible and well maintained. Would definitely recommend!

This is a wonderful place to stay and our family of five loved it. Raj is there whenever you need him. Listening to    rolling waves and turning over in bed each day to that view was superb. Great area not as crowded. So close to Kapalua airport for easy transfer. All the little touches that make for a great host.

Raj’s condo was as beautiful as the pics showed it to be.  It was very comfortable and nicely furnished.  We had a wonderful time with the resort amenities and enjoyed our time at the beach and pool!  Everything was just steps from the condo including some great dining options! 

Thanks again for a wonderful stay!

When we walked in for the first time, all four of us were awestruck. The place is beautiful, and the view is even better!! 1st class operation and location. One of the best parts is the helpful ideas that are given in the check in/out pamphlet. Well done!
A wonderfully.comfortable place with a perfect ocean view. The lanai was our favorite spot for rainbow watching!

Rajeev's condo is exactly as it is listed.  The view is amazing and you can never get tired of it.  So convenient to other locations and a great place to stay put also for the day.  It is great to have an onsite restaurant / bar - that was super convenient when needed. The condo was clean, bright and so spacious.  Could not believe the size of the suite - great for a couple with two children, or two couples etc. - with two spacious sleeping areas, two large bathrooms and dressing areas - you can't beat it.  It was larger than my condo in Toronto when I live there.  We did not use the pull out in the living room, but there was one there.  The condo was also very well appointed and so very tastefully decorated.  Thanks the memories!

This is a great find, and one we're sure to return to again. The apartment is clean, has a fully stocked kitchen and laundry, and looks out onto an incomparable ocean front view. We ate out on the patio every chance we got!

This was our first time using Airbnb and I was nervous that the condo would not be as nice as the description. I had nothing to be nervous about-it was better than I expected. The location and the resort amenities were perfect. From the balcony, we saw several pods of whales playing and even saw a few breach! It was amazing!!  The views were spectacular and we saw the most gorgeous rainbows. The beach is clean and the water was beautiful.  Rajeev’s welcome packet was very helpful. Thank you for sharing your home with my family.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. There was plenty of space for our family of 5 with stunning views of the beach. We enjoyed all the amenities that were on offer. Rajeev's home was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.
The view was amazing. Highly recommend it.

We loved everything about this place. It’s very spacious and beautifully decorated.  The kitchen is very nicely equipped for preparing meals. The ocean view is spectacular and we spent our mornings enjoying coffee on the balcony watching the whales and kitesurfers.  The beds are comfortable and we loved falling asleep listening to the ocean surf. The resort has everything we needed - a nice sandy beach, pool area and hot tub, an open-air restaurant with great service and food and plenty of parking. The grounds are very nice and well-kept and the staff are very friendly and helpful. There’s a small grocery store and lively bar with great food right across the street. We will definitely stay here again.

name: Westin Kaanapali KORVN Studio  v3
summary: Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas North timeshare - Pay resort: $8-12/day, stays under 7 night $38/res - Inquire about availability, I review then offer/approve if available :) - READ "The Space" for cleaning/etc AND brief explanation about timeshare reservations - Want guaranteed view for additional cost? Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.
space: This is a timeshare owner reservation. You are under no obligation to attend any sales activity :) PLEASE NOTE for most dates, due to high reservation demand, owners almost always pre-reserve units a year in advance where the reservation is OFTEN 7 nights long with check-in on Fri, Sat, or Sun. If you desire check-in and/or check-out Mon thru Thur, we can coordinate any available additional reservation for the nights which are in addition to the 7 night reservation. HOWEVER the rate for additional reservation MAY be at a substantially higher nightly rate than shown for this listing. ALSO if you request a stay which is fewer than 7 nights, there will be times when the only way to provide a unit is via a pre-reserved 7 night reservation. notes: AS OF 01/16/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) CONSTRUCTION - Construction at the nearby Westin Nanea Ocean Villas is complete and will not impact Westin Kaanapali guests. AS OF 01/16/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) POOL CLOSURE - Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Octob (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The pool and deck areas at The Westin Ka‘anapali Ocean Resort Villas North will be closed for maintenance. The North phase Pirate Ship Pool, ALL South phase pools/slides, and ALL Westin Nanea pools ARE OPEN AND AVAILABLE. While the Pailolo Bar & Grill at North phase will be closed ALL OTHER RESTAURANTS at the three resorts will remain OPEN. Workers will be present between 8:30 a.m. and 6 p.m., seven days a week at the North phase pool.
transit: Complimentary shuttle service to the town of Lahaina and sister resorts in Ka‘anapali Once booked, our DIRECTIONS info includes a link to book shared and private shuttles from airport to/from timeshare resort, fees approx $60 to $300 Car Rental Recommended if you prefer self-guided tours to entire island. Taxi Service also available.
access: Check in at this resort in the same way you do any hotel / resort. Full guest privileges at this resort. - The resort WILL REQUIRE your government ID / passport to have the same name as what we provide to them (it's OK to omit your middle name/initial), and more than one Airbnb policy necessitates we require your Airbnb name be the same as that on your ID. If the named guest is under the age of 21, the resort will not allow you to check in, and you will not receive a refund! THIS IS THE WESTIN TIMESHARE RESORT, NOT THE HOTEL. - Guests staying at the timeshare have full access and privileges for EVERYTHING at the TIMESHARE ( INCLUDING the pools and slides). - Guests may charge expenses at the Sheraton and Westin hotels to their timeshare unit. - HOWEVER timeshare guests do not have access to the HOTEL pools NOR the Westin Hotel waterslide park. NO ONE has access to the Westin hotel water slide except Westin hotel guests ... just like no one except Westin timeshare guests may use the Wes
interaction: There are activities programs and concierge activities booking services at this resort.
house_rules: No smoking; No Pets; This property is located in the Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas, so their rules apply. Please call the resort directly to verify details.

host.host_about: Adventurous couple loves to travel :)

reviews.comments: Amazing room with ocean view!!! We were very impressed with the Westin and the 5 Star service!!! Complete with a full kitchen and washer and dryer!!! Home away from home. Mahalo :)

name: Large well-lit & quiet room in the Plateau
summary: Fully furnished.  The room has lots of natural light through the day New windows = great insulation from the cold Meshed windows = almost no bugs Each room has its own heating The kitchen has its own balcony and fire exit Anything you need, please don't hesitate to ask!
space: The room looks out onto the street - perfect for a sunny afternoon!
description: Fully furnished.  The room has lots of natural light through the day New windows = great insulation from the cold Meshed windows = almost no bugs Each room has its own heating The kitchen has its own balcony and fire exit Anything you need, please don't hesitate to ask! The room looks out onto the street - perfect for a sunny afternoon! Your room and any common spaces such as the kitchen, living room, balcony, bathroom. Naomi and I will be around to give you advice, tips and any help you need. If there is anything you would like or anything not to your liking, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you! We know the area very well so don't hesitate to ask about anything! Middle of the Plateau! We're next to Mt Royal and between the streets of St Laurent, St Denis and Mont Royal. There are many bars, clubs, festivals and restaurants in the area. Metro Mont Royal station is close by and buses pass through many major streets in the area. You are also in the center of eve
neighborhood_overview: Middle of the Plateau! We're next to Mt Royal and between the streets of St Laurent, St Denis and Mont Royal. There are many bars, clubs, festivals and restaurants in the area.
notes: Feel free to use anything in the kitchen including spices, etc. All we ask is that you replace anything you use as soon as you can.
transit: Metro Mont Royal station is close by and buses pass through many major streets in the area. You are also in the center of everything so walking or biking is also easy. There are two rental bike stands within a block of our house. Uber taxis are also available at our door and there are always plenty in the area.
access: Your room and any common spaces such as the kitchen, living room, balcony, bathroom.
interaction: Naomi and I will be around to give you advice, tips and any help you need. If there is anything you would like or anything not to your liking, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you! We know the area very well so don't hesitate to ask about anything!
house_rules: Smoking is allowed on the balcony, just not in the house. No shoes when walking around the house unless during a party. We can give you house slippers/flipflops/thongs.  Please leave things the way you found them.  Do not feed the cat, or the squirrels and birds in the balcony. Do not let the cat outside unless you are willing to wait till he comes back in.

host.host_about: Hello, my housemate Naomi and I are looking forward to hosting you! Montreal has been our home for atleast few years now so we know Montreal very well to be able to give you insider suggestions ;).We can communicate in French, English, German, Hindi. We love to travel and move around ourselves, and understand your needs as a visitor. Search for us on Face book and Couchsurfing if you would like to know more. We are involved in Science, Psychology, Engineering and Entrepreneurship and are familiar with different types of dance, martial arts, sports, and music. We are easygoing although we like being active, and can easily find a way to relate to you!  If you need anything at all, please don't hesitate to let us know during your stay, and we'd be happy to provide it.

reviews.comments: Yannick était en voyage donc nous avons rencontré ses colocataires. Elles sont fort sympathiques. Draps et  serviettes étaient fournies. L'appartement est propre, silencieux et bien placé. On a même eu droit à une part de gâteau de pendaison de crémaillère ! Je recommande.

the time in yannick's place was really nice. his roommates welcomed us perfectly and his room had lots of space for all our luggage. the area has a lot to offer, shops, bars and restaurants and the park is close by. we can only recommend the place.

Yannick's roommates were perfect hosts! The area was great as it was walking distance to Mont Royal with tons of coffee shops and everything you can imagine. It was also only a 5 min walk to the Mont Royal subway station so it was very easy to get around to anywhere. The apartment was exactly as described on the photos.
Le logement est super bien placé à 5/10 min du métro Mont Royal au coeur du Plateau ! Audrey et Johanna les colloques de Yannick nous ont super bien accueilli et mis à l'aise.
Nous avons fait 3 airbnb à Montréal avant d'arriver chez Yannick et nous pouvons dire qu'une chose : c'est définitivement le meilleur !

Yannick is a helpful host for local events, eateries and getting around. The apt is a classic third floor walk up in the "Plateau", on the rise near Mt Royal. Great location. Easy access to metro subways, buses and very walkable.  Close to restaurants and shopping. He is on a one way, quiet street. If youre driving parking can be limited or unavailable so scope the neighborhood and watch the signs! There is a Montreal parking app and Metro Transit app that are very helpful, and Yannick can help you strategize for a spot.

Yannick is a helpful, warm host, and responds to queries quickly. The location is great - walking to cafes, restaurants and shops and there is lots of character in this part of Montreal. The bed is comfortable and the apartment is tasteful and interesting. Highly recommend.

name: home
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: natulius avm metro marmaray metrobüs . Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: rahat yatak, dış mekan, semt, ışık ve ortam. Yerim yalnız maceralar ve kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar için uygundur.
description: Mekanım şuraya yakın: natulius avm metro marmaray metrobüs . Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: rahat yatak, dış mekan, semt, ışık ve ortam. Yerim yalnız maceralar ve kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar için uygundur.

name: Hawaii by the Sea~Walk
summary: AMAZING location in Kailua Kona. *taxes included* Free Parking. Walk to great snorkeling beach, best Kona coffee shop, fun places to eat and lots to do in Kona. Fully equipped kitchen, large fridge.  Enjoy eating meals on the lanai. This lovely one bedroom has queen size bed and a comfortable queen size pull out sofa bed.
space: This clean and bright condo is in a central location on the Big Island. This is home to the famous Ironman race and we are right up the street from the starting line. There is super snorkeling in the bay, paddle boards, kayaks and bike rentals are available at the beach hut "Kona Boys" also right here in front of the Court Yard Marriott. You can visit the Marriott on the weekend for "All you can eat" crab Buffett, or go to the outside bar for cocktails, or the luau if desired. The sunset dinner cruise on the Body glove boat, the submarine and glass bottom boat are located at the pier as well. There is a jet ski island and para sailing here, something for everyone in this part of town.  The famous Splashers bar and grill is right there on the corner.  Enjoy meals on the "lanai" seating for four around the bistro set and the hanging swing. The super markets are convenient, and the farmers market is near and it is opened everyday from 7am-5pm except Mondays.  We have great weather for wal

You can visit the Marriott on the weekend for "All you can eat" crab Buffett, or go to the outside bar for cocktails, or the luau if desired. The sunset dinner cruise on the Body glove boat, the submarine and glass bottom boat are located at the pier as well. There is a jet ski island and para sailing here, something for everyone in t
notes: *Free parking for one car *No pets *No children *No parties or events *The washer and dryer downstairs takes quarters. *The tv is for DVDs, I have some here or redbox movie rental is one block away at KTA or Sack in Save for about a dollar. *Wifi password sent when you book the condo. *Hawaii taxes Included.*  Mahalo, Adrienne and Christopher
transit: There is an open air trolly for $2. It's two dollars each way.  Exact cash. There are two different routes. One to the beaches and the one to the stores make sure you get on the one the one you want. The beach travel takes you to Magic Sands, Kahaluu which is amazing snorkeling and they rent equipment there all the way to the Sheraton where the manta rays are at night.  Located straight down the hill in front of the abc store. I am not sure of the pickup schedule.
access: Entire apartment with balcony, full kitchen, out door laundry, pool.
house_rules: *Please remove shoes its the  Hawaiian way and we want to keep the new carpet clean. *Keep kitchen clean right away. It's Hawaii and we want to avoid all bugs.  *No candles or incense *No aerosol spray's or spray sunscreen in the house or on the lanai. *Please hang all wet clothing and towels on rack and hooks provided. *Please leave bath towels here at the unit and if using a beach towel make sure all Sand is removed before entering *Remove all trash to the dumpster daily. *No smoking in condo or on lanai to avoid losing security deposit. This is a smoke-free unit. *No pets *No parties or events *No excessive drinking or drugs *No spray sunscreens in the house or on the lanai. Thank you Mahalo, Adrienne

host.host_about:
I love living in Hawaii♡ 
We have three listings.
#1 Hawaii by the Sea it is an entire house walking distance to the ocean.
#2 Walk to Kailua Bay it is a private room with a lock on bedroom it is walking distance to the ocean.
#3 No longer are hosting this one it had a built in curtain it was walking distance to the ocean.
We are very quiet, we don’t have a tv but we do have wifi.
We love Airbnb because we get to meet wonderful people.

reviews.comments: Adrienne was super responsive and very kind.  The place was clean and cozy.  The location wasn't ready but she had a comparable, nearby place available.  It had a parking space, which was helpful.  She even had guidebooks and such for the area handy, and toiletries. Cons: a few tiny ants, apparently common in Hawaii.

Adrienne's place was a great find! I daresay my best airbnb experience ever. The location was perfect. Behind the place was the KTA store and Kona Coffee Company. Walk a few minutes down Palani you get to the start of Alii drive. I was able to get around and do my Kona itinerary with just a bike for the first few days.

I really felt at home here. The place was huge and I had it all to myself. The furniture and decorations were well put together. I loved the paintings and pictures hung around the wall. Lots of pillows, plenty of towels, well stocked toilet, and even the kitchen had every utensil  I may need to cook a dish.

This is a new place and while there were some teething issues, Adrienne addressed every thing quickly. She and her friend Monica even helped me get a transfer to the airport last minute when I had issues with my rental car. 

Great place, great host. I'd love to come back and stay here again.

The apt is really nice! Very clean, new and well equipped. Adrienne is fantastic and she helped us with everything we asked during and before our stay. The apt is very close to ali drive (kona center): you can reach it just walking 5 minutes and you will find all restaurants and shops. Just near the apt you can also find other shops to eat or buy whatever... It is also very good for visiting all the great big island beaches: both north than south side, as well as the mauna kea summit.
Kona is a very hot town (also in the night) with no wind at all; so the only suggestion we made to Adrienne is to add in the bedroom a portable air cond. At the moment there are 3 fans in the entite house which are ok for the living room but sometimes not suffucient in the bedroom to sleep properly. Overall, we enjoyed our stay! :-)
Comfortable and very convenient for the airport

Good place to stay location wise. Right in the middle of where you want to be in Kona. Shopping, restaurants, and the ocean. 

Apartment was clean and had enough space for the two of us. 

There is no A/C in this apartment, which is listed in the description. It gets hot, almost unbearable during the day.

I loved my place, it's a very convenient location if you don't have a car. 
Adrienne was very nice and helpful and she provided me transportations for the airport .
The apt is super cute and had almost everything we needed! Definitely recommending and would LOVE to be able to stay there again! Very close to everything!

I stayed at this apartment with my husband and two sons, ages 19 and 10, for just the last night of our ten-night stay on the Big Island. It was a very clean, comfortable apartment within a very short walk to the ocean and all of the restaurants and shops, as well as a short drive to the Kona Airport. The parking space alone was priceless! But the bed and pull-out were also comfortable, we loved lounging on the screened-in deck, and the kitchen was nicely appointed (aside from missing a microwave, which we assumed was there to heat up leftovers). The only other amenity that would have improved our stay would have been an air conditioner. The fans were nice, but as a second-floor unit, it gets warm. Otherwise, we felt like this was a great find in a great location, and the host was very communicative and did everything she could to ensure we had a nice stay. We will certainly seek it out again when we return to the Big Island -- and hopefully for more than just one night next time.

We very much enjoyed our stay here. The apartment was spacious for 2 people, well appointed, and clean. Adrienne went out of her way to make sure that we were comfortable and had what we needed. We loved the lanai and appreciated all the ceiling fans. The location is very convenient to shopping and restaurants. The only minor issue is that the location is a bit noisy when all the windows are open. I would definitely recommend this apartment to others.

My husband and I were pleased with this condo.  Neighborhood was quiet, nice view of the ocean, and easy walking distance to the water.  We sat out on the lanai with a cold drink and watched heat lightening show over the ocean.  Although the place doesn't have air conditioning, there are lots of fans and a cool breeze which keeps the place comfortable.  The place was clean and the bed was comfortable.

If you're looking for a great value place in the most convenient of locations, this is it. You can walk to anything you need from here. KTA, Kona Coffee, Kona Brewery, and plenty of great restaurants are all close by. But if you are driving around you do have a convenient parking space as well.
The place was very clean and well equipped. No their isn't A/C but there are plenty of fans in every room, you're in Hawaii so enjoy the weather. Great to sit out on the lanai in the mornings and drink coffee. You won't be disappointed.

Adrienne's place was just what we needed! We were extending our trip and needed an affordable, comfortable, and clean place to stay. We were pleasantly surprised at how cute it was too! I loved sitting on the swing to have breakfast in the morning. We were cool and comfortable at night, there are plenty of fans to make that happen. Adrienne was very friendly and helpful. She called us shortly after we landed and made it known she was available for questions or concerns. She even invited us out to snorkel with her- she is an underwater photographer and got stills and videos of us with sea turtles! She gave us information to help us on our outings as well. She also is a vacation babysitter and is very sweet to the littles. This was our first airbnb experience and it was a great one! Thank you Adrienne!

Thank you for the nice and clean apartment! The location is great, the kitchen is nice, and I had convenient transportation. This is a great value for anyone who wants to stay in Kona and enjoy the city without needing a car.
