Nuestra experiencia fue excelente. Fuimos a Kona para la participación de mi Esposa en el Campeonato Mundial de Ironman. El departamento estaba limpio, completo y prolijo. Una excelente ubicación. 
Los primeros dias nos pareció caluroso, pero creo que se debía a la diferencia de temperatura entre nuestro pais y la Isla. Al pasar unos dias y aclimatarnos, ya nos pareció  fresco, especialmente por la noche.
Adrienne me facilitó toda la info por mail. A mi llegada, no había recibido dicha info por la desconexión de mi teléfono en los vuelos, llamé a Adrienne y ella se acercó a proporcionarla en persona.
No tuvimos absolutamente ningún inconveniente. Adrienne me había ofrecido también algunas excursiones, pero no pudimos tomarlas por disponer de poco tiempo.
El metodo de acceso con cerradura electrónica con clave me parece muy cómodo, ya lo habíamos experimentado en otro departamente que alquilamos en Canadá. 
Recomiendo firmemente a Adrienne y su excelente alojamiento.

Adrienne was great with communication before and during our stay here. The place is very quaint and perfect for a few days stay on the west side of the island. We can tell she put a lot of thought and hard work decorating the place. The place as a whole is well stocked with everything you'll need for your stay there. 
We were a group of three for one night, then I left to head home while my two friends stayed for an extra two nights. With the sofa bed pulled out and our luggage laid out, it felt cramped for three people. Once I left, my friends told me the place felt much more spacious and comfortable. Adrienne also offers manta ray night snorkeling tours that includes pictures and day time snorkeling excursions. We took her up on the manta ray tour and had a great time with her! I would do research before to see if booking a tour with an outside company or going on your own may be better fit. We were short on time so what she offered us worked best for us.
Very welcoming, as decribed, enjoyable stay. Thanks Adrienne

Adrienne was easy to communicate with and very accommodating. The unit was exactly as described and pictured, and had everything we needed. It was only a short stay for us, but we were very happy with it!

The apartment is well appointed, clean, accessible and in a very charming and well kept complex of apartments.  The listing shows two beds when actually there is one bed and a pull-out sofa bed.   It worked but a bit disappointing.  The apartment includes kitchen ware, cook ware, serving ware and linens sufficient to fully run a small household and the wi-fi is appreciated.   The TV set is for videos only, no cable TV.

Andrienne is a very attentive hostess attending to all of our needs, frequently checking in and responding to any calls or inquiries we had.

We were there for only one night and our day before and day after were already scheduled so a lot of the advantages of being close to the beach, the other resort hotels and the main tourist street of Kona was a little lost on us, but we were grateful to have a comfortable place for the one night we were there.
This place was great! I loved the set up and how close it was to everything. One of the best places I stayed at during my time on the island.
Thank you Adrienne! My crew was very happy with the apt! We will be back in a month and hope to stay with you again. Mahalo!

Adrienne was extremely helpful.  From the moment I completed the booking she was in contact with me with all the details.  Very clean place.  Convenient location very close to the town of Hilo.  Steps to Kona brewing company.  Excellent stay, wish we could have stayed longer.

This apartment was excellent, had everything you’d want in a place to stay: clean, quiet, and an overall good value. It was very comfortably sized for 2 people, I’d imagine it’s a bit tight with 4 guests (at least adults, I’d imagine 2 children on the pullout couch is easily done).The shower took a minute or two to heat up, but there was plenty of hot water once it did, and you’ll really appreciate that on the Big Island (not every place has such ample hot water in our experience). 

The apartment complex felt safe and was quiet, especially considering it’s close to a busy street (really, noise is not a concern here despite being close enough to all the action of Kona). There’s plenty of access to groceries within a walk or short drive, just a few minutes on a highway to a Target, local grocery store is a 2 minute walk. The ease of access to the beach and attractions of Kona are probably understated in the listing. 

The host was very kind and went out of her way to make our stay enjoyable, going above and beyond to make recommendations of things to do in town and how to find some of the local gems we’d only read about. 

10/10 would book again!

Adrienne was excellent, always responding to emails promptly. Details about how to find the place and check in were great. I never got to meet Adrienne but hopefully on my next visit we can meet.

The apartment is excellent. It had everything you need. Very clean and the grounds were very nice
She provided ample fans to keep the place cool so not having an air conditioner was not a big deal. GREAT location! Close to everything including the airport, Costco and Walmart for those who want to buy some food etc. You can walk to Ali'i Drive and Kona Brewing Co ( amazing food and beer at the brewery). Even my boyfriend said it felt like home.
 
I recommded Adrienne 100% and would stay there again.
This was a phenomenal place to stay and was in perfect walking distance to everywhere I wanted and needed to go during my trip to Kona.
The apartment is really nicely decorated and centrally located in Kona near restaurants and shops, providing a great place to stay. Adrienne is really helpful as well!
Wonderful little gem in Kona! Great location to walk around town, nice to have a parking space and communication with host was very easy and clear.

This was a great place to stay. Good price and close to heaps of shops and restaurants. Adrienne was very easy to deal with and promptly responded to our messages. The place was very nice and homely and was very enjoyable to stay in.

The location is perfect for exploring the Kona attractions and as a basecamp for bigger adventures. It was a really nice service to get picked up at the airport since we came in late at night. A really cute place with nice Hawaii themed decor, great kitchen amenities and lots of room for storage. We really liked waking up to all the birds.
What a great place. Very comfortable and clean and a great location. Close to them waterfront, restaurants, shops etc all within walking distance. I highly recommend staying here.
Great location!

My husband and I had a great time when staying at Adrienne's condo. The location was very convenient to activities and restaurants. The condo was very clean, and the bed was very comfortable. Thank you Adrienne!
If you are considering a place to stay that is convenoent, walkable to absolutely everything you need, cozy, clean and just right..... this is the place for you!

The unit is in an older apartment complex but the interior is  brand new, up-to-date modern, and impeccable clean. Easy walking distance to the beach and nearby restaurants. Nice view of the ocean from the screened-in lanai. Unit is on the 2nd floor (stairs).
The flat is nearby the airport. It was easy to find with Adrienne's informations, clean and functional. A good place to be after a long flight from Europe. Thank you (-:
Adrianne's place was clean, comfortable and well equipped. We enjoyed sitting in the screened balcony! Easy walk to restaurants and shopping.

Great location to walk into Kona. Fairly quiet even though it is in an Apartment like complex. nicely furnished and decorated with lots of fans ( no air cond.)  I could see the ocean and the cruise ships from the balcony but a good 7 minute walk to the water..

Location is good. Couple blocks from beach and food/shopping area. Basic clean  amenities. No ac so it could get a little warm. An iron would be nice. Owner accomodating to late departure. Would recommend.

The apartment was clean, easy to find and comfortable to stay at. It's in a good location, not far away from the beach and the center of kona. 
There is also a kta store nearby.

We really enjoyed sitting on the balcony (especially the bench), drinking coffee or reading a good book.
There was a reserved parking lot for the apartment and a laundry station by the pool.

One minor issue: Sometimes it could be a little bit noisy in the morning with the windows opened, but it was not too bad. 

We would definitely recommend staying at Adriennes apartment and we'd love to come back!
Centrally located, clean and easy to find. Affordable option to a hotel, if looking for central location close to restaurants and shops.

Adrienne's place is very central to shops and beaches. The condo is very clean and all facilities were provided. Adrienne gave very clear instructions as to how to get to her place, which was very helpful (im sure i would have turned into the wrong driveway otherwise).
We stayed at Adrienne's place for 4 nights as we dived and explored the west coast. It was clean, comfortable and close to everything. We'd definitely stay there again!

A very clean and cute place to stay. It is within walking distance to the shore with a ton of shops and great restaurants. Well equipped with fans for a very pleasant and breezy nights sleep. Adrienne was very quick to reply. We would definitely stay again.

Adrienne is a lovely host. Her place is adorable and clean and very close to shops and restaurants! The parking spot was perfect. She was also easy to get ahold of and provided us with great directions which made it very easy to find her place (even in the dark!). Would highly recommend for a cute, easy, convenient place to stay in Kona!

Steve and Melinda's was convenient for us for our last night as it is close to Kona airport as well as some beautiful white sand beaches. The apartment itself is in a complex with many other units and is tidy if a bit devoid of personal touches. However for what we were looking for it was a great fit.
房子位置很好,也非常安静,下楼旁边就是超市,走路5分钟就到海边,有个小海滩可以潜水,房间内干净,饰品摆放合理,床被温馨舒适｡
Adrienne's condo is cute,clean,good location,there're many restaurants and two supermarket nearby.and thanks for arranging pick up and drop off to the airport!
Conveniently located and clean.

We had a short, but wonderful stay at Adrienne's. It was nice to finally park the car on the Big Island and be able to walk around, so the location was actually great for us. As for everything on the inside, we were instantly made comfortable as soon as we stepped in, and everything was just as described. Thank you so much!

Adrienne was a great host. She was extremely responsive to messages (both via Airbnb and text). Her place is just as pictured - it was very clean and spacious for me and my travel partner. There is no AC but that was not a problem since she has fans that kept us cool. Thanks for a great stay!

My sister and I stayed for two nights while we were in Kona.  Apartment was clean and close to grocery stores,  restaurants and the pier.  There is a coin operated laundry on premise and ABC store close by which is very convenient.  Kitchen is stocked for very basic cooking.  We had a great time here and would stay here again.
Great place, great location. Really couldn't have been happier with our stay. Adrienne was great with communication and extra questions. Mahalo!
Great cozy and clean condo within waking distance to everything downtown Kona has to offer. Recommend staying here for sure!
Nicely appointed apartment with ocean view, walkable to ocean and lively Kona scene. Enjoyed the screened in lanai with fresh ocean breezes.

Adrienne's AirBNB was located a quick walk from the Touristy area but is in a more residential part of town. The building exterior is fairly modest, and we did see a couple of people dumpster diving in the parking lot. However, the interior itself was exactly as described, and had everything we needed. It's clean, comfortable and conveniently located. Close to the touristy area, some restaurants, and the Kona Brewing Company. Adrienne was easy to work with and communicative, and flexible about checkin and check out time. It's good value for money and we would definitely stay here again if we're ever in Kona.

We really enjoyed staying at Adrienne's place. We were centrally located in Kailua and had plenty to see and do there. The pool is relaxing, the smell of hops wafts through the window from the local brewery, and you can see the cruise ships coming in and out of the harbor.  The walk to the beach is easy and short....but coming home is uphill so beware if you aren't in good shape. You may want to take a cab home...especially after a couple of Mai Tais!! All kidding aside, Adrienne answered calls quickly and her place is bright and sweet! The bed is VERY comfortable. I would stay there again.

Adrienne's apartment is perfectly located a few minutes walk from the seafront. It was perfectly clean and had everything we needed - we enjoyed sitting on the balcony while the rain came down and watching the mongooses running around below! Thanks for having us ❤

The location of Adrienne's place really can't be beat.  Just a block and a half up off the pier.  I woke up early every morning and went for a long swim.  There's a rack by the beach where all the swimmers leave their sneakers and shirts, etc. when they swim and I took full advantage of it.  The condo was clean and the little porch was a great place to hang out at night.  And the cool breezes coming off the water at night and into the bedroom helped me sleep very soundly.  I will definitely rent this place again, should it become available.

Adrienne's Airbnb is awesome! Clean, convenient, calming. My favorite place in the house is the swing on the screened porch. I spent evenings there, sipping on wine and taking in the ocean view. I'd definitely book this place again. Thank you, Adrienne!
They are the best host ever. They  helped me with things to do and on my last day I got sick. She was right there to ask if I was ok. I will defiantly recommend this place.
Beautiful place.. Great location!

Clean, comfortable, and tastefully  appointed apartment. Comfy beds, good shower, and soft linens.  Ideal location for exploring the Kona coast- short drive to harbor, airport, and other kona sights. Excellent thai food restaurant within a 5 minute walk. Also easy access to grocery and other restaurants. Would happily recommend this apartment to anyone considering a trip to Kona--- more comfortable and far better value than any of the resorts in the area.
Convienient location,  lovely place.  Clean and comfortable.  Adrienne provided clear instructions on how to get to her place. This was our first airbnb experience and we loved it.

Great stay!  Just above Kona town can walk to bars. Restaurants and fishing .  Other neighbors nice and it wasn't loud or anything in the evening. .  Totaaaaallly recommend this place to friends and family

The condo is conveniently located within 5 minutes walking distance to all the shops and restaurants on the main strip in downtown Kona. Although the condo is in an older complex, it has all the things we needed with full kitchen and coin operated laundry. We had a great stay there!

Stayed for 9 days with my mom. The location is spot on. Very close to the beach with beautiful sunset views. 3-5 minute walk to Marriot, restaurants and 4th of July parade and fireworks.
The condo is airy, clean and very cozy.  Adrienne is very responsive and accommodating. Well worth the visit.
Great location.

Very nice apartment centrally located. I really enjoyed the convenience and cleanliness of the apartment. The breeze was so relaxing at night and the sofa bed was very comfortable.  Definitely a sweet place!

The apartment was exactly what i expected it to be, it was clean and within walking distance to the shops in town. Adrienne was a great host and easy to communicate with. I would definitely stay at her place again.
Epicerie à proximité et près du centre-ville, tout ce fait à pied. Deuxieme étage donc plus chaud mais plusieurs ventilateurs.
We had a great stay at Adrienne's place. It was clean, well equipped and very well located.

This is our second time at Adrienne's place.  We like the place because it is clean and comfortable, has no refrigeration - the fans and open windows keep place comfortable and we are in Hawaii for the warmth!  We enjoy hearing the birds in the morning.  You can see the water from the lanai - nice place to sit back and enjoy a cold drink at the end of the day.  We like the location because it is quiet and we can walk downtown or to other restaurants, grocery stores...  It is a little uphill from downtown but if you like to walk it shouldn't be a problem.  You don't have to worry about parking.  Easy access to main road to drive to other beaches along the coast.  We walked down to the pier for the Body Glove Sunset Dinner Cruise which was a nice time.  Adrienne responded in a timely manner with any questions that we had.
Very nice and well located place. Adrienne is a very gracious host and her place is ideally situated for exploring Kona or getting to/from the airport

Lovely little apartment - as described. Lack of air con not a problem except in the bedroom where there is less air flow than in the living room. Lanai was amazing, especially with the fan and porch light. Few bugs but easily managed, and I think it's just virtue of the island as we saw lots more outside the apartment, particularly in our hire car which was unfortunately infested with cockroaches, so a watch out for anyone collecting cars from kona airport! Adrienne was amazingly helpful, we had a maintenance issue during the stay and she sorted it within 24 hours! Kona itself was ok, mostly hotels and shops but the island itself had lots to offer.

Adrienne's place was great & super clean. My husband & I really enjoyed our stay in Kona at her condo. Lovely decorations & everything I needed was available.... when it gets super hot- the heat was slightly uncomfortable & unexpected- even with all the fans on. Location: I didn't realized condo was uphill from downtown area- so I really disliked walking up the 2 blocks incline daily (we decided to not get a car rental for our stay this time). It's not wheelchair accessible or suitable for people w medical issues & have a hard time walking.
We had a wonderful stay at the apartment. It's cheerful and airy and perfect for the big island. Very close proximity for walking to the ocean front in Kona. Great experience!

Great location to walk to the beach and restaurants. The porch swing seat is very nice. The only issue would be that the afternoons heat up in the condo and the air circulation isn't really enough to make it comfortable. Air conditioning or even a swamp cooler would help a lot.
Great location! We were able to walk everywhere and it made it easy to get to Kona Brewing, the restaurants and nightlife downtown. Place was clean and had everything we needed.

The apartment from Adrienne is well located (near to the beach an center). Everything was clean and tidy. The check-in worked good, we received all details per mail. I can recommend this place for everyone who visit Big Islands west and south coast.
She was very accommodating to our last minute requests. Wish we could stay longer than 1 night!
Handy location and a lovely space
Adrienne was great and full of information prior to our arrival. Would have given the place a 5 star, but lack of AC was rough with the heat. Overall a great place for the price during Ironman week.
Great option. Great location. Found the pool after two days along with laundry.
Très beau logement!

The location is perfect for visitors. Easy to find central location. We walked up to the coffee and tea shop next door each morning and we walked down town for dinner a couple of times. Of course we toured the island, volcanos, water falls, beaches, etc. 
Your reference books about Hawai’i were quite helpful. We enjoyed sitting in the lanai with the cool breeze. Everything was as stated. Very nice.
A wonderful place to stay, helpful advice and clear directions. Walkable, central location in Kona. Great snorkeling and nightlife nearby!
Adrienne is really a considerate host and quick responder. The apartment is clean, cozy and stylish

The only thing I was extremely  disappointed in was the communication from the host. It was difficult, if not impossible to reach the host and when we finally did it took over 24 hours for a subsequent response. Otherwise it’s in a good spot, although a car is needed to get most places.
This was a great, centrally located spot!
Very convenient location and comfy condo, would stay again!
Nice well equipped kitchen with a KTA grocery a short walk away.
Good place to stay. Clean and convenient.
Excellent location in town with and easy walk to the bay.

The apartment was fantastic: clean, close to the beach drive, close to grocery stores, towels, plates, glasses, shampoo etc. there is also a good coffee place nearby from which we got coffee to enjoy our breakfast in the lanai.
Very nice small apartment in a local resident condo. A bit small for a family of 4 but ok. Basic kitchenette. Well situated in case you don’t have a car in Kona. Thank you Adrienne.
Great place...close to (Website hidden by Airbnb) could be a little bigger...suite had all we needed.  Aloha

Nice home but could be upgraded. No air condition, couple of fans. Very small television. No microwave or oven. Bed in room seemed a bit smaller than a queen size bed so we slept on the pull out sofa which is right under a ceiling fan in the living room and actually feels like a queen size bed. Don't pack heavy because the apartment is up a few flights of stairs, no elevator, no ramp to get to apartment. 

Parking convenient. Shower was nice and hot. Apartment in the middle of everything. Food and gas station walking distance away from apartment.

This is a wonderful location and great value for your money!  It is a quiet community and short walk to beach, shopping and restaurants. No air conditioning, but plenty of ceiling fans make it very comfortable.

Great location, short walk to tourist area along the ocean.  Up the hill, another short walk is a supermarket, restaurants etc.  The condo is excellent for a couple, maybe a bit small for an extended stay for 4.  The screened-in porch is a plus.  The  only downside is with open windows, it can be a bit noisy sometimes, but that was not an issue for us.
The location was amazing! Just a short walk from downtown. Check-in and check-out was very simple. Adrienne was great with communicating. Would definitely stay here again if the opportunity arises!
Condo is clean and easy walk to the beach.
Adrienne’s place lived up to its promise. It was clean, had a great view and was easy walking distance to downtown Kona. We highly recommend staying there.
Walking distance to Old Kona. Great views of the ocean. Clean too!

We really enjoyed our stay here! It was a great location for exploring around Kona and walking distance to a lot of restaurants. It’s also really close to a small grocery store in case you need to pick something up or rent a Redbox movie. Just a note in case you missed it, there is no microwave but a pretty fully equipped kitchen otherwise. The screened-in lanai is really nice with a small table and swing. There are a few stray cats around so don’t be surprised if you come across one when it’s starting to get dark out.
Great place to stay. Clean neat and  nicely located
Very kind

Adrienne and Christopher's place is cute, cozy and welcoming.  The bed is comfortable and bed linen and towels are good quality.  The apartment is very clean and attractively decorated in what we would call "Hawaii style", and the screened porch a delightful area to sit in and relax.  Very detailed instructions on how to find the car space and apartment were provided and this was greatly appreciated.

We enjoyed our stay. It was in a residential area and although the units are fairly close to each other, it was very comfortable. We didn’t cook much but did stay in to watch a movie a couple times. Very close to town and walking distance from the beach. It is as advertised. Would stay here again.
The place was very neat and the location was very close to the shore. There were lots of places to eat and shop very close to the apartment. Highly recommend the place.
The perfect place to stay in Kona, it was exactly what we were looking for. The condo is beautifully decorated and clean, and is in a great location. Mahalo for having us, we will be back again!

Great place in town and was able to book instantly. Adrienne and Christopher provided timely and accurate instructions on check-in, check-out, etc. Their place was very clean and cute and I'd definitely  recommend staying there especially if you'd like to be within walking distance to Ali'i Drive on the Big Island!

This is a great location, close to many amenities. Condo is spotless!
Bed very comfortable and linens clean and fresh smelling. I have been to Kona many times and I would have to say... for the money, best value ! Our friend that stayed with us was impressed as well...
Thank you !

Es ist ein wirklich schönes und gut ausgestattetes Apartment in guter und ruhiger Lage am Ortsanfang. Es gibt viele Einksufsmöglichkeiten und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe. Ort als guter Ausgangspunkt für Ausflüge auf der Insel geeignet, 15 Minuren zum Flughafen Kona, 15-20 Minuten zum Strand...dort kann man mit Schildkröten schnorcheln.
The condo was clean and well equipped. Great location!
The place was great and the location was perfect! It was very nice and quiet. The place was clean and the best part was how comfortable the bed was! Would definitely stay here again!

This condo is in a great location and very clean- exactly what we were looking for.  Both large chain stores and small local businesses surround you- easy to walk to or to drive.  Convenient parking right outside the building. It’s super quiet too- we slept really well here.  There is no AC, but so many fans in every room, so we felt like air was constantly moving in the apartment.
Great location, very clean, nice balcony with mosquito nets where you can work or relax.

Great quiet location in Kailua Kona, just a walk away from lots of restaurants and shopping. Adrienne and Chris's place is very clean and has the most comfortable beds! There is no oven or microwave in the kitchen, but they do have a mini toaster oven available and gas stove top that was perfect for our cooking needs. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at our "home away from home" while visiting Kona. Thanks Adrienne and Christopher!

L’appartement est bien situé. Il est propre et agréable et il était bien aéré lorsque nous sommes arrivés. Charmant petit balcon. Nous sommes restés une nuit, mais il est parfait pour plusieurs jours.

GREAT location! Ali’i drive is literally right down the road and is walkable to many places. The only down fall is that there is no air conditioning, but they have a handful of fans to help make it tolerable. Very clean and nice decorations. The swing on the porch was a nice touch. Would definitely recommend.
Great location! We didn't have to rent a car during our stay in Kona because this condo is close to everything we needed. Thanks for the great stay!

We stayed only 2 nights, and didn't arrive until after 10pm after a long flight on the first night.  The hosts were super fast on any communications, and left very good details on driving directions, etc.  The location was very convenient!
Great, homey apartment with a screened in balcony and an ocean view. Nice touches everywhere. Close to everything in Kailua Kona,

Was able to snag this place for one night very last minute, and I couldn't have been happier. Affordable, perfect location for our purposes. Two friends and myself were looking to find a place to crash in Kona for a little nightlife since we had been staying in Waikoloa. Check in and out was a breeze and the complex was nice and quiet and off the bay enough so tourists weren't everywhere. Would definitely seek this out again next time I'm on the big island.
Centralized location, comfortable bed, enjoyed our stay.
Very nice apartment with all facilities. Very nice kitchen and bedroom. We loved our stay here. Highly recommended

Spent a week in this lovely apartment and didn't want to leave! It was beautifully clean and a lovely size of a space, especially with the Lanai. The kitchen was great, with coffee and condiments provided, and full ice-cube trays in the freezer. The shower was excellent, water was always warm and shampoo and shower gel etc. were provided. The bed was so comfortable it was hard to get out of! It is a 5 minute walk to the Kona seafront and many bars/restaurants. It's honestly hard to find anything negative to say about this place, we loved it. The only miniscule thing I would say is be careful of dropping anything thin down the gap at the left-hand side of the bathroom counter as I dropped my eyeliner pencil down there and there was no way to get it out.

Adrienne and Christopher’s apartment was absolutely perfect for our stay. The location is amazing and the flat is well equipped for all needs. The flat is located right next to a supermarket, multiple fast food outlets, a bank which has an outdoor ATM with 24/7 access and the best part of the location is the short stroll to the prettiest beach I have ever seen (we saw turtles everyday we were in Kona less than 5 mins from the flat). The apartment was really clean, well presented and comfortable. It was bigger than we expected and the couch was super comfy to lounge on after a long day of exploring. Thanks to Adrienne and Christopher’s clear instructions check in was a breeze and the flat was easily located. The hosts were accommodating and allowed us to check in a couple of hours earlier when we arrived earlier than expected. We found the bed super comfy and sleeping easy with the fan running. The wifi was super fast too! Adrienne and Christopher were great hosts and would re book the apartment in a heart beat. Thank you for making our first Hawaii experience absolutely perfect and memorable. 
Regards
Jane & Killian

The condo seemed to be good value for the location. It was easy to walk down to the beach and restaurants, etc.  We were also close to other amenities nearby, so we didn't rent a car during our stay. We saved money by using Lyft to access beaches that were further than we wanted to walk and also to get to/from the airport.  The pool was nice, we enjoyed it a couple of days while there. These condos are older and showing signs of wear--this one had sagging ceiling plaster and a couple of places where it had broken through. We had issues with cockroaches while we were there and killed many that were 4-5" plus several small ones.  They had notices up about spraying the day after we left, so seems to be a problem for the whole complex.
Very convenient parking, comfortable apartment for a couple and close to many fast food restaurants and 10 minute walk down to the front.
Great location.  Easy peasy to find coming from Airport using hosts' instructions.  Will look for tis place if we return.

The apartment is great, location is great (walking distance from the beach and from many local shops). The place was clean, spacious and fully equipped with anything we needed. Overall we enjoyed our stay a lot, recommended!

This was a nice, well equipped apartment in a great location. However, it had a definite insect issue. Maybe that's part for the course in the tropics, but we didn't like seeing cockroaches in the kitchen and palmetto bugs (or something like that) in other parts of the apartment.

It's close to everything! Great place to stay. Clean. Hosts are super responsive. We chose to stay here out of all the other options because I had such a good experience when my girlfriend chose this spot for a previous stay in Kona. You won't go wrong!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Adrienne And Chrispher’s place. Everything was well prepared including beach towels, a beach chair and a beach mat which was a plus during the stay. The location is very convenient that closed to downtown Kona. From there we can go to most beautiful beaches easily. Would love to visit and stay again next time.

Really nice unexpected shielded patio/balcony. Comfy bed. Everything was really nice and clean except for the small roaches in the kitchen. Wasn’t a problem for me though ; my sister on the other hand ...

I have stayed at these condos in the past and was very impressed on the remodel of the condo. We loved it! Clean and quiet and right in town. Thank you so much for you hospitality! I will definitely use you again in the future!
Great value and easy to walk wherever you need to go in Kona town.

Place is exactly as described, close to town and to the little beach . 
Bedroom is warm in summer without AC. Bed is comfy.
Living room is well ventilated and cooler. Lanai is very pleasant.
However, There is a serious roaches issue coming from the kitchen sink and they are all around the kitchen. I think it is a building issue. As a result I did not use the kitchen except the fridge but I was not planning to cook too much anyway.
This is the perfect spot close to all there is to see in Kona.

Great location and a sweet apartment.
If you are looking for self catering this might not work for you but there are plenty of places to eat out within walking distance.

This place was in a good location and a nice setup.  The kitchen isn't as fully equipped as we had hoped.  There is no microwave or coffee maker.  I send a message to the host about the coffee maker, and unfortunately did not get a response.  We wound up going out and buying a coffee maker and left it in the apartment for future guests to use (as we flew back home from this stay and could take it wit us).  The more disappointing aspect was the lack of communication from the hosts.  Other than that the stay was everything we needed.

The condo was lovely, well equipped and clean. Very close to the shoreline and restaurants. 
Only drawback to me was the bed: way too soft and left a sore back. I had to sleep on the pull out couch instead. But if you like extra soft beds, go for it!!
The place was very comfortable, had everything we needed. The kitchen was well stocked so we were able cook anything.

Nous avons occupé cet appartement pour l'IRONMAN HAWAII -- Les prix sont doublés est c'est du vol. L'appartement est sur PALANI ROAD donc extrêmement bien situé pour le triathlon mais cela ne justifie pas le prix. Il existe d'autres appartements à environ 1.5 km du site qui pratiquent des prix normaux lors de la course. L'appartement est mal isolé et l'endroit bruyant. Une entreprise de camions est située juste à côté et à partir de 04h30 du matin, on entend les "bip-bip" d'alarme de recul des camions, et ce de façon presque continue. En gros, on ne dort pas, déjà que le décalage est dur à encaisser et qu'il n'y a pas de possibilité de faire le noir complet dans la chambre, pas top pour préparer l'IRONMAN. Pour le reste, il y a deux supermarchés à proximité et le village + le pier sont à 5 mn à pied.

Their place is very basic. It is true to description, so this review is less. Criticism of the place than it is a note about choices while on vacation.        The apartment does not feel exciting. I stayed in some nice places on Kauai that I felt were a great value. Having spent a bit more on Kauai, I opted for a less expensive place in kona, but I regret it bc this place detracted from the “island feel”. It was too practical and real world and pulled me out of my Hawaiian dream I’d been riding for a week. Next time I’ll spend a bit more - bc it’s vacation!
Great location.  Close to a Kona coffee shop, grocery store, Aloha Brewery,  the ocean with tourist shopping.
great location very clean just needs an air conditioner

This apartment is super well located and very well equipped. However the ceiling fans are not enough to cool it down in the heat of the day. If you return for lunch in the early afternoon and want to cool down you will find it is hotter inside than out. The only way to get cool is to use the pool and the lounges next to the pool. An air conditioner would make the apartment perfect.

This place is just as described, our morning view was palm trees, ocean and a cruise ship, it is about a 5 to 10 minute walk to the waterfront and Ali'i Drive where all the action is, a great location but it is an uphill walk all the way home.
Convenient location.  Had everything we needed.

This place has been wonderful!   After a long day of hiking and sightseeing, it was so nice to take a quick shower and then be just a five minute walk from a slew of restaurants and shops along the ocean front.  Great for grabbing breakfast on the way out too.  We could see the ocean from our screened in porch too!  This place was the perfect size for a couple.  Had everything we needed and was such a great location central between the north and south ends of the island.  We went to the north tip one day and the south tip the next.  Bed was sooooo comfortable. Shower was clean and high pressure.  Lots of shelves for your things and a closet with hangers.  No AC but with the fans we were more than comfortable!  Owner gave great directions to get here and had a guide book for us to use while here. Beach towels available. Lots of extra blanket and pillow for the apartment.

Great host and great place to stay. So close to the beach too and restaurants!

So happy to stay here. The toilets are clean, lotsa utensils and everything just perfect. Love the paintings in the wall the the beautiful lamps.

Mahalo

Nicely updated unit, clean, extra towels, and some beach gear was also available. It is a great location, easy walk to downtown Kona, night life, and a nice family beach. We enjoyed our visit to Kona and our stay in this unit.

I really enjoyed staying here. The location is great. Very easy walk to the water and to all shops and attractions in Kona. Easy parking and easy to get into after I got into the airport late at night. It is less than 10 minutes from Kona airport. I left an item there and the host was super helpful getting it returned to me. I highly recommend this place if you want to be in the heart of Kona.
Cute space that was perfect for our purposes - close to Kona and Holualoa!  Very quick to respond!
Excellent appartment!
Centrally located and very clean.

This location is a 5 minute walk to tourist stores and ocean views. Also, a 5 minute walk to KTA supermarket for groceries and a coffee shop. Its such a convenience location because it is a 5 minute walk to restaurants and even across the street from gyms if you want to work out during vacation (or you can run along the ocean). I liked this place because it had a full kitchen with microwave, toaster oven, fridge and all utensils and bowls. I like that their knives weren't as terrible as other places I been to where it was difficult to cook with. They have a shared coin operated washer and dryer in the complex that was cheap too. My only critics is this place isn't in the best shape and a few repairs could be made to make it better but as a visitor I wasn't bothered by it. Also, this place needs a better TV. The TV is small and reacts really slow. There isn't any AC but the fans are pretty good at cooling the rooms.
Good location! This place has everything we needed. Free parking was a plus.
Very nice place in very convenient location in Kona. would definitely come back again.
很喜欢这里

name: The Safe Room For You Cirrus Tomtom
summary: YERİMİZ GAYET KONFORLU VE 24 SAAT HİZMET VERMEKTE AYRICA GÜNLÜK ODA TEMİZLİKLERİ, TEMİZ HAVLU OLANAĞI VE ODALARIN KENDİNE ÖZEL MUTFAĞI BUZ DOLABI OCAK KETIL TV VE MIKRO DALGA FIRINI MEVCUTTUR SİZLERİ AĞIRLAMAKTAN ŞEREF DUYARIZ :)
description: YERİMİZ GAYET KONFORLU VE 24 SAAT HİZMET VERMEKTE AYRICA GÜNLÜK ODA TEMİZLİKLERİ, TEMİZ HAVLU OLANAĞI VE ODALARIN KENDİNE ÖZEL MUTFAĞI BUZ DOLABI OCAK KETIL TV VE MIKRO DALGA FIRINI MEVCUTTUR SİZLERİ AĞIRLAMAKTAN ŞEREF DUYARIZ :)

name: * Room Taste of Real İstanbul
summary: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. We serve local style breakfast plate in the mornings at our rooftop terrace. Also, we have a 24/7 front desk agent to assist you with anything you might need.
space: The room has one French bed, satellite TV, mini fridge, internal phone, A/C (for summer) and central heating (for winter).  Free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the building for our guests’ use. You can buy water, snacks, and other items you might need from the grocery store nearby. Upon request, we can provide airport transfer service to/from both Ataturk and Sabiha Gokcen Airports. For pricing and service details, it will be enough to send us a message. Our place is located in a pretty quiet and safe area of Sultanahmet, so you don't have to worry about most of the grossly exaggerated news you hear on media. There are also many restaurants and cafeterias in the area, which are usually open until 1 AM. If you will be travelling with your own car, we usually have free space in front of the building. If not, there is a parking lot with reasonable fees, where you may leave your vehicle until some space becomes available.
description: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. We serve local style breakfast plate in the mornings at our rooftop terrace. Also, we have a 24/7 front desk agent to assist you with anything you might need. The room has one French bed, satellite TV, mini fridge, internal phone, A/C (for summer) and central heating (for winter).  Free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the building for our guests’ use. You can buy water, snacks, and other items you might need from the grocery store nearby. Upon request, we can provide airport transfer service to/from both Ataturk and Sabiha Gokcen Airports. For pricing and service details, it will be enough to send us a message. Our place is located in a pretty quiet and safe area of Sultanahmet, so you don't have to worry about most of the grossly exaggerated news y
neighborhood_overview: The building is situated at a very convenient location, it is just a few minutes of walk to Sultanahmet Square Just a few steps to historical places in walking distance as below; Blue Mosque – 5 mins Hagia Sophia Museum – 8 mins Topkapi Palace Museum – 12 mins Basilica Cistern – 8 mins  Roman Hippodrome – 5 mins Gulhane Park – 15 mins Grand Bazaar – 25 min Egyptian Market – 35 mins on foot, 15 mins by public transit Eminonu & Karakoy Districts – 35/40 mins on foot, 15-20 mins by public transit
notes: Definitely no extra guests from outside allowed in the rooms. You may have your guests in the front desk area.
transit: The nearest public transit is the tram stop of Sultanahmet, which can be reached through 8-10 min stroll. With the tram, you can easily reach Beyazit, Eminonu, Karakoy, Kabatas, and Taksim (with connection). Grand Bazaar is located in Beyazit district. On one side of Karakoy, you may find all types of industrial shops, selling tools, machinery equipments, building materials, etc. and on the other side, there are many newly opened chic restaurants, bars, bistros, through its tiny streets. Taksim is famous for its shops in day time and its nightlife until the morning :) One tip about Taksim, only go to places that has good feedback. From Eminonu, you may take a ferry across Bosphorus, either to Uskudar or Kadikoy, both of which are residential districts of Istanbul on the Asian side. Kadikoy is more lively usually until late evening with its cozy coffeehouses, restaurants, bars, etc.  Apart from those places nearby, here are the ports of entry into Istanbul for you: Ataturk Airport – 20
access: All rooms are private in the building. The rooftop terrace and the front desk area is always available for our guests’ use.
interaction: Me and my colleagues at the front desk are always available for your assistance on directions, calling a taxi, ordering food through restaurants’ delivery, sightseeing tour arrangements, etc. It will be sufficient to stop by the front desk.

host.host_about:
Greetings from Istanbul :) This is Alihan, born in 1986 in Tarsus/Mersin. I have been through many areas of tourism business and currently engaged in both being a travel consultant and a host here at Airbnb. At our various rooms in Sultanahmet area, I'd be delighted to guest you at one of our accommodations ;) With years of guest satisfaction and understanding of hospitality, I am sure you will be enjoying your stay with us.. I am currently working as Travel Expert on Efendi Travel Istanbul and Reservation Manager at Deniz Houses Hotel and Naz Wooden House Inn Hotel in Istanbul. 

I, myself, like to travel single and explore on my own without any hassle, taste different things, travel to quiet locations and get away from the crowds much as possible. In Istanbul, whichever type of traveler you might be, you can always find an aspect suitable for yourselves. Just come over here and discover this beautiful city..If you would need any suggestions, I and my colleagues at the accommodations will be happy to assist you ;)

reviews.comments:
удобно добираться, рядом со всеми интересными местами, чисто, все есть. 
Не дорого. есть завтрак

This amazing place is the best! It is very close to everything I need, old city Sultanahmet (Mosques and everything) just few minutes walk. All amenities are around the hotel and easily accessible. Although it is in the heart of tourist spot, it is in a quiet street and really give a nice cosy place to sleep.
As a lone traveler and woman, this hotel give me a sense of security. It feels safe.  The staffs are extremely helpful and friendly. 
I left my wallet in the lobby area, the staff helped secure it. I need to go to airport, the staff who were on the way somewhere, brought me along and dropped me in the nearest metro station, saving me the trouble to drag my bagage around....and it was for free.
If I come back to Istanbul, i will stay in Sultan's inn again.
Как всегда, все супер. Спасибо!
Helpful host, many tips and arrangements for transportation. The place is 2-3 mins walk from Blue Mosque, 5-6 minutes from tramway.

My trip to Turkey means a lot to me. Alihan and his team helped me with everything I needed which I appreciate so much. The place is affordable and decent and everything is walking distance. Beautiful city. Definitely recommend.
Very good location, clean, comfortable - when you need only a place where you you want only to go sleep and whole day you spend outside the hotel it is a good choice.

Expérience très positive. Emplacement idéal dans un quartier agréable et touristique. Une femme de ménage qui passe tous les jours et remet le nécessaire de toilette. C'est une petite chambre d'hôtel mais c'est idéal si vous visitez la ville toute la journée et venez seulement pour dormir. Dommage qu'il n'y ait pas eu des bouteilles d'eau dans le frigidaire, par contre. Je recommande ce logement.
This was a great location to stay at in Istanbul I would recommend.

Очень удобное расположение для тех кто решил посмотреть достопремичательности.Подходит для одиночных путешественников и пар.Мне достался номер с недостаточно убранны сан узлом.А так хорошее соотношение цена качество.
Sultan Ahmet is a great area. Everything is in the neighborhood and if you're up for it.. just a walking distance away (tram is recommended)

Well, the room is small for many days, but if you used it just for sleep it’s okay. The air conditioner works but it’s old and we missed something better, and we think that this room - 20 - needs an upgrade. 

The location is very nice, close to all main places and super secure!
Very nice Hotel. Especially for that price. Thank you guys.

Хорошее место, не далеко от основных достопримечательностей . Своих денег стоило! 
Чистенько, красивый вид с крыши))
Cozy clean place, hospital friendly receptionists ,  close to Old city

Great location, very clean and truthful, there is always someone at the reception to help and guide you ... I only need extra blankets for cold nights. Overall perfect

Gran ubicación, muy limpio y veraz, siempre hay alguien en recepción para ayudarte y guiarte... Unicamente falto cobijas adicionales para noches frías. En general perfecto

Très bien situé, très propre et sincère, il y a toujours quelqu'un à la réception pour vous aider et vous guider ... Je n'ai besoin que de couvertures supplémentaires pour les nuits froides. Globalement parfait
В принципе, понравилось. Близко от достопримечательностей.  Хороший завтрак.Но оставляет желать лучшего чистота в номере. На прикроватной тумбочке пыль. В ванной волосы...
Vey good location easy to find. Kind personal. Clean accommodation.
De l'accueil aux prestations, tout était très bien. Je recommande chaudement cet établissement.

name: Economy Single Room in Kumkapi
space: Hotel Kumkapi Konagi is in the historic Kumkapi district, which is also famous for its many fish restaurants. The hotel features luxurious interiors, modern rooms and an open-air terrace with views of the Marmara Sea and Blue Mosque.
description: Hotel Kumkapi Konagi is in the historic Kumkapi district, which is also famous for its many fish restaurants. The hotel features luxurious interiors, modern rooms and an open-air terrace with views of the Marmara Sea and Blue Mosque.

host.host_about: travel, music, movie, swimming, reading.

name: Artsy 4BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and airy decor, expansive living area, and beautiful fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Located in the Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and airy decor, expansive living area, and beautiful fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Located in the Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Ramen Ya Restaurant or Café Névé for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montreal on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the metro at Saint-Urbain/Rachel station. For an authentic Montreal exper
neighborhood_overview: Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Ramen Ya Restaurant or Café Névé for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montreal on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the metro at Saint-Urbain/Rachel station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled at the foot of Mont Royal, Le Plateau is the epicenter of entertainment and culture in this diverse city. Day or night, the streets of Saint Denis, Mont Royal Ave, and Saint Laurent Boulevard come alive with residents and tourists alike. Eat your way through a variety of restaurants, and adventure through countless shops, cafés, and bars. Save some time to explore Saint Laurent Boulevard, where you'll find all sorts of unique urban art installations on every turn, thanks to the annual Montreal Mural Festival.
notes: This Sonder has seasonal air conditioning available from June 1st to September 30th. Air conditioning units are removed in the off-season. This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help just give us a call. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid street parking nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments:
This is a ground-level apartment (actually a few steps up from the street) on Rue St. Urbain. It's very spacious and newly renovated. Beds are comfortable and brand-new. Contrary to the description, there is actually a full-size washer and dryer in the apartment.

Two bedrooms are near the street and can be noisy when the windows are open. The other 2 bedrooms are in the back and are quieter. You will hear the neighbors upstairs when they walk around, but this was not a problem at night.

The neighborhood is lively and has lots of restaurants. There is a supermarket 2 blocks away. Metro stops are a 10-15 minute walk. Parc Jeanne-Mance is a block away and great for an evening picnic.

Flatbook was very responsive via phone and email (though email sometimes took several hours to be answered).

Great location.  Clean.  Comfy beds.  On street level, so be ready to close and lock windows when not at home.  One room right on a noisy street.  Two are tucked away quietly in the back.  Great kitchen, though bring everything you need for cooking.  There are no knives for cutting other than basic perforated bread knives (ie. no chef's knife or paring knife).  The space feels somewhat cold (more like a staged house than a warm home).

The host was very responsive and provided keys for all of us (4 guests). They installed an AC during the first night that helped a lot with the hot Montreal summer. The apartment was very clean, and the furniture, bathroom, and kitchen were new. It was a great value, and it has a fantastic location opposite a church and a block away from a beautiful park.

I visited Montreal and spent 3 nights here with my husband and his parents.  The flat was as pictured, setup and perfectly decorated. It was spotless and had everything we needed for our stay.  The kitchen had all of the utensils and dishes necessary to prepare meals in if wanted.  The appliances were all new and the apartment in general was in great condition.  There are 4 separate bedrooms each with a desk, closet and drawers.  The apartment is in a great neighborhood with easy access to anything you want to do.  We LOVED the area and I enjoyed running in the nearby park daily.  The neighborhood is very safe and we all felt immediately "at home." I cannot say enough about the customer service provided by Flatbook.  Upon check we had an issue with the lockbox.  Erika was over within 5 minutes to assist us.  She was kind, personable and professional.  We had a small issue with one the beds that had not been properly assembled.  We sent a message and within hours someone came and delivered a new bed. There was a minor issue with front door of the building as it appeared someone had broken a hinge. This didn't really compromise security but I let them know as I thought it would polite.  It was fixed before I saw it again.  I have stayed at hotels with maintenance teams on site that could not provide this level of customer service.  They truly deliver on their promise of 5 star 24 hour service.  I would be thrilled to have future booking accompanied with Flatbook service and can't wait to use them again!!!!
Great stay in Montreal!  Would reccomend to others.
Sonder was a great host this place is in a great location in the Le Plateau. We ended up walking to a lot of places. The check-in process was very easy. I would recommend this place.

Our stay was great. The space was true to pictures, very modern and simple in a way that felt like a hotel! I stayed with 5 other friends, each of us was left a towel, shampoo soap etc. The kitchen was fully stocked with anything you might need! Everything was extremely clean, organized, and the size was great for 6 or even 8 guests. All in all an amazing experience.
A great affordable place to stay.
Very clean, comfortable place in a new building. Location was s fantastic. Walking distance to the main drag in the plateau.
Beautiful place!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Place is just as beautiful as you can see in the pictures. The house is equipped with everything you need, such as extra towels, soap, conditioner, shampoo, plates, cups, silverware, cooking utensils and coffee! The house Is located in a great neighborhood very close to restaurants and stores. The house was very clean and you can tell the host is on top of their game in making sure you walk out of their place with a wonderful experience. I will definitely book again in the future.
bel appartement

Amazing place in a great part of town. large, modern, and well laid out. quick response, self check-in was easy. it's a managed property, so not a personal touch, but professional and pleasant. only complaint is that the place is a bit loud: you can hear walking (stomping?) from upstairs, and the front room let's in all the noise from the traffic. otherwise super great!

Amazing location and value in Plateau, great for groups. Since the building is older, the floors/walls are quite thin so light sleepers should bring earplugs. Host was great and easy to communicate with.

We had a great stay at this lovely appartment in Le Plateau! Very nice and spacious, very comfy couch and a great location. Communication went well and all necessary amenities were provided. The only thing we struggled with was finding a spot for the car, but apart from that everything was great.
We were very happy with this apartment: it's very spacious and located in the heart of Le Plateau.

Where were 4 guests, and pleasantly surprised that there were also four sets of keys available! The flat has a dishwasher and a laundry machine, detergents were supplied.

Its about 30min walking for downtown (conference center), or 10 minutes by bus (bus stop just outside the house). We did not use the kitchen much, but there is a (filter) coffee machine, a big fridge, microwave and stove.

Sonder was extremely supportive and available throughout my stay. I reached out to ask some questions about the area and was helped out in just minutes. Everything was as described and super clean. 

I will be booking with Sonder again, next time I come to Montreal.

Great place in a great location. Bus stop outside the door to get you to Old Montreal in minutes. On a nice day you can walk and it was an $8 Uber. 
The host responded right away and was helpful. The parking suggested worked great and the person came in on the Holiday to open up when all the other garages were closed. 
The place was clean and had all the amenities needed. Would recommend this place.

This was an amazing find. Centrally located, this apartment was perfect for our 6 person group’s doors and drink tour of Montreal. Plenty of supplies and sparkling clean, would definitely stay here again. (Parking details were provided by host and cost about 25$ a day)
Wonderful area great place too

name: Big Room private Bath + Kitchen
summary: The room is on the second floor with its own kitchen and bath, only a hallway is shared. It's a very quiet, private space. Fully furnished with a desk, dining area, bed etc. 5 min. walk to Ft. Hamiltion F/G stop, 10 minutes to B/Q. Next to the park!
description: The room is on the second floor with its own kitchen and bath, only a hallway is shared. It's a very quiet, private space. Fully furnished with a desk, dining area, bed etc. 5 min. walk to Ft. Hamiltion F/G stop, 10 minutes to B/Q. Next to the park!

name: 4BR-5BR Hawaiian Dreams Beach House
summary: 4 Bedroom Country Beach House w/ option to add a separate studio unit- total of 5 bedrooms/2.5 baths at an additional cost.  27 girl steps to white sand beach & infamous Alligator Pond. Private road, NO highway to cross! Safe beach for children & seniors. Convenient! For pricing to add on additional Studio unit, click on our profile pic and input your dates for quote and details!
space: With our special low nightly rates, you will get a beautiful 4-bedroom beach house located on the Northeast Shore on the island of Oahu. Situated in a small and friendly local town, where everybody knows your name. Private access to white sandy swimming beach, known only to the locals. Disney movie with Even Stevens filmed right here on location. Ask your kids, they'll know. For more space and privacy, at an additional cost, we have an separate Studio unit with full bath and kitchenette to add on to our 4-bedroom home. What's the difference, you ask?  Well, the 'size' is. The 4BR home sleeps up to 10 comfortably, depending on size and age. The separate Studio unit can sleep 2 people on one sofa bed with the luxury of an extra full bathroom. Where else can you find paradise fit for the whole family? We are two houses away from a secret white sandy swimming beach, a favorite spot for the locals in the area.  Depending on the season, you may encounter various sea creatures that are protec
description: 4 Bedroom Country Beach House w/ option to add a separate studio unit- total of 5 bedrooms/2.5 baths at an additional cost.  27 girl steps to white sand beach & infamous Alligator Pond. Private road, NO highway to cross! Safe beach for children & seniors. Convenient! For pricing to add on additional Studio unit, click on our profile pic and input your dates for quote and details! With our special low nightly rates, you will get a beautiful 4-bedroom beach house located on the Northeast Shore on the island of Oahu. Situated in a small and friendly local town, where everybody knows your name. Private access to white sandy swimming beach, known only to the locals. Disney movie with Even Stevens filmed right here on location. Ask your kids, they'll know. For more space and privacy, at an additional cost, we have an separate Studio unit with full bath and kitchenette to add on to our 4-bedroom home. What's the difference, you ask?  Well, the 'size' is. The 4BR home sleeps up to 10 comfortab
neighborhood_overview: Endangered sea creatures call our beach 'home'.  If you fish, dive or snorkel, there is good food in the water here. Bring your gear! A little further down the beach is a local favorite surf spot, Pounders. We are also minutes to famous attractions such as Polynesian Cultural Center, Kualoa Ranch, Chinaman's Hat, Crouching Lion, Haleiwa Town, Turtle Bay Resort Health Spa and Golf Course, just to name a few.  Walking distance to grocery store (food, liquor, supplies), eateries and post office. Minutes to Polynesian Cultural Center (a must-see for visitors and locals alike). Steps to bus stop that will take you around the island. We are on the ocean side, NOT on the main road or across the highway!!! You can relax and unwind, sipping mai-tais near the beach or take a scenic drive to Haleiwa Town at the North Shore or Windward Mall in Kaneohe. Either way is only a 30 minute drive.  Walking distance, across the street, is our grocery shopping store, some eateries and our local post office.
notes: Max amount of registered guests is 10 people.  However, if your headcount is over 10 people and your group is comfortable with the size of accommodations, please check with owner for approval of head count.  If approved, there will be a one-time (for the entire stay) fee of $50 per person (no matter the age) over the 10 person count.
transit: Reserved parking is included with your stay but if you prefer not to rent a vehicle, the circle island bus (public transportation) is conveniently located at the beginning of our road.
interaction: As homeowners, we are here to please.  If you need anything while you're here, for your convenience, we are just a cell phone text away.
house_rules: No smoking in the home and no pets please.  Our home is not suitable for parties or events involving more than the number of registered guests.

reviews.comments: The home was great for our family. Geri & Ke'Alii were so welcoming and did everything to make us feel comfortable. We needed a couple things during our stay and they came right over to help. We enjoyed the home and the neighborhood. Everything in the home worked great. We would stay here again.
This is a great place to stay with a semi-private beach--great if you have kids.  Also nice for adults.  Very peaceful to sit and watch and listen to the ocean.
Premises accommodating but not of a high standard, beach location was perfect and shopping facilities walking distance, must have car to travel to tourist attractions.

Geri and Ke'Alli were very accommodating. If I had any questions they were always quick to respond to my texts. The location of the house is in authentic Hawaii (not commercial) and shops and food are only a short drive away. There is a very nice drug store which sells alcohol  within walking distance. It is a QUIET  neighborhood so if you plan on bringing a large group who likes to sit outside I would keep that in mind. We would definitely stay here again.

This house had a wonderfully spacious master bedroom, and everything you needed to be at home in paradise!  I highly recommend it for the close beach access alone.  The beach was perfect for my family.  The coral made nice safe swimming holes for my 2-year-old, and my best friend's 9-year-old snorkeled for hours!  We had a great experience.
Thank you! We had a great time! It's a wonderful home!

All I need to say is..... beach. This is not the place to go for wild night life. This is the place to go if you want to relax , eat food truck meals, and play and have fun at the beach.  I can not stress the closeness of the beach.  We walked are few steps to the beach and left towels and such at the house.   We snorkeled every day, walked the beach, and enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere.  The host are on the property and are very nice.  Great family vacation.

The location was great! My kids loved having their own pool ok the ocean! And we enjoyed so much just bathing suits and go! Walking distance to grocery stores, restaurants and cvs.Geri & Ke'Alii's were amazing hosts, always there to talk to and very friendly and attentive. We can't wait to go visit again and stay with them! BOOK IT!!
Great location, great host. We thoroughly enjoyed our time in Hau'ula and are looking forward to our next visit. Mahalo guys.
I would highly recommend the stay here! The house was prefect and fit the whole family. Super close to the beach, which the kid loved!
Location is fine but house amenities are not of high quality (beds, pillows, sheets).  Limited Wifi and no cable

House is a great location, easy walk to a great beach that's good for boogie boarding and snorkelling. Geri and Ke'Alii live in and rent the neighbouring houses and so there's a bit of to-ing and fro-ing but good to have them close for any minor issues that arise. Ke'Alii is very responsive to any issues.  House isn't new but fairly typical of the area.  Everything worked fine and the location is good to a local market and take outs.  Shame the noisy outdoor aircon unit is located next to the outdoor dining area.  But you can just turn it off when outside.  Overall a very enjoyable holiday.
Very close to the beach....basically a private secure beach

nice and quiet. the proximity to the beach is really good.  not a lot of people in the beach - on some days we had the beach all for ourselves.  need swimming shoes for the kids as the shallower parts are a bit rocky
Fabulous beach access, delightful rooms and plenty of surrounding activities. All you need to do is ask.

name: Modern West Kowloon Based Apartment
summary: single bedroom available for rent. Good for people on business or have lay overs in Hong Kong or family holidays Safe, Convenient, Accessible, Cosy apartment.  This apartment is located in west Kowloon Tai Kok Tsui Area. it is very easy to access the MTR (Train) stations and get to Hong Kong Island or the new territories, also great to relax in doors. can provide a list of help items if required.
space: Single Bedroom. 1. secure apartment with three more entry processes. 2.  -8 mins walk to NamCheong station or Olympic station -1 mins walk to minibus station (12B) heading to Mong Kok MTR. -2 mins walk to minibus station (78) heading to Tsim Sha Tsui. -2 mins walk to airport bus station (A21) -30mins to the Airport by Taxi 3. Minibus just under! 5mins to go to Mong Kok station and Prince Edward station.
