reviews.comments: this was my first experience to visit Hongkong with my family. wr are 3 person includr a toddler... we really enjoyed our stay in Govinda's apartment during our trip in HK... this room maybe not spacious, but already good enough for us since you cant meet such a comfortable place if you stay in hotel at HK.... there are 2 rooms but unfortunately I can only use 1 room since the weather is really cold there on december so I decided to sleep on the living room. the room is really cool since its near to the window, but still we still so happy coz we can put our things on that empty room. there are also a kitchen with very complete utensil and ingredients, and the owner are generous enough to let us use them. the bathroom is quite small but it's doesnt matter at all coz there are hot water so we can warm up our body. my conclusion is we are so happy to live there and hope we can stay there again if we come back to HK. the neighbourhood is really good too, you can put your laundry on the shopping mall neat the apartment. there are some nice restaurants too nearby and dont worry the transportation is really easy too. there are so many stand by taxis in front of the lobby of the apartment.

Apart from the two hiccups involving the metal gate that locked me out (since govinda didn't mention any instructions on how to open it i assumed it was going to remain unlocked) the rest of the stay was ok. Govinda was friendly and the place comfortable.
Quite and beautiful
Amazing host! Recommend for short stays.

Govinda was gracious to accept my request for accommodation at a very short notice. In spite of his busy schedule he also took out some time to spend with me and helped me in getting around. 
The building is very nice with a lot of security for the safety and comfort of the residents. There’s a nice park right outside the building for relaxing and for walking. A small Thai restaurant across the park serves very good food. Must try. A convenience store next to the building and availability of taxi and public transport close by makes it very easy to commute. Over all a nice neighbourhood to stay.

name: Heart of Honolulu, 2BD gem! Free Garage Parking!
summary: Cozy two bedroom apartment two queen beds, in the heart of Honolulu, Makiki neighborhood. Very clean. Enjoy easy access to downtown, beaches, shops, major highways. It features a full kitchen, cable, internet, laundry, fully stalked with all the essentials. It comes with a free parking garage. We also leave for every guest a complimentary bottle of wine. We have extra bed sheet sets, and extra towels if needed. There is also one A/C unit that can cool off the entire apartment.
space: Family neighborhood, pretty quiet
description: Cozy two bedroom apartment two queen beds, in the heart of Honolulu, Makiki neighborhood. Very clean. Enjoy easy access to downtown, beaches, shops, major highways. It features a full kitchen, cable, internet, laundry, fully stalked with all the essentials. It comes with a free parking garage. We also leave for every guest a complimentary bottle of wine. We have extra bed sheet sets, and extra towels if needed. There is also one A/C unit that can cool off the entire apartment. Family neighborhood, pretty quiet Porch with a love seat, table and three chairs. Regular trash is a gray container next to the garage and blue container is for glass and plastic. As often as they need me. I love the fact that the house is so close to everything like shops, grocery stores, Ala Moana Center, Waikiki, beaches, highway, downtown. Public transportation is available, and uber is very inexpensive to any of the places listed above. Yes. It's better to rent a car if willing to explore the island. No shoe
neighborhood_overview: I love the fact that the house is so close to everything like shops, grocery stores, Ala Moana Center, Waikiki, beaches, highway, downtown. Public transportation is available, and uber is very inexpensive to any of the places listed above.
notes: No shoes in the house. Turn off A/C once ready to leave the apartment. Turn off the outside light before going to bed or leaving the apartment. Please don’t take anything from the laundry room before asking. We don’t provide paper towels and toilet paper during the entire stay. We leave two rolls of toilet paper and one roll of paper towel upon your arrival. Thank you.
transit: Yes. It's better to rent a car if willing to explore the island.
access: Porch with a love seat, table and three chairs. Regular trash is a gray container next to the garage and blue container is for glass and plastic.
interaction: As often as they need me.
house_rules: No shoes in the apartment. Throw away all the trash before the check-out. Trash container for regular trash is gray and it’s located next to the garage. Glass, bottles and cans go in the blue container which is next to the gray one. Please don’t move things around in the apartment like furniture and decoration. Thank you.

host.host_about: I love to travel but most of all I love to spend my time with my beautiful daughters and my amazing husband. I'm a chef so I also love to cook. Good life is when you assume nothing do more, need less, smile often, dream big, laugh a lot and realize how blessed you're with what you have."

reviews.comments: Even though we were thousands of miles away from home, Tanja and Vlady's hospitality and friendless made me feel right at home. When we got there, we were greeted with cold brews and friendly smiles. They even added amenities during our stay based off our suggestions. To top it off, fresh fruit, bake goods, and meals were offered pretty much every day to us. Simply put, both our stay and them as people were enough to make me want to return to Hawaii and stay with them again. Highly recommend!

We give tanja and her beautifull location five out of five stars. From a very pleasant greating and check in, to a lovely, very well kept and comfortable stay.  Thank you for making our weekend just perfect. Mahalo

Tanja was a great host. She met us when we arrived, even though it was super late when our flight came in. She even gave us fruit, wine, snacks, water and soda during our stay. The apartment is in her basement and you can hear noises from upstairs where her and her family live but if you spend most of the day site seeing and spending time exploring the island, it may not bother you. The apartment is very clean and as pictured on the site. The location is ideal to Honolulu without being directly in all the hustle and bustle. We had rented two cars and she allowed us to park both underneath her garage port even though I'm pretty sure it kept her and her family from parking there during our stay. We were comfortable there and this is a great place to stay while in Honolulu!

This place was better than I expected. It's a very spacious 2 bedroom basement apartment with living area kitchen and bathroom.  The hosts (Tanja and his family) are extremely kind and courteous. The apartment is very centric. It is about 9 minutes drive from Waikiki beach. This place is highly recommended.

Overall experience was great. Tanja was very nice and welcoming. Almost everything was provided in the apartment and if you ever need anything, she's quick to respond and very accommodating. Definitely recommend!
Tanja was great.  Apartment was comfortable and had everything.  It was close to downtown, museums, beach, and shopping.

Excellent neighborhood...close to everything. The hosts were very kind and welcoming. They even brought us a homemade dessert one night. The walk-out basement apartment was quiet, clean, spacious and very bright and cheery. All the amenities you could ever need. We couldn't have happier.

Tanja is an awesome host!

She was very helpful in assisting my family without me, the home was spotless and with plenty of food.

She took care about my wife and my 2 daughters assisting them during the whole stay.

You rock Tanja!

Of Course I Highly recommend Tanja as the perfect host!

Thank you again very much!

We had a great stay. Tanja Ohana was super friendly and the place was perfect for us to come and go as we please. So centralized for our business event. Will use again for our business. Great first time experience with Air BnB. 
Mahalo Tanja.
This place is wonderful.

Tanja was great, the house was super clean and tidy. Conveniently located only a few minutes walk from downtown. Laundry, wine, happy faces, and good chats; all necessary ingredients for a great holiday are to be found at Tanja's.

The flat was clean, fresh and cosy and provided a good base for three of us. Tanja and Valdi were great hosts and were extremely kind in assisting us with a number of questions during our stay. Although the flat is within walking distance of downtown Honolulu, the heat and hill back to the flat means that a car really does make life easier although we managed with Uber. A wonderful holiday / vacation. Mahalo to Tanja and Valdi.

Great home. Location was very convenient for our needs. It was extremely clean. Loved that it was a few miles away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki, since we wanted to avoid that area mostly. It was well stocked with linens and kitchen supplies. Our hosts even had some cold beers, waters & other snacks upon our arrival. Thanks for hosting us!

Tanja was such an amazing host. Her place was everything my family and I needed and more. We also was able to use one of their parking space in the garage which was helpful because we would get back to the place later at night and parking on the street was all taken. We had our 4 year old with us and Tanja was sweet enough to let her play with some of her daughter's toys. On our last night, my daughter also got to play with her kids upstairs which made my heart so warm because my daughter has been away from her friends and family for a week. Tanja also made us a delicious home cooked meal which I was so sad about not finishing because we had just got done eating dinner. I would highly recommend having Tanja as a host. She is just the sweetest and so accommodating!

The place was just as pictured. Any questions we had while staying there were answered right away. They were extremely nice and checking in/out was easy. The location was great in relation to any place we wanted to go. We had no issues while staying here!
非常非常好的房子,位置也非常方便｡性价比很好,很干净舒适｡适合一家人入住休息｡主人也能及时回复信息｡很完美的入住体验

Tanja and her family were great!  She was so kind enough to give us homemade desserts and invited my daughter and I to spend time with her and her family. Everyone was so welcoming and kind. My daughter, Penny made a new friend with Tanja's daughter. Thank you Tanja for your hospitality and kindness!
My parents and aunties are vary satisfy with the trip not only for the beautiful scene in Hawaii, but also for have met a bunch of great people
Great hosts!! Easy access to all. Cozy.

Tanja and her family is so sweet to me and my parents. The flat is clean and spacious as they described, and has everything we need. The location is close to almost everywhere we need to go. The best part is Tanja's desserts! I love the banana cake! It's a perfect start of our trip in Hawaii. Thank you!
It is a very nice place. Clean and convenient. The host is very nice and helpful.

Tanja and her entire family were the sweetest people we have ever met! They were very welcoming and so happy! The day we arrived, they were celebrating Serbian Christmas and they invited us all up to hang out and have fun. They fed us some delicious food and amazing drinks, and it was the birthday of one of the guys in our group and they surprised him with a little birthday treat and candle and everyone sang...this was all within a few hours of first meeting them. 
The space downstairs was so cute and perfect for us. Everything was very clean and well put together and we loved everything about it! We will definitely be staying here again next time we're on the island.

Tanja's place is perfect for a family. She and her husband are very nice. They helped us a lot. If we come back to Honolulu, we will definitely choose this place again! 房间很大,4口人住完全没有问题,房东人不错,很友善｡从这uber去威基基大概10美元,很方便｡性价比很高,强烈推荐｡

Location: Residential area. We had a rental car (they had a garage parking spot saved for us, which was really great), but a rental would make commute around Honolulu a lot easier from here. We liked staying away from the crowds of waikiki hotels, so this was perfect for that. 
Space: This was a good amount of space (2 adults, 2 teenagers and we didn't feel cramped), separate entrance from main house, nice living area w comfortable couch, big screen LCD w cable, good connection and wifi speed. Kitchen well stocked w amenities, utensils, and has coffee/creamer/pasta/cooking oil etc. Air conditioning and all compliances worked well. Washer/dryer that was not coin operated! The entire space was very clean and located downstairs to the main house. There were many extra towels, beach towels, extra bedding, extra toiletries in the bathrooms etc. Everything was there to make our trip comfortable. Beds were comfortable and the ceiling fans kept temperature at night comfortable.
Surrounding area: There are several cats and kittens wondering around, they were actually cute and didn't bother us. There are also chickens/roosters in neighboring yards (which do crow in the morning), so it may take a day or two to get used to them. 
Hosts: They are quite wonderful. Not intrusive but they did check in to make sure we had everything we needed.  They gave us desserts one night some of which was handmade!
Location is great, and newly decorated apt. I would like to recommend the place!

Our stay at Tanja's was wonderful! She is a gracious, kind, considerate hostess. My fiancé and I throughly enjoyed visiting with her and her husband over a bottle of wine. We brought our parents and our foster children children along on this vacay and Tanja gladly accommodated all of us!! If your looking for a quite, peaceful get a way this is definitely the location to book!! We will be returning and will book with her again. ❤

Vlad and Tanja were excellent hosts! The place was very clean and we were provided all the amenities we needed.  Our hosts were very accommodating to our every need.  When I come back through Hawaii for work I will definitely look to see if this place is available to stay in again. Thank you Vlad and Tanja!
Great space and super hosts. Place was beyond clean and so comfortable. Would definitely recommend.
This was the perfect place for us to come on a quick trip for graduation.  Very cute and CLEAN!!  Owner(s) very attentive and super nice. Will definitely recommend to our friends/family.

Tanja's place is very nice, cute, clean, and well appointed.  Tanja went above and beyond, providing fruit, muffins, and even wine - all of my mom's favorite things.   When I couldn't join my 85 year old mom as planned, Tanja made sure my mom was comfortable.  We had a terminally ill relative who lived nearby, and Tanja was so sensitive and accommodating towards my mom and family.  This place is located toward the front of the Punch Bowl Crater - a perfect and easily accessible central location in Honolulu.  I highly recommend it!
My colleague and I had a wonderfull stay at Tanja's apt during our conference in Hawaii. The place is spacious and very clean. I would recommend this apt and host if you are visiting Honolulu.
Wonderful place, easy, central and Tanja was very helpful!
Tanja's place is hands down the best rental in Oahu. Beautiful place to stay. Equip with everything you need. And the owners are so accommodating and very nice and easy going. We love staying here.
Quite good location, few minutes drive to waikiki, shops and restaurants. Quiet neighborhood, great value for money.

Tanja's place was nothing much to ask more. The house was so close to downtown and the highway, and was spacious for 4 adults and very clean. The kitchen stuff, bathroom towel, A/C and ceiling fan etc. the most thing what we needed were there.  We stayed comfortably for 2 weeks. I strongly recommend Tanja's house.
Great place and great host! The room is very clean. The host is very friendly and communicative. Will stay there again next time!
Tanja's apartment is exactly as seen in the photos. She is very hospitable and the location was great for us to be near Queens Medical Center and away from downtown and Waikiki.

Tanja's place is super clean & cute. Have everything there. Easy to check in and check out. We got quick response from Tanja whenever we had any questions. And the location is great - close to the beach/restaurant/shops. Will absolutely stay there if we visit Honolulu again. Thank you, Tanja!

I'd like to thank Tanja for being an excellent host and allowing my friends and I to stay at her beautiful home. Her place was everything we were looking for and her family warmly welcomed us. I would recommend any and everyone to stay here, you will absolutely love it as much as we did. Thanks again Tanja!
It’s a nice and clean place

We had a lovely experience: The unit was very clean and nicely decorated, the owners were friendly, it had garage parking, plus DirecTV (with premium channels and DVR). When we arrived there was a bottle of wine and some treats. And it was surprisingly quiet, too. (Granted, there's currently a rooster crowing its feathery heart out early most mornings, but we turned on the AC and it was fine.) We'd definitely consider staying there again!
Excellent house, location and host! We enjoyed staying at Tanja's place.

Tanja’s place was nicely decorated and clean. It is a basement apartment in her house, with parking available in the house garage. Laundry facilities are outside and shared with the main house. There is an A/C in the living room, but not in the bedrooms (and no ceiling fans) — we found the rooms to be a bit stuffy at times. Good location, very central to exploring Honolulu. We had a lot of luggage so we found the space to be somewhat cramped for 4 adults, as the decorations in the apartment don’t allow for a lot of storage space/functionality. Would be a good choice, however, for those traveling lightly.

Tanja has created a wonderful vacation space for travelers.   The beds were comfortable, the fully equipped kitchen made cooking a breeze, the shower has good pressure, and the hospitality was unparalleled!

The private parking space was ideal and the laundry facilities were very convenient!

Mom and I hope to return one day!!

Tanjas place is wonderful. You are staying amongst the locals so lots of trees, roosters, and chirping birds, are to be expected. It's peaceful and has everything you need. Spacious and comfortable, we had a fantastic time. Thank you again for letting us stay at your place!
This place was great!!! We had a good stay. Very clean and organized! Strongly recommend this place
Great time here

Tanja's house is great. The place is close to downtown but on the residential area so it is also quite. My family had a very good time here. Definitely recommend to people looking for a place to stay in Honolulu.

Tanja has set an example for other Airbnb hosts should run their premises. Her airbnb provides a welcoming and just-feel-like-home experience that hotels cannot offer. This is truly my best Airbnb experience. 

Beside providing clean towels and laundry supplies, Tanja’s airbnb also  provides coffee and snacks and she was very helpful giving us tips for where to eat and explore. I will totally recommend Tanja’s place.
Great host, nice listing, really enjoy staying there!

This is a very classy place. Very clean, well decorated, safe neighborhood with jungle In the back with tons of birds. So it did not feel like we were in the middle of the city. The kitchen was  well equipped. We made most of our meals there and mostly had what we needed for that. Loved the laundry facilities and garage parking. It was a very comfortable pleasant stay. Will go there again.
Schöne und geschmackvolle Wohnung. Alles da, was man für einen Urlaub benötigt. Wir (4 Personen) haben uns von Anfang an wohl gefühlt.

We have been to Hawaii many times but this was our first time using an Airbnb. Our expectations were blown out of the water! Tanja was amazing! Such an awesome location. Convenient to Waikiki and to the highway! 
We brought our daughter’s and she provided toys and beach equipment. We saw Tanja a few times and she was always so friendly! 
The apartment is awesome and such a great price. Two bedrooms, kitchen and living room with a dining table. It conformtably slept 3 adults and two children :)

Tanja ist eine wunderbare Gastgeberin. Das Willkommen und ankommen war fantastisch. Wir hatten gleich das Gefühl ein Teil der Familie zu sein. So viel Herzlichkeit und das auf der anderen Seite der Welt . Tanja selbst war immer für uns da wenn wir Fragen hatten und hat uns auch tolle Tips und Ratschläge gegeben. Die Wohnung ist wunderschön und durchdacht und mehr als vollständig eingerichtet. Selbst eine kleine Grundausstattung an Lebensmitteln war vorhanden . Ganz zu schweigen von der Einrichtung. Tanja hat sich hier viel Mühe gemacht und man findet immer wieder kleine Details die einfach schön sind und dadurch ein „heimeliges“ Gefühl vermitteln. Schlicht gesagtes hat es uns an nichts gefehlt und wir würden jederzeit gerne wieder kommen.
Awesome experience.  Tanja is extremely friendly and accommodating.  Her home is comfortable, clean, and was in a perfect location for us.
Great location and value
Very clean and tidy. Convenient location.
Good value for money. Really nice place.

Our family had an awesome stay with Tanja.  Very clean, plenty of towels, lovely personal touches (wine on arrival and a vase of sweets). We recommend it to anybody considering travelling to Honolulu.

Tanja and Robert has done great job at maintaining this place and made sure everyone’s comfortable. House was fully equipped with essentials, washing machine, dryer and such.

Our whole family spent a New Year’s Eve here, Tanja and Robert was kind enough to invite us to their little party and met some of their friends, we truly had a blast, highly recommended this place if you’re ever in town :)
Really enjoyed tanjas place! Super clean and very convenient location but also tucked away from the touristy action if you’re looking for more privacy.

This was our second stay here, and I'll repeat most of what I said last year (minus the comment about a rooster, since that was not around this time): We had a lovely experience: The unit was very clean and nicely decorated, the owners were friendly, it had garage parking, plus DirecTV (with premium channels and DVR). And it was surprisingly quiet, too.

This is exact how the pictures look like ... clean and comfortable 
warm hospitality from host

This accommodation in Makiki stood out from its neighbors in terms of recent renovations and immaculate condition.  
The furniture in the living room could be improved by adding more comfortable seating and providing luggage racks.  Adding more working drawers for clothing would enhance the space.
A nice space in Hawaii
This place is clean and decorated very beautifully!  Tanja was always available if needed. Really enjoyed our stay.

name: Flatshare in heart of Soho
summary: Room available with 1 super nice French roommate in Mid-levels from 9 to 31st May: double bed, storage, open view... 2 500 HKD/semaine.
description: Room available with 1 super nice French roommate in Mid-levels from 9 to 31st May: double bed, storage, open view... 2 500 HKD/semaine.

host.host_about:
I'm French, 24 years old and I've been working in HK for the past 2 years.

I love travelling and I enjoy spending time with people.

space: Charming, renovated, quiet, fast internet, close to everything and in a very safe place.
description: New and renovated apartment, cozy, residential and safe, without heavy traffic of cars. Near the beach (1 min walking), Copacabana (3 min walking), subway (13 min walking). name: Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow
summary: Located close to the beach-just steps to the water, you’ll love our optimal quiet location& newly renovated comfortable bungalow with oversized loft, large tropical lanai for lounging& paddle board, surfboard, boogie boards & beach gear for play. Ride your bike into historic Lahaina in just s few minutes, or stay on property and play in the 3 pools, tennis court, beautiful club house, surf breaks or wander the 30 acres. TAXID: TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
space: Newly renovated two story, 2 bedroom  one bedroom is super-sized loft room), 2 bathroom townhome, large covered lanai and all the amenities located in Puamana gated community
description: Located close to the beach-just steps to the water, you’ll love our optimal quiet location& newly renovated comfortable bungalow with oversized loft, large tropical lanai for lounging& paddle board, surfboard, boogie boards & beach gear for play. Ride your bike into historic Lahaina in just s few minutes, or stay on property and play in the 3 pools, tennis court, beautiful club house, surf breaks or wander the 30 acres. neighborhood_overview: Puamana is a manicured 30 acre gated complex of low-rise town-homes. There is a historic clubhouse, 3 swimming pools, gym, secluded beach (which has a variable amount of sand depending upon time of year), 2 surf breaks just out front and close walking or biking distance to the adorable town of Lahaina and all the restaurants & shops.
notes: The state of Hawaii charges a 14.42% lodging tax. Tax ID TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: Other than walking, or biking the one mile into Lahaina (bike rentals available at Boss Frogs for $65 week) you can use your own car, Uber or a local taxi as other options to get around.

host.host_about: Bozeman, Montana- mother of two adorable boys-  I love to travel and explore this amazing world we live in

reviews.comments: Great communication as well as an superb property and location!

When we where at the entrance from Puamana we already had a good feeling. When we where entering to the place from Elise the Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow we felt like at home. The place is even better as shown on the picture. It is very clean and tastefully furnished. The kitchen has everything you need to cook. And all the bedrooms are very nice. You got even surfboards or bikes to use. We had every morning our breakfast on the porch which was always a very nice start into the day. From the house you will get in approx. 30“ to the ocean where you can enjoy every day the moast romantic sunsets. Its just fantastic. Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow is located close to Lahaina where you also find a lot of nice restaurants and grocery stores. And from Puamana you also can do realy nice daytrips like going snorkeling or do the road to Hana, to Wailea Makena or you go to Haleakala where you have a nice few on 10000 Feet over Maui (if the weather is nice) And if you just feel like relaxing than the ocean pool from Puamana is the perfect place just to calm down an enjoy the beauty of the pacific. Right in front of the club house are two surf spots where my son and daughter went surfing every morning. We just can highly recomand this beautiful place and we are still overwhelmed. Thank you so much Elise for having us. You have been always so nice and flexible and did respond very quick to our e-mails and answers. We had a realy great time and we will miss this quiet and romatic place. We just love Maui and all the other Hawaiian Islands. 
Mahalo for everything. 

Lajos and Family

This was my first time using Airbnb and it was perfect!   The bungalow is very comfortable, in a beautiful setting and within walking distance (one mile) of shops and restaurants.  Elise had everything available for us and we felt right at home.  If we ever return to Maui, we would love to stay here again.   Thank you Elise!!!

We spent a week and a half at the Ocean Breeze Bungalow in Lahaina and it was absolutely perfect. The house was well appointed, extremely clean and  Puamana is centrally located to everything Maui has to offer. We had everything we needed to feel right at home. The complex is within walking distance of Lahaina. And a 30 minute drive to everything else. You really can't find a better place on Maui.
Elise was an ideal host and we had great communication from her and her onsite manager. 
One note - If you are looking for more of a party scene or a place to get a little wild this is probably not a great choice....if you want a sweet peaceful place that's not a pretentious resort, this is for you.
Lovely Place and quiet community

Elise was fantastic - quick and responsive to all communication.  She sent a very detailed e-mail with all the necessary check-in information. Her place was exactly as described and the photos were accurate.  It was, neat, clean, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen had everything necessary to cook and prepare meals. The neighborhood was awesome - clean and safe.  It was an easy walk into town and located close to many of the activities we had planned.

Fantastic location with many amenities and easy walk to all the shops, restaurants and activities that Lahaina has to offer. Limited sand on the beach at location (December), but plenty of activities for the whole family to enjoy. Elise is a pleasure to work with; outstanding communication and information shared!

This is a wonderful property, private, and walkable to the town of Lahaina. Good for family or couples getaway. Elise was readily available for any questions we had! We loved hanging out on the back porch in the beautiful Maui weather!

Great location! Just a nice walk down Front street brings you to the heart of Lahaina. A beautiful Airbnb steps away from the ocean and in a very nicely maintained community.

Elise is very very responsive. The guests before us left the place in a mild disarray breaking various items but she let me know as soon as she found out and attempted to fix what she could in one day. She sent us a lovely basket of Maui-an goods to make up for the honestly very minor inconveniences, which was a very nice gesture. Check-in instructions very clear and easy.

The house has a lovely back deck, while although not entirely private as you can see the other neighboring decks, was a nice place to enjoy some meals.  She offers many of the essentials such as a SUP, snorkels, watershoes, boogie boards and a outdoor shower, which made going out to explore the beaches hassle free. The rooms are nicely appointed and we really had everything we needed. Could not have asked for a better place to stay.

Great location and very comfortable.  Comes with everything you need for a beach vacation including boogie boards, paddle/surf boards...  we watched the sunset every day from the pool/clubhouse area.  Elise was wonderful and very responsive.  Mahalo for a wonderful vacation!!!

Puamana is the best place to stay in Maui. Elise's place is also the best place in Puamana. It had everything we needed to relax, swim, eat and play. Thank you for sharing an incredible place with us!

We had a great time. Elise's is a nice place with everything you need for a fun trip to Hawaii, including kitchen equipment, beach toys, surfing and body surfing boards, and beach lounge equipment. There was one minor mistake in the listing but Elise promptly corrected it when it was brought to her attention and made amends for the confusion. Everything else was as described and made for a wonderful trip to Maui! Thanks for sharing your place with us!

I would definitely recommend Elise's condo to anyone staying in the Lahaina area. It is even nicer than the pictures suggest and we were very comfortable during our stay. Elise thought of anything and everything you could possibly need - from making a home-cooked meal to spending a day on the beach. Also, the community of Puamana is beautiful! Do not miss the ocean front pool - it's spectacular.
Don't hesitate to book here - it's a great value and you'll love every minute of your stay!

Elise's place in Lahaina was perfect for the couple days we visited. The home is in a great location off front street, close to multiple restaurants and shopping opportunities. She has a lot of beach equipment that comes with the house. We used the snorkel equipment, SUP, and surfboard. All equipment is in good condition and beach access is everywhere you look. A really great place for a quick beach vacation. Wouldn't hesitate to go back.

Puamana and specifically Elise's lovely townhome were perfect for our family of four's vacation in Maui. We had everything we needed, most importantly an absolutely beautiful and serene central location.

Check-In was easy and the property was just as described. The property is located within a mile walk of downtown Lahaina. Wonderful selection of restaurants and the nightlife is second to none. Elise responded immediately when we needed new batteries for one of the remotes and had an issue with operating one of the ceiling fans. Her on-site handyman Rick responded within minutes to assist us. The property met all our needs and I can highly recommend the property for a comfortable stay.

We had a great stay at Elise's place. The unit was comfortable for four guests. We loved the back patio area and having the charcoal grill was really nice. There was no beach access for us as the sand was covered by rocks however, this was stated in the description that beach access can vary depending on the time of year. The grounds were neat and clean and the views of the ocean are surreal. Elise was very responsive to any messages or texts. The check in process was easy and all the information was accurately provided by Elise. We had a great stay at Puamana and loved exploring Lahaina ( several shops and restaurants are close by). We would love to come back some day.
Incredible property.  Fast communications.  All the little touches (Hulu, grill, beach gear, charcoal, etc) were awesome!

This place his just amazing. Loved the private surfbreak! Very close to downtown lahaina. Elise was very accomodating for our schedule and responded very quickly. I don't have much more to say than our vacation at Elise's place was amazing!!
This was such a nice home to stay in. We had a fabulous time. The house had everything we needed for a fantastic holiday.

Elise's home is a beautiful home. It was very comfortable and located in the beautiful community of Puamana. The location itself seems as though it's right out of a brochure for Maui as it is right next to the ocean with huge palm trees everywhere. The location itself is very convenient as it is only a mile away from the center of Lahaina. It is close enough to get there were ease but far away enough that you can sleep while you can listen to only the waves crashing in the background. The house itself was clean and spacious. The pictures were very accurate in showing representing the home. Elise was awesome in getting back to me with any questions or concerns I had. She was also able to provide an extensive list of places, sights, and activities that you can do on the island. I know with me, I like to maximize my experience wherever I go. With Maui, there are so many places to see that it can get a bit overwhelming. The information that Elise provided was essential to narrowing down all the great experiences we had. All in all, my stay at Elise's home was an integral part to the amazing experience I had on Maui and would recommend this home to anyone!

This house was perfect for my family. Large upstairs and great location. Our favorite part was the patio. It was great to relax in the morning and have our coffee while listening to the birds and watching the lizards run by.

Elise's place is A-mazing.  Great location close to all the fun, but removed enough to be relaxing and quiet if you want.  Elise is a great host who was in contact and gave us all the information and responsive to questions.  She also has a great feel for the area and "things to do" restaurants etc.  The home is comfortable, cozy, and has all the creature comforts you may need.  I highly recommend.

It took 40 minutes to drive from the airport to Puamana and the instructions to check in were straightforward. Our family of five fitted in to the house comfortably and having two bathrooms was helpful. The house is tastefully decorated in a beach theme. The beds were comfortable and we appreciated the air conditioning coming from a New Zealand winter! The outdoor area was a nice place to relax and read. We used the beach gear provided, that was a bonus. The pool was a family favourite as were those amazing sunsets. We have great memories of our stay and would happily go back again.
We were so comfortable in this home.  Elise covered all the details and we appreciated it.  We hope to return.

Elise's place was amazing! The location was perfect - quiet and peaceful, yet still close to amenities in town. The nearby beach (a five minute stroll away) was very uncrowded. 

We traveled as a family of four, and our two teenagers loved having the loft space as their own hangout zone.

Sitting out on the lanai in the morning with a cup of coffee, listening to the birds and nature, was one of our favorite things to do. We also loved grilling in the evenings. 

We will definitely return! Thank you, Elise, for a wonderful stay.
The house is very clean, full of equipments and well furnished!! Elise is always available for info and suggestions... great host!!!

We had a great stay in Elise's Ocean Breeze house. It is clear that Elise and her family use the house themselves: it's not just another rental condo, but it shows that it gets quite some TLC. It feels homely and is well equipped (both on the water sports and the cooking front). It is a small, cosy house, but well laid out and it has A/C, which is not standard on Hawaii. 
Elise herself was very easy to communicate with. She responded within minutes to my emails and provided personal tips on what not to miss on the island. A perfect host. 

The only downside were the bugs, but I guess that's part of being on a tropical island.

We loved Elise place . 
Location , communication great , surfboard and paddle board for our use , 
We definitely recommend.

This property is absolutely fabulous!! It was exactly as described and offered everything you would want, and more! The host, Elise, was super quick to respond to communications, and provided lots of additional local information which we found very useful. The location was ideal, with just a short stroll into Lahaina to explore the many shops and restaurants. Having three pools on the property was excellent, as it offered a range of pool-time fun for both my children and my mother, not to mention all the surrounding beaches where my boys surfed everyday. We would definitely hire this house again if we are ever to return to Maui. So if you are looking for a little slice of heaven outside of the super-busy resort area of Kaanapali, and a home away from home, then look no further!

This was an enchanted, once-in-a-lifetime trip for my wife and me and that is in no small part due to Elise's gorgeous, safe, clean, perfectly located place. We were both fascinated by how much Puamana reminded us of our Southern California childhoods in the 60's and 70's - except it was the childhood we both aspired to and not so much the one we actually had! The grounds were immaculate, the location ideal, and the bright, beach-themed bungalow was absolutely perfect for us. We especially noticed how quiet it was - no traffic noise at all, just the very light purr of the waves in the middle distance. Elise was very quick and complete with all communication, which comforted me since we had never been to Hawaii and I really wanted to make sure we were stepping into a good situation. This was also a surprise anniversary/birthday trip for my wife so I needed everything to be perfect. With all the great beach-fun gear provided by Elise and the easy walk to the private beach (Puamana is a private, gated community), we had the makings of many warm, sweet memories. And yes, we did take her advice and had both morning coffee and sunset snacks at the clubhouse! I haven't even mentioned the location - a mile from the heart of Lahaina and just another 5 minute drive up to Black Rock. We took full advantage of both places and still had plenty of downtime to recharge and relax at the bungalow. We are still in the glow of the whole trip, but really, I cannot recommend Elise's bungalow enough.

Elise's place was  perfect for our mother/daughter getaway.  Elise was incredibly helpful, her place has nice personal touches and was very clean, and the location was perfect. We could walk into town for meals and enjoy the beach and ocean pool during the day.  We wanted to simply relax and we could not have chosen a better location for that.   We will definitely return.

We highly recommend Puamana and Elise - the facility was exactly as advertised- clean and easily accessible! We walked into town several times and used the quiet pool for laps, reading and relaxation! Neighbors were scarce but friendly and the weather was Stellar!! First time Airbnb - now committed to the process! Kudos
Great spot, walking distance to Lahaina, stocked with all the goods you need for the beach / cooking.
Well appointed beach bungalow feel. I wish we would have been able to use the beautiful Lanai but the weather didn't cooperate.  Next time!  Owner was very quick to respond.  Thank you!
Charming place close to the ocean. We loved the pool overlooking the ocean. Elise gave us great local tips and was quick to respond. Great trip!

The location is really great, near Lahaina but not right in the center of town. The complex is right on the ocean, a short walk to palm trees and shoreline, with a nice pool and clubhouse (though we didn't have a chance to use it). The loft is super sunny and great for spreading out, or for a family. And a shady back porch with outdoor seating on the garden area. Very nice, you won't be disappointed!
Great spot! Nice amenities, especially the property outside.

Elise’s place was fantastic for our family of four.  It was spotlessly clean with a well equipped kitchen for self catering and lots of towels and water activity equipment to use.  The location of the apartment is awesome - we watched the sunset and the whale activity from the pool house every evening and loved swimming in the ocean front pool.  Being close to Lahaina was also fantastic - good supermarkets, coffee and interesting shops.  We loved our time at Elise’s place.  Thank you Elise!

Elise’s place is perfect for a family! The house is stunning, clean and the location is simply the best. A short minute walk to the beach and the pool, and a few minutes from Lahaina’s Center. The backyard is perfect for some great dinners and some quiet breakfasts with the ones you love. Elise is an amazing host!

Wonderful bungalow just as described .
Full amenities ice chest, beach toys paddle board! Central location for walking into Lahaina.

Elise’s home was beautiful, stylish, clean, excellent location and great use of space. We loved the grounds and easy walk to town. She responded to any questions immediately. Every extra included for great beach days down to the ice packs and coolers. Would have stayed forever!!!

Elise’s Ocean Breeze bungalow was ideal for our family gathering and provided a peaceful, beautiful setting for our time together. Elise was very responsive to any requests I had leading up to our stay. The space included all the comforts of home, and we found it was the ideal location for the activities we enjoy. Very very nice!

What an amazing experience!   The home was beautiful and more than expected.  The private lanai with outdoor seating was a perfect start to every morning.   The home was tastefully decorated, clean, and welcoming!  The location was so perfectly close to downtown Lahaina.   Elise was lightening quick in responses when there was only 1 key left at the home vs 2, and 2 additional keys were made on the spot.   The home is in a wonderful private gated community with friendly neighbors/ guests.   The quiet hours also made for relaxing evenings to wind down after fun-filled days.   Our teenage son LOVED having a large upstairs loft all to himself as well.   Elisa also provided a wealth of local knowledge and helpful tips and recommendations as well. 

My only comments would be that while walking or biking into Lahaina is absolutely possible, there is no shoulder on the road and quite a bit of vehicle  traffic.  I don't recommend biking with smaller/ younger children if possible.   However, downtown is just perfect for walks, great food and drink options, and welcoming locals.  We can't wait to return!!!  Thank you for opening your home to us!  We will be back again.

Our family of five enjoyed a wonderful week at the bungalow! The location is excellent, close enough to town that it is convenient, but the property is not at all crowded. We used the pools on site and  walked down to the public beach at the end of the property. While the kitchen and bathroom spaces are on the smaller side, the loft easily accommodated our three older kids and the lanai gives ample room for everyone to spread out. You can enjoy a morning cup of coffee at the side of the bungalow, where Elise has set up a small table and chair set, and watch the surf roll in. We did experience a little noise from neighbors, but less than you would at a typical hotel. Overall this was a great experience for our family.

What you see on line is truly what you get with way more!  All the amenities you could hope for as well as a super location to club house and quiet pool. The trip into Lahaina is a mile away and an enjoyable bike ride or walk. We felt very safe in Puamana and would definitely recommend this unit to others.
What a wonderful place, close to town but the property feels like you are off the beaten path. Elise has it all covered,  appreciated the beach toys, towels and chairs.
Great space, loved the lanai, good location near Lahina.
Wonderful place. Great for families.

Great place and very responsive host.

We stayed for 2 weeks. We, as a family built great memories there!

Slight issues with the dishwasher, which they called a handyman very quickly for.

Small ant problem, but nothing we were concerned about.

We will be back for sure!!!!!

We stayed for ten nights and we wish we could have stayed longer. This bungalow is the far best that we have come across renting Air BnB. It was everything as promised and then some. The host, Elise, is very accomodating and was quick to respond to any questions and also came with suggestions for adventures around Maui. 
The location is great with both ocean access and close enough to Lahaina to walk there. The neighbourhood is very quiet and serene and the surrounding is lush. We highly recommend this to anyone who wants a part of paradise.

We have been approximately two weeks in Elise‘s host. Our stay was amazing, we didn‘t miss anything. There are all facilities and equipment, which make your holiday even better. The apartment is furnished with love and the Resort has everything, tennis courts, pools, beach access and by the clubhouse you can see the most beautiful sunset on the island. 
We didn‘t face no problems getting there as Elise explained everything very well! 
Summed up, best thing that we probably could have booked and we absolutely would go there again.

Elise's home is even better than any description, you've simply got to see it. Yes, Maui and Hawaii isn't cheap, and neither is the accommodation, but by heck it is worth it. The house is in excellent condition throughout and everything is spick and span clean. There is everything you need and more for your stay. Elise is a fabulous host and kept in touch with us as a hurricane threatened to hit the island. She gave us tips at every turn, not only to stay safe, but also where to find great and fun things to do on Maui. The location of her house could not have been any better to be honest. From Lahaina, we were able to see almost everything we set out to do before our arrival. Elise, thank you again for being such an amazing host!!!
Great location, stunning views from the clubhouse where we watched the sunset most nights. Would definitely recommend to others

Such a greay stay. Clean community with great facilities. The condo is comfy with a fun second floor that would be ideal for kids. Incredible pool that overlooks the ocean just steps away. Lahaina is a mile away. We walked it many times. Great dining. Sit and enjoy or, Fleetwoods and Pacific’O were our favorites, or carry out back to the condo to relax. For carry out I recommend Paia Fishmarket. Excellent and reasonably priced. 
Looking forward to our next visit!

Brian and Dieny
Illinois

We absolutely loved our stay it was wonderful! Such a perfect location and the property really is something very special. 

Highly recommended this property a truly wonderful, relaxing experience. 

Elise and Adrian are great hosts so responsive and easy to communicate with and very helpful.

Thanks so much Annmarie, Mel and Kylie.
Elise‘s house is beautiful with a lot of pretty details. The communication was always very kind an the answers on questions very fast. We highly recommend to stay in this super located house.

We loved our stay at Puamana.  The condo was just as expected. The complex is quiet and beautiful and convenient to everything in the area.  We hope to come back in a few years. The hosts were wonderful also.
Beautiful property!  Very comfortable and with great access to everything Maui has to offer.  I wish I lived there.
Great location

Puamana Ocean Breeze was a beautiful place to stay in Lahaina.  We loved everything about the unit including it’s location so close to the ocean pool and the club house for sunset happy hours.  I would absolutely recommend the unit to anyone traveling to Lahaina.

Loved staying here and would recommend to everyone. Completely accurate descriptions and excellent communication. Location was super convenient to downtown Lahaina but loved that it wasn’t right in the hustle and bustle. The best thing was having beach chairs, a variety of snorkel gear, coolers, beach bags, water shoes, umbrella, towels etc all available for use. Large outdoor patio space was lovely for morning breakfast. Would definitely stay here again!

Elise is an amazing host - quick responses and provides lots of suggestions for things to check out in Maui. The space was beautiful and well located in the complex - quiet but super close to the ocean and clubhouse. I would highly recommend staying here! Thanks again, Elise!
Great place, very convenient to Lahaina and all it offers!
Elise's bungalow is wonderful. Location is ideal for exploring Maui; home is very clean & well-stocked. Lovely decor. Watched humpback whales right from the sea-side pool!

We loved your place - it was all and even more than we hoped for. Nice clean - with so many little extra details, only a short walk to pool, or ocean. Already planning our next trip 
Thanks  Again - it was great

Perfect for a family! We had two little ones with us ( 1&4 ). During nap time we could hangout on the patio and still enjoy the sun. I do recommend renting baby gates if you have little ones that aren’t good on there feet still/get into everything. Watching the sunset out front of the club house and the whales breaching was truly breathtaking!!

name: São João
summary: The apartment in Oporto has 2 bedrooms and has capacity for 5 people.  The apartment is homely, is fully-equiped, and  is 120 m².  It has views of the mountain.  The house is situated in a family-friendly neighborhood in the center of the city.
space: The apartment in Oporto has 2 bedrooms and has capacity for 5 people.  The apartment is homely, is fully-equiped, and  is 120 m².  It has views of the mountain.  The house is situated in a family-friendly neighborhood in the center of the city. The accommodation is equipped with the following items: lift, garden furniture, 10 m² terrace, iron, internet (Wi-Fi), hair dryer, central heating, air-conditioned, covered parking in the adjoining building, 1 electric anti-mosquito device, 1 TV, tv satellite (Languages: Spanish, English, German, French), DVD. In the induction open plan kitchen, refrigerator, microwave, freezer, dishwasher, dishes/cutlery, kitchen utensils, coffee machine, toaster and kettle are provided.
