Wir fühlten uns in unserer Unterkunft sehr gut aufgehoben. Orestes war ein aufmerksamer Gastgeber, ohne aufdringlich zu sein. Das originelle, gut gepflegte  Haus liegt in einer ruhigen Gegend. U-Bahnstationen der Linien E und 7 liegen ein paar Schritte entfernt und man ist in 1 Station mitten in Manhatten. Das Zimmer ist zweckmässig eingerichtet. Wir durften unser Frühstück in dem wunderbaren romantischen Garten einnehmen. Ein Highlight!
Kurz zusammengefasst: Die Unterkunft können wir wärmstens empfehlen und würden bei einem nächsten Aufenhalt in NY sofort wieder dort buchen.

Thank you so much for the wonderful hospitality, Orestes... our stay couldn't have been made better! Our room was very comfortable, quiet and very private. We loved having breakfast in your lovely garden oasis. We got to really appreciate the neighbourhood and easy access to the subway system. I would gladly return! :-)

Fantastic stay! The location as perfect, very close the the subway. The property itself was lovely, we specially liked the bathroom, very spacious. Orestes is a lovely host, he was always there if we needed any help at the same time maintaining our privacy. If we visit NY again, we will definitely stay here.
Great place, amazingly located, kind host.

Orestes, Thanks for being our consummate host ! 
Allister, Brandon (our 20mth old) and I stayed with Orestes at his gorgeous townhome on a quaint tree lined street.  We come to NY often but this was the first time we decided not to stay at a boring hotel in Manhattan and we're so glad we picked to stay at Orestes!  The place is just lovely, and the neighbour (that we met) was great.  Very secure home and in a safe neighborhood if you are worried or new to the Airbnb experience.  Orestes had great recommendations if you want to explore Queens or head into Manhattan.  The home is as described but better, you have full privacy in the spacious room and large bathroom, clean, and very convenient access on the E and 7 lines (only a 2-3 minute walk).  Besides the art and decor of the place, the other highlight is the beautiful garden in the back of the home.  A garden paradise away from the hustle and bustle of the city, we loved kicking back and enjoying our breakfast in the garden.   If you share a love of photography, art and travel/culture, you will enjoy your stay with Orestes’s as we have.  Definitely would love to stay at Orestes’s again, and would recommend to our friends and other Airbnb members.
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Orestes es encantador  y su casa muy acogedora. Nuestra estancia fue muy agradable y tranquila. Recomendo la experiencia. Gracias Orestes.

Nice room in a beatiful house! It is a quiet, safe neighbourhood, with restaurants and shops nearby. Manhattan can be reached in minutes using the Metro. Two stations are located close by. Orestes and Cristian are perfect hosts, being there when you need them yet still allowing for privacy. We were allowed to use the washer/dryer and besides the intermittent wifi-connection, everything was fine. Kiki is a delight for every dog lover and for early risers the garden is an oasis of peace. Thank you very much!

We enjoyed the stay a lot. Orestes and Chris are really nice guys and help with info wherever they can. Several train and metrolines are just around the corner so it is very easy to go to manhattan or to discover queens, williamsburgh, brooklyn ..... The house is perfectly renovated and the room with seperate bathroom is perfect for recovering from intense city tours. Around the corner are restaurants and bars but you have to know a bit where to look for it ( try court sqare diner, john brown bbq, also a nice thai at court square)

Orestes was welcoming and a good host.  We were very grateful for the phone calls that he made on our behalf to sort out some coach tickets and he suggested places of interest to visit. 

The room is large and comfortable with a microwave and cups for that all-important cup of home-made tea or coffee. The bathroom is next door to the bedroom and the shower lived up to the expectations that we had read about in previous reviews!

This is a great location, very close to the subway and only a few stops from the heart of Manhattan. The neighbourhood feels like a safe, quiet residential area with a good selection of cafes and diners which are cheaper than the city centre. This was a secure and friendly base from which we enjoyed a great time in New York. 

Thank you, Orestes!
The host canceled this reservation 158 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The location is pretty good, its close to the train station and there are several restaurants and grocery stores nearby. Orestes is a very nice person! Highly recommend!

A great place to stay in NYC. Orestes is a brilliant host with a fabulous apartment. The room and bathroom are spacious, clean and decorated to a very high standard.  Orestes has loads of local knowledge and was a great help to us. The apartment is in a fantastic location. The metro is a 5 min walk and we felt very safe. You can also get a really good view of Manhattan from GantryPlaza which is only 20 mins away on foot. Here you can also get a boat down the river. Another great tip from Orestes. 

Thank you Orestes! Hopefully be back in NYC in the future!

Orestes was very friendly, communicative, and gracious before and during our stay. Upon arrival, he gave us a nice quick tour and we got to meet Kiki the lovely dog. His place was very clean and quaint, just as described. His backyard was especially beautiful - too bad we did not get to utilize it since we were out exploring most of the days. In fact the entire block is just beautiful to walk down.

Overall our stay with Orestes was very pleasant. We'd stay here again if we visited.

You're paying for location. The place is very nice but if you're in the city exploring you will not care so much about how nice the place is.  If you plan to have any guests at all this is not the place.  For not that much more you can get a hotel in the city which could be a better option for you depending on your needs.  

But Queens is an amazing place and a very nice place to stay.  We were able to walk to all kinds of food, bars, and the beautiful park on the water where you can see the whole city skyline.  The "private entrance, private room, dedicated bathroom" are all right outside of the hosts home office which he will be in constantly, which is fine but the wording of his description put a larger emphasis on privacy so I guess expected more.

Over all, this place is very nice but if I had to do it again I would strongly consider going to a hotel for a little more per day or gone to a cheaper Airbnb.

The journey is very happy! Orestes"s home is very comfortable and clean. There have M/E/7 line subway to Manhattan, It takes only one stop and ten minutes .Nearby supermarket and restaurant is available .We love it and hope to live next time!

We had a great time in NYC and in Orestes house! The location in LIC was perfect and very close with the subway to Brooklyn and Manhattan  (1 stop!). We also liked the neighborhood and the beautiful historic house. The room was clean and spacious, the bed comfortabel. Above of all there is a beautiful garden where we had our own breakfast every morning. Thank you Orestes for all the good care!

Orestes & Chris were fantastic hosts. The accommodation was exactly as described - even before arrival Orestes was extremely responsive in replying to any queries we had. The location was great - close to the subway and only 2/3 stops from Manhattan, but far enough away from the city to get away from it all. We had an absolutely brilliant time and would definitely book this accommodation again if or when we decide to return to New York! Thanks for everything :)

We had a wonderful time in NYC and at Oreste's house. It is perfect if you want to be close to Manhattan (just 1-3 stops with the metro). The neighbourhood LIC is very nice and safe with metro stations just around the corner. The room and bathroom are spacious, clean and comfortable and Oreste is a great host with a Sweet dog. We really enjoyed our stay!
Great location and room. Orestes was a very friendly and good host. I would come back again.

Orestes es un gran anfitrión, no sólo preocupado de que el alojamiento fuera perfecto, si no que también tuvo la amabilidad de compartir algunos consejos geniales sobre la ciudad, lo que hizo nuestra estadía aún mejor. El alojamiento es exactamente como se muestra en la descripción, y aún mejor, espacioso y luminoso y con un jardín de sueños. Lo pasamos de maravilla junto a mi marido. Lo amamos y esperamos volver pronto!
Perfecto.Ideal. No está en Manhattan, pero en 3 paradas cortas de metro estas en el Estación Central

Orestes was very prompt in replying to all questions and requests.  He gave great suggestions of places to see.  The location is very close to MTA station - very convenient.  The bathroom and towels were cleaned daily, which was very nice.

Beautiful home, nice sized bedroom and private bathroom with a lovely large shower. Located on a very scenic street and conveniently close to transport which takes you straight to Manhattan in a matter of minutes. Orestes is a very friendly and helpful host - highly recommend for a fantastic stay in the Big Apple!

We love this place. This was our second stay at Orestes'. The first time I was alone with my oldest (11y), this second visit with my wife and our 2 kids (9 & 11y). It is very quiet, at the same time very close to everything wih the 2 subway lines at just 1 block away. There is also a super convenient dinner at the corner. The room is cozy, the bathroom is superb. Exactly as pictured. Orestes and Christian are great guests!

Orestes was an absolutely fantastic host. The room was extremely clean and comfortable during the cold weather. He was very friendly and was always available for tips or suggestions for the city. The location is perfect. Do not confuse Long Island City with Long Island. It is only one subway stop to Manhatten and it takes about a 10 minute ride to Time Square or Grand Central. Highly recommended Orestes for any type of stay.
Thank you for a great stay! We look forward to coming back! We would love the tv to be working next time, but everything else was great! This is a great place and very accurate description!

Orestes' house is an absolute gem! The room is quiet, clean, large and comfortable, and Orestes and Christian made me feel very welcome in their stunning home. The back yard is an oasis of tranquility in frenetic New York.

Long Island City is just one stop from Manhattan on the subway, and is very easy to get to from JFK and La Guardia, and has excellent transport links to Queens, Manhattan and Brooklyn.

Highly recommended!

This is my 3rd times at Orestes'. It is my favorite place to stay when I visit NYC. I feel always welcome. Cris and Orestes are great hosts. The proximity of the train lines around the house makes it easy to go around the city. I highly recommend it.
As others have noted, walkable and comfortable. Recommended!

Everything is comfortable,when I lived in Orestes's house. Specaily,I really enjoyed the bathroom that Mr.Orestes provide us. It is really clean and nice. The location is very
convenience. My friend and I really like it!

This place is the perfect location for someone looking to explore queens as well as travel into the city during their trip. The block is historic and picturesque, so close to lots of different subway lines and the room itself is very clean and comfortable! Would highly suggest this place.
Spotless accommodation in a up-and-coming part of the city with super easy access to public transit and tourist destinations in Manhattan. The hosts were fantastic.

Orestes is the perfect host: around when needed and not around when privacy was needed. The best shower I have ever had. Beautiful artsy environment that was intriguing and gorgeous. Easy access to major subway lines with neighborhood food options.  Lovely time.

What a great find, brilliant location, 1 stop your in Manhattan. a lovely room, spotlessly clean, fantastic shower in such a stylish home. Fan, aircon, firidge everything you need for your stay.

Orestes was very welcoming, helpful and I hope we are able to stay again.

La maison d'Orestes est très bien placée entre 2 stations de métro (E/M et 7/G) et très bien décorée ! On sent la patte de l'architecte. Orestes est un hôte très sympa qui connait bien la ville et a plein de bons plans. Très facile d'accès depuis JFK et très rapide pour se rendre à Manhattan (2 stations très proches à 2min). Orestes is a very nice host, very kind. His house and the room is awesome for a couple, with a nice little garden. Location is great, easy acces from JFK, easy to go to Manhattan or Brooklynn by subway (very close to 2 metro stations). We will love to come back next time !

Que dire sur la maison d’Orestes et de Cristian qui n’ait  pas déjà été  dit. 
Nous revenons ravis de notre séjour à Long Island City à 5 minutes de Manhattan.
Tout nous a séduit :

La maison se situe dans une rue type West Village mais en mieux, puisque nous avons été surpris en arrivant d’entendre chanter les oiseaux dans les arbres. Avons succombé au charme du jardin d’Orestes. Maison aménagée avec goût, très inspirante.
La situation extrêmement près du métro lignes (E/M) ou (7/G). on peut facilement aller à l’aéroport mais aussi en plein Manhattan plus vite que si on y était ! 
La vue sur Manhattan superbe le long de la East River. Bateau one stop to Manhattan et possibilité de joindre le Williamsburg et wall street aussi
Les bons restaurant alentours (Bia, LIC Market, Court square ouvert 24H/24) 
Le quartier riche en musées contemporains et street art (près des studios de cinéma)

Mais surtout l’accueil et la personnalité de notre hôte Orestes. En effet sa gentillesse, disponibilité  a fait de ce séjour un moment unique. Nous avons pu notamment partager notre  passion pour le jardin et l’art. Bref tout était parfait !

Thanks again Orestes for receiving us. We look forward to seeing you again.

Fantastic space to stay in. Orestes made us feel very welcome. The listing is absolutely perfect for getting anywhere in Manhattan. There is a Metro station right around the corner. Very convenient.

The neighborhood was also quiet and felt safe. Thank you for hosting us!

We had a fantastic stay at Orestes and Christian’s house. They are amazing.
And Orestes description (and pictures) of the room, the house, the area and the direction from JFK was exactly right.
They were both very helpful with hints on restaurants, sightseeing etc.
Thank you for opening your home to us – hope you will let us come back. All the best to you and Kiki.

Orestes' place in LIC is very well located and charming. The room is very big and the bathroom is newly renovated. The private entrance into their home makes it easy access in and out. We definitely recommend it!
Great hosts and a wonderfull placefrom which to explore the City. Close to Metro and in no-time in Manhattan. I would reccomend it highly to friends and family.

We spent 4 amazing in NYC and we really appreciated the Orestes house. Beautiful and typical house. The little garden is lovely and very useful for an outdoor breakfast (except some hungry mosquitos...). The position of this B&B is quite perfect (2 min from the subway Line E so 5 min from Manhattan) and finally Orestes is a very sympatical host, always available. Thanks, hope to come back again.

We looooove staying at Orestes', this is our second time and it was just as great as the first but with the bonus that we already knew Orestes was an amazing host so it was all easy peasy. Room is just as pictured, huge, clean, bathroom is amazing and you can't beat the location. 

Hope you are well Orestes, Juan says hi and we'll see you again soon!
As advertised.  Lovely street.  Subway access to Manhattan is excellent.  We really only slept there which it was perfect suited for.  Accommodating and friendly hosts.  Thanks!
Great location and wonderful hosts!! We loved our stay here.
My first trip to NYC was fantastic!! My son and I were so blessed by our gracious hosts!!! Thank you both so much for your kindness...we are so grateful!!!
Excelente ubicación de la casa, la atención de Orestes es excelente y hay un buen jardin disponible para los huespedes. Transporte publico a solo 1 cuadra. En fin muy recomendable.

Orestes's place was great, the best we've been to so far. 

It's just like the pictures: pretty, spacious and clean. He made us feel at home right away and gave us some good tips to eat and go to. If you need him, he's always available.

The location is great as well. The subway is literately around the corner and not far from Manhattan.

We really recommend this place!

We really loved our stay at Orestes's. The bedroom and the bathroom were both really large and confortable. The house was very tastefully decorated, and really close to the subway. Orestes is very welcoming and kindly answered to all our questions. We will definitely come back! Thank you!

Orestes was an excellent host. The room was large and comfortable, the bathroom was lovely and everything was clean. 

The location was fantastic, it was so quick and easy to get everywhere we wanted to on the subway which is right around the corner. 

We had a great stay and would definitely recommend staying here.

The house is just few stops out of Manhattan, in a residential area, with the chance to take several subway lines to reach different points of the city easily. The room is comfortable, as the bathroom too: it would have been great to have the access to the bathroom straight from the bedroom, because you need to walk through the entrance to the working studio, but Orestes has been always very nice and left us our privacy and spaces. He is a great host, very precise and available to give tips and indications. Next to the house there is a supermarket, an American diner, Coffee shops, there is everything you could need during a vacation.  
It's a good solution for people visiting NYC and not spending lot of time inside the house and for who likes to live more as a resident than as a tourist.

We had six fantastic days in Orestes charming house and with Orestes as the perfect host. 
Nice, friendly, many good advices, as walking tours, what to see, where to eat etc. Nice to stay in a part of NY, where people lives. In addition, easy to take the subway to Manhattan, being in the center of this interesting town – and nice to come back in the evenings in a quiet atmosphere.
Al the best recommendations to the place, and Orestes!
Henrik and Rikke, august 2017
We had very comfortable and convenient stay!! Thank you so much!

Great location, so close to Manhattan. Room is spacious and very comfortable. The shower is phenomenal - multiple heads and a steam function. Cris was lovely and very helpful. We highly recommend Orestes' home and would return.
This places is amazing, located in a very convenient and safe area. The hosts are very friendly and always willing to help!

We stayed for three nights. As first time travelers to NYC, we wanted to be close to or in Manhattan. We chose this property because it was close to the city but allowed us to escape the hustle and bustle. The property is only a minute walk from Courts Square metro and the subway goes directly into Manhattan. 15 minutes and you're in Times Square. It is quick, cheap (about $2.50 one-way) and convenient. An Uber or taxi from Downtown is about $30. The neighborhood itself is quintessential gritty Queens but did not appear dangerous and the street itself is beautiful and quite. 
The room exceeded our expectations. We thought it would be a small space, but it was the size of a standard hotel room. It was clean. It has a mini fridge, microwave, couch, double bed and air conditioning. The bed was soft and the room was quiet. The bathroom was fantastic. A proper bathroom with big shower, plenty of hot water - plus a sauna feature. 
Both Orestes and Cris were wonderful hosts. They were accommodating to our requests and were very welcoming with their home. They lived upstairs, allowing for privacy as well as access to free wifi and most of the whole bottom floor. We were also offered full use of the courtyard at the back, which would be perfect for breakfast in the sunshine or to read a book. 
This place is a definite gem and we would highly recommend staying here again.  Thank you again, Orestes and Cris for your kind hospitality.

Merci à Orestes et Christian pour leurs explications, précisions et propositions de visites, notamment une entre Le Queen's et Brooklyn fort sympathique!
Ils sont disponibles et très accueillants. 
Le calme de la maison est salutaire après les journées de visites entre-autres dans la fougue de Manhattan!
Nous avons pu profiter du joli jardin pour les petits-déjeuner et ce fut bien agréable! La maison est très jolie et rapide d'accès pour Manhattan! On vous le conseille vivement. A&C

Orestes's place is great!!! Location, get around is easy, love the LIC market Orestes recommended. Had brunch there twice! I definitely recommend you to live here! Its truly a good experience and I can't ask for more!

The listing made it sound like it was a private room on the lower level of their home that they do not use. It said private door entrance which I believed would be our own and we would have a room in a location they never came to. The room is next to their office space and they were there quite often playing music and working. The entrance was the one they used and was not private. I feel they made it seem quite different in the description. They also have no instruction about checking out and so we just left in the morning to catch our flight and then he sent me kind of a rude sounding message saying that wasn’t the right thing to do and he deserved an explanation. It did not meet expectations at all.

Orestes and Christian are welcoming og positive hosts. 
Close to the subway, big room with private big bathroom. 
Refrigirator and microwaveoven in the room. 
Quiet and safe neighbourhood. 
TIP:  use the Citibikes to go round New York. You see a lot more this way.

Great place for people looking to experience New York City. It’s close to Manhattan while also being a quieter neighborhood. Orestes is an excellent host and had many great recommendations for places to eat and sights to see. Definitely would come here again.

Orestes's place is really convenient for anyone visiting NYC. Close to a transport hub and walkable it's a great jumping off point regardless of your plans. Orestes is also a fantastic host with a wealth of information about his city. We had an amazing trip, improved by having an amazing place to stay.

I loved staying with Orestes. The location was unbelievable, and on a block I always wanted to live on (looks like something straight out of Sesame Street). Super close to the trains. I made it to the center of Grand Central in 12 minutes. Highly recommend! And Orestes is a wonderful artist as well... I would have loved to see more of his work. Maybe next time...

Orestes was an amazing host. He went above and beyond to share local knowledge on everything from trains and best places to eat. The location is superb, literally a 2min walk to the subway which takes u directly into Grand Central/Times sq and one arrives every 5mins. If we were to do this trip again we would definitely stay here. The accommodation is fantastic, quirky décor which we loved, comfy bed and an amazing shower. Thanks a million.

Sin dudarlo reservar el apartamento de Orestes, tanto por su cercanía con Mahattan como por la amabilidad y el excepcional trato que tiene que te hace sentir como en casa, mi viaje en Nueva York ha sido increíble y parte es por Orestes.

We found a comfortable bed and futon, and a luxurious bath. The location was quiet while at the same time close to the subway. Directions for my trip from JFK were clear and helpful. I highly recommend Orestes’ place.
A beautiful room and fantastic host!

Orestes was a wonderful host - very welcoming and friendly. The room itself was clean, cozy, and comfortable, and the location was excellent with easy access to the subway line. Would definitely recommend staying here on your trip to NYC.
Orestes is kind, thoughtful, and wonderful!

We stayed with Orestes for a week and have nothing but good things to say. Clean with a large bathroom and bedroom the accommodations were great. 
Communication with Orestes was simple and quick.
Thank you!

Orestes is a very nice guy, with a very nice place to stay. Clean and big room / bathroom and a beautifull garden. 

Location is perfect. 1 minute walking from the metro and 10 minutes from Times Square with the metro. 

He is happy to give you al the information you need as well as more then enough privacy to get your rest. 

It has been a great experience, both the city as the accommodation. 

Kind regards,
Pieter
The house is amazing and comfortable, especially the bathroom! The host is also friendly and approachable. Host can arrange the check in / out time based on our needs :)
Orestes es un anfitrión muy amable,tiene un lugar realmente muy bonito, cómodo y limpio. La ubicación es buena tiene 3 líneas de subte cerca y es muy fácil llegar desde el JFK. Gracias!

Muy lindo lugar, la casa es acogedora, muy cómoda y limpia. Orestes es atento y preocupado, un muy buen anfitrión.  La ubicación  inmejorable, a una estación de Manhatan.  Nos llevamos un lindo recuerdo de nuestra estancia allí.

Sehr nette kleine Unterkunft mit sehr netten Gastgebern! 
Die Lage ist perfekt und man ist sehr schnell in Manhattan!

Orestes was a wonderful host with an absolutely beautiful home. The space was exactly what we needed for our stay & the bed was super comfortable.
And honestly, it is by far the BEST location if you want to spend the day in Manhattan-a quick & easy 10 minute subway ride to Midtown.

Orestes's house is a lovely place to stay while visiting the Big Apple! 

Thanks once again.
Très facile d'accès depuis JFK. Appartement proche du métro, 10 mn de trajet pour rejoindre Manhattan. Nombreuses possibilités de restauration à proximité.

The location is on a historic classic block in Queens. The subway is around the corner. Manhattan is just minutes away. The Court Square Dinner around the corner serves great food, big servings at great prices. The Thai place next to the doughnut place is good to. There are several quality dinners within a couple of blocks. It is a much greater value to dine in Queens than Manhattan. At Time Square around Broadway and 48th we ate often at TSQ. Awesome ,delicious big servings. Strong Long Island Ice Tea for just 12 bucks.
 Can't wait to comeback!
We stayed for a week at Orestes place. It's a  nice place to stay and close to Manhattan. Very nearby are 2 metrostations, and it's a short walk to the East River where you can take the ferry.

Nous avons séjourné 10 jours chez Orestes et c’était parfait. 
L’accueil s’est fait en présence de l’hôte. Nous avions pu communiquer facilement avant notre arrivée sur les lieux pour fixer quelques détails. 
Ensuite tout au long du séjour Orestes a été très disponible pour nous, il nous a donné quelques conseil sur notre séjour et ce que nous devions absolument faire. 
Même si nous sommes dans une maison habitée la chambre est isolée et avec sa propre entrée donc c’est paisible. Hyper bien desservie en termes de transports avec 3 lignes de métro à 5 min à pied de la chambre. Une vue magnifique sur Manhattan et l’East River à 10 min à pied. Idéale au coucher du soleil :) possibilité de prendre le ferry aussi comme moyen de transport pas loin ! Bref tout les avantages de NY avec des hôtes à l’écoute mais pas envahissant :) je recommande vivement cette adresse !
Really friendly hosts. Location is really peaceful, quiet and very easy to get into the city using the subway.
Great place! Very close to the subway. Orestes was very amiable and we felt like our space was respected. This was our first shared Airbnb experience and it went very well!

I enjoy staying with them.
And It was very convenient to go to Manhattan :)

Orestes's home is a great place to stay if you want to live like a local! Most would think Long Island City is too far from all the action from Manhattanx but that's not true! It's only 3 stops from Times Square,  and you avoid all the hustle and bustle. The home is a 1t minute walk to the ferries, and you will have a chance to look at the spectacular city from across the water. Mind you,  if you are not ready to socialize, this place is not for you! You will have privacy in your own space but the host does work out of the home office beside your quarters, so you might hear each other when you're both on the same floor. My husband and I were more than happy to chat with Orestes and get some local tips from him so that's a big plus. Overall, it's a great and convenient place to stay and to get an authentic New Yorker experience!
Excelente anfitrión, el inmueble es muy bonito, tal y como aparece en las fotos, la ubicación excelente, sin duda una opción inmejorable para visitar NYC.
Expect a charming host, a nicely decorated and well appointed room, and an excellent location.
Location is so perfect and minutes away from the noise of Manhattan.  Easy to get to from airport, 1 subway stop to Manhattan, and incredibly great hosts!

Very fine place, very well connected by subways (3 lines), the room is big and quiet with AC. The private bathroom is luxurious. The hosts are very prevenants and gave good advices. It's the place to be to explore NYC in peace!!!! I recommand++++

Excellent emplacement : pratique d'accès depuis et vers l'aéroport JFK, plusieurs lignes de métro situées à proximité, quartier calme et reposant, beaucoup de commerces utiles. Salle de bain spacieuse et agréable. Propreté impeccable assurée par Orestes et sa femme de ménage. Disponibilité et réactivité de notre hôte. 
Nous n'avions pas bien compris l'annonce. Nous pensions que l'entrée indépendante était à notre usage exclusif ce qui nous assurerait une meilleure intimité et que notre hôte utilisait l'entrée située à l'étage. En fait, c'est une porte qui est empruntée par tout le monde : voyageurs, hôte et amis de l'hôte. Cela ne remet pas en cause notre séjour, c'est une mauvaise interprétation de notre part. L'avantage certain est que nous savions lorsque notre hôte s’absentait.
Nice location - excellent host. We enjoyed this stay in the home of Oreste.
Great location within LIC. Everything as described and pictured. Only sorry that the weather didn’t permit use of the lovely garden!
We had some nice days in Orestes apartment. The location is perfect - near East River.

You can expect a specious room, a large and very well equiped bathroom and a large garden. The subway is very nearby and Manhattan by metro is less than 10 minutes. JFK by metro and AirTrain is about 1,5 hour.

This is a great place to stay. The accommodation is ideally placed for visits to the Big Apple. Situated in Queens, the historic house is beautifully cared for. Your own private entrance leads to a spacious room that is clean and comfortable. There is a small fridge and microwave, a large bed settee and a very comfortable bed. It was a nice touch to have a dressing gown to use when accessing the well equipped bathroom which adjoins the bedroom. Orestes was brilliant at communicating with us and although we didn’t get to see him in person, his partner Chris  was so friendly and helpful, giving us great advice regarding restaurants and places to see that we felt like honoured guests throughout our stay. I booked this accommodation on the basis of previous reviews and i certainly have no reservation about recommending a stay here. Thank you Orestes and Chris, we hope to come back.

This Airbnb is a great place to explore NYC and surrounding areas. It’s only 1 stop from Manhattan, (it’s actually closer to Manhattan than some of Manhattan!). Orestes is a lovely, friendly, and welcoming host. We also had a special doggy welcome from Gus, which was lovely.... a home is not a home without a fur baby! The subway stop is also really close,  a 2 minute walk. 
To be honest, I could have spent my whole stay in NYC in that shower, oh my god... what an amazing shower and a gorgeous bathroom. 
The attention to detail is great too, with lovely artwork. Oh, and there’s a traditional diner around the corner that serves lush breakfast!  
Thank you Orestes for a lovely stay and for some great tips. If you’re ever in Wales, we’d love to return the favour!

My wife and I had a wonderful stay at Orestes’s place. The room was very comfortable and with an entrance right off the hall we felt comfortable coming and going. All the amenities were great and the house had a wonderful design. The location is central to many great restaurants and the subway to midtown. I personally enjoyed burger garage and the micro brewery fifth hammer, both right down the street. All of this added up to a wonderful stay for my wife and I. This is a part of NY everyone should experience once.

Orestes place is wonderful. The location in Queens is excellent, just a few minutes walk to the metro that gets you in to the city in a few minutes and JFK in about 40 minutes. The room is very comfortable and a lovely bed. The bathroom is exceptional, with large shower and steam room. There’s a microwave and refrigerator provided and a few coffee sachets. Whilst the room is private, it is adjacent to Orestes workshop, which is fine and has direct access into his apartment upstairs. The area is safe and nice to walk around. It’s only a 10 minute walk to the ferry terminal too and I’d recommend doing that as it’s a nice walk along the river too to the next stop down. We also thoroughly recommend the Court Square Diner around the corner for any time of day, the breakfast is amazing. Will certainly return next time we’re in New York and recommend.

My sister and I shared the room for 5 nights. We found Orestes to be very friendly and helpful. He has a very calm demeanor and we felt like we were staying with an old friend rather than a stranger. The room is comfortable and quiet, and the shower in the bathroom is the best! Very close to trains and you can also walk to Gantry Park and take the ferry to Brooklyn or Manhattan.

Everything was just perfect. 
The house was located in a very safe place, near by subway stations. The room was really large and spacious, and the bed was also large and comfortable. The host provided ample bedclothes, pillows and towels. The best thing about this house was that it was extremely clean. The restroom was equipped with steamshower(!!) and was also very clean. The host had a high level of sensitivity in art, so the whole house was decorated with beautiful pictures and props. He was also very kind and did not cause any inconvenience in staying. The picture he took in the garden will be the biggest gift of my life! 
If I ever come to New York, I will definitely stay in this house again.

Our stay at Orestes' place was great! The location is really good to explore NYC - we just needed 15min to get to times square. The room is really comfortable and we felt like home! Orestes was always kind and helpful. We can highly recommend a stay at his place!

Orestes was a good host. The room was exactly what we expected and it was nice to have private access to it so we could come and go without disturbing the family. He recommended a diner where the food was great. We would happily stay there again.
Great experience and great value!
Orestes was very kind and helpful! He was eager to help when needed and gave great recommendations! He even gave us fresh towels throughout our stay. We enjoyed it greatly!

Chambre grande et propre. Salle de bain magnifique ! Station de métro aux deux extrémités de la rue à 1 minute à pied. Commerces proches. Manhattan atteint en 15 min de métro. Très bon emplacement et super rapport qualité prix ! N’hésitez pas !

Orestes is an amazing host and his home is beautiful (with an amazing shower) :).  Furnished with art collected from around the world, we loved the cozy interior and comfortable bed. Located a heartbeat away from Manhatten, you will not regret staying here. Literally zero complaints.
Orestes muy atento y muy servicial ante cada situación, la verdad es que es un lugar para quedarse y disfrutar de la cercanía con todo.
Everything perfect .. I will be using this apt in the future

It was a great experience. I like the interior decoration, which is very artistic. Corridor painting is also very meaningful. The bathroom is nice and it's convenient to take a bath. The landlord is very nice, too. If you have any travel questions, you can ask him. Anyway, thank you very much.

Cozy space with an amazing bathroom! The outside garden is stunning even in the snow. Amazing breakfast spot just a block away.

Orestes was super nice and welcoming.

name: Home mate
space: Central in Beşiktaş next to W hotel, fully furnished, wireless, kable tv...
description: Central in Beşiktaş next to W hotel, fully furnished, wireless, kable tv...
house_rules: Eaisy to decide together.

host.host_about: Free lance producer

name: Near Airport private room, 2 bedroom granny flat**
summary: Private room in a newly renovated 2 Bedroom granny flat with its own side entry, large bedrooms, tiled flooring, internal laundry and plenty of on street parking. Located on the border of Wolli Creek and Arncliffe its only a 10mins walk away from Wolli Creek train station, 1.2km walk to the Sydney International Airport and a short stroll to buses . Also close to supermarket, parks, water and Domestic Airport. Book a room for yourself or Book both bedrooms for family and friends.
space: A private bedroom in our newly renovated 2 bedroom self contained granny flat designed for travellers, modern  kitchen and bathroom. Furniture, white goods and wifi included.. Available for short or longer term accommodation.
description: Private room in a newly renovated 2 Bedroom granny flat with its own side entry, large bedrooms, tiled flooring, internal laundry and plenty of on street parking. Located on the border of Wolli Creek and Arncliffe its only a 10mins walk away from Wolli Creek train station, 1.2km walk to the Sydney International Airport and a short stroll to buses . Also close to supermarket, parks, water and Domestic Airport. Book a room for yourself or Book both bedrooms for family and friends. A private bedroom in our newly renovated 2 bedroom self contained granny flat designed for travellers, modern  kitchen and bathroom. Furniture, white goods and wifi included.. Available for short or longer term accommodation. You might be sharing the bathroom and kitchen with another guest. Plenty of on street parking and parking on our driveway are available too. Large second floor balcony for hanging washing, smoking or just to chill. I work shift work on a 24hr roster so if im not home or available to accept
neighborhood_overview: *Less than 10km in distance to the city *Within walking distance to the international terminal  *Cheap bus ride or Uber/Taxi to the Domestic Airport. *4 stops to Central station from Wolli Creek station *Large Woolworths supermarket opens 7am to midnight, cafe, restaurant and 24hr 7/11 all within Wolli Creek precinct  *Closest beach: Brighton Le Sands
notes: Pin code Check-in and Check-out
transit: *18min/1.3km walk to the Sydney airport international terminal or cheap taxi ride   *take the 400 bus on Wickham St to the domestic terminal or take a taxi.  *422 bus and Wolli Creek train station to the city
access: You might be sharing the bathroom and kitchen with another guest. Plenty of on street parking and parking on our driveway are available too. Large second floor balcony for hanging washing, smoking or just to chill.
interaction: I work shift work on a 24hr roster so if im not home or available to accept your calls please call my co-host/mum (Fen). Her English is limited but she will try to assist to the best of her ability. My family and i live on the upper floor and have been in the area for the past 15 years, so if you need any help with anything to make your stay more enjoyable please let us know.
house_rules: - Please keep the common area clean - Keep the noise to a minimum after 10pm - Please be considerate to other guests

reviews.comments: Very close to airport, comfortable bed
Shuang's place was great. It had everything I needed for the Stay and was very clean. I had a small problem with the iron but Shuang had it fixed within minutes! Would definitely recommend.

Very clean and calm. We had one of the two rooms and shared kitchen and bathroom with another traveller (second room). Quiet nice place. Only a 15 minutes walk to the airport. Next time again :-) Thank you very much!
Shuang was very helpful and was very quick with his responses to any questions i had. Was clean and had all the things i needed to have a comfortable stay.

Shuang is a very organised and helpful host. all our questions had been answered quickly and accurate before our arrival. the room was spacious and clean with all the needs for our short stay. 
the location is near the airport and took us about 25min to walk there with heavy backpacks - easy!

definitely recommend Shuang!
Shuang was a helpful and kind host. The property was accurately described and very close to the airport. My stay was very short, but was perfect for my needs. Thanks Shuang!
It was a very pleasant stay. Thank you Shuang for your hospitality!
Beautiful home, cute little room perfect for resting your head for the night while traveling. Only $8 Uber ride from here to the airport.
Great!
It's very comfortable to live in this place.The bed is soft and clean.Shuang is a very kind and helpful person and i really appreaciate all his help for us.

Shuang's place was perfect for our overnight layover in and out of Sydney airport. It's easy to get to and a short walk from the train station which took us right downtown. It was clean and comfortable. Definitely recommend.

This was a quiet, extremely clean, and cozy place to stay after a 11 hr. flight, and was only 10 min. away from the Sydney airport (about $18 taxi fair). I found everything I needed from internet code printed with local maps. I had to wait for my ride to arrive and I was able to wait in the common room and was even given coffee. I highly recommend this very nice and private granny flat. Thank you for the welcoming hospitality! I will stay again if come back to NSW, Australia.

Shuang was very helpful in providing instructions and tips to getting to his place. The room itself is very clean, spacious, and modern. The neighborhood is pretty quiet and the person/people I shared the kitchen and bathroom with were very considerate and quiet. Getting around was pretty easy as it was only a 12 minute walk from Wolli Creek station and shorter walk to a few bus routes that will take you to Sydney or surrounding suburbs. My stay was very short as I was heading to the airport, and it's a relatively easy walk to the airport if you don't have too much luggage. Otherwise, it's an inexpensive taxi ride or short bus trip to the airport, which works just as well. Would definitely try to stay here again if I'm ever in the area again.
It was one of the best places that I have stayed in and I couldn't have asked for a better place and shuang was a wonderful host

The flat was very modern and we'll equipped, I only stayed for one night but it was a pleasant experience. Only downside was the bathroom wasn't that clean, maybe due to sharing with another airbnb guest, because the room was spotless. Thanks for having me to stay!
Very comfortable and clean room. Close to food shops and airport. Was a nice experience. I'd love to stay there again. Very lovely host. Thank u very much.

We stayed just for a short night but enjoyed our stay.
Very clean, tidy and modern apartment. A few minutes from the airport, around 15$ by taxi.

Very nice stay.  Shuang's room allows you to go in and out on your own schedule and is perfect for short or overnight stays.  Highly recommended!
Shuang's place was convenient, clean and tidy. We enjoyed our stay. Thanks, Shuang!

My girlfriend and I had an okay stay. the bed was clean and comfortable but there was no heat and Sydney was pretty chilly at night (~15C). everything was newly renovated but we still felt uncomfortable using the appliances.
Great place to stay when flying out the international airport. Great price, easy to get to airport ($12 uber). Highly recommend.

Shuang's place is totally fantastic both in terms of location and quality of the room. It's close to transit, quite easy to find with convenient arrangement for key pick up. And the room is well equipped with all necessities, and above all cleaned professionally, which is what I found to be key to a comfortable Airbnb experience. I was only here for a day and the proximity to the airport was a solid plus, yet I can see this could also be nice for longer travel thanks to the easy access to the city. Thanks for the nice experience and hope next time when I visit Sydney I could potentially stay again here.
I'm very glad we stayed here. Close to the airport. Very clean, great hosts.

The room was clean, comfortable, and well-appointed. The host even provided electric blankets for us, which were very much appreciated during the cold winter night. We were not chilly at all. The bathroom was very spacious and modern, similar to the room. Would stay here again!

Clean and close to the airport. We stayed there for a night and overall it was pleasant.

The place is clean and quiet, and also accessible as there is a 7/11 nearby. Would have loved staying here longer than just one night, but it was a pleasant experience nonetheless.
Convenient location. Very close to the airport and just $10 uber ride. The key got stucked the first time I used and the host help us to get it asap. It was lovely to have a short stay here.

Excellent! Immaculately clean.  Love Shuang as he was very accommodating, gracious, warm and hospitable.  Place is very close to the airport.

nice house located in walking distance from the airport owned by a lovely family.

We were made o feel very welcome by Shuang and his family. The room was quite spacious and very well fitted out. We were overnighting to pick up an international flight out of Sydney and found the location to the airport very handy.
The host was very accommodating as we had quite a few luggages with us. Very clean apartment with close location to the train. Also very close to the airport. Overall a fantastic value!

The rooms were separate from the main house and impeccably clean with white towels and bathmats supplied. Tiled floors and bench space in the bathroom with a washing machine.  Up the stairs on the balcony were clothes drying racks. The bed was comfy and pillows of high quality. 
Contact with the host was via phone and he or family attended to my requests. There was very little actual conversational communication. Overall a pleasant experience.
Beautiful and clean place. And close to the train station. You can walk.

The location is about 5 EASY minutes from international airport. Easy parking in private road.  Access clear amd simple,  Spacious bedroom, modern bathroom with AWESOME shower.  Kitchenette well equipped for simple needs.  Wifi excellent.   The bedroom door could be locked.  Great communication.  No traffic or aircraft noise - located in cul-de-sac.  Separate entrance to main house.  Have booked to return  for our next early flight.  Simple and great value

I rented one of two bedrooms on a ground floor. A living room/ kitchen and a bathroom were shared. There was a small frig and a small laundry machine. Rooms were very sparkling clean and new. A big TV was in a common living room. Communication was fast and clear. No need to see the host as keys were in a padlock and thus late arrival or early leave is fine. A host seems to live in a house annexed to the AirBnB rooms but entrances were different. Actually, his house is a proper detached house. 15 minutes walk to an international terminal. No need to take a cab if you go to an international terminal. Walk to an int terminal is safe but is not a no trainer due to a airport construction. But it is not too difficult to find a way to it. It is a great place to stay overnight if you have a morning flight. Very competitive price. Good for two people (queen bed), even with a small kid.

Very easy to access. It was about a 20 - 30 minute walk from the airport so we just caught an uber for around $8.00. We did share with someone else in the other room and they did get a bit noisy with their tv show when trying to sleep and can be a bit small if you're looking to watch tv as no couch, but for us we were just looking for a place to stay and it was great!

I stayed in room 2 and it was very pleasant. The room was quite roomy, bed was super comfy, had basic kitchenette facilities and bathroom was noce and clean! Had a great stay there and Fen was very welcoming. Shuang was friendly and prompt to reply to queries. Definitely would stay here again. Thank you!

Highly recommend Place for short term or long term visiting in Sydney. The location is very good, just 10mins walk distance to the wolicreek train station. Close to central and airport as well. The house is very clean. I didn't get chance to meet Shuang, but as we text ms, he is very kind and welcome person. Hope you guys can enjoin in his house as I do.
Shuang's place was neat, clean and tidy. Fabulous for those early morning take offs from the airport.

Thanks Shuang. A very nice space. Very smart with the beatiful tiling in the room and bathroom. I did meet your Mum and Dad, very welcoming. The shared bathroom worked well with the couple in the other room.  Very handy to the airport. One stop on train to International, and two stops to Domestic.

It was very clean and has all the necessities for a comfortable stay. Awesome spot to stay near the airport. It's about a 5 minute cab ride to the international terminal. Super super clean, and quick internet. Beautiful house, thanks for the stay!
Fantastische Kommunikation, Wohnung sehr neu und wie beschrieben. Würde wieder dort übernachten. Praktische Nähe zum Flughafen.

Very pleasant stay at Shuang's place. We needed a one night stay that was close to the airport and this fit the bill. The space is exceptionally clean and the bathroom is huge and wonderful. What was extra nice is that we were able to get some laundry done that evening. There is no dryer, but Shuang provides plenty of hanging racks and clothes pins for our 3 loads of laundry. What a relief to have such a comfy stay and 2 full suitcases of clean clothes for the duration of our trip!

I would definitely stay here again for a convenient and super comfy layover at Sydney Airport.
Lovely little place 5-10 minute taxi ride to the International or domestic airport. 10 minute walk to Wolli Creek train station which is perfect to get to the city centre.

Shuang's place is a really good distance from the airport, thus making it a convenient location to stay for that reason. The space was clean, and the bathroom was modern and large. Not much else to do around there, but if you're staying for the airport it's great.
Very quiet and tidy, we enjoyed this stay.

Truly excellent value and convenient access to airport. Was <$10 Uber to International airport, and at 1/3 the price of airport hotel. Shuang was great at communicating and the check-in/check-out process was very simple. House is clean and pretty, with big front yard and gate. While short walk from/to bus station to airport, if coming/leaving at night, do not take the bus (a bit too long of a walk at night in unfamiliar neighborhood). Apartment was very clean and tidy, but gaps in the door led to two cockroaches. Ultimately very worth the price we paid.

Very convenient to the airport- under $10 in an uber (less than $20 in a cab). Very new, clean and well equipped. Great bathroom and amenities. Excellent value. The place is great, its modern, clean and cosy.  The bathroom is nice with great lightings. Overall, we enjoyed our stay.

The property is in prime location for access to the airport. It's very private, newly renovated and spacious. Shuang responded quickly to any communication and was very accommodating of my late check in. I appreciated how he went out of his way to make sure I had a smooth arrival.
Clean, modern and very convenient to airport ($22 taxi from domestic terminal).  Great value for money.  Would definitely recommend.

Great place to stay before you fly out of Sydney. It is really close to the airport, very convenient and good value! We would definitely come back again.

I booked this room because my flight was in the morning and Shuang's house is super close to the Sydney airport. All full stars, pretty clean, tidy, quiet! Good mattress hotel level bed sheet set. Even the shampoo and body wash product are of good  quality. The room is as  good as the picture shows.
Such a cute place to stay at!
Tidy and nice room. The location is very close to airport, Is the best choice to for ppl taking the early airline.

My wife and I needed a room near the airport because we had a morning flight the next day. This room had a perfect location, was within walking distance to the train station/grocery, and was very clean. The aesthetics of the room and bathroom were modern. Basic "hotel" amenities were provided. Shuang's instructions were very clear and everything worked as expected. Great price for a great room.

Contact et entrée facile, très proche de l'aéroport, quartier calme et appartement propre
Parfait pour une nuit avant ou après un vol!
Nice  place !!! no noise, clean, modern, nice kitchen and bathroom ...

The place was really convenient since it's just 10-12 mins walk from the restos, wollies and wolli creek station.  The room was relaxing, toilet and bath are well maintained and the kitchenette was good as well.
全程自住住宿离开,非常自由,就是宿舍隔音有些差,能听到隔壁说话声,总体感觉非常好!
Very clean and nice accommodation. Convenient location to the airport and Wolli Creek train station. Would highly recommend!
Awesome location if you're flying out of the international airport  Lovely hosts
Very clean and comfortable. 5 stars!
The place is very nice and clean. The most valuable things is the closeness to the airport. Is perfect for people who will flight at morning.

Great stay! very clean and modern place if you need a room close to the airport. It was easy to find and it cost me only $2 to get there by bus from the airport! A Woolworths is only a few hundred meters away and the bus stop only a short 10 min walk.
Great hospitality, helpful and kind host, very clean, highly likeable place!

I highly recommend this place. This is one of the most well organised airbnb I have ever stayed in. I did not get to see Shuang but the instructions given were clear, the room and the facilities are well maintained, and the house is only 12 minutes walk from the train station, shops, restaurant and supermarket.

Easy access and exit, room ok, clean etc. Probably would have put small tv in each room rather than large one in kitchen as chairs in kitchen not comfortable to sit on to watch tv. This would allow for different guests to watch there own programs. Otherwise, not bad.
Nice and clean!

The accommodation is within close proximity to Arncliffe rail station and very near taxi ride to the airport which is very handy. 
The premises and fixture and amenities are very clean and tidy and I would recommend this for anyone travelling thru. Very quite Street away from traffic noise.

Perfect set up! Amazing stay! Clean, private, quiet and easy to access. I would definitely stay there again if I ever go back to Sydney
Excellent and convenient stay.
Great location, clean, comfortable , great host!

Shuang's place is very clean and organized. We didnt meet him during the stay, but he responded our inquiry in time. The place is walkable to train station where you can find a shopping centre with lots of restaurants and shops. We only need 10 min to reach international airport by car.
Nice place

The room is very clean. Location is very close to the airport. 15 mins walk to arncliff rail station. A quite neighborhood. Everything are well provided, utensils, etc. Washing machine is a plus. The detergent is provided as well, so doing your laundry is not a problem.
My second time staying here, great value, very clean and quiet. I will definitely be staying here more.
Nice place!!
Great place! Exactly what I expected. Easy access to airport via train or walk!
Very clean and quiet Shuang was prompt and polite. The location is an easy walk to the international. You share the common area and amenities with another double room  but not a problem
Very nice, quiet place. So close to the airport.

So clean, warm, good smell.

Nice and convenient 10-15 minute walk from international airport.
Very great location ! Will definitely stay here again!

Shuang's place is beautiful! The room and bathroom are a substantial size and extremely clean. The comforter is SO comfortable! Shuang was also very prompt with providing directions and instructions immediately after booking and responded quickly thereafter. The Arncliffe train station is only a 10 minute walk and his place is conveniently located minutes from the airport. We stayed here due to an early  flight in the morning. This is a shared space with another Airbnb guest. Both rooms have private access and the door locks for extra security which gave us piece of mind. Overall great stay and highly recommended!
This was a short one night stay in between flights and the location was perfect for this. It's modern, clean, and close to Wolli Creek station where there's lots of eateries. I would stay here again.

It was a nice place to enjoy Sydney.
1. I met a momther of the host and she was really kind. I arrived at the house quite earlier before the check-in time and it was very chilly ,but she allowed me to come in and let me store the luggage. I really appreciate it. 
2. Especially what I like most is the cleanliness which is the most important thing to me. It was neat enough. The house is small but there are everything I need.
3. The location is not bad as well. I used a taxi about 4 am to go to the domestic terminal and it costed about 2 dollars. 
It is located in the suburb, but it's not that far to get to the city. I walked 10-15 minutes to the train station and it took about 20 minutes to the city. There is also a bus stop nearby.
I am worried if I didn't leave your house clean. I was in urgent situation to go to the airport, so I would apologize it if it offended you.

Shuang's place is exactly as described. It is a very convenient place to stay if you need to have a sleep over near Sydney airport. Communication was great, the room and shared areas are good and the shower was awesome! I was able to walk to the international airport this morning.

Thanks Shuang for receiving me at your place! I will definitely return and recommend to friends
Very clean and 5 minutes away from airport! You share a wall with a neighbor but if they're quiet you don't hear anything! Comk

Very convenient

The place was close to the airport and the check-in was easy in that you could get in at odd hours. Very convenient if you need to stay the night and need to get to the airport early in the am. 

All the essentials were provided including an iron. You potentially need to share the bathroom and kitchen if there is another tenant in the next room. it didnt matter to me as i only stayed the night. 

Would stay again in the future if i was making a short stop in sydney.
very convenience to airport
我们短暂停留了两天,因为回国时间较早,这里离机场很近,拎着两个大箱子走路也就30分钟,房间十分干净,是自助入住,房东人很亲切,房东妈妈也很热心地为我们指路,周围很安静,可以走路到附近的便利店和超市,入住体验非常好｡

Parfait pour une nuit entre deux vols. 
Propre

很不错的小房间,干净整洁,不小心反锁了,房东夜里过来给我开门,很感动

Location is easy to find - near Woolies and 7E. Room is super clean and comfortable! 15 mins walk from Wolli Creek stn with some climb up the hill so expect some delay if youre bringing big luggage! Room on ground floor - which is super convenient. Took uber to airport instead of walking as I have huge luggage with me.

Close to train station, market and some restaurants. Walkable distance to Airport. Neighbors are a bit noisy but we did no better, either, because we can hear almost everything through the thin wall. The host are really nice.
Nice room with full amenities! Recommend to those who need to catch a flight in the morning
Shuang's place was super clean and convenience to go to airport.

L'hôte est disponible et hyper rapide pour répondre à nos nombreuses questions. L'endroit est plus que parfait pour un transit près de l'aéroport. Un grand merci pour tout !
Another fantastic stay and I can now confirm it is only a 25 minute walk (with luggage) to the international terminal, the walk is safe and follows a brand new walkway for about half the distance.
帮朋友订的,朋友说房东人超好,很热情,棒棒哒!!
房东妈妈人特别好,有问必答,因为第二天要赶早班机,房东妈妈还特地提前一天指引我们如何去机场,对我们特别照顾｡自助入住的形式,日常设施用品齐全｡地理位置距离火车站和超市都很近,附近还有很多餐厅,有公车可以到悉尼歌剧院,出行方便｡距离机场30分钟步行,适合第二天赶早班机的旅客｡很棒的一次住宿体验 :)
Third stay at Shuang's place. As always, easy 20-min walk from the International terminal (with luggage), smooth check-in, clean, and quiet. Cookies are a very nice touch! Thanks again!!

very nice

Lovely house and room, very clean and cozy. Strongly recommended. Btw, Shuang’ mum is very nice and helpful.

Perfect place for convenience to the Airport. As advertised, great communication. Thanks!

This place is awesome for anyone who has a layover in Sydney and needs a place near the airport. It’s so pretty and super super clean. It’s also quiet and has everything you need. One of my favorite AirBNB experiences so far!
房东很好,抵达悉尼当日是雨天儿,在bnb上跟房东简单沟通了下从悉尼国内机场坐400路车去民宿,没曾想下bus后没走多久,房东开车来接我了｡下着雨独自拉着大箱子在陌生的街上走有人能帮把手瞬间能感到温暖｡很快到达民宿,房屋很干净,室内设施一应俱全,周边有超市,离Wolli Greek 火车站较近,随后两天出行都是坐火车去市中心及邦迪海滩等游玩,回国可步行至悉尼国际机场,很方便｡

This is a beautiful, very modern space. Just like a new hotel. The location is great: a short walk to the train and shops, it took me just 16 mins to reach the international terminal. 100% would stay here again.
It is very clean and comfortable accommodation. I recommend it to those who want to find a place closed to the Sydney International Airport.

Great location, really clean and convenient! The place is really close to the airport. We arrived at the domestic airport with the bus 400 and then left by the international airport by walking 20 minutes. We also went to Sydney on the evening with the T4 at Wolli Creek (10 minutes walk) for only 6$ for a return ticket :) we were really satisfied with our stay!
The apartment is clean and tidy! We stayed one night between two flights and it has been a good solution. We reached the airport by feet. I recommend.
Go to place close to the airport. Stylish and easy check in.

It's sparkling clean room, feel cleaner than hotel room. I was impressed. Fully self check-in and check-out. I walked with my luggage directly from international terminal to the location, very convenient. Only 10 minutes walk to the train station and about 25 minutes ride to CBD. I enjoyed the stay.

Shuang's place was perfect for an overnight stay before an early flight the next day. The room was clean and comfortable. The place is conveniently located close to the airport. We would happily stay again next time we're in the area.

Nice and clean, well equiped room and kitchen, shared bathroom, very easy check-in, check-out, great communication with host. Roughly 15-20 mins walking to and from the airport, less than 15 mins to trains to the central Sydney. All well! Recommended! :-)
Great accommodation, clean and easy access. Well organised and great location if you have a car (free parking) and well situated in the suburbs.
Perfect location for a stopover near the airport. Not much to choose from within walking distance, but Yan is a great little restaurant. Great find!
V convenient location, close to shops, transport etc Its also nice & quiet!

Shuangs place was perfect for an overnight stay before flying out of Sydney.  Really clean and quiet.

Alles super, sehr sehr ordentlich, super ordentlich. Top geflie§t, 1a. Gepäckaufbewahrung geht aber nicht, nur mit fahrradschloss am Eingang. Der ist mit 2 Toren geschützt. Aber gut. Thanks for a lovely stay! Good location being so close to the airport, but if you have a suitcase I would recommend an Uber rather than walking from the train station. Nice and very clean room and bathroom with easy instructions in and out. So close to the airport with an uber that cost $10! Thanks Shuang!

Shuang and his mum are super friendly, helpful and very responsive to every enquiries. The house is super clean and tidy! Really enjoy my stay in here. Although the house a little bit far away from wolli creek station, it still a good choice to stay in shuang's house as it is located in a quiet neighbour . It takes around 5 mins walk to get to the supermarket to get what all you need. Thank you Shuang and your mum! I will defintely stay in your place again in the near future ! Cheers!

Shuang’s place is really close to the airport so that makes it easy to catch an early morning flight.  Everything is nice and clean.  Walking distance to restaurants and the supermarket.  I would stay here again next time!

Very easy access to Internal airport!

Good place, very tidy and clean.
The place was very nice and clean. I recommend this place if you have an early start to the airport.

Goed bereikbaar met bus 400 vanaf international airport. Lopend had ook zeker gekund qua afstand en als je overdag aankomt. Huis is goed te vinden door de beschrijving van verhuurder. Het is een prima kamer, licht, schoon en comfortabel bed. Badkamer ruim met fohn en wasmachine, gedeeld met 1 ander persoon. Ging bij mij erg goed.

Shuang, Thank you for your hospitality, I loved staying at your Airbnb. It felt like I was coming home even though I was travelling. Your directions were clear and easy to navigate, the location was brilliant as I was flying the next day very early.
I encourage you to think about air-conditioning as it was a hot night when I stayed and even though the fan was excellent and with the window open (screened)  it was very comfortable, the noise from outside woke me a lot through the night. It didn’t bother me too much apart from realising how important cooling is for guests, especially if they are only really sleeping for 4-5 hours and then travelling again. Thank you and all the very best for the future. Kind regards, Jonathan

Easy to check in and close to the airport. We stayed the night before an international flight early the next morning and had no problems getting a quick taxi. Communication before our stay was very clear, all necessities were provided along with towels and wifi. It could have been a little clearer that there were 2 bedrooms attached to a common area and that we would be sharing with other guests - we had a bit of a surprise when we walked in!
Lovely place, conveniently located very close to the airport.
Wonderful place, very close to the airport. Beautiful house.
Das Zimmer und das Badezimmer waren sauber, auch die Küche sah sehr gepflegt aus. Trotz unserer späten Ankunft hat alles super geklappt
全五星好评!一尘不染,非常的干净整洁｡街区也很安静,适合短期或长期居住,强烈推荐!
Shuang was very nice and helpful. He did everything to make us feel welcome. The place was nice and simple but with everything you needed. Very nice overall value for money.
nice room and friendly host
Great stop when we needed a place by the airport.  We were able to check in early and it was so helpful for our short trip!  Clean and great instructions.

We arrived a little bit early and were able to check-in a few minutes earlier than 11am which was great. The check-in information on how to access the apartment was very clear. The apartment is generally clean with a spacious bedroom and a comfy bed. You got a supermarket not far away and on the way to the Train station, however you have to walk a little bit as it is not right around the corner.

I stayed for 20 days and it was great. Shuang and Hong fen were very accomodating. The place is always clean and everything was well provided from laundry detergents to some kitchen ingredients. I couldnt ask for more. The first and probably the best airbnb experience Ive had.
Shuang的房子位于悉尼机场进城的路边,无论是到机场还是到市区都非常方便,购物也很便利｡房子布置温馨现代,干净整洁｡房东善解人意,给我们的游览提供了很多好建议和省钱小窍门｡我们回国的飞机是晚上起飞,checkout后房东很贴心地为我们保管行李,既安全又方便拿取｡十分感谢!强烈推荐!
房东是华人,会说普通话,所以交流很方便,Fen姨很Nice,会给我们指路｡房间设备齐全,地理位置也很好找,出了悉尼机场,延停车场的天桥直走到分岔路口再往右边的路直走就能找到公寓所在的街道,步行路程20分钟｡

It is great place near international airport. I love the house and garden style.

Great location close to the international airport, and wonderful room to stay.

you could not find a better place so clean and lovely and very close to air port i will stay there every time i go to sydney i can not phraise it enough  david

This was one of the nicest and cleanest Airbnb’s I’ve ever stayed in! Everything was super easy, the communication with the hosts went well and they were so helpful when I got there and checked in. They showed me around the place, which has a well equipped kitchen, a modern and very clean bathroom and everything you need for your stay is provided. The room itself was perfect for one night. It’s also spacious enough to stay with two people. This is the perfect Airbnb when you’re looking for a place close to the airport. I’d definitely recommend it!

Shuang’s place is excellent, very convenient, clean, well maintained and comfortable, walking distance to the international airport really helped, I would definitely recommend to anyone traveling through Sydney

A place very calm, neat and relaxing with complete privacy. Shuang is a wonderful host and has guided me right from the start and it was very convenient to travel with all the information the host provided
Great location for an early morning flight. Very close to the airport!

Place is near to the airport, both domestic and international. Bus stand with bus route to City is very nearby. Train station is just ~900meters. Place is kept sparkly clean.

Great location close to the airport but a touch out of the city. Very clean and clear communication from host.
Great place!
Easy and uncomplicated Communication. It was nice and clean - absolute recommendable!
I had booked Shuang’s place for my cousins and they found the place very clean, with good amenities and convenient location.

The room looks just as pictured. The bed is super comfortable which is a bonus. Clean, spotless and two thumbs up for providing shower soap and shampoo! I would definitely stay here again if I need a place close to the airport. Thank you very much for all of your quick responses, Shuang!
Great place. Very clean, easy checkin and out, walked to and from airport. Couldn't ask for anything  more for me 24 hour stay in Sydney.

We stayed at Shuang’s apartment for 1 night and it was a great experience.  The room was clean and although we had to share bathroom with another room, we felt that we had our privacy.  Shuang is quick in responding and the house is clean and has what we needed.  Check in was very smooth.  Thank you!
Great house ! highly recommend.
Comfortable and close to the airport.

Very clean and lovely place. Convenient location. Close to train station, supermarkets and restaurants. Shuang was very helpful and is a very good host. I would love to stay here again next time when I visit Sydney!
Very clear and easy instructions for check in. Lovely clean room. Fast response from host.

It was perfect. There is nothing to tell about this house bad. I and my boyfriend had time at the house for 3 nights and 4 days. Before going to this house, my bf and me were unsure if this house would be real since the house or room was perfect but it was pretty cheap for its perfection. 
I highly recommend this house to everyone who wishes to stay around the airport (takes only 24mn by walk, 20mn by bus from the airport). I love this houseeeee!!!!!

A nice clean space that is private. I had no problems with a late 9pm checkin. A good nights sleep was had in a comfy bed. Electric blanket was a nice touch on a cold evening.
Great location for airport travellers.

First and foremost, amazing value for money. Sparkling clean, interiors thoughtfully done, very practical and welcoming place. The check in, checkout process was seamless too. I would highly recommend this place and would love to stay again here.
Shuang房子離Wolli creek station 其實不算遠,回家前重可以去market shop ,房子潔静每曰都打掃公用地方､日後再到訪悉尼一定先book shuang 房子,房子很熱賣不一定有空房
My son stay overnight. He mentioned that the host had great hospitality and easy to check in.  We had great experiences.

Immaculately clean, with new modern furnishings and decor, and clear instructions. I would (and definitely tried) to stay here again! Located in what I would call the suburbs so Uber or self-driving is the best, though location is possible with a bit of walking and train/bus as instructed (or check (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps). WiFi was a saviour. It was cold at night but I discovered the heated blanket and all was alright. There is a washer but no dryer, so expect to hang dry.
Great value. Very very clean and so good if you are coming by plane or need to get to the airport.

Close to airport

The place is nice and clean. Definitely  stay again.

The room was very clean and the easy check in procedure was appreciated especially arriving so late at night. Overall a convenient stay. However, the room is walking distance from the international airport., 10 to 15 minutes. It is a 18$ uber from the domestic airport. Also the room price is deceiving as it initially said 43$ a night it changed to 53$ when paying and then a cleaning and service fee was also attached bringing the room to 68$ a night, almost double from the airnb quote per night that is stated. So I was unhappy with that surprise but was desperate for a last minute room and took it. The owner seems to be a good business man however he needs to communicate the costs before hand to the customer so there are no surprises.
tidy and clean,  within 20mins walk from the airport, very convinient. thanks!

Shuangs place is absolutely perfect for folks arriving and travelling from Sydney airport. wonderfully clean. Shuang responds very quickly to questions and issues. His dad is a delight and was very helpful when a thunderstorm knocked out the power. they made me feel very welcome in Sydney!

Shuang's place was perfect for our short stopover in Sydney, it was an easy short walk to Wolli Creek train station and had all we needed for a comfortable sleep. Free parking and a washing machine were additional perks! Would definitely recommend!

First thing I noticed was how clean the place was. There’s also a washing machine and detergent is provided so you don’t have to worry about getting your clothes cleaned up especially if you’re planning to stay a bit longer. The place is also very convenient - there’s a grocery shop and train & bus stations near the unit. Will definitely recommend this place to my friends coming over to Sydney!
Shuangs place was very nice. A bit of noise from the people in the room next to us and the beds. But extremely close to the airport and would recommend! Thanks!

The good thing is location and cleanness. The location is great, near the international airport. A 10-15min walk will get you there. Also, the place was clean, and it was private. 
The downside was the smell. The room was really damp, with a strong smell. It was so strong, that I inly stayed there one night, but it impregnated my cloths. I would suggest increasing the ventilation of the space, or get a dehumidifier.

We needed a place to stay for 1 night between flights. This place was close enough to walk to from the airport. Bed was fine but the bathroom could be better. Bath gets wet everywhere easily so a bit hazardous when leaving the bathroom because floors are glossy and slick outside the bathroom. Also every room has an odd small step so be careful. This place served our purpose but I wouldn't necessarily do it for a longer stay.
Good little place. $15 uber to the airport. 600. Walk to Woolworths. Good tidy place.

This is a very basic room in the downstairs apartment of a nice home. It's very no-frills, but for the price, hard to beat. When they say walking distance to the airport, they mean it, it's about 15 minutes on mostly bike path and you're at the terminal. I wouldn't spend a long holiday here, but for someone needing a quick, cheap place to lay your head down for an evening before an early flight, it's hard to beat.
Thank you Shuang. Perfect for my early morning flight. Great location and so comfortable
Second time in here. Easy to check in, easy to park car. Will definitely come again next time. A sparkling new TV in my room.

다음날 일찍 비행기를 타야 해서 공항 근처에 하룻동안 예약한 숙소였는데 가격은 제가 묵었던 다른 에어비앤비와 비교해 조금 높았지만 그만큼 값어치를 하는 숙소였어요! 공항까지 캐리어 들고 걷는건 좀 부담스러워서 기차로 이동했는데 아침 9시 비행기여서 6시 남짓에 이동했음에도 불구하고 공항까지 가는 기차가 운행해서 너무 좋았구요! 주로 중국인들이 많이 거주하는 아파트 지역에 위치한 조용한 주택인데 집 자체도 너무 예쁘고 에어비앤비용 숙소도 정말 깨끗하고 잘 관리해놓으신것 같아 편안하게 묵을 수 있었습니다! 제가 묵은 에어비앤비중에 방도 가장 넓고 시설도 정말 좋았어요. 방, 화장실, 공용공간 등 모든게 완벽하게 구비되어 있었고 콘센트, 샤워기, 냉장고, TV까지 사소한것들을 잘 제공해주신 것 또한 큰 배려심을 느꼈습니다. 시내까지 접근하기는 조금 부적당한 위치이지만 공항 근처에 숙소 잡으실 일이 있으면 꼭 이 곳을 추천드립니다!!

Perfect location to approach Airport and it was a best place between my Airbnbs in Sydney. All furnitures were well-prepared and clean. I think the host is always very careful about his airbnb. Highly recommended!
Very nice place, sparkling clean, host were lovely and extremely helpful. Will definitely recommend!

So good place to stay, near to airport for take an uber not very expensive. Good details in amenities and everything that you could need (as umbrella for rainy day in sydney, for example). Everything nice and clean.

Shuang's place is exactly as described in the listing. The check-in and check-out process is super easy, which is great for the weary traveller! Convenient location if you want to be close to the international and domestic airports, plus within walking distance to the Wolli train station. The room was clean and stylishly decorated with little touches like mints. Bed is very comfortable and I had a great nights sleep! Very important if you have an early flight the next morning. I would stay again.

Clean, tidy 2-bed granny flat type place which you get one of the rooms of (separate keys). Super close to the airport that means walking is easy (assuming no big cases), but not under the flight path. The Train is less than 15 mins walk and has regular services straight into town.  Good cooking facilities and a nice bathroom. No AC if that matters to you, but does have a fan. Would be perfect for a city break or business meeting stay over.
Overall the place is lovely and affordable, it is near to the airport,  only $18 Uber to the airport. Best for people who need to catch a flight.

name: large, affordable, clean,convenient
summary: My place is located in a 2 bedroom big and sunny apt, on the 4th floor, at Bronx. You can use kitchen and living room as well. It is just 2  minutes walking to the D and B train (stop 182). The apt has been renewated  recently.
