reviews.comments: This place was very clean and convenient. Extremely close to the subway. It's a little warm as it was the beginning of summer and there is no air conditioner in the apartment but with the windows open it was manageable. There is a place to do laundry in the basement which was very helpful and overall I'm happy with my experience.
The room was large and clean as listed and it was a good experience staying there, and Ehsan was helpful as best as he could

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: REFÚGIO BOAS VINDAS!
summary: My apartment is very close to the historic center of the city (a 10 minute walk). You will really like it because of its location. The surrounding area has many services. The apartment itself is very pleasant and cozy. It's good for couples or families with children (over 2 years old). Pets are also very welcome.
space: Perfeita combinação do antigo com o contemporâneo. Você pode desfrutar de um apartamento completamente remodelado com mobiliário e eletrodomésticos novos.  Localizado (a pé) a: * 1 minuto da estação de metro 'Campo 24 de Agosto' - Linha E (violeta) que sai do Aeroporto.  * 10 minutos do centro histórico da cidade do Porto.
description: My apartment is very close to the historic center of the city (a 10 minute walk). You will really like it because of its location. The surrounding area has many services. The apartment itself is very pleasant and cozy. It's good for couples or families with children (over 2 years old). Pets are also very welcome.
transit: Do apartamento, a pé, você está em valores aproximados:  1. Estação de metro 'Campo 24 de Agosto' - Linha E Violeta (Aeroporto) (1 minuto); 2. Coliseu Porto (6 minutos); 3. Majestic Café (7 minutos); 4. Via Catarina Shopping (7 minutos); 5. Mercado do Bolhão (8 minutos); 6. Estação São Bento (12 minutos): conexão trem, metro, autocarros;  7. Rua Galeria de Paris (14 minutos): onde ocorre a 'Movida do Porto'; 8. Ponte Luiz I (15 minutos): ícone da cidade do Porto; 9. Torre dos Clérigos (16 minutos): vista estonteante da cidade.
access: Tu podes usar todo o apartamento, tendo total privacidade.
house_rules: Pedimos que, por favor, zelem pelo espaço como o fazem com sua própria casa. É permitido que fumem apenas na varanda do apartamento, mas não dentro dele.  Respeitem o tempo de repouso e descanso dos vizinhos, mantendo total silêncio entre às 23h e às 7h durante a semana e aos sábados, domingos e feriados entre às 20h e às 8h. No restante do tempo deve haver ponderação e bom senso na administração do barulho.  Não levem para o apartamento pessoas que não tiveram reservas previamente agendadas.   A hora da saída é sempre às 11h, mas um atraso nesse horário é negociável desde que solicitado com antecedência. Ao saírem deixem as chaves dentro do apartamento pendurada no quadro de avisos e entreguem o espaço arrumado como o encontraram.

host.host_about:
Sou uma pessoa de bem com a vida que aprecia conhecer pessoas, ter boas conversas e fazer amizade.  
As 5 coisas essenciais para mim são: paz de espírito, bons amigos, natureza, boa leitura/música e boa comida.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Silvia nous a reservé un super acceuil.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Le logement est super propre et fonctionnel 
Très bonne communication avant et pendant le séjour. 
On reviendra!

Sehr zentral gelegen; Die Gastgeberin hat uns zur besseren Orientierung eine Stadtkarte bereitgestellt. Schönes, voll ausgestattetes Apartment.
Schnelle Rückmeldung und einfache Kontaktaufnahme mit der Gastgeberin.
Fue muy agradable, nos recibio con puntualidad, nos explico todo muy bien y hasta nos dio un detalle de bienvenida.

Silvia was really sweet and very attentive -- she stocked the apartment with all the basics and more. The apartment is exactly what you would expect -- felt very homey and warm. Also conveniently located with metro station and supermarkets within a few minutes' walking. The small one-way street it overlooks can get busy (traffic noise) and the restaurant across the street a little noisy so not the quietest but was not an issue for me with the balcony doors closed. All in all great!

Apartamento muito acolhedor, moderno e limpo, com tudo o que é necessário. 
A Sra. Silvia foi muito simpática e facilitou-nos o horário do check-in mais cedo o que realmente foi muito útil para não termos de andar com as malas.
Recomendo!

Great place and a very helpful, professional host!

We arrived, drenched in rain (apparently one of those rare summer days when water decides to pour from the skies above Porto) and Silvia was waiting for us, with a bottle of wine as a little welcome gift! 

The apartment itself is very clean, cosy and ideally located in central Porto, perfect for those who want to explore the city.

Silvia è un ho sto meraviglioso!gentile,educata e disponibile. La casa era pulitissima,bella,in una posizione favorevole alle attrazioni. 
La casa è completa di tutto ciò che può servire per il soggiorno.
Grazie Silvia! Torneremo presto a trovarti!
Espaço acolhedor, muito bem localizado. A Silvia extraordinariamente simpática e disponível. Recomendo intensamente.

Silvia's place is amazing! It is super clean and very well equipped. The location was great, one minute away from metro and 10 minutes walking from the city centre. In addition, Silvia was an amazing host, super kind, concerned and thoughtful. 100% recommended.

Silvia -  невероятно внимательная и приветливая хозяйка. Еще до приезда она подробно ответила на все наши вопросы и дала подробные инструкции. А когда мы приехали, ждала нас, стоя на балконе.
Приветственная бутылка вина была для нас приятным сюрпризом.
Апартаменты  просто поразили нас своей чистотой и уютом. Есть все необходимое. 
Немного шумно, поскольку транспорт под окнами ходит и днем, и ночью. Но это расплата за очень удачное расположение. Рядом магазины, кафе. Метро рядом, но мы им практически не пользовались, всюду гуляли пешком.
В следующий раз, когда мы приедем в Порту, мы знаем где остановится.
Очень рекомендуем
Спасибо, Silvia

Sylvia a été très accueillante. Elle est vraiment très attentionnée, elle nous a fournit toutes les infos utiles pour arriver à l'appartement et avait tout prévu pour que le séjour se passe bien. 
L'appartement était nickel, très propre et exactement comme sur les photos. Il est très bien situé proche du centre ville historique. 
La rue en elle même n'est pas la plus agréable mais le quartier est central et très sympa. 
Je recommande vraiment l'appartement!

Wir haben zwar nur eine Nacht in Silvias Appartement verbracht, sind aber dennoch voll auf begeistert und werden es garantiert weiterempfehlen - womöglich sogar selbst sehr bald nochmal buchen. Das Appartement ist viel geräumiger und schöner als es auf den Fotos wirkt. Wir waren die zwei Tage in Porto nur zu Fuß unterwegs - strammen Schrittes sind es 15 Minuten bis zur wunderschönen Rua das Flores und dem Bahnhof Sao Bento. 
Silvias Appartement ist komplett ausgestattet - von Fön bis Waschmaschine (inkl. Waschmittel)! Die Gastgeberin war super freundlich, hat schon vor der Ankunft schnell auf Nachrichten geantwortet und uns herzlich - und mit einem Gastgeschenk - empfangen. Vielen Dank, Silvia, und bis zum nächsten Mal! 

We only stayed one night at Silvias apartment, but we liked it really much and will for sure recommend it - and book it again for ourselves the next time we'll spend Porto a visit. The apartment has much more space and charme than it seems in the pictures. We only explored Porto by foot - if you walk a bit faster, it's 15 minutes to beautiful Rua slas Flores and the train station Sao Bento.
Silvias apartment is fully equipped - from blow dryer to washing machine! The host was as nice as could be, answered messages promptly and welcomed us warmly - with a little gift as well. Thank you very much, Silvia, see you!
Joli appartement, bien équipé, très bien situé mais bruyant. Accueil chaleureux de Sylvia. Ville pleine de charme, séjour très agréable à Porto.
Nice and clean apartment near the beautiful old town (a 15 minute walk).  It is fully equipped .Fast communication with the friendly host.
très mauvais nous avons pas encore enlevé nos affaires quel était dans appartement quartier de prostitution.
Boa localização! A Sílvia foi muito acolhedora, óptima host. A casa é muito bonita, mais do que nas fotos. Tencionamos repetir esta experiência.

Все произвело положительное впечатление, начиная от бронирования и заканчивая выселением. Сильвия очень внимательный хозяин. Точно и подробно давала интересующую нас информацию. Квартира произвела благоприятное впечатление. Чистая, уютная, светлая, небольшая (но для трех человек хорошо). Находится в центре, до исторического центра можно дойти пешком. Все понравилось. Если будет возможность, то воспользуюсь сама еще раз и очень рекомендую всем!

Silvia nos recebeu muito bem.Foi muito simpática e atenciosa.Levei meu cãozinho Luca e quando chegamos encontramos vasilhas novas e uma caminha com manta para ele.O apartamento está todo novo e a limpeza impecável!
Gostamos muito da estadia! Recomendo!

Très bien accueillis dans l'appartement, conforme aux photos, tout confort avec en cadeau yne bouteille de vin.
Propreté digne d'un hôtel!
Et centre à proximité,merci!
Excellent host.  Fantastic location close to metro and short walk to downtown.
Silvia was excellent and considered.  I recommend her house.
Excellent séjour à Porto, en partie grâce à Silvia et son appartement. Hôte au petit soin que ce soit pendant, avant et même après le séjour.

L'acceuil réservé par Silvia était idéal, ses explications pour nous diriger de l'aéroport étaient très utiles. Le logement est dans un état impeccable, et est bien situé par rapport au dynamisme de la ville.

Un bémol cependant concernant le bruit dans la rue en pleine nuit (voitures, passants...) mais rien qui n'altère le sentiment agréable de notre séjour chez Silvia.

Je recommande !

Сильвия - замечательная гостеприимная хозяйка! Апартаменты найти очень просто благодаря подробному описанию Сильвии. Уютно, чисто, комфортно. Рядом с метро. В 15 мин от вокзала. 20 мин до центра. Все рекомендации вы легко получите у хозяйки.

Tudo perfeito! O apartamento é super bem localizado. Tudo novo, limpíssimo. Apenas um lance de escadas. Funcionou muito bem inclusive na viagem com a minha mãe (76 anos). Adoramos o vinho de presente, obrigado.

The apartment was very clean.You have all the things you need, even shampoo, soap, toilet paper and... a welcoming bottle of wine ! 
Silvia is very helpful and nice.
However there is noise in the street during the night.

The appartment is very nice, comfortable. The appartment is also very clean, which is very important for me. Near the appartment you can find Metro Station, restaurants and supermarkets. So I think the location is super nice. Silvia is also very kind. She gave us a bottle of port wine as a welcome drink. She explained us about the appartment and told us to feel like home, which is very nice of her :) Highly recommended to stay at her place :)

O apartamento é ideal para 1 casal. Muito bem localizado, Silvia é um encanto (até nos deixou um detalhe de bem-vindos), sempre preocupada e atenta conosco. A limpeza impecável e muito confortavel. Voltaria sem dúvidas!!!!
I really liked the experience, everything was very clean and perfect. It was a little cold in the apartment, but everything else was great.

We had a wonderful 3 night stay at Silvia's place. The apartment was very beautiful and spacious, very clean and well-equipped. There was everything we might need - lots of clean towels, extra blankets, wifi, shampoo, soap, a map of the city, etc. The apartment building was also very nice and quiet, close to a metro station and not too far away from the very centre of the city. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Porto!
Квартира в центральном районе. Все достопримечательности поблизости. Сильвия была очень гостепреимна и любезна. Спасибо Сильвия. Отдых в Порту очень понравился.

El piso de Silvia es precioso y confortable, tiene todo lo que necesitas para sentirte como en casa. Está muy bien comunicado y situado, a 1 minuto de la parada de metro y a 10 del centro, además tiene muchos servicios cerca. Estamos encantadas de haber elegido esta opción, tanto por el piso  como por la hospitalidad de Silvia y su hermana. Esperamos volver a veros pronto porque pensamos repetir!! 100% recomendable!!

Silvana (Silvias sister) checked us in and she was very sweet and attentive. They gave us a bottle of welcome wine which was very nice. The beds were very comfortable and three of us fit in the apartment comfortably. The bedroom is actually bigger than it appears. The location is great- within walking distance to the downtown areas and tons of restaurants and shops. Also less than 2 blocks from the metro. Also, there is no elevator but the apartment is only up one flight of stairs so it was fine for us. The only thing worth noting is that the kitchen is small and might not be ideal for anyone seeking to cook a large meal. That aside, this is a lovely apartment and I would definitely stay here again.
We ad a very good welcome. The appartment is pleasant, and the neighbourhood is very local, with a nice variety of restaurants.
Silvia很热情,为我们提供了详细的路线｡房子位置不错,设施很齐全｡

Нам заранее объяснили как добраться до квартиры. На месте нас встретил Виктор, друг Сильвии. Все показал и объяснил . В квартире новая мебель и посуда, сделан хороший ремонт. Новая бытовая техника  и все необходимое для проживания. Рядом метро и магазины. Бутылка вина и воды была приятным подарком. Единственный минус - очень холодно в квартире зимой. Есть обогреватель, можно нагреть квартиру, но очень холодный пол (берите тапочки).
Nice house, very near to augusto metro stop. All places are nearby to visit . Silvia is very helpful too.

L'appartement est comme sur la photo. Il est très propre et très bien entretenu. Silvia est l'hôte parfaite, elle répondra a toute vos questions et toujours prete a aider au moindre problème.
Le seul petit bémol est le quartier qui est un peu lugubre mais les gens y sont tres accueillant.

Silvia is an amazing host. She met us at her apartment and went over everything. She provided us with a list of "must see/go/do" as well as names of local markets, etc. Her apartment is located in a very eclectic neighborhood. It's got everything we needed for our stay and more (a bottle of wine waiting for us was a nice touch). It's clean, airy, cozy and located within walking distance to the river, Rua Santa Catarina and other attractions. We highly recommend Silvia's apartment.

We loved Silvia's place. It was so clean and so comfortable! It was close to restaurants, shops, super markets and more.  We felt like we were in the heart of Porto and the metro was only a one minute walk away and it was really easy and straight forward to get from the airport to Silvia's place. Silvia was extremely kind, great communication. She was flexible and easy going. It was everything we hoped for and more! Thanks again!

The flat is very comfortable and it is in very good location-close to the historic center of Porto and to the metro station.  We really loved it. Silvia is very nice and kind person, who helped us a lot.

O apartamento encontra-se em óptimas condições, super limpo, com tudo o que está descrito no anúncio e muito bem localizado. E a Silvia é sem duvida um amor de pessoa sempre pronta a ajudar! Recomendo a 100% o Refúgio de boas vindas! :)
Excellent apartmen and very good location. Silvia is very friendly and helpfully. I would go back now! Thank you!

Sylvia a été une hôte très agréable qui nous avait donné toutes les indications pour trouver précisément le logement, et elle nous attendait sur place, le Top L'appartement est petit mais très bien agencé et équipé. Il était conforme à nos attente et même plus il dégage une chaleur qu'on ne perçoit pas sur les photos. A recommander fortement

Het appartement is schoon, mooi ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. Prima Wifi en goede bedden. Geschikt voor 2 mensen, voor meer is het krapjes.  De plek is prima, je loopt zo de stad in, en winkels om de hoek.  Silvia is een uitstekende host, ze geeft prima uitleg, kaarten en wijntje liggen klaar, aldoor goed bereikbaar en geeft alle vertrouwen.  Ik kan eigenlijk niks te verbeteren vinden.
Recomendo sem dúvida alguma. A Sílvia é muito prestável. Localização perfeita! É possível fazer tudo a pé. 5 estrelas!

l'alloggio è molto bello, tutto nuovo e ben equipaggiato anche in cucina. posizione ottima, strada tranquilla ma vicino al centro e ai negozi. non serve la metro per spostarsi ed è comodissima con la metro arrivando dall'aeroporto. un ottimo connubio tra vari aspetti. pulizia e cortesia non mancano. brava Silvia, continua cosi :)

Het appartement van Silvia is precies zoals je ziet op de foto's. Niet onwijs groot, maar ruim genoeg voor een heerlijk verblijf in Porto. Het huis is van alle gemakken voorzien en super schoon. De bedden liggen goed!
De locatie is top. Heel eenvoudig te bereiken vanaf het vliegveld en alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand. De communicatie met Silvia verloopt heel prettig. Ik zou deze accommodatie zeker aanraden!

Excelente anfitriona, nos dio mucha información no sólo para conocer Oporto, si no también los alrededores. Siempre estuvo al pendiente y la comunicación con ella fue eficiente en todo momento. El departamento está súper bien ubicado, cerca de todo y a la vez en una calle tranquila. Las instrucciones que nos dio Silvia para llegar al departamento fueron muy precisas. Todo funcionaba correctamente y hasta una botella de vino nos regaló a nuestra llegada. El departamento está precioso, justo como aparece en las fotos. Es amplio y muy luminoso, la decoración es muy linda. Gracias por todo Silvia, ten por seguro que si regresamos a Oporto, nos volveremos a quedar en tu departamento.

O espaço é limpo, muito bem decorado e agradável. Tem todas as facilidades que se necessita e Silvia uma ótima anfitriã. Isto tudo numa cidade linda fez a  estadia ser ótima! Silvia tudo de melhor para você!
Appartement très propre, joli, bien équipé et bien situé. Sylvia est une hôtesse attentionnée et fiable. Une excellente adresse.

We've had a perfect stay, Silvia was so nice and even waited for us to show us the apartment although we arrived really late. The apartment was really clean and it had a coffee machine and lots of things you could possibly need to cook. We can definitely recommend to stay there!

We loved staying in Porto, especially in this lovely apartment!
It is very clean and offers enough space for three or even 4 guests.
Silvia is a very kind host, she gave us tips what to visit and we were able to contact her at any time.
All in all, we can really recommend this accomodation!

Bonjour,
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour de 3 jours et 2 nuits dans l'appartement que Silvia notre hôte nous a loué dans la ville de Porto.

Silvia était là pour nous accueillir, pour nous expliquer tout dans les moindre details sur son appartement et sur le quartier ainsi que les activites possible à faire.

Silvia sera toujours là pour vous aider, depuis la location sur internet, jusqu 'à votre arrivée, sejour et départ.  
A tous  vos messages-demande Silvia y répondra rapidement.

L'appartement est parfait, salle de bain et toilette, séjour, chambre, un appartement que nous recommandons, l'appartement est comme neuf, vous vous y sentirez très  bien.

L'appartement est très bien situé avec toutes les commodités, quartier calme.

Le lieu de l'appartement est situé vraiment très  proche du centre ville et du port de porto.

Ensuite les activités  sont nombreuses pour visiter et profiter de la ville.

Un bon séjour pour tous ceux qui iront visiter porto et ses environs.

Fernando et famille.

The host was very nice and sweet. Explained to us in details about the place. Offered us map to go by walk in the city of Porto. She even helped us book a cab in the early morning since we had an early flight. The apartment was spotless clean, well situated and very close to all the places of attraction.

A casa é fantástica. Muito bem equipada, limpa e moderna. Ideal para duas pessoas, mas com espaço necessário para quatro. A localização é excelente - perto do metro e de fácil acesso aos pontos turísticos principais.
Lokalizacja i mieszkanie swietne ,polecam .Zbigniew

Silvia est vraiment très sympathique, accueillante, et serviable, son appartement est très bien situé à 5 ou 10 minutes à pied du vieux porto, il est calme et proche des magasins de proximité.
Son appartement propre, confortable est meublé avec goût et de plus il est pratique. Silvia fournie tout le linge, vous n'avez rien à prendre avec vous.
Elle a même réservé le taxi pour nous.
Nous vous recommandons milles fois Silvia et son appartement.

O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado, perto de tudo e com todos utensílios que precisamos. A Silvia é super simpática e nos passou informações importantes e dicas muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaríamos a nos hospedar lá em uma nova oportunidade.

A Silvia foi super gentil, muito acessível a comunicação e auxiliou com todas as informações necessárias sobre a cidade, inclusive ajudando a agendar o táxi na madrugada. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo a estação de metrô, lojas e padarias e poucos minutos a pé de muitas atrações da cidade. Limpeza e organização do apartamento são excelentes. Recomendo e retornaria numa próxima visita ao Porto.

It was a pleasure to stay in this apartment. Centrally located, comfortable, clean, bright. We felt like at home. Everything was easy to reach. 
Silvia is one of the best hostesses I met on my many travels. 
Our stay here was great! This apartment is absolutely recommended!!!!

Сильвия замечательная хозяйка : заботливая, внимательная, очень гостеприимная! 
Квартира уютная, удобная, чистая. Есть все для комфортного пребывания. Удобное расположение: рядом метро, вокзалы, магазины , исторический центр. Все очень понравилось!
O apartamento está  localizado próximo aos principais pontos turísticos. Silvia é pontual, atenciosa e foi bem prestativa. Sofá cama bem confortável. Limpeza impecável.

Silvia waited for us like some friends. It's a great host, that makes you feel good from the first moment. After a long trip, the wine and the water received were a pleasant surprise.
She presented us the apartment, that is nice and very well equipped and provided maps, showing us the tourist attractions of interest. The apartment is located close to the tourist areas, on a quiet and secure street. Here you can feel  better the spirit of old Porto.
Nearby, there are 2 supermarkets, fresh fish shops and other small local stores with various products.
We recommend the apartment to anyone who wants a pleasant stay in the beautiful and picturesque city of Porto.
Het appartement was een echte aanrader omdat het dichtbij alle bezienswaardigheden is en de wijk is gezellig.

L'appartement est situé près du centre de Porto ce qui est vraiment trés agréable. 
L'appartement est très cosy, propre et calme.
Silvia est très accueillante et prend le temps de vous conseiller sur les différents endroits à visiter.
Si vous planifiez un week-end à Porto, je vous recommande cet endroit.
Et si je retourne à Porto, sans hésiter je retournerai chez Silvia.

Sylivia super człowiek jej dom perfekcyjny, idealne miejsce do zwiedzania blisko metra i dworca bus. 
Pomocna i uczynna dzięki Sylvia i do zobaczenia 
Greg

First of all, Silvia was really kind with us, we missed the flight and she was so flexible with the check in time. The apartment is beautiful and comfortable. It is a very good place to stay in Oporto!

This is a great apartment and excellent value for money! It is close to everything (metro, shops, restaurants etc.) and very neat and fully equipped. Silvia is very friendly and helpful - she gave us a map of Porto and pointed out some nice places to see and gave some tips. The welcome wine was a really nice touch! I'd definitely recommend this apartment if you're looking for a nice place to stay.

Foi uma excelente escolha que fizemos! A Silvia é uma pessoa super simpática, prestativa, pensa em todos os detalhes possíveis para tornar a estadia uma experiência mais que agradável. Seu apartamento é muito lindo, cetral, super organizado e bem equipado, tudo muito limpinho e de muio bom gosto! Só tenho o que agradecer, voltaria novamente e recomendo à todos!
Because our train was delayed, we arrived at Porto at eleven o 'clock in the evening. The landlord was waiting for me. Thank you very much.

Amazing flat and superb host. The apartment is well located, modern, clean with loads of useful amenities. We couldn't ask for a better accommodation. I traveled first time in Porto with a friend and we were super pleased with the whole experience.  Silvia was absolutely lovely and very attentive. Always happy to help in any situation. She waited for us checking in and she gave us great tips about the city.  It was a pleasure spending days in this wonderful City and meeting Silvia. Highly recommended with no doubts.
We are very satisfied. The apartment is as indicated. Silvia welcomed us perfectly, she is available for any help and information

Silvia is a great host, very attentive and helpful! I loved her place very clean with everything you would need.
Thank you!
Appartement très propre et fonctionnel à 10mn du centre vile mais quartier en cours de rénovation
Everything was absolutely gorgeous! Silvia was really helpful!!! She left us some maps and took care about everything! I would reccomend this place to anyone staying in Porto! We had a perfect stay!
L appartamento è monto carino, pulitissimo e non manca proprio niente. Silvia è gentilissima e molto disponibile. Non potevamo chiedere meglio di così

Mieszkanie bardzo dobrze usytuowane,  kilka metrów od metra, bardzo blisko do sklepów i restauracji oraz w odległości krótkiego spaceru od najważniejszych atrakcji miasta. W mieszkaniu jest wszystko co potrzebne do codziennego życia łącznie z ręcznikami na plażę jeśli kogoś najdzie ochota na takie atrakcje. Kontakt z Silvia bardzo dobry, wszystko wyjaśniła i udzieliła potrzebnych rad.

El apartamento es precioso y está muy bien situado. Dando un paseo se encuentra próximo a los sitios más turísticos de Oporto. Está equipado con todo lo necesario y es muy cómodo. Sin duda, un gran acierto. Silvia es una gran anfitriona!! Lo recomendamos 100%

Esperamos volver pronto :)

Great apartment. Very well equipped. Kitchen with cooker and washing machine and air conditioning. Sylvia was a great host. Would deffinately stay in this well priced and located apartment again. Thanks Sylvia
Silvia è stata molto cortese e disponibile. La casa è pulita, comoda e in posizione centrale. Assolutamente consigliato
Apartamento genial ubicado, en pleno centro de Oporto y muy bien equipado!! Podriamos habernos quedado allí a vivir, jeje.

Mooi appartement voor 2 personen. Ruime slaapkamer, goeie bedden. Alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig, goeie douche! Gebruik van wasmachine is ideaal! Je met met 10 minuten lopen in het oude centrum van porto.
Wonderful, I would stay there in a heartbeat again! Clean, comfy beds, great location and beautifully decorated!

Appartement très propre, un accueil parfait , elle est à l'ecoute, disponible pour nous aider, elle nous a très bien guider pourboires séjour. L'appartement est à 5mn à pied des rue commerçantes et touristique. Tout peu se faire à pied. L'appartement est très propre et assez spacieux je le recommande ++++ ! Séjour parfait dans cet appartement !

Silvias appartment was really great! It was clean, beautiful and there was everything you might need. Silvia was extremely friendly and gave us many tips. We don't have anything to complain. We really recommend!
Silvia is a wonderful host. Good location

Ótimo apartamento, muito limpo e extremamente organizado, localizado próximo às atrações principais da cidade. A anfitriã Silvia foi muito prestativa e explicou tudo o que precisávamos saber sobre seu espaço e sobre a cidade. A casa conta com absolutamente tudo que alguém precisa para passar vários dias lá, incluindo cozinha totalmente equipada, secador de cabelo, shampoo, toalhas,  etc.

O apartamento da Sílvia é excelente, bem localizado, ótima infraestrutura, organizado, limpo e tem atenção aos pequenos detalhes. A anfitriã nos recebeu pessoalmente e carinhosamente com um vinho, fez indicações de lugares e serviços além de estar à disposição para dúvidas durante todo o tempo. Não pense duas vezes para escolher este espaço acolhedor! Voltaremos a Portugal e desde já indicaremos a todos a hospedagem. 

Sílvia, muito grata pelo carinho e simpatia! Beijinhos Carina e Iara
Excelente ubicación, gran anfitriona! Las fotos reflejan la realidad. Muy lindo apartamento y muy bien dotado! 100% recomendado.

Die Wohnung ist wirklich der Hammer! Wir haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt, es war alles wie auf den Bildern. Total sauber, es roch gut und alles da um auch selbst zu Kochen und zu Frühstücken. Die Lage ist Perfekt. Die Innenstadt und der Fluss Douro ist alles fussläufig zu erreichen. Auch Porto selbst kann man schön zu Fuß alles laufen! Also würden wir wieder nach Porto kommen, würde ich diese Unterkunft wieder wählen! Ich danke Silvia für ihr herzliches Willkommen und ihre Tips wo man am besten hingehen kann. Vielen Dank es war eine tolle Woche in Porto für uns. :)
Excelente anfitrión, sobresaliente por su hospitalidad, asesoramiento, personalidad; el lugar es muy bueno también,

Мы выбрали квартиру Сильвии, так как это рядом с автостанцией Порту - Terminal Rodoviário на Campo 24 de Agosto, nº 125. Также рядом станция метро с фиолетовой линией в аэропорт. Историческая часть Порту и Вила Нова ди Гайя в пешей доступности, городским транспортом можно не пользоваться. Квартира в доме после ремонта, супер современная. Улица типичная для Порту. А дальше можно сравнить со сказкой, как Буратино (Пиноккио) открывает дверь золотым ключом, а там всё сверкает, всё чудесно и прекрасно! Сильвия предоставила много карт города, подробно рассказала, как и куда сходить. Недалеко от квартиры супермаркеты Pingo Doce, Mini preco, Lidl.

Apartamento muito bem localizado, organizado, arrumado e limpo. A recepção foi perfeita pois Silvia nos deu todas as dicas necessárias para que pudemos desfrutar ao máximo nossa passeio. Pudemos fazer o passeio por toda parte histórica de Porto a pé. Recomendo muito o apartamento dela.
Действительно выдающееся гостеприимство Сильвии! Апартаменты не только укомплектованы всем необходимым, но и уютны и стильны.
Muy recomendable. Reserva con los ojos cerrados, no tendras ningun problema. Excelente la experiencia de mis padres en el departamento de Silvia. Muchas Gracias por todo.

Silvia is a very nice host, with great communication skills. She had some good tips for us. The apartment itself was nice and clean, but a bit noisy (cars driving trough the street during the night, which made it a bit difficult to get a good night sleep). Soundstoppers solved that problem the next 2 nights :-).

Sylvia was a very welcoming host and offered us great advice in what to see/do in Porto. We enjoyed our stay at her apartment, very clean, fully equipped and located just outside the historic Porto. Fully recommend!

Silvia est une hôte exceptionnelle, elle vous accueille à bras ouverts et vous fournit toute la documentation que vous souhaitez et ses conseils avisés. Dès la réservation, elle prend contact avec vous et vous donne l'itinéraire pour arriver chez elle dans les moindres détails. Silvia est toujours disponible. L'accueil est vraiment très chaleureux et une attention personnelle vous est offerte. L'appartement est tout à fait conforme aux photos, il est décoré avec des couleurs très gaies, l'équipement est neuf et les accessoires de cuisine sont au top ! La literie est excellente. L'appartement est d'une propreté impeccable ! Vraiment, merci Silvia ! si toutes les locations pouvaient être ainsi, et les hôtes, comme Silvia, ce serait super ! L'appartement est très proche du métro CAMPO 24 DE AGOSTO et à 30 minutes de l'aéroport (pas de changement de ligne). Vous pouvez vous rendre à pied en centre ville sans problème.
Apartamento de diez y anfitriona de lujo

Silvia was such a delight! She was so informative and helpful with tons of options for everything we asked her for. She makes sure she caters to every type of person and is just so helpful for anything you can possibly ask for. Her place is SO close to the subway station that you can stay on to get into the city center. Had we known about this we would have utilized the subway much more! Her neighborhood is also very quiet and peaceful at night. It's the perfect place to be just off the beaten path but not far that a 10 minute subway ride can't get you to the beautiful waterfront and city center of Porto and a quick ride to Gaia! Definitely recommend this quaint private home!
Silvia is friendly, sympathetic lady. She gave us many useful tips and her place is very comfortable. It is quiet but very close to the historical center.

3 amigas brasileiras. Ficamos extremamente satisfeitas com as acomodações, com a localização privilegiada e próximo à transporte públicos, o que facilita o deslocamento pela cidade. A Silvia é muito simpática e dá informações preciosas para os turistas!!!!

Silvia, muito obrigada pela estadia maravilhosa! Eu e minha mãe adoramos o apartamento.
O espaço é simples, mas muito funcional, agradável e bonito. A Silvia foi muito simpática e atenciosa, deu várias dicas e mostrou os principais pontos da cidade e sempre esteve disponível para atender qualquer dúvida. Ela nos ajudou com o transporte no dia da nossa partida e deixou dicas de restaurantes (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza é um apartamento que eu recomendo e que voltarei a reservar!
Silvia, mais uma vez, muito obrigada! Abraços.

Genial!!!!! El piso es perfecto para 3 personas. Es cómodo, súper limpio, cerca de todo, moderno, con estilo, y Silvia fue una anfitriona excelente! Nos explico recorridos para aprovechar al máximo la ciudad, dónde comer o beber, que no nos podíamos perder!!!! Todo!!!! Volveríamos sin dudarlo.
Silvia was a great host and the apartment is perfect for a citytrip Porto!! Thanks Silvia!

Silvia ha sido una anfitriona estupenda, en todo momento ha estado pendiente de nosotras, también nos explicó las zonas más bonitas para visitar y como regalo de bienvenida nos dejó una botella de vino.

El alojamiento de Sílvia es un 10. Al llegar, Sílvia nos estaba esperado y nos habló un poco de la ciudad: qué ver, cómo movernos, recomendaciones... y nos dio unos mapas. El alojamiento se encuentra muy bien situado, cerca del transporte público, supermercados y cafeterias y restaurantes. Todo muy limpio, y Sílvia muy agradable y cercana. 
Muy recomendable!

Sylvia is a fantastic host, she met us when we arrived, provided us with all the details and gave us some great tips that made the getaway special. The flat is small, but met our needs very well. We were especially impressed by how pet friendly Sylvia was, she even supplied us with bowls for the dog. The bedroom was comfortable and we appreciated the heater as it became quite cold outside the second night in the flat. The kitchen was outfitted nicely, however, a kettle and toaster would be a welcome addition. The bathroom was very awkward to use as the shower door opens up to the toilet and there is no place to hang a towel, robe or clothes. The space on the other side of the shower does not make sense to me. All in all a good place to stay while in Porto.
Very nice place to stay. It's close to the center of the city. The apartment is clean and has all the comforts you will need. Should be your first choice!

Silvia's place is perfect. Very clean, well furnished, completely functional, close from the city center.
Silvia's friend welcomed us very nicely. She gave us many information about places to visit, bars to chill, spot to relax...
I really recommend.
Thanks again

O apartamento é muito acolhedor. Está situado praticamente no centro do Porto, onde nos podemos deslocar para qualquer parte da cidade a pé, sem necessidade de transportes.
E a Silvia é uma excelente anfitriã. Muito atenciosa e simpática.
Belo apartamento. Confortável. Espaçoso e aconchegante.
Silvia foi muito atenciosa  em todo tempo que ficamos em Porto!! Sua casa é muito bem localizada, limpa e organizada!! Quando voltar á Porto, com certeza me hospedarei novamente com Silvia!!
Excelente apartamento e boa localização.

O apartamento da SIlvia é excelente, muito limpo, organizado e ótima localização.  Perto dos principais pontos turísticos,  metro, supermercados e cafés. SIlvia foi muito atenciosa e sempre nos respondeu às dúvidas com agilidade. Se voltarmos a nos hospedar em Porto, sem dúvidas o imóvel da SIlvia será nossa primeira opção.  Agradecemos pelo vinho de boas vindas e lhe desejamos um 2018 cheio de realizações. Abraços,  
Valente e família.

Silvia's flat was clean, well equipped, comfortable, and conveniently located. In fact, I could walk from the flat to almost everywhere I wanted to go in Porto. Unfortunately, Silvia was away during my stay at her place, so I didn't get to meet her in person, but she was available by email, and she had a friend meet me at the flat when I arrived. Silvia was considerate and flexible about my checkout time, and it was a good experience staying at her place. I recommend that anyone going to Porto consider staying at Silvia's flat.
Espaço  muito acolhedor, limpo e bem organizado. A Silvia foi atenciosa e disponível. Boa localização e fácil acesso ao centro histórico à pé.  Agradeço  a atenção no check-in e no check-out.

O apt fica muito bem localizado. Uma caminhada de 10, 15 minutos e já estamos próximo a São Bento e Avenida dos Aliados. Tem mercado próximo e é fácil pra quem chega da Estação de Campanhã. As camas são extremamente confortáveis, chuveiro, impecável! O sofá cama também é bem confortável. A Silvia é uma excelente anfitriã e ainda prolongou nosso horário de check out! Obrigada!

Excelente comunicação.
Espaço perfeito e muito bem localizado.
Recomendo!

从未见过如此热情友好的房东,房东两姐妹很热情地为我们推荐当地好玩好吃的地方｡
公寓非常棒,位置好,设施齐全,干净,温馨…
这次住房体验几乎挑不出什么缺点
Silvia’s place was great and the local tips provided by her and Mariana were very helpful. We had an amazing time in Porto!

This place was a really good option and I definitely recommend it. Very clean, Comfortable and cosy. I felt at home and after a long day it was a good feeling to go back to the apartment. All the amenities needed. Very good located, 7 min walking to the tube station and lots off restaurants and bakeries/coffee shops. Santa Catarina street, where is Majestic Coffee it is just less than 10 min walking and "Mercado do Bolhão". Another References of the city are around and easily walking.
Sílvia was a very communicative host. Despite off didn't met her personally, she was always in touch with us and always giving us informations.  Many thanks Sílvia for the lovely place. I loved the place and loved Porto city.

Silvia was a really nice host with her amazing apartment. We spend a really great time there and would love to come again.
Even with the rain we had that week, we enjoyed staying at this warm place. 
The apartment is located at about 10-15 min from the center and has all the facilities needed. Everything was nicely prepared at our arriving.
At the check-in, her friend Marianna gave us a map with all the hot spots of the city.
Thank you for having us at your place!
Amazing place cant complain bang on for the bucks.

l'appartement a tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un agréable séjour;  il est très bien rénové et équipé; la  literie est super ; il est assez bien insonorisé dans un  quartier vivant et tranquille , avec  tout à proximité et  à 2mn du métro. 
-très bonne communication avec Silvia qui nous a tout indiqué pour arriver à l'appartement et qui nous a donné un précieux conseil pour le jour du départ: s'assurer que la porte de l'immeuble n'était pas fermée à clé! car comme on devait laisser les clés à l'intérieur de l'appartement , nous avons failli rencontrer un problème! merci à Marianna qui nous à accueillis et merci de tous ses conseils pour visiter la ville; nous avons apprécié l'attention des  bouteilles de vin et d'eau et le minimum de produits de base ; nous reviendrons sans probléme chez Silvia

Appartement super équipé (isolation,chauffage, cuisine ...) et trés agréable.
L'emplacement est idéal, près des métros, mais aussi du centre ville à pied,commerces pas trop loin.
L'accueil a été très attentionné avec pleins de conseils touristiques.
Mérite largement la dénomination de SUPER HOTE
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir

Hostitelka Silvia je moc milá, starostlivá a pečlivá. Perfektně mi popsala cestu, včetně jízdenky, kterou si mám koupit na cestu z letiště. Následně na nás v bytě čekala milá slečna, která nám vše ukázala, dala nám mapky a zaškrtla nám do nich zajímavá místa. Oceňuji perfektní komunikaci. Byt byl krásně čistý a uklizený. Když bylo chladněji, ocenili jsme možnost přitopit si klimatizací. Byt má výhodnou pozici kousek od metra i centra města. Jedinou menší nevýhodou je rušnější ulice pod okny. Ubytování všem doporučuji, pokud se do Porta vrátíme, víme, kde budeme bydlet :-). Na přivítanou jsme dostali lahev vína a vody, což bylo moc milé. Děkujeme

We had a great stay at Silvia’s place! It was in perfect walking distance to a great market for food and walkable to all the main attractions. The apartment was spacious and well-equipped and the hosts gave us a lot of great tips for seeing the city, would definitely recommend!

Wir waren 5 Tage in Silvias Wohnung. Die Lage ist in Mitten der Altstadt, man erreicht alles zu Fuß. Es gibt wunderbare Restaurants in der Nähe und auch Supermärkte. Das Appartement ist top ausgestattet und sehr sauber. Silvia ist eine tolle Gastgeberin. Sie hat sich super um unser Wohl gekümmert und stand auch jederzeit bei Fragen zur Verfügung. Wir haben tolle Tipps bekommen und uns rundum wohl gefühlt.
Beim nächsten Mal in Porto gerne wieder!
Muitos parabéns à Silvia pela excelente hospedagem.  Tudo excelente. Espero voltar numa próxima oportunidade.

L'appartement de Silvia est très bien situé, que ce soit pour visiter Porto à pieds ou en transports. Tout est très bien expliqué, l'accueil est charmant et on vous donne les meilleurs conseils pour profiter de votre séjour et découvrir la ville. L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel, Silvia a pensé à tout ! Nous y retournerons avec plaisir !

Silvia was a great host. She made herself available and helpful from the moment we landed on the airport. Her directions and advises was accurate and on point. Nevertheless we hadn't had a chance to meet each other in person, her co host Mariana showed us around the apartment and kindly suggested places of interest and a good place to have a francesinha. 
Silvia's apartment was spotlessly clean, equipped with everything you might need for your break, very well situated, short distance from the metro station, supermarket (Pingo doce), local cafes and bistros. If you're physically fit , you could even avoid the metro to get around the city. Fantastic!
Thank you so much Silvia and your team of great helpers, for the bottle of red we we're welcomed and the warm hospitality.

The flat is very clean and well-equiped, plus it is in a quiet area of the city, close to many restaurants and cute little breakfast places. The historic centre is accessible by foot. Silvia and her friend Mariana have been very welcoming, we'd love to come again!

Silvia's Wohnung ist toll gelegen: ein netter Becker, supermarket, empfehlenswerte Restaurant's und viele  Sehenswürdigkeiten - alles fußläufig sehr gut erreichbar. Die U- Bahn Haltestelle nur 4 min zu Fuss  entfernt. Wir bekamen gute Sightseeing-Tipps  and Silvia war immer sehr gut für  uns  telefonisch erreichbar.Die Wohnung war schön hell und suß eingerichtet. Vielen Dank Silvia!

Silvia nos deu muita atenção antes da chegada e durante a estadia.
O apartamento estava extremamente limpo.
É novo, bem equipado, espaçoso. Perfeito para um casal!
O apartamento é bem localizado, fizemos muita coisa a pé.
No quarto, dá para fechar a veneziana e deixar bem escuro. Fora que o vidro é duplo e não deixa entrar nenhum som no apartamento. 
Enfim, ótimo custo benefício. Voltaremos com certeza!

Жильё очень понравилось, удобное расположение - центр, метро, вокзал, магазины близко. Квартира чистая, уютная, есть всё необходимое и даже больше того. Единственное - вместо обычного чайника была кофеварка, но мы приспособились. Очень рекомендуем (Website hidden by Airbnb) Юля, Алёна

appartement irréprochable, nous avons été reçu agréablement par l'amie de Silvia. Bel emplacement pas loin du centre. La ville de porto est a voir, les gens de porto sont  accueillant.
Nous reviendrons au Portugal .

A localização é muito boa. Apartamento tem todos os utensílios de cozinha e para a casa. Parece que você esta na sua própria casa. Tudo muito limpo . Sempre que precisei de alguma informação a anfitriã respondeu imediatamente,  isso me ajudou muito.
Apartmant is just few minutes from centar of town. Silvia was excellent host and the apartment was clean and beautiful. I would strongly reccommend Silvia’s accomondation.

We werden warm welkom geheten. Heerlijk om zelf een geheel appartement ter beschikking te hebben, woonkamer met open keuken, slaapkamer, badkamer.  De locatie is op korte loopafstand metro en leuke restaurants en loopafstand oude stad .  Erg aan te bevelen.

Super lugar para disfrutar Porto,  cerca de centro. 

Todos tipo de comercios cerca,  super comunicacion con Silvia.

El apartamento de Silvia es un verdadero "nido de amor". Todo está puesto y equipado como para quedarse a vivir en Oporto. Gracias Silvia por todo. Mi recomendación para este este lugar es de 11 puntos sobre 10. Nuevamente gracias y quoenes quoeran conocer Oporto no sólo deben sino que pueden alojarse en este "nido de amor". Gracias por todas tus atenciones Silvia.  Besos de los argentinos Silvia y Carlos
Silvia's flat is very tidy, comfortable and well situated. Our stay was incredible thanks to her attention and hospitality. If some day we return to Porto we will borrow her flat again for sure.

Останавливались в мае 2018. Отличная квартира. Современный ремонт, идеальная чистота, все необходимое для проживания в наличии. Квартира расположена в центральной части Порту. Все достопримечательности в пешеходной доступности. Сильвия замечательная и гостипреимная хозяйка.
Мы своим выбором не разочарованы. Замечательный город, Замечательная квартира. Рекомендуем....
sem dúvida foi o melhor apartamento que ficamos, era limpo, lindo, e tinha tudo, ficava perto do Métro, e de comércio, dava para fazer tudo a pé e ainda era silêncioso

The apartment is clean and cosy. Suits the needs of 2 people. We had everything that we needed for our 4 night stay. It’s a 10-15 minute walk from the central parts of Porto, however very close to public transport, and very easy to get to the airport. We were greeted very warmly by Mariana and Silvia who gave us lots of advice about Porto.
Please note, even though it didn’t affect us and we never felt unsafe, there are a couple of active sex workers operating in at the end of the street all day. However, we loved our stay. Thank you!! :)

Very nice apartment, perfect to visit Porto. 
Silvia took care of us perfectly I would recommend it to everyone.

Wir hatten als 3-köpfige Familie (14-jährige Tochter) einen wunderschönen Aufenthalt in Silvia Appartment. Die kleine Wohnung ist super top eingerichtet, sehr gut durchdacht, viele clevere Details, sehr sauber. Das Appartment ist noch schöner als auf den Bildern. Zur Straße hin sind zwei Fenster hintereinander, so dass man nachts trotz Straßengeräuschen gut schlafen kann. Beide Zimmer sind klimatisiert. Die Wohnung ist einfach schön und stilvoll eingerichtet.

Silvia ist eine sehr freundliche und herzliche Gastgeberin, sie hat uns sehr gut mit allen Infos versorgt, sowohl im Vorfeld wie auch vor Ort. Die Kommunikation war super.

Das Appartment hatte eine sehr gute zentrale Lage, um Porto zu Fuss zu erkunden, in 3 Minuten ist man an der Metro. Unweit der Wohnung gibt es Supermarkt, Gemüsehändler, Bäckerei, Cafés und Restaurants.

Eine bedingungslose Empfehlung unsererseits! Und einen herzlichen Dank an Silvia!

Silvia ist eine super Gastgeberin, sie antwortet sehr schnell auf Nachrichten und gibt hervorragende Tipps wie man zum Appartement  kommt und was ,an in Porto unternehmen kann. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen in einer blitzsauberen Wohnung, die mit allem ausgestattet ist. Es hat uns nichts gefehlt, wir waren vielmehr überrascht an was Silvia alles gedacht hat ( Regenschirm, Nähset, Einkaufstrolley,....). Das Appartement liegt nah an vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten die wir bequemem zu Fuß erreichen konnten. Und die elektrischen Jalousien haben gut abgedunkelt . In der Nähe sind zwei Supermärkte und viele Restaurants, dennoch ist es ruhig. Vielen Dank Silvia für diesen tollen Urlaub wir werden sicherlich wieder kommen

Die Wohnung liegt klasse, alles ist fußläufig zu erreichen. Der Bäcker ist direkt um die Ecke, ebenso die Metro. Sylvia hat viele gute Tipps und ist super freundlich. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Vielen Dank, Sylvia.

tivemos uma surpresa ao ficar alguns dias no apartamento da sílvia.
o imóvel é recém reformado,bem equipado e localização excelente.
o único problema é que você não vai mais querer ir embora.
o porto foi uma das cidades mais lindas que tive oportunidade de conhecer,
e olha que já viajei muito nesse mundão de deus.
a Silvia é super simpática e atenciosa .amamos tudo.
Un accueil très chaleureux, d'excellents conseils de A à Z, et un appartement très fonctionnel et agréable. Silvia fait tout pour que l'on passe un bon séjour. En bref: absolument rien à redire!

el departamento es muy bonito, funcional y céntrico, tiene lo necesario para pasarla muy bien, nosotros que desayunabamos y cenamos en el, tiene todo lo necesario para cocinar. muy agradable. Silvia muy atenta

Wir verbrachten 3 Tage in Silvias gemütlich kleiner Wohnung. Die Lage ist in Mitten der Altstadt und man erreicht alles gut zu Fuß. Das Appartement ist sehr gut ausgestattet und sehr sauber. Silvia war super nett, hat uns wertvolle Tipps gegeben und konnte uns bei allem weiterhelfen. Auch ein früherer Check in war möglich. Wir können die Unterkunft sehr weiterempfehlen!

Silvia is a wonderful host! She was very Quick to answer to our messages. She took the Time to welcome us and  gave us a lot of precious advices to visit Porto. The apartment is very clean and Well located just near the Subway. Thanks again Silvia !
Une hôtesse remarquable par sa gentillesse et sa disponibilité, sans oublier les attentions et surtout l'appartement super équipé, très bien situé, et très propre, je garde l'adresse pour mes amis

Silvia bolig er skinnende ren og ligger super centralt i forhold til den gamle bydel. Silvia selv er meget imødekommende og hjælpsom og gav os rigtig gode input til, hvad vi kunne gøre de 2 dage, vi var her. Kan klart anbefales!
Cozy, clean and convenient appartment near the old city.

Ultra propre, au coeur du vieux Porto, on s'est senti comme chez soi. Sylvana la co-host de Sylvia, nous a guidé avec gentillesse pour le stationnement et les points d'intérets. Merci encore et reviendriont sans hésiter.
Séjour & accueil parfait !

Friendly host and the place is clean and comfortable. We got everything we need!
If I come to Porto again, I will choice here!
超级舒服 干净的屋子 女主人特别热情 绝佳的体验

Bardzo dobra lokalizacja, blisko metro, supermarket, restauracje i główne atrakcje miasta. Mieszkanie czyste, w pełni wyposażone (m. in. garnki, kubki, talerze, sztućce, przyprawy, herbata, suszarka do włosów, klimatyzacja) zgodne z opisem i zdjęciami; wrażenia bardzo dobre. Silvia była bardzo pomocna i uprzejma. Pobyt w jej mieszkaniu był przyjemnością. Serdecznie polecam! I highly recommend this place and the host!

Aconselho o espaço da Sílvia a todos os viajantes, pelo seu conforto, limpeza, organização e comodidade, ideal para passar umas excelentes férias ou apenas  uns dias. Fica a 2mn do metro que nos leva a qualquer lugar. Fica a 10mn a pé do centro da cidade e onde não falta nada. E por fim a anfitriã Sílvia é de uma simpatia, atenciosa e cuidadosa com os viajantes. O que acabei de descrever corresponde exatamente ao anúncio apresentado no Airbnb.
Silvia is an excellent host and the property offers everything necessary to make Porto an unforgettable experience. Can't wait to return!

Silvia is an incredible host. She waited for us very late in the evening, taking time to explain how to live in the appartement ans showing us places to visit in the town.
She was very communicative ans compréhensive.
Thanks for everything Silvia.
We recommend the place for sure.
Apartamento aconchegante, limpo e organizado. A localização é boa, fomos a vários lugares a pé ... porém caminhamos muito. Valeu muito ficar nessa acomodação, certamente ficaria de novo.

Appartement très bien localisé et très propre.
Bonnes commodités.
Disponibilité de Silvia pour répondre à toutes nos questions.
Fortement recommandé sans hésitation.

Nous avons apprécié notre séjour à Porto ainsi que le logement bien placé, propre et moderne. Silvia est réactive. Nous avons été accueillis par une  amie qui a été agréable et soucieuse de nous donner des conseils.
Appartamento molto pulito. La proprietaria di casa è stata molto gentile per averci aspettate fino alle 23:30 per il check-in, molto disponili per le informazioni sul posto.
Super feliz com a hospedagem! Silvia foi extremamente atenciosa. Recomendo muito!!!!

In the apartment everything is thought out to the smallest detail. The hostess met a bottle of wine and provided information about the sights of Porto. The apartments are very close to the metro and the main sights. Next time we will definitely stay in this apartment. Thank you very much Silvia :)

Great place and wonderful hosts.The location is great and close by to everything you need. Sparkling clean and stylish you have everything you need. Silvia is a great host she gave us plenty of tips that helped us enjoy our stay in Porto. Definitely recommend staying at her place.

Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral, so dass man die Innenstadt auch gut zu Fuss aufsuchen kann. Für die "fußfaulen" ist eine Metro-Station aber auch direkt um die Ecke. Das Apartment ist schön und modern eingerichtet und ist für einen Städtetrip in Porto optimal. 
Silvia ist eine super Gastgeberin, die sehr darauf bedacht ist, dass es Ihren Gästen gut geht. 
Ich werde bestimmt wieder kommen.

Нас встретила дочь Сильвии, Марианна. Очень милая девушка. Рассказала нам все о квартире и окресностях города. Квартира замечательная, чистая, уютная. Все продумано до мелочей. Нас даже ждал приятный сюрприз от хозяйки: бутылка вина и воды. Всем рекомендуем эти апартаменты. Нам все очень понравилось.
Recomendo este apartamento para a estada no Porto por qualquer período. A hostess é extremamente educada e se mostra sempre disponível.
Absolut empfehlenswert.
Foi muito agradável e tinha tudo o que era preciso.

Jesteśmy z rodziną drugi raz u Silvi , mieszkanie super czyste, dobry kontakt, lokalizacja, wskazówki, troska o gości polecam 
urlop czy weekend w Porto tylko u Silvi
